28b3(rgyud): bri bar ba ste ni ba mo dang / be ru N+Da dang / gtum mo dang / 'jigs pad ma rnamaso// de rnams kyi mtshan ma ni mdung rtse gsum pa dang / drang ba dang / 'khor lo dang / dril bu dang / thod pa khrag dang bcas pa dang / 
28b4(rgyud): 'khar sol dang / mche ba dang / kha T+wAM ga'o// sgo srung rnams kyi ni thod/ pa dang / rus pa'i lu gu rgyud dang / brgod dang / bi la'o// de na sa phag rgya'i slob dade na chos spong ba/ gtsang gagos
28b5(rgyud): gtsang ma dgos pa thams cad za ba 'am/ thams cad spyad pa la yang sman pa med zhi ba'i pi ti'i phyag rgyas zhugs la snying de bzlas par bya'o// de nas dkyil 'khor gyi dbus nas
28b6(rgyud): b+he chen po thos par 'gyuraro// de nas slob dpon ma gtogs pa gzhan thams cad ji ltar 'ongs pa zhugs par 'gyur zhing 'thob par 'gyur te/ gdug po'i dam tshig ni ma gtogs so// de nas slob
28b7(rgyud): me lag na me tog thogs pas ras kyis mig bkab la nag po chen po'i phyag rgyas bcug ste/ rnam par dam tshig chen po d+ho zhes bya ba dang sbyar bar bya'o// de nas skrag nas me tog 'dor// de nas
28b8(rgyud): gang du ltung ba de lhag pa'i lngar bsgrub par bya'o// gal te ltung bar ma gyur na yang 'dor du bzhug// des ni 'jigs par byed par nus shong rnal 'bar yong so sor 'thob par 'gyur// de nas gdang
29a1(rgyud): g.yegs bkrol la dkyil 'khor bstan par bya'o// gdug pa la sogs pa'i phag rgyas mchod nas snying po dang rang rang gi mtshan ma sbyin par bya'o// de ras dam tshig bstan par bya sa/ 
29a2(rgyud): sems can thams cad rgyas gdab cing / dam tshig sdang rnams bza' bar ba// sngags rnams bstan par mi bste/ dang tshig rnal 'bor grub ster ba'o// drag po'i dam tshig bdung rtsa dang / ma mo rnams kyi
29a3(rgyud): rgyas 'debs par// gal nga 'das na khod kyi snying // rtag tu 'jig par byed par 'gyur// de nas brtsams to gang sha chen po za bo ni de ring po mi thogs par rnal 'ber 'grub par 'gyuraro// gang za bar
29a4(rgyud): mi 'gyur ba de'i rnal 'byor mdo// gal te dang tshig las 'angaso par 'gyur na tshigs thams cad kyis kyang mi gsed pa Ta 'gyur// phyag rgya'i ye shos bslab par byaste// ngag rgya'i gar
29a5(rgyud): dang mchod pa byas ras gter ma sbyin zhing bza' ba dang / btung ba dang / longs spyod la sogs pas tshor bar byas nas phyir byung bar bya'o// dngos grub thas cad kyi dang tshig
29a6(rgyud): ces bya ba'i ngag rgya'i dkyil 'khor// de nas sbrang rdzir bde pa la sogs pa ming po gsum gyis bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal te mgrin gcig tu rang gi de kho na nyid kyi snying po 'di
29a7(rgyud): phu le/ swa de nos 'di'i dkyil 'khor bshad par bste/ zur bzhi pa dang sgo bzhi par// phyi yid dkyil 'khor bri bar bya// de yi nang du dkyil 'khor ni// gzhu yi dbyibs can bri bar bya// de yi dgra
29a8(rgyud): su ming po ni// mchog gsum dag ni bzhag bya ste// sbrang rtsi bad dang rgyal byed dang // den kun grub dad ces pa ba'o// gaM cha ya lang bgos pa dang // de bzhin thod po mtshan ma 'dzin// lha yi gos/ 
29b1(rgyud): dang drang ba 'chang // cung zad dgod cing khri ba dang / seng ge'i khri la 'dug pa dang // 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyis mdzes pa'o// dngos grub kun sngar dag pa ste// gsum ni srid gsum dag dang mtshungs
29b2(rgyud): ske dang mtshams ni thams cad du// tshegs la sogs pa legs par bzhag/ sgrub dang 'phel chen gnod sbyin dang // gtam dang khre mchog gsod pa'o// pha rol pa dan rtse mo la/ dril bu'i brang bcas
29b3(rgyud): thams cad du/ bum pa gang pha rol mchog bcas// 'byung po ma lus gtor mar bcas/ klu rnams glu ru len pa dang // rol me rdung bar byed pa dang // de bzhin slob dpon gar bad pas// phyag rgya kun gyis
29b4(rgyud): 'jug par bribya/ zhugs nas spyan la dad pa yis// yang de/ nga yang du gdung bya zhing // me tog kun gyis mchod pa yis// sgrub dang de nyid dag kyang brjod/ 'jog rten gsum pa srid
29b5(rgyud): gsum mchog/ ngan song gsum mchod gsum rnam pa/ sum// legs ljon sbas pas grub pa ni// dngos grub kun la rtag tu'o// de nas snying po lan cig brjod cing phyag rgya thad
29b6(rgyud): kyi g.yas pa'i mdzub ro lcags kyur bas la dgug par bya'o// de nas dril bu dang bcas po'i drang ba rnams g.ye'o// thams cad bab nas de bzhin du gzhug par bya'o// de nas dam tshig
29b7(rgyud): 'di brjod par ba ste/ gal te dam tshig 'ongs gyur na// pha gsod 'gro ba gang yin dang / ma gsod pa yi 'gro ba gang / 'gro ba der ni 'gro bar 'gyur// rtag tu dam pa bstan par bya// dam pa
29b8(rgyud): min pa ye su spang / gzhan la de nyid bstan mi ga/ rtag tu ming po gsum po sgrub/ 'di ni ma tshig go// de nas glu dang / gar dang / rol mo dang / dgod pa dang / dga' ba dang / za ba dang / mgu
30a1(rgyud): bas ral tse ba'o// phyag rgya dang gar gyi rol re'i mchod pa yang byas la// stob dben gyis kyang bag rgyud dang bcas pas byung ba dang / 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i ye shes brjod par
30a2(rgyud): ba'o// de nas brtsams te dngos grubo thams cad dang / phun sum tshogs pa thams cad dong // 'byer ba thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro// dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor ro// de nas sring mo bzhis bcom ldan
30a3(rgyud): 'das la phyag 'tshal te/ rang gi de kho na nyid kyi snying po 'di phu'o// hUM de nas 'di'i dkyil 'khor bshad par bste/ dkyil 'khor kun nas zlum par thig btab la thig bzhi la 'khor lo bzhi pa bsal/ dkyil 'khor
30a4(rgyud): de rnams sgo bzhir lnga ba'i lha mo bzhi'i gzugs brnyan bzhag par bya ste/ 'di lta ste/ dga' ba ni shar du lta ga/ mda' dang gnu thegs pa la ba rtson pa/ sgeg ma mdog dmar ba'o// gsod ma lde phyogs lta ba/ 
30a5(rgyud): lag ni gre dang phug thogs pa/ mdog nag po'o// ngag mo nug tu lta/ galag na gsar gyi gtar thogs pa/ gsar gyi mdag ca ne/ grwa/ ba ba me/ zhib me zhes pa ba bang du lta ga lag ni gri dang / sha ka
30a6(rgyud): ra thogs pa/ mdog dkar me'o// phyi rol gyi sgo bzhir mtshan ma dgod pa bzhag par ba'o// de nas slob dben dril bu dkrol zhing lag pa g.yon pa kha T+wAM ga dang bcas pas 'jug par bya'o// zhugs nas snying
30a7(rgyud): po bzla bar ba'o// de nas phyag rgya dang gar gyi mchod pa btab par bya'o// de nas yid la 'dod pa'i dngos grub thams cad ster bar 'gyuraro// thams cad kyis mchod par 'gyur// mkha' 'gro ma la sogs pa'i
30a8(rgyud): gdon rnams kyis mi tshugs pa dang / 'di ni nor rnams kyang bskyed par 'gyuraro// ji ltar mngon par 'dod pa'i thams cad kyis mnyes par byed pa dang / gter thams cad 'byin pa dang / dngos grub thams cad
30b1(rgyud): sprub nus par 'gyur// slob ma gtsug pa yang de bzhin// de rnams kyang 'di dag thams cad 'grub par 'gyur/ las kyi dkyil 'khor// bde ba chen de rdo rje don yod pa'i dam tshig gi rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po las
30b2(rgyud): pi rol gyi rdo rje'i rigs kyi rtog pa rdzogs// / de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mtha' yas mu med pas mthar thug cing mu med pa'i chos dang ldan pas yang cho ga 'di mthar thug par
30b3(rgyud): byin gyis brlabs pa'i phyir chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi mthar thug pa byin gyis rlob pa rdo rje zhes pa gshes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di bshad/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mtha' yas
30b4(rgyud): bo zhing pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mtha' yas pa 'di/ bos/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma med pa nyid pas rdo rje tham sa cad mu med pa 'ad// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa du ma
30b5(rgyud): nyid pas ches thams cad du ma nyid// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa methar thug pa med pa nyid pas las thams cad mthar thug pa med pa nyid yin// gang la la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di
30b6(rgyud): nyan pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / ston pa dang / brjod pa dang / sgom pa de sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa mthar thug pa med pa'i mthar pin te sgrib pa thams cad zad nas/ de bzhin gsheg
30b7(rgyud): ba'am rdo rje 'dzin par myur du 'gyur ro// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'dus te/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'dri don yod pa dang / thegs pa med par myur du grub par bya ba'i phyir lag na rdo rje la/ lags
30b8(rgyud): nas bya ba byin/ sems can chen po legaso lags// bde ba chen po lagase legs// theg pa chen po lagase legs/ blo gres chen po leg so legs/ cho ga 'di ni legaso par smras/ sangs rgyas
31a1(rgyud): 'dzin kun gyis/ 'bras bu yod pa 'dul ba'i mchog rdo rje'i bde 'di'i ba'i gyis brlabs/ cho ga'i rgyal po blar med// gang rnams 'di dag 'dzin pa ni/ bdud la sogs pa thams cad kyis de
31a2(rgyud): dag 'i sod mi tshug se// sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang // dengs grub dam pa thams cad kyang // sangs rgyas kun gyis gsungs pa bzhin// ring por mi thogs 'thob par 'gyuraro// de skad gsungs nas gsang grub
31a3(rgyud): phyir rdo rje can gyis bshad pa la/ kun mtshog sangs rgyas mangs bcas pa// thams cad kyis ni mngon par bskyed// bde ba cher po rdo rje don yod pa'i dam tshig gi rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po las shes rab kyi
31a4(rgyud): rol tu phyin pa'i tshul rdzogs// / rgya gar gyi mkhan de a tsar+yashrad d+hA ka ra barma dang / nu chen gyi le tsA ba dge slong rin chen bzang bas bsgyur cing nus te gtan la phab pa/ 
31a5(rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i ches nyid brnyas pa/ chos thams cad spros pa med pas yang ride ba chen de rdo rje don yod pa'i dam tshig
31a6(rgyud): ces bya ba/ rdo rje chos nyid shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo dpal mchog dang po theg ma dang dbus med pa'i dam pa 'di gsung so// byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi 'dod chags chen po'i dngos
31a7(rgyud): grub dom pa ni/ bde ba chen po'i dngos grub dam por 'gyur// byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi bde ba chen po'i dngos grub dam pa ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byang chub chen de'i dngos grub
31a8(rgyud): dam par 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byang chub chen po'i dinges grub dam pa ni bdud chen po'i stobs thams cad rab tu 'joms par byed pa'i dngos grub dam par 'gyur// byang chub sems
31b1(rgyud): dpa' rnams kyi bdud chen po'i stobs rab tu 'joms pa'i dngos grub dam pa ni/ khams gsum pa thams cad dbang phyug chen po'i dngos grub dam par 'gyuraro// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi khams gsum badzad
31b2(rgyud): kyi dbang phyug gi dngos grub dam pa ni sems can gyi khar sa ma lus shing lus pa med par yengs skyeng bar 'dod pa'i rgyud phyir/ 'khor ba la yang ma chags shing brtson 'grus chen po'i byang chub sems dpa'
31b3(rgyud): rnams kyis sems can gyi khams ma lus shing lus pa med pa rnams yengasu sgrub pa dang / sems can thams cad la phan po bde ba'i mchog shin tu bde ba chen po'i dngos grub dam par 'gyur// de ci'i phyir zhan/ 
31b4(rgyud): ci srid 'khor ba'i gnas ni/ mkhas mchog 'dug par gyur pa'i tshe/ ji srid mtshungs med sems can don// mya ngan mi 'da' byed par nus/ shes rab pha rol phyin thabs dang / yes shes gnasu bsgrub
31b5(rgyud): bas ni/ chos kun rnam par dag pa'i phyir/ 'khor ba yongs drug pa 'gyur// chags la sogs pas 'dul na ni// 'khor ba'i ba ra du rtag par yang // 'jig rten sdig byed de sbyar bar// 'khor
31b6(rgyud): ba srid du bdag nyid 'bul/ ji ltar pad+ma rab dmar ba// 'dam gyi nyes pas mi ges pas// de bzhin gnas pa'i nyes pa yis// 'gro phan rnams la mi gso// 'dod chags chen po rnam par dag/ bde bo chen po nor
31b7(rgyud): che la khams gsum dbang phyug thos pas na// sems can don rnams bstan par byed// nang par langs nas dpal mchog dang po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul gyi sgo'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nyin ra
31b8(rgyud): bzhin 'don pa dang / nyen pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / klog pa dang / snyam pa de yis bde bo dang yid bde ba thams cad kyang theb par 'gyur/ bde ba chen po'i rdo rje don yod pa'i dam tshig dngos grub kyi mchog kyang
32a1(rgyud): tshe 'di la thob par 'gyuraro// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba mchog kyang 'grub ste/ rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po thams cad dam/ de bzhin gshegs par 'gyuro// bde ba chen po
32a2(rgyud): rje don yod pa'i dam tshig dpal mchog dang po las/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bde ba chen po rdo rdza gas ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo rdzog so// // de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
32a3(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje sems dpa' byin gyis rlob pa'i rdo rje gsang ba mchog gi dngos grub kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyal po chen po de bzhin gshegs ga thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje gsang
32a4(rgyud): ba'i don yod cing bstan pa'i cho ga phyag rgya btab pa'i sku gas rang thugs thams cad kyis rdo rje bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig chen de thams cid la rab tu zhugs nas ches
32a5(rgyud): zhi rdzogs pa'i ye shes la rab tu zhugs nas/ de bzhin ga/ shegs pa thams cad kyisna tshogs pa'i drin las kyis dus pa/ sum du 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus par spros pa las kyi ma
32a6(rgyud): can de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad chen po/ zla ba byed pa du ma la rab tu gnas pa'i rdo rje rin po che rnams kyi 'od zer sna tshogs pa rnam par 'bar ba'i 'od kyis gsal ba gsar gyi dril bu
32a7(rgyud): btag pa dang / sna tshogs pa'i ba dan rlung gis bskyod pa rnams kyis nye rab mdzes par bas pas/ me tog gi phreng ba sna tshogs pa dang / na bza' dang / me long dang / mu tig gi phreng ba rab tu 'phyang bas
32a8(rgyud): mdzes shing rgyan pa/ sna tshogs pa'i khakhyer la gnas pa mchog tu gyur pa'i lha'i bu mo dgod pa dang / sgeg pa dang / gar dang / glu yis rab tu rgyan pa dang / bstod pas sad par byed pa/ bde ba chen po rdo rje
32b1(rgyud): sangs dpa'i gnas gzhal yas khang pa la bzhug so// de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rjes byin gyis brlabs pa'i dam tshig
32b2(rgyud): sems dpa' thams cad dang dbang bskur ba thams cad dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i ting nge 'dzin las thams cad mchog tu gyur pa/ khams gsam thams cad 'dal bar mdzad pa/ thams cad dbang du byed pa po 'byin
32b3(rgyud): pa po 'dod pa thams cad pa/ rgya che ba'i dngos grub kyi cho ga thams cad po/ rtag pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa la gsol ba btab pa/ ci srid srid pa'i bar gnas pa// nga srid sems can don mchog mdzod sems
32b4(rgyud): can khams ni mtha' yas dang / rgyal sras srid par 'dod pa'i phyir/ srid pa'i skyon rnams 'joms phyir dang // bde ba chen po 'phel ba'i phar// gsang ba'i rtog pa mchog gsang ba'i// rjes
32b5(rgyud): gnad par bdag la stsol// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pas chos thams cad sgrib po med pa nyid la lhag pa ra dgengs nas// gdul ba thams cad thugs rje chen po'i sna tshegs
32b6(rgyud): rdo rje nas bya pa'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ ma lus shing lus pa med pa'i sems can gyis bsam pa thams cad yongs rdzogs par byed pa dang / thams cad yengs bstang ba dang / phan pa dang / bad pa dang
32b7(rgyud): dngos grub thams cad phun sum tshogs pa dang / ya shas dang / las dang / mchog gi dngos grub gi rgyur 'gyur ba'i bar du de bzhin gshegs pa'i thams cad nyid dang / rdo rje 'chang chen po thob pa mchog gi
32b8(rgyud): dngos gru kyi don bde ba chen po'i rdo rje dang po de/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor los bsgyur ba nyid de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis skra'i phreng ba'i cod pan gyis dbang bskur bas yin// de nA
33a1(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang chen po ma lus pa lus pa med pa'i bde ba chen po mchog gi dngos grub la sogs pa dngos grub thams cad thob par bya ba'i phyir/ sems dpa'i dkyil mo
33a2(rgyud): dgrangs bcas te sku drang por srang ste/ g.yen pa snyems pa'i tshul du mdzad nas g.yas pa rdo rje gser bas rang gi thugs khar dang po'i rdo rje mchog gi sbyor ba 'dzin cing bde ba rgan de'i rdo rje nas bya ba thams
33a3(rgyud): cad kyi phyag rgya 'di nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs las 'byung // oM ma hA su kha badz+ra satwa dzaHhUM baM ho su ra ta s+t+waM/ de nas phyung ba tsam gyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad bon nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams
33a4(rgyud): cad kyi khro tshur yongasu dazung ba rnams slar yang byang chub chen be mngon par rdzogs nas de rnams kyis bzhad pa chen po mngon par mdzad// 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad g.yes pa dang shin tu
33a5(rgyud): g.yos pas yongasu dag par gyur to// khams gsum rgyas pa/ ra spros pa thams cad kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi 'khor chen po ra gyur to// gang gi sems can thams cad bde ba dang yid bde ba thob
33a6(rgyud): bar gyur to// de nas rdo rje 'chang chen pos de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi don yod cing / thegs pa med pa las mngon par 'byung bar rdo rje chen po phyag ces bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ bad
33a7(rgyud): ba chen po rdo rje'i dam tshig ces bya ba rnam par gnon par mdzad nas de'i sku thams cad las dngos grub thams cad dang bde ba dang yid bde ba ster ba rtag tu rjesu 'brel ba can ldan cig du spyod pa bde ba chen po
33a8(rgyud): rdo rje dam tshig gi sems dpa' rnams phyung nas phyogs thams cad du phyung ste mdun du rdo rje gsang ba yid las byung ba g.yasu rdo rje kI li kI li/ rgyab tu 'dod pa'i rdo rje g.yon du rdo rje bsgyings pa'o// mtshams
33b1(rgyud): rnamasu mched pa'i lha mo rnam so// phyi rol gyi kha khar 'tshar su lha'i bu mo rnam so// sgo srung ba rnams ni rdo rje lcags kyu dang / zhags pa dang // lcags sgrog dang / dril bu 'dzin pa'o// pha rol tu rdo rje sge srud kyi tshegs
33b2(rgyud): dang po nya dang bran rnam so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi khu tshur bcings te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad byang chub rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyems par zhugs nas
33b3(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' rdo rje 'chang chen po la gsol ba btab ste/ sems can kun la bdade don du// rgyal ba chen po 'byung ba ste// chags bral de rnams chags ldan yang // rang gi btsun me'ang
33b4(rgyud): gsol mdzad pas// de phyir bdag gi khad la gsel// bde/ ba chen po rdo rje che// gsang ba'i rtog pa'i dngos grub ste/ 'dul ba mchog ni bshad du gsol// de nas bcom ldan 'das don yod cing
33b5(rgyud): thegs pa med pa'i bka' bde ba chen po thams cad kyi dngos grub 'dul ba rdo rje 'dod pa'i mchog ces bya ba'i rnam par ge non par mdzad nas rdo rje chen po gsang ba'i dam tshig ces pa pa'i
33b6(rgyud): dkyil 'khor chen po 'di gsungs// de nas yang dag bshad pa pa// dkyil 'khor chen po dam pa ste/ bde ba chen po rdo rje mchog/ dam tshig dam pa'i ring can yin// dkyil 'khor gnas ni 'dus bsol// de'i
33b7(rgyud): dbus che ga bzhin du ni/ bag rgya chen po mnyam gzhag nas// de ni dkyil 'khor bsgrub par ba// gsar zhing lags par bsgril ba dang / bdud bdag ni med pa yi/ thig skud dmar pos thig btab nas// tshon gyi po
33b8(rgyud): mas bri bar ba// ngur bon pa la sme bzhi pa// sgo khyud bzhis ni mdzes pa dang / 'khor gyis ni ying su bskor/ mtsham su lha ya~M bu mes mdzes// dkyil 'khor gyi ni mtshams rnams dang // sme dang sde khyad mtsharas
34a1(rgyud): / rnams zla ba phye la gnas pa yi// rdo rje rin rgan 'ad zer 'dar// rlung gis skyed pa'i dril bu cheg/ ba dan sna tshogs mdzes pa yin/ me leng dra ba ma tog drang / ldan pa'i pha rol dkyil 'khor
34a2(rgyud): bri da yi nang du 'khor le ni// dkyil 'khor brgyad pa dang 'dra ba/ rdo rje thig gis yongs bskor ba'o// rdo rje 'khor le yang dag bri// da dbus cho ga bzhin du ni// rdo rje sems dpa' dged par ba// blugs sam yang na bas
34a3(rgyud): pa 'ams brdungs sam yang na bris pa yis// bshad pa dang bcas zla ba'i 'od// 'bar ba'i 'od zer dmar pos khab// sangs rgyas drang bas rnam par mdzes// ska la tshen gyis yang dag byugs// sems dpa'i dkyil
34a4(rgyud): mo dkrungs gis bzhugs// rdo rje bsnyems pa 'dzin pa'i ma/ tshig/ sa ma ya ste zhes brjod nas/ snying khar rnam par dgod pa/ ra ba// de yi legs ni thams cad du// sems dpa' chen po rnams bris
34a5(rgyud): de tshon nas yang na rdul chen gyis// go rims ci bzhin bri bar ba// mdun du sku mdog dmar be ni/ rdo rje mtshon cha la brtson pa/ g.ya su dag po'i dkar po ste/ lags par 'byung ba'i rdo rje can/ rgyab tu sku mdog
34a6(rgyud): seng po ste/ chu srin gyi ni rgyal mtshan 'dzin/ g.yon du sku dag sngon po ste/ phyag gnyis snyems pa 'dzin la sogs/ mchod pa'i snod rnams 'dzin pa'o// mchod pa'i lha ro bri bar ga// sgeg mo bshad na gu ma dang
34a7(rgyud): dkar me lha yi bu mo'i tshogs/ rdo rje lcags kyu nags pa dang // rdo rje lpags rjeg dril bu snrums sgron bzhi po rnams la ni/  srung bani pa dgod pa jug/ danas de dag gi snying po rnams ni 'di yin te/  dz+ra dr-iSh+Ti sA
34a8(rgyud): ka maH/ hUM badz+ra kI li kI li ye hUM/ hUM smA ra badz+ra bi d+ha hUM/ hUM tuSh+Ta badz+ra pa Ni hUM/ rdo rje bran no// de nas mchod pa'i lha mo rnams kyi ni/ hUM ma d+hu ra badz+re hUM/ hUM badz+ra ma g+ho hU~M/ hUM shwa rad badz+ra hUM/ hUM badz+ra sha ri hUM/ de nas lha'i bu mo rnams
34b1(rgyud): kyi ni hUM dz+wa lA s+ye/ ma hA bar badz+ri Na/ oM badz+ra gI te badz+ra/ oM d+hi ti badz+ra/ de nas sgro srung rnams kyi ni/ dza maM ku shi bA ti ha ra/ hU badz+ra pA sha ga na/ ba badz+ra s+phoT du ha/ a badz+ra g+ha btsud/ de ltar lha mo'i dkyil 'khor du/ bud mad
34b2(rgyud): grags pa nyid ni 'ged// bkod na de dag rnams kyis re/ byin gyis brlabs pa nyidadu 'gyur// de nas phyag na rdo rje 'dzin// dkyil 'khor kun tu bris pas nas/ bum pa gang po ji snyed dang / ma teg la sogs kun gyis mched/ 
34b3(rgyud): dril bu btags pa'i ba dan rnams// mtshams rnamasu ni gzhag par ba/ lcug ma dang bcas bum po rnams// sgo yi bi rel dag tu bzhag/ rdo rje dang bcas gzhi dang // bcug mo yongs bzlas nas ni/ dri chus gang ba'i bum pa
34b4(rgyud): ste pag na rdo rje'i mdun banag pa// de la 'di ltar bde ba chen po'i dam tshig gi bdud rtsi'i chu byin gyis brlab pa'i snying po ni/ oM mahA su kha ba dzA sa ma ya/ a b+hi Shaka/ dzaHhUM baM ho// lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzla'o// chu
34b5(rgyud): 'di gter ba 'ar 'thungs na sdug bsngal thams cad rab tu byang ba dang / bde ba thams cad rab tu 'angal bar 'gyur ba yin// de nas rang gi dam tshig rnams kyis rdo rje 'chang la sogs pa bsdum
34b6(rgyud): par bya'o// dzaHhUM baM heHnas brjed nas dgug pa dang / gzhug pa dang / bcings nas skad cig gis dbang du 'gyuraro// phag rgya chen po mnyam gzhag ste/ de bzhin g.yasu mdzub lcags kyus// dgug pa 'di ni lan
34b7(rgyud): gnog gis// 'grub par rab tu gzhug par ba// oM mahA su kha badz+ra satwa/ a a ti shI g+h+ra~M su kha badz+ra gu h+ya sa ma yau ma nu sma ra bA nu s+pha ra pra b+hU ta sa ma ya s+t+waM hri da ya/ su troSh+yo me b+ha wa/ su be Sh+yo ma b+ha wa/ a nur
34b8(rgyud): k+She ma b+ha ba/ a d+hi tiSh+Tha b+ha ga bA a na ti na da na sod d+h+ye tu me man+ta pa de dzaHhUM baM heHde nas rtag tu bcom ldan 'das// dkyil 'khor du ni rang nyid byin// dgug cing bcug gnas brtan pa dang / dbang du 'gyur zhing
35a1(rgyud): 'grub pa yin/ rmang du byung ba'i rdzu 'phrul du sa rnams mthong ba'am/ yang na bcom ldan 'das rang nyid kyis mthong bar 'gyur/ da nas rang nyid rdo rje 'dzin kun gyi sleb dben ni phag rgya thams cad 'grub
35a2(rgyud): ba dang tshig thams cad shes pa/ las thams cad rus pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bir gyis brlabs pa yin// 'jug pa'i tshi ga 'di yis rdo rje sleb dben rang nyid ci snyed pa'i dris byugs shing bsgos pa rgyan dang bcas
35a3(rgyud): ba'i ma ngag gi phreng bas lus shin tu rgyan pa/ ges dmar po gnyis bsgres pas rang nyid kyi bcom ldan 'das la bstod cing rdo rje dang bcas pa'i rdo rje bsnyems pas rang nyid 'jug par bya'o// bstod pa ni drug ldan
35a4(rgyud): la sogs pa glu yis bya'o// 'ded chags la sogs bde kun yid khyed ni/ kun tu sa bdag la bde ba la stsol cig/ rdo rje sems dgengs myur du bdag bstan mdzad// dag dgyes mdzad dang
35a5(rgyud): bde mcheg grub la 'dud de nas rab tu zhugs nas dgengasu gsol bar bya ste/ thig mtha' med pa'i sems dpa' ni// rdo rje sems dpa' bad pa chen// kun tu bzang po khad yin te// rdo rje bsnams bdag khyab bdag
35a6(rgyud): yin/ saras kyi sems dpa'i ting 'dzin// de bzhin rdo rje rdo rje 'dzin// kun mchog dam tshig dngos grub can/ rdo rje sems bdag de grub mdzod// de nas bcom ldan de nyid kyis/ rdo rje sleb dben bin rlabs gyur// de sngar ma
35a7(rgyud): byung ba'i se ser rang rig pa'i bde ba gnyis ka la skye bar 'gyuraro// phra mo dbab par 'gyuraro// de nas bcom ldan 'das grub par gyur to// zhes shes par bya'o// de nas de bzhin du 'dug lo ci 'dod pa'i bzlas brjed
35a8(rgyud): phyi de nas de bzhin du 'dod la rang gi bsod nams kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis 'dod pa'i dngos grub thob par 'gyuraro// de nas brtsams te sems dpa' chen po thams cad 'grub par 'gyur zhing mthong bar 'gyur
35b1(rgyud): de rnams kyis kyang de la dngos grub thams cad rtsol bar mdzad/ phag rgya thams cad kyang bdag rang nyid kyis bcings nas las thams cad 'grub par 'gyur// dam tshig thams cad kyang 'di la bstan par 'gyur
35b2(rgyud): yid kyi 'ded pa'i las rnams kyang bde pa yino// de ba dang yid bde pa thams cad nyams myed ning gzhan gyis mi thub pa dang mi sad pas lo gcig 'das nas sangs rgyas nyid la sogs pa'i mchog gi dngos
35b3(rgyud): grub thob pa yin// de nas sems can thams cad zhugs pa'i don du brtag par bya ba yin/ rdo rje slob dben rang nyid snga ma bzhin du lus la brgyan nas rab tu bde ba'i rdo rje'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya rab tu bcug te/ 
35b4(rgyud): bzhin du de kho na nyid chen po bskul bas yang dag par bskul la dgug par ba la 'di skad ces brjod do// sid pa'i bde ba rnam dag phyir/ sngar gyi srid pa la khed dga'/ 'dod pa kun gyi dngas grub cha/ 
35b5(rgyud): 'gro ba kun la'ang 'grub par gyis// de nas mchod pa bas la/ rang gi lhag pa'i lha gang yin pa de'i dam tshig phyag rgya ma tog dang bcas pa gzugs par ba ste/ bcug nas rna bar 'di skad
35b6(rgyud): ces brjed par bya'o// chags bral nyid kyis 'dul bar 'gyur// 'dod chags chen po bde ba cha// rdo rje sems dpa' sbas pa yin// 'dod chags bal ba lta bu yi// sdug bsngal gzhan ni rang bzhin med// de
35b7(rgyud): ngas sems can chags bra'o// slar yang yid ni mi byed cig/ de nas me tog la sogs pa snying po 'dis 'dir du gzhug/ oM ma hA su kha badz+ra satwa pra to gr-i h+Na sa ma ya ste/ de nas gang du bus pa de ni de'i lnga
35b8(rgyud): yinod / de nas de len nyid chen por brjod par bya'o// gang 'dod pa'i snying po byin la sgrub tu bcug la rang nyid lhag pa'i dbang bskur bas dbang bskur nas de'i mtshan ma lag pa gnyis byin te/ de'i rigs kyi ming
36a1(rgyud): gi dang bskur la snying po 'dis dang bskur bar bya'o// oM sarba A ga ta At+make sa badz+ra d+ha ra sa mu kha b+ha a b+hiShi tra/ a b+hi'i nA mi gr-i h+Na sid+d+hi badz+ra te a ro g+ha sang+ge ste/ de nas phyag rgya bcings pa
36a2(rgyud): bslab par bya'o// de nas ci 'dod pa'i mchod pa bas shing bang du bcug nas ci 'dod pa bza' ba dang btung bas sleb ma rnams tshim par byas le phyag rgya dang phyag rgya'i lan dang gar dang rgod pa byed du bcug cing rang
36a3(rgyud): nyid kyis myong ba'o// de nas thams cad bgrad nas 'di skad brjod par bya ste/ theg mtha' rgyu yi 'gro ba 'di/ dga' bas mchog la rag lus te// sems dpa' chen po rdo rjer 'gyur/ sngar yang gshegs par mdzu
36a4(rgyud): gsol// de nas snyim pa'i me tog der nas dbyung bar bya'o// dkyil 'i khor yang rang nyid kyi phyogs la rdul chen de dag gi ril bu byas lnga bzhag na las thams cad 'grub par 'gyuraro// de nas bad ba chen
36a5(rgyud): po rdo rje dam tshig gi bdud rtsi'i tshul de yang bcug na tshe 'phel ba/ la sogs pa'i las thams cad dgongs pa yino// de nyid kyis dbang bskur na yang dkyil 'khor du dbang bskur ba bab pa
36a6(rgyud): dang mchog gi dngos grub kyang theb par 'gyuraro// gal te sku bri bi'i ri mo mkhan ma rnyed na rang gi phyag mtshan gyi phyag rgya rnams kyis dkyil 'khor bri bar bya'o// gal te de yang mi shes na/ phyag mtshan bzhag par
36a7(rgyud): ba'o// phyag rgya'i cho ga rgyas pa'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das don yod pa thogs pa med pa myur du 'grub pa'i cho ga rgya rga ba'i dam tshig rdo rje nas pa bi'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te rnam par gnon par
36a8(rgyud): mdzod nos rdo rje 'chang chen pos 'di gsung so// bde ba chen po rab bsgrubs dang / 'dod pa chen po rnam dag phyir// rdo rje sems dpa' 'grub pa ni// brtag par myur du bshad par ga/ ci srid 'khor ba'i gnas
36b1(rgyud): ni de srid sems can gnon par bya// mya ngan 'das pa byang chub sgrib// de nyid kyi ni dam tshig rnams// ji srid pa la gnas pa ni// de srid sems can don nyid byed // thams cad dag pa'i mchog chos can// ci ltar
36b2(rgyud): sems can kun gyi don// dngos grub thams cad rab sgrub pa// daphyir sbyin tshegs pha rol byin// byang chub spyod pa mchog gi min// de bzhin gshegs ni 'dul min la// sems can kun rnams don mdzad pa// 'di ni
36b3(rgyud): nges grub rab grub na// dus kun tu ni thams cad mdzad// de nas sgrub 'di bshad bya ste/ dngos gu'i shin tu brtag pa yin// gang gis srid pa 'di nyid du// shin tu brtags pa'i dngos grub thob/ dkyil 'khor
36b4(rgyud): ngag tu ma zhugs kyang // dam tshig rnam par spangs pa 'am/ bsod/ nams med kyang thams cad du/ srid pa 'di la myur du 'grub/ gal te dngos grub sgrub 'dod na// rtag tu yul dang ldan gyur
36b5(rgyud): ma gsang ba'i mched pas mchod nas ni/ rang rang phag rgyas la grub par 'gyur// drug ldan la sogs snyan pa'i gru// gas pa kun kyang phyir 'dod par// bzlas pa'i don ni ci nus
36b6(rgyud): pas rdo rje sems dpa' bsgrub par bya// 'di yis 'dod pa'i kun dbang phyug/ ci 'dod 'ang ngo mkha' la rgyu// dngos grub kun gyi dbang phyug grub rga shi med cing gtso bar 'gyur// rgyal ba kun gyis mchod
36b7(rgyud): byas la// rang gzhan kun gyis bsnyen bskur zhing // rdo rje 'chang chen dang mtshungs shing // don yod kun spyod pa yin no// bde ba chen po rdo rje grub pa'i rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa'i dngos
36b8(rgyud): grub thams cad rab tu sbyar ba'i rdo rje 'tshang byang chub sems dpa' yin na// gal te de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dngos grub mngon par 'dod pa des/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa
37a1(rgyud): // de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya'i khu tshur yongasu 'dzin pa ras ris la bri bar bya'o// shad pa dang bcas pa dngos pa mas cad du de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis yongasu bskor
37a2(rgyud): ba'o/ de'i mdun du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad khu tshur yongasu 'dzin pas/ rdo rje'i tshig gis stong phrag bzlas par bya'o// 'bum rdzogs pa na mtshan pad na bdud kyi tshogs rnams 'ong bar 'gyur// 
37a3(rgyud): de nas bdud thams cad kyi stobs gzhom par bcom par bya'o// de nas tho rangs kyi dus su de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad nyid dang byang chub sems dpa' nyid thob par 'gyuraro// gal te rdo rje 'chang chen po
37a4(rgyud): nyid mngon par 'dod nas des lugs ma 'am/ 'dus byas pa 'am/ brdungs pa 'am// ras ris la sogs par legs par bri sa pa'i bag na rdo rje'i rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor bzhin du sngar grub pa
37a5(rgyud): la sku gzugs kyi khyad par ci ltar thob pa rdo rje sems dang / 'i sgrub pa bshad de/ zla ba drug gis rdo rje 'chang chen po dngos grub chen po 'grub bo// gal te rdo rje 'chang chen po dgul
37a6(rgyud): na bde ba chen po rdo rje lcags kyus dgug cing ci 'dod pa bsgrub par bya'o// zla ba gcig bzlas nas thams cad gsol bar bya'o// gal te rang gi ngag rgyas bdag nyid sgrub na rang gi lha'i phyag rgya chen po
37a7(rgyud): bcings te bsgoms pas bdag rdo rje sems dpa' yino zhes bsgoms la bsgrub par bya'o// de ci ltar mngon par 'dod pa'o bzlas pas bdag nyidaM bsgrub par bya'o// yang dang yang du sme mo zhing bzlas pa de
37a8(rgyud): srid bdag gis pa'o// ci srid rdo rje 'chang nyid zla ba phyed bzlas nas thob par 'gyuraro// de nas 'dod pa thams cad kyi dbang phyug sgrub par 'dod na de bzhin du rang yid du 'ong ba dang bcas par rab tu zhugs
37b1(rgyud): tephyag rgya bcings la de srid bzlas par bya'o// ci srid bdag 'dod pa rnams kyis dbang phyug dang khams gsum pa ma lus pa'i bdag por 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang khams gsum pa
37b2(rgyud): ma lus pa'i rdo rje'i rgyun gyi rang bzhin thams cad grub pa'i chos nyid kyi ye shes rnam par rol par mdzad nas ma bsgrubs pa'i phyag rgya'i las kyi rgyun rdo rje'i cho ga rgyas pa 'di gsung so// ma bsgrubs pa'i
37b3(rgyud): snying po'i las rnams 'di lta ste bdag nyid srung ba ni bde ba chen po'i rdo rje gsang ba'i gtsug tor gyis// thams cad srung ba ni bde ba chen po rdo rje gsang ba'i mdzod spraso// phyogs thams cad dang 'chims
37b4(rgyud): drang dkyil 'khor bcings pa ni/ bde ba chen po rdo rje gsang ba la brar ba'i phreng ba so// bdud thams cad kyi stobs gzhom pa ni dad pa chen po rdo rje gsang ba mi bskyed paso// tsha 'phel bar bya ba ni bde ba
37b5(rgyud): chen po rdo rje gsang ba'i bdud rtsiso// gzugs chen po phun su mtshogs pa ni/ bde ba chen po rdo rje gsang pa'i gzugs can gyiso// gzi brjid dang na chod shin tu bzang po rab tu 'phel ba
37b6(rgyud): la ni bde ba chen po rdo rje gsang ba'i bcud kyis lan gyi so// stobs dang mdog 'phel ba la ni/ bde ba chen po rdo rje gsang ba'i mthu yi so// dbang bskur ba thams cad la ni rdo rje gsang ba'i bcod pan gyiso// ra
37b7(rgyud): thams cad thob par bya ba la ni rdo rje gsang ba'i dbang phyug gis// rgyal srid thob pa la ni rdo rje gsang ba'i rgyal po'i phyag rgyaso// sa ma lus pa thob pa la ni rdo rje gsang ba'i rtsal gyiso// thams cad dbab pa dang
37b8(rgyud): g.yo bar bas pa dang // gar byed du gzhug pa dang / dus gsum bden pa nyid du slar gzhug pa la ni bde ba chen po rdo rje gsang ba'i dam tshig gi don du gzhug paso// pra sa na tha~Md grub pa la ni rdo rje gsang ba'i
38a1(rgyud): pra san dbab pas// gdon thams cad las thab pa ni rdo rje gsang pa'i rangs pa'o// thams cad gnyid log par bya ba la ni rdo rje gsang ba'i gnyid kyiso// thams cad rgyas gdab pa la ni bdes
38a2(rgyud): chen de rdo rje gsang ba'i dam tshig gi mkha 'gro maso// thams cad du gsang ba la ni rdo rje gsang ba mthar byed kyiso// thams cad bsgyel po la ni rdo rje gsang ba'i hUM mdzad kyiso// thams cad bslang ba la ni rdo rje gsang ba'i
38a3(rgyud): dam tshig gis bslang ba'i// thams cad bcing ba la ni rdo rje gsang ba bcing bso// thams cad thar bar bya ba la ni rdo rje gsang ba'i yi ge mu so/ 'bra man ma thams cad las thar bar bya ba la dang sngon gyi gnas
38a4(rgyud): skabs rjes sbyin pa la ni gsang ba chen po ha ru ka'i rdo rjeso// ma mo de'i gdon thams cad laso thar bar bya ba la ni rdo rje gsang po shrI drag mo so// 'phra man ma thams cad kyis rgyas btab pa la dang / 
38a5(rgyud): thar bar bya ba la dang snying thos pa las snying gzhan 'byung bar 'phru dag pa dang / shi ba gseb la ni dam chog chen po gsang pa'i ka'i rdo rje'i dbang bskur ba'i phyag rgyas// gdug brgyad kyi 'a
38a6(rgyud): rgya gzhig pa la ni rdo rje gsang ba'i rdo rje so// rims thams cad zhi ba la ni rdo rje gsang ba'i 'bar ba'i lta bas// dug thams cad gzhig pa dang / bza' ba dang / 'bab pa dang / 'o tsho ba gseb la ni gsang ba chen po rdo rje nar
38a7(rgyud): bu'i phyag rgyaso// dug thams cad dang / sbyar ba'i dug thams cad rab tu zhi bar bya ba la ni/ rdo rje gsang ba'i dug med pa so// gshed byad thams cad dang / byad dang ro langs dang / byung dang / gnod sbyin mo rnams kyi gzhig pa la ni
38a8(rgyud): rdo rje gsang ba'i sbyin sreg gis// rtse dpa thams cad dang / 'thab pa dang / 'thob mo dang / rtsod pa gzhig pa la ni rdo rje gsang ba'i zhal rab tu gdangs paso// yams dang / 'tshe ba thams cad dang / sdig pa dang / rmi lam
38b1(rgyud): ngan pa gcig pa la ni rdo rje gsang ba'i ni bso// gzhan gyi dpung thams cad rengs par bya ba dang / gnyid log par bya ba dang / rmongs par bya ba dang / lkugs par bya ba dang / rgyas gdab pa dang / gsad pa la ni bde ba
38b2(rgyud): chen po rdo rje gsang ba'i gshed byed kyis// 'thab mo thams cad las rgyal ba thob la ni rdo rje gsang ba'i rgyal mtshan gyi dngadra rgyan gyis// gdug pa thams cad gzhag pa la ni rdo rje gsang ba'i rdo rje lags
38b3(rgyud): bas// dgegs thams cad zhi bar bya ba la ni rdo rje gsang ba'i thabs sbyor gyiso// dgra bo thams cad rnam par gzhig pa la ni rdo rje gsang ba'i rnam par 'thor bso// bdud kyi stobs thams cad gzhom pa
38b4(rgyud): la ni rdo rje gsang ba'i rab tu 'dul bso// sprin bskyed pa la ni rdo rje gsang ba'i sprin chen poso// char dbab pa la ni rdo rje gsang ba'i bsdigs mdzub kyis// thog dbab pa dang / klog dang / rlung dang / 
38b5(rgyud): char zhi bar bya ba la ni rdo rje gsang ba'i sprin srung gis// sprin dang / mun pa dang / khug sna zhi bar bya ba la ni rdo rje gsang ba'i bde ga chen po'i spyan gyiso// klu thams cad dgug pa la~M ni rdo rje
38b6(rgyud): gsang ba'i phyag rgyaso// klu thams cad dbang du bya ba la ni gsang ba thams cad kyi nor bu'i phyag rgya ste// klu thams cad rjesu 'brang bar bya bya la ni rdo rje gsang ba'i klu 'dul bso// klu thams cad 'byin pa la
38b7(rgyud): ni rdo rje gsong po'i klu 'did bsre/ sa ma lus po g.yo zhing 'gul bar bya ba lo ni rdo rje gosang po'i thar paso// chu mang bor chu'i phung po char bsal zhing dri ma med par bskyed pa la ni dad batshon po rdo rje
38b8(rgyud): kwa'i phyag rgya so// munu pa nyi ma'i snang ba chen po bskyed pa la ni rdo rje nyi ma'i phyag rgyas// rlung thams cad dbang du bya ba la ni rdo rje rlung thams cad kyiso// namakha' la gzugs thams cad kun tu ston pa
39a1(rgyud): la ni rdo rje gsang ba'i 'dzin paso// na mkha' las dngos po thams cad 'byung bar bya ba la ni rdo rje gsang ba'i 'byung bso// na mkha' la rang gi bdag nyid kyi dngos po kun tu bstan par
39a2(rgyud): bya ba la ni rdo rje gsang ba'i rdzu 'phrul gyis// na mkha' la de bzhin gshegs pa dang / rdo rje 'dzin pa la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad bstan pa la ni
39a3(rgyud): rdo rje gsang ba'i rnam par 'phrul pas// na mkha'i shing thams cad lo ma dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu thams cad 'byung ba la ni rdo rje gsang ba'i dus kyi phyag rgya sa// sa'i cha thams cad la 'bras bu'i cha
39a4(rgyud): thams cad smin par 'gyur ba la ni rdo rje gsang ba'i gshol gyi/ phyag rgya so// thams cad las lha'i kha zas dang / btung ba dang / gos dang / rgyan dang / gnas sar pa dang / bu mo gnyen 'byung ba dang
39a5(rgyud): skyes pa dang / dud mad dang / dran po dang / bran mo thams cad 'byung khar bya ba la ni bde ba chen po rdo rje dam tshig gi bsod nam/ sa kyi chu bas so// g.yul du dpung gi tshogs yan lag pan
39a6(rgyud): po bstan ste g.yul 'gyed pa la ni rdo rje bde ba chen po'i sdom paso// sgyu ma thams cad bstan pa la ni rdo rje bde mchog giso// bde me chog gi bya ba thams cad la ni rje rje sgyu ma'i bya bso// rma du byung
39a7(rgyud): ba dang cho 'phrul thams cad bstan pa la ni rdo rje rmad du byung ba'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam par 'phrul paso// lan thams cad gdub par bya ba la ni rdo rje lan bstan paso// me rangs par bya ba la ni rdo rje shin tu grang
39a8(rgyud): bsod chu 'bab par bya ba la ni rdo rje zla ba'i chu shel gyiso// dgen pa dang / grong dang / nag dang / chu bo dang / rdzing bu dang / skyes mes tshal dang zas dang / skom dang / gtsug lag khang sprul pa la ni rdo rje
39b1(rgyud): grub paste// chu'i stang du bzhag pa dang / bdag nyid gzugs mang po'i dngos po ston pa dang / mi snang ba dang / na mkha' la 'gro ba'i dngos grub la ni rdo rje gsang ba'i dngos grub kyi phyag rgyas// lha la sogs patha/ 
39b2(rgyud): mngag gzhug par bya ba la ni rdo rje gsang ba'i bka' bsgobs// sems can thams cad dbang du bya ba la ni rdo rje gsang ba'i dbang gso// mi rgyu ba thams cad drang ba dang / dbab po dang / bden par slar gzhug
39b3(rgyud): ba la ni rdo rje gsang ba'i dngos grub chen po'i phyag rgya sa// gzugs brnyan thams cad dbab pa dang / dgug pa dang / dgod par bya ba dang / gar bad du gzhug pa dang / rel bar bya ba dang / bsgre ba thams cad dang
39b4(rgyud): byad du gzhug pa dang thams cad khyer te 'ong ba dang / las thams ca da byed du gzhug pa la ni bad pa chen po rdo rje'i dam tshig sgra bi paso// thams cad rjes tshogs par bya ba la ni bde ba chen
39b5(rgyud): bai rdo rje yid las byung ba ste// rgyu dang mi rgyu ba thams cad rtser gzugs pa la ni rdo rje ki li kaM li'i gsang bso// thams cad brtan par bya ba la ni rdo rje chu srin gyi phyag rgyas// thams
39b6(rgyud): cad dang bar bya ba la ni rdo rje bsnyems pas// rmi lam ngan pa bzlog pa la ni rdo rje ngag giso// gzhan dag gis rang 'dod pa'i rmi lam mthong bar bya ba la ni rdo rje rmi lam mthong bas// rmi lam ngan pa thaMd gzhi
39b7(rgyud): ba la ni rdo rje bsregs lugs kyis// rmi lam bzang ba thams cad sgrub pa brtan par bya ba la ni rdo rje lam grub pas// nad dang gnod pa thams cad gsal ba la ni rdo rje sman gyiso// rims thams cad
39b8(rgyud): gcig pa la ni rdo rdza bcud kyos len gyis// dus ma yin par 'chi'i gzhig pa lani rdo rje rung bas// dmyal ba la sogs pa'i ngan 'gro thams cad gzhig pa la ni rdo rje sdig pa dral ba'i/ skabams/ 
40a1(rgyud): cad sgrub pa la rdo rje sku'i mchog gis// gsung thams cad sgrub pa la ni rang gi lce 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar gyi dngos po thams cad bden par sten pa'i rdo rje gsang ba'i
40a2(rgyud): ljags kyi mchog gis// thugs thams cad sgrub pa la ni rdo rje thugs thams cad bskyed paste// rdo rje thams cad kyi dngos grub ni rab tu dag pa'i rdo rjes so// dkyil 'khor thams cad rab tu 'jug pa
40a3(rgyud): la ni rdo rje 'khor los so// phyag rgya thams cad bcings pa'i dngos grub la ni rdo rje gsang ba'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya chen poso// thams cad dam tshig thams cad sgrub pa la ni rdo rje dam tshig gi phyag
40a4(rgyud): rgya so las thams cad sgrub pa la ni rdo rje gsang ba'i mchod pa/ so// dngos grub thams cad la ni rdo rje gsong ba'i bde ba na po'i grub paso// phun sum chags pa thams cad la ni rdo
40a5(rgyud): ltung ba las gden pa'i phyag rgya sa// thams cad mkhyen pa'i/ ye shes thob pa la ni rdo rje ye shes kyi phyag rgya so// thams cad kyi mchod pa ba ba nyid la ni rdo rje gsang pa'i gar gyis
40a6(rgyud): rdo rje thams cad kyi dngos grub dam pa la ni rdo rje 'do ba chen po'i rdo rjes// sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi dngos grub dam pa las rdo rje sems dpa'i 'do ba chen po de bzhin gshegs pa thed
40a7(rgyud): kyi dngos grub dam pa la ni rdo rje sems dpa' gsang ba'i mchog gi bde ba chen pos so// rdo rje 'dzin pa thams cad dngos grub dam pa la ni bde ba chen po gsang ba'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya so// bde
40a8(rgyud): ba chen po rdo rje gsang ba'i rtog pa'i rgyal po las rab tu dga' ba'i rdo rje gsang ba'i mchod pa'i cho ga rgyas pa'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das bde ba chen po rdo rje'i dam tshig gi sems
40b1(rgyud): dpa'i byin gyis brlabs pa gsang ba'i chos can rnam par snang mdzad chen po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi khu tshur yengasu 'dzin pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor 'o byin gyis
40b2(rgyud): rlob ba'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyengs par zhugs te rang gi rdo rje sems dpa' la gsol ba btab be/ bde ba chen po rab grub dang / 'dod chags chen po rnam dag pir// de bzhin gshegs pa
40b3(rgyud): mtha' yas nyid// dam pa'i rigs ni bskyed gsel/ de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang chen po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig bde ba chen po mi 'ad pa'i rnam par gnon pa mdzad nas/ 
40b4(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje rdo rje thangs cad la rab tu zhugs nas thams cad kyi bdag nyid mnyam pa ra spes nas/ bde ba chen po rdo rje phyag rgya'i gzung so// oM d+hIHde nas 'di
40b5(rgyud): ni gsungs tsam gyis rnam pa drug tu g.yos gyur te/ sangs rgya sa sras dang bcas pa kun// kun nas 'dus shing bstan pa ra gyur// dkyil 'khor chen po'i sbyor ba yis// thams cad grub pa
40b6(rgyud): kun nas bzhugs// gnad pa chen po'i khyad par gyis// rmad byung chen po rab tu bzhad// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin du rdo rje la snyoms par bzhugs te// bde bo
40b7(rgyud): chen po'i dam tshig rdo rje gsad pa zhes bye ba'i gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor 'di gsus// ji ltar chos kyis bris nas ni// rgyal ba g.yen du bsnams 'dzin pa// dam tshig mchog gi mchog bkod ras/ sa ma ya
40b8(rgyud): ste nas brjod do// de bzhin gshegs pa sras dang bcas// rdo rje mtshon cha la sogs bzung // ngang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' che// me tog la sogs spyir thal sbyar// de la 'jug la sogs pa yi/ 
41a1(rgyud): cho ga rgyas pa'i khang par ni 'di yin te// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag bya ba'i phyag rgya dang / rdo rje glu 'di la 'jug par bya'o// rdo rje sems dpa' bsdus pa yis// rdo rje rin
41a2(rgyud): chen bla na rang // rdo rje ches ni glur blangs pos// rdo rje'i las ni byed par 'gyur// de nas rab tu zhugs nas de bzhin goshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi gzungs bde ba chen po rdo rje gsang ba'i lcags kyus
41a3(rgyud): dgug par ba'o// oM badz+ra d+ha ra su ra ma hA su kha sar+b+ba hA rarma paM ma ta ya/ sar+b+ba ta thA ga tA dz+nyA na ma mu drA prangaHdzaHhUM baM hoHda nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'dzin pa dang bcas pa yang dag par bon
41a4(rgyud): bar 'gyuraro// yid bde ba la sogs pa'i mtshan ma 'byung / cho 'phrul du ma dag mthong ba yin/ de nas cho ga rgyas pa dang / sgrub pa dang / yid kyi 'dod pa'i dngos grub thams cad dang / de ni yid
41a5(rgyud): ba dang / thogs pa nad par myur du dam pa grub pa yin/ de bzhin du bya'o// de nas ma bsgrubs par lan cig bzlas bas las rnams byed par 'gyuraro// thams cad srung ba la ni rdo rje
41a6(rgyud): gtsug tor gyis/ sems can thams cad dbang du bya ba la ni rdo rje mdzod spu'o// chos nyid thams cad thob pa la ni rdo rje chos nyid kyis// de bzhin gshegs po thams cad kyis mchod pa'i dngos grub ni rdo rje
41a7(rgyud): mchod paso// gdug pa thams cad 'dul ba la ni khro boso// byang chub kyi spyod pa ma lus par rdzogs par bya ba la ni rdo rje spyod pa'i phyag rgya so// bdud thams cad gzhom pa la ni bdud thams cad 'joms
41a8(rgyud): bar byed paso// de bzhin gshegs kha thams cad nyid du bya ba la ni rdo rje ye shes kyi khu tshur gyis// bde ba chen po rdo rje gseng ba las/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba chen po'i cho ga rgyas
41b1(rgyud): ba'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs paden yod cing thogs pa med pa'i bka' bstan pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs rdo rje chen po thabs bad ba chen po'i khro bo rdo rje zhes bya ba'i
41b2(rgyud): ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ rang gi rdo rje sems dpa' la gsol ba btab bo// bde ba chen po rab sgrub dang / chags pa chen po rnam dag phyir// gdug pa thams cad gzhom pa'i phyir/ rang gis sprul
41b3(rgyud): mjed rdo rje 'dzin// de nas bcom ldan 'das rje rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bka' rdo rje'i dam tshig ces pa ba'i rab tu dga' ba'i rdo rje khro bo 'di gsungs// hU~M rak+Sha dzA la mA la
41b4(rgyud): prA ti la ya/ ag+ni pra bti te/ mahA su ra ta badz+ra kle d+ha dzaHhUM pha Ta/ de nas 'di gsungs pa tsam gyis bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje'i rdo rje las kun nas 'ad zer gamar po 'bar snying po san smin
41b5(rgyud): ma 'gyur zhing khre gnyar bsdus gasmar sar zhing spyan 'bar ba rdo rje mche ba gtsigs pas mchu'i spros rnam par gnon pa'i zhal mnga' ba/ dbu skra byin du 'bar ba/ rdo rje dang
41b6(rgyud): gzhu la sogs pa yongasu 'dzin pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyi dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul du bzhugs pas// bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang khams gsum pa'i gdug pa thams cad 'dul bar mdzad
41b7(rgyud): nas rdo rje dam tshig chen po'i byin gyis brlabs pa'o// dkyil 'khor thams cad thig gdab phyir/ dra la dang po khres pa bzhag/ su ra ted b+ha ba hUM zhes zlos/ ud bal sngon po'i 'od 'bar ba// rdo rje
41b8(rgyud): bsnyems pa 'dzin pa'i mchog/ mche ba cung zad gtsigs pa'i zhal/ khro dang bcas pa bond pa'i zhal/ rdo rje skyil mo krungs kyis gzhugs// 'od zer 'bar ba 'khregs pa'i 'od// dkyil
42a1(rgyud): / 'khor chen po'i tshul gyis ni/ khams cad du ni bre ba bri/ rab tu dga' ba'i rdo rje khre ba'i phyag rgya chen pos dang per slob dpon gyis 'jug par ba ste slob ma rnams kyang da bzhi'o// slob dpon
42a2(rgyud): zhugs nas bres pas lcags kyung nyid kyis dgug da ra ba'o// hUM su ra ta badz+re kre tA/ a ya te la hA su~M kha badz+ra satwa dzaHsarba badz+ra ku la ne tra pra ba sha ya hU~M/ sar+b+ba mu drug Na bad+hA ya gaM/ sarba ma maM bi shwa
42a3(rgyud): ku ru Ne/ sarba karma Na tra satwa ya a da nas rdo rje'i rigs thams cad bcom ldan 'das dang bcas pa ben zhing grub pa yin// slob dben dang / sleb ma rnams la dgyes pa dang / khro bo 'bab pa'i mtshan yang
42a4(rgyud): dag par 'byung bar 'gyuraro// gnan yang cung zad 'byung ba yin na de grub pa dang dngos grub dang mchog rgyas pa yang de bzhin du'o// gal ta ma grub na lan gcig bzla'o// khams gsum
42a5(rgyud): ba ma lus pa las rgyal bar bya ba la ni rdo rje hUM mdzad kyi phyag rgyas// sems can gyi khams thams cad 'dul ba la ni rdo rje khro bo'i gsang bso// 'jig rten gsum pa las rnam
42a6(rgyud): bar rgyal ba la ni 'jig rten gsum las rnam dar rgyal ba'i phyag rgya so// thams cad dgug pa dang / gzhug pa dang / dbab pa dang / bcing ba dang / dbang du bya ba dang / gzhig pa dang / rangs pa dang
42a7(rgyud): gnyid log par bya ba dang / rgyas gdab pa dang / bskyal ba dang / bsad par bya ba la ni bde ba chen po rdo rje khre ba~M so// thams cad ltung bar bya ba la ni rdo rje khro mo'i khri bas so// thams cad dbab pa la
42a8(rgyud): ni rdo rje 'babs po'i khri bso// thams cad nges par gnon pa la ni rdo rje god rgyangs kyiso// las thams cad nye bar dgod pa la ni bang ba chen po rdo rje dam tshig gi khre bos so// bde ba chen po'i rdo rje
42b1(rgyud): gsang ba las rab tu dga' ba las byung ba rdo rje gsang ba rnam par rgyal ba'i dam tshig gi che ga rgyas pa'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi don yod cing thogs pa
42b2(rgyud): med pa thams cad dag pa'i chos sgrib pa med pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rdo rje'i ye shes kyi phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ rang gi rdo rje sems dpa'
42b3(rgyud): la gsol ba btab bo// bden pa chen po rab grub dang / 'dod chags chen po rnam dag phyir// pad+ma'i rigs chen dag pa la/ mchog chan khyed kyis bskyed par mdzod// de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang
42b4(rgyud): chen pos ches thams cad la gzigs pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i rnam par gan/ ngan par mdzod nas bde ba chen po rdo rje gsang ba'i pad+ma ma zhes bya ba'i sngags 'di gsungs// oM hUM bi he r+Na 'di gsungs pa
42b5(rgyud): tsam gyis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal nas pad+ma'i mdog gi mdangs can zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi 'od lta bu pad+ma'i mdangs la sogs pa yengs 'dzin pa// de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbang
42b6(rgyud): bskur ba dang / ral pa'i cod pan dang / na bza' dmar po 'chang ba dang / pad+ma chen po'i sems dpa' rnams byung nas dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshal gyis bzhug so// bcom ldan 'das zhal rab tu bzhad pas rdo rje
42b7(rgyud): g.yon pas pad+ma 'dzin cing de bzhin du rdo rje snyams pas dkyil me dkrungs kyi bzhug so// de nas dkyil 'khar ni/ dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul gyis ni/ dkyil 'khor chen po thams cad thig gdab pa// 
42b8(rgyud): rdo rje 'jig rten dbang phyug gzhag/ pad+ma'i mtshan ma'i tshogs rnams bri// dan rdo rje pad+mas zhugs la mdzub me'i lcags kyu gnyis kyis dgug pa'o// oM hI ba ho/ oM hriHma hA su kha badz+ra A lo ka/ 
43a1(rgyud): shwa ra ya ma/ A A ha dra ba sha d+hi d+hi ma b+ha ba sid+d+hi rA mu drA pa daHdzaHhUM baM heHdanas bcom ldan 'das spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug byen ta mchog thams cad spel bar 'gyur ro// snang ba'i
43a2(rgyud): mtshan ma 'byung bar 'gyur// cho ga rgyas pa thams cad dang / sgrub pa dang / dngos grub thams cad kyang de bzhin/ ma bsgrub kyang lan gcig bzlas pa las thams cad bde// sgrib pa thams cad rnam par snang
43a3(rgyud): ba la ni pad+ma chen pos// thams cad srung ba la ni pad+ma'i gtsug ter gyis// thams cad rjes chags pa la ni pad+ma la blta so// thams cad dag pa'i ting 'dzin thob pa lo ni pad+ma kha 'bad paso// bud med thod
43a4(rgyud): dbang du bya ba la ni pad+ma chen po 'dod chags kyis// skus pa thams cad dbang du bya ba la ni pad+ma chen po'i dbang phyug gi/ so// rmi lam gdab pa la ni pad+ma chen po dmar poso// bcom ldan 'das
43a5(rgyud): kyi mcho ga thob par bya ba la ni rdo rje gsang ba'i pad+ma rmongs pa med pas// bad ba chen po pad+ma gsang ba las/ bde ba chen po pad+ma'i rigs kyi cho ga rgyas pa'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das khams gsum
43a6(rgyud): pa thams cad kyi bdag pa dbang phyug de bzhin gshegs pas bsam pa thams cad yengasu rdzogs pa'i rin po che'i dbang bskur ba'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyems par zhugs nas rang / 
43a7(rgyud): rdo rje sems dpa' la gsol ba btab bo// bad pa chen po rab grub dang / chags pa chen po rnam dag phyir/ nor bu chen po'i rigs mchog ni// mgrin sbor phyir ni bskyed par mdzod// de nas bcom ldan
43a8(rgyud): 'das de bzhin gshegs pa zad kyi dbang bskur ba'i dam tshig rab tu bzhag pa zhes bya ba'i rnam par gnon par mdzad nas bde ba chen po'i rdo rje rin po che zhes pa ba'i rigs sngags 'di gsung sa// 
43b1(rgyud): oM li ti d+ha bA r+thaT ta twe/ de nas 'di gsungs pa tsam gyis bcom ldan 'das dbang bskur ba'i bde ba chen po'i rdo rje las nor bu rin po cha rab tu byung nas phyag g.yon pa la rab tu gnaso// nor ba rin po che dag
43b2(rgyud): bde yang mar gang reg pa med pa'i ridag can rdo rje rin po che rang gi 'od zer gyis dbang bskur ba can nor bu rin po che'i mda' la sogs pa'i mtshan ma yengasu bsnams pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyi dkyi
43b3(rgyud): 'khor chen de'i tshul gyis zhugs// de nas dkyil 'khor bri ba ni dkyil 'khor thams cad thig gdab pa// rdo rje rin chen bdag po gnag/ ner bu'i rigs ni chen po bri/ rdo rje rin chen gyis byug
43b4(rgyud): rgyas zhugs te/ de bzhin du mdzubu mo gnyis kyis rdo rje lcags kyus dgug par bya'o// oM ma hA su kha~M badz+ra bi b+hU te ra ya b+ha ga bI de A kaR+Sha ya gi ra be sarba ta thA ga ta a gre sa tre sa ma ba na
43b5(rgyud): nA ma b+ha ra ma ta ba traM pa nya ra swA hA/ de nas bcom ldan 'ad sa na mkha'i snying po'i nor bu thams cad dang bcas pa bon ba yin// spyi bo nas spu ltung ba'i mtshan ma 'byung bar 'gyur// tse
43b6(rgyud): ldan 'das kyis bdag la dbang bskur ba la ni zhes shes par bya'o// de nas slob ma rnams gzhug par bya ste cho ga rgyas pa thams cad de bzhin du bya'o// de nas ma bsgrubs pa'i las rnams lan cig/ 
43b7(rgyud): bzlas pas 'grub par 'gyur// dbang bskur ba zad thob pa la ni rdo rje rin po che'i myug gus// don thams cad theb pa la ni rdo rje rin chen gyi rgyal mtshan gyis rtse mes// bsam pa thams cad yengs rdzogs
43b8(rgyud): par bya ba la ni rdo rje ner ba rgyan de'i mtshan mo'i phyag rgya sa// gter chen po theb par byi ba la ni rdo rje rin chen gyi sa 'og gi phyag rgyaste/ rdo rje'i dbang bskur ba theb pa la ni rdo rje chen po'i phreng bse/ khyeng chub
44a1(rgyud): // sems dpa' chen po'i dbang bskur ba theb pa la ni rdo rje chen po'i drang bso// de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbang bskur ba theb pa la ni rdo rje rin chen gyi dbang bskur ba dam pa'i phreng bste// rdo rje 'dzin pa
44a2(rgyud): chen por dbang bskur ba thob la ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku'i mcheg gi rdo rje rin chen gyi cod pan gyi phreng bso// bde ba chen po'i rdo rje gsang ba la bde ba dang yid bde ba thams cad kyi nor bu'i
44a3(rgyud): rigs kyi cho ga rgyas pa'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das rigs thams cad bsdus pa'i rdo rje byin gyis brlabs pa'i ye shes theb pas sems can thams cad gzhug pa'i 'khor lo rdo rje phag rgya zhes pa ba
44a4(rgyud): dang 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs// thog ma tha med pa'i btson ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' la gsol ba ba go bde ba che na po rab grub pa// chags pa chen po rnam dag phyir// 'ad pa chen po don
44a5(rgyud): gyi phyir// 'gro rnams ci bder bzhugs gsol// de nas bcu ma ldan 'das thams cad pas rnam par rgyal ba 'gro bku/ na 'dul ba/ dam tshig thams cad dang dngos grub zed spel ba rdo rje
44a6(rgyud): 'tshong chen po ston pa de/ sgrub pa pa/ stobs dang pha rol gnon pa thogs pa med pa thams cad la rjes ston pas don yod par grub padam tshig rdo rje 'dzin pa zhes bya ba'i rnam par gnan pa mdzad nas ba
44a7(rgyud): ba chen po dngos grub thams cad kyi dam tshig ces bya ba'i don yod pa mtshungs pa med pa'i thams cad kyi snying po 'di gsung so// hoSh+Tha AHhUM hrIHtrAM/ de nas 'di gsungs pa tsam gyis de bzhin gshegs
44a8(rgyud): 'a thams cad la sogs pa 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po der yang dag par gnas te/ dkyi la 'khor gcig nyid du 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'a
44b1(rgyud): chen pos sems can thams cad rjesu gzhug pa bde ba chen po'i rdo rje'i dam tshig gsang ba gsungs pa/ dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul gyis ni// dkyil 'khor thams cad kun tu bri// dkyil 'khor chen po dang
44b2(rgyud): der ni// da yi dbusu brtag par bya// de yi dbus rigs rnams kyis// dkyil 'khor chen po bri bar ba// pi yi mtshams kyi mtha' ma ru// phyi yi dkyil 'khor tshegs rnams bri// sgo rnams kun tu 'jug par ni// 
44b3(rgyud): rang gi phyag rgyar rab tu gnas// dkyil 'khor dam pa lnga sdud cing // rdo rje shugs kyis 'jug par bya// cho ga rgyas pa thams cad dang / dngos grub thams cad dang las thams cad kyang de bzhin no// de nas lnga la
44b4(rgyud): sogs pa dam tshig sems dpa' thams cad bcom ldan 'das las rang rang gi rjesu gnang ba gnas nas sems can thams cad la bde ba'i don yod pa bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang chen po'i
44b5(rgyud): zhabs la phag byas nas rang rang gi gsang ba'i snying po 'a de rnams phu'o// de nas 'jig rten gsum pos gsol pa/ oM b+h+re trAM/ de nas dkyil 'khor bri ba ni/ zur bzhi pa la sgo
44b6(rgyud): bzhi pa pheM yi dkyil 'khor mchog yin// de yi dbus dngos grub par// gzhu yi sa ral kar ldan zhing // mda' dang tsa sha ga thogs bri// sbrang rtsir bad dang rgyal bar byed// sgrub pa thams cad sgrub pa
44b7(rgyud): po rtse gsum mtshan ma'i phyag rgya yis// dbus mo lha nga btsugs byas te// nugs nas dam tshig bcings nas ni// yang dag dgug pa nyid du bya// oM b+hAr b+hA ba sA hA po nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas paM yis
44b8(rgyud): thams cad kun gyis yengs bskor ba// dngos grub kun ston 'ongs pa la// ci ltar rnyed pa'i gter ma sbyin// slob dpon gyi ni 'jug pa yis// slob ma thams cad gzhag par bya// dam tshig mchog ni de
45a1(rgyud): nyid dang // gsang ba'i de nyid brjed par bya// gal ta ma brtags ma spras dang // 'on te 'di skad bshad pa'i chos// 'dir ni kun tu ra spyad na// rtse gsum gyis ni khyed snying 'joms// snying
45a2(rgyud): stobs rdul dang mun pa ni// tshangs pa khab 'jug dbang phyug che// ming po gsum po 'di dag ste/ nam yang brnyas par mi ba'o// gang zhig 'di dag la brnyas pas// yang dang yod du rab bzhugs nas/ 
45a3(rgyud): dkyil 'khor mchod pa byed pa de// dngos grub thams cad thab pa ni// phyag rgya dag kyang bstan pas nas// de yis gar gyi mchod pa ba// 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga po yi// rtag tu dkyil 'khor mched par bya// 
45a4(rgyud): nas gsang ba'i lha mo rnams kyis rang gi phyag rgya ru le/ hrIHhUM shrId+d+ha/ dkyil 'khor thams cad bya ba ni/ gru bzhi pa la sgo ba zhi pa/ thig bzhi dang ni yang dag ldan// ka ba chen po bzhi dang bsra
45a5(rgyud): gru chad bzhi yis rnam par mdzes// de yi dbus de bzhin du/  kyil 'khor bzhi be bri bar ba/ ske ru mngon phyogs bzhi po ni// snying po dang bcas gzhag par bya// dga' mo lag na
45a6(rgyud): mchen cha thegs// dngos grub bya ba skams dang bcas// de nas dang po dkyil 'khor du// de bzhin kun nas 'jug par bya// sring mo rang gi ngag rgyu yis// go rims ci bzhin 'gro bar bya'o// zhugs nas
45a7(rgyud): 'jug pa la sogs kyis// cho ga bzhin du mchod pas nas// gsang ba de nyid rab grub pas// dgug pa yang dag bya ba yin// oM ka li ma nir ha pro ta la/ me b+h+re rAk+Sha saM pa rastA ma ya ha~M ba he ga ba rA ha du
45a8(rgyud): sta ma ya swA hA/ sid+d+hi ka sid+d+hi s+thA ma a he/ phyag rgya 'od rnams kyis// hrIHhUM shrI b+h+yo/ de nas thams cad 'bab par 'gyuraro// babs nas gzhug par bya'o// de nas de bzhin phyag rgya bcings pa bslabs la mna'
45b1(rgyud): bsgrags nas gsang ba brjod par bya'o// sems can don la gang zhugs pa// gang du dkyil 'khor spen pa rnams// gal te gsang ba mi srang ra// khod kyis de dag gsang ba yin// 'dod chags zhe sdang ga
45b2(rgyud): mug dang // de bzhin zas dang skem dang ro// chos kyis rten pas bde ba dang / chos min pas ni sdug bsngal te// phyag rgya gar gyi mchod pa yi si// tso 'dod par ni mchod par bya// ci snyed pa dang ci 'ded bzhin// yul
45b3(rgyud): rnams la ni bstan par ba// de nas lha ma yin thams cad kyis rang gi snying po phul le// oM sarba ma hA tsakre pr-i brda ya daR+sha ya be hUM phaT/ zur bzhi ba yi dkyil 'khor ni// khra gang tsam du brkos pas nas/ 
45b4(rgyud): gyar du la bltas sde bri bor// bde mchog la sogs bri bar bya/ 'khor la rab tu zhugs byis la/ yang dag dgug par bye// me tog la sogs gtor ma byaM/ sha la sogs pa'i gter
45b5(rgyud): ma byas/ oM baSh+Ti tsakra A na ya/ she brtsi ma tsi ta tre su ra a d+hi \u0f7f he sho he/ sar+b+ba bAM sAM g+h+ri ta~M d+ha ba ma sid d+yA hA hA swA hA/ da nas yid kyi 'dod pa'i sgyu ma thams cad grub pa yin// slob ma gtu
45b6(rgyud): ba yang de bzhin du bya'o// de nas klu rigs bzhis snying po phulo// phu de nas dkyil 'khor bri ba ni/ zur bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa// sbrul gyi thig gis kun tu bri/ klu yi gdengs ki'i btsum mos 'khyud// 
45b7(rgyud): mtshams kyi char ni mjug rngu 'dud// de yi dbus sa 'dzin pa// klu yi rgyal po she 'bri/ shes rab can gyis klu chen gyi// rigs rnams thams cad bri bar bya// de nas sa 'dzin shugs kyis ni/ khros shing
45b8(rgyud): drug pas 'jug par bya/ dkyil 'khor der ni ri zhugs nas// gangs ka'i phyag rgya dgug par ga/ oM dz+dzaHa nI la dza ba beg pr-i bi b+hin d+ha ra sha raH/ swo ya ti/ pu sarbanA ga ku la A na ma hU~M pu sa ma
46a1(rgyud): ya pra be sha ya phu/ sar+b+ba sA d+ha ya ruH cu bu su de nas klu thams cad du zhes bya ba zlas shing dkyil 'khor du zhugs na 'angs par 'gyur zhing 'thob bo// de nas slob dpon gyis ri mo'i phyag
46a2(rgyud): rgyas dug med par bya'o// de nas brtsams te thams cad zos na yang bdud rtsi bzhin du 'ju bar byed do// 'di rnams ldan cig tu gar byed pa dang / dug thams cad skrag pa dang / 'jig pa dang / za ba nus par 'gyu
46a3(rgyud): de nas ci 'ded pa'i dam tshig sbyin par bya ste/ 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug ste// 'di dag 'jig rten dug gsum// gal te bden las 'das gyur na// 'chi ba'i 'jig rten 'di rtag nas/ gel te dngos
46a4(rgyud): grub thob 'dod ni// glog brnyas par yong mi bya zhing / ser ba ba zlog par mi bya'o// sbrul ni gang yang bsad mi bya// bde ba che na po rdo rje gsang ba'i rtog pa'i rgyal po las bde ba chen po'i
46a5(rgyud): dam tshig chen po'i rdo rje gsang ba la sogs pa'i cho ga rgya sa pa'o// de nas rdo rje chen po yi/ ri rab ri yi rtse mi no// rdorin chen 'od gsal bas// dri med gzi brjid mdzes pa la/ zur
46a6(rgyud): bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa/ sgo khyud kyis ni rnam par mdzes// kha khyer rnams la gnas pa'o// rdo rje lha me chags kyis mchod// zla ba 'dra la gnas pa yi// rdo rje rin chen rnams kyis mdzes// rlung gis bskyod pa'i
46a7(rgyud): dang bzangs kyis// ba dan dril bu'i sgra sgrogs pa/ dra ba ma long me tog gi/ phreng ba chen po btags pas rgyan// 'ad ba chen po rdo rje cha/ rdo rje kun gyi mngon 'dun byas// rdo rje sems dpa' gnas chen po/ 
46a8(rgyud): sangs rgyas kun gyi ngas bsten pa// byang chub sems dpa'i gnas pa mchog/ rdo rje 'chang bkun gyi gnas/ bde ba chen po rdo rje che/ ner bu chen po mchog ces bya// rdo rje chen po'i khang pa na/ bde ba chen po
46b1(rgyud): bzhugs nas yin// thog mtha' med pa'i sems dpa' ni/ rdo rje sems dpa' dga' ba che// kun tu bzang po kun bdag nyid/ rdo rje bsnams tshul bdag po'i dadag/ sems can kun gyi sems gang yin// brtan
46b2(rgyud): phyir sems dbang bshad pa yin/ mnyam par gnag pas ting 'dzin te/ nges pa'i phyir ni rdo rjer 'gyur// sems dpa' byin rlabs sbyor ba yis// slar yang rdo rje sems dpar 'gyur// de nyid rtag pa bcom ldan
46b3(rgyud): 'das// byang chub spyod pa'i rjes 'gro yin// rang sems so sor rtogs sogs no// sangs rgyas byang chub cho ga bzhin// bdud ni sangs rgyas rdo rje can// rdo rje 'chang chen de nyid yin// de nyid de bzhin gshegs
46b4(rgyud): pa'i rigs// de nyid rdo rje rigs chen po// de nyid pad+ma'i rigs da ga pa/ de nyid ner bu'i rigs dam pa// de nyid 'dod chags bra la ba yis// 'dod dang thar pa nyid yin te/ dus srid gsum
46b5(rgyud): mchog gsum dang // 'jig rten gsum dang khams gsum ba/ mi g.yo thams cad mchog de nyid// brtan zhing snying po ner bu che// rgyu ba sems kyi 'du byed thabs// thams cad byed pa
46b6(rgyud): thams cad nyid// dang po'i sems dpa' sems dpa' che// byang chub sems dpa' bde rab stsol// sems dpa'i skyil mo krungs bcas nas// pad+ma'i lta bar zhugs pa yin/ btsun mo'i tshogs bcas
46b7(rgyud): sna tshogs pa'o// rdo rje lha mo rnams kyi bskor// bde ba chen po rab grub dang / chags pa chen po rnam dag phyir// ma lus gdul bya'i don dang ni// dngos grub thams cad rang grub phyir/ bdag nyid la
46b8(rgyud): sogs sems dpa' che// dngos grub thams cad rang grub phyir// dam tshig chen po dam tshig rnams/ rgyal pos kyang ni srung bar mdzod// snyams bcas rdo rje gsor ba dang / rdo rje bsnyams bcas yang
47a1(rgyud): / dag ldan/ phyag rgya thams cad rnam dag dang // rdo rje sems dpa' mchog grub byir// bde ba chen po rdo rje cha/ dngos srung dz+rad gyus / ye shes phyag rgyar yang dag ldan snying po chen por dam pa yin/ 
47a2(rgyud): gang gi bsod nams mi ldan dang / de bzhin dkyil 'ber ma lus zhugs/ don med thegs med nyid mchog gi// des grub thangs cad rnyed nr-i dka'/ bde ba chen po rdo rjeH/ 'das pa'i mchog de dmatshig bstan/ des
47a3(rgyud): grub thams cad sgrub pa yin// rdeg pa thams cad myur 'grub pa// 'og mtha' med par dang po 'byung // bsod nams thams cad char mtho ba/ gzi can rnams dang bde mcheg dang // 'dod chags chen po rnam dag pir/ rjesu
47a4(rgyud): chags pasgom pa nas// ci bzhin ye shes rab 'jug po// nye ba'i snying po bcas snying po// bskal thob bcom ldan 'das kyis gsung so// hUM de nas 'di ni gsang tsam gyis// sangs rgyas sras dang bcas pa
47a5(rgyud): rnams nye bar 'dzin pa mdzad nas ni// 'gro ba thams cad skyed pa ra mdzad// sna tshogs 'gro ba kun bskyed nas// gtso zos da nges grub dris gyur pas// ci ltar skad cig gis 'di 'grub// sems
47a6(rgyud): dpa' chen po myur du smos// de nas dkyil 'khor chen po ni/ theg mar dkyil 'kho byin rlabs ni// rdo rje kun mchog dam tshig ni/ cho ga bzhin du bsgrubs nas ni/ de nas phan tshad sems can 'byung // ji bzhin las
47a7(rgyud): kyi rdzas 'gro ba/ rtag par sdig pa kun spyod dang / ngan sems dang ni le lo can// da ni skyes pa gsum gzigs nas// 'jig rten gtso bo rnams kyis gzigs// bcom ldan ci ltar 'o na ni// byis pa dag bkun
47a8(rgyud): tu bskyed/ de rnams kyi ni tshig gsan nas// tshig ni 'di skad gsungs pa yin/ rdo rje 'dzin kun byed pa pos// las kyi 'chib ltos gyur pa// de yi tshig de thos nas ni/ sras bcas sangs rgyas thams cad
47b1(rgyud): kyisang dgas chen pos 'di skad gsus// dad bu chen po 'grub dang / shin tu chags pa rnam dag phyir// kun mchog cho ga rgyas pa yis/ snying po 'di ni ba shadu gsol// de nas sngon pa rdo rje 'dzin/ des grub thams cad
47b2(rgyud): stsol ba yin/ rtog pa kun gyi dad pa che// rdo rje gsang ba dang po mchog// gzhan yang snying po bstan pa dang / dkyil 'khor la sogs chog cha/ sna tshogs phyi ma'i rgyud dang bcas// des grub thams cad rang grub byed/ 
47b3(rgyud): 'jig rten thams cad khams chen po/ phra rab rdul rnams dang mnyam pa// snying po chen po 'di nyid kyis// grub pa'i bden pa dam par 'gyur// de nas bde gshegs de rnams ni// de yi chog mchog gsar gyur nas
47b4(rgyud): dang po'i dkyil 'khor grub stsol pa// de che de la gsel ba btab/ chags pa dang bral 'dul ba'i phyir// chags bral ba ste/ na par bya ba 'am/ 'dod chags thams cad rnam dag phyir// nyid kyi
47b5(rgyud): thugs kyis cho ga gsungs// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rdo rje'i glu chen po gsung zhing dkyil 'khor rtags pa mdzad// thams cad rjes chags pa bde ba dam pa'i thugs/ rdo rje
47b6(rgyud): sems dpa' khyod ni rang du byung ba yin/ rab tu dga' ba 'gro ba kun gyi ngade chen po// brtan mtho de ring bdag la myur 'grub mngon phyogs mdzod// ces bya ba'i dkyil 'khor klu len cing brtags par mdzad/ 
47b7(rgyud): dkyil 'khor tshon po'i sbyor ba yis// dang po'i dkyil 'khor brtag par bya// phyag na rdo rje thams cad du// rdo rje lha mi la sogs tshogs// ji ltar cho ga bzhin du ni/ brgyan par bya ta rab 'jug bya// g.yon du
47b8(rgyud): bu mo rdo rje 'dzin/ bsdus te rnal 'byer bca bar bya/ rdo rje dang bcas snyomaso pa yi/ phyag rgya mchog gi rang nyid 'jug dkyil 'khar der zhugs nas kyang / la ni gsu mo duni bskor 'drobya/ 
48a1(rgyud): sems dpa' mdun 'dug ste/ de nyid gsang da'ang brjod par bya/ hUM ma hA su kha badz+ra sarbA dzaHhUM ba ho// sa ma ya swA a nu rak+to me b+ha gas tro Sh+yo ma b+ha gadr-in+tu me b+ha ga/ a d+hi tiSh+Tha thA ga bA a na di ni
48a2(rgyud): d+he na swA hA/ ma hA su kha badz+ra satwa sa ma ya gu h+yaM sa ma ya sid+d+hi m+me pra ya tsA oM ha ha ha~M ha e/ de nas ra tu dge' bas rdo rje lha mo dga' ba'i gtam bya'o// oM badz+ra muSh+Ti sa ma ya ka mag+ha badz+ra kI li kI li ho/ ts+tshe s+pha ra
48a3(rgyud): badz+ra Na ba d+ha hUM du shu badz+ra Ni hUM/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi mdun du nye bar 'dug te/ de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das bdag la 'grub par mdzod gcig ces bcom ldan 'das la gsol brjod par bya'o// myur du
48a4(rgyud): thams cad rjes chags par/ ki li ki las thams cad nus/ thams cad rjes chags drin dang / rtag tu legs par mnyas gyur bdag/ oM ma hA su kha sid+d+hi badz+ra satwa dzaHhUM baM he/ \u0f7fsid+d+hi sa ma
48a5(rgyud): ya s+t+waM sid+d+hi hUM/ de nas chen po'i rdo rje chus dbang bskur zhing 'thungs la rdo rje rtse lnga pa bzung ste/ bdag rdo rje sems dpa'/ yin zhes rang gi ming brjod pa la snga ma bzhin du gar gyis
48a6(rgyud): mchod pas mchod pa bya ste ci ltar rnyed pa'i yul dang ldan pas sleb ma dang / lhan cig mched pa byas nas byung bar bya'o// slob ma gzhug par bya zhing rang nyid kyang der zhugs pas dkyil 'khar thams cad
48a7(rgyud): du zhugs par 'gyuraro// rdo rje slob dpon thams cad phyag rgya thams cad kyi bdag po dam tshig thams cad shes pa thams cad la tshar gcod pa dang phan 'dogs par nus pa// dngos grub thams cad phun sum
48a8(rgyud): tshogs pa'i ye shes kyi las byed pa/ rang nyid 'jug pa tsam nyid kyis slob dpon ma yin pa dang dkyil 'khor du ma zhugs par skad cig nyid kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi byin gyis rlob par 'gyur// rdo ce
48b1(rgyud): phyi zhe na/ 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das nyid nges par rang nyid rang gi dam tshig gi rdo rje slob dpon du gyur nas 'jug par mdzad// las thams cad kyi cho ga rgyas par mdzad pa yino// snying po 'di'i byin rlabs kyis dkyi
48b2(rgyud): 'khor du ma zhugs na yang dkyil 'khor thams cad du zhugs pa dang / thams cad kyi slob dben du 'gyur ro// lan gcig bzlas pas mi sod pa dang / mi tshugs pa dang / khams cad du sna tshogs pa'i yi
48b3(rgyud): ge rnams kyis mthong ba dang // zos pa dang / rig pa dang / shes pa yino// rdo rje 'chang chen po dang bcas pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ma lus par mdzad nas/ dngos grub thams cad de la stsol ba yin/ 
48b4(rgyud): yongasu sbyang ba dang rten pa'i don du ma yino// bgags byed pa rnam ngas kyang sdug bsngal bar 'gyur ba ma yino// bcom ldan 'das dbade ba chen po rdo rje 'chang chan shin tu brtun zhing shin tu dgyes
48b5(rgyud): parjesu chags pa shin rgyas pa dngos grub thams cad dang / phun sum chog pa thams cad dang / ye shes thams cad la sa thams cad gdon mi za ba'i grub pas myur du grub par mdzad
48b6(rgyud): pa yin no// 'on kyang gang gis bris sam 'drir bcug gam/ lan gcig brjod pa'am/ 'dzin pa des ma bsgrubs shing gyil 'khor du ma zhugs na yang tshe 'di nyid la ci ltar meg par 'dod pa'i mchog
48b7(rgyud): gi dngos grub thams cad grub pa yino// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ don yod cing thogs pa med pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po bdag po'i bdag dang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
48b8(rgyud): kyis kyang bar chad byed par min so// thams cad rjes chags pa nyid kyi phyir// sangs rgyas kyi byang chub kyang rje su chags pa las byung ba yino// 'dod pa brtan pas rjesu chags te/ da mi 'dod pa ji ltar mchog
49a1(rgyud): gi 'dra ba chen po la sogs pa'i go 'phang thams cad tu 'gyur ro// zhes bya bar thogs pa med pa'i bcom ldan 'das chags pa chen po'i bde ba chen pos gsung so// grub na bde ba chen po ni/ rdo rje chags pas skad
49a2(rgyud): cig ste/ grub pa'i dam tshig 'di yin ste// 'di ni kun gyis 'da' bar dka'// sdig pa chen po byang pa 'am/ de bzhin dkyil 'khor ma mthong gakhan gcig bzlas pas sdig sbyangs pas// mchog grub pas
49a3(rgyud): na grub par 'gyur// rtog par gsungs pa 'am 'dod pa yis// gzugs brnyan rdza su dran bsgoms na/ snying po yang na glags bam du// thams cad nyid phyir bdag po grug gang la gzugs brten med pa dang / 
49a4(rgyud): glegs bam med par 'gyur na yang // yi ge hUM ni thams cad du/ bris te bdag grub bsgrub par bya// zhes bya ba don yod pa'i thog/ nges pa med pa'i dngos grub can rdo rje 'chang chen pos gsung so// de
49a5(rgyud): nas rtog pa'i rgyal po 'di'i// las kun sgrub par 'dod na ni/ kyil 'khor thams cad thig btab nas// mtshan ma'i phyar/ rgya bri bar bya/ dang po'i rdo rjes zhugs nas ni/ brjod par bya ste/ 
49a6(rgyud): chags pa cha las thogs pa che// thogs pa che las bde 'che// bdo ba cha las rdo rje brtan/ rdo rje las ni phyag rgya 'byung // sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje yi// gzugs brnyan rab tu sbyor ba yis// phyag rgya thams
49a7(rgyud): cad bshad pa ste// dam tshig 'da' bar dkar ba'o// phyag rgya bcings pa tsam gyis ni// sangs rgyas rdo rje 'chang la sogs/ yang dag bsdus par gyur nas ni// mnyam pa'i 'jig rten grub par 'gyur// ci ltar
49a8(rgyud): rgyal ba'i phyag rgya yis// bka' ni 'da' bar dka' ba ste// de bzhin rgyal ba kun gyis ni/ phyag rgya 'da' bar nus pa sa ni// sangs rgyas nyid dam rdo rje 'chang // de ltar bskal pa bye ba yis// thob min ci ltar
49b1(rgyud): phyag rgya mcheg/ bsdus pa tsha 'di nyid la thob/ ci ltar gdul ba'i 'jig rten ni// de bzhin dngos po gsungs pa yin//  yi thabs ni phyag rgya ste// dngos grub thams cad bad pa mchog/ de bzhin cho ga rgyas pa dang // dngos
49b2(rgyud): grub thams cad gdon mi za'o// de nas dang po'i dkyil 'khor gyi gsang ba'i dam tshig 'di yin te/ sor mo thams cad kun sbyar nas/ rdo rje thal mo zhes brjod do// sor mo rlung du bcings pa las// rje rje bsdams
49b3(rgyud): bdag tu bshad/ rdo rje bsdams pa'i nang du ni// mdzub mo mtha bang yang dag sbyar/ g.yas pa yi ni mthe bong ste/ bcug ste btsir ba'i lcags kyu 'dzin/ mda' lnga bsdus pa nang du gnas/ mthe bong bsnams pa'i
49b4(rgyud): mtha' dri l+la dang ba'i bde ba dam pa bstan// 'thab mdzub rtse sbya dbus ma'i rtse/ mig 'bras ltar sbyar 'dzin pa'i// dbus ma'i rdo rje'i 'og tu ni/ mthe bong gis mnan btsir bar bya'o// rdo rje 'dren/ 
49b5(rgyud): ma dang 'dra ba/ srin lag mthe chung kha phye ba// bskor nas pus mo ra bzhag pa ni// dang po rdo rje las byung ba'o// gyen du gtor dang thur du blugs// mthe bong sbyar nas bskor ba dang // rab tu rkyang zhing
49b6(rgyud): byug pa dang // bsnyer zhing spyi bor gnas pa dang // bskor nas snying khar bzhag pa dang / yongs bskor zhing dgad pa'o// kha lis gyen du 'byung ba dang / de bzhin gar gyis bskor ba dang / mdzub mo'i sor me gnyis
49b7(rgyud): kyi dang / g.yen pa'i mdzub mo g.yas kyis bzung // mdzub mo'i mthe bo bcing ba dang // mthe bong mtha' mi'i nang du bzhag// khu tshur gyi phyag rgya rnams// de nas don yod cing thogs pa med pa 'di rnams kho na'i
49b8(rgyud): las kyi phyag rgya bcing ba mchog tu gsang ba bla mamed cing bla ma'i las kyi tshogs sgrub par byed pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang bcas pa'i bdag gis kyang gnon par mi nuso// de la bde ba chen
50a1(rgyud): be'i rdo rje dbus ma'i las rdo rje sen mo'i mchul sogs par gzhag pa dang / 'khor lo rab tu bskor ba dang // rdo rje ner bu dang / ci ltar 'dod pa'i dngos grub kun tu byed pa rnams kyis rdo rje 'chang
50a2(rgyud): chen po dang // sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang / rdo rje rin po che dang / mchog gi dngos grub bo// rdo rje 'dren mas ni mig 'bras kyi las// g.yas pa dang g.yen pa'i mig gis bltas pas thams
50a3(rgyud): cad rjesu chags paso// mig 'bras tshur 'dren dgug pa'o// gzhug pas thams cad gzhug pa'o// brtsir bas 'ching ba'o// btsums pa med pas dbang du bya ba'o// rdo rje ki li ki li las dbus ma la btsum
50a4(rgyud): ba na dang / 'khyud pa dang / rol pa dang / dbus me dang mthe bo'i rtsa mor bde bar rdeg pas mthong ba dang // rol pa dang / btsir ba rnam ngas kyis thams cad la rol pa ste/ rgyu ba dang mi rgyu ba thams
50a5(rgyud): dad du lha'i gzugs kyis bud med rnams 'byung ba yin/ srid 'di rnams dang rol cing rdo rje sems dpa'i btsun mol yang rol par byed do// rdo rje chu srin mas btsir ba dang / 
50a6(rgyud): gyen du btag pa dang // myang ba dang / drung du 'gro ba dang / myur du za ba rnams kyis brtan pa'i chags pas bcing ba dang / thams cad las rnam par rgyal ba dang / chu'i nong du gnas pa dang / 'chag pa dang / thad
50a7(rgyud): zab grub pa'o// rdo rje bskor bas g.yo zhing g.yo ba dang / lhod par byed pa dang / btsir ba dang / dbus ma phan tshun ldan cig dgug pa dang / mgyog par dbus ma'i rdo rje dral ba rnams kyis khro ba thad
50a8(rgyud): 'bar ba dang / rab tu zhi ba dang / thams cad la rgyal btab pa dang / ltung ba dang / gsod pa rnams myur du 'grub bo// tha ba rdo rje'i nang du zhugs pa'i mchod pa rnams kyis mchod na rdo rje 'chang chen pos/ 
50b1(rgyud): kyang mchod par 'gyuraro// de bzhin du lha'i bu mo rnams kyis mtha be rdo rje'i nang du zhugs pa'i las rnams kyis lha'i bu mo thams cad kyang bkug nas rol pa la sogs pa'i lus thams cad nye bar sbyar ba'o// 
50b2(rgyud): rje lcags kyu ma la sogs pa'i nang gi khu tshur gyis las rnams kyi yid kyis 'dod pa'i dngos grub thams cad// de nas dngos grub thams cad kyi rgyud ni rdo rje sems dang 'phag chen pos dngos grub dang / dam tshig
50b3(rgyud): dang / ye shes dang / las kyi dngos grub grub pa'o// don yod pas grub pa myur du thams cad kyi bdag nyid bcom ldan 'das kyi bon gyis brlabs pas yid kyi 'dod pa gus pa'o// rab tu dga' ba'i rdo rje sems
50b4(rgyud): mi g.yo bar bad pas las thams cad sgrub par byas na thogs pa med pa'i dngos grub kyi grub par 'gyuraro// de bzhin du ring gi phyag/ mtshan rnams kyis dngos grub thams cad grub par 'gyur// dang
50b5(rgyud): po nyin re lan gcig du// phyag rgya chen por snying po bad+ma/ rdo rje nye ba'i snying po yis// phyag rgya thams cad ngas sbyar bya/ thams cad den yod par sgrub pa'o// de ba chen po rdo rje cha/ 
50b6(rgyud): gsang ba'i rdeg pa mchog phyi ma// sgrub pa don yod dam tshig ni/ snying pos skad cig dngos grub ster// rba rgyud phyi mi'i rgyud dang bcas// phyag rgya'i rgyud ni bla na med// dengos grub mchog na de bzhin du blan
50b7(rgyud): med pa'i ye shes grub de nas dang po'i dkyil 'khor la sogs pa'i phyag rgya thams cad rgyud kyi cho ga rgyas pa'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi phyag rgya chen po'i rgyud ni// bang pa g.yen du dgod bya ba/ zhabs
50b8(rgyud): kyi pad+ma Ni bder bri/ rdo rje skyil mo krungs bcas nas/ sku ni dran por 'dzin pa 'de/ bsnams bcas rdo rje gsor nas ni/ rdo rje bsnams pa yang dag 'chang / sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje yis/ rdo rje sems
51a1(rgyud): dpa' rang nyid 'gyur// 'das ni rdo rje sems dpa' nyid// sangs rgyas nyid dam sras nyid dam/ dngos grub kun gyi dbang phyug nyid// tshe 'di nyid la 'grub par 'gyur/ sku gsung thugs
51a2(rgyud): kyi rdo rje yis// ji bzhin phyag rgya'i rdzas 'drangs nas// mtshan ma'i phyag rgyar ldan pa yi// sems dpa' chen po rang nyid 'gyur// phyag rgya chen po'o// de nas dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcis pa ni dad pa chen
51a3(rgyud): de'i rdo rje bshad do// rdo rje mda' la sogs pa'i bzhi po 'di las byung // mdzub mo gnyis kyis lcags kyu'i phyi rol tu mngon par phyogs pa'o// mtha bos 'khyud pa'o// mthe ba gnyis kha ba la
51a4(rgyud): mdzub mo gnyis kyis dbus ma'i rtse mo 'dren cing swaM/ na lag dang mthab chung mnyam por sbyar le rtse mo sa ser pa bas chu srin gyi rgyal mtshan gyi sgreng ba'o// brla gnyis lo bskor
51a5(rgyud): shing gnas pa'o// de bzhin du mtshams rnams la rdo rje thal mos bskor bso// ske'i phyag rgya rnams ni rdo rje bsnams pa'i khu tshur gyis se// bad chen mchog gi phyag rgya che// de bzhin dngos
51a6(rgyud): grub rab stsol ba/ mda' sogs dam tshig sna tshogs pa'i// dngos grub chen po mchog ster ba'o// de nas chos kyi phyag rgya ni/ ho bid/ hUM d+haM ka hUM/ de rnams kyi dngos grub thams cad spel ba'o// 
51a7(rgyud): de nis las kyi phyag rgyaran rdo rje med pa rnams kyis rtogs par bya'o// g.yen pa'i rdo rje snrums pa g.yas pa'i khu tshur bstod pa'i tshul gyis snying khar bzung bar byas pa ste/ rab tu dga' ba
51a8(rgyud): bstan par byed cing dngos grub thams cad stsal ba'o// mda' gzhug tod pas rdo rje mtshan cha ma'o// 'og tu 'khyud pa'o// rgyal mtshan gyen du sgreng pa'o// bsnyems pa gnyis gtad pa'o// 
51b1(rgyud): skrag pa dang bcas mtha' la sogs pas bkrol bas glog 'gyur da'i gar g.yas yongasu bskor bas me tog la sogs pa'i ka pu ti'i thal me spyi bo nas phag/ rdo rje thal me
51b2(rgyud): bkrol bas de bzhin du skrag pa dang bcas pas mched pa der bar bya'o// rdo rje gar gyi nang gi mtshams kyi la'o// rtogs pa 'am ni mtshang g.yang na ji ltar rnyed pa bzhin/ ma tog mchod la
51b3(rgyud): sogs ma yin// dngos grub mchog stsol thun med yin dam tshig gi phyag rgya'i skyer mtshan yengasu bzung ba'o// 'di rnams kyang den yod pa'i las sgrub pa rnams/ rdo rje khu tshur gyi bdud rtsi'i
51b4(rgyud): bzla'o// 'jug pa'i che ge'i ngag rgya bshad pa ni/ kyil 'khor chen po thams cad kyi rdo rje sleb dben gyis byin gyi brlabs pa 'i gsang ba'i dam tshig ces bya ba'i 'jug pa'i reg rgya gzhi
51b5(rgyud): pa ni g.yon mtha' 'dzub re'i skye gnas// g.yas pa mthe be'i lhag bcug la// btsir ba bdabaster ba'o// mdzub me lcags kyu bcings pa da// dkyil 'khri mchog tu 'jug par
51b6(rgyud): ba/ yang na sems dpa' gang la 'jug/ de dang myur du 'grub par 'gyur// rab tu dgo' ba'i rdo rje ma'o// rang gi khu tshur gyis rdo rje'i bdud rtsi'i chu blangs nas chu'i rgyun des dbang bskur te 'thung du bcas
51b7(rgyud): ni dbang bskur bar 'gyur ro// dbang skur ba thams cad kyis 'tshed dngal bab pa dang / nad med pa dang / dngos grub thams cad dang ldan par 'gyur/ 'di la rims dang gdon dang / dug dang / spyir du
51b8(rgyud): dang mdo 'gro ma dang / phag rgya la sogs pas gnod pa byed par mi nuse// skyil ma krung gis ni gar dang mched pa dbul bar ba'o// de nas mchod pa ni rdo rje gar gyis// rdo rje glu blangs pas rdo
52a1(rgyud): / gar dbul na ni 'khor los bsgyur ba'i gar gyis so// rdo rje khu tshur yengs bzung ba rdo rje gdod pas rdo rje mtshon cha la sogs par bsgreng bar bya ste/ mthar sgeg me dga' ba rdo rje gas
