52a2(rgyud): ba'i bshad pa dang bcas pa'i zhal dang spyan g.yon pas ngag 'tshal ba'o// bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang dgyes pas dga' ba thams cad la sogs pa'i bde ba dang yid bde ba thams cad kyis dngos grub
52a3(rgyud): stsol ba yin// rdo rje bsdams pa btsir ba rang gi snying khar bde ba bkrol na kyil 'khor bkrol pa la rdo rje sems dpa' sgom pas reg dang rdo rje yid kyi gyen du btag la rim pa nang gi dkyil 'khor du zhugs
52a4(rgyud): nadam tshig nyams par mi 'gyuraro// rdo rje sabs dpa'i sgom pas de kyil 'khor byugs na dam tshig nyams par yang mi 'gyuraro// dra nas las kyi phyag rgya'i rgyud ni/ bde ba chen po rdo rje spyi bo dang / 
52a5(rgyud): dpral ba dang / snying khar bzhag pa bab ste/ phyogs thams cad du 'bar ba'i rab 'byung bar 'gyur te/ rdo rje khro ba'i rgyal po chen po rna mas kyis kyang 'jug par mi nus// snying par sgom pa rdo rje dang
52a6(rgyud): bcas pa'o// gyen du kha lta bas ltung bar bya'o// nga gi gdong yongasu sbyangs nas gdong par bkrol bar ba'o// dbus ma'i rdo rje brtag par bya'o// dpung 'ag gnyisu bzhag cing snying khar banag par bya'o// dar du
52a7(rgyud): kyi dbang bskur ba mthong ba'o// skye gnas las deng tshe 'byin pa'o// spyi bor bzhag par bya'o// sa la rig par bya'o// rab tu dga' ba'i rdo rje'i rtags kyi lcags kyu so// rtse me gtod ba'i skyes gnas bkrol ba
52a8(rgyud): lal pa g.yon pa'i mthil nyid cing bsnun par bya'o// de btsir bar bya'o// mig btsum par bya'o// bskor ning btsir nas khro bo'i lnga bas blta bar bya'o// yengasu bskor nas kha'i mthar mche ba bstan pa'i g.yas
52b1(rgyud): pa'i mjam mos bsdigs mdzub/ mdzub mos blta bar bya'o// man po bcing bar bya'o// yi ge mus phyag rgya dgrol ba'o// dang po'i mthe bo chung gis rdo rje bstan par bya'o// de nyid rnam par 'gyur ba'i gdeng bso//  nyid
52b2(rgyud): mongasu bskor nas dpral bar gyen du la blta bas gnas pa'o// de nyid kyis na mkha' la bdag pa'o// gam zhing btsum pa'i mig gis phyag rgya bcings par dgrel ba'o// mtha'u chung gi nar bus reg pa
52b3(rgyud): bya'o// mdzub mo mnyam pas zhabs kyi sor mo rdza bar bya ste/ bza' ba 'am yid kyis gnag par bya'o// mdzub mes sbyin sreg byed pa'o// rab tu dga' ba'i rdo rje gdong bar dgrol bar bya'o// sbyin sreg byed pa'o// 
52b4(rgyud): ma'u chung gnyis skya gnas la sbyar te phyag rgya bral bar bya'o// srin lag dang mtha' ma mnyam par spyir ser mo ba dan gyi tshul du bslang bar bya'o// rdo rje bsgoms pas lags par byed
52b5(rgyud): ba mdzabu mi'i mthe bo mnyam pa phye ba dang 'akug pa bskor nas dral bai bya'o// rdo rje bsdams pa rab tu brkyang ba'i mthil la sa rig par bya'o// dong po'i rdo rje sman bskyed pa'o// mdzub mos
52b6(rgyud): char bskyed par bya'o// mdzub mos bzlog par bya'o// rdo rje lta bas 'breg par bya'o// rab tu dge' ba'i rdo rje bshad do// mdzub mo gcig gi nor bu'o// mthe'u chung rdo rje bsdigs mdzub ba/ mdzub mos ches
52b7(rgyud): sa 'ganas chu mil bkug pa la bstan pa'o// nga bachen po rnga rjes la 'dzung nas g.yo bar bya'o// mdzub mo gnyis kyi gdangs ka'i tshul bstan pa'o// mdzu bya mo 'ano'i 'ad bar gyis ma sdug bsam
52b8(rgyud): bal mdzuthu mo rlung skyed pa'o// rab tu dga' ba'i rdo rjes la bu mo ma lang dang / rol pa dang nam pa' rdo rje lta ba dang / steng du bskor bar byar/ rdo rje'i mangs shing du thams cad dang / nags dang / skyed mos
53a1(rgyud): tshal dang / 'dra thams cad la bzhag par bya'o// rnon pos gleg par bya'o// bdag nyid kyis thams cad la drang ba bya'o// phyi rol gyi dpung mdun du bskor bar bya'o// rdo rje khu tshur gnyis kyis
53a2(rgyud): glog 'gru bas bskor bar bya'o// klog 'grubs namapa' la bskyed par bya'o// g.yas pas g.yon pa la brdeg par bya'o// rdo rje khu tshur gnyis g.yo zhid g.yo ba med la gnag par bya'o// mdzub mo
53a3(rgyud): mnyam pa'i dkyil 'khor na ner bu'o// mdzubu me'i rdo rje g.yon pa'i mthe bong gi bu gar g.yas pa'i mdzubu mo gzhug par bya'o// rab tu dga' ba'i rdo rjes steng du namakha' la bka' bskyod pa dang / skye
53a4(rgyud): gnas g.yo ba dang / dbus ma'i rdo rje bskrad cing btsir ba'o// rdo rje yid las byung ba dang / rdo rje ki li ki li dang / rdo rje chu sri drang / rdo rje bsnyems ma ni bshad pa'o// rdo rje bsdams pa'i mdzu
53a5(rgyud): mos gsol ba 'debs par byed pas mdzub me gnyis kyi rang gi mig bka' la yid kyis ci ltar mngon par 'dod pa/ bsgoms par bya'o// sbyin sreg byed pa'o// mdzub mos rang mig
53a6(rgyud): btsum par bya'o// ses bzung bar bya'o// btung bar bya'o// rtse mo bskyod cing sbyin bsreg bya'o// mthe bo'i 'og tu rab tu brkyang la sbyin par bya'o// rdo rje'i sku'i phyag rgya'i mchog ni mthe bong sems dpa' skyil
53a7(rgyud): mo krung gi mdzub me rdo rje ni rdo rje'i sku mtsho'o// dbus ma'i mnyam po'i mgo lcogs kyi tog 'byin pa'o// snying khar bzhig nas/ oM bi d+hi tsit+taM u tra pA da yAM mi zhes bya ba sgom mo// mthe bo'i rtags g.yon pa'i
53a8(rgyud): mthe bo'i bu gar gzhug pa'o// rdo rje khu tshur gnyis klog 'gru ba ltar bskor bas rdo rje 'khor lo'o// rdo rje bsnams ma rdo rje dang bcas pa'o// yi gi hUM gis bsdigs mdzuba'o// rab tu dga' ba'i rdo rje gar gyi
53b1(rgyud): kha sbyor ro// rdo rje bskams ma bshad do// mthe'u chung gi zur gyis mdud pa'i rtse mo mnyam pa yongasu bskor// 'og nas btag pa mdzub mo mnyam pa'i rtse mo dang dbang bskur ba'i gnas su bzhag na rdo rje mdzod spu'o// de
53b2(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi khu tshur ni 'oganas bshad par bya'o// rdo rje gar gyi bshad pa yin/ mdzub mo phyir phyogs pa smad pa'i rdo rje snying khar badz+re ha zhes bye ba ni phyag rgya chen po'o// de bzhin du stong la
53b3(rgyud): rdorje skem zhing mahAs ha sa zhes bya'o// ye shes kyi khu tshur gyis te sh+lo ga te a hUM/ bcom ldan 'das kyis phyag rgya chen pa bshad// de nas rdo rje khu tshur gyis bcing po ni// mdzub mo rdo rje bsnams pa bcing mthu
53b4(rgyud): mo bkug pa gnyis kyis rgyan// mtha' ma gnyis kyi nang du ni/ mthe bong gnyis kyi kha sbyar na/ dam tshig chen po rdo rje mchog/ khu tshur dngos grub mchog kun stsol// rdo rje khu tshung rab tu brtags/ 
53b5(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi phyag rgya'i rgyud cho ga rgyas pa ni phyag rgya chen po rnams kyi ni/ ta thA ga to hUM zhes bya bas 'acing par bya'o// dam tshig cho ga mchog ni mthi ba mthe chung
53b6(rgyud): mnyam pa'o// rdo rje sna tshogs rdo rje'o// mda' li sogs pa de bzhino// las kyis phyag rgya rnams ni de nyid// de bzhin gshegs pa'i khu tshur gyis de bzhin du bcing ba'o// lcags kyu ma bzhin no// kha tshur gyi khyang
53b7(rgyud): bar rdo rje bsdams pa'i khu tshur mthe bong gnyis la gnas pa dam tshig gi khu tshur te/ de gnyis byas pa de bzhin gshegs po'i khu tshuro// de bzhin gshegs pa'i khu tshur gnyis dang / dkyil 'khor
53b8(rgyud): lngas phyag 'tshal zhing 'jug par bya'o// 'di dag kyang dngos grub thams cad stsol ba'o// de nas las kyi phyag rgya bcing ba ni rdo rje sku mchog gis spyi gtsug dang mdzod spu dang / snying khang bzhag ste bskor
54a1(rgyud): zhing bskor bas khu tshur chos dang gtsug tor du gzung bar bya'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i khu tshur gnyis kyi mdzub mo gnyis kyis bsdigs mdzub bya ba dang / sbyin pa'i tshul bya'o// g.yon
54a2(rgyud): ba snying khar bzung ste g.yas pa'i mdzub me cig gis sa la reg pa'o// g.yon po'i khro bo'i mdzub mo g.yas pa'i khu tshur gyi nang du mngon par phyogs pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi khu tshur sangs
54a3(rgyud): rgyas nyid du myur du 'thob pa'o// rdo rje bsdams pa'i 'og tu bcing bas bston pa'i skyil mo krung ngo // de nas rdo rje rigs kyi phyag rgya'i cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud ni 'jug pa'i phyag rgya rab tu dga' ba'i rdo rje khro bo'i
54a4(rgyud): dgug pa'i phyag rgya de nyid do// phyag rgya chen po rnams kyang de bzhin no// dam tshig ni 'og du rdo rje bsdams pa'i sor mo thams cad 'bar ba'i nang du mthe bong rdo rje ni rdo rje khri bo ti rin ti ri ste/ rdo rje
54a5(rgyud): 'chang chen po sgrub par byed pa'o// gzhan dag kyang de bzhin no// chos kyi rnams ni de bzhin te las kyi phyag rgya rnams ni de bzhi na no// khu tshur gyi khyad par ro// rdo rje khu tshur gyi mdzub mo bsdigs
54a6(rgyud): mdzu'o/ dam tshig las byung de bzhin no// de nas las kyi phyag rgya rnams ni rdo rje hU~M mdzad las byung ba'o// lag pa rdo rje'i mthe'u chung gdu bur bcings pa'i bsdigs mdzub ni/ rdo rje hUM mdzad de g.yon brkyang bas gnas pa'i/ 
54a7(rgyud): g.yon pa'i mdzub mo'i rdo rje bsdigs mdzub po// sna'i dbugs dang yi ga hUM giso// khros pa yi ge a sbyar bar bya'o// ha har dgod pa gzhad par bya'o// snying khar rdo rje bsgoms pas rdo rje'i phyag rgya chen po'o// de nas
54a8(rgyud): bad+ma'i rigs kyi phyag rgya'i cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdo rje'i mdzubu mo gnyis bkug la de'i snying khar bzhag pa ni rdo rje pad+ma'o// phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa'i phyag rgya thams cad ni da bzhin
54b1(rgyud): dam tshig gi khyad par dang khu tshur gyi khyad pa'o// kha 'bus pa'i thal mo las mthe bo dang mthe'u chung kha bye bas 'dab ma bzhi pa'i pad+ma chen po'o// thams cad bcing ba ni ci lta ba bzhi no// khu tshur gyi khyad par ni rdo rje
54b2(rgyud): bsdams pa'i mdzub mo gnyis bkug la mthe bong mnyam par bkyang la dbus ma gnyis phyi rol tu gshibs pa dang bcas pa gzhag pa ste de gnyisu byas pa bad+ma'i khu tshuraro// de las kyi ngag rnams ni pad+ma chen
54b3(rgyud): de'i bshad pa'o// de nyid spyi bo la'o// de nyid rdo rje lta bas blta bar bya'o// de nyid ser mo thams cad kha bye bas so// de nyid rdo rje gnyis gnyis kyi mig go// de nyid lags par byed pa'o// de nyid dngul bar byas nas gsol
54b4(rgyud): ba gdab par ba'o// de nyid gson pa'i sku gnas su mthe be'i rtags pa cu'o// de nas nor bu'i rigs kyi phyag rgya'i rgyud kyi cho ga rgyas pa ni rdo rje thal mo rab tu brkyang zhing mthe bong mnyam po la
54b5(rgyud): mdzub mo dkug pa bzhag stang bral ba'i mdzod spu'i phyogasu bdag ni dbang bskur ba thams cad gsol ba'o// phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa'i phag rgya thams cad bcing ba de bzhin no// dpa
54b6(rgyud): tshig gi rdo rje bsdams pa ni mdzub mo bkug pa'i ser mo mnyam pa'i nor bu mthe bong rdo rjes bkab pa rdo rje ner bu'o// gzhan rnams ni de las byung ba'i rdo rje rin po che'i khu tshur/ de gnyis byas nas rin po che'i khu
54b7(rgyud): churo// de nas las kyi phyag rgya rnams ni rdo rje rin po che sgreng ba bsgrub par bya ba'i myu gu'o// kha sbyar nas srin lag dang mthe'u chung mnyam po kha phye bas mchog gi dang dbyangs 'dzin pa'o// dbus mi'i nor bu'o// 
54b8(rgyud): mthe'u chung gi rtse mo'o// 'og du gtor ba'o// rdo rje bsdams pa las ni mdzub mo'i nor bu brkyang ba'i drang ba'o// rdo rje rin po che gsum mdun dang logs gnyisu bcing bar bya'o// rdo rje rin po che'i mdzod spu'i
55a1(rgyud): pogasu bzhag ta 'dzub me'i rtsa mes stang du 'dud pa dang dbatas kyi tshul du ba'o// mtha bong gnyis brtan pa'i skyil mo klungs pas la mdzub re gnyis bkug nas mnyam pa'i kha 'bras
55a2(rgyud): pa'i rachog gi lus can de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku'o mchog go/ des spyi bo nas brjems te bdun dang g.yas dang rgyab dang g.yor du bya ba byas nas de bzhin du 'dun dang rgyab dang legs gnyisu
55a3(rgyud): skrag pa dang bcas pas mtha' ma la sogs pa bkrol ba bas nas/ drang ba bcing ba'i ridud pa bya zhing dang dbyangs kyi tshul du bya ste// rdo rje sems dpa'i dbang bskur ba dang srid pa gsum gyi dbang phyug thams cad
55a4(rgyud): kyi cho ga rdo rje sems dpa' nyid thob pa yi'o// rdo rje thams cad kyi rtog pa thams cad ni gong du ci lta nga bzhin no// de nas phyi'i phyag rgya shes bor ba ba ni 'di yin te/ phyag rgya chen po ni g.yon
55a5(rgyud): bar kham por dang g.ya su mda' stod pa'i phyag rgya'o// dam tshig gi 'a drug pa ni mdzub mo dang gung mo dang srin lag mnyam par la gas par sbyar la/ rtse gsum par byas la nathe bo dang mthe'u
55a6(rgyud): chung gnyis lu gu rgyud ni mgon po rnams kyi'o// ci nas ltar bzung ba bzhin du lha mo rnams kyi phyag rgya'o// dam tshig ni gung mo dang srin lag rdo rje bsdams pas mdzub mo dang gung mo dang mthe'u chung dang srin
55a7(rgyud): lag mthe bo'i ser mo'i rtsa bar bsdus pa ni sring mo bzhi'i dkyil 'khor gyi phyag rgya'o// gal tau dkyil 'khor brtag par mi nus na de'i tshe 'di bcings pas dkyil 'khor shin tu brtag par 'gyur de dngos
55a8(rgyud): grub kyang shin tu gsol ba yin// lha mo rnams 'di nyid kyis spyan drang bar rang 'jug par bya'o// de nas sgyu ma'i 'khor lo na g.yon pa'i steng du sor mo thams cad shin tu brkyang dam tshig dkyil 'khor
55b1(rgyud): lo steng lha ma yin thams cad kyi sgyum thams cad don yod par sgrub pa'o// gdengs ka can gyi dbang po'i mthe bong gnyis pa rtse mo'i phyi rol tu phyogs pa'i sor me brgyad gyis klu thams cad dgug pa dang / 
55b2(rgyud): gzhug pa dang / bcing ba dang / dbang du bya ba'i dan tshig ste/ lto 'phye chen po'i lag pa'o// gal te 'da' bar byed na 'chi bar 'gyuraro// gung mo dang srin lag bzhi pos mdud pa byas la mgu ba'i tshul gyis
55b3(rgyud): steng du sbrang te bsdus nas mtha' chung gnyis kyi rtse mos sngags par byas na dug thams cad 'bar ba dang / dug thams cad bcing ba dang / kun nas bsdus te bteg pas dugi thod 'jig pa'o// 'di nyid kyi dug
55b4(rgyud): thangs cad za ba dang / 'bo bdug med par bya'o// phyi rol gyi phyag rgya'i cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyudo// de nas rtog pa thams cad sgrub pa'i phya ga rgyu'i rgyud kyi cho ga rgyas pa'o// zhes bcom ldan 'das bde ba
55b5(rgyud): chen po'i rdo rje'i gsad pa'i dam tshig chen po rdo rje sems dpa' gsung so// de la sku'i phyag rgya chen po rdo rje 'chang chen po 'i rigs la'o// dam tshig gi phyag rgya de bzhin gshegs
55b6(rgyud): pa'i rigs la'o// rdo rje hUM mdzad ni rdo rje'i rigs la'o// pad+ma chen pa ni pad+ma'i rigs la'o// rdo rje nar bu chen po ni nor bu rigs la'o// de nas gsung gi phyag rgya lnga ni sIn bi'i klu'i yul thams cad kyi
55b7(rgyud): tshul rnams nus pa ci lta ba'i klu'i rgyun thams cad glu blangs te bzlas pa ni rdo rje sems dpa'i rigs la rab tu dga' ba'i rdo rje'i ngag go// lha dang mchu gnyis shin tu g.yo ba med cing ngos shin tu ma
55b8(rgyud): 'byur ba dbyangs dang bral ba'i rdo rje'i de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs la te/ rigs thams cad dgos pa'o// sprin gyi 'brug sgra yi ge hUM gi sgra phra mo dang ldan pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ngag rdo rje'i
56a1(rgyud): / rigaso ting 'dzin gyi ngag pad+ma'i rigs la te thams cad dag pa'i pad+ma zhes bya ba'o// chos kyi ngag ner bu'i rigs la te mchod pa'i nor bu'o// de nas thugs kyi ngag rgya lnga ste/ thams cad
56a2(rgyud): bsgrub par bya ba la ni rdo rje sems dpa'i dngos pa so// sangs rgyas rjesu dran pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs la'o// dag ma na// mdun du bsad par bya'o// zhes bya ba ni rdo rje'i rigs la'o// sbyang bar
56a3(rgyud): bya'o// zhes bya ba ni pad+ma'i rigs la'o// namakha' thams cad sgom pas nor bu'i rigs la'o// de nas rdo rje'i phyag rgya lnga ni rdo rje rtse mo lnga 'od zer gyi phreng bas rtse me ye su khyab pa dang bad pa chen de'i rdo rje'i khu tshur
56a4(rgyud): gyis rdo rje sems dpa'i rigs la'o// rdo rje rtsa lnga pa 'od zer dang bcas pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i khu tshur gyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i ri gas la'o// 'bar ba'i rang bzhin rdo rje rtsa bzhi pa rdo rje khu tshar gyis
56a5(rgyud): rdo rje'i rigs la'o// pad+ma'i steng gi de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdo rje'i pad+ma 'i khu tshur gyis pad+ma'i rigs la'o// rdo rje phad pas rdo rje rin po che nor bu khu tshur gyis nor bu'i rigs la'o// de nas rigs
56a6(rgyud): thams cad rtog pa'i gsang ba thogs pa med cing gdon mi za ba'i de kho na nyid kyis bden pa myur du mchog gi dngos grub kyi cho ga rgyas pa sgrub pa thams cad kyi rgyud bshad par bya'o// zhes bcom ldan 'das kyi
56a7(rgyud): don yod cing thogs pa med par myur ba mchog gi dngos grub can rdo rje sems dpas gsungs// rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya chen po na bde bo chen po'i rdo rje gsang ba'i dam tshigo/ gsung gi phyag rgya ni snying po'o// 
56a8(rgyud): thugs kyi phyag rgya ni nye ba'i snying po'o// rdo rje'i phyag rgya ni rdo rje brnams ma'i'o// de nas phra mo'i las kyi phyag rgya'i rgyud don yod cing thogs pa med pa 'di yin te/ ma mchu'i sgros rnams kyis bzung nas
56b1(rgyud): rdo rjerje lta bas blta zhing thams cad rjesu chags pa dang / dbang du byed pa dang / rol pa dang / brtan par byed pa'i dngos grub skad cig gis se ser nyams myed pa ni rdo rje sems dpa'i rigs la'o// rdo rje phra me bin gyis
56b2(rgyud): brlabs te/ dam tshig tsam du blta ba de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi tshul khrims dang / ting 'dzin dang / shes rab dang / rnam par grol ba dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i dngos grub theb par
56b3(rgyud): 'gyur ba de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs las byung ba'o// khro gnyer dang bcas pa'i khro bos mi bzad pa'i lta ba bya ba shin tu ma mkhal bsdams nas thams cad ltung ba dang / dbab pa dang / rangs pa dang / nyal
56b4(rgyud): du bcug pa dang / rgyas pan pa dang / gsod pa dang / gzhan gyi dpung rmugs pa dang / thams cad las rnam par rgyal ba'i spos byu ba skad cang mas 'byung bar 'gyur ba khro ba rdo rje khu chu
56b5(rgyud): rigs la'o// btsams pa med pas rdo rje lta bas mchu mnyam pa ni sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sbyang ba dang / srung ba dang / ting 'dzin mngon du gyur pa'i dngos grub 'byung ba ni pad+ma'i rigs
56b6(rgyud): la'o// 'ba' ba'i lta bas zhal rnam par bzhad pas dbang bskur ba thams cad dang phun sum tshogs pa thams cad dang mchod pa'i cho ga rgyas pa'i dngos grub myur du thob par 'gyur// de nas phyag rgya thad
56b7(rgyud): bcing bsgrub pa ni tanar mngon du lan gcig tu/ snying po rang nyid sgrub pa ste/ rang gi bcings nas mdor bsdus pas phyag rgya thams cad grub par 'gyur/ de nas phyag rgya thams cad kyi gsang ba grub pa ni/ 
56b8(rgyud): snying po'i phyag rgya snga gsang rig pa'i// sgrub pa 'di ni rma du byung // ci nus ci 'dod bzlas pa yis/ nye ba'i snying po gsang ba'o// don yod thogs med gsang ba dang / ring bzhin grub pa de bzhin du// bsod
57a1(rgyud): / nams med pa rnams la yang / dngos grub kun la grub par 'gyur/ dkyil 'khor ma zhugs pa rnams la/ snying po mchog 'di sbyin mi bya/ gangs pa 'am gsang rgyud dam pa ni// gal te dngos
57a2(rgyud): grub yid 'ong 'dong/ gang gi khyim du gnas gyur pa'i/ phyag rgya sngags 'di dge ba ste/ gzhan gyi mi thub mi sod cing // dngos grub thams cad thob par 'gyur/ sems can thams cad bde don dang // sgrub pa
57a3(rgyud): thams cad sgrub pa'i phyir// sras bcas sangs rgyas thams cad kyis// rdo rje mchog 'dzin de la zhuso// bde ba chen po rab sgrub dang // chags pa chen po rnams drag phyir// rtog pa thams cad bsdus pa'i rgyud// 
57a4(rgyud): sems dpa' chen po bo sha du gsol rnam rtog med pa'i chos rnams dz+wa la/ 'dir ni rtog pa gang zhig brjod// snying po zhes ni gang bsha dra ba'i// ye shes rgyud ni ci ltar yin// dkyil 'khor zhes ni brjod
57a5(rgyud): ba ci// deng 'jug yon tan ci dang ldan// rigs kyi 'khor lo'i khyad/ bar dang // gzhan yang smra ba'i lta bu// rdo rje sems dpa' sems dpa'i nyid/ 'di yang ci ltar de nyid gang // thog ma tha ma
57a6(rgyud): mad nyid dang / rab tu dga' ba ci ltar 'gyur/ dang po snying 'di yi yin// de bzhin nyid ni gang zhig yin// hUM gi glu ni gang gis gsungs// 'di yi don ni ji ltar brjod/ sems ni rdo rje nyid dang ni// de bzhin phyag
57a7(rgyud): rgyu rdo rje nyid// sangs rgyas rnams ni 'byung ba dang // rigs rnams kyang ni de bzhin du/ sangs rgyas byang chub sgrub pa dang // sangs rgyas bdud du ci ltar 'gyur// rtogs pa rnams kyang sgrub pa dang // dang po'i snang
57a8(rgyud): po'i de nyid dang // snying po phyag rgya sngags rig pa'i// sgrub pa de bzhin dngos grub rnams/ bsod nams med pa'i ci ltar 'grub// slob dpon nyid du ci ltar 'gyur/ me tog spos dang mar medang // dri rnams kyi
57b1(rgyud): yin ci lngar 'gyur// mchod pa yang ni ci ltar ga/ gsang ba'i mchod paci ltar yin// kun byad kun za sdig pa can// shin tu sdig can ci ltar grug don yod thogs med dedes grub gyis// de rnams ci ltar 'gyur/ 
57b2(rgyud): gsang ba de yang gang zhig yin// 'di nyid du ni gang gis grub/ bde ba chen po rab grub dang // tshogs pa chen po rnam dag phyir/ gsang ba'i de nyid gsang ba ni/ bdag cag rnams la kun bshad gsol// danas
57b3(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang chen pos de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsel ba btab pa'i tshig gsan nas/ zhalo rab tu bzhad de/ bshad pa chen po'i dam tshig chen po thams cad kyi de kho na nyid kyi rdo rje
57b4(rgyud): nas bya ba'i rnam par gnon par mdzad nas rtog pa thams cad kyi rgyud phyi ma 'di gsu so// de la rnam par mi rtog pa khyab pa'i rgyud ni/ rnam rtog med pa'i ting 'dzin las/ sems can don ni yongs
57b5(rgyud): brdag/ de nas rtag par bshad pa ste// rtog pa yongasu dag phyiro// de la bde ba chen po'i rdo rje gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor rgyud ni 'di yin te/ sa la yi ge'i gnas bri nas// bde ba chen po zhes brjod
57b6(rgyud): pa// de yi dam tshig rdo rje ste// stong pa thams cad sgrub byed po'o// de la rgyal 'khor gyi bshad pa'i rgyud ni/ ci ltar gnas dang ci ltar dus// ci ltar 'jig rten ci lta bu// 'khor ni dgod par bya ba ste// de lta bu yi dkyil
57b7(rgyud): 'khor bri/ de nas dkyil 'khor thams cad du// zhugs pa'i rnam par smin pa'i rgyud ni/ rdo rje sems sogs sems dpa'i yi// 'khor bcas de tshe dkyil 'khor du/ zhugs pa'i bsod nams ci 'drag/ de ltar
57b8(rgyud): bris pa'ang de dang 'dra// de nas rigs thams cad kyi 'khor lo'i khyad par gyi rgyud ni/ rdo rje 'khor lor bstan pa bzhin/ lcags kyi 'khor lo dam pa ste/ 'bar ba'i 'khor lo de bzhin du// pad+ma 'dab brgyad nor
58a1(rgyud): / bu rmeH de nas dkyil 'khor thams cad sgrub pa'i rgyud ni/ dkyil 'khor brtag par byas nas ni/ nang gi rim pa zhugs bya ste/ dkyil 'khor bdag la dza hUM baM ho// drang srid d+ha me brjod bya// 
58a2(rgyud): de nas rdo rje sems dpa' de nyid ni// sangs rgyas la sogs 'gro kun gyis/ thams cad bdag nyid bcom ldan mchog/ sems can 'byung phyir sems dpa' che// rdo rje sems dpa'i rab tu grags// de nas dam
58a3(rgyud): tshig chen po'i de kho na nyid bshad pa'i rgyud ni/ thog mtha' med pa'i sems dpa' ni/ rdo rje sems dpa' dga' ba che// kun tu bzang po kun bdag nyid/ 'khor ba mya ngan 'das de bzhin// de nas thog ma dang tha
58a4(rgyud): ma med pa'i de kho na nyid bshad pa'i rgyud na// rngog mtha' med pa thams cad ni/ na mkha' 'byung ba chen po'i gnas// na mkha' skye ba skye med phyir/ rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin no// de nas bcom ldan
58a5(rgyud): 'das rab tu dga' ba'i bshad pa'i rgyud ni/ rab tu dga' phyir nyon/ mongs te/ 'dod pa thams cad bde 'dod pa/ de la 'od pa rna ma dag phyir/ srid gsum snga rol bcom ldan 'byung / de
58a6(rgyud): nas dang po'i snying po'i de kho na nyid bshad pa'i rgyud ni/ chags pa kun las chags pa che// 'dod ldan thams cad sad par byed// 'dod chags 'bar ba dri za yi/ snying po'i phyag rgya rdo rje'o// de nas yi ga
58a7(rgyud): hUM gi glu blang ba'i rgyud ni// glu las chags pa dga' las 'dod// rab tu dga' las thams cad 'byung // thams cad 'byung bar grub pa'i phyir/ bskal pa dang por bcom ldan gsung // de nas yi ge/ 
58a8(rgyud): hUM gis bzlas pa'i don gyi rgyu bshad pa'i rgyud ni/ myur du thams cad rjes chags pas// rjesu chags par byed mchog no// snying po bzlas pa'i don yin// de nas rdo rje sems rgyud ni/ klu rnams ci ltar/ 
58b1(rgyud): khro bo ni// bsdus nas kun tu 'jug pa ni// rdo rje thog na brtan gyur pa// de bzhin rdo rje bsdus pa'o// de nas rdo rje sems dpa' 'byung ba shes pa'i rgyud ni// thams cad de nyid sems dpa' ni// bdag gis bdag nyid la
58b2(rgyud): yang gnas// rdo rje sems dpa' da su ni// myur du thams cad du yang zhugs// de nas de bzhi ni gshegs pa 'byung ba shes pa'i rgyud ni// 'dod chags pas ni dga' las bang // bde las sdig pa sdig pa sdug// sdug las
58b3(rgyud): ting 'dzin shin du brdan// rdo rje nyid las sangs rgyas 'byung // de nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs la sogs pa 'byung ba'i rgyud no// de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs nyid dang // de nyid rdo rje rigs chen po// de nyid pad+ma'i
58b4(rgyud): rigs dag pa// de nyid ner bu'i rigs mchog bshad// de nas mngon bar byang chub pa'i rgyud ni// rang sems so sor rtog pa ni// byang bsams ni yang dag 'byung // rdo rje nyid phyir sa sa rgyas nyid// 
58b5(rgyud): bdag nyid sangs rgyas rab tu sgom// de bzhin gshegs pa bdud nyid du shes pa'i rgyud ni// rang sems nyid ni bdud nyid ste// sems nyid de bzhin gshegs pa yin/ rang gi sems ni
58b6(rgyud): gdul ba'i phyir// sangs rgyas bdud nyid du ni 'gyur// de nas rdeg pa thams cad sgrub pa shes pa'i rgyud ni/ rtog pa kun la grub bya gang // rgyu ba dang ni mi rgyu yin// rang gi lha yi rnal 'byor gyis// de dag thams
58b7(rgyud): cad bsgrub par bya// de nas dang po'i snying po sgrub pa shes pa'i rgyud ni// bzlas pa'i don shes nus pa yis/ rdo rje sems dpa' rab sgrub ste/ ci srid 'dod pa'i bzlas pa'i mchog// dngos grub chen po'i bde ba
58b8(rgyud): steng de nas snying po dang / phyag rgya dang / sngags dang rig pa sgrub pa shes pa'i rgyud ni// sems dpa' gang gi snying po dang // phyag rgya sngags dang rig pa dang // bzlas pa'i don du sems dpa' che// bdag nyid
59a1(rgyud): dang na bsgrub bya ste/ de nas dngos grub shes pa'i rgyud ni// rdo rje sems dpa'i des grub che/ de bzhin de bzhin gshegs kun gyis byang chub rdo rje sems dpa' nyid/ las kun mchog gi
59a2(rgyud): dngos grub phyir// de nas bsod nams med pa rnams kyis grub par shes pa'i rgyud ni// ci 'dod 'khor lo bris nas ni// ci 'ang rung ba'ang thal bas kyang // sems dpa' chen po bzhag byas nas// nyin zhag
59a3(rgyud): bzhir ni bsgrub par bya// de nas slob dpon nyid kyi dngos grub shes pa'i rgyud ni/ bde ba chen po rdo rje yi/ gsang mchog dam tshig grong khyero// ci bzhin rang nyid rab zhug sa te// bdud rtsi chu yi dbang bskur bya/ 
59a4(rgyud): de nas me tog la sogs pa'i mchod pa 'dul ba'i shes pa'i rgyu da ni// rdo rje can la mchod pa kun// de bzhin gshegs pa'i gas la dkar// rdo rje bdag nyid nag pa ste// dmar po pad+ma
59a5(rgyud): nor bu ser/ de nas 'bul ba shes pa'i rgyud ni/ rdzogs pa'am ni rmi/ tshang ba/ yang na ci ltar rnyed pa ni/ rdo rje gar sogs mchod ba yi// rtag tu thams cad 'grub par 'gyur/ de nas dus
59a6(rgyud): kyi mchod pa shes pa'i rgyud ni// drug ldan la sogs sbyin pa'i glu ni// glu ni thams cad ci 'dod pas// rdo rje 'byed pa la sogs 'grol// mchod pa dag ni rab tu bya// de nas gsang ba'i mchod pa shes
59a7(rgyud): ba'i rgyud ni/ rdo rje gang bcas mchod pa ni/ go rims ci lta ba bzhin du// bzlas pa'i den gyis ma brjod kyang / mchog gi dngos grub 'grub par 'gyur// de nas sdig pa chen po byed pa'ang grub pa shes
59a8(rgyud): bi'i rgyud ni/ dkyil 'khor la ni ma zhugs kyang / tshul khrims 'chal pa la sogs pa// ting 'dzin gyi stobs kyis ni// sdig pa kun las grol bar 'gyur// de nas dngos grub mi 'thob pa'i rgyu shes pa'i
59b1(rgyud): rgyud ni chags pa spad par mi bya ste/ rnam dag de bzhin bde ba ster// bcom ldan 'das kyang chags pa che// 'di ma dag pas 'grub mi 'gyur// de nas mchog gi dngos grub sgrub pa shes pa'i rgyud ni// ci bzhin
59b2(rgyud): yul dang ldan gyur nas// mchog gi dngos grub bsgrub par bya// rtog pa kun nas rnal 'bor 'di// tshe 'di nyid la sgrub par byed// bde ba chen po rdo rje gsang ba'i rtag de'i rgyal po chen po'i rdo rje rin po
59b3(rgyud): chen po las rdeg pa thams cad kyi rgyud phyi ma'i cho ga rgyas pa'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das rtog pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje gsang ba de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbang bskur
59b4(rgyud): ba'i rdo rje rin po che/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi cho ga ga/ zigs pa'i ye shes kyi dbang phyug gi rdo rje'i pad+ma/ de ngani na gshegs pa thams cad kyi sna tshogs pa'i mdzad pas
59b5(rgyud): phrin las dam pa'i cho ga rgyas pa'i rdo rjes thams cad la khyab pa/ ma lus shing lus pa med pa'i rdo rje'i khams bstan bi'i dngos grub kyi cho ga rgyas pa namakha'i khams kyi
59b6(rgyud): mthar thug par chos kyi dbyings sprob thams cad khyab pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor lo mngon par mkhyen par mdzad nas dang po'i snying po'i gsang ba'i de kho na nyid kyi rdo rje
59b7(rgyud): sgrub pa'i rgyud 'di gsungaso// ci srid 'khor ba'i gnas la zhugs/ da srid sems can gdon par mdzad/ mya ngan 'das bzhugs gzi brjid can// sems can don ni nus pa ma ni// de phyir sems
59b8(rgyud): dpo' dam pa rnams// 'khor ba'i srid du 'khor bar bzhugs// sems can don ni mngon par zhen// thams cad dag pa'i mchog chos can// de bzhin gshegs pas ma 'dul bas// sems can
60a1(rgyud): don mi mdzad pa de// 'dir ni rab grub dngos grub mchog/ dus kun tu ni thams cad du// rdo rje 'chang chen la sogs pa/ 'di ltar bsod nams rnam smin gyis// kun la mthong ba sogs
60a2(rgyud): kyang // rang gi las kyis mdzad mi spyod// dkyil 'khor la ni ma zhugs kyang // srid pa 'di la lhur 'grub 'gyur// shin tu mthong ba la sogs kun// sems can thams cad rab spel mdzad// kun nas dus kun
60a3(rgyud): thams cad la// dngos grub thams cad rab stsol 'gyur// rgyal po rdo rje 'chang chen po// srid pa'i dbang phyug kun gyiso// da phyir bsgrub bya 'di bshad bya// dngos grub shin tu rtag pa'o// gang gis srid pa 'di
60a4(rgyud): nyidu// shin tu rtag pa'i dngos grub theb// lugs ma 'am ni ba rdungs ma 'am/ ri mo dris pa'am 'dus byas pa'o// phyag na rdo rje'i sku gzugs ni/ ci bzhin bshad par rab gzhug bya/ 
60a5(rgyud): bde ba chen po rdo rje gsang ba'i dam tshig gi de kho na nyid sgrub ba'i dngos grub kyi cho ga rgyas pa'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis phyag rgya'i
60a6(rgyud): shes kyis slar yang phyag rgya thams cad sgrub pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsung so// nyin re snga rol dus ci bzhin// dang po'i rdo rje dade ba che// 'di ni rtag pa thams cad la/ phyag rgya thams cad mdor
60a7(rgyud): bsdus pas// dam tshig yang dag bcings nis grub// byi nas ma bsgrubs kyang grub 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rdo rje chos kyi de kho na nyid kyi gsang ba'i sngogs grub pa 'di gsungs
60a8(rgyud): langs pa 'am ni 'dug pa 'am// gang dang dar ni gnas pa 'am// thams cad rjes chags rnal 'byor gyis/ dngos grub thams cad thob par 'gyur/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis las kyi gsang
60b1(rgyud): 'di khon nyid rgyud 'di gsung se// gsang ba'i grwar mcheg mched pa'am/ yang na mched pa ci bad bang / byas ta mgon pa sgrub byas nas/ mchog gi dngos grub myur du theg/ dunas rang gi phyag rgyas bdag nyid sgrub
60b2(rgyud): pa'i rgyud ni// phyag rgya chen po mnyam bzhag ste/ rang gi snying pos lan cig sgrub// brtan zhing shin tu dgyes kun chags// shin tu dgyes myur bdag de sgrub// de nas yi ga hUM gis glu blangs pa'i grub pa'i rgyud
60b3(rgyud): ni ri b+h+r-i da sogs rgyan dang ldan// si nus pa dang ci 'dod pa// dri za dang po blangs nas nI/ yi ge hUM gis grub par 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das chags pa chen po dang po'i rdo rje sems dpa' gsungs// 
60b4(rgyud): na nyid chen po'i gsang ba'i dngos gru'i sgrub pa'i rgyud do// rtog pa thams cad kyi las kyi pheg rgya bshad par bya'o// zhes bya ba bcom ldan 'das theg ma dang tha ma med pa'i drin las kyi rdo rje
60b5(rgyud): sems dpas gsung so// shin tu ring ba'i tshe 'phel ba ni bad ba chen po'i rdo rje'i chos// shin tu gnyen pa'o na chod 'a la ba ni bde ba chen po'i rdo rje'i bcud kyis len gyiso// gzugs
60b6(rgyud): chen po dang gzi brjid chen po 'phel ba ni bde ba chen po'i rdo rje'i gzugs kyi gzi brjid kyis/ 'du byed chen po thams cad 'phel ba ni bde ba chen po rdo rje 'du bang chen po sa// sems can thams
60b7(rgyud): cad kyi bdag nyid thams cad srung ba ni dad pa chen po rdo rje snang bso// phyogs thams cad dang mtshams dang dkyil 'khor bcings pa ni bde ba chun po rdo rje bskor bas to// thams cad rdo rje chen po'i ngo bo nyid
60b8(rgyud): khro ba'i rgyal po chen po rje rjes kyang 'jug par mi nus shing mi phung por 'gyuraro// srid pa thams cad srung ba ni bde ba chen po'i rdo rje'i byin gyis brlabs pas// 'dag nyid kyi dngos grub thams cad
61a1(rgyud): das gnan das de byad nga ni de chen po'i go cha / 'tha de ba sa las rnam par rgyal bani nga chen po'i rdo rje rgyal mtshan mchog gi bcu rgyan gyis// 'thang me srung ba ni nga
61a2(rgyud): chen po'i gzhan gyis mi thub pas// gzhan gying dung thams cad bshig pa ni rdo rje 'dre ba chen po'i rdo rje 'dzin pas// gzhan gyi dadung nyams pa dang / ldang ba dang / ltung ba dang / ga sed pa ni bde 'a chen po'i rdo rje gleg
61a3(rgyud): bskor bso// rim thams cad la sogs pa'i nad thams cad dang nad chen po ni ba ni bde ba chen po rdo rje phrogs paso// dug thams cad gzhig pa dang dug med par bya ba ni bad nga chen po'i rdo rje 'breg pas// phyag rgya
61a4(rgyud): gdon thams cad las dgrel pa ni bdade ba chen po'i 'byung po bskrad paso// ma mo mkha'agre dang / gdon thams cad dgrol ba chen po dang / ga zhom pa dang / snying gnan dbyung ba dang / shi ba gso ba dang / 
61a5(rgyud): tshe 'phral ba de shin tu srung ba rnams ni bde ba chen po'i rdo rje'i phag rgya'i lan gyis// thams cad dbab pa dang / g.yo ba dang / ching ba dang / gar bad du gzhug pa dang / glu lan du gzhug
61a6(rgyud): ba dang / snga ma 'byung ba so sor bstan pa dang / rmad du 'byung ba dang // cho 'phrul bstan pa dang / bang chen thams cad pa thams cad spur gzhug pa dang / dgrol ba dang / srung po dang / se su bcug pa rnams ni bde ba
61a7(rgyud): chen po'i rdo rje dbab paso// rgyu ba dang mi rgyu ba'i dngos po thams cad la yod kyis 'dod pa'i pra dbab pa thams cad grub pa ni bde ba chen po rdo rje phra dbab paso// rang gi lus dang / ngag dang / yid rdo rjes mthong ba
61a8(rgyud): dang thos pa dang / smra ba dang / sten pa'i shes pa grub pa ni bde ba chen po rdo rje'i bdag nyid bsgoms pa'o// thams cad las 'das pa dang / ma 'ong ba dang / da ltar byung ba thams cad kyi bka' mthong ba'i yi ge
61b1(rgyud): sna tshogs pa'am/ dngos pa sna tshogs pa thams cad kyis rna ba'i shes pa rab tu 'jug pa ni bad pa chen po'i rdo rje thams cad mkhan pas// glog dang / char dang / thog dbab pa thams cad bzlog pa dang / sprin gcig
61b2(rgyud): ba ni bde ba chen po'i rdo rje khro bo'i lta ba sa// sa'i 'og thams cad las sngar ma byung ba'i 'bru la sogs pa'i 'bras bu 'byung ba dang / nye bar len pa dang / chu med pa'i gnas las chu'i dngos po 'byung ba dang / nye bar
61b3(rgyud): len pa dang / mun pa chen por snang ba chen po bskyed pa dang / nye bar len pa dang / rlung thams cad la bka' bsgo ba dang / nye bar len pa dang / na mkha' thams cad las yid kyis 'dod pa'i dngos pa thams cad mthong
61b4(rgyud): ba dang / nye bar len pa ni bde ba chen po'i rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug maso// thams cad gzhom pa dang / rings pa dang / dral ba dang / rmugs pa dang / gnyid log par bya ba dang / rgyas gdab pa dang / 
61b5(rgyud): ltung ba dang / rmongs pa dang / bsad pa dang / phyir ldog pa ni bde ba chen bo'i gdug pa'i rdo rje'i phyag rgya so// thams cad rjes chag/ sa pa dang / dgug pa dang / gzhug pa dang / dbab pa dang / 
61b6(rgyud): bcing ba dang / bgrel pa dang / dral ba dang / lhung ba dang / ltung ba bslang ba dang / 'dren pa dang / bran du byed pa dang / mngag gzhug bka' bsgre ba byed pa dang / thams cad tshur drang ba dang / phar btang ba dang / bsad pa dang
61b7(rgyud): slar gseb la sogs pa'i las thams cad byed pa dang / dbang du byed pa'i sgrub pa ni bde ba chen po rdo rje'i thams cad sgrub pa ni bde ba chen po rdo rje'i thams cad sgrub pas// rigs thams cad kyi mchog gi
61b8(rgyud): dngos grub la sogs pa'i mchog gi dngos grub thams cad dang / na tshig gi dbang bskur ba la sogs pa'i thams cad dang // phun sum tshogs pa thams cad dang / thams cad rje su chags pa la sogs
62a1(rgyud): / pa'i dad pa dang / yid dade ba thams cad ba tu gzhug pa dang / mched pa chen po thams cad la sogs pa'i las thams cad mung du grub pa'i cho ga rgyas pa 'de ba chen po'i rdo rje'i mchog gi dngas grub
62a2(rgyud): kyis// de la bde ba chen po rdo rje gsang pa'i dam tshig gi dang ba'i mitshig gi dam tshig gi las kyi phyag rgya'i rgyud ni 'di yin te/ bde ba chen po'i rdo rje'i ni rdo rje sems dpa' che sbyar ba'o// 'di'i las kyi phyag rgya
62a3(rgyud): thams cad bcing ba'o// dbus mi'i rdo rje btung bar byas// rtse me'i 'od thar bas nas gdeng ba yongasu sbyangs te gdong par dgrel bar bya'o// bdag kun tu bskor nas snying khar dgrol bar bya'o// gtsug ter dang
62a4(rgyud): phyogs thams cad dang dkyil 'khor bskor ba'o// snying khar dang / yid kyis rgyab dang / drag pa dang / spyi bo dang / dpral bar bzhag la rdo rje khu tshur gnyis kyis phreng ba bcings la ge cha byas te/ 
62a5(rgyud): mngod pa byas nas rdo rje'i gnas rnams slar yang blang ba bya sa bas rgyab tu mdud pa bya ste/ dang dbyangs bya'o// snying kha/ ra dang / dpral ba dang / mgrin pa dang / spyi bar bzhag par bya'o// dbus
62a6(rgyud): ma'i dang mchego/ khyab pa'i gyen du kha bltas pa'i dbugs pa dang 'jigs pa'i gdong gis blta bso// 'ab bzhi'i tshur gyis 'dor zhing khros pa'o// rang gi snying khar bcings te zhi ba'i lta bas rtse mo
62a7(rgyud): 'breg par bya'o// lta bas 'phrog par bya'o// dngab pas myur du dgrol bar bya'o// yongasu bskor nas dpral bar bzhag ste dbus ma'i rdo rje sor mo'i rtse mo gnyis bskyod par byas na ci lha bzhin du las
62a8(rgyud): byed pa'i stong khar bzhag ste/ dbus ma rdo rje'i las ni 'di lta ste/ snying khar stod pa dang / bskyed pa dang / bcing ba dang / gar byed du bcug pa dang / mgrin po gsel ba dang / rtsom btsir ba dang / kha 'bus
62b1(rgyud): ba dang / mgrin pa gsal ba dang / bangs pa myur du la ba dang / srung ba dang / khyab pa'i laso// snying ka kha skyer bskyod pa'o// nyin bzhin snga rol tu lan gcig lus yongasu snang ba dang / mgrin pa gsal
62b2(rgyud): ba ga dang / snang 'ang bzhig pa dang / khrag r+b+hi ts+tsha bsta/ zhir lnga la du lan gsag dbang po thams cad la kun tu bskye bya'o// ngas man rjes byed pa ni blo ma rdo rje'i rtsabs 'dum mardordzams nam/ 
62b3(rgyud): nas 'byung ste/ nye bar longs spyod pa dang / thams cad la dgug par byed pa dang / dbab pa sbyin pa dang / 'bar ba'i me sdug byed po dang / nye bar len pa dang / rlung gi tshul dang / nam pa' bsgoms pa las du ma'o/ 
62b4(rgyud): dbus ma'i rdo rje'i lus ni phyag rgyas gzhom pa dang / rtse mo gonyis snying khar btsir ba dang / sen mo phrad pa dang / mig dal reg pa dang / btsum pa dang // sen mo mnyam pas snying khar bteg pa
62b5(rgyud): dang ltung ba dang / glod par byed pa dang / phun tshun rdeg pa dang / rang gi snying khar rang bzhin du bzhag pa'i laso// dbu sa ma'i rdo rje las ni mda' gtod pa dang / lcags sgrog gnyis kyi dgug
62b6(rgyud): ba dang / g.yen pa la g.yas pa bcug pa dang / rtse mo bskyod pa dang / gdu bur bcing ba dang / myur du dgrel ba dang // sor mo mnyam por myur du dral ba dang / ltung ba dang / reg nas btag pa dang / g.yon pa
62b7(rgyud): g.yas pas drang ba dang / las thams cad la sbar bar bya ba dang / reg nas bskyed cing gyen du drang ba dang / tshur 'dran pa dang / phar gtad pa dang / g.yon dang g.yas kyis drag por 'dag pa dang / rang gi
62b8(rgyud): snying khar rtse mo 'dren pa dang / las thams cad la nges par skyeng bar byed pa'i las dang / snying khar 'khor lo gzhug pa dang / dbang bskur ba'i phreng ba dang / dang dbyangs 'ching ba byed pa dang / snying khar las
63a1(rgyud): / drangs te bad ba tshur 'dren pa thams cad yengs sbyang ba dang / gar gyis blangs te spyi ber dgrel ba'i laso// bde pa chen po rab grub dang / chags pa chen po rnam dag phyir// den yod thogs med
63a2(rgyud): sna tshogs pa'i/ phyag rgya'i rgyud ni rab tu bshad/ rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po yis// sangs rgyas sras bcas bdag nyid kun/ sems thams cad myur grub dang / den yod dngas grub kun spel ba'o// dkyil 'byor
63a3(rgyud): ngag tu ma zhugs pa// sdig pa'i las ni kun dang ldan/ de dag kyang ni sgrub 'gyur te/ btsongs pa tsam gyis sdig byang phyir// gang zhig le le nyid kyis sam// brtson 'grus ldan pa yang tshang ba/ dkyil
63a4(rgyud): 'khor med pa'i sems can gang // sleb dben nyid byin ma rlab dang / de da ga grub mchog rdo rje cha/ rdo rje slob dpon nyid du 'gyur// den yed mchog dang sna tshogs pa'i/ bcings pa tsam gyis
63a5(rgyud): myur grub byed// bsam pa thams cad yengs rdzogs pa'i// mchog gi dngos grub kun la 'jug dang po 'byung ba'i rdo rje mchog/ bde ba che la yang dag 'byung / dag cing shin tu grub pa
63a6(rgyud): dang dgrol ba thams cad la yang ngo // de nas phyag rgya thams cad sgrub pa'i gsang ba'i rgyud ni/ las 'dod theg mar phyag rgya ni// skal ba ci bzhin snying pos sgrub// rang gi bdag nyid nges sbyar ba// bde ba
63a7(rgyud): chen po'i rdo rje gsang ba'i rtog pa'i rgyal po las/ bde ba chen po'i thams cad kyi dam tshig don yod pa'i dngos grub kyi mchog ces bya ba'i rgyud phyi ma'i tshig rgyas pa yongasu rdzogs pa'o// de nas
63a8(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yongs mthar thug pa med pa'i sku dang gsu dang thugs rdo rje thams cad kyi las kyis sbyor ba/ rdo rje 'chang dang bcas pa rnams kyis bde
63b1(rgyud): ba chen po'i rdo rje gsang ba'i dam tshig rtog pa'i rgyal pa di sems can gyi khams ma lus pa kun khyab cing spro ba dang dngos grub thams cad kyi cho ga rgyas pa srid pa thams cad kyi rtse me'i yongasu mthar ma thag
63b2(rgyud): bi'i gsung rab yongasu mthar thug pa'i don du theg ma dang tha ma med pa'i rdo rje sems dpa' la gsol ba btab pa yin no// rdo rje namapa' chen po yi/ chos kyi dbyings ni spro ba mche ga/ rdo rje na mkha' chen po ma
63b3(rgyud): chos dbyings spro ba'i dngos grub ste/ rtag tu sangs rgyas thams cad ni/ rdo rje 'chang chen bcas pa dang // rdo rje 'chang gi zag pa ni/ yongasu mthar thug nus pa mino// e ma'i mngon nyan sems can dang / la la
63b4(rgyud): can dngo las kun dang // thugs rje dam pa'i rdo rje khyed// byang chub sems ni bla na med// bde ba chen po rab sgrub dang // chags pa chen rnam dag phyir// rtog pa 'di ni mthar thug pa/ rab tu sgrub phyir mthar
63b5(rgyud): zug brjod/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsol ba btab pa'i tshig gsan nas/ de ba ni na gshegs pa thams cad ting 'dzin rdo rje sems dpa'
63b6(rgyud): byin gyis brlab pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas 'di gsung so// bde ba chen po rab sgrub dang / chags pa chen po rnam dag phyir// thams cad dngos grub don du ni// yongs mthar
63b7(rgyud): thug byin rlabs pa'o// gong gis tshul mchog 'di ni nyan 'gyur dang // gang gis khyim nA gsang ba thams cad gnas// bde chen mchog gi rdo rje mchog gsang ba'o// dngos grub tsha 'dir de dag rnams la
63b8(rgyud): brta no// brtan pa nyid par 'dul bar rang mi byed// sems can den du rgyal ba las dog phyir// rnam par sbyang bar mdzad pa 'di yin te// rtog pa 'di ni bgegs med bdud rnams med// dngos grub 'bal
64a1(rgyud): mad min par byin gyis brlabs// bdud dang brtan med nyid ni bdag mi byed// brtan pa nyid phyir 'dul ba dang mi byed// rtog pa chen po'i mchog 'di gang grub pa// myur du dngos grub mcheg
64a2(rgyud): phyir bdag brtan 'gyur// brtan zhing rab dgyes brtan pas rjesu chags// bde ba chen po byed cing shin tu rgyas// nga yi dang po snying po gang sgrub pa// de la nga ni rtag tu dnges grub sngar// de nas de bzhin gshegs
64a3(rgyud): ba thams cad 'dus nas lag so zhes bya ba byin de bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bskyed do// bde ba chen po rdo rje gsang ba zhes bya ba'i rtog pa'i rgyal po mchog tu grub pa yongasu rdzogaso// 
64a4(rgyud): / de nas bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dang 'chen po byeg na rdo rje 'di nyid slar yang ston par mdzad cing zhal rab tu 'dzum pa dang mchog dang de'i rdo rje bde ba chen po rje
64a5(rgyud): rje snyams pas gsor nas rang gi thugs khar stod pa'i tshul du mdzin cing mchog tu gsang zhing mchog tu gru ba pa don yod cing thogs pa med pa bde ba chen po rdo rje don yod
64a6(rgyud): pa'i dam tshig 'di rtog pa thams cad kyi sdig pa dang // sgrib pa dang / bdud thams cad 'dul bar byin gyis brlabs pa'i dbang gis ma grub pa rnams kyang mchog dam par grub par byed pa dang / mchog
64a7(rgyud): tu gsang ba thog ma dang tha ma med pa'i mtshon cha mchog dang po zhes bya ba'i rtog pa'i rgyal po dbang phyug chen po'i chen po rgyud phyi ma gsungs pa/ de nas thog ma'i gnas nyams dga'/ 
64a8(rgyud): namakha'i kun la rab tu gnas/ rin chen 'ad 'bar rab tu gsal// dri mo medang po'i mdangs kyis rgyan// zur bani pa la sme bzhi pa/ sgra khyud rnams kyis rab tu rgyan// kha khyer gyis ni yengasu bskur/ 
64b1(rgyud): lha mo tshogs kyis mched// zla bu byed ni rab tu gnas// rdo rje rin chen 'bar byed pa/ rlung gis skyed pa'i rtse mo mchog/ dpa' phan dril bu sgra sgrogs pa// dra ba me long rtag me leng // me teg chun de'i rgyun
64b2(rgyud): gyis bskor// bde ba chen po rdo rje no// rdo rje kun gyis legs sbyar ba// rdo rje sems dpa'i bzhugs gnas che// sangs rgyas kun gyis rjes brten pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i gnas kyi mchog/ rdo rje 'dzin pa
64b3(rgyud): kun gyi gnas// bde ba chen po rdo rje che// rdo rje rin chen mchog ces bya// rdo rje 'chang chan bzhugs nas ni// bde ba chen po rnam par bzhugs// theg mtha' med pa'i sems dpa' ri// rdo rje sems dpa' dga'
64b4(rgyud): ba che// kun tu bzang po kun bdag nyid// rdo rje bsnyems tshul ba dag gi bdag/ sems can kun gyi sems gang yin// brtan ba'i phyir ni dpa' zhes pa// brtan par bzhag pas ting 'dzin te/ 
64b5(rgyud): nges pa las ni rdo rjer gyur// sems dpa' byin rlabs su rab yis// rdo rje sems dpa' nyid du 'gyur// de nyid ma ljon sna tshogs pa/ byang chub spyod pa'i rjes 'thun pa/ bdud
64b6(rgyud): dang bdud las rgyal ba nyid// byang chub sems rgyas de nyid de// rdo rje drag po mthar byed nyid// phyag na rdo rje nyid kyang de// de nyid de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs// de nyid rdo rje rigs chen po// de nyid pad+ma'i rigs
64b7(rgyud): dag gdi nyid ner bu'i rigs bzang bshad// de nyid 'dod chag bral ba nyid// 'dod dang grol ba de nyid ni// dus gsum srid gsum mchog gsum ste// 'jig rten gsum mchog khams gsum pa/ 
64b8(rgyud): g.yo thams cad mchog de nyid// brtan pa sra ba ner chen po// rgyu ba sems kyi 'dus byas pa// thams cad byed pa thams cad nyid// dang po'i sems dpa' sems dpa' che// byang chub sems dpa' bde
65a1(rgyud): / bar stsol// sems dpa'i skyil grangs bcas nas ni/ pad+ma'i steng du bzhugs pa dang // btsun mo'i tshigs bcas sna tshogs pa// rdo rje lha mos yongasu bskor// bde ba chen po grub don du// 'dod
65a2(rgyud): chags chen po rnam dag phyir// ma lus gdul bya'i don du ni// dngos grub thams cad rab grub phyir// dam tshig mchog ni ma lus pa// rgyal bas kyang ni bsrung bar bya// snyems bcas rdo rje gser ba dang // rdo rje
65a3(rgyud): bsnyems pa'i tshul 'chang zhing // phyag rgya kun myur grug mngon du// rdo rje sems dpa' mchog grub byir// dben grub kun gyi thabs chen po/ bsod nams kun gyis cher mthong ba// ye shes phyag rgya yang dag
65a4(rgyud): ldan// snying po chen po dam yin ste// gang gis bsod nams mi ldan pa/ de bzhin dkyil 'khor ma zhugs pa// don yod thegs pa me da mchog 'gyur// dngos grub thams cad rnyed dka'
65a5(rgyud): ma ni bde ba chen po rdo rje che/ gsang ba mchog gi dam tshig brtan/ dngos po thams cad sgrub pa ste/ rtag pa thams cad myung sgrub byed// thog mtha' med phyir dang bar 'byung // mchog dang po zhes bya ba
65a6(rgyud): bshadaka/ tshig kun gyi ni ci 'dod pa// chags pa kun gyi ci dga' bar// rjesu chags par bgyi'o zhes// ci bzhin 'bab pa'i ye shes 'jug/ nye ba'i snying po bcas snying po// bskal pa dang por bcom
65a7(rgyud): ldan gsungs// hUM de nas 'di ni gsungs tsam gyis// sangs rgyas thams cad sbas pa// rdo rje 'dzin bcas sna tshogs pa/ skad cig gis ni 'dus par 'dus/ rdo rje 'dzin gyis thog mar ni// yud kyi 'jig
65a8(rgyud): rten gsum po 'byung / ci ltar 'gro bar rab grub ces/ bde gshegs rnams kyis dngas grub dris// de rnams kyis ni bka' gsan nas// rdo rje 'dzin rang grol ba ni// 'byin dang stsol ba ston pa 'o/ 
65b1(rgyud): byed pas tshig ni 'di skad gsol// chags bral gyis 'dul 'jig rten rnams// chags bral nyid kyis dag par 'gyur// 'dod chags chen po bde ba che// 'di ni ci ltar 'grub par 'gyur// de yi tshig da
65b2(rgyud): gsan nas ni// rgyal ba rang nyid kyis gsungs pa// byang chub sems da theg ma'i lha// khod ni thabs chen nyid yino// ci srid 'khor lo'i gnas ni// mkhas mchog 'dug par gyur pa'i cha// de srid mtshungs
65b3(rgyud): med sems can den// mya ngan mi 'di' byed par nus// ci srid sems can rnam rtog pa// de srid byang chub srid pa che// byang chub sems can la phan phyir// rdo rje can gyis ci bder gyis// de nas thog ma dang dkyil
65b4(rgyud): 'khor// dang po dkyil 'khor bir gyis brlab// rdo rje kun gyi dam tshig ma chog/ ci bzhin chags sgrub pa nyid// de nas bcom ldan 'das de ni// bde ba chen po grub phyir dang // 'dod chags
65b5(rgyud): chen po rnam dag phyir// gtso bo mgon la gsol ba btab// bcom/ ldan khyod la gsol pa ni// 'dod chags chen po bde ba/ che// snying po 'di ni rtog pa mchog/ bde chen myur du grub
65b6(rgyud): ba'o// de rnams kyi ni bka' gsan nas// rdo rje sems dpa' bde chen po/ bde ba chen po rdo rje che// dkyil 'khor chen po bka' stsal to// de nas rab tu bshad bya ba// dkyil 'khor chen po dam pa ste/ ba
65b7(rgyud): ba chen po rdo rje mchog/ gsang ba dam pa zhes bshad do// theg mar dam tshig gsum thob pa'i// rdo rje slob dpon rang phyag rgyas// 'khor lo kun gyi cho ga la// rtag tu rdo rje dril 'chang ba// rtog pa
65b8(rgyud): thams cad yang dag 'bebs/ dkyil 'khor thams cad sgrub byad yin// dam tshig che gsum zhes bya ba'i// rgya 'di thams cad sgrub byed yin/ dngos grub cho ga thams cad lo// rdo rje dril du
66a1(rgyud): / rab bskul ba/ cho ga lhag gam ma tshang yang // 'grub 'gyur smad par mi bya'o// des bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs// mchog gi dang po mtha' yas mchog/ 
66a2(rgyud): bla na med cing mnyam med pa// rnam par kun la rab tu gnas// mchog ste yi ge dam pa yin// dkyil 'khor gnas ni snang bas la// de yi dbus cho ga bzhin// dngos grub byin rlabs cho ga yis// 
66a3(rgyud): dkyil 'khor de ni grub par bya// glu dang rol mo'i cho ga dang // me tog spos sogs mchog pa yi// ci rnyed pa dang ci 'dod par// mchog dang por ni brtag par bya// mchog gings mtha' yas
66a4(rgyud): mchog bla na med cing dpe med pa// namakha' kun la rab tu gnas// grong khyer dag ni mi 'gyur mchog/ thog ma med mchog rtag pa'i phyir// sangs rgyas 'byung ba 'ang rab tu bzhugs
66a5(rgyud): kun mchog mnyam pa nyid rten pas// lhag dang mtsha med kun gang // mtha' dang dbus med na mkha' ni// 'di nid bu mar rnam brtag pas// phyag rgya sbyar ba'i ting 'dzin gyis/ 
66a6(rgyud): de yi dbu mar rnam brtag nyid// de yi dbus pad+ma'i gzugs// yu bar bcas pa rab tu bzhag/ sna tshogs pad mas yang drag khabs// thams cad dag pa'i gdan de yin// de nas sras bu nyid
66a7(rgyud): 'gyur du// byas pa'i thig ni gdab bya ste// na mkha' kun gyi tshad yin phyir// gdul ba'i blo ni mtha' yas pas// tshad ni tshad med pa yino// mi mnyam med pas zur bzhi pa// dran dang dbang po'i sgra
66a8(rgyud): ba zhi ste/ bcom gtan rnams kyi rta babs pa ni// ting 'dzin khyam su bshad pa yin// khyims la rten pa'i rdo rje'i bdag/ gzungs rnams lha mos mchod pa'o// rgyan rnams kun gyis bkra ba ni/ 
66b1(rgyud): bsam pa thams cad rdzogs byed pa// gdul bas skyod pa sna tshogs mchog/ dam ches mchog ste kun tu 'gro// rlung gi spyod pa sna tshogs pa'i// kha dan rtsa btags dril sgra sgrogs// me long ya shas rtag
66b2(rgyud): me dog byang chub yan 'ag me dog phreng / dra ba mo long me tog che/ me tog drang ba'i rgyan gyis bskor/ kun grub mi 'gyur bde ba ni/ bde ba chen po zhes bshad do// bde ba chen po'i gzhal yas
66b3(rgyud): khang dang po'i gnas de bri bar bya// thar pa chen de'i grong khor mchog/ kun mchog de ni legs bris nas// theg ma med pa'i dbyings// phyogs kun mnyam pa nyid du bsam// phyi yi dkyil 'khor ro// 
66b4(rgyud): de yi nang gi 'khor lo ni/ dkyil 'khor brgyad pa lta bu yin/ 'di ni rnam thar brgyad pa ste/ dngos grub kun gyi bde bste/ byang sems theg pa chen po yi// mdo sde'i 'khor lo ra
66b5(rgyud): bskor bas// rdo rje thig gis yongs bskor ba/ rdo rje 'gro ra le yang dag bri// da ni sna tshogs pad+ma char// rdo rje sems dang 'dagod par bya// lugs ma 'am yang na brkos pa 'am/ byas
66b6(rgyud): ba 'am yang na bris pa ste// 'dzum bcas zla ba'i mdog can la// dmar ning sna tshogs 'od 'bar ba/ sangs rgyas kun gyi dbang sogs dang // rgyan dang na bza' sna tshogs pa/ sems dpa'i skyil
66b7(rgyud): klungs ngag gis bzhugs// rdo rje bsnams tshul 'chang mchog/ su ra ta ste zhes brjod cing // rang snying pos kyang bzhag par ga/ da yi phyogs ni thams cad du// mtshon na mad de bzhin pa ma yis
66b8(rgyud): go rims dag ni ci bzhin du// rdo rje lA ma yang dag bri/ rdo rje mched bstod la bden pa/ rdo rje chags ma mdun dra bri/ lha mo rdo rje la po ni// rdo rje can la rab tu 'khyud/ rgyab tu rdo rje dran ma ni// chu srin rgyal
67a1(rgyud): mtshan 'dzin pa'o// rdo rje 'dod pa'i dbang phyug ma// rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bsnams bri// de nas 'di rnams dgod pa'i bag rgya ni// dza badz+ra dr-iSh+Ti sa ma ke ma Ta hUM/ oM badz+ra ki li kI li hUM/ 
67a2(rgyud): be badz+ra NaM smA ragaho badz+ra kA ma shwa ri ste/ mtshams rdo rje sems ma sogs// dus kyi mchod pa yang dag bri// rdo rje brang rtsom dang sprin// ston dang dgun ni rdo rje ma/ me tog bdug pa mar me che// dri de spyi
67a3(rgyud): thal sbyar ba// rdo rje rgyal po'i lha mo ste// de nas phyag rgya rab bshad bya/ yo ma d+hu badz+ra g+hu g+h+raM/ oM badz+ra me g+he gu lu gu gu oM sha rang badz+rI/ oM oM oM badz+ra shai tri ro hU hUM/ sgeg mo bzhad ma
67a4(rgyud): gru chen mo// gar mdzad pa yi lha mo'i tshogs// rdo rje rol mo 'did ga ni// pha rol gyi ni mtshams bya/ he ra ti badz+ra ma g+ha bi la si ni tra Ta/ ha ra te badz+re nr-i t+yai be ba be la/ sgo
67a5(rgyud): yi gnas ni thams cad du// gsol ka ba ni bzhi po ste// rdo rje lcags kyu zhags pa dang // lcags sgrog de bzhin dril bu ma'i// badz+ra oM ku sha dzaHbadz+ra pA shaM hUM/ badz+ra shrig le be// badz+ra g+haN+Da ho/ 
67a6(rgyud): dam tshig mchog ni thams cad kyi/ dgongs shing brtag pa nyid du 'gyur// rdo rje lha mo la sogs pa// dngos grub kun la 'byung bar 'gyur// gsol ka ba naM gi yog me yi// gtso mo dang / 
67a7(rgyud): dang 'bran mo dang // de nas sku mchog la sogs pa// mngon bris yang dag bsgrub par bya// dam tshig mchog ni bcings na su// dzaHhUM be hoHzhes brjod bya// sems dpa' skyil krungs bcas nas ni/ 
67a8(rgyud): rdo rje can gyi spyan sngar la dug/ bad ba chen po rdo rje mchog// bdag po lan gcig yang dag dgug/ hUM mahA su kha badz+ra satwa/ ya hi shi g+h+ra~M/ ma ho su kha badz+ra a mo g+hA ya/ a nu pA la ya/ 
67b1(rgyud): pra bu d+ha su ra ta tre a nu rak+to ma b+ha ga su to Sh+yo ma b+ha waHsu po Sh+yo ma b+ha wa/ b+ha ga bA na na di nas sa twa/ sarba sid+d+hi m+ma pra ya ts+tsha/ a she ta ma tri Shi A ba sha ya sa ma yar bad+d+ha/ ba shI ka ro ma/ yi mar
67b2(rgyud): mu dru bA daMHdzaHhUM baM he// 'di yis bcom ldan 'das rtag par/ dkyil 'khor du na rang nyid gshegs// bkug cing bcug la shin tu brtan// dbang du gyur nas rab tu thub ces bcom ldan 'das dpa
67b3(rgyud): tshig chen po gsung so// rdo rje sleb dben rang lha ni// 'od zer kun tu ston la sogs// mtshan ma rnam pa mang po ni// ngo mtshar gyur pa mthong bar 'gyur// de nas rdo rje mched yon ni// rdo rje thal mo ba
67b4(rgyud): dbye dbul// bum pa gang dag ci snyed pa'i/ me tog sogs kyis yang dag mchod// ba da rtse mor dril btags pa/ mtshams kyis char ni bzhag par bya// bum pa spos chus gang ba la/ 
67b5(rgyud): de nas rdo rje mched yon ni/ lcags ma la ni yongasu bzlas// de la bde ba chen po rdo rje don yod pa'i dam tshig gi chur sgrub pa ni 'di yin te// hU~M ma hA su kha badz+ra a mo g+ha sa ma
67b6(rgyud): yod sad da sa b+hi Sha Tu/ sarba su kha sau ma na s+ya nA da da ku ru ku ru/ dzaHsbub ho// 'di la na nyi shu rtsa gcig yongasu bzlas lo bdag nyid la rdo rje dbang bskur bya'o// gsang gter bya ba dang / 
67b7(rgyud): 'thungs pas kyang sdug bsngal thams cad bsil ba dang / bang ba thams cad 'phel bar 'gyuraro// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' gsung so// de nas 'khor lor ma nugs kyang / 8
67b8(rgyud): nyid theg mar byung zhugs shing // rdo rje kun gyi slob dben che// rdo rje can gyis rang byin rlog// nga nas rdo rje 'dzin sleb dpon/ rang nyid khrus byas dris legs byugs// ci rnyed pa yi rgyam gyis
68a1(rgyud): brgyan/ shin tu dmar ba'i gos smos zhing // me tog phreng btags kha dris sgo// rnam sgeg dga' ba'i rdo rje dang // rdo rje gar gyi sbyor ba yis// spyi ber me tog thal sbyar nas// gnas
68a2(rgyud): de mgon la phyag bya'o// zhugs nas dkyil 'khor de la ni// bskor ba dag ni lan gsum pa// de nas mdun du 'dug nas ni// de kho na nyid lan gcig brjod// 'dod chags chen po bde bo che/ rdo rje chen
68a3(rgyud): po nor che ba// ye shes chen po las chen po// de dag rdo rje sems grub brjod// de nas me tog si li ma ni// mgon la gtor te cho ga bzhin// dang po Sha Da ba la sogs// bstod pa'i glu ru lan cig blang / 
68a4(rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi bstod pa'i rgyal po mtshan brgyad pa/ rgya rtsa brgyad po de kho na nyid chen po na 'di yin te// dpal ma/ cho ga dang po sems dpa' che// dga' ba chen po'i
68a5(rgyud): dga' ba che// kun tu bzang po'i kun bdag nyid// rdo rje bsnams chu la bdag po'i bdag// sems dang sems dpa'i ting 'dzin ma/ cho ga/ rdo rje rdo rje mchog chen po/ kun tu bzang po'i spyod/ 
68a6(rgyud): pa mchog/ bdud dang bdud ni rab 'joms pa// thams cad du ni byang chub che// sangs rgyas sangs rgyas skyes mchog skyes// rdo rje hUM mdzad yi ge hUM/ 'jig rten dbang phyug nor rab gsal/ 'dod chag
68a7(rgyud): chen po bde ba nyid// 'dod dang thar pa nor che ba// dus gsum srid gsum mchog gsum pa// 'jig rten gsum mchog khams gsum pa// brtan par rang byang gsal ba ste// rab sdom dang
68a8(rgyud): legs bsags pa/ rgyu ba rab mchog thob mdzad pa/ srid pa 'khor bar sbyong mdzad pa// thog mtha' med cing theg mtha' can// mdangs ldan dang por thams cad gnas/ snying po phyag rgya sbyor
68b1(rgyud): dam tshig/ de 'di bden pa mchog ste// de bzhin gshegs pa'i dngos grub che// chos dang las ni khams chen po// dam pa'i chos sna las mchog bdag/ byang chub sems ni rab skyong mdzad/ rdo rje
68b2(rgyud): khro bo che// dus mtha' ltar 'bar 'dul ba po// 'dul mdzad chen po gdug pa'i mchog/ drag po drug nyid zad mdzad pa// thams cad dag pa pad+ma che// shes rab thabs te tshul chen po// 'dod chags
68b3(rgyud): dag pa ting 'dzin mchog/ sna tshogs chags pa dbang phyug cha// nam mkha' mtha' yas brtag pa'i don// 'byung po thams cad gnas chen po// 'byor pa po ni thams cad gnas// 'byor ba dpal dang
68b4(rgyud): gtso ba rgyal// bsam pa thams cad rdzogs mdzad pa/ phyag 'tshal khyo da la phyag 'tshalo// phyag 'tshal 'dud cing phyag 'tshalo// dad pas khang las bdag rten bgyid// rdo rje sems dang bdag
68b5(rgyud): grub mdzod// gang zhig bstod pa'i rgyal po 'di// nya ni re nang par ba rjod byed dam// chos kyi tshig gis lan gcig brjod// dngos grub shin tu myur bar 'gyur// gal te 'dir grub mi 'dod
68b6(rgyud): na dang por nyin re dus gsum du// bstod na sdig pa las nges grol// zhing dag pa ni grub par byed// rtag tu sdug bsngal thams cad sel// lan gcig rab tu brjed pa yis// dngos grub thams
68b7(rgyud): cad skal bzang byed// phun sum tshogs dpal 'phel bar byed// kun grub don yod yon tan tsan// mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad dam pa'o// de nas gsang ba'i mchod pas ni// rab tu dga' bas dgon la
68b8(rgyud): mchod// rang gi phyag rgya lan gcig ni// rang gi phyag rgyas bcings te grub// de nas lha yi chu dang ni// de bzhin sku mchog gis dbang bskur// rang gi snying po rdo rje phyag/ snying po 'di ni blang bar bya// 
69a1(rgyud): ra su ra s+t+wa ma hA badz+ra sa twa/ oM d+hu b+hu ba swa/ de nas rdo rje dbang bskur ba// phyag na rdo rje mi 'dzin pa// rdo rje 'jan chen sleb dben du// 'di nyid du ni rab grub 'gyur// de nas kyang ni ci 'dod par/ cho ga'i dam pa bsgrubs nas ni/ 
69a2(rgyud): rdo rje gare gyis mchod pa yis/ legs par mched la phyir byung bya// de nas brtsams te rdo rje'i bdag / rdo rje kun gyis gsang rab 'jim/ rdo rje thams cad 'dzin sleb dben// dngas grub thams cad grub par
69a3(rgyud): 'gyur rdo rje sems dpa'i dngos grub che// phyag rgya ku/ nang dag dbang phyug che// d+hI thams cad mkhyen pa'i rdo rje che// las rnams thams cad nus la brtag/ mi tshugs pa dang ma sad pa/ 
69a4(rgyud): kun byed dngos grub thams cad sbyar// sems can kun gyi rgyal po che// char gcod pa dang phan 'dogs nus// thams cad rjes chags byed kun mcheg/ kun rig pa dang kun gyi bdag/ 'dod pa thams
69a5(rgyud): cad la rab sbyor// thun tshegs kun gyi dbang phyug che// lha la sogs pa'i sen kun// spro ba thams cad rtag tu byung // rdo rje sems dpa' rtag tu mthong // tshe 'di nyid la 'grub par 'gyur// de nyid kyis ni 'ded
69a6(rgyud): bar ldan// dga' ning rang nyid de bdag por// rdo rje slob dpon 'gyur ba yin// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsung so// bde ba chen po rdo rje slob dpon byin gyis rlob cing 'jug pa'i cho ga rgyas
69a7(rgyud): pa'i rgyud// rdo rje slob ma 'jug pa'i tshi ga rgyas pa'i rgyud rjesu bshad par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs// rdo rje mchod yon stong khar bskor/ bcings nas bsam g.yas
69b1(rgyud): bzhin gyis ni/ mge bas yang dag phyag bya ba/ des grub thams cad sgrub byed yin// dkyil 'khor du ni ra zhugs la/ bskor ba lan gsum byas nas ni/ 'dod chags chen po bad che// 'gro ba
69b2(rgyud): kun las grub mdzad brjod/ de nas dus kyi mchod pa yis// bde ba chen po yong dag mched// de bzhin du ni dbang bskur bar// rdo rje gsang ba'i sleb mapo zhug// de nas ci bzhin brgyan nas ni/ rdo rje sleb dpon
69b3(rgyud): gyis rab gzhug/ slob ma'i tshogs rnams bcug nas ni// ci 'dod pa yi dngos grub thob// de nas sleb ma bcug nas ni// dga' chen po'i di brjod par bya// rab dgyes rab bde bstan pa yi// rdo rje sems
69b4(rgyud): bdag 'di grub mjed// de nas ma tog phreng ba ni// spyi bo nas ni myur du dong // gang du me tog babs gyur te// lhag pa'i lhar ni rab grub 'gyung // de nas lha yi chu yis ni/ rdo rje 'dzin pa rang dbang
69b5(rgyud): bsgrub rdo rje chen po rdo rje lnga// bin la rdo rje be d+hi ba rjed// mo ma hA su kha badz+ra/ badz+ra a b+hi Sha kra na ste// a d+hi Shiny+tsa mi/ ma hA badz+ra d+ha ra/ ha badz+ra nA ma sid+d+hi nA maHgang la rdo rje ming gang
69b6(rgyud): zhig yin pa de la kye zhes bya ba'i sgra dang sbyar bar bya'o// de nas snying po byin la/ phyag rgya bcing ba rlabs ci ltar mngon par 'dad pa grub par bya'o// rdo rje sems dpa'i cho ga 'am// gang 'dod rang gis grub
69b7(rgyud): ba la de nyid kyis ni dam tshig nyid/ 'gro la sogos pa'i tshi ga bshod/ 'jig rten pa ni sna chags dang // de bzhin 'jig rten 'das po yang // thams cad rang gi ngo ba ni// rgyas par bsgrubs na
69b8(rgyud): tu gug 'di la rab tu 'jug tsam gyis// mi tshugs pa dang mi ldog pa// nyid du rgyal ba'i sras 'gyur zhing // dede chen rab tu grub pa ste// de nas rdo rje 'dzin slob dpon// mna' ni mang du bsgrags nas
70a1(rgyud): kyang de ci chos dang dam tshig ni/ la ci pa ni gzhin gyis bsdug del 'di ni man grub pa'i// den chus nga bsru nas med par bya'o// 'di ni byed kyi dmyal ba'i chu// dam tshig
70a2(rgyud): 'das na sreg par byed// dam tshig bsrungs na 'grub par 'gyur// dngos grub rdo rje 'dud rtsi chu// de nyid chos dang dam tshig ni// gal te dkyil 'khor ma mthong spro// skya bo 'dug na gnas pa 'am// dad pa med
70a3(rgyud): bas bgad par 'gyur// de la 'di ni de yi na nyid dang dam tshig gi gsang ba'i cho ga rab tu sbyin pa yin te// thog mtha' med pa'i sems dpa' ni// rdo rje sems dpa' dga' ba che/ kun tu bzang po kun
70a4(rgyud): bdag nyid// rdo rje bsnams tshul bdag po'i bdag/ de kho na nyid mchog gi gsang ba'i lnga'i de kho na nyid chen por bshad par brjed pa/ ra bya'o// bcom ldan de nyid ches kyi mtshig bka' stsal
70a5(rgyud): bar mdzad// srid pa ngo bo nyid kyis dag/ ngo bo nyid kyi srid bral byas// nga bzhin dag pa'i sems dpa' mchog/ srid pa mchog ni byed pa yin/ de la srid pa rnam par dag pa'i thabs rtog pa thams
70a6(rgyud): cad kyi gsang ba'i mchog dam tshig chen po bstan par bya ba ni 'di yin te// srid pa'i bde ba shin tu chung // sdug bsngal chen po dag bya'i phyir// shin tu bde ba dam pa'i thabs// dam tshig rtag tu
70a7(rgyud): ston par bya// 'dod pa'i long spyod thams cad ni// ci 'dod par ni rten bzhin du// rang gi lhag pa'i lha sbyor bas// bdag dang bzhin la mchod par bya// de la rtog pa thams cad kyis gsang ba'i mchog gi
70a8(rgyud): dam tshig chen po 'di brjod par bya ste/ ci srid 'khor ba'i gnas ni// mkhas mchog 'dug par gyur pa'i tshe// de srid mtshangs med sems can den/ mya ngan mi 'da' byed par nus// gsang ba mchog
70b1(rgyud): gi dam tshig thabs// bsod nams byin rlabs sgrub byed pa// dngos grub kun gyi dbang phyug mchog rgyun tu sems can don byang ba'o// da ltar sems ni rab dang rdo rje nying du gyis/ rang gi dam tshig ma bza
70b2(rgyud): bde spyang bstan par gyis// de ni 'gro la myur du bde ba sangs rgyas thams cad dang // rab tu mtshungs shing rtag pa nyid du rtog par 'gyur// de nas khad kyis bcud dang kha zas dang / gnas pa dang / gla dang rol
70b3(rgyud): mo la sogs pa'i mchod pa rnams legs par stobs pas bdag nyid gang la sred des kyang rdo rje sleb dben chen po mched par bya'o// rdo rje slob dpon me tog sogs// ci 'dod par ni lags
70b4(rgyud): mchod cing // rdo rje gar gyi mchod pa yis// yang dag par ni mchod de byung // de nas rdo rje 'dzin slob dpon// gar gyis mchod pas mchod nas ni// rdo rje thal mo sbyor ba yis// slob ma kun gyis rab
70b5(rgyud): tu mchod// ro dang kha zas gnas pa dang // glu dang rol mo ci 'dod pas// rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin bdag/ yang dag mched nas phyir byung ba// dpal mchog dang po zhes bya ba'i dkyil
70b6(rgyud): 'khor mchog tu gsang ba'o// de nas sgrub pa bshad bya ba// dngos grub shin tu rtag pa ste// gang gi srid pa 'di nyid la// dngos grub rtag pa thob byed pa'o// 'di yis byang chub sems dpa' ni/ srid par
70b7(rgyud): gnas shing srid par sangs// dngos gru'i kun gyi dbang phyug gug/ rtag tu sems can kun don byed// mi yis ci ltar mchog grub pa/ da ltar byang chub spyod sogs pas/ dag pa'i tshul gyis gzhan
70b8(rgyud): gyis kyang // sangs rgyas kun sogs thib mi 'gyur// gdul bya min pa bsod nams med// sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzin pa ni// rnam pa kun tu mthong segs kyis// sems can don byed mi nus// de bas rlud
71a1(rgyud): chen las grub pa sangs rgyas sa ma rdo rje 'dzin// mthong la sogs pas sems can don/ rnam pa' mnyam par byed pa yin/ 'dod chags chen po 'dab che/ smi pa'i sa pacwa
71a2(rgyud): ma med na kha' mtha' yas sems can don// mya ngan mi 'da' byed pa yin// dkyil 'khor dag tu ma zhugs pa// bsod nams med pa 'o ma la lo can// de yang kun mchog grub pa yi// tshe 'di nyid la
71a3(rgyud): 'grub par 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das de ni yod grub pa rdo rje sems dpas gsung so// de nas don yod pa thogs pa mang ba myur du sgrub pa'i mchog rjesu bshad par bya'o// zhes bcom ldan 'das
71a4(rgyud): rdo rje sems dpas gsung sa// lugs ma 'am ni brkos pa 'am/ byas/ ba 'am ni byas pa yi// dang ba'i sems dpa'i rtags na/ sa ni// mdun du da ni bsgrub par bya// nyin re zhing ni dang po ru
71a5(rgyud): de bzhin yul dang ldar gyur pas// dang po'i gsang mchog gis bkug ste// phyag rgya chen por rab byin rlag/ rdo rje mig gis de bzhin blta sa// rdo rje sems tshul bdag po rang / rdo rje hUM ni glung bras
71a6(rgyud): bas/ rdo rje sems dpa' bslab par bya// der rjes cha lugs ci bzhin du// mchog gi dang por rab gyes pas// gzugs brnyan la sogs dang por ni// ci 'dod par ni rab tu skrag/ 'di yis 'drid bkun
71a7(rgyud): dang phyug 'dod pa tsam gyi 'gro 'ong lding // gos grub kun gyi dbang phyug grub/ kun mchog dang po'i dbang phyug yon// na tshogs kun bdag thams cad pa/ 'dod chags chen po bde brje/ 
71a8(rgyud): kun mdzad sna tshogs pa/ rtag par kun tu 'dul ba po// dngos grub kun gyi 'ad ba mchog phyag rgya kun bdag dbang phyug yin/ rdo rje kun gyi dngos grub che// thams cad mkhyen pa'i 'byung gnas che/ mi
71b1(rgyud): tshugs pa dang mi sod pa// thams cad byed cing kun gyi gnas/ khams gsum las rgyal sna tshogs pa/ tshar gcod pa dang phan 'dogs pa/ kun la rjes chags kun gyi mchog/ kun rig dngas grub thams
71b2(rgyud): cad ste/ rang gi rnam 'phral rab ston byed// kun mchog dngos grub chen po ste// dbang phyug chen pos dbang phyug che// gzugs dang tshe stobs rdo rje mchog/ rdo rje sems dpa' gnyis pa bzhin// 'gro ba rnams
71b3(rgyud): kyis mchod cing rjed// rang gi gnyen rnams kyis rten pa// rgyal po rdo rje 'chang chen ltar// rga dang 'chi ba med par 'gyur// gal te rdo rje sems dpa' 'am// sangs rgyas byang chub sems nyid 'dod// dengs grub
71b4(rgyud): ji ltar 'dod pa nyid// tshe 'di nyid la 'grub par 'gyur// phyi ma 'am ni 'jig rten pa 'am// rtog pa kun bshad cho ga 'am// rang nyid kyis mdzad kyis rtag tu// dngos grub thams cad grub 'gyur nas
71b5(rgyud): bcom ldan rdo rje dngos grub kyis// dbang phyug bde ba chen po ni// rdo rje 'cha/ nga ba chen rgyal po// kun mchog sa yi dbang pos gsung sa// da la ci ltar na rang gi phyag rgya sgrub pa'i rgyud yin
71b6(rgyud): zhe na sa phyag rgya chen po mnyam gzhag la/ rang gi snying po lan gcig sgrub// dr-i D+ha su to Sh+ya san rak+ta/ su bo sid+d+ha ta la gu// de la ci ltar yi ge hUM/ glu blang ba'i rgyud yin zhe na/ ri d+hi ta sogs kyis rgyun ldan/ 
71b7(rgyud): ci nus pa dang ci dga' dang // gaN+DI la sogs glu blangs pa'i yi ge hU~M gis 'grub par 'gyur// de nas phyag rgya thams cad kyi// mchog de sgrub pa'i rgyud bshad de// gal te phyag rgya sgrub 'dod na// 
71b8(rgyud): bzhin yul dang ldan gyur pas// rang nyid kyis ni rgya bcings la/ yongs mi skye'i bar du sdug/ de la ci ltar na dam tshig thams cad grub pa'i rgyud yin zhe ni// dam tshig phyag rgya btsong nas no// sa ma ya swA
72a1(rgyud): zhes brjod la/ rang gi snying khar rim bzhin du// phyag rgya'i mchog de bsgrub par bya// de nas las kyi phyag rgya yi/ mchog sgrub pa 'di rgyud du ni/ rdo rje gar gyis mchod pa yis/ yos
72a2(rgyud): mi skyo bas bsgrubs ni// mchod pa kun sogs las rnams ni// tshe 'di nyid la grub par 'gyur// rdo rje 'chang chen nyid dang ni// sangs rgyas byang chub sems nyid dang // gzhan yang dngos grub thams cad ni// 
72a3(rgyud): dam par myur du 'grub par 'gyur/ rtog pa thams cad sgrub pa chen po den yod par grub pa'i cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud do// de nas rtog pa thams cad sgrub pa'i des grub kyi rgyud ni nyin re zhing drang por lan
72a4(rgyud): cig phyag rgya sgrub pa don yod pa des grub thogs pa med pa bshad par bya'o// zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs// thams cad rje su mnyam par bya ba dang / dgug pa dang / bcing ba dang / 
72a5(rgyud): dbang du bya ba sgrub pa la ni bde ba chen po rdo rje lta bas// / bde ba dang / yid bde ba dang / phun sum tshogs pa dang // dngos grub thams cad mngon par 'phel bar bya ba la ni bde ba chen po
72a6(rgyud): rjese/ tshe dang / ling tshe dang / gzugs dang / gzi brjid chen po mngon par 'phel bar bya ba la ni dang po'i rdo rje bcud kyis len gyis// dpal chen po dang / skal ba bzong po dang / grags pa dang
72a7(rgyud): snyan pa 'phel bar bya ba la ni dang ba'i rdo rje grub pas// stobs chen po dang / ye shes dang chos dang las bsgrub par bya ba yin dang po'i rdo rje snying stobs cheb so// rdzu 'phrul dang cho 'phrul dang rmad
72a8(rgyud): du byung ba dang / rnam par 'phrul pa thams cad ston pa la ni dang po'i rdo rje'i rnam par 'phrul bso// thams cad du yi go dang / gzugs kyis bden pa thams cad mthong ba dang / zos pa dang / hA/ 
72b1(rgyud): bdang 'dri ba sgru par bya ba la pa nga rngu rjed med par 'a ba sa babams cad kyis bden pathams cad rje ba dang thos pa dang / smra ba dang tshal gyis gad par bya ba lan dang pa
72b2(rgyud): den med pa'i ban pas// sgyu ma thams cad dang / bde ba'i mchog dang / lung bsgre ba dang / lan thob pa grub pa la dnga'a' rdo rje rmad du byung bas// gtir thams cang byung ba dang / nong phrog pa dang rgyu
72b3(rgyud): srid theb pa dang / sa la nye bar long spyod pa la ni dang po'i rdo rje dbang bskur bas// yul thams cad dang / skya ba dang / grong khye ra dang / nags dang / chu bor nye bar langs spyod sprul pa lA ni dang po'i
72b4(rgyud): rje grub paso// thams cad las mngon pa byung ba'i lha yul dang / rin po che dang / kha zas dang / btung ba dang / g.yog 'khor shin tu bzang ba la sogs pa yul de nye bar longs
72b5(rgyud): spyod pa la ni dang po'i rdo rje sprul paso// skad cig gis sa bzhi thams cad 'bru la sogs pa smin par spyad pa dang / chu'i phung po chen po 'byung ba dang / snang ba chen po bskyed pa dang // rlung thams cad
72b6(rgyud): dbang du bya ba la ni dang po'i rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug giso// rgyu dang mi rgyu ba'i de nges po thams cad bza' ba dang / btung ba dang / rang rtser gzhug pa dang las thams cad la sbyar ba la ni/ dang po'i
72b7(rgyud): rdo rje don yod pa'i thams cad dbang du byed paso// dngas grub thams cad las de bzhin gshegs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / rdo rje 'dzin pa dang / rdo rje la sogs mthong ba la ni dang po'i rdo rje
72b8(rgyud): snyams paso// rang gi bdag nyid rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i gzugs thaMd sprul cing sngon pa mi snang ba dang / nam khar 'gro ba grub pa dang / shin tu phra ba dang / sbom pa dang / du mar stor pa la ni dang
73a1(rgyud): rdo rje gzugs sna tshogs pas// 'jig rten gsum gyi bdag por gyur pa thams cad dbab pa dang / dbang du bya ba dang / las thams cad la sbyar ba la ni dang po'i rdo rje hUM mdzad kyis
73a2(rgyud): lha thams cad dbab pa dang / bcing ba dang / dbang du bya ba dang / las thams cad la nges par sbyar ba la ni dang po'i rdo rje lho'i bdag poso// klu thams cad gdon pa dang / 'dul ba dang / dbang du bya ba dang / 
73a3(rgyud): las thams cad la nges par sbyar ba la ni dang de'i rdo rje 'bar ba'i rdo rjes// gnod sbyin la sogs pa thams cad dgug pa dang / dbang du bya ba dang / las thams cad la nges por sbyar bar bya ba dang // skrag tu
73a4(rgyud): bya ba la ni dang po'i rdo rje gden 'dul bas/ dkyil 'khor thams cad brtag pa dang / 'jug pa dang / mchod pa dang sgrub pa dang / las thams cad la nges par sbyar bar bye ba la ni dang ba'i rdo rje
73a5(rgyud): mos byag rgyathams cad dgug pa dang / btsang ba dang / dbang du bya ba dang / brtan par bya ba sgrub pa la ni da rdo rje phyag rgyas grub paso// dam tshig thams cad dgug pa dang / gsus
73a6(rgyud): ba dang / btsang ba dang / sgrub pa la ni dang po'i rdo rje dam tshig gos// las thams cad rab tu sgrub po la rnam pa mi 'jigs par bya ba dang / bstan par bya ba dang / grags pa chen po rab tu bsgrags pa
73a7(rgyud): la ni dang po'i rdo rje las kyiso// rdo rje thams cad dgug pa dang / gzhug pa dang / bcing 'dang/ dbang du bya ba sgrub pa la ni dang po'i rdo rje se// sems dpa' chen po thams cad dgug pa dang / gzhug pa
73a8(rgyud): dang / tshang ba dang / ga du bya ba sgrub pa la ni da 'i rje sems dpa / de badzin gshegs po thams cad thug pa dang / gzug pa dang / nga ba dang / yang du bya ba sgrub pa lan
73b1(rgyud): bzhin gshegs paso// rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po dgug pa dang / gzhug pa dang / bcings pa dang / dbang du bya ba la ni dang po'i rdo rje 'dzin paso zhes kyang gsung so// dkyil 'khor dag tu ma nugs pa 'am/ 
73b2(rgyud): sdig pa thams cad byas pa'am// rang gi snying po maM bsgrubs pa'ang / dngos grub thams cad grub par 'gyur/ ma bsgrubs pa thams cad 'grub pa// don yod par grub pa phyag rgya mchog tu grub
73b3(rgyud): ba'o// de nas dang po'i snying po ma bsgrubs pa'i thams cad don yod pa thogs pa med pa las thams cad kyi rgyu skad cig sgru ba pa rjes bshad par bya'o// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje tha~Md kyi sna tshogs pa'i
73b4(rgyud): phrin las rdo rje 'chang chen pos gsung sa// don yod pa thogs pa med pa// bdag kyang bde gshegs lhan cig/ tu/ las kyi rab 'byams 'di dag ni/ dngos grub skad cig gis sgrub
73b5(rgyud): byed/ 'di lta ste/ thams cad shin tu srung ba dang / yengasu bskyang ba dang / ni ba dang / bde lagasu bya ba dang / tshe 'phel bar bya ba la ni rdo rje gar gyi sems dpa'i tshul gtsug ter gyi phyag rgyas/ dkyil
73b6(rgyud): 'khor thams cad mtshams dang phyogs dang / dam tshig dang // dngos grub bcing zhing srung ba ni rdo rje gir gyi so sor 'brang ba chen poso// nyid gnu pa zhi / slar bzlos pa dang / rtag pa can pa dang / khab
73b7(rgyud): 'jug gi rigs thams cad gsol ba la ni rdo rje gar gyis nad med pa so// gdung ba thams cad dang / gnod byed dang / nad dang / mya ngan dang / sdug bsngal thams cad gzhig pa la ni rdo rje rar gyis
73b8(rgyud): sdug bsngal nye bar zhi ba'o// dug dang sbyar ba'i dug la sogs nye bar thar pa dang / dab pa dang / bcing ba dang / bza' ba dang / bdud rtsir bya ba la ni rdo rje gar gyi nye ba'i dug giso// gdon thams
74a1(rgyud): cad dbab pa dang / bcing ba dang / dam tshig 'dzin du gtsug pa dang / rab tu gdul ba dang / srung ba la ni rdo rje gar gyi gden las thar pa'o// thams cad la bcing ba dang / thar pa dang / 
74a2(rgyud): dral ba dang / ltung ba dang / ldang ba la ni rdo rje gar gyi rdo rje chen po'i khro ba so// mkha'agro ma thams cad kyi phyag rgya gzhig pa dang / gden las thar bar bya ba dang / shi ba bslang ba dang / tshe mngon par 'phel ba
74a3(rgyud): dang shin tu srung ba la ni rdo rje gar gyi phyag rgya'i lan gyis// sgrib pa thams cad dang / sdig pa thams cad dang / rmi lam ngan pa dang / ltab ngan pa dang / byur gzhig pa la ni rdo rje gar gyi zhi ba'o// thams
74a4(rgyud): cad dbab pa dang / bskyod pa dang / gar byed du gzhug pa dang / thams cad nga den par smrang gzhug pa dang / pra san thams cad sgrub pa la ni rdo rje gar gyis thams cad 'bebs pa'i phyag rgya so// 
74a5(rgyud): thams cad rgyas gdab pa dang / bsad pa dang / ltung bar bya ba dang / bslang ba dang / slar gso ba la ni don yod grub pa'i rdo rje gar gyis mkha' gre ma tshan mes// thams cad rengs par bya ba dang / rmongs
74a6(rgyud): bar bya ba dang / gnyid log par bya ba dang / bsad pa dang / bza' bar bya ba la ni rdo rje gar gyi gdug pa'i srid pa sa// gzhan gyi dpung thams cad skrag par bya ba dang / gzhig bar bya ba dang / dbang du bya ba
74a7(rgyud): dang ltung bar bya ba dang / bsad par bya ba la ni rdo rje gar gyi gshed byed kyis// khro bo thams cad bsal ba dang / bzhin ras dang bar bya ba dang / brtsod pa las rgyal ba dang // 'jig pa las thar pa dang / 
74a8(rgyud): g.yul bgyod pa la sogs pa'i rgyal ba sgrub pa la ni rdo rje gar gyi rgyal mchen mchog gi dpung rgyan gyis// sprin thams cad yang dag par bzung zhing mi g.ye bar bya ba dang / char chen po dang
74b1(rgyud): ba dang rlungangams klog dang / sar ba bzlog pa dang / dro ba dang / grang ba gsal ba la ni rdo rje gar gyi dbang po'i rdo rjeso// gzugs dang / sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg pa thams cad shin tu grub pa la ni rdo rje gar
74b2(rgyud): gyi 'dod pa'i dbang phyug gis/ rgyu ba dang mi rgyu ba thams cad rje su chags pa dang / dgug pa dang / dbang du bya ba dang / rtse ba dang / las thams cad la nges par sbyar ba la ni rdo rje gar gyi dngos grub thed
74b3(rgyud): kyiso// lha thams cad dbab pa dang / klu thams cad dbang du bya ba dang / gnod sbyin dang / 'byung ba dang / ma mo thams cad las la nges par sbyar ba la ni rdo rje gar gyi rdo rje gri'i mchog giso// rnam thos sras mnan
74b4(rgyud): nas dpal drang ba dang / lha'i bu mo thams cad rab tu bdag pa dang / lha dang lha ma yin gyi bud med thams cad rtse ba dang / 'jig rten gsu ma ma lus pa las rgyal ba dang / 'dod pa'i dbang drug
74b5(rgyud): thams cad las rgyal ba dang / dbang phyug chen po thams cad theg pa la ni rdo rje gar gyi skyes bu byed pa chen po sa/ mched pa tham sacad sgrub pa dang / thams cad rdo ra bya ba dang / bdud la
74b6(rgyud): sogs pa thams cad rab tu gnem pa dang / phyag rgya thams cad bcing ba dang / dengs grub kyi mchog la sogs pa ma lus shing lus pa med pa'i phas grub thams cad kyi myur du grub par bya ba la
74b7(rgyud): ni rdo rje gar gyi den yod cing thegs pa med pa myur ba'i las sna tshogs kyi dngos grub kyis// de nas phyag rgya thams cad sgrub pa'i cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud// nyini re dang bai lan gcig ni/ byig rgyas thams cad
74b8(rgyud): rab sgrub byed// snying mchog lan gcig bzlas nas ni// phyag rgya chen po rab sgrub bya// de yis rdzal nye snying ngo // las rnams kun la nges sbyar bas// den yod grub pas las rnams ni// kun la shin tu
75a1(rgyud): grub par 'gyur// phyag rgya thams cad dang byin rlob// phyag na rdo rje'i phyag rgya ni/ kyil 'khor dag kyang mthong ba la/ ma bshad pa la'ang rab grub 'gyur// rtog 'dir 'jig pa yod min te/ 
75a2(rgyud): 'khor lo mad la brgya byin la// gang phyir bdag la byin rlob pas// rang sras rgyu ni 'gyur ba yin// sdig pa chen po byed pa la'ang // bsam pa shes nas sbyin par bya// 'di dag bcings tsam nyid dag byed// dang
75a3(rgyud): grub thams cad 'grub par 'gyur// dpal mchog dang po'i rtog pa po'i rgyal po bde ba chen po'i rdo rje don yod pa'i dam tshig gi cho ga rgyas pa'i rtog pa'o// de nas ston pa rdo rje 'dzin// 'byin pa byed
75a4(rgyud): pa bad ba che// bde chen can du bstan phyir dang / sems can thams cad rnam dag phyir/ khams kun dang mnyam zad pa med// kun gyi bdag nyid la zhugs te/ mnyam pa'i dngos grub mchog spros nas/ 
75a5(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs phyung // mtha' yas pa yi// zhing thams cad// 'jig rten kun gyi khams bcas pas// de cha sangs rgyas thams cad kyis// til gyi gang bu bzhin myur ga
75a6(rgyud): 'jog rten khams ni thams cad du/ sems can kun mdun yang dag bzhugs// sen thams cad ma dag pas// rang rig las kyis dag ma gyur// de tshe sems can khams rnams ni// rang bzhin gyis ni sa
75a7(rgyud): dka' byor// rang gi las ni spyang don du// btang snyoms chen po mdzad pa yin// de nas bcom ldan rdo rje can/ sems dpa' chen po bde ba che/ byang chub chen por thugs brtan pas/ skad cig gis ni yang dag
75a8(rgyud): bskul// sems can la phan bsod nams tshegs/ byang chub sems ni brtan pa dag / sems can khams ni rgud 'gyur bas// shin tu btang snyoms ma mdzad cig/ de nas sangs rgyas gis gsungs
75b1(rgyud): bsku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje can// thugs rje'i bdag nyid can gyi thabs/ byang chub sems mchog khyod spros shig/ de nas ston pa rdo rje 'dzin// de cha kun nas byin gyis brlabs// bde ba chen po rdo rje cha/ dkyil
75b2(rgyud): 'khor chen po dam pa yin// khams gsum 'khor ba'i rgya khyon gyi// 'khor lo chen po gdod nas byung / de yis khams gsum gnas pa yis// sems can thams cad yang dag bsgrubs// sangs rgyas
