75b3(rgyud): kun sogs dngos grub la// de cha dag pa 'grub par 'gyur/ de nas sangs rgyas thams cad la/ 'dus nas gsol ba 'debs mdzad pa// de bzhin gshegs pa'i rin po che// sangs rgyas kun mchog bshad du
75b4(rgyud): gsol// de nas sangs rgyas thams cad kyis// sku gsung thugs la yang dag gnas// sku gsung thugs ni rdo rje la/ ya dang dag spros te 'di gsung sa// oM b+hA khe/ de nas 'di gsungs tsam gyis
75b5(rgyud): sangs rgyas thams cad 'dus nas ni/ bdud bcom la sogs mdzad nas ni// byang chub snying ber byin gyis brlabs// de nas ston pa rdo rje 'dzin// dkyil 'khor gyi ni mchog gsungs pa// sems can la ni
75b6(rgyud): bde don phyir// rtog pa kun gyi bde ba che// de nas yang //  sa kyi chen mas chen po'i phyi rol mchog/ rdo rje 'khor lo yang dag bri/ 'khor lo lte bar sangs rgyas nyid/ 'dzum pa'i tshems ni mi
75b7(rgyud): snang gsu ra ta sa ma ya s+t+waM/ oM sid+d+ha mAM zhes brjod dgod// mdun du bdud las rnam par rgyal/ mdzad pa'i sangs rgyas yang dag bri// g.yasu byang chub sems dpa' yi/ nor chen pos ni dbang bskur ba/ 
75b8(rgyud): rgyang du byang chub sems dpa' dang / mnyam du mchos kyi 'khor lo bskor// g.yon du log par rnam dregs pa// sdig pa bsdus pa 'byin pa'o// de nas 'di rnams kyi snying po ni// badz+ra sa twa 'adz+ra ra
76a1(rgyud): / badz+ra d+harma/ badz+ra karma/ da nas phyag rgya rnams te/ sa twa badz+ri khadz+ra tA/ badz+ra da da ma/ khi shwa badz+ri mtshams kyi char ni rdo rje dang / na chen sdong bu ner bu dri'o// mtshams rnams ni lha me ste/ lha kyu la segs/ 
76a2(rgyud): sgo rnamasu// de bzhin snga ma ci lta bar// 'khor la de ni rtag par bya// mchod pa'i thal mo snying kar bcings// g.yon du de bzhin bskor bar bya// me tog dang bcas phyag rgya 'di// sangs rgyas kun gyi dam tshig rim// ma
76a3(rgyud): dog bcas twa snying kar bcing / bsam pa g.yos pas gdung par bya// mgen la mge bos phyag byas la/ bskor ba lan gsum byas nas ni/ zhugs nas me tog deng bar bya// shin tu gsang ba yang dag
76a4(rgyud): dgug/ de la de bzhin gshegs pa thed mnyes par bya ba dang / dbang / du bya ba dang / dgug pa dang / bsgrub par bya ba'i snying po 'di yin te/ oM a kA ro mu khaM sarba d+harma NAM/ a d+ya nu ta banan tA ta/ de nas
76a5(rgyud): cho ga ji bzhin du// ston la me tog sa li ma dang // sangs rgyas byang chub rab grub phyir// 'gro ba'i mgon la de nyid brjod// de yis kun nas sangs rgyas ni/ thams cad 'dus pa nyid du 'gyur// thams cad mi dmigs
76a6(rgyud): sbyor ba yis/ dngos grub thams cad stsol bar mdzad/ dkyil 'khor der zhugs pa la ni// dngos grub thams cad 'grub par 'gyur// dga' ba la sogs mtshan ma mchog/ sna tshogs pa ni 'byung bar 'gyur/ 
76a7(rgyud): de nas de bzhin cho ga ni// rgyas pas slob ma mchog tu zhugs// mchod pa'i thal mos 'khor le che// mchod nas slar ni dbyang bar bya// sgrub pa byas nas dngos grub kyang // cho ga ci bzhin rab bshad bya// rang la
76a8(rgyud): bcom ldan bdud la sogs// rnam par rgyal ba mnyes par bri// sgrub 'di lan gcig tsam gyis ni// de 'dri'i sgrub pas 'grub par 'gyur// sgo gzugs sogs mdun yang dag par// ya shas khu tshur
76b1(rgyud): yongs bzung la// rdo rje'i tshig gi cho ga bzhin// bzlas brjed stong phrag brgya bya'o// mdor na 'bum ni rdzog pa na// ci 'dod dngos grub thams cad dang // tshe mchog 'di la sangs rgyas nyid// thob 'gyur 'di
76b2(rgyud): la the tshom med// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag rgya chen po'i sgrub pa chen po'i rgyud ni/ phyag rgya gang rung gcig bcings nas// bdag ni sangs rgyas yin bsgoms na// phyag rgya chen po'i dngos grub che/ 
76b3(rgyud): brtan par myur du thob par 'gyur// de nas dam tshig sgrub pa'i rgyud no// snying khar rdo rje gzugs bzhag ste/ sa ma ya ste zhes brjod la// bzlas brjod 'bum gyis bsgrub nas ni// dngos grub thams cad thob
76b4(rgyud): bar 'gyur// de nas las kyi phyag rgya thams cad sgrub pa'i rgyud ni// bdud dra las rgyal ba'i mchog bcings te/ chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu ba skor// mtshungs medo sems can don byas la// las kyi
76b5(rgyud): phyag rgya rtag tu 'grub ces bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungaso// de/ bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dngos grub kyi mchog sgra/ ba mchog sgrub pa'i cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyudado// de nas ma
76b6(rgyud): bsgrubs dngos grub mchog/ las rnams rab 'bams dag pa ste/ sdig pa kun sal sna tshogs pa// go rims bzhin du rab bshad bya// 'di lnga ste/ nad thams cad dang / mya ngan dang gnod pa dang / gnod byed
76b7(rgyud): dang dug thams cad dang / sbyar ba'i dug dang / ga shing byed da dang / g.yed byad dang / ro langs dang / sngags dang / sman dang / bgegs dang / log 'dren dang / sdig pa dang / rmi lam ngan pa dang / dus ma
76b8(rgyud): yin par 'chi ba dang rims dang / gdon dang / mang 'gro ma dang / nye bar 'chi ba dang / 'gro ba'i nad dang / nyon mongs pa dang / lus dang / ngag dang / sems kyi sdug bsngal thams cad rnam par bshig
77a1(rgyud): pa la ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sdug bsngal 'dreg par byed pas// tshe dang lang tshe dang / gzugs dang / kha dog dang / gzi byin chen po dang / mdas dang / stobs dang / spro ba dang
77a2(rgyud): brtson 'grus dang / dpal dang / skal pa bzang po dang / bsod nams dang / ming dang / snyan pa dang / grags pa dang / dran pa dang / blo gros dang / brtan pa dang / rtog pa dang / stobs dang / ting 'dzin dang / khung po dang / 'du/ 
77a3(rgyud): bad dang / sku dang / gsung dang / thugs 'bel ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bde ba chen pos// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sbyin pa dang / tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus
77a4(rgyud): dang bsam gtan dang / shes rab dang / ye shes dang / stong/ sa dang / thabs dang / rdo rje dang / sgrub pa dang / gzungs dang / sad/ nga/ spyod pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma
77a5(rgyud): 'dres pa dang / chos dang / las dang / sna tshogs pa'i bya ba dang / son gyi don dang / sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa'i don dang / sku dang / gsung dang thugs grub pa la ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dngos grub thams cad
77a6(rgyud): kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems bskyed pa/ kun tu bzang po'i cho ga spyod pa rdzogs par bya ba dang / sems can thams cad kyi den dang 'be ba dang / skye ba'i sa dang / 
77a7(rgyud): gzho nu'i rol pa ston pa dang / mngon par byung ba dang / dka' ba spyod pa sten pa dang / byang chub kyi snying por gshegs pa dang / bdud thams cad 'dul ba dang / byang chub chen por mngon par byang chub pa dang / chos
77a8(rgyud): kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang / mu stegs thams cad tshar gcod pa dang / 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba dang / lha las babs pa dang / 'dus pa chen po'i byin gyis brlabs pa dang / gdug pa thams
77b1(rgyud): cad 'dul ba dang / 'dul ba la rang tu bzhag pa dang / ngan 'gro thams cad las 'don pa dang / mdo sde thams cad ston par mdzad pa dang / rdeg pa thams cad byin gyis brlabs pa dang / dngos grub thams cad
77b2(rgyud): sbyin pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs las dmigs pa'i rdzu 'phrul dang / cho 'phrul sgrub pa la ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sna tshogs kyi rdo rje so// tsa~M ltar
77b3(rgyud): byag rgya 'di dag gis// byang chub sems la mngon ston pa// de ltar byang chub spod tshegs kyis// byang chub dam pa thob mi 'gyuraro// de na yod bsod nams dam pa yis// las kyi rab 'bam sgrub byed pa/ che ga
77b4(rgyud): ma grub pa rnams grub// sangs rgyas ches ni rab ster bad// rnam pa kun tu dang ldan pa'i// sems can kun la sbyin par bya// dkyil 'khor dag tu ma zhugs pa// skad cig gis ni sbyor bar byed// dpal
77b5(rgyud): mchog dang po rdeg pa'i rgyal po las de bzhin gshig/ sa pa thams cad kyi byang chub rdo rje byin gyis brlabs pa'i rdo rje rdeg pa rgyas pa'o// de nas sna tshogs las chen po khab
77b6(rgyud): bdag rdo rje 'dzin chen po// gdug pa thams cad 'dul ba 'i mchog/ sems can kun la rjes sngon mdzad// de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs bskyed cing // gang phyir nyes byas kyis gdug po'i/ 
77b7(rgyud): rang gi rang sems spyod pa yis// zhi bas sems can kun gyi don// gdul bar rab tu sgrub mi nus// sangs rgyas kun gyis bsgrub pa pa'i// 'gro ba 'di dag thams cad yin// gang tshe bde gshegs
77b8(rgyud): sen don// dam pa mdzad par mi spyod pa/ de tshe nyid kyis dngos po kun// gitse bas rdo rje gsel ba bdag sems can thams 'dul mdzad pa/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba bdag u taM Sh+Tha sa
78a1(rgyud): ma ya kre d+ha ni su m+b+ha dz+wA la badz+ra hUM/ de nas 'di ni gsungs tsam gyis/ phyag na rdo rje rang nyid gtso/ sku gsung shugs kyi rdo rje las// sgrar byung nas ni mdun na gnas khro chen rgyal
78a2(rgyud): be'i sku yis ni/ sems dpa'i skyil dkrungs kyis legs bzhugs// 'bar ba'i phreng 'od kyis gsal ba// srag po'i bskal pa gzhan 'dra ga g.yen pa'i rdo rje snyems pa che// drag tu gser bas
78a3(rgyud): bskyod mdzad cing // 'bar ba'i rdo rje char 'bar ba/ rnam par 'phos pas sreg pa yang // 'bar ba chen des gsod pa ni/ bskal pa'i ma yi phung po 'dra// dang po'i rdo rje khre gnyar bcas// rdo rje mchog
78a4(rgyud): 'dzin pas gsungs pa/ de la rdo rje me dang nyi ma ltar// 'bar ba zhes/ bya'i snying po 'di yin te// hUM de nas 'di ni gsungs tsam gyi/ sa/ sdig pa kun gyi bud shing zad// 'jig rten khams kyi
78a5(rgyud): 'jig rten gsum// thams cad g.yongs zhing 'dul bar 'gyur/ lha chen la sogs lha rnams ni// g.yo ba med cing rmongs par 'gyur // rdo rje 'bar ba 'khrugs pa kun/ de bzhin 'jig pa
78a6(rgyud): lta bur 'gyur// nyan thos dang ni rang rgyal rnams// mya ngan 'das pa banye bar 'gro// lha la sogs pa'i srid gsum kun/ de tshe kun tu rmongs par 'gyur// sangs rgyas thams cad 'dus pa yin// sangs
78a7(rgyud): rgyas byang chub yang bstan mdzad// sems dpa' kun gyi thabs chen po// dam pa yang ni thugasu chud// de nas rdo rje 'bar ba'i mchog/ 'bar ba'i phreng ba 'khrugs pa'i 'od/ rdo rje mche ba gtsigs pa'i zhal
78a8(rgyud): zhal ras khri dang bcas pa yin// g.yon brkyang bas ni legs par bzhugs// spyan 'bar 'jig su rung ba ste// dbu skra gyen du brngas shing g.yo// kun nas 'byil cing 'bar ba cha// rdo rje gsang ba'i/ 
78b1(rgyud): rnal 'byor cha/ mkha'agro'i tshogs kyi yul can rnams// phyung nas kun tu 'gro ba rnams// thams cad du ni 'bar bar 'khrug/ rlung bskyod bskal pa'i malta bur // 'bar ba'i drang ba kun tu 'khrugs/ 
78b2(rgyud): 'jig rten khams ni ma lus na// sangs rgyas thams cad sras bcas pa/ yang dag zhugs pa legs bskul te// 'jig rten thams cad yongasu bskor// bkug nas sems can kun den dang / brtan pa
78b3(rgyud): tha~Md 'grub pa'i phyir// 'jig rten gsum dag de rnams dang / rgyu dang mi rgyu'i sems med byas// de nas rdo rje 'dzin rgyal pos// kun mchog lha yi dbang po ni// de rnams la ni thugs rje yis// 'chi ba slar
78b4(rgyud): gse badzin pa gsungs/ oM u d+hiSh+Tha ma hA d+hi ba ti badz+rAg+haM ud rna ba ye hUM/ rgyu ba dang mi rgyu ba blam cad bslang ba'o/ de nas sa gsum blang ba na/ thams cad du ni shi bags/ 
78b5(rgyud): sangs rgyas dpa' bas btul gyur cing // rdo rje can gyis kyang rjes btul// de nas rdo rje 'dzin khro bas// 'bar ba'i rdo rje gsor byed cing // nga yi dam tshig la gnas zhes// sna tshogs
78b6(rgyud): ba la bka' rab bsgo// de rnams kyis gsol ba/ 'di su zhig lags// bcom ldan sku ni zhi ba la// gnod sbyin gzugs can gang lags gsungs// khyad kyi dam tshig ci 'dra ba// zhus pa bad
78b7(rgyud): bi'i tshig tu gsungs// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// 'di ni sangs rgyas rnam grol ba// gdod skyes rdo rje gnod sbyin che// dkon mchog gsum dang de bzhin du// nga la skyabasu 'ge bar gyis/ 
78b8(rgyud): 'jig rten gsum gyis 'di thos nas// tshogs bdag tshogs kyi dbang phyug bcas// bskal pa'i ma dpung lto bu yi// 'bar ba'i mtshan gyis 'thab par brtsams// de rnams kyis smras pa/ bdag
79a1(rgyud): / cag gis ni sangs rgyas rigs// rdo rje gnod sbyin shes ma yin// bdag cag 'jig rten gsum po gcig/ gnod sbyin skye bas ci zhig pa// de nas rdo rje 'dzim khris nas// khre gnyar bral
79a2(rgyud): bAbasdus te/ gnas de nas khro gnyar thams cad ni// rdo rje 'dzin po'i rdzasu spyod// g.yen pa snyams pa rgya bcas pas// smin ma spyan bsdus pos rked cing // nam po'i khab pa'i dngas kyis ni// rtag tu bcas khres
79a3(rgyud): bcas pas smraso// de la khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba'i nye ba'i stong bro// sems can ma lus rgyal ba la ni 'ang yin te// hi de nas snying po 'di byung bas// nges brgyal bcu cig bcings pa dang / dam tshig ba
79a4(rgyud): ba'adzin du bcug/ rdo rje ming gi dbang bskur nas/ lag na rdo rje 'dzin mchog/ byas/ rdo rje ring ni byin nas/ 'jig rten gsum po ting 'dzin bzhag/ de nas rdo rje chen po mchog/ mgon pa yis ni gsal
79a5(rgyud): btab pa// sa ni kun la rjes ston pas// rtog pa 'di ni bshad du gsel/ rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs po yi/ dkyil 'khor chen po'i pha rol tu/ 'bar ba'i 'khor lo yang dag bri// da yi dbus bzhag pa ba/ sngon pa
79a6(rgyud): 'bar ba gzugs bzang bag/ zhal gyi mchab cung zad gtsigs// zhal ni khro dang bcas pas bzhad// sems dpa'i skyil krungaso kyis legs bzhugs// bsnyems bcas shas char 'bar ba la// 'od zer
79a7(rgyud): 'bar ba 'khrugs pa yi/ rdo rje gsor ba mdzad la brtson// de yi ngos ni thams cad du// rdo rje rnal 'byor ma yi gzugs// rdo rje mtshon cha mdung chen dang / ral gri zhags pa mtshan 'dzin pa/ mtshams
79a8(rgyud): su mda' dang kha T+wAM ga// 'khor lo ba dan sna tshogs 'dzin// rdo rje'i rigs ni sna tshogs pa/ 'byung ba'i 'khor los yongasu bskor// kyor dgod par bya ba ni// thig bdun gyis ni yang dag tu// dang po rdo rje
79b1(rgyud): phyag rgya gdag gnyis pa sngags kyi lha mo ste/ gsum pardo rje rgyal po ni// rdo rje lha mos yang dag bskor// rdo rje chen me skrag me che// ba ni ba glu ma pan ma la sogs// rgyal rigs gsel ka bran rnams kyis/ 
79b2(rgyud): khro bo rnams ni lnga pa las// drug par rdo rje po nya mcheg/ gnod sbyin srin po king kar// dbang phyug dam pa drag po segs// gtum po chen po 'dul bar mdzad// pi yi dkyil 'khor dbabs rnams 'di
79b3(rgyud): na ming po gsum la sogs// lha la sogs pa'i tshegs thams cad/ legs par 'bri 'am bzhag par ba// mtshams lha mo rab bshad pa// de rnams kyi ni sgo dbus 'ong // lcags kyu la sogs de bzhin du// 
79b4(rgyud): kyil 'khor chen po'i tshul gyis ni// go rims dag ni ci bzhin du/ che ga rgyas pa tso bzhin bya// khros pas rdo rje gser ba dang / khro gnyi ra 'dzum dang bcas pas mdud// de nas khro zhing sleb dpon
79b5(rgyud): cha rdo rje can mcheg rab zhugs la// rdo rje hUM mdzad kyis bsdigs mdzug// hUM mdzad rab tu sbyar bar bya// skams dang bcas pas rgya sa gdab nyid// de bzhin khrobs gdul ba la// rdo rje 'cha
79b6(rgyud): chen rgyas pa yis// gdug pa nyid la rab tu dgyes// de nas me tog blangs nas ni// bres pas bdag po che la gter// rdo rje 'bar ba'i lcags kyu ches// yang dag par yang dgug par bya// a ma hA badz+ra dz+wa la yA
79b7(rgyud): na lA rka ya hi dzaHsarba badz+ra ku la pra ba sha ya hrI/ sarba mu d+h+waM gA nAn ban d+ha na traH/ sarba sa ma ye sA d+ha ya phag sarba duSh+TA na ta sa pa tsa b+ha smiM ku ru ma hA kle d+ha a g+ni badz+re Na sU dag a a a/ de nas bcom ldan
79b8(rgyud): khro bas yis// rgyal po bstan pa che byin 'gyur// rdo rje rigs la sogs pa kun/ dngos grub thams cad gsol bar mdzad// de nas hUM mdzod la sogs smras// mtshan ma rnams kyang 'drung bar 'gyur// 
80a1(rgyud): / gal te slob ma la sogs la// snying bar da' pa dra ba skyed// de nas rdo chu mdzad kyis// phyag rgyas slob ma gzhug par bya// bcug nas dang po'i sems dpa' yi/ rang gi snyid po brjed par ga
80a2(rgyud): hUM badz+ra prA ha ra Ni ShaH/ hUM badz+ra shu la yA gr-i ni tra ta/ ma hAs hUM badz+ra ke Sha ts+tshin+da haM/ oM badz+ra a mal pa she ma// rdo rje 'gugs pa dang / rdo rje mdung dang / rdo rje ral gri dang / rdo rje nags pa ste/ rdo rje khro ba'i srung ba'i// 
80a3(rgyud): de nas 'di rnams kyi phyag rgya rdo rje don yid thegs pa med pa shin tu grub pa// stobs dang pha rol gnon pa rnams sems can mngon par rgyas gdab pa nus pa rnams bskul bar bya'o// oM badz+ra gu h+ye sid+d+ha par
80a4(rgyud): ma yo ge shwa gi hUM badz+ra nAN+Da he kha T+wAM ga ma hA badz+rA ka/ b+hU la~M ya ma gu ste/ du lur chu tri hUM badz+ra nA rA ya ni mr-i hU~M/ badz+ra phaT ka dza~M/ rdo rje khro bo'i ma'i 'gro mo lan gcig bzlas te dgod
80a5(rgyud): ba 'am bri dar ba'o// bcom ldan 'das de kho na nyid kyi snying bos gzhugasu gsol na dngos grub thams cad la don yod pa'i dngos grub 'grub par 'gyuraro// de nas dam tshig brjed par bya ste/ san
80a6(rgyud): rnams la dad pir dang / bstan pa thams cad 'grub pa'i phyir// gdug pa 'dul ba bsod nams ni// 'gyur nas rdo rje 'dzin gyis gsungs// de nas bcom ldan 'das hUM mdzad kyis phyag rgya dong bcas
80a7(rgyud): ba'i mdzub me sbyor bar byara'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das gdug pa thams cad dang / 'dud da dang 'jig rten gsum po thams cad yang dag par 'dul ba nyid du byin gyis rlob par mdzad/ de nas dbang bskur
80a8(rgyud): brgyam pa la sogs pa de bzhin du byas la rde khro ba'i las bzhi pa bslab pa bye ste/ phyag rgya rnams kyis sems can rnams rgyas gda' ba dang / khyig myo gcig pa dang / sa pa dang / sa
80b1(rgyud): bar bya'o// gang la phyag rgya sbyar ba ni 'chi bar 'gyur ba de ni gdug pa yin par shes par bya'o// de nas 'che bar byed pa'i phag rgyas 'tshe bar byas la shin tu srung ba rab tu sbyar ba byas na shin tu srung
80b2(rgyud): ba yin pa'i phyir// gdug po rnams slar yang gnod par mi byed// de nas brtsams te slob mo bzang // dkyil 'khor tshe gso ni kun gyis kyang // mtshugs pa dang mo sod pa 'o// che 'di nyid la 'grub pa
80b3(rgyud): 'gyur de nas 'di sgrub bshad bya ste/ ci bzhin sku ni dge 'dun du// rdo rje gser zhing drang bar ni// bzlas brjod steng phrag brgya bya'o// 'bum chang nas ni sems dpa' che// rdo rje sems dpa' dang ma'am mi dag
80b4(rgyud): rdo rje kho ba rgyal po mchog/ rgas dang 'chi ba med par 'gyur// gdug pa rnams ni rdzas 'dul zhing // sangs rgyas kun la rab mchod par// 'jig rten gsum du legs snang zhing cis kyang 'jigs pa med
80b5(rgyud): par 'gyur// de nas de kho na nyid kyi snying po sgrub pa ni// grang ngam yang na 'dug pa 'am/ 'gro ba 'ang nyal bar byed pa na/ ci ltar de ltar 'bus bzlas na// tshe 'di nyid la 'grub par 'gyur/ 
80b6(rgyud): yis 'dod pa'i dbang phyug kun// 'dod pa tsam gyis 'gro 'ang lding // dngos grub kun gyis dbang phyug grub/ rgas dang 'tsho ba med par 'gyur// 'gro ba rnams kyis mchod pa dang // rang gi nye tu rnams kyis brdan
80b7(rgyud): gdug pa thams dang rjes 'dul zhing / gang la 'jigs pa med par 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das khro bo'i rgyal ba chen pos gsungs// de nas phyag rgya'i dam bsgrud pa yin// ci bzhini dus su phyag rtsa
80b8(rgyud): 'ang // bdag 'di 'i bar bsregs nas ni/ srid 'di nyid du khre chen po'i// dengs grub zad 'grub par 'gyur // de nas dam tshig sgrub pa ni/ dag ni thams cad bas byi zhes/ rjed mo phyag na rdo rje yos/ das
81a1(rgyud): tshig phyag rgya bcings nas ni// bzlas na rdo rje 'dzin 'grub 'gyur// de nas las rnams sgrub pa ni/ las rnams dpa pa sgrub pa ni// rnam pa ba nir ni rab byed cing // thams cad pade pa'i phyir
81a2(rgyud): ces na rdo rje las nyid theb par 'gyur// sgrub pa chen po'i cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud// de nas dngos grub sgrub ni/ rdo rje khro mchog rgyal po yi/ las kyi rgyun ni dam pa rnams// go rims bzhin du bshad par bya/ 
81a3(rgyud): 'di lta ste/ zed sreg pa dang / bskrad pa dang / gzhig pa dang / rengs pa dang / gnyid log par bya ba dang / rgyas gdab pa dang / rmongs pa dang / gzhig pa dang / bcing ba dang / gzir ba dang / dral ba dang / rngag pa
81a4(rgyud): dang 'bar ba dang / bskal pa dang / gtse ba dang / bcad pa dang / dbug pa/ dang / phye mar bya ba dang / gtor ba dang / rnam par gzhim pa da/ nga rims dang / dug dang / gdon gyis zin du gzhug pa dang / 
81a5(rgyud): sbyong bar bya ba dang / gsod par bya ba la ni rdo rje hUM mdzad kyiso// thams cad 'dug par bya ba dang / nges par bkod pa dang / bskyod pa dang / gar byed du gzhug pa dang / glu lan du gcug pa dang / ngargyal du gzhug
81a6(rgyud): bo dang tshor gtsug pa dang / ha hau zhes dgod du gzhug pa dang / 'khor ba dang / phreng ba dang / 'od du gzhug pa dang / sgom pa dang / nub par bya bo dang / dbyang ba dang / 'phang ba dang / nye bar ldeg pa bya ba dang / bskur ba dang
81a7(rgyud): nga re 'don par bya ba dang / cu gzhug par bya ba dang / rang nyid bajog par bya ba dang / 'ching bar bya ba dang / skra 'bal bar bya ba dang / zhe 'gras par bya ba dang / gos pa shub dang / khro ba 'bar bar bya ba len khre
81a8(rgyud): ba'i gdan gyi phyog rgyas// rbad dgug 'dong / gzhug pa dang / dbang po dang / pra sen sgrub po dang / bdon pa smra bar brjod pa dang / sgyu ma ston tsong lan ston pa ston pa dang / dus tshigs kyi 'khor le le
81b1(rgyud): bu dbreg pa dang / dus ma yin par shing las me tog 'bras bu smin par byed par sten pa dang / 'bruthams cad yang dag par ston pa dang / rims dang / sbyar ba'i dug dang / gdon dang / dug dang / ma 'a 'grem
81b2(rgyud): las thar pa ra ba dang / g.yul 'gyed pa thams cad las thar bar bya ba dang / gzhan gyi dpung gzhom pa dang / phyogs dang / mtshams dang / dkyil 'khor bcing ba dang / shin tu srung ba dang / yongs skyo
81b3(rgyud): bya ba dang / thar bor ba pa dang / bslangs pa dang / dbang du bya ba la ni khro bo chen po sna tshogs grub paso// lha la segs thams cad ltung bar bya ba dang / klu gden par bya ba dang / gnod sbyin rjesu 'brang bar ba drong / srin
81b4(rgyud): po skrag pa dang / mkha 'gre ma la sogs pa'i gdan thams cad dang / bdud kyi dpung thams cad gzhom pa dang / ma mo rnams gdul ba dang / gdug pa'i tshogs rnam par gter ba dang / gdug
81b5(rgyud): pa rnams tshar gcod pa dang / 'dum pa dang / 'jigs pa med par ya de dag par bskyed pa dang / nor bu bzang po dbang du bya gan rwa sbyin las nor bu thams cad 'breg pa dang / rnam thos
81b6(rgyud): sras mnan nas dpal drang ba dang / lha'i bu mo gnyen ma thams cad dang bcu 'jo bya ba dang / brgya byin mnan nas bde tsigs ma dbrog pa dang / skye ma pad tshar bcad pa dang / tshangs pa ltung bar bya ba dang / khyab
81b7(rgyud): 'jug 'dul ba dang / dbang phyug chen po las rnam par rgyal ba dang / 'dod pa'i dbang phyug mnan nas dga' ba me dbreg pa dang / rdo rje sgrub pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sgrub pa dang / de bzhin gsheg
81b8(rgyud): bzed mnyes par bya ba dang / dgug pa dang / gzhug pa dang / dam tshig gi bcing ba dang / dbang du bya ba dang / sgrub pa la ni rdo rje khre bo chen po rgyal po dam pa'i dngos grub kyis/ nas kyang gsung sa// lan gcig
82a1(rgyud): // bzlas pas mchog grub pa/ thog ma'i rtsa snying bzang lan gcig// de yi 'og tu khre gnyer gyis// sgrub pa thams cad grub pa yin/ dpal mchog dang de'i rtog pa chen po'i rgyal pa las
82a2(rgyud): rdo rje ma dang nyi ma ltar rab tu 'bar ba'i rtog pa'i cho ga rgyas pa'o// de nas ting 'dzin zed ni// rnam dag mchog gi chos nyid las// spyan ras gzigs dbang chen po ni// rdo rje sems dpa'i gtso chen yin/ 
82a3(rgyud): gdug pa thams cad 'dul den du// rang rigs rin po chen bskyed// sangs rgyas kun gyi khro ba che/ thabs med pas ni thabs yin/ 'dod chags la sogs kun bsags pas// ma dag son khams dag
82a4(rgyud): ni de rnams la ni rab sbed par// skyes bu mchog ni rnam par mkhyen// / mchog tu mi 'dul ba nyid kyis// sangs rgyas kyang ni mnga' mi mdzad// 'jig rten kun na mchog/ rang snying bzang ba la
82a5(rgyud): snyoms zhugs// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ting 'dzin gyi rgyal po ches thams cad rang bzhin gyis rnam pard/ ga pa'i chos nyid kyi ye shes kyi rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting
82a6(rgyud): 'dzin te/ grang la gzigs pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad khams gsum pa thams cad kyi dbang phyug thams cad kyi thugasu chud par gyur pa'o// bsnyems pas pad+ma g.yos pa ni// gzung ste
82a7(rgyud): 'dab ma 'byed mdzad pas/ ci nus pa yi ting 'dzin gyi/ rang bzhin gyis ni gzigs par mdzad// ci ltar pad+ma dmang po 'di// chen gyi nyes pas mi gos pa// gnas kyi nyes pa sna tshogs pa'i// khams gsum
82a8(rgyud): pa ni de bzhin dag/ 'di la gzigs pa la sogs pas// rgyal ba rnams ni dbang por 'gyur// de yis rdo rje sems dpa' ni// spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang phyug gyur// de bas sgom pa'i snying po 'di/ dag
82b1(rgyud): par bsgoms pas skem par ni/ rdo rje 'chang ba chen po ni// pad+ma chen po 'chang bar 'gyur// gser spyas ri yi dbang po ste/ rgyal po chen po dang mnyam pa// bsnyems pa g.yon pa'i dang mchog gis
82b2(rgyud): tshul gyi 'dul ba mdzad pa na/ pad+ma'i rigs mchog ston pa'i phyir// rgyal po rnams kyis gsol ba 'jog de nas thams cad 'dul mdzad cing / shin tu dkar ba'i chos 'dzin pa/ rdo rje chos te rang rgyal
82b3(rgyud): ba 'jig rten dbang pos bka' stsal pa khyi ni dkyil 'khor chen po la/ pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad pa bri// de yi dbus spyan 'dzum pa/ 'jig rten dbang drug dgod par bya// gser sbyangs lta bu'i bad+ma na/ 
82b4(rgyud): g.yon bsnams tshul gyis gzigs mdzad pa// rgyal mtshan kun gyis rnam par spras// sangs rgyas skur che ga spyi bor bcug/ sa/ de yi ngos ni thams cad du// sangs rgyas sku'i brgyad
82b5(rgyud): po bri/ rang gi 'dzin pa pad+ma cha'i// tingange 'dzin la rnam par gzigs/ 'jig rten dbang po'i gzugs leg su// sangs rgyas la so/ gas rigs kyi lha// zhi ba sred med bu tshangs po/ 'dod pa'i
82b6(rgyud): gzugs ni pad+ma tsan// spyi bor 'tshar zhing mgrin 'degs pa// rta mgrin lcags kyu bcings nas ni// chos kyi tshigis spyan drang ba// de nas pad+ma'i snying po ni// sarba ta thA ga ta pad+ma dza/ hUM badz+ra pad+ma he pad+ma/ pad+ma She/ 
82b7(rgyud): se pad+ma ni ru dza/ de nas mtshams rnamasu ni/ d+hU bidwe tsAt+ta shwa ra hU~M/ he ma hA bi sha pad+ma tsu Ne sid+d+ha r+m+mA aHhU~M/ bad+ma badz+re/ b+hU ma sau pad+ma a shwa kra ma kra ma hUM dzaHdkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul gyis ni/ cho ga rgyas
82b8(rgyud): bar byas nas ni/ bad+ma chen po me tog bcas/ ma yangs yid kyis phyag bya'o// dkyil 'khor zhugs nas ting 'dzin// las byung gzugs 'di brjod par bya// oM bi sho d+ha ya/ ma nu sa ni shud+d+ha ma hAs
83a1(rgyud): d+ha tu sa ma ya satwa/ rA ga dI bi tsa ye/ tsit+ta me san+da d+ha ma bya badzi Ni tsit+ta me sar+b+ba d+ha me byA dzi ni// gzus kyi phyag rgyags na nas ni// dgyes pas bad+ma 'dzin pa ni/ de nas mdzub mo lcags kyu bcing / 
83a2(rgyud): ngas kyi tshig gi legs spyan drangs/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta a ba lo ka shwa ra pad+ma haswa/ ya hi shrI g+h+raM ma me badz+ra mu ma gri sh+ya sa be sa ma ye ba d+ha bi shi ko mi/ dzaHhUM ba hoHshe d+ha ya sarba sA d+ha ya ba ma ma/ ma hA
83a3(rgyud): d+ha ra ste/ de nas 'jig rten 'dzin par rang nyid byon// 'jig rten kun mchog grub 'gyur ba'i// ting 'dzin cho ga nges par mdzad// de nas de bzhin slob ma rnams// gtsug pa'i cho ga rgyas pa ni// dngos grub zed sbyin
83a4(rgyud): pa yis// ye shes dag ni bslab par bya// ting 'dzin snying po 'di yin// sgrub pa chen po gdod nas 'byung // 'jig rten kun gyi dang nga phyug nyid// go ribs bzhin du bshad par bya// bud med rnams kyi
83a5(rgyud): nang zhugs pa 'am// gdug pa kun gyi nang / chud pa 'am/ gang yang rung bar 'dug nas ni// d+ma chen po yongasu bzung / dus dang stobs ni ci bzhin du// nye rings ci nus bsgrub par bya/ cho ga
83a6(rgyud): 'di yis tshe 'di la/ myur du mcheg ni grub par 'gyur// 'dod chags kun gyis bde myur bar// 'dod pa tsam gyis 'gro 'ong lding // 'jig rten kun gyi dbang phyug rgya la// rga dang 'chi ba med par 'gyur// sangs

83a8(rgyud): chen po nyid thob bo// dam tshig dam tshig mchog gis te// las kyi las mchog rgyaso// sgrub pa chen po'i cho ga'i rgyud// de nas dngos grub ma grub pa'i// ting 'dzin las ni 'dres pa dag/ dang po'i ting 'dzin
83b1(rgyud): grub pa ni// go rims bzhin du rab bshad bya/ 'di lta ste/ sgrib pa thams cad dang / sdig pa thams cad dang / rmi lam ngan pa dang / ltas ngan pa dang / yams dang / 'tshe ba dang / nad 'gro ba dang / nyon mongs pa dang /

84a4(rgyud): dbang phyug gdod nas byung // nyi zla dang ni gze' skar can// nam pa' nyid du 'gyur ba yin// de nas rin chen ting 'dzin ni// nges par rdo rje can du brjod// de nas namakha' rdo rje nyid// ljang sngon buDUR+Ya

84a7(rgyud): kun la dbang bskur nas/ shes pa brjod pa 'di gsung so// oM sarba badz+ra satwa a d+hi ba ti tA a b+hiShi nA mi b+hu d+hU ba sma/  nas bzang pos 'di gsungs shing / legs par shis brjod dbang bskor pos// rdo rje na chen
84a8(rgyud): ched las/ chos kyi gtso bor byung bar gyur/ byung nas 'gro ba thams cad ni/ mi rigs par ni kun dbang bskur// rdo rje kun gyis dbang bskur nas/ slar yang dkyil 'khor tshul gyis bzhugs/ bad gshegs
84b1(rgyud): kun gyi byin rdzas pa// rdo rjerin chen ldan med/ shin tu dang rtsug chen po'i mcheg/ dngos grub gsel ba'i rtag pa gsungs dkyil 'khor chen po'i phyi rol na/ rnam pa'i 'khor lenam pa'i mede gnyi ma zla bska

84b3(rgyud): bsgom/ g.yas pas ner chen rab spel ba/ de yi ngos su sems dpa' mchog/ bzhi po gzugs bcas dam pa yin// dbang bskur ba dang gter nyid dang / ner bu chen po bla med // 'bar ba dpal ni phun sumachog

85a1(rgyud): de sa tu grung ba grur// denas pas rgyag tsu/ seM rtog sa pa satshig gis gtsug zug nas de ma rjeg ting gzhan pa'an gcig spyon du gtsug/ nas byung ba'i

85b1(rgyud): brdeg pa dang / sbyang ba dang / rtad pa dang nye ba dang / btsang ba dang / kun tu 'ged pa dang / nya bar dgos pa dang / brtan par bya ba dang / rdo rngang bya ba dang / 'byor pa thams cad sgrub pa dang / 'byer ba thams cad kyi mchog smram
85b2(rgyud): ba ni rdo rje rin chen dpal gyiso// phun sum tshogs pa thams cad dgug pa dang / gzhug pa dang / bcing ba dang / dbang du bya ba dang / dbrog pa dang / bsag pa dang / len pa dang / 'don pa dang / 'gug pa dang / gdod pa
85b3(rgyud): dang gzhig pa dang / 'phan pa dang / 'deg pa dang / 'bangs pa dang / rdeg pa dang / spyad pa dang / rnyed pa dang / nye ba dang / btsong ba dang / kun tu 'gyed pa dang / nye bar dgos pa dang / brtan par bya ba dang / rdo rjer bya ba dang / 'byer ba
85b4(rgyud): thams cad sgrub pa dang / 'byor pa thams cad kyi mchog sgrub pa la ni rdo rje rin chen phur sum chog pas// mchod pa thams cad dgug pa dang / gzhug pa dang / bcing ba dang / dbang du bya ba dang / breg pa
85b5(rgyud): dang bsag pa dang / len pa dang / 'dren pa dang / 'gugs pa dang / gted pa dang / gzhig pa dang / 'phan pa dang / 'degs pa dang / 'ab bas pa dang / rdeg pa dang / sbyang ba dang / rnyed pa dang / nye ba dang / 
85b6(rgyud): btsong ba dang / kun tu dgod pa dang / nye bar dgod pa dang / brtan par bya ba dang / rdo rje bya ba dang / 'byor pa thams cad sgrub pa dang / 'byor ba thams cad kyi mchog sgrub pa la ni rdo rje rin chen gyi mchod pa sgrubs pase// zhes
85b7(rgyud): kyang gsungs// sems can thams cad dang don du/ rdo rje sems dopa' nang che ba/ rang gi rgyal mchog lan gcig sgrub pa dang / yi ge tra ni sbyar bar bye/ dpal mchog dang po rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po las
85b8(rgyud): bsam pa yong su rdzogs par byed pa rdo rin can gyi rtog pa'i cho ga rgyas pa'o// / de nas rgyal brdo rje 'dzin/ 'jig rten gsum pa kha kyi 'jig rten gsum bdag thams cad la// 'dzig rten
86a1(rgyud): gsum 'cheg 'dul mdzad pa/ cheg bzhin du sbreb 'gyur shing // sangs can don gyi tshogs bzhugs/ 'dod chags la sdang gti mug rnams// rtag tu rnam par gnas pa yin/ mi mnyas
86a2(rgyud): pa yis rter gyur na// dug nyid du ni nye bar 'gre/ 'dud rtsi nyid kyis brter gyur na// bdud rtsi nyid du'ang 'gyur ba yin/ 'dod chags tshangs pa mchog 'byin pa// zhe sdang drag po'i ting 'dzin gyis// gti mug khab 'jug brtan
86a3(rgyud): mdzad nas// 'jig rten gsum de byir gyis brlabs// 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug rnams// rtag tu gnas pas srid gsum gnas// chos kyi rten nas gsum mchog ste// ches min rten pas ngan seng gsum/ 
86a4(rgyud): 'dod chags sdang rtsir byed par bshad// zhe sdang rgyal bar byed par bshad// gti mug don ni sgrub byed ces// kun tu gsang ba'i ming yin// nga ni 'jig rten gcig pu nyid// 'jig rten gsum du/ 
86a5(rgyud): rab tu bshad/ nga ni 'dod pa gcig pu nyid/ tshangs pa drag po ga yung drung yin// de nas gsum po 'di yis mchog/ sbyang / ra rdo rje spyang 'dzin pa// gzugs ni gsum po 'di dag nyid// 
86a6(rgyud): bdag nyid kho na 'byung ba yin// gang phyir 'jig rten 'di dag ni// rtag tu yang ni 'di skad smra// tshangs sogs kyis 'dul yang dag pa'o// sangs rgyas byang chub snod ma yin// de rnams sbyang phyir bcom ldan 'das
86a7(rgyud): rdo rje 'chang chen rang nyid ni// gzugs ni gsum pa 'di mdzad nas// phyis ni sangs rgyas nyid mi 'gyur// de nas tshangs pa la sogs lha// 'jig rten gsum mchog dbang phyug che/ gyi lo 'khor der ni gas
86a8(rgyud): snying po'o// rang gi rang grub phyir rab phul// oM b+hu b+hu baHswaHzur bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa// ske srung bzhis ni rab srung ba// kha khyer gyis ni lags bskor ba// phyi yi dkyil 'khor bri bar bya// de ya nang ma
86b1(rgyud): nyid dang ni// dkyil 'khor gnu yi dbyibs can la// sbrang rtsi byed dang rgyal nyid byed// sgrub pa thams cad sgrub pa ni// go rims dag ni ci bzhin du// legs par bri 'am bzhag par bya// dbus mo gnyis kyis
86b2(rgyud): zhugs la dang // rtse gsum dam tshig gis mtshan pas// zhugs te dam tshig bcings nas ni// yang dag par ni dgug par bya// oM b+hur+b+hu baHswaHswasti na maHswA hA/ nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas pa yis// thams
86b3(rgyud): cad thams cad kyis bskor ba// thams cad grub phyir 'ongs pa la// de snyed pa yi gtor ma sbyin// slob dpon rab tu zhugs pa yi// slob ma thams cad gzhug par bya// de nyid gsang ba brjod nas ni// dam tshigs
86b4(rgyud): mchog ni sbyin par bya// gal da khyod kyis rtse gsum bcag/ snying po snod min la sma sa ma/ ji skad smras pa'i chos rnams ni// gal te 'dir ni mi spyad dam// snying stobs rdul dang mun pa nyid// tshang
86b5(rgyud): pa drag po gi yung drung ste// ming po gsum po 'od nyid ni// nam yang brnyas par ma bya'o// gang zhig 'di rnams sgom pa slob/ yang dang yang du zhugs nas ni// dkyil 'khor mchog
86b6(rgyud): bar byed pa dang // des grub thams cad thob par 'gyur// rang gis phyag rgya bslabs nas ni// de la gar gyi mchod pa dang / 'dod yon dam pa lnga rnams kyis// rtag tu dkyil 'khor mched par bya/ 
86b7(rgyud): 'jig rten gsum byin pa'i rgyu do// / de nas ston pa rdo rje 'dzin// sems can kun rje sten mdzad pa// 'jig rten gsum phyung don grub tu// slar yang sring mo rnams 'byin mdzad// kun tu chags dang
86b8(rgyud): zhe sdang rmongs// brtan par byed pa'i rgyu yin// dga' dang phra dog bud med ni// rab tu grags pa'i grub kun ster// gang zhig 'jig rten kun tu bshad// tshogs kun gyis mchod lha mo rnams// zhi dang
87a1(rgyud): / 'jigs ma de bzhin gsar // grub pa dang na ni bar bshad// phyi rol sems can phan phyir dang / rtogs don khong du chud byi'i phyir// de rnams kyi ni snying po dang // dkyil 'khor de bzhin dam tshig
87a2(rgyud): bshad// siM hUM shri sh+yaH dkyil 'khor chen po bzhi pa ni/ srad bu gsum gyi dkyil 'khor bya/ mtshams kyi thig ni ka ba che// bzhi pi dag gau rim pa bzhin// de yi dbus dkyil 'khor ni// bzhi pa dag gi de bzhin
87a3(rgyud): gya rang gi snying po bzhi pa ni/ rang gi sker ni phyogs pa bzhag/ skal bzang 'ag na rang gi mtshan/ sring mo blab can ni bam/ phag mo lag na gter nyid de// grub mo ni stebs dang bcas// de nas dang po'i dkyil
87a4(rgyud): 'khor du// kun nas de bzhin bzhugs nas ni// sring mo rnams kyis rang gi rgyas// go rims dag ni ci bzhin du// zhugs nas de bzhin che ga bya// spos la sogs pas mchod par bya// de nyid gsang ba rab
87a5(rgyud): sgrub pas// kun nas dgug pa dag tu bya// oM suM b+ha ga/ ra tiSh+Tha ma ya hI b+hu/ rAg+h+ra sa mA tiSh+Tha ma ya hAM b+hu b+hu baH/ ba/ ra hA a mir+ya tA ma ya swA hA/ sid+d+hi ka sid+d+hi sa ma ya hi I mA mI mu
87a6(rgyud): hrIn+ti/ hrId+d+ha shrI b+he/ de nas lus ni thams cad kyis// de bzhin du rno legs bzhugs la/ de nas phyag rgya bcings brtan te// gsang ba mchog 'di brjid par bya// gal te gas nyid ma bsrungs na// gang zhig
87a7(rgyud): sems can don bzhugs dang / gang yang dkyil 'khor sgrub byed pa// de rnams khyed kyis bsad par 'gyur// chos dang ldan la bdud rtsi nyid// chos min pas ni dug pas lhag/ ci snyed pa dang dus
87a8(rgyud): bzhin// yul rnams nye bar bsten pa dang / phyag rgya gar gyi bshad pa yis/ tso bde bar ni rtag tu mchod/ sring mo bzhi'i rgyud// de nas ston pa rdo rje 'dzin// sa yi dbang phyug kun gyi mchog/ 
87b1(rgyud): 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug cha// sgrub pa dag ni rab sgrub nyid/ 'dod chags sogs dug gzhig phyir dang / kun nas bdud rtsi nyid byi'i phyir// zhe sdang las byung kA yi ni// dkyil 'khor dam pa 'byung bar 'gyur
87b2(rgyud): de la snying po 'di yin te/ lu zur bdi pa la sge bani pa srad du thams cad yang dag dri// sgo khyud klu yi gdangs ka mchag// mtshoms kyi rje mchog mjug ma mdud/ de yi dbus klu rgyal ni/ mtha' yas gdangs
87b3(rgyud): ka bcas pa ni/ klu yi rigs na brgyad po dag/ shes rab can gyis kun tu bri/ de nas khres dang zhugs nas ni// klu 'dzin pa yi shugs kyis ni// zhugs nas dkyil 'khor de nyid du// sbrul gyi gdengs klas dgun
87b4(rgyud): b.ru/ oM hI ma nI la dza ba beg br-i thi b+hin da r-i She sha ya hi pu/ sar+b+ba nA ga ku lA nA na~M pu/ sa ma ya br-i be shwa ya phu/ sarbA na sA d+ha ya pu ta ta sar+b+ba nA ga pu tra ka pu/ de ltar byas na legs
87b5(rgyud): bar bzhugs shing dga' bar 'gyuraro// de nas slob dpon rgya sa dug med par bsam par bya'o// de nas brtsams te dug tha mas cad zos pas kyang bdud rtsir 'gyuraro// nor rgyas pa rtse bar byed do// 
87b6(rgyud): dug thams cad sbar ba dang gzhig pa nus par 'gyur// de nas mna'i snyi po sbyin par bya ste/ 'dod chags na sdang gti mug rnams/ 'jig rten na ni 'di gsum dug/ gal te bden pa las 'das nas/ 'di dag
87b7(rgyud): gis ni rtag gsod 'gyur// khyad kyi glog la brnyas mi bya/ sar ba bzlog par mi bya zhing // gal te dngos grub la dga' na/ si nas sbrul ni bsad mi bya/ klu'i dkyil 'khor ro// de nas sten pa rdo rje 'dzin/ 
87b8(rgyud): sdug bsngal thams cad sol ba'i mchog/ sems can kun la bde ba'i byor// gdon gyi dkyil 'khor bsdu ba yin/ 'ad chags zhe sdang gti mug rnams// nyes byas kyi ni dug 'di 'gyur/ 
88a1(rgyud): gdon dang rims dang sdig pa dang // dmyal bar yang ni 'gyur ba yin// de nas gdug pa'i snying po ni/ haM zung bzhi pa la sgo bzhi par// gdon gyi dkyil 'ber kun tu bri// de'i dbus
88a2(rgyud): dang por gdon la sogs// cho ga rgyas pa dgod par ba// de nas bshad pa bzhin zhugs nas// dged cing myur du dkyil 'khor du// rdo rje 'dzin pa zhugs nas ni/ khros pas rkang pa g.yen pas mnya/ de nas
88a3(rgyud): gdon dang rims sdig kun// dmyal ba thams cad rtag tu ni// sdig pa chen de byed pa yang // rdo rjes rab tu 'jig par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsung so// sdug bsdang thams
88a4(rgyud): cad 'don pa'i rgyud// / de nas sten pa rdo rje dadzin// kun mchog dbang phyug dam pa yis// sems can kun den rab sgrub phyir/ dkyil 'khor thams cad gsungs pa
88a5(rgyud): yin/ de la snang ba 'di yin te/ oM AHhU~M hrIHhU~M/ nas 'di na gsungs tsam gyis// kun mchog gang drug dam pa yin// gzugs kun gyis ni kun mchog ni/ dbang phyug da
88a6(rgyud): ba mdzad pa yin// gsang ba chen po lnga yis ni// geng ma 'dul bar ma gyur gad che sna tshogs cher mdzad pa/ 'gro ba 'dul ba'i dam pa yin// dam pa yang dag bshad pa ste// kun mchog sna tshogs
88a7(rgyud): rnam par rgyal// kun mchog dang phyug dam pa yi// dkyil 'khor chen po bris nas ni// de yi dbus cho ga bzhin// rdo rje sems dpa' rab bzhag la// rdo rje lha mo tshogs dkyil 'khor// dmi
88a8(rgyud): nges ni thams cad du// kun mchog bdag po sku rnams// rdo rje mchog bcas mtshan ma ni// rang gi rigs kyis bskor ba bzhag/ rgyal po rdo rje sred med bu'i// gzugs 'dzin 'khor lo rnam
88b1(rgyud): bar bris bab bdag rdo rje can rdo rje// gtum dbang rdo rje mdung bsnams pa// rdo rje pad 'byung pad+ma 'byung // rdo rje 'dzin pa tshangs pa'i gzugs// namakha'i sdong po 'dod pa'i gzugs// rdo
88b2(rgyud): dang bcaso me tog mtshan// dkyil 'khor gyi ni mtshams rnams// rigs kyi lha me bri bar ba// rdo rje dpal mo dkar mo dang // rdo rje sbrel ma mnga' rdo rje// de nas dkyil 'khor gyi bdag po 'di
88b3(rgyud): rnams kyi snying po bshad par bya ste// oM badz+ran rA ya Shad+hin+da pra te ha na badz+ra rbakra Na ho/ b+ha ga bA badz+ra ta thA ga ta/ dzaHhUM ba hU~MHbadz+ra d+ha ra te/ badz+ra ta thA ga ta hU badz+ra kro d+ha ma hA ye gi rI ga N+De shwa ra ma hA badz+ra
88b4(rgyud): ku lo gra pa na ho/ b+ha ga bAM badz+ra tsin+d+re shwa rA ya/ ha hi hahrIHbadz+ra pad+mo b+ha ba ho// b+ha ga bA badz+ra lo ka shwa ra/ ma hA pra ma sid d+ha// oM b+hu b+hu baHswaHsIstaM na maHswA hA/ he badz+ra ku su mA
88b5(rgyud): yu d+ha/ sarba kA ma ma sA d+ha ya hoHb+ha ga bai badz+ra A kA shaM gar+b+ha/ Sha ba Ta Ta traM/ badz+ra Ak+Sha sha gar+b+ha a shaiSha mu dra/ na ma ye nA sA d+ha na/ b+ha ga ba te pradz+nyA pA ra mi tA yu d+hi/ ts+tshir+yA badz+re dzi tsakra
88b6(rgyud): Na te na sa t+ya na pA pa kAn/ oM d+h+waMHshri shra tI smr-i ti bai dza ye swA hA/ badz+ra pa ra mi/ oM badz+ra gai ri ma hA bad+yi tI lo kA bi dza ye shwa ri badz+ra kro d+ha ag+ni sa ya/ badz+ra d+ha ri na mo stu s+t+rai/ tad+ya thA/ oM ho l-i ma~M li/ la li lA
88b7(rgyud): la~M badz+ra mu ka ya~M swA hA/ badz+ra sa ma ya~M/ na ma ye na sA d+ha na b+ha ge be te/ bu d+h+ya bud+d+hi gu ra/ badz+ra d+harmA pra yo ga na/ te nas t+ye nas sid+d+ha me/ oM tA re tu t+tA re tu ra swA hA/ badz+ra d+ha mo tA/ oM kA ma badz+ri NI sid+d+ha sad+d+ha
88b8(rgyud): shwang+yas tu ba ha/ gi gan du po mo gnas tum par ma ka re/ tu blag gan ci shud d+he/ sid+ham b+hi bral pa ri pU ni swA hAM/ byi mo dkyil le khor gnas rnam su// rdo l-i ni be na
89a1(rgyud): // gnas lha dbang dang ni ma me nyid// 'jig rten skyed rnams dgod par ga// tshogs kyi dbang phyug rdo rje yi// rol mo cha bcu rdung byed pa/ khyi'i dkyil 'khor 'a khyer la// ske dang mtsham sa 'ang 'di
89a2(rgyud): drilo sgo rnams kun tu 'jug pa ni// rang gi phyag rgyas rab tu gzhug/ dkyil 'khor dam pa lnga par ni// dang po'i sbyor bas 'jug par bya'o// de nas dbus 'dug nas ni// dang po lcags kyu che ba nyid// 
89a3(rgyud): snying po 'di ni brjod byed cing // 'gugs pa 'di ni brjod par bya// oM ma hA su kha badz+ra satwa sa~Md+hir+m+mA/ sar+b+ba ta thA ga tA na/ sa ma ya A kaR+Sha ya dzaHbadz+ra ku la dI bi da ma ya tA pra be sha ya hU~M/ sar+b+ba
89a4(rgyud): kr-i shwa re pra la sha yos ma sa dun / sa ma las rbA hA so/ ma /  shA ts+yai hU~M \u0f7fhU~M shwad+hI/ de nas gsang chen po mi// snying ba bang po'i med pas/ rdo
89a5(rgyud): chen rgyal po ni// 'khor lo thams cad dang bcas pas// kugatsang rab tu bcug pa dang // bden pas bcings te dang du/ byas// dkyil 'khor rgyal po mchog thams cad/ dngos
89a6(rgyud): grub kun gyi sgrub par 'gyur// de nas go rims ci bzhin du// dkyil 'khor thams cad sgrub pa dang // dngos grub de rnams nyid kyang ni// thams cad kyang ni bsgrub par bya// bde ba thams cad mi
89a7(rgyud): 'gyur gnas// bde ba chen po zhes brjod do// rdo rje 'di ni sgrub la sogs// 'di ni tshe 'dir 'grub par 'gyur// de ltar sna tshogs pa'i don sbyang ba'i don gyis cho ga 'grob dpag tu med pa
89a8(rgyud): 'dul ba mtha' med cing sna tshogs pas mnyam pa med cing phul du byung ba de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa'i rigs thams cad len pa'i bde ba'i mchog byed pa rgyal ba thams cad
89b1(rgyud): kyis sbyin gyis brlangs pa srid pa'i 'de ba'i mchog byed pa gsungs pa min// dpal mchog pa rgyal ba las dog pa thams cad kyi rlung phyim ba na kun gyi mtsham
89b2(rgyud): phyag dam pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga rgyas pa rdzog so// // sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang ba che// dam tshig mchog gi sgrub pa dang // 'ad be nan pa'i gzhal yas khang // dngos
89b3(rgyud): grub kun gyi lus byas pa/ de bzhin gshegs mchog chen po yi// rin chen rgyal ba sogs kyi rgyan// bde ba chen po'i chags pa che/ glu dang rol mo rjes chags pa// 
89b4(rgyud): bla mad dga' ba chen po yi// mchod pa kun gyis rab tu mtsho// da// dpa' ba chen po dpal gyi gnas// rang gi ba zhugs gnas mchog de la// rab tu dga' ba'i rgyal
89b5(rgyud): po mchog// mi 'gyur mchog tu yang dag bzhugs// rdo rje sems dpa' bdag rang nyid// rab tu dga' ba mi 'gyur mchog/ kun tu bzang po 'khor ba dang // byang chub sems dpa
89b6(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs// dngos grub chen po kun gyi mchog/ rdo rje snyems pa'i bdag po'i bdag/ kun mchog chags pa chen po yi// dngos grub dbang phyug rjes grub bo// glu dang rol mo
89b7(rgyud): thog mtha' med// mchog ni bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs// hUM de nas 'di ni gsung tsam gyis// rdo rje thams cad 'dzin pa ni// gsang ba lnga yi de nyid che// phyag rgya'i lha mi byung bar gyur/ 
89b8(rgyud): rtag tu chags dang dngengs grub che// rnam rgyal dang phrug lhag pa'i lce/ phyag rgya dam pa bzhi pa ste/ sems dpas byin gyis brlazlas pa'i sku// de nas de rnams kyi snying po ni 'di yin te/ kun
90a1(rgyud): / mchog so sor rtog pa dang // dngos grub kun gyis bde ba'i mchog/ kun mchog rnam rgya ba mthong ba dang // thams cad dbang phyug marnyed pa ma// dngos grub rnams dang bran ces
90a2(rgyud): dang dga' ba dag dang bdag po rnams// rdo rje lha ma theg mtha' med// rdo rje sems dpa' sku yi mchog// ces bya'o// de nas mchog tu gsang ba'i mi rnams ni dga' ba chen po dpal den yed dga'
90a3(rgyud): pa'i dam tshig 'dod pa'i rdo rje ma dang / dga' ba chen po dpal den yid la chags pa'i dam tshig gi rdo rje ki lo ki li dang dga' ba chen po dpal rdo rje don yid la chags pa'i dam tshig rnam par
90a4(rgyud): rgyal ba'i rdo rje ma dang / dga' ba chen po dpal rdo rje don yod la chags pa'i dram tshig rdo rje 'dod pa'i dbang phyug ma'o// 'di rnams gsang ba'i mtshan dag ni/ mkhas pas gang zhig dad pas brjed/ 
90a5(rgyud): doni phyag rgya thams cad kyi/ nges pa kun pags par 'gyur// zhes bya/ ba bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' mchog tu gsang bas gsung ba yin// de nas 'di sgrub bshad bya ga/ zhes
90a6(rgyud): grung shin tu brtag paste/ sdig pa che las dga' ba dang / sgrub pa gang nig ma grub kyang / rdo rje sems dpas gsungs pa bzhin/ de dag kyang ni myung du 'grub/ nyin re'am ni zla ra 'am// de bzhin le nor ral
90a7(rgyud): ci mngon mngon 'dod bsgrub par bya// ci rnyed pa dang ci bde bas// ras la bcom ldan bri bar bya// kun bdag/ dam tshig dbang phyug ste// gang zhig bris par gyur na ni/ mchog tu rtag pa'i bar ba theb/ band
90a8(rgyud): pa dang bcas zla ba'i 'od/ sna tshogs pad+ma'i 'od 'bar ba/ sangs rgyas kun gyi dbang bskur sogs// sna tshogs rgyan dang ni baba' ldan/ sems dpa'i skyil mo krungs kyis bzhugs/ rdo rje bsnyems pa'i
90b1(rgyud): mchog 'chang ba// g.yen pa dril bu mchog bsnyems pa/ rdo rje sems dpa' rab tu brtag/ de yi legs na bzhugs pa rnams// de yi 'od kyi dkyil 'khor brten rab tu dga' ba bde pa'i sku/ 
90b2(rgyud): gsang ba chen po dgod par bya// dang po pad+ma ltar dkar dmar// gzhan ni ba la sha ltar dkar// gzhan ni ud pa la 'dab ltar sngo// rdo rje snyams ma sar po 'dzin/ dang po dang ni gnyis pa dge
90b3(rgyud): g.yos kyi legs la brten pa ste// gsum pa dang ni bzhi pa dag/ g.yon gyi legasu bzhi pa yin// rdo rje ki li ki la ma// dbus kyi rang lha dgyes par spro// de yi legs la rdo rje che// mda' ni gso
90b4(rgyud): ba la brtson pa// snyems pa'i phyag gis yongs 'khyud pa'i// chu srin rgyal mtshan bsgreng dang bcas// de yi logs na bzhad dang bcas// mchod pas bdag po la lta ba// sangs rgyas
90b5(rgyud): rin chen dbang bskur mtshan// thams cad spyan gyi phyag rgya gzigs// rang la bdag gi thugs btad pa// zur du blta zhing bzhugs pa'o// ras ris 'di ni mthong ba yis// rtag pa'i bsod
90b6(rgyud): nams thob par 'gyur// mchod pa dang ni brtag pa yis// mchog tu dga' ba'i thar pa thob// zhes bya ba bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsung so// de ltar mchog tu dga' ba rab tu 'dod pa ni// 
90b7(rgyud): mchog tu dga' ba dam pa'i dngos grub 'gyur// gsal zhing rgyal ba'i ras ris chen po 'di// thams cad gzigs rnams mchod pa chen po'i dpal 'dis rol/ 'khor lo de ni brtag byas nas/ mam
90b8(rgyud): tu gsa' ba'i dkyil 'khor ni// rnar dben pa'i khang par ram// yang na skyed mos tshal sogasu// de bzhin gshegs mchog chen po yi// ras ris rgyal po sogs kyis rgyan// dril bu dang bcas
91a1(rgyud): / yid dga' ba'i// bla ras phul bas mchog gyur pa'i// rdo rje gru yi mchod tshogs dang // glu dang rol mes rnam 'phrul pa/ me tog spos segs rang skyer ga/ mar me'i sbyor bas yang dag
91a2(rgyud): mchod khang pa gsub rtsegs dkyil 'khor du// mchog gi gsang ba bsgrub par bya// yang na bdag nyid kho na mchog/ rang gi lhag pa'i lhar bsgom bya// de nas 'khor lor ma zhugs kyang / rang nyid kyis ni rtag
91a3(rgyud): shugs nas// rdo rje kun 'chang slob dpon ni// dngos grub kun la grub par 'gyur// rang nyid khrus byas dri zhim bsgos// ci rnyed rgyan dang gis dang ldan/ sna tshogs gos kyis yang dag klubs// brang bcas la
91a4(rgyud): ni dri nim pa/ rdo rje sems dpa'i sbyor ba yis/ me tig ste/ sa dang dri srid 'das/ rdo rje glu ni 'di dag gis// gar byed grong dbyer 'jug par bya/ de la mchog tu gsang ba'i dpa la dam tshig gsum
91a5(rgyud): 'jug la mchog tu gsang ba'i klu'i mchod pa mchog tu grub pa 'di yin te// ngas grub kun gyi bde ba nyams dga' ba 'i// khar ba'i grong du bcom ldan pade chen 'jug mchog tu bde ba dam
91a6(rgyud): pa'i dngos grub kyis// 3\u0f7fthAb hoHrab tu grub par mdzod/ rab tu zhugs te g.yon pa yis// rdo rje mig gis mgon la 'dud// g.yon pa bsnyems pa cung bad bzhad/ bstod cing mdzes pa'i mig gis
91a7(rgyud): btsums pa di la mchog tu gsang dadas pa dpal dam tshig gsum gyi phyag 'tshal ba'i me tog gi sil ma dang ba'i mchog tu gsang rdo rje klu'i mchod pa mchog tu grub pa 'di yin te/ ma
91a8(rgyud): khyab pa'i sems namal pa bldan/ skrag pa'i phyag gis bcom ldan 'das la 'du/ dzaH cin tati /  zhin pa snyim pa'i me rtag panani su gso ga/ de nas ma rtog si la ma dang / rdo rdzams
91b1(rgyud): dpa'i dbang bskur bas// rdo rje dri bu'i phyag rgya dang / ldan pa'i 'od gsal sbyar bar bya// de la mchog tu gsang ba dam pa'i dpal dam tshig gsum gyi rdo rje sems dpa'i dbang ba'i mchog tu gas
91b2(rgyud): ba'i rdo rje'i gli'i mched pa mchog tu grub pa 'di yin te// oM sangs rgyas kun ldan rin chen mchog gis rgyan// lha yi cod pan dang bcas khyod la 'dud// rdo rje 'chang bdag rin chen dbang bskur bas
91b3(rgyud): sems dpa' sa ma ya swA hUM/ de nyid kyis ni rdo rje bzung // chos kyi dril bu dgrel bar bya// dam tshig gis ni phyag rgya cher// byin gyis brlabs nas snying po bzlas// rdo rje la segs theb bzung bas/ 
91b4(rgyud): rdo rje sems dpa' gnyis pa 'dra// rdo rje thams cad da 'dzin rgyal po// rdo rje can gyis byin gyis brlabs// gyur zhes bya ba mchog tu gsang ba dam pa'i dpal dam tshig
91b5(rgyud): gsum gyis bdag la byin gyis brlab pa'i sgrub pa gcig pu'i cho ga mchog tu grub pa bcom ldan 'das rdo rdza sems dpas gsungs// de nas 'dir grub bshad bya ba// 
91b6(rgyud): dngos grub shin tu brtag pa yang / gang gis sgrub pa dam pa dang // sdig chen byed pa rnams kyang ni// rdo rje sems dpas gsungs pa bzhin// ma sgrub rnams kying grub par 'gyur// lugs ma
91b7(rgyud): 'am ni brdungs pa 'am/ 'dus byas pa 'am bris pa 'am// dang po'i sems dpa' bzhugs gsol nas// de yi mdun du cho ga bzhin// rtag tu rdo rje dril 'chang zhing // dngos grub mchog ni
91b8(rgyud): bsgrub par bya// thams cad dgug dang mchod pa che// bdag byin blab sogs sgrub rnams// de la ci ltar mchog tu gsang ba dam pa'i dpal dam tshig gsum gyi dngos grub thams cad
92a1(rgyud): dgug pa'i rgyud ni 'di yin te/ rang lhag lha yi sbyor ba las// thams cad dgug pa'i sbyor ba las/ yan lag mchog gi rol bcas pas// gar bya zhing ni dgug par bya// 
92a2(rgyud): nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchog gi dngos grub mchog tu gsang ba'i dam tshig gi glu'i mchod pa ni 'di yin te// dza mchog dang po'i rdo rje 'chang ba rdo rje sems dpa' bde rtogs
92a3(rgyud): rab tu dga' ba khyod bdag sangs rgyas so ser rtogs// hUM mchog rdo rje las ni mchog tu zad med srid pa mi 'gyur bde dang yid bde dam tshig bdag la de grub mdzod// bam mchog bdag gi sku
92a4(rgyud): 'dzin rnal 'byor zeng rnam rgyal bsgreng ba rab mchog dag baM bde ba 'gyur ba'i pad+ma'i rgyal ba kye/ horab mchog gi ni mchog/ dgi dngas grub dam pa thams cad dbang phyug dam
92a5(rgyud): bdag gyur cig/ rtag par bdag 'bal nam kha'i snying po khyed// hul du/ lu'i sgrub pas dba' par mdzad/ dam tshig chen pos yang du ga dgug pa khyed// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi dam
92a6(rgyud): tshig ste/ rab tu dga' ba mchog dang po// de la mchog tu gsang ba dam pa'i dpal dam tshig gsum gyi dngos grub thaMd kyi mchod pa chen po'i cho ga ji ltar yin/ rang lha'i rnal 'byor ci bzhin du/ 
92a7(rgyud): mchod pa kun mchog sku rnams kyis// rol mo'i rnam 'phrul gyis rjes mchod/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis mchog gi dngos grub kyi mched po chen po'i tshe gis ches
92a8(rgyud): dam tshig gi rdo rje'i glu'i mchod pa ni 'di yin te/ da rje su tshogs pa bde ba dam pa'i thugs/ rdo rje sems dpa' khyod ni rab tu dga' ba yin/ bde ba chen po gsal mthong bdag la brtan
92b1(rgyud): gyur cig/ myur du so sor mkhyen nas rab tu 'dod pa bsgrubs// de la mchog tu gsang ba dam pa'i dpal/ dam tshig gsum gyi dngos grub thas byin gyis brlabs kyis sgrub pa chen po ci ltar yin/ 8
92b2(rgyud): lha'i sbyor ba ci bzhin du// phyag rgya kun gyis byin rlabs pas// de nyid chen po'i mchog gis ni// rang nyid bsgrubs te snying po brla/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchog gi dngos grub 'i
92b3(rgyud): gyis brlabs pa'i gsang ba chen po dam tshig gi rdo rje'i glu'i mcho dra ba mchog tu grub pa ni 'di yin te/ oM namapa' skye ba mtshan sa/ thog ma tha ma med pa'i mchog/ sems dpa' rnga
92b4(rgyud): rje che rang bzhin// rdo rje sems dpa' bdag grub mdzod// kun mtsho ga dngos grub chen po ste// dbang phyug chen po lhag pa'i lha// rdo rje 'dzin pa kun gyi rgyal// mi 'gyur mchog
92b5(rgyud): tu bdag grub mdzod// nyes pa mi mda' rtog pa khyod// 'dod chags kyis ni rjes chags pa// 'dod pa chen po dga' ba che/ bcom ldan de nyid kyis grub mdzod/ shin tu dag pa kun gyi mchos
92b6(rgyud): gdong nas grol ba de bzhin gshegs// kun tu bzang po kun bdag nyid// byang chub sems dpar bdag grub mdzod// dngos grub chen po kun gyi mchog/ dbang phyug chen po phyag rgya'i mchog/ 
92b7(rgyud): grub pa'i rdo rje cher bstod pas// rdo rje bsnyems bdag bdag mdzod cig/ dpal mchog dang po'i bcom ldan khyod// gang gis don dang glu yis bstod// de ni dngos grub kun gyi mchog// dbang phyug
92b8(rgyud): chen po nyid grub 'gyur// zhes bya ba mchog gi de kho na nyid kyis mchog tu gsang ba'i glu chen po mchog tu grub pa bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang gis gsung sa// dngas grub che ga 'di ni// 
93a1(rgyud): rdo rje sems dpa' yang dag rtogs// kun mchog dngos grus chen po yi// dbang phyug nyid ni rab sgrub pa'o// kun nas 'od zer ston sogs dang // se ser ston pa'i rmad byung
93a2(rgyud): rnams// rdo rje'i tshig gis rang lha las// ngo mtshar gyur rnams mabong bar gyur// rtog pa kun gyis sna tshogs cha// dngos grub dbang phyug bde rnams kyis// myur du rang gi byin rlabs pas/ rdo rje slob dpon gyis
93a3(rgyud): zab bo zhes bya ba bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' mchog dang pos gsung so// de la mchog tu gsang ba dam pa'i dpal dam tshig lha thams cad kyis bdag la byin gyis brlab pa'i sgrub pa chen po'i
93a4(rgyud): rgyud ci ltar yin// rang lha rnal 'byor ci bzhin du// lha kun bdag tu nga sku rnams kyis// nga lha rnal 'byor bdag nyid kyis/ lhag lha nyid bsgrub par bya// de nas mchog tu gsang ba
93a5(rgyud): dam pa'i dpal dam tshig gsum gyi kun mchog dngos grub chen po 'i bang phyug chen po'i bdag nyid la sogs pa'i des gru ba thams cad kyi las kyi tshogs mchog tu mi 'gyur
93a6(rgyud): bu dam pa bla na med pa'i dga' ba dang rab tu dga' ba bde ba dam pa dang yid bde ba thams cad kyi dngos grub dam pa'i cho ga rgyas pa rjesu sgrub pa ni 'di yin te// rang lha'i rnal 'byor ci bzhin du/ 
93a7(rgyud): rje kun mchog sku rnams kyis// glu dang rol mo'i cho ga ni// rdo rje nyid kyis rjes chags 'gyur// rang lnga'i sbyor ba ci bzhin du// dbyangs kyi rtsa ba rnams sad pas// glu dang ral mo'i cho ga ni/ dril bu nyid
93a8(rgyud): kyis rje su brjod/ rang lha'i skyer ba ji bzhin du// sna tshogs phyag rgya'i bdag po mchog/ glu dpal mo'i cho ga ni// dam tshig gis ni rjes bsgrub bya/ de yi rtag pathad la/ rdo rje 'bebs pa ra
93b1(rgyud): sad pas// rang gi lha yi dam tshig ni// thams cad bzhi 'gyur 'grub par 'gyur// mchog tu gsang ba dam pa'i dpal// dam tshig gsum gyi glu chen po dang / rol me'i cho ga mchog tu gsang ba
93b2(rgyud): mchog tu grub pa bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsung so// de nas rdo rje gnas ji bzhin// ji snyed pa ni ci bde bas// me tog spos kyis mchod nas ni// khang pa 'am skyes mos tshal sogs// 
93b3(rgyud): bdag nyid ci 'dod rab bsgrubs nas// ci snyed rgyan dang gos dang ldan// sna tshogs gos kyis yang dag klungs// matog phreng bcas kha dri zhim// lugs ma 'am ni brdungs pa 'am// 'dus pa 'am
93b4(rgyud): ni ri mer bri// dang be'i 'khor la de mdun du// cho ga bzhin du bzhugs gsol nas// rang lha'i rnal 'byer ci bzhin du// rdo rje dril bu rab sad pas// thams cad dgug dang mchod pa che// bdag
93b5(rgyud): byin rlab sogs bsgrub par bya// sngon du lan gcig bsgrubs byas nas// de nas rdo rjes ci 'dod po// ci 'dod ci spyod ci smras pa/ thams cad bza' zhing thams cad byed// langs pa 'am ni
93b6(rgyud): 'dug pa 'am// rab tu dged dam smra ba 'am// ci bzhin de bzhin de dang der// ci 'dod par ni ci bzhin bzhag// gsang ba mchog gi 'khor lo ni// me tog segs kyis mchod nas ni// ci bzhin du ni rjes bsna
93b7(rgyud): bya// 'dis ni 'dod pa kun dbang phyug/ 'gro dang 'od dang 'dod ni 'phur// dngos grub kun gyi dbang phyug 'grub// rga shi med pa'i gtso bor 'gyur// rdo rje sems dpa' grub chen po// phyag rgya kun gyis
93b8(rgyud): dbang phyug bdag/ rdo rje kun 'dzin rgyal ba ni// rdo rje mtshon cha thams cad 'dzin// mi thub pa dang mi sod cing // thams cad byed cing kun gyis rten// sems can kun gyi rgyal po che// char gcod rdza su
94a1(rgyud): bzang sa nus// kun mchog rdzasu chags pa che// 'dod pa grub pa bdab mchog/ kun las rnam rgyal grub 'gyur te// kun mchog dbang phyug dam pa yin// dnges grub chen po kun
94a2(rgyud): gyi mchog/ dbang phyug chen po'i ge 'phang nas// rgyal po rdo rje kun 'dzin pa// sangs rgyas thams cad rab 'grub 'gyur// de ltar mchog tu rjes chags dga' ba pad+ma'i ra ba che// mchog tu gas
94a3(rgyud): ba grub pa'i bla na med pa'i dngos grub stsol/ mchog gi rgyal mtshan sgreng bas gang zhig rje su bsten pa ste/ mchag gi dngos grub dbang phyug chen po nyid des nyams mying ga zhes bya ba bcom ldan
94a4(rgyud): 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsung so// dpal mchog dang po las ga/ dasang ba chen po dam pa'i dpal dam tshig gsum dang dnges grub thams cad dgug pa dang mched po chen po dang bdag
94a5(rgyud): la byin gyis brlab pa la sogs pa'i sgrad cho ga rgyas pa'o// // gsang ba mchog gi dgyes pa dang // sangs rgyas kun gyi sa rjes brten pa// rdo rje sems dpa' rang gi gnas// thad
94a6(rgyud): bdag nyid rtag tu bzhugs// thog mtha' med pa'i sems dpa' ni// rdo rje sems dpa' dga' ba che// kun tu bzang po kun bdag nyid// rdo rje snyems tshul bdag po'i bdag/ 'di ni rang byung bcom ldan
94a7(rgyud): 'das// lhag pa'i khyi ni gcig pu nyid// ces bya ba grub par 'gyuraro// de ltar mchog tu rjes chags dga' ba pad+ma che// mchog tu bsngags pa bla na med pa'i dngos grub stsol/ mchog gi rgyal
94a8(rgyud): mtshan sbyang ba gang zhig rdzasu bstan pa ste// mchog gi dngos grub pa bde ba chen po nyid des nyams myong ba/ zhes bya ba bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsung so// dpal mchog dang po las
94b1(rgyud): dga' ba chen po'i dpal rdo rje den yod pa'i dga' ba'i dam tshig rnal 'byor thams cad kyi dbang phyug de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dpal rang gi dam tshig dkyil 'khor mchog tu gsang ba yongs
94b2(rgyud): rdzogaso// / de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig chen po'i slob ma'i tshi ga rgyas pa rjes bzung ba bshad par bya'o// zhes bya ba bcom ldan 'aladas rdo rje sems dpas gsung so// de la dang ba
94b3(rgyud): khe nar re shig de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchog tu gsang ba dam pa'i sngags 'di lan gcig brjed pas sems bskyed du bcug ste/ oM sarba ye ga tsi t+taM ud pA da yA mi/ 'di brjod pa tsam gyis
94b4(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang mi 'bral zhing phyir mi ldog pa da dang / bdud thams cad zil gyis gnon pa'i phyag rgya byang chudab sems dpa' chen po de bzhin gshegs pa nyid du
94b5(rgyud): yang rtogs par bya'o zhes bya ba yang gsung so// byang chub sems ni bla med pa// mchog tu bskyed par byas nas ni// snying khar rdo rdza rab bzhag nas// su ra ta sa ma ya ste ho// snying po
94b6(rgyud): rdo rje ci dang sgrub// 'di yis rdo rje bskul ba na// 'dod pa kun las 'grub par 'gyur// de nyid bskul pos myur du ni// byang chub sems ni rab bla na med pa// kun mchog dngos grub chen po'i phyir// rdo rje
94b7(rgyud): sems dpa' nyid du 'gyur// zhes bya ba'i mchog bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsung so// gar byas spyi bar thal me sbyar// gos kyi gdong ni g.yogs pa rnams// ci 'dod dngos grub
94b8(rgyud): 'dod pa yis// sleb ma thams cad gzhug par bya// ci 'dod dnges grub sems dpa' yis// sleb ma me tog deng du gzhug/ phyag rgya gang la de bcas pa'o// de de'i lha mo bsgrub par bya// de nas
95a1(rgyud): gdong g.yogs dgrol byas la// rnam pa kun gyi yen blang nas// sangs rgyas rin chen dbang bskur gyis// dam tshig gsub ni gsal bar spyod// de la rdo rje chen po mna'i chus
95a2(rgyud): dang skur de 'di ltar brjod par bya'o// 'di ni khyed kyi dmyal ba'i chu// dam tshig 'das na sreg par byed// dam tshig bsrungs na dngos grub ni// rdo rje bdud rtsi'i chu 'dis 'grub// rdo rje dril bu'i phyag rgya ni// 
95a3(rgyud): gal te dkyil 'khor mthong smras// skye bo 'dus pa'i nang na gnas// dad pa med pas pa dang gang smad// zhes bya bas mna' bsgrag go// de la sangs rgyas kyi rin po che'i dbang bskur ba'i cho ga ni 'di yin
95a4(rgyud): te rdo rje chu yis dbang bskur nas de bzhin gshegs pa// thams cad kyi sku'i mchog dbang bskur ba'i gnasu bzhag ste/ oM sarba tra thA ga ta ma hA sa ya a d+hi pa ti s+t+waM a b+hi Shany+tsa si ma hA badz+ra
95a5(rgyud): d+ha ra nas bya ba'i sngags 'dis rdo rje lag tu sbyin par ba'o// 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad nyid// rdo rje 'chang gi rdo rje swa/ rdeH'chang gi brtul zhugs che// khyod kyis kyang ni rtag tu
95a6(rgyud): bcang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byang chub mchog gi sems chen po yesu mi spang bar rtag tu sgrub pa shin tu gsang ba de 'di yin te// oM badz+ra karma bA d+hing+gi shrI badz+ra na ma sid d+ha sa ma ya ste b+hu
95a7(rgyud): b+hu dzaHswaH/ gang la rdo rje'i ming btags pa de la kye'i sgra dang por sbyar bar bya'o// de'i ming de yang ci srid byang chub snying po'i mthar thug pa'i bar gyi de bzhin gshegs pa yi yang ming du 'gyur// 
95a8(rgyud): de la mchog tu gsang ba dam pa'i dpal dam tshi gsum sbyin pa ni 'od yin te/ bag mtha' med pa'i sems dpa' ni// rdo rje sems dpa' dga' ba che// kun tu bzang po kun bdag nyid// rdo rje skams
95b1(rgyud): tshul bdag po'i bdag/ ces bya ba bcom ldan 'das dpal mchog dang po'i skyes bu mchog gi de kho na nyid kyi gsang ba lnga'i de kho na nyid bshad par byas nas rdo rje sbyin par bya'o// 'di bcom ldan 'das
95b2(rgyud): srid pa'i bdag po dam pa kun gyi mchog/ dbang phyug gi dam pa de bzhin gshegs pa de nyid chos kyi mchog gi bka' yang dag par stsol bar mdzad pa ni// srid pa'i rang bzhin gyi ni dag/ rang bzhin
95b3(rgyud): gyis ni srid bral byas// rang bzhin dag pa'i sems dpa' mchog/ srid pa'i mchog ni mdzad pa yin// mchog tu gsang ba'i chos nyid 'bebs pa ni dril bu'o// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
95b4(rgyud): la mched pa bya ba 'am// lha sgrub pa dgrel bar bya'o// de nas chos tham/ sa cad kyi de kho na nyid rab tu sred pa'i bab pa rnams kyis sgra ba pa thams cad rnam par dag par byed pa yin// rdo rje
95b5(rgyud): thams cad 'bebs par byed pa dang / rab tu sgrub par byed pa dang / dbang du byed pa dang / rab tu dang bar byed pa nas bye ba sgrub para'i gyur ro// de nas srid pa dag pa'i thabs kyi mchog rtog
95b6(rgyud): pa thams cad kyi gsang po chen po dam tshig la rtag tu bsten par bya'o zhes bya ba'i// de la 'di ni dang khyod kyi/ sred bde shin tu gyur pa ni/ sdug bsngal chen po dag bya'i phyir/ shin tu bde ba dang
95b7(rgyud): ba'i thabs// dam tshig 'di ni rtag tu bskyed// 'dod pa'i langs spyod thams cad la// ci 'dod par ni rten bzhin du// rab gi lha yi sbyor ba yis// bdag dang gzhan la mchod par bya// de bzhin gshag
95b8(rgyud): pa thams cad kyi bla na med pa'i mchog tu gsang ba'i theg pa chen po'i yang chen po dam tshig gi sbyor ba ni bcom ldan 'das dam tshig ge/ 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyis kyang / 'da'
96a1(rgyud): / bar ni mi mdzad pas// phyag rgya dam tshig ces ni bsgrags// yid kyi sku na brtan phyi ro// zhes bya ba mchog tu gsang ba bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsu so// de la'i
96a2(rgyud): brjod par bya ste/ ci srid 'khor ba'i gnas ni// mkhas mchog 'dug par gyur pa'i tshe// ci srid mtshus med sems can den// mya ngan mi 'da' byed par nus// gsang ba dam pa dam tshig thabs/ 
96a3(rgyud): bsod nams byin gyis brlabs bsgrub pa// rtag tu dngos grub kun dbang phyug/ sems can don ni byed pa yin// dam tshig 'dis ni bdag sgrub cing // ci bde bar ni sgrib byed pa/ nyes pa spyad kyang sdig kun
96a4(rgyud): gyis// rnam pa kun tu gnod mi 'gyur// 'dod pa chen po sgrub par 'gyur// kun bdag dam tshig dbang phyug dang / tham sa cad rdo rje 'dzin rgyal po// kun mchog dbang phyu dam pa'o// las
96a5(rgyud): kyi tshogs kyi das grub kyis// ma lus bsgrubs pas 'grub par 'gyur// bdag gzhan thams cad rgyas btab pa sa// yang na bsgrub bya kun la yang // don yod mchog tu grub pa
96a6(rgyud): 'gyur// rnal 'byor thams cad rjes sgrub byed// dpal ldan sdug bsngal kun 'phrog byed// dam tshig 'di ni 'da' bar dka' ba'o// zhes bya ba mchog tu gsang ba bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sam
96a7(rgyud): dpas gsungaso// rdo rje la sogs thob 'dzin pas// dngos po kun gyi bdag kun// phab pas rdo rje slob ma yis// dkyil 'khor du ni nyamasu myong // de nas thams cad gzengs bstod pas// sangs
96a8(rgyud): rgyas kun gyi bdag nyid dngos// rdo rje'i ming gis dbang bskur bas// de bzhin gshegs ni lung bstan bya// de la de bzhin gshegs pa tha~Md kyi lung bsten pa'i rdo rje sems dpa'i cho ga 'di yin / 
96b1(rgyud): sangs rgyas kun gyi bstan pa che// gzangs bskyod pa yis gang lus bstan// de ni sangs rgyas thams cad nyid/ rdo rje ming gis dbang bskur ba'o// oM 'di ni ngas khyod lung bstan te// rdo rje sems dpar
96b2(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs// srid pa shin tu grub pa'i phyir// srid pa'i ngan 'gre las khyed bton// he badz+ra na maHta thA ga ta sid d+ha sa ma ya s+t+waM b+hu b+hu ba d+ha swaHgang la gzi bstod pa 'di dang / phyag rgya chen
96b3(rgyud): bos lung bstan mchog tu gsang ba'i chags byas pa de la rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / rdo rje 'chang dang bcas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i dkyil
96b4(rgyud): 'khor dang bcas pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rang gi dam tshig gi slob dpon rnams dang / mgrin// gcig tu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub lung
96b5(rgyud): bstan par mdzad// 'di lta ste/ gzangs bstod pa 'di nyid kyi phyag rgya chen po dang / mchog tu gsang ba dam pa'i dngos grub kyi byin gyis brlabs pa 'ad dang / sngags kyi stobs las dang
96b6(rgyud): par bya'o// de nas ci lta ba bzhin du zhugs pa rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'dus pa la sogs pa'i dbugs dbyung ba sbyin par bya'o// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rdorje 'am
96b7(rgyud): dang bcas pa ji snyed pa byang chub sems dpa' dkyil 'khor dang bcas pa gang yin pa de dag thams cad rang gi dam tshig la rjesuM chags pa 'dir dgug pa dang / rab tu zhugs pa dang / dbang du
96b8(rgyud): bya ba dang / sgrub pa dang / rjes sgrub pa rnams kyis rdo rje'i dbyings thams snga bstan par 'gyur ba nyid kyis 'di brtan par 'gyur ba chos kyi dbyings thams cad kun tu khyab pa nyid kyis kun tu zhags pa/ 
97a1(rgyud): na mkha'i khams thams cad kyis rgya che ba nyid kyis 'dir rab tu bzhugs zhing / legs par rab tu bzhugs pa gang yin pa de dang de dag de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
97a2(rgyud): rang gi dam tshig la rag las pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa nyid la lhag par dmigs nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rang gi dam tshig gi slob dben de bzhin gsheg pa thams cad 'di yi na
97a3(rgyud): zhes bya ba byin gyis brlabs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rang gi dam tshig gi sleb dben gyis/ dam tshig gis mgrin gcig tu khang rnams las dbugs dbyung ba mdzad pa yin te/ dang
97a4(rgyud): par byora'o// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchog tu gsang ba'i thugs dbyung ba 'di yin te// gsang ba'i dkyi/ 'khor dam pa ni// mthong ba dang ni zhugs pas kyang // sdig pa kun
97a5(rgyud): las nges grol zhing // khyed rnams 'dir ni legs pa ra gnas// bde chen theg pa 'di las ni// slar 'chi ba ni yo da min te// mi tshugs pa dang mi sad pas// cis kyang mi 'dzegs
97a6(rgyud): rol bar gyis// srid pa'o sdug bsngal ldeg pa ni// srid pa shin tu grub pa'i phyir// ston pa mchog tu gyur pa khyod// srid pa shin tu grub pa yin// dam tshig sdom pa grub pa 'di// khyod kyis rtag
97a7(rgyud): tu bsrung bar bya// sangs rgyas kun gyis 'thun par gsungs// dam pa brtag pa'i bka' yi no// gang zhig bskyed po tsam gyis ni// sangs rgyas nyid du dogs med pa'i// byang chub sems ni btang mi bya// 
97a8(rgyud): phyag rgya rdo rje gang yin pa'o// dam pa'i chos ni mi smad cing // nam yang btang bar mi bya'o// mi shes pa dang rmongs pa yis// de ni smad par mi bya'o// rang gi bdag nyid yongs spangs nas// bka'
97b1(rgyud): thub rnams kyis gdung mi bya// ci bde bar ni bde bar gzung // 'di ni ma khyen rdzogs sangs rgyas// rdo rje dril bu'i phyag rgya rnams// nam yang yongasu spong mi bya// slob dpon smad par mi bya ste// 'di ni sangs rgyas
97b2(rgyud): kun dang 'dra// sangs rgyas kun mtshungs bla ma yi// slob dben la ni gang sbed pa// des ni sangs rgyas kun smod pas// rtag tu sdug bsngal thob 'gyur te// rims dang dug dang sbyar dug dang // mkha' 'gro rnams
97b3(rgyud): kyis gtses pa dang / gdon dang leg 'dren gtum po yis// bsad nas sems can dmyal bar ltung // de bas 'bad pa thams cad kyis/ rdo rje slob dpon blo gros tshe// dge pa rab tu mi snyems pa/ nas
97b4(rgyud): yang sprad par mi bya'o// bla ma la ni gus bcas yon/ rjes 'thun khyod kyi sbyin par bya// des ni rims sogs gan/ da pa rnams// phyir zhing 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// rang go dam tshig
97b5(rgyud): slob dpon ni// sbyin min bu dang chung ma dang // rang sreg gris brtags bstan bya na// lings spyod g.yo ba smos kyi dges// gang gis bskal pa bye ba ni// grangs med par yang rnad
97b6(rgyud): dka' ba'i// sangs rgyas nyid kyang brtson ldan la// tshe 'di nyid la ster bar byed// rtag tu ring gi dam tshig de bzhin gshegs pa mchod// rtag tu bla ma la yang mchod// 'di ni sangs rgyas kun dang 'dra// 
97b7(rgyud): de byin sangs rgyas thams cad la/ rtag tu phyin pa nyid du 'gyur// de byin bsod nams tshogs yin te// tshogs las dngos grub mchog tu 'gyur/ de phyir 'di ni legs gnas pas// deng byed
97b8(rgyud): skyeb 'bras bur bcas// rang byung dam tshig lha dang mnyam// deng khyed gyur pa tha tshom med// sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzin bcas pa// kun gyis dang khyod dbang bskur bas// khams gsum gyi ni rgyal
98a1(rgyud): / be chang rgyal po bdag por bstan pa yin// da na bdud las rnam rgyal te// grong khar mchog tu rab zhugs// khyad rnams kyis ni sangs rgyas nyid// dang 'dir theb pa the tshom med// ces bya
98a2(rgyud): ba de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / rdo rje 'chang dang / byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dang bcas pa'i bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' mchog tu bden pas gsung so// de nas de
98a3(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchog tu gsang ba de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis dpal rang gi dam tshig slob dben dang / slob ma'i tshogs rnams kyis dbugs dbyung ba ni 'di yin te/ phyir mi ldog
98a4(rgyud): ba'i phyag rgya yis// byang chub sems dang lhan cig bskyed// sa/ ngas rgyas nyid ni rtogs bya ste// zhes bya ba'o// de'i rgyu gang yin zhe na/ gang gi phyir khyed rnams kyi bdag nyid thams cad kyi byang chub kyi sems
98a5(rgyud): chen po bskyed pa tsam gyis mthu nyid kyis phyir mi ldog par / gyur pa yino// phyir mi ldog pa nyid kyi phyin nges pa'i phung po la rnam par gnas pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
98a6(rgyud): chub tu nges pa nyid bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par rje su rtogs par bya'o// zhes bya'o// de nas thams cad kyi dpal dam tshig gi slob dpon gyi
98a7(rgyud): mchog tu gsang ba'i dbugs dbyung ba yin te/ rdo rje sems dpa'i bdag sbyor ba// rnal 'byor kun dang rjes sbyor ldan// sangs rgyas nyid du rtogs bya ste/ mkhas pa mchog tu brtag pa'o// zhes bya
98a8(rgyud): de'i rgyu gang yin zhe na// gang gi phyir khyed rnams kyis bdag nyid thams cad 'di de bzhin goshegs pa thams cad kyi rang gi dam tshig yengasu gzung ba gdon mi za ba nyid kyi phyir// de bzhin gshegs
98b1(rgyud): ba bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par sangs rgyas pa nyid du rtogs par bya'o// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dpal rang gi dam tshig rjesu sgrub pa mchog gi dngos grub rnams/ 
98b2(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad nyid du dag rtogs par bya'o// de'i phyir gnas skabs thams cad du yang ci nus pas sdug bsngal dang yid mi bde ba thams cad kyi skabs mi 'bad pa khyed
98b3(rgyud): rnams kyis rang gi bdag nyid thams cad kho na rje su srung zhing bsad par mi bya'o// ci rnyed pa'i longs spyod dang nye bar spyod pa thams cad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchog tu gsang ba bu
98b4(rgyud): na med pa'i theg pa chen po'i dam tshig gi sbyor ba yang dag par mchod la/ bde bar bzung ba dang / yang dag par 'di la bar ba'o// / bdag nyid la ji lta ba bzhin du mngon par brtson
98b5(rgyud): ba de bzhin du gzhan rnams la na tshed bskyed pa yin no// lha ba log pa dang / phyi rol du mu stegs pa dang / nyan thos thamasacad dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sar lhung bas 'di shin tu bsad pa
98b6(rgyud): yin// ngag ni shin tu mi smra bas so// sems ni shin tu 'gags paso// gang gis kyang khyod kyi lus ngag yid gsum gyi rdo rje rnams de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs
98b7(rgyud): kyi rdo rje dpal rang gi dam tshig bla na med pa'i dngos grub mchog tu rtogs par 'gyur zhes bya ba yang gsung so// 'dod pa'i longs spyod thams cad kyis// cis kyang mi 'jig sa rol par gyis// 
98b8(rgyud): dam tshig 'di ni 'da' dka' ste// sdig pa med kyis ma 'jigs shig/ ces bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpal mchog tu 'den pas gsung so// byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor
99a1(rgyud): dang bcas pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa tha~Md kyis thugs la dgongs pa yino// de ltar yid ni rab dang rdo rje nyid du gyis/ rang gi dam tshig ma zad dang ster bsten par gyis/ dang ni 'gro ba myur brje rje
99a2(rgyud): sems dpa' dang / rab tu mnyam zhing rtag pa nyid du rtogs par gyis// de nas ro dang bza' ba spyod pa glu/ rol mo'i mched sogs kyis ni mgon mchod la// rdo rje bla ma chen po bde phul nas// rang dang gzhan dag ci 'dod
99a3(rgyud): mchod par gyis// myos byed mos bral btung ba ni// ci 'dod pas ni bstan pa yis/ glu dang rol mo'i cho ga sogs// ji bzhin rjes 'gro'i bzlas pa bya// rang gsang tshogs blangs pa yi// glu dang me ga
99a4(rgyud): rnams kyi// sna tshogs phyag rgya'i mchod pa dang // rdo rje sems dpa' rol me sogs// bud med sogs dang ldan pa 'am/ derang gi slob mo dang bcas pa// ci 'dod pa yi longs spyod kyis// 
99a5(rgyud): mchod pa byas pas myur du 'grub// ces bya ba mchog tu gas nga ba bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungaso// de la gsang ba'i cho ga'i khad par ni 'di yin te// hUM bcom ldan 'das
99a6(rgyud): mchog dang po'i rdo rje sems dpa' 'o// a de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi'o// hi dpal 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'o// oM pad+ma'i snying po'o'o// ha na mkha'i snying po ste byang chub sems
99a7(rgyud): dpa' chen po'i rgyal ba na mkha' snying po yin zhes bya ba gsung so// rang gsang snying po'i glu dag ni// yi ge lnga pos bya ba ste// rang gsang tsho gas blangs pa 'di// mchog tu gshegs pa kun gyi
99a8(rgyud): yinang de nas mchog tu gsang ba rdo rje glu yi mched pa ni// rdo rje dril bu mnyam sogs bcas// rnam par dben par rol me dkrol// rang gsang tshogs glu blangs pa// gsang ba'i rol ba tu sgrub// 
99b1(rgyud): de nas mchog tu shin tu gsang ba'i rdo rje gar gyi mchod pa ni// 'dzin pa dang bcas bzung che'i// bgyi ba rab tu byas nas kyang // dkyil 'khor 'dra ba'i gar byas nas// yongasu bskor bas rab mchod bya/ 
99b2(rgyud): nas mchog tu gsang ba'i phyag rgya sna tshogs pa'i mchod pa ni// rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs lha'i// rtog pa thams cad rnam 'phrul pa// gtam brgyud phyag mtshan phyag rgya yis// gang zhig gar
99b3(rgyud): rol me yin// gser ya ya na da lu dang ni// de bzhin shing las byas pa yi// rang gi lha yi gdong rnams kyis// grub pa'i phyag rgyas ging rnams bya// dkyil 'khor gong dang gang brten pa/ phyag rgya sna
99b4(rgyud): tshogs mchod pa yis// slob ma'i tshogs ni de dang // badz+ra zhing thams cad mchog tu gzhug/ sna tshogs cho ga 'di yi sa ni// sdig pa kun las rnam grol 'gyur// bsod nams kun
99b5(rgyud): kyang 'phel 'gyur te// rtag tu srung bar 'gyur ba yin/ rim sa dang gdon dang dug dang nad// spyir dug mkha'agro'i che ba dang // bdud dang gsod par byed pa rnams// 'di ni rab tu zhi bar 'gyur
99b6(rgyud): dngos grub dag ni brgya sum tshogs// dga' ba de bzhin bdag po rnams// sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag nyid kyis// rnal 'byor dam pa thob par 'gyur// zhes bya ba shin tu gsang ba'i bcom ldan 'das rdo rje
99b7(rgyud): sems dpas gsung so// de nas phyag rgya sna tshogs pa'i mchod pa'i cho ga rgyas pa// lhag pa'i lha thams cad re re'i mchog gsang 'jug pa'i rdo rje glu'i mchod pa'i cho ga rgyas pa mngon par brjed nas
99b8(rgyud): rdo rje slob dpon gyis byas pa 'am// de las gzhan ci 'dod pa'i glu rol mo rnams kyis rtag pa thams cad kyi sna tshogs pa'i dam tshig chen po'i mchog tu grub pa zhes bya ba ste// dere shig thog ma
100a1(rgyud): / kho nar bcom ldan 'das dpal mchog dang po'i rdo rje sems dpa' mchog tu gsang ba'i dam tshig gi 'jug pa'i glu'i mchod pa ni// thams cad rjesu chags pa bde ba dam
100a2(rgyud): ba'i thugs// rdo rje sems dpa' khyod ni rab dga' dam tshig ste// bde ba chen po brtan zhing mthe ba gsal gyur cig/ so sor rtogs nas mngon du phyogs shing myur du bdag bsgrubs shig/ 
100a3(rgyud): de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thaMd kyis rigs kyi mchog tu gsang ba'i dam tshig gi 'jug pa'i rdo rje grwa'i mchod pa ni// rdo rje sems dpa' bsdus pas ni// rdo rje rin chen bla na med// rdo rje chos
100a4(rgyud): ni grung blangs pas// rdo rje las ni byed par 'gyur// de na sa rdo rje rigs thams cad kyi hU~M gsang ba'i dam tshig gi 'a drug pa'i rdo rje glu'i mchod pa ni// hUM rdo rje mda' gzhu dang
100a5(rgyud): bcas khyed la 'dud/ rdo rje chags pa'i dam tshig dpal khyod 'dud// khaT+wAM 'jig dus rje rje khyod la 'dud// rdo rje dril bu bskyod pa'i dpal khyed 'dud// de nas pad+mo'i rigs tha~Md mchog
100a6(rgyud): tu gsang ba'i dam tshig gi 'jug pa'i rnga gA'i mchod pa ni// la lar skye ba ma rengs pa yi sreg 'brog byed pa shin tu drag po'i sku// la lar 'gro ba mtha' yas 'dul phyir shin tu rna
100a7(rgyud): ba'i 'khor lo 'dzin pa'i sku// la lar pad+maSh+Ti gdan gyi shin tu zhi ba'i sku ste 'gyur pa med pa sde// la lar shin tu 'bar ba'i 'dod pa'i dam tshig pad+ma'i rgyal po bdag bsgrubs shig/ 
100a8(rgyud): de nas nor bu'i rigs thams cad kyi mchog tu gsang ba'i dam tshig gi 'jug pa rdo rje glu'i mchod pa ni// dbang bskur thams cad dbang phyug dam pa las// yang dag bsgrubs shing
100b1(rgyud): mi zad gter gyi mchog/ kun mchog rgyal mtshan rnam rgyal spang ba las// rdo rje rin chen dpal dag lags mched 'gyur// de nas rang ming gsum gyi ni b+hur b+hu baHsaH/ de nas sring mo bzhi rnams kyis
100b2(rgyud): hrI hUM shrI b+he// de nas klu'i rigs thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor gyi ni phu pu// de nas gnod sbyin gyi sded dben chen po lag na rdo rje'i sdig pa thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor gyi rdo rje glu'i mchod pa ni// baN+Da
100b3(rgyud): mag saN+Da la ma~M da badz+ra d+ha ra kra ma bi mar+tha b+hi ka~M dza d+hi ki ra b+ha b+hany+dza lung stod ya na sha ya nyin dge/ bas b+ha lA~M ku kro d+ha s+thA ka ra minIn/ de nas thams cad kyi mchog dang drug dam pa'i dkyil la'
100b4(rgyud): chen po'i mchog tu gsang ba'i dam tshig gi rdo rje gyu rnyed pa ni kha lar dri meng du ba'i kyil 'khor snying gi 'od kyi sgra ni rnams par mdzes la yang 'jig dus nyi ma 'char ka
100b5(rgyud): pa'i 'od zer tshegs ni 'jigs chen 'bar// la lar mdangs dang 'od zer dang ldan 'de zhing zhi ba'i rgyal po'i sku 'dzin pa/ la lang shin tu mdzes pa'i gzugs 'chang mchog gi
100b6(rgyud): mda' dang bcas pa'i gzhu 'dzin pa// la lar gdul bya rnam par sbyang phyir brtson pa'i rdo rje sems khyed mkha' bzhin bzhugs// ma lus 'dul ba mkhas pa'i bde ba dam pa nyid phyir bdag la
100b7(rgyud): 'grub gyur cig/ de nas mchog tu gsang ba'i cho ga dam pa'i gsang ba'i mchog dpal dam tshig gsum gyi mjug pa'i rdo rje glu'i mchog tu grub pa ni 'di yin te dngos grub kun gyi bde ba
100b8(rgyud): nyams dga' ba'i// thar pa'i grong khyer bcom ldan pade chen 'jug// mchog tu bde ba dam pa'i dngos grub kyis// dzaHrU baM heHrab tu grub par mdzad// de nas shin tu mchog tu gsang ba
101a1(rgyud): cho ga mchog tu gsang ba bla na med pa'i dam pa'i dpal dam tshig bla na med pa'i mchog shin tu gsang ba'i rdo rje'i glu'i mchod pa mchog tu shin tu grub pa zhes bya ba mngon par
101a2(rgyud): brjod nas shin tu mchog gi de kho na nyid kyi rdo rje'i mchod pa'i glu dang gar dang tshegs ci lta ba bzhin du rje su bsgrubs nas so sor rje su bsgrub par bya'o// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchog tu
101a3(rgyud): shin tu gsang ba bla na med pa'i rtog pa thams cad kyi sna tshogs pa'i dam tshig chen po'i mchod pa mchog tu grub pa yin// zhes bya bar yang gsung so// sna tshogs che ga 'di yini// rdo rje sems
101a4(rgyud): dpa' bsgrub pa yin// kun mchog sna tshogs chen po yi// rnal 'byor dbang phyug rab tu grub/ ces bya ba shin tu gsang rab bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs// de ltar dpal
