125a2(rgyud): rdo rje khyab 'jug ces bya'o// dengan thams cad gcod par byed// rdo rje 'khor lo'i phyag rgyas nyen mongs pa'i dgra thams cad kyi mgo rnams bcad nas mchog tu byung ba thams cad grub pa'o// 
125a3(rgyud): chung mthe bong dang snrel ba'i// lag gnyis steng dang 'og tu ni// dbus ma gsum gyi rtsa gsum mtshan// rdo rje 'dzin ma zhes sgrub pa'o// rdo rje dam tshig phyag rgya rdo rje gtum pa'i dbang phyug ma
125a4(rgyud): zhes bya ba don yod pa'i dam tshig go// rdo rje pad+ma mnyam ga/ zhag nas// gang der ji bzhin de bzhin du// shin tu thob dka' sangs rgyas kyang // sgrub pa bzlas pas sgrub par byed// 
125a5(rgyud): rdo rje chos nyid ces bya ba'i phyag rgya sgrol ma'o// mdzub mo bsdams pa'i phyi rol dgug// mthe bong rdo rje bka' pa ste// rdo rje chen po'i nor bu ster// zhes pa'i ni rdo rje na
125a6(rgyud): bu zhes bya bar phyag rgya'o// de nas thams cad kyi dbang phyug dam pas bsgrubs pa'i dngos grub thams cad kyi tshogs kyi phyag rgya'i rgyud ni 'di yin te// de la dang por shig dang po'i dngos grub
125a7(rgyud): ngargya rab tu sgrub par byed pa'i phyag rgya rab tu sgrub par byed pa'i phyag rgya chen po stong 'gyur te/ ji lta ba bzhin du dam tshig phyag rgya mtshan rnams kyis lag pa g.yas pa dang / g.yon pa dag
125a8(rgyud): gi rdo rje chen po'i sbyor ba las thams cad kyi dngos grub tu sgrub par byed pa'i stong pa nyid du 'gyur te/ rdo rje bsdams pa'i nang du bcings paso// de ltar na rang gi mtshan gyi khu tshur rdo rje ga
125b1(rgyud): las byung ba'i phyag rgya stong dang po'i las kyi tshogs brgya sgrub par byed pa'i rdo rje las byed pa gsum// de ltar lag pa g.yas pa dang / g.yon pa'i gcig shos kyis las thams cad rab tu sgrub
125b2(rgyud): par byed pa'i las kyi phyag rgya stong bzhi pa'o// de ltar ma lus po'i phyag rgya bcing ba ni lag pa gcig gis phyag rgya thams cad bcing ba rab tu sgrub pa'o// de ltar 'gro ba don kun tu// 'khor dang
125b3(rgyud): dam tshig las dang bcas// kun mchog dbang phyug dam pa ni// rdo rje sems dpas sgrub par mdzad// de ltar gsang ba rgya chen rmad du byung // mchog tu 'gro ba thams cad sbyong byed pa// mchog dang
125b4(rgyud): po yi bla ma bla na med// gsal ba'i rgyud ni nga yis yang da ga bshad// dpal mchog dang po'i rtag pa'i rgyal po las rigs thams cad kyi phyag rgya'i rgyudo// de nas ston pa rdo rje
125b5(rgyud): 'dzin pa gsang ba kun gyi bdag brtan pas// de nyid phyag rgyargyud chen po// mtshon cha dam pa 'di gsung so// de nas bcom lda na 'das rdo rje sems dpa'i rtog pa thams cad kyi gas
125b6(rgyud): ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi rtog pa'i tshogs mchog tu mkhas shing phra ga rgya che la zab pa/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ tshad med pa/ gsal zhing mnyam pa med pa/ bla na med pa'i bla ma mthar thug pa med
125b7(rgyud): ba'i dngos grub kyi gsang ba sgrub pa ma lus shing lus pa med pa'i dngos grub thams cad kyi las rnams sgrub pa po don yod cing thogs pa med pa bshad par bya'o// zhes bya ba bcom ldan
125b8(rgyud): 'das mchog tu gsang bas gsung so// ma mchu so rnams kyi bzung la dga' ba chen pos dang po'i rdo rje'i lto bas lta zhing byed pa dag gis ma lus shing lus pa med pa'i dngos grub thams
126a1(rgyud): / cad kyi las kyi tshogs rnams sgrub par byed pa'o// bde 'a chen po'i gsang ba chen de'i rdo rje rdo rje can zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdang pa chen
126a2(rgyud): nges dged cing brtan pa'i rdo rje lta bu'i byed pa dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi las rnams sgrub par byed pa ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi spyan zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya
126a3(rgyud): khro gnyer dang bcas pa/ khre ba'i rdo rje lta ba dang bcas pa'i byed pa dag dang / sna'i dbugs chen po'i yi ge hUM gis rdo rje thams cad kyi dngos grub ste/ rdo rje nyi ma ltar ma 'bar bar lta ba'i spyan zhes bya ni
126a4(rgyud): phyag rgya'o// de bas cung zad 'dzum pas dngos grus thams cad kyi las kyi ye shes kyi rdo rje lta ba'i byed pa rnams kyis mchu mnyam pa'i ting nge 'dzin rdo rje la sogs pa'i dngos grub bams
126a5(rgyud): cad kyi las kyi ye shes kyi tshogs rnams sgrub par byed pa ste/ pad+ma chen po'i spyan zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o// snyems pa dang bcas pa'i ting 'dzin gyis phra bar 'dzum pa'i lta ba'i byed/ 
126a6(rgyud): pa rnams dang / bzhin 'jam pa dang bdad pas na mkha' la dngos grub thams cad kyi las kyi tshogs sgrub par byed pa ste/ rdo rje chen po ni nor bu'i spyan zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o// den yod thogs med grub
126a7(rgyud): ba dang bden pa'i bdag nyid 'jig pa med// sangs rgyas kun dang bdag nyid kyang / gsang ba'i phyag rgya legs grub stsa la// dkyil 'khor du na ma zhugs kyang // de nas de phyir mchog dang ngo po// bcom
126a8(rgyud): ldan rdo rje sems dpa' mchog/ dang po shin tu mkhas shing phra la bab cing rgya che ba bsam gyis mi khyab ste// mchog gi mchog ni dang po dang // mchog tu gsang ba dam pa ste// 'dzum pa'i
126b1(rgyud): phyag rgya la sogs tshogs// rdo rje sems dpas gsungs pa yin// rdo rje 'chang chen slob dben ni// mchog tu dang dang rab dga' bas// snying po la sogs rnams med kyang // myur du thams cad sgrub par
126b2(rgyud): byed snying po phyag rgya sngags rigs pa// sgrub pa 'di ni rmad byung ste// dngos grub thams cad rab sgrub pas// ma grub rnams kyang 'grub par 'gyur// gang zhig grub par ma gyur dang / bsod nams dun
126b3(rgyud): tshogs mi ldan na// bdag nyid dam ni rdo rje sems// bsgrubs na de ni myur du 'grub// gal te rdo rje sems dpa' mchog/ snying po sogs dang nye snying bas// sgrub pa byas kyang ma grub na// mdzum pa'i phyag
126b4(rgyud): rgyas bsgrub par bya// de phyir gsang ba'i btsum mo 'ad// rdo rje sems dpa' rab dga' byed// rdo rje sems dpa' dga' ba che// dgyes pa de yis myur du 'gru'o// de nyid chen po 'di grub pa// dam po
126b5(rgyud): mchog gi bdag nyid ni// gsang ba mchog tu bsod nams ldan// so so'i skye bo la brjod min// de nyid grub pa'i rjes 'brang ba'i / rdo rje sems dpa'i grub pa gang // gal te dngos grub mchog
126b6(rgyud): 'dod na// de bzhin gzhan la sbyin mi bya// gang gis grub par mi gyur na/ de la de nyid sbyin par bya/ de nyid 'dzum pas myur du ni// bdag byin rlabs pas 'grub par 'gyur// de nyid chen po dag pa 'di// 
126b7(rgyud): rdo rje can gyi mtshon cha mchog/ phyag rgya'i rgyud ni bla med pa// mchog tu gsang ba bshad pa yin// de nyid dang po'i rjes 'brang ba'i// rdo rje slob dpon kun mchog la// gal te dngos grub mchog 'dod
126b8(rgyud): nang gzhan rnams la yang de bzhin sbyin// phyag rgya'i rgyud ni gcig pu 'di// bdag nyid gang la yang gyur na// bdud la sogs pa rnams kyis ni// mi thub pa dang mi sod 'gyur// de la rgyal ba
127a1(rgyud): rdo rje 'dzin// kun mchog dngos grub kun gsol pa// kun gsel kun byed thams cad du// bka' bsgre ba kun grub par gyur// dpal mchog dang po gsang ba'i bla ma dam
127a2(rgyud): pa'i dpal rang gi dam tshig gi bla na med pa'i mchog tu gsang ba'i phyag rgya'i che ga'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal mchog dang be rdo rje sems dpa'i mchog tu mangs shing phra la
127a3(rgyud): zab cing rgya che ba bsam gyis mi khyab la mtha' med cing shin tu mtha' yas pa tshad med cing gzhil du med pa/ bla na med pa/ don yod cing thogs pa med pa'i mchog de kho na nyid kyi snying po
127a4(rgyud): mchog tu gsang ba'i snying po mchog tu gsang ba zhes bya ba thams cad kyi mchog gi dngos grub chen po'i bdag po nyid la sogs pa'i dngos grub thams cad kyi las kyi tshogs
127a5(rgyud): mchog tu mi 'gyur ba'i dam pa bla na med pa'i gas nga ba dang / rab tu dga' ba thams cad dang / bde ba dang yi da bde ba'i dngos grub kyi mchog sgrub par byed pa dang / mchog
127a6(rgyud): gi phyag rgya'i rgyud bshad par bya'o// nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs// tsum pa nas byud pa la sogs pa'i bcom ldan 'das mchog dang rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya thams cad ni dga' ba
127a7(rgyud): chen po dpal rdo rje don yod pa'i dga' ba'i dam tshig rnal 'byor zhes bya ba ta thams cad rnal 'byor nas bya bar gang brjod pa'o// de dag dang gang la nye bar sbyor ba de dang dar bcom ldan 'das ni// kun mchog
127a8(rgyud): dngos grub chen po yi/ dbang phyug chen po lhag pa'i lha// byin rlabs mchog ni rtags mdzad nas// rdo rje sems dpal myur du 'grub// tsum pa na 'khyud pa la sogs pa'i reg bya'i rgya btab pa tsam gyis kyang ma/ 
127b1(rgyud): lus shing lus pa med pa dang / lhag ma med pa thams cad kyi mchog dbang phyug chen po'i bdag nyid la sogs pa'i dngos grub thams cad kyi las kyi tshogs yid kyi 'dod pa grub par byed pa yin no// zhes
127b2(rgyud): bya ba shin tu mchog tu gsang ba'i phyag rgya'o// rnam par 'phrul pa dang bcas pa'i 'dzum zhing g.yo ba'i mig gi zur gyis lta ba'i phyag rgya ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyi dga' ba chen po'i rdo rje don yang ba'i
127b3(rgyud): mda' zhes bya bas rgyas btab pas thams cad rjes chags pa dgug pa dang / dbang du bya ba dang / ngos grub mchog la sogs pa'i des grub thams cad kyi las kyi tshogs yid kyi 'dod pa rnams
127b4(rgyud): sgrub par byed pa'o// 'dzum zhing cung zad phye ba'i mig gi lha ba ni mchog tu dga' ba'i dpal rdo rje spyan zhes bya'i phyag chu thams cad sgrub par byed pa ste 'dis lta zhing btung bar bya'o// 
127b5(rgyud): 'od ni bcom ldan 'das kyis rab tu dga' ba chen po dpal rdo rje don yod dga' ba'i bcud kyis len gyi mchog gi da ngos grub ces bya ba'i phyag rgya ste tshe zad pa thams cad kyang 'dis
127b6(rgyud): rdo rje sems dpa'i na ched gzhon pa dang / nad med pa dang / gzugs dang / stobs/ gzi brjid kyi stobs dang / spro ba dang / dngos grub kyi mchog thams cad dang / dpal dang bskal pa bzang po dang / dga'
127b7(rgyud): ba chen po dang / shin tu bde ba thams cad dang / yid bde ba dang / dngos grub kyi mchog mchog thob pa ste/ ji srid dngos grub kyi mchog thams cad kyi las kyi tshogs mchog tu dam pa grub sta/ 
127b8(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das yum gyi rgyas btab pa tsam gyin cig ma gcig gis grub pa'o// skams pa dang bcas pa'i g.yon pa'i mig dgod cing stod pa ni/ bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen po
128a1(rgyud): dpal don yod pa'i dga' ba'i rgyal mtshan mchog gi dpung rgyan zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya ste/ 'dis rgyas bta pas thams cad las rnam par rgyal bar byed pa dang / phyag byed du bcug
128a2(rgyud): pa dang rab tu sgrub par byed pa dang / ji bzhin ji srid mchog thams cad grub cing dngos grub chen po'i dbang drug nyid rab tu sgrub par byed pa'o// sgeg pa dang bcas po'i lta ba dang / 'dzum pa dang gso
128a3(rgyud): zhing phyag 'tshal ba dang ldan pa ni bcom ldan 'das kyi phyag rgya phyag 'tshal ba'i phyag rgya ste/ dga' ba chen po dpal don yod pa'i dbang phyug ga~M kaM li ki la zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya ste/ 'dis rdo rje sems dpa'
128a4(rgyud): la sogs pa'i brtan pa dang g.yo ba'i dngos grub thams cad la rgya sa btab pas 'dud par gyur nas dngos grub thams cad la sogs pa'i dngos grub thams cad kyi las kyi tshegs kyi mchog
128a5(rgyud): gi dam pa'i das grub kyis 'grub par 'gyuraro// rnam par 'phru ba dang sgeg pa dang bcas pa'i 'dzum pa'i zhal nyid ni bcon/ ldan 'das mchog dang po rdo rje sems dpa'i dga' ba chen
128a6(rgyud): po'i dpal rdo rje don yod dga' ba yis rnam par 'phral pa brtson pa zhes bya ba mchog tu gsang ba'i rdo rje 'dzum pa'i phyag rgya ste/ 'dis bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa thams cad kyi slob dpon mchog
128a7(rgyud): dang po'i glu ni/ kun mchog dngos grub chen po ni// nga drug chen po lhag pa'i lha// rdo rje 'dzin kum rgyal po ste// mi 'gyur mchog ni 'grub pa cu ka rnam 'phrul pa dang bcas pa'i sgeg pa'i 'dzu
128a8(rgyud): ba'i phyag rgya rgyas btab pa tsam gyis thams cad kyis thams cad kyi dades grub chen po'i bdag pa nyid la sogs pa'i dngos grub thams cad las kyi tshogs yid kyi 'dod pa rnams 'grub
128b1(rgyud): par byed de// sarba ku ru ya thA su khaM zhes bya ba brjod de// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba theg pa chen po'i mdo snga'i dbang po'i rgyal po bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa dzad/ 
128b2(rgyud): kyi phyag rgya ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thag pa chen po'i mngon par rtogs pa'i gsang ba'i rdo rje byin gyis brlabs pa zhes bya ba 'di rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'i phyir// chos thams cad
128b3(rgyud): rnam par dag pa la sogs pa ma lus shing lus pa med pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos nyid thob pa'i ye shes dang / mngon par shes pa dang / mchog gi dngos grub la sogs pa'i dngos
128b4(rgyud): grub thams cad kyi las tshegs rnams sgrub par byed pa'o// rnam pa ru 'phrul pa dang bcas pa'i 'dzum zhing smin ma'i khro gnyar rdo rje lta ba'i phyag rgya ni bcom ldan 'das kyi khro bo ki li ki
128b5(rgyud): la zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya ste/ 'dis rgyas btab pas rdo rje sems dang / 'a la sogs dpa'i brtan pa dang g.yo ba'i dngos po thams cad rjesu chags pa dang / dgug pa dang / dbang du bya ba dang / 
128b6(rgyud): 'babs pa dang / gzhug pa dang / gar dang / glu dang / rnam par 'phrul pa ston dang / bdan ngag thams cad dang / grol ba dang / pra dab pa thams cad sgrub pa dang / sgyu ma thams cad dang / rmad du byung ba thams
128b7(rgyud): cad so sor ston pa dang / sna tshogs pa'i gzugs thams cad kyis bya ba sten pa dang / thams cad la rgyas btab pa dang / gnod pa dang / gdul ba dang / bsod pa dang / thams cad phyir 'dren pa dang / 
128b8(rgyud): thams cad sgrub pa dang / mchog gi dngos grub la sogs pa gnom du med pa'i dngos grub thams cad kyi las kyi tshogs rnams sgrub par byed pa'o// thams cad dag pa'i ting 'dzin gyis/ 
129a1(rgyud): thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi gzugs/ sna tshogs pa yi bya ba la/ rab tu 'jug mchod pa byin gyis brtag rdo rje pa dA zhes bya ba'i ni/ bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa spyan ras gcig
129a2(rgyud): kyi dbang phyug gi phyag rgya ste/ thams cad rnam par sbyang ba dang / sang ba dag yongasu sbyong ba dang / rims thams cad dang / dug dang / sbyar ba'i dug dang / gdon dang / nad dang / mkha'agro mi'i phyag rgya nye bar shi
129a3(rgyud): ba dang / shi ba yang dag par gso ba dang / dbang phyug thams cad thob pa dang / gzugs sna tshogs pa'i bya ba thams cad la rab tu 'jug pa la sogs pa'i dngos grub mtha' yas pa de bzhin gshegs pa
129a4(rgyud): thams cad kyi ting 'dzin gyis rab tu byed pa'o// namakha' phra bar ba skyed pa dag gis rol zhing rnal 'byor thams cad kyis rjesu chag sa par bya ste/ 'di la bcom ldan 'das na mkha'i snying po'i rdo rje/ 
129a5(rgyud): byin gyis brlab pa zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya ste/ 'dis rgyas bta ba pas bcom ldan 'das rjesu chags shing dges pa dang nga / brtan par rjes chags nas na mkha' thams cad kyi bdag
129a6(rgyud): nyid kun gyi dngos po nyid kyi phyir bsam pa thams cad yong su rdzogs pa dang / mchog gi dngos grub la sogs pa'i dngos grub thams cad kyi las kyi tshogs yid la 'dod pa rnams sgrub par byed
129a7(rgyud): ba'o zhes bya ba yang gsung so// mchog dang po ni mchog nyid du// gsanga' dam pa gsungs pa yin// mig sogs phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o// rdo rje sems depas gsungs pa yin// rdo rje kun 'dzin
129a8(rgyud): slob dpon gyis// tsum pa na dang / 'khyud sogs kyis// thams cad rnal 'byor rjes grub ste// myur du kun la rgyas gdab bya// snying po phyag rgya sngags rig pa'i// sgrub pa 'di ni rmad byung ste/ grub
129b1(rgyud): ba med pa rnams la yang / dngos grub thams cad dang sgrub byed// gang la dngas grub mang gyur dang / bsod nams phun tshogs meng ba yang // bdag nyid rdo rje sems dpa' ma// rgyas gda' myur du 'grub par 'gyur
129b2(rgyud): gal te rdo rje sems dpa' mchog/ snying po la sogs nyi snying pos// sgrub bya grub par ma gyur na// tsum pa sogs kyis rgyas gdab bya// gang phyir gsang ba'i phyag rgya ni// dngas grub kun gyi bad dam pa/ dza
129b3(rgyud): rje sems dpa'i mched pa mchog/ de yis myur du 'grub par 'gyur// de nyid chen po 'di grub pa// mchog gi 'dag nyid dam pa ste// mchog tu gsang ba bsod nams ldan// so so'i skye bo la brjod min// 
129b4(rgyud): rje slob dpon slob ma mchog/ de nyid dang pi'i rjes 'bring lagal tu dngos grub mchog 'dod na// sbyin te gzhan la sbyin mi bya/ phyag rgya'i rgyud 'di 'ba' zhig gis// dag nyid ga
129b5(rgyud): yod gyur na// bdud la sogs pa thams cad kyis// mi thub pa dang sed mi 'gyur// dri nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin// kun mchog dngos grub kun stsol ba// thams cad mdzad cing
129b6(rgyud): thams cad mkhyen// thams cad sgrub par mdzad pa yin// zhes bya ba bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsung so// dpal mchog dang po las mchog tu gsang ba zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'i
129b7(rgyud): rgyud phyag rgya bcu pa rdzog so// // de nas mchog tu mkhas shing phral zab cing rgya che ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa shin tu mtha' yas pa tshad med cing gzhal du med cing brjod kyis mi
129b8(rgyud): lang zhing rab tu khyab pa mchog grub pa zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'i rgyud bshad pa'o// zhes bya ba bcom ldan 'das mchog tu grub pa'i rdo rjes gsung so// de la phyag rgya bcu ni bdag nyid thams cad
130a1(rgyud): bskyed par byed pa'o// rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya chen po'i bde 'a chen po'i rdo rje don med pa'i dam tshig las byung ba'o// sngon du dang po'i dings grub thams cad mchog la sogs pa'i
130a2(rgyud): dngos grub thams cad kyi las kyi tshogs myur du grub par byed pa ste/ de la 'di ni sku'i phyag rgya ste ba dan gsum pa dang / kha T+wAM ga'i phyag rgya bcings nas g.yon pa dril bu dang bcas shing g.yas pa bslang ba'i
130a3(rgyud): tshul du byed pa ste/ sgeg pa dang bcas pa'i mdzub mo la sogs pa dkrol ba'i gar gyis rdo rje 'ded pa'i dbang phyug ma bskyed pa ste/ thams cad kyi mchog dngos grub chen po dbang phyug chen po'i mchog
130a4(rgyud): gi phyag rgyas dga' ba chen po'i dpal rdo rje don yod pa'i dgyes pa 'i dam tshig dngos grub kyi rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug ma zhe/ sa bya ba ste/ des rdo rje snyems ma yongasu btang bar byas
130a5(rgyud): na dngos grub bzhir 'gyura'o// rdo rje snyems ma de nyid kyis rgyas btang ni thams kyi mchog gi dngas grub chen po'i dbang phyug chen po'i bdag nyid mi 'gyur ba'i mchog go// mda' gser pos
130a6(rgyud): rgyas btab na rdo rje lha mo rnams kyang rjesu chags par byed na bud med gzhan rnams lta smos kyang ci dgos/ rdo rje ki li ki las rgyas btab na lha dang lha ma yin gyi bud med thams cad rol bar byed cing ma
130a7(rgyud): grub na yang thams cad sgrub par nus pa yino// chu srin gyi rgyal mtshan sgreng ba'i phyag rgya 'dis thams cad las rnam par rgyal ba dang gsod pa'o// rdo rje 'dod pa'i dbang phyug mas yongasu dgod cing phreng
130a8(rgyud): ba dang ba'i sngags dang phyag rgyas btab pa tsam gyis 'dod pa thams cad kyi dbang phyug thob pa'o// mchog tu gsang ba'i ras ris kyi phyag rgya ci lta bzhin du brjod par bya'o// bde ba chen po rdo rje don yod/ 
130b1(rgyud): pa'i dam tshig gi mchod pas ra tudaga' ba la sogs pa'i mched pa thams cad thob pa mi bzad par//  rje stod pa phyag rgyas srid pa gsus thams cad bskyed pa dbab tu byed pa'o//  rje
130b2(rgyud): mdzad kyis phyag rgya dang rkang pas lho'i gzugs brtan mnan cing rgyas bta' nas bsdigs mdzad byas te// l-I la sogs pa'i sems can de dang de dong bar mi thogs par rgyas btab pa
130b3(rgyud): bka' bsgo ba thams cad dang las rnams byed par 'gyur ro// stan mthon pa la skyil krungs phyed pas 'dug ste rkang pa g.yon pas rdo rje sems dpa'i gzugs brnyan yang mnan nas rdo rje gsor
130b4(rgyud): zhing rdo rje sems dpa' mnan nas/ dngos grub yid du 'ong ba thams cad dang phun gsum tshogs pa rnams nyam su myong na lha la sogs pa'i sems can rnams lta smos kyang ci dgos/ 
130b5(rgyud): g.yon pa'i rdo rje khu tshung gyis rang gi rtags bzung nas g.ya sa pa rdo rje la sogs pa bstod pa'i tshul gyis la/ dzin cing // yid la 'dod pa'i lha'i bu mo thams cad
130b6(rgyud): la rgyas 'debs shing stobs kyis rol par byed pa 'am/ sgrub par byed pa ste rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya chen po'o// de nas dam tshig gi phyag rgyu ni bde ba chen po rdo rje don yod pa'i dam tshig
130b7(rgyud): las byung ba ni bcu snying khar sen mo 'dud pa'o// ljags kyu bdag pa'i// g.yon pa'i lcags kyu lo zhags pa de gzhug pa'i lcags kyu'i rtse mo btsir ba'o// phan tshun sems drud pa'i stong ka
130b8(rgyud): byas pa'o// lce mnyam par byin pa'o// stang kar rdo rje bston par rab tu bzhag pa'o// rdo rjes byeb pa'o// rtse ba'i phyag rgya yang // 'di rnams kyi dngos grub dang / phun sum tshogs pa dang / bde
131a1(rgyud): 'dang phyag rgya dang / dam tshig dang / dkyil 'khor dang / ches dang / ye shes dang las dang / bde ba chen po thams cad kyi dngos grub rnams don med par theb par 'gyur// 
131a2(rgyud): de nas gsang ba'i dam tshig gi rdo rje bsnams pa las byung ba'i las bcu ni dbus ma'i lcags kyus// kha sbyor gyi nang du rdo rje ser me rnams thams cad ky-i las// mthe bo rdo rje'o// de nyid kyis mthil
131a3(rgyud): gnyisu bud pa'o// mdzub mo rdo rje de da kyi lcags kyu gnyis// bus mi'i rdo rje'o// de nyid kyis sor me'i rtsa me btsad par bya'o// srin lag gi rdo rje'o// de nyid kyis sa mo'i rtseme dag garal mo'o// 
131a4(rgyud): mthe'u chung gi rdo rje'o// de nyid kyis mthe bo gnyis kyi sen mo/ btsir ba'o// 'di rnams kyis btab pas rdo rje sems dang 'a la sogs pa'i dngos po thams cad sgrub pa dang / rjesu
131a5(rgyud): chags pa dang / dbang du byed pa dang / dgug pa dang / rol pa dang / chags pas bcing ba dang / thams cad smrar gzhugapa dang / gar byed du gzhug pa dang / dged du gzhug pa dang / 
131a6(rgyud): gsod pa'o// de nas las kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcang ni rdo rje gar gyi mchod pa lha dang lha ma yin gyi bu mo thams cad dang / bu mo gzhan nu ma thams cad brten par rdzas chags pa ni rdo rje lha
131a7(rgyud): bso/ rab tu dga' ba'i sgrub pa ni ma mchu nang du g.yo bar byed pas myang ba dang btung ba'o// chags pa brtan zhing ltung ba ni dbugs ring por gtor bas// de nas las 'dod pa thams cad kyis
131a8(rgyud): dbang phyug thob ma ni dpung pa gnyis bstod pas// thams cad kyis mchod par 'gyur ba ni snying kar gzhug pas// yod pa thams cad rnyed pa la ni mig dgug paso// 'dod pa'i chags pa bskyed pa
131b1(rgyud): ni dbus dang bcas pa'i sman pa'i gdong gis lta bso// thams cad 'debs pa'i cho ga ni rang gi snying phra bar bskyed pa'i las rnams kyiso// 'dod pa'i chags pa bsad pa ni dbugs btang bas
131b2(rgyud): rang nyid ldang bar byed paso// 'dod pa thams cad kyi rjesu spyod pa la sogs pa'i las thams cad kyi byed pa ni bko' bsgo bso// de ma sa dpa' la sogs pa'i brtan pa dang g.yo ba'i dngos po
131b3(rgyud): thams cad la yang nye bar spyod na don yod grub pas skad cig nyid kyis brtan zhing mi 'gyur ba'i dngos grub kyis rgyas btab na 'grub par 'gyuraro zhes bya ba bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas
131b4(rgyud): gsung so// de nas las kyi phyag rgya bcu ni rdo rje snyams pa'i phyag rgyas thams cad sgrub pa'o// rdo rje pa'o// rdo rje mtshon cha mas thams cad las rnam par rgyal ba dang rjes chags
131b5(rgyud): pa'o// rdo rje ki li ki las rab tu dga' ba'i reg bya dang / dngos grub thams cad bde ba sa grub pa'o// rgyal mtshan sbrang ngas 'thab mo thams cad las rnam par rgya'o// rdo rje 'dod
131b6(rgyud): pa'i dbang phyug mas bdag po chen po nyid do// dus kyis mchod pas mchod par 'gyur ba nyid do// rdo rje gsor bas thams cad 'dul ba'o// rdo rje dor bas thams cad gsod pa dang / thams
131b7(rgyud): cad 'brog pa'o// g.yon pa snyems shing g.yas pa'i khu tshur gyis las rnams kyi sgyu ma dang / rdzu 'phrul thams cad dang / so sor ston pa dang / rmugs pa dang / rengs pa dang / gnyid
131b8(rgyud): log tu gzhug pa dang / bskor ba dang / bskrad pa dang / 'bru dang / ltung ba 'pho ba dang / dbang du byed pa la sogs pa'i las thams cad sgrub par byed pa'o// rdo rje sems dpa' dam tshig gi
132a1(rgyud): phyag rgya bcu ni rdo rje thal me las byung ba'o// rdo rje sku mchog gi dngos grub thams cad de// mdzub me gnyis kyi lcags kyus dngos grub thams cad do// rdo rje gnad sbyin gyis
132a2(rgyud): bdud thams cad la sogs pa'i gdug pa 'dul ba'i de nyid kyis mthe be'i rdo rjes btab pas thams cad rnyed pa'o// de nyid kyi mthe bo gnyis bcug pa'i ter rdo rjes thams cad srung ba'i mthe bo rdo rje nang
132a3(rgyud): du bcug pa de nyid kyis rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i sems can thams cad rjesu chags pa dang / dgug pa dang / dbang du byed pa sgrub pa'o// mthe'u chung rdo rje ser mo gnyis mdzub mo gnyis kyis
132a4(rgyud): legs par bzung bas mthe bo ni dpal dgug pa dbang du byed pa'o// / rje gnod sbyin gyi rgyal mo de nyid kyis ne thams cad dang / dpal dazlog pa'o// de nyid kyi dbus ma gnyis kyis srin
132a5(rgyud): lag gnyis kyi rtse mo yongasu btsir bas bdud la sogs pa'i gdon las grol ba dang / dbang du byas nas las thams cad la sbyor ba'o// rab tu dga' ba'i rdo rjes yul thams cad
132a6(rgyud): kyi mchog sgrub pa'o// de nas gsang ba'i phyag rgya rab tu dga' ba'i rdo rje las byung ba'o// sems dpa' mnan nas rdo rje lha mo rol tu gzhag pa'o// de yang rab tu dga' ba'i rdo rje chen pos rgyas btab pas// 
132a7(rgyud): rdo rje dang bcas pa'i rab tu dga' ba'i rdo rje sa// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chags pa dang bral ba'i 'khor les so// mdzub mo dang / dbus ma dang / srin lag gi 'khor lo snang bar byas la mthe'u chung
132a8(rgyud): mnyams la dral bar bya ste/ rab tu dga' ba'i rdo rje sgrub pa de kho na nyid kyis rgyas bta' cing sgrub par 'gyuraro// bci rabs 'dod pa thams cad rab tu sgrub par byed pa'o// mdzub me lcags kyus 'dod pa thams cad
132b1(rgyud): kyi bde ba dgug pa'o// mdzub me phrag dog la sogs pa'i 'dod pa thams cad kyi sdug bsngal rab tu zhi ba'o// rtag tu bskyed pas rab tu dga' ba 'babs shing de nas sgrub pa'o// skra gnas g.yo bas bud med dang
132b2(rgyud): skyes pa dag gi rab tu dga' ba la 'jig rten las 'das pa'i 'dod pa thams cad kyi bde ba chen po shin tu mtha' yas pa'o// kha sbyor btsir bas ji srid 'tsho'i bar du 'dus pa dang bral ba yang ngo // rtags
132b3(rgyud): kyi san me g.yen pa'i mthil phrad pas shin tu brtan pa'i 'dod pa la chags pa nyid du 'gyur// gzhan gyi 'dod pa la mi lta zhing gzhan la mi 'gro bar shin tu bde ba de yid bde ba sbyar ba'i bud med thams
132b4(rgyud): cad 'grub par 'gyuraro// skye gnas kyis sen mo byud pas skyes bu rnamase// de nas thams cad kyi bdag nyid kyi gsang ba'i phyag rgya bcu ste/ de la lus thams cad kyi phyag rgya ni rdo rje khu tshur gnyis kyis
132b5(rgyud): 'khyud la ma mchus rnams kyis bzung ste// rmongs pas bde ba steng du gzhug sgrub pas rab tu dga' ba'i des grub kyi rdo rje sem/ sa dpa' shin tu 'grub par 'gyur// mchog dang po
132b6(rgyud): dngos grub kyis su ra ta s+t+waM zhes bcom ldan 'das la brjod cing de khaM naM nyid bskul bas grub par 'gyuraro// rab tu dga' ba'i ye shes kyis thams cad sgrub pa'o// lag pa g.yon pa'i gsang ba khu
132b7(rgyud): tshur ni thams cad sgrub pa'o// bde ba chen po rdo rje las byung ba'i rdo rje chen po'i lta bas thams cad grub pa'o// smir ma gyen du btag pas ltung ba spong ba'o// rang gi ma mchu nang du myang bas skal ba bzang po
132b8(rgyud): chen po sgrub pa'o// rang gi lha bskyod pas rang nyid kyis bden pa thams cad dang dra kho na nyid gsal zhing mi slu bar smra ba'o// rang gi lus la 'debs pas gzugs thams cad yongasu bsgyur ba ste/ rdo rje
133a1(rgyud): sems dpa' 'am sangs rgyasu yang 'gyur ba yin// rang gi bdag nyid rdo rje bsgoms pas namakha' la 'gro ba'o// de nas dang po las thams cad kyi phyag rgya bcu ni rdo rje thal mo kha T+wAM gso// des
133a2(rgyud): grub thams cad rdo rje khu tshur dag giso// de bzhin gshegs pa'i khu tshur dag gis dngos grub thams cad// thams cad gsed pa ni khro bo'i khu tshur dag giso// thams cad sbyar ba ni padA'i khu tshur dag gis// ner thams
133a3(rgyud): cad 'drog pa ni nor bu'i khu tshur gyiso// thams cad 'bebs pa ni thams cad 'bebs pa'i khu tshur gyiso// thams cad gar byed du gzhug pa ni kha T+wAM ga gtor ba'i khu tshur dag giso// thams cad smrar gzhug pa
133a4(rgyud): ni mdzub mo mnyam pa'i lce'i khu tshur dag giso// thams cad skyod pa ni brtan pa'i khu tshur dag giso// thams cad gzhug cing don yo dper sgrub pa ni rdo rje lcags kyu'i khu tshur gyis// de nas rdo rje
133a5(rgyud): khu chung gnyis kyis ci 'dod pa'i lag pa'i sor mo'i phyag rgya bcu ste/ den yod cing thogs pa med par skad cig mes myur du grub par byed pa 'di lta ste/ pi wang dang / gling bu dang / rdza rnga dang / 
133a6(rgyud): mu ku t+yA dang / cha lang dang / je med/ us/ rnga ba Ta ha dang / gun+d+ha dang / ti mi li ste/ 'di rnams kyis rgyas btab na thams cad du rje su chags pa dang / dbang du byed pa dang / 'bebs pa dang rims dang / dug dang / sbyar du/ 
133a7(rgyud): dang gdon las grol ba dang / gsod pa dang / 'thab mo las rnam par rgyal ba dang / phun sum tshogs pa thams cad thob pa yin zhes bya ba gsung so// 'dod chags chen po rnam dag phyir// rdo rje sems dpa'
133a8(rgyud): chen po yin// phyag rgya'i rtag pa rab tu brtags// rdo rje slob dpon slob ma mchog/ de nyid dad pa'i rdzas 'brang la/ rtogs pa tsam gyis skad cig gis// don yod kun grub bde bar gsol zhes bya'o// dpal mcho
133b1(rgyud): dmas pa rjes tu grub pa zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'i chung rtogaso// de nas mchog tum pas shing mtha' las las pa tshad mang tsong gsal du med pa ma lus shing lus pa med pa'i mchog gi dngos grub chen
133b2(rgyud): ngo'i bdag nyid la sogs pa'i dngos grub thams cad kyis las kyi tshogs mchog tu dam pa grub pa zhes bya ba rdo rje gar las byung ba'i tshogs thams cad kyi phyag rgya stong bshad par bya'o// zhes bya ba bcom ldan
133b3(rgyud): 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs// phyag rgya chen po mnyam gzhag nas skrag bcas mdzub sogs bkrol ba yis// las kyi phyag rgya chen po rgya// thams cad gar gyis bsgrub par bya// bde ba chen po rdo rje gardza
133b4(rgyud): ba'i lcags kyus khyad par du las kyi bcing ba ste rgya phrag dang / bo mchog tu bsgrubs te rdo rje dam tshig lha mo rnams kyi phyag rgya'o// rdo rje bsdams pa bcings nas ni// kha sbyor nang du gsal ba ste// mcheg
133b5(rgyud): bo yi gsang chen gyis// las kyi phyag rgya brgya bzhin yin zhes bya ba rdo rje lha mo gsang ba thams cad kyi phyag rgya'o// rdo rje gar gyi mchod pa che'i// thal mos spyi bor bzung nas ni// las kyi phyag rgya grub pa
133b6(rgyud): na dbang po rnams dang sbyar bar bya// zhes bya ba rdo rje thams cad kyi mchod pa chen po'i lha mo rnams kyi phyag rgya'o// rdo rje skams mas gang bya zhing // skrag bcas mthe chung sogs bkrol bas// de nyid bcings
133b7(rgyud): nas gar bya zhing // phyi ma 'di ni 'byung ba yin// zhes bya ba rdo rje thams cad kyi las don yod pa'i dam tshig grub pa'i dbang phyug chen po'i mchog gi phyag rgya brgya'o// rdo rje thal mo mnyam gzhag nas// thams cad
133b8(rgyud): kyis ni bsgrub par bya// mchog dang po yi las chen po'i// phyag rgya mchog ni gzhan yino// zhes bya ba rgyal mo thams cad kyi phyag rgya/ mda' lnga bsdus pa bcings nas ni// las kyi phyag rgya bde brgya rab tu
134a1(rgyud): dga' chog ma dkrol bar/ 'ad ba nyid du mngon pa sbyar// zhes bya ba rje rna thams cad kyi mche ga tugs ba'i 'dod pa ma'i phyag rgya'o// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje yis// ji bzhin byu
134a2(rgyud): rgya mchog sbyor bas// las kyi phyag rgya sna tshogs brgya// mchog dang po ni rab tu brtag/ ces bya ba rdo rje thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje lha mo'i phyag rgya'o// rdo rje lha mo'i kha T+wAM ga/ lus kun gyi na gar bya
134a3(rgyud): zhing rdo rje gar mchog glu blang zhing // dang pe'i phyag rgya chen po zhing bya ba'o// ji ltar gong du brgya gsung nga// rol mo mchog gi rgya'i tshogs// rel mo srung zhing glu len pa// phyag rgya kun gyi gsel ba brgya// zhes bya ba rdo rje
134a4(rgyud): thams cad kyi lha'i bu mo'i tshigs kyis phyag pa ste phyag rgya stong mchog tu grub pa'o// de la sogs pa mtha' yas mchog/ chos dbyings ma nyam dang mi mnyam pa/ na mkha'i mtha' ltar grangs med pa'i// phyag rgya
134a5(rgyud): rgyal mo grub mchog sngar// kun mchog dengs grub chen pa yi// dang phyug chen po'i mchog grub phyir// rnam pa'i kun gyi ga skabs kyis/ dkyil 'bor 'dir ni rab tu zhugs// dam pa mchog
134a6(rgyud): tu grub par byed// mchog gi dam pargyud chen po// dam pa mchog gi dngos grub ster// rdo rje slob dpon slob ma mchog/ de nyid dad pa'i rjes 'brangs la// phyag rgya kun gyi tshul 'di ni// bstan par ba ste gzhan ma min// de ltar
134a7(rgyud): mchog tu mo 'gyur dam pa'i dngos grub bad ba yi// mchog tu rnam dag rdo rje bde grub mtha' yas 'bras bur ldan/ dpal mchog dang po'i gsal ba'i de nyid mchog gi sku'i tshulo// mchog tu rtag pa'i tshul
134a8(rgyud): 'di yong su mthar thug pa'o// dpal mchog dang po las dam pa mchog tu grub pa zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'i rgyud rdzog so// / de nas sems dpa' chen po kun// rdo rje 'dzin dang bcas pa'i mchog rdo
134b1(rgyud): 'chang chen gtse ba ni// mgon la bde gshegs rnams kyis gsal// kun mchog rnam pa' chen po yi/ dngos grub dbang phyug rab grub phyir// rtog pa thams cad kun bsdus pa'i// de nyid sems dpa' chen pos
134b2(rgyud): gsungs// rnam rtog med pa'i chos rnams la// rtog pa'i don 'di gang brjod pa// gang gis rgyud 'di phyi ma la// dang de'i gnas mchog ji ltar lags// de bzhin rdo rje sems dpa' nyid// rab dga' nyid dang bzang ba nyid/ 
134b3(rgyud): rdo rje snyems bdag ji ltar lags// sems dang sems dpa'i ting 'dzin dang / de bzhin rdo rje rdo rje 'dzin// rdo rje 'chang chen nyid dang ni// byang chub spyod pa ji ltar lags// dud dang bdud las rgyal ba nyid// byang chub
134b4(rgyud): sangs rgyas ji ltar lags// rdo rje gtum mo thar byed nyid// phyag na rdo ji ltar lags// ji ltar dang po'i rigs byung dang // 'dod pa thar ba ji ltar lags// ji ltar mgrin pa rnam gsum dang // khyed
134b5(rgyud): ni ji ltar thams cad nyid// dang po'i snying po ji ltar lags// de kyi ste snying ji ltar lags// de chen rdo rje chen po y-i// don yod dam tshig ji ltar lags// kyil 'khor zhes bya ji skad gsungs// de ma
134b6(rgyud): rnam smin ji lta bu// thig gdab pa dang brtag pa yis// denges grub ji ltar gsungs pa lags// gsang ba lnga yi de bde ba// ji ltar gyur pa ji lta bu// dkyil 'khor bdag po rnams dang ni// rigs rnams gsal
134b7(rgyud): ba ji ltar lags// thams cad dbang bskur de nyid dang // phyag mtshan tshogs kyi de 'di dang // thams cad dgug gzhug mched pa che// bdag byin rlabs sogs sgrub pa che// da ni da nyid gsang ba dang // den yod pa ni
134b8(rgyud): mchog nyid de// mi 'gyur dam pa grub pa'i phyir// thams cad bdag cag rnams la gsungs// zhes bya ba bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cod kyis mchog gi mdo gsung so// de nas ston pa
135a1(rgyud): rdo rje 'dzin// rtog pa kun gyi bdag po ni// the tshom tshogs rnams gsan na su// 'di yi lan ni gsus pa yi ni// de la rtog pa'i don gyi rgyud ji ltar yin na na/ rnam rtag med pa'i chos rnams
135a2(rgyud): lasaHsems can don ni yongs brtags pas// des na rtogs par gsungs pa ste// rtog pa yongasu dag phyir de nas rgyud phyi ma ji ltar yin zhe na// rgyud ni rgyun zhes bya bar bshad// phyi ma sngar dang yang dag byung // 
135a3(rgyud): de nyid gsang ba'i gsang ba dang / phyi ma dang bcas rgyud du 'dod// de la dang po gnas zhes bya ba'i rgyud ji ltar yin zhe na/ namamakha' kun la rab tu gnas// rdo rje kun mchog rang bzhin mchog/ bde ba chen po dga'
135a4(rgyud): pa che grong khyer dang ni mi 'gyur mchog/ ces bya ba bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' rtog pa thams cad kyi rtog pa'i de kho na nyid ces bya ba 'di gsung so// de la theg ma tha ma med pa'i rdo rje
135a5(rgyud): sems dpa' ji ltar yan zhe na/ na mkha' skye ba mtshan ldan phyir// thog ma tha ma med pa'i mchog/ sems dpa' rdo rje che rang bzhin/ rdo rje sems dpa' zhes byar brjod// de nas bcom ldan 'das de
135a6(rgyud): gang yin zhe na// dkon mchog dngos grub chen po yi/ dbang phyug chen po lhag pa'i lha// rdo rje 'dzin ba kun gyi rgyal// ga tu dga' ba mi 'gyur mchog// de la bcom ldan 'das dga' ba chen po nyid ji ltar yin zhe na/ nyes
135a7(rgyud): ba med cing shin tu rtag/ 'dod chags kun gyis rjes chags pa/ de nyid 'di yis gsang ba 'di// 'dod chags chen po'i dga' ba che// de la ci kun tu bzang po nyid ji ltar yin zhe na/ shin tu dag pa kun gyi
135a8(rgyud): mchog/ gdod nas grol ba de bzhin gshegs// kun tu bzang po kun bdag nyid// byang chub sems dpa'i cho ga mchog/ de la rdo rje snyams pa'i bdag po bcom ldan 'das ji ltar yin zhe na/ kun mchog/ 
135b1(rgyud): des grub chan de yi// dbang drug chen po'i phyag rgya'i mchog rdo rje dbang phyug char sbed pas// rdo rje skams pa'i bdag po'i bdag/ ces bya ba ni bcom ldan 'das mchog dang po'i skyes bu re// sa chog dang po la
135b2(rgyud): de nyid 'di// rdo rje sems dpa'i gang gang brjod// dngos grub kun gyi 'byor pa rnams// de la thams cad 'grub par 'gyur// zhes pa ba mchog gi de kho na nyid bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsung so// de nas
135b3(rgyud): de'i 'og tu las kyi babs bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyi mchog nyid du bshad par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungaso// de la bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyis sems can ji ltar yin nan/ bsam
135b4(rgyud): gyis mi khab rgya che ba// thab dngas kun dad mi 'gyur ba// thams cad khyab cing dri ma med// byang chub sems ni bdag brtan pa// de nas 'di las khyab par ni/ sems nyid brtan pa nyid sems pas// ting 'dzin da la mnyam
135b5(rgyud): par gzhog/ rnam shes las ni rdo rje kun// rdo rje las ni 'dzin gyur ta// bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin ji ltar yin na na/ sems da/ ba'i byin rlabs sbyor ba ni// dag la byin rlabs mchog sgrub
135b6(rgyud): babazhin ra sgrub par byed ni des// rdo rje sems dpa' nyid thob 'gyur// de la bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa ji ltar yin zhe na/ snying stobs rdul dang mun pas kyang // gang phyir sems can don gyur pas// 
135b7(rgyud): phyir nga ni kun tu bzong // byang chub spyod pa'i rjes 'jug pa'o// de la ji ltar bcom ldan 'das bdud nyid dang 'dul bas rgyal ba ji ltar yin zhe na/ sems nyid kho na bdud nyid do// sems nyid de bzhin gshegs
135b8(rgyud): pa'o// rang sams gdul bar ba pa'i phyir// bdag ni bdud nyid gyur pa yin// de la ji ltar bcom ldan 'das mngon par rdzogs pa'i byang chub dang sangs rgyas yin zhe na/ rang sems so sor rtog pa'i phyir// 
136a1(rgyud): ngang chub sems mchog rdo rje 'di// dpir de nyid sangs rgyas zhing // bdag byin rlabs mchog grub phyir// de la ji ltar bcom ldan 'das phyag ni rdo rje yin na na/ mi byad so ser rtogs pa
136a2(rgyud): dang gdug pa thams cad ngos por gnon// sangs rgyas kun dngos rdo rje sta// byang chub sems ni brtan pa bdag/ kun tu bzang po'i lag tu ni// mtshon cha de ni rgyal bas bin// brtan pa thams cad grub pa'i
136a3(rgyud): pir des ni phyag na rdo rje das// de la ji ltar dang po'i rigs las byung ba shes pa rgyud zhe na/ shes rab pha rol phyin pa yum// yab ni thabs la mkhas pa ste// rdo rje sems dpa' gdul ba'i phyir// rigs
136a4(rgyud): rnams rab tu byung ba'o// de la ji ltar bcom ldan 'das 'dod pa thar pa yin zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das ni tshogs pa che// dngos gru ba thams cad rjes chags phyir// dngos grub thams cad mi 'gyur
136a5(rgyud): bde bde ba chen po zhes brjod pa'o// de la ji ltar bcom ldan 'das rnam pa gsum yin zhe na// bdag ni dus gsum ma tha' yas phyir// nga ni srid gsum gdul bya'i phyir// gsu
136a6(rgyud): mchog 'jig rten gsum kun phyir// 'jig rten gsum pa khams gsum nga// de la ji ltar bcom ldan 'das thams cad nyid yin na na// nga nyid brtan pa thams cad bde// bsod nams kun mchog
136a7(rgyud): che ba'i phyir// g.yo ba sems kyis 'dus byas phyir// sgyu ma thams cad nga yin no// zhes bya ba rang gi las kyi bya ba'i de kho na nyid rdo rje sems dpas gsung so// de la ji ltar dang po'i glu byung ba shes
136a8(rgyud): ba yon zhe na// srid pa shin tu grub pa yi// dbang phyug chen po mchog grub phyir// gib can sems can den mdzad phyir// bskal pa thog mar bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs// de nas gang yin na
136b1(rgyud): nad 'dod chags chen pa bcom ldan 'das// rab tu dga' ba mi 'gyur mchog/ gsang ba'i yi ni snying po brjod// yi ge hUM ni mi 'gyur mchog/ de nas nye ba'i snying po yi// de kho na nyid shes pa ni// de nyid gas
136b2(rgyud): ning gsang ba dang // snying po rab tu brjod par bya// snying po'i rje su sgrub par 'grub// nye ba'i stong po nyid du brjod// de la ji ltar bde ba chen po'i rdo rje don yod pa dam tshig gi bshad pa'i rgyud yin zhe na / dngos
136b3(rgyud): grub kun gyi mi 'gyur bde// bde ba chen po zhes brjedro// rdo rje de nyid don yod grub// dam tshi 'da' bar dka' ba'o// zhes bya ba'i mchog gi dam pa'i glugru bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so// 
136b4(rgyud): de la ji ltar dkyil 'khor gyi don shes pa yin zhe na// ji ltaraganas dang 'khor lo dang // ji ltar dgod par 'gro ba dang / 2khor dang bcas pa dgod pa gang // de 'dra'i 'khor lo mchog
136b5(rgyud): gis sprul// de nas rnam par shes pa ni// rdo rje sems sog/ sa lha rnams kyis// 'khor lo mngon sum mthong ba yis/ rtag pa'i bsod nams ci 'dra ba// phyir na bris na'ang de banan
136b6(rgyud): de nas thig gdab pa'i cho ga ni// shes rab can gyis dkyil 'khor bris// phyogs kun mnyam pa nyid dmigs la// shar dang nub dang byang dang lhor// thig bzhi btab pas dkyil 'khor brgyad/ rdo rje
136b7(rgyud): thig gis yongs bskor bar / ka' brgyad kyis nyer mdzes shing // sgo bani rta babs khaM khyer dang // dra ba dra byed la sogs rgyun// dang bdag po yi don shes ni// rdo rje sems dpa' ji lta bu zhe na mam
136b8(rgyud): skye ba mtshan ldan phyir// theg ma tha ma med pa'i mchog/ sems dpa' rdo rje tshe rang bzhin// dpal mchog dang po zhes byang brjod// de nas bcom ldan 'das gang zhe na/ kun mchog dngos grub chen po yi// 
137a1(rgyud): dbang phyug chen po lhag pa'i lha// rdo rje 'dzin bkun gyi rgyal// rab tu dga' ba mi 'gyur mchog/ ces bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas gsung so// de nas spyan ras gzigs dang
137a2(rgyud): gisaH/ pad+ma rA ga dang mtshungs pa// thams cad dag pa bla na mang// rdo rje sems dpa' rang bdag nyid// spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang phyug nyid// de nas pad+ma'i rigs kyi de kho na nyid ni// rdo rje chos ni rab grub phyir
137a3(rgyud): sems can thams cad rnam dag phyir// pad+ma chen po'i rigs dag pa'i// ting 'dzin ye shes kun nas bsdus zhes bya'o// de la ji ltar namakha'i snying po yin zhe na/ thams cad na mkha'i bcom ldan
137a4(rgyud): 'das pasems can bsod nams mthong zhing cha// nam pa'i snying po sems dpa' dang // de nas nor bu'i rigs kyis ni// dbang ba skur ba dang gter dang ni// rdo rje rgyal mtshan mched pa che// nor bu chen
137a5(rgyud): po'i rigs grub pa/ ngasam pa thams cad yongs rdzogs pa'o// zhes pa dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi de kho na nyid chen po bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs// rdo rje rigs thams
137a6(rgyud): cad kyi dbang bskur ba shes pa ni// sangs rgyas rin rdo rje byed// rdo rje na chen rdo rje la/ spyan dus gzigs la rdo rje sgra/ nang bu nor bu 'dzin pa'o// de nas mchog dang po'i phyag mtshan gyi de khe na
137a7(rgyud): nyid// kun mcho ga dngos grub chen po yi// dbang phyug chen po'i mtshon mchi// gsang ba lnga yi de nyid che// rdo rje rtsa lnga zhes brjod do// de nas rigs thams cad kyi phyag mtshan de kho na nyid zhes pa ni// sangs
137a8(rgyud): rgyas thams cad sangs rgyas nyid// sna tshogs bya ba rdo rje can// 'jig rten dang phyug rdo rje chos// nor bu bsags pa'o// zhes bya ba dbang bskur ba thams cad kyi phyag mtshan gyi de kho na nyid bcom ldan 'das
137b1(rgyud): rdo rje sems dpas gsung so// de la ji ltar thams cad dgug pa'i rgyud yin zhe na// rtog pa kun gyi gsang chen gyi// rdo rje lcags kyu dril bcas pas// bkug ta de nas rjes bsgrub pa// dril bu nyid kyi bya ba yin// ji ltar
137b2(rgyud): mchod pa thams cad kyi tshi ga yin zhe na// rtog pa kun gyi gsang chen gyi// rab tu dga' bas ma chad nas ni// glu dang rol mes rnams 'phrul pas// mchod de sngar yang rnal 'byor mchod// de la ji ltar dngos grub thams cad
137b3(rgyud): kyi byin gyis brlabs pa'i dam tshig chen po'i de kho na nyid yin zhe na/ rtog pa kun gyi gsang chen gyi// phyag rgya kun gyi legs byin rlabs// dam tshig chen po 'di nyid kyis// rang nyid bsgrubs nas snying po bzlas// thog
137b4(rgyud): mtha' mang ba'i sems dpa' ni// rdo rje sems dpa' dag / kun tu bzang po kun bdag nyid// rdo rje snyems par bdag po'i bdag/ ces bya ba'i mchog dang po'i skyes bu'o// de la ji ltar
137b5(rgyud): lhag pa'i lha thams cad kyi sgrub pa chen po'i rgyud yin na na/ brtan pa dang ni g.yo ba dang // rtog pa kun las bsgrub bya gang // rang gi lhag pa'i lha sbyor bas// de dag thams cad bsgrub par bya// 
137b6(rgyud): de nas thams cad rjesu sgrub po'i rgyud ni// rdo rje dril bu 'dzin gyur nas// rdo rje dril bus rab sad cing // rtog pa thams cad rjes sgrub pas// mchog dang la sogs 'grub par 'gyur// de la ji ltar 'bad po mang po
137b7(rgyud): thams cad sgrub pa'i rgyud yin zhe na// bsgrub bya ci 'dod bsgrungs nas ni// phyi nas ji ltar 'dod pa yi// ci 'dod spyod pa la spyad cing // thams cad byed cing thams cad bza'// langs pa 'am ni 'du ba 'am// 
137b8(rgyud): gang dang der chag pa 'am// dgad pa dang ni smra ba 'am// gang der ci bzhin de bzhi no// dbang po gang dang gang 'am 'gyur// de dang nga yi nge ber bya// mnyam par gzhag nas rnal 'byor gyis// rang gi lhag
138a1(rgyud): ba'i lha sbyor ba// de nyid rnal 'byor 'di yis ni// thams cad nyid ni bsgrub par bya// sangs rgyas kun dngos thams cad ni// rtag tu mthong zhing grub par 'gyur// dam tshig chen po de nyid ni
138a2(rgyud): mkhas pa gang zhig dang pas klog/ de ni sdug kun dang bral bas// dengos grub kun gyi dbang phyug 'gyur// zhes bya ba dam tshig chen po'i de kho na nyid de// de ltar dpal mchog dang po'i tshe ga ma nyams mchog
138a3(rgyud): gi bla ma gsal// mchog tu gsang ba sgrub pa'i tshi ga bde mchog myur du grub phyir gsol// rdo rje mchog 'dzin dang bcas bde gshegs sras bcas rnams kyis bin rlabs pa// bde chen dam
138a4(rgyud): brdo rje 'dzin pa dga' chen mchog gis de gsung so// dpal mchog de/ nga ba~M las mchog tu gsang ba'i cho ga/ de nas ston pa rdo rje dzin// mkha' ltar thug med kun tu 'gro// sangs rgyas
138a5(rgyud): kun gyis bston nas ni// rtog pa'i mthar thug don gsung so// bdag gi snying po dang 'di mchog chen po'o// bde chen mchog gi mchog dang rjesu chags pa che// kun mchog sems dpa' rnams
138a6(rgyud): kyi rtag tu 'byung gnas ni/ kun mchog 'byor ba'i dbang phyug gso ba yin// mtha' yas pa dang thog med mthar thug med pa ni// mchod bya chen po thams cad rnams kyi tshul chen po// na mkha' dang mtshung
138a7(rgyud): mchog gi dngos 'angal gsel// de ni sus kyang mthar thug bad par nus pa ma ni// sems can rnams ni dman la zhen cing nyung la dga'// dad pa med cing bsgrub byed la ma sbyangs pa// rtag tu rje su chags
138a8(rgyud): bral la chags pa// de rnams la ni phan phyir 'di ni mthar thug pa'o// gang gi khyim na 'di gnas gang gis rab tu sgrub pa 'am// yang ni ji bzhin gsungs pa rtag tu 'dir sgrub byed// so sor nyam su
138b1(rgyud): myong ba'i mthu yis thamams cad du// dud kyi la sogs rnams kyis de ni gnod mi nus// rdo rje 'chang sogs sku ni gang gis sgrub byed pa// gzugs brnyan la sogs thams cad 'dir ni ji bzhin gsus// 
138b2(rgyud): des ni thams cad so sor nyams myong nus par ldan// bdud kyil sogs rnams kyis de ni gnod mi nus// gang zhig rdo rje la sogs gzugs brnyan la sogs pa// ji ltar 'dod pa 'di dag thams cad sgrub
138b3(rgyud): par byed// rab tu 'dod pas yi ge hUM las bris nas ni// 'dod pa'i dngos grub de yis ster zhing thob par 'gyur// rgyal po rnams kyis rnam par sbyangs par mdzad pa ni// gang la don kun dag phyir mdzad par
138b4(rgyud): mi 'gyur ma ni// 'dir ni 'gegs byed bded rnams kyang ni yid ma yin// rtogs pas dngos grub 'phel zhing byin gyis bzlas pa yin// nga ni bdud nyid mi 'gyur brtan med nyid mi 'gyur// brdzun pa nyid phyir nga ni brtan
138b5(rgyud): bar mdzad pa yin// rtag pa 'di ni mchog chen gang gis sgrub byed pa//  la nga ni dngos glub myur du sgrub par byed// dngos grub chen po/ la thams cad du rje su chags shing shin tu mnyes pa
138b6(rgyud): dang shin tu mdzad pa dang / shin tu rgyas pa dang / rtag tu rgya che bar 'gyur ba yino// gang zhig mchog gi rgyal po'i snying po sgrub byed pa/ rgyal ba thams cad dgyes shing rgyal ba dgyes par mdzad// 
138b7(rgyud): dag grags pa chen po thob nas bde ba'ang thob// dpyir 'di la dang cing gus par bya ba yin// de nas rgyal ba rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la leg so zhes bya ba byin te/ yab mchog sangs rgyas
138b8(rgyud): sras ni lagaso legs// sras mchog sangs rgyas sras ni legaso legs// rdo rje mchog ni rdo rje 'byung ba legs// dam pa'i chos kyi bdag nyid lagaso legs// sangs rgyas rnams kyis yang
139a1(rgyud): dag byin bshAs ga/ rtag tu mi 'gyur don yod grub pa mchis// ji ltar dang de'i grub pa de bzhin du// phyi nas kyang ni de bzhin dung bar 'gyur// de ltar ngag chen gsungs nas ni// sras dang
139a2(rgyud): bcas pa'i sangs rgyas rnams// rdo rje sems dpa' chen po yo// gsung la rjesu ya~M rang mdzad// dpal mchog dang po las rtog pa'i rgyal po thams cad kyi mchog rdzog s+ho// // thugs dam spu'i
139a3(rgyud): snying po ze ling du phyug gyi mkhan po baN+Di ta mangs pa chen po mnukas sha dang / khA sgyur gyi mo srab lnga batshan po dge slong bla ma ni ba'i yid kyi nal mabar nas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la ba' ga'i ts+tsha
139a4(rgyud): chen po rin chen bzang po ma// dpal mchog dang po'i rgyung / 'di ba sgru ba la//  ba dab ma rnyed pas ma 'gyur na// 'ad/ ga gis 'thad pas dpe bcal rnyed pas bskyug rgya gar skad du Ar+ya thA
139a5(rgyud): bA ra mi tA na ya sha ta ban+d+ha da sha ka/ bod skad du/ 'phang/ sa pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul brgya lnga bcu pa/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la phyag 'tshal lo// 
139a6(rgyud): 'di skad bdag gis thob pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mkhyen pa'i bye brag rnam pa tha dad pa dang ldan pa// de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che thams cad kyi cod pan
139a7(rgyud): gyis khams gsum du dbang bcu rdzogs pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ma khams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes dang ldan pa/ rnal 'byor can chen po'i dbang phyug// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag
139a8(rgyud): rgya chos thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid thugasu chud pa sna tshogs kyis/ bya ba mdzad de ma lus pa na sems can gyi khams lus pa med pa rnams kyis re ba thams cad yongasu bskang ba'i phrin las mdzad pa/ 
139b1(rgyud): thugs rje che ba rnam par snang mdzad chen po rtag pa khams gsum gyi mnyam pa nyid la bzhugs pa sku dang gsung dang thugs thams cad rdo rje de bzhin gshegs lha'i rgyal po gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi gnas/ 
139b2(rgyud): 'dod pa'i khams thams cad na/ ner bu rnon po che chen pos rab tu smras pa dang / bdag kha dog sna tshogs dri'i khu 'argyur ba rlung gis bskyod pa dang / me tog gi phreng ba dang / rnga ma dang / rgyan phreng dang / chun 'phyang
139b3(rgyud): drangs zla ba lha bus mdzes par byas pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad bzhugs pa/ shes pa bstod pa na/ byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag brgya dang / thabs gcig tu bzhugs pa la 'di lta ste/ byang chub
139b4(rgyud): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje dang / spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang / na mkha'i snying po dang / rdo rje'i khu tshur dang / 'jam dpal dang / sems bskyed ma thag tu chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang
139b5(rgyud): namakha' mdzod dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'// chen po bdud kyi stobs thams cad rab tu 'joms pa dang // / de dag la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag brgya dang thabs
139b6(rgyud): gcig ste/ yongasu bskor cing mdun gyis bltas nas tshes ston te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid rnam par dag pa'i sgo zhes bA 2/ thog mar dag ga bar du dge
139b7(rgyud): bdon bzang po// tshig 'bral bzang po// ma 'dras pa/ yongasu rdzogs g.yongs byang ba/ yang dag par ston te/ 'di ltar rab tu dag pa rnam par dag pa'i gnas de ni/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i phan
139b8(rgyud): sor 'dod chags kyi mtha' rnam par dag pa'i gnas de ni 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i gan so// reg pa rnam par dag pa'i gnas de ni 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i gnaso// sdug pa'i 'chi
140a1(rgyud): pa rnam par dag pa'i gnas de ni 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i gnaso// thams cad la dbang phyug dang / dbang rnam par dag pa'i gnas de ni// 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' gnas
140a2(rgyud): lta ba rnam par dag pa'i gnas de ni// 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i gnaso// dga' ba rnam par dag pa'i gnas de ni 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i gnaso// srad pa rnam par dag pa'i gnas de ni/ 'di
140a3(rgyud): lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i gnaso// sems pa rnam par dag pa'i gnas de ni/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i gnaso// rgyan rnam par dag pa'i don/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i gan so// yid
140a4(rgyud): tshim par byed pa rnam par dag pa'i gnas de ni/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i gnas// snang ba rnam par dag pa'i kun sa de ni 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i gnaso// lus bde ba rnam
140a5(rgyud): bar dag po'i gnas de ni/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i gan so// gzugs rnam par dag pa'i gnas de ni/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i gan so// sgra rnam par dag pa'i gnas da ni
140a6(rgyud): 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i gan so// dri rnam par dag pa'i gnas du ni/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i gan so// ro rnam par dag pa'i gnas de ni/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i gnaso// reg
140a7(rgyud): rnam par dag pa'i gnas de ni 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i gnaso// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos thams cad ni ngo bo nyid kyi rnam par dag pa ste/ chos thams cad ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid pas/ shes rab
140a8(rgyud): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongasu dag pa'o// lag na rdo rje su la la chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid rnam par dag pa'i sgo sgrub pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ba'i tshul 'di lan cig thos na yang // 
140b1(rgyud): / byang chub kyi snying po'i bar du sgrib pa thams cad dang / chos pa dang / nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa dang / chos kyi sgrib pa dang / las kyi sgrib pa chen po bsags kyang sems can dmyal ba la sogs pa ngan song
140b2(rgyud): du rnams kyang skye bar mi 'gyur/ sdig pa yang byas ma thag tu sdug bsngal med par byang bar 'gyur ro// su zhig 'dzin pa dang / nyin re bzhin klog pa dang / kha ton byed pa dang / tshul bzhin yid la byed pa
140b3(rgyud): de tshe 'di nyid lo chos thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid rdo rje'i ting 'dzin thob pas// chos thams cad la dbang bar 'gyur// chos thams cad la dga' ba dang / mgu ba dang / mchog tu dga' ba myong bar 'a gyur// 
140b4(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i tshes bcu drug gis de bzhin gshegs pa 'am// rdo rje 'dzin thob par 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan 'das lag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams
140b5(rgyud): cad par theg pa chen po mngon par rtogs pa dkyil 'khor/ thams cad la/ rdo rje 'dzin mtha' dag gi sems can gyi ma cho ga khams ma lus pa dag ni/ 'jig rten gsum po thad
140b6(rgyud): las rnam par rgyal gsems can gyi khams lus med pa/ don thams cad grub pa/ dam tshig chen po la rdo rje gsang ba'i sems can du mas g.yog byas pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul
140b7(rgyud): gyi don 'di ston te/ bzhin rab tu 'dzum shing lag pa g.yon pa rdo rje bsgyings te/ thog ma'i rdo rje chen po gsor nas/ rang gi snying khar bstod pa'i tshul gyis 'dzin cing / bde ba chen po rdo rje don yod
140b8(rgyud): pa'i dam tshig ces pa rang gi de kho na nyid kyi snying po 'di smraso// hUM de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad kyis yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis mnyam
141a1(rgyud): rdzogs sa su zhes byug shes tu na pa tshul du da / la / rje tsaman pa
141a2(rgyud): mu la /  ma chen sder/ tsugacig par da kyi ma yod ldan pa chogs pa myo la ma phyi ma chen pa / nga ba nyi rnam pa pa rgya chos kyi rnam pa nyid man
141a3(rgyud): rdzogs pa rgyu po ni/ khya mu chen po'i/ khams cad po rnam par mi rtog par phyi khams cad pa so pa 'di man pa rdzogs pa byang chub ba ni/ byang chung chen pa'o// gan rje phu la la chos men
141a4(rgyud): bar spyad bapon po 'di dag zhen pa dang / 'dzin par nga klog pa dang / sgom pa de sdig pa thams cad spyod kyang / byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug gi bar du dran seng thams cad las yang
141a5(rgyud): dag por 'gyur// myur du blan med pa yang dag rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bden par rdzogs par 'chang ra 'gyur // de nas bcom ldan las ye shes kyi khu tshung yong su 'dzin
141a6(rgyud): bang don gnas 'di nyid rgya cher ston cing / bzhin rab tu 'dzum dbul te/ chos thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid kyi snying po 'di rab tu smra so// a de nas ma 'dus pa thams cad 'dul ba bcom ldan 'das
141a7(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas kyang / yang chos thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid kyi rnam par rgyal ba bsdus pa zhes bya ba/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgrub pa 'di bshad de/ 'dod chags
141a8(rgyud): spros pa med pa nyid kyis/ zhe sdang gi spros pa med pa nyid do// zhe sdang gi spros pa med pa nyid kyis// gti mug spos po med pa nyid// gti mug smos pa med pa nyid kyis chos thams cad spros pa
141b1(rgyud): med pa nyid// chos thams cad kyi spros pa med pa nyid kyis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa spros pa med par cig pur bya'o// lag na rdo rje su la la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di nyan pa dang / 
141b2(rgyud): 'dzin pa dang / klog pa dang / skem pa des 'dul ba'i dbang gis khams gsum du skyes pa'i sems can thams cad bsad kyang ngan song du 'gro bar mi 'gyur te/ myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzog
141b3(rgyud): pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyuraro// de nas bcom ldan 'das lag na rdo rje chos 'di'i don rgya chen po sten te/ 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i
141b4(rgyud): phyag rgya bcings nas khro gnyer dang bcas shing smin ma bteg ste/ 'bar bar lha la pad+maSh+Ti gdong khro zhing dgod/ mche ba gtsigs nas rkang pa g.yon pa brkyang ba'i tshul du gnas pas gan/ 
141b5(rgyud): rdo rje hUMn bya ba'i snying po 'dra smra so// hUM de nas ma ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ngo bo nyid dag pa'i chos nyid thob pas/ yang chos thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid spyan ras
141b6(rgyud): gzigs dbang phyug gi ye shes kyi phyag rgya zhes bya ga shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di bshad/ 'dod chags thams cad rnam par dag pas/ 'jig rten na zhe sdang thams cad rnam
141b7(rgyud): par dag par 'gyur// dri ma thams cad rnam par dag pas/ 'jig rten na sdig pa thams cad rnam par dag par 'gyuraro// chos thams cad rnam par dag pas/ 'jig rten na sems can thams cad rnam
141b8(rgyud): par dag par 'gyur ro// shes pa thams cad rnam par dag pas/ 'jig rten na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag par 'gyur// lag ni rdo rje su la la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
142a1(rgyud): tshul 'di nyan pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / klog pa dang / sgom pa de 'dod chags dang / dri ma thams cad kyi nang na 'dug kyang pad+ma lta bur 'dod chags kyi nyes pa rnams dang / dri ma rnam
142a2(rgyud): dang glo bur gyi nyon mongs pa rnams kyis gos par mi 'gyur te/ myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po
142a3(rgyud): spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug don gyi gnas 'di nyid rgya cher ston cing / bzhin rab tu 'dzum dmul ta/ pad+ma'i 'dab ma kha 'byed pas/ 'dod chags la sogs dri mas mi gos pa la lta zhing / pad+ma gzug
142a4(rgyud): sna tshogs nas bya ba'i snying pa 'di smra so// hrIHde nas bcom lda na 'das de bzhin gshegs pa khams gsum thams cad kyi dbang pos yang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbang bskur
142a5(rgyud): ba las byung ba'i ye shes kyi snying po zhes bya ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bshad de/ dbang bskur ba ni khams gsum thams cad kyi rgyal sris thob par 'gyuraro// nor sbyin pa
142a6(rgyud): ni ra ba thams cad yong su rdzogs par 'gyuraro// chos sbyin pa ni chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid thob par 'gyur// zang zing gi sbyin pa ni lus dang ngag dang / sems kyi bde ba thams cad thob par 'gyur ro// / 
142a7(rgyud): de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po na mkha'i snying po bzhin rab tu 'dzumya te/ rang gi mgo la rdo rje rin po che'i dbang bskur ba'i phreng ba 'ching zhing don 'di nyid rgya cher ston te/ dbang bskur ba thams cad
142a8(rgyud): kyi dam tshig rin po che zhes bya ba'i snying po 'di smraso// tAM de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi phyag rgya thob pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bu chung
142b1(rgyud): 'dzin pa de bzhin gshegs pas yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi phyag rgya'i gnas rdo rje zhes bya ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di bshad de/ de bzhin gshegs
142b2(rgyud): ba thams cad kyi sku'i phyag rgya yongasu 'dzin pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa nyid du 'gyur// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsung gi phyag rgya yongasu 'dzin pa ni/ chos thams cad theb par 'gyur
142b3(rgyud): ro// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs kyi phyag rgya yongasu 'dzin pa ni/ ting 'dzin thams cad thob par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i phyag rgya yongasu 'dzin pa ni/ lus dang / ngag
142b4(rgyud): dang sems thams cad rdo rje rdo rje'i dngos grub dom pa thob pa ra 'gyur// su la la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'a da nyan pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / klog pa dang / lung 'begs pa dang / skem
142b5(rgyud): pa das dngos grub thams cad dang / phun sum chags pa thams cad dang / shes pa thams cad dang / dgos pa thams cad dang / lus dang / ngag dang / sems thams cad rdo rjer rdo rje'i dngos grub dam
142b6(rgyud): bzong nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje khu chur dam tshig chen po'i rdo rje'i phyag rgya yengasu 'dzin
142b7(rgyud): pas don gnas 'di rgya cher sten te/ de bzhin rab tu 'dzum zhing rje rje sra ba'i dades grub thams cad kyi mchog ces bya ba'i snying po 'di sprus// A de nas bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad spros pa meng pa'i
142b8(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pas/ yang 'khor lo ltar yi ge bskor ba zhes byag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshu lo 'di bshad// ngo bo nyid med pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad stong pa'o// mtshan ma med
143a1(rgyud): pa'i phyir/ chos thams cad mtshan ma med pa'o// smon pa med pa'i tshul gyis/ chos thams cad smon pa med pa'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongasu dag pas/ chos thams cad rang
143a2(rgyud): bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa den 'di nyid rgya cher ston te/ bzhin rab tu 'dzum bzhin du khadag gi ral gri des de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la
143a3(rgyud): 'debs shing / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i snying po'i mchog 'di smra so// A de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor der 'dus pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor lo chen po
143a4(rgyud): la 'jug pa zhes bya ga shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul la dab shad// rdo rje mnyam pa nyid la 'jug pa ni/ de bzhin gshe gas pa thams cad kyi 'khor lo la 'jug par 'gyur// den gyi/ 
143a5(rgyud): mnyam pa nyid la 'jug pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'khor lo la 'jug par 'gyur// chos thams cadakyis mnyam pa nyid la 'jug pa ni/ dam pa'i chos kyi 'khor
143a6(rgyud): lo la 'jug par bya'o// chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid la 'jug pa ni/ 'khor lo thams cad la 'jug par 'gyuraro// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po sems bskyed ma thag tu/ chos kyi 'khor
143a7(rgyud): lo bskor ga chos mnyam pa nyid kyi don rgya cher ston cing / bzhin 'dzum nas/ rdo rje 'khor lo bskor zhing // rdo rje 'khor lo thams cad lo 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i snying po 'di smraso// hUM de nas bcom ldan 'das
143a8(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa thams cad kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i snod kyi/ mchod pa thams cad kyi mchog ces byagab/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di bshad// byang chub kyi sems bskyed pa ni/ 
143b1(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod pa'i cho ga rgya che ba'o// sems can gyi khams thams cad yongasu slob pa ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod pa'i cho ga rgyas pa'o// dam pa'i chos yongasu 'dzin
143b2(rgyud): pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod pa'i cho ga rgyas pa'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yi ger 'dri ba dang / yi ger 'drir 'jug pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / klog pa dang / brjod pa dang / sten pa
143b3(rgyud): ba zhan pa dang / sems dpa' dang / skem pa dang / mchod pa byed pa ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod pa'i cho ga rgyas pa'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po na mkha'i mdzod
143b4(rgyud): don de nyid rgya cher ston te/ bzhin rab tu 'dzum zhing las thams cad don yod pa'i dam tshig zhes bya ba'i snying po 'di smra'o// mau de nas bcom lnga 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sam can thams cad
143b5(rgyud): 'dul nus pa/ yang ye shes khu tshur yongasu 'dzin pa sems can thams cad 'dul ba shes pa'i snying po zhes byab/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di bshad// sems can thad
143b6(rgyud): mnyam pa nyid pas// kho bo mnyam pa nyid// sems can thams cad 'dul ba nyid pas khro bo 'dul ba nyid de// sems can thams cad chos nyid pas khro bo chos nyid// sems can thams cad rdo rje nyid pas/ khro bo
143b7(rgyud): rdo rje ni/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di lhung sems can thams cad 'dul ba ni byang chub bo// de nas byang chub sems dpa' bdud kyi stobs thams cad rab tu 'joms pa/ don de nyid rgya cher ston te/ bzhin rab tu 'jum
143b8(rgyud): zhing rdo rje mche ba'o phyag rgya dang / rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi gzugs kyi khro bo'i gad mo zhes bya ba'i snying po 'di smra so// ha de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa/ ches thams cad kyi mchog ces bya ba// 
144a1(rgyud): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di bshad/ thams cad mnyam pa nyid pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mnyam pa nyid do// thams cad don nyid pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu
144a2(rgyud): phyin pa den nyid// thams cad chos 'ad pas/ shes rib kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ches 'di// thams cad las nyid pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las nyid du rig par bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das lag na rje
144a3(rgyud): rje de bzhin gshegs pa/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi don yod pa'i dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor byin gyis rlob pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugaso nas/ den yod pa thams cad kyi dam
144a4(rgyud): tshig ces bya ba'i snying po 'od smras// hUM de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad po/ rnam par snang mdzad kyis ya dang / sems can ta kyi ba pa zhes bya ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
144a5(rgyud): pa'i tshul 'di bshod// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po thams cad kyi rang bzhin yin pas// sems can thams cad ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po cano// thams
144a6(rgyud): cad snying rje'i snying pos dbang bskur ba nyid pas/ sems can thams cad ni rdo rje'i stong po ca no// ngag thams cad rab tu byung bas/ sems can thams cad ni chos kyi snying po cano// sems can thams cad kyi bya ba byed
144a7(rgyud): pa la sbyor bas/ sems can thams cad ni las kyi snying po ca no// de nas pha rol gyi rdo rje rigs rnams kyis ca co'i sgra byung nas chos nyid kyi don rgya cher ston cing / snying po phul te/ de nas rdo rje'i dbang phyug
144a8(rgyud): chen pos rang gi de kho na'i snying po 'di phulo// tri daM nas ma mo thams cad kyis bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal te/ mgrin gcig tu thams cad dgug pa dang / gzung ba dang / gzhig pa dang / sgrub pa'i
144b1(rgyud): dam tshig ces bya ba rang gi de kho na'i snying po 'di phu'o// g+hoglod nas sbrang rtsi byad la sogs pa mang po gsum gyis bcom ldan 'das la phag 'tshal te/ rang gi de kho na'i snying po 'di smraso// sA de nas sring mo
144b2(rgyud): bzhin bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal te/ rang gi de kho na'i snying po 'di phulo// hUM de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mtho' yas la mthar thug cing mu med pa'i chos dang ldan pas yang / cho ga
144b3(rgyud): 'di mthar thug par byin gyis brlab par bya ba'i phyir// chos thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid kyi mthar thug pas byin gyi brlabs pa rdo rje zhes bya ga/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di bshad de/ 
144b4(rgyud): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phan pa mtha' yas pa nyid pas/ de ba ni na gshegs pa thams cad mtha' yas pa nyid do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mu med pa nyid pas/ rdo rje thams cad mu med
144b5(rgyud): pa nyid do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa du ma nyid pas/ chos thams cad du ma nyid// shes rab kyi rol tu phyin pa mthar thug pa med pa nyid pas/ chos thams cad mthar thug pa med pa nyid
144b6(rgyud): yi no su la la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di nyan pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / ston pa dang / brjod pa dang / bsgom pa des sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa
144b7(rgyud): thug pa med pa'i mthar phyin te/ sgrib pa thams cad zad nas de bzhin gshegs pa 'am/ rdo rje 'dzin par myur du 'gyur// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'dus te/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di den yod pa
144b8(rgyud): dang thogs pa med par myur du 'grub par bya ba'i phyir// khag na rdo rje la lagaso zhes bya ba po no// sems can chen po lagaso legs/ bde ba chen po lagaso legs/ theg pa chen po lagaso lags
145a1(rgyud): blo gros chen po legaso legs// cho ga 'di ni lags par smras// sangs rgyas rje rje 'dzin kun gyis// 'bras bu ye nga 'dul ba'i mchog rdo rje mdo sde byin gyis brlabs// cho ga'i rgyab dra
145a2(rgyud): na med nag rnams 'di dag 'dzin pa ni// bdud la sogs pa thams cad kyis// de dag mi sed mi chugaso// sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang / bas grub dab pa thams cad kyang // sangs rgyas kun gyis gsungs pa
145a3(rgyud): bzhin// ring por mi thogs theb par 'gyur// de skad gsungs nas sngags grub par// rdo rje can gyis bshad pa la// kun mchog sangs rgyas mkhas bcas pa// thams cad kyis ni mngon par stong// // de nas
145a4(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad de/ bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i chos nyid brnyes pa chos thams cad spros pa med pas yang bde ba chen po rdo rje den
145a5(rgyud): yod pa'i chos mnyam pa nyid shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo mchog dang po theg ma dang tha ma dang dbus med pa'i dam pa 'di gsung so// byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis
145a6(rgyud): 'dod chags chen po dngos grub dam pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bde ba chen po dngos grub dam par 'gyur// byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi bde ba chen po dngos grub dam pa ni de bzhin
145a7(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi byang chub chen po dngos grub chen po grub pa dam par 'gyuraro// byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byang chub chen po dngos grub das pa
145a8(rgyud): ning bdud chen po'i stobs thams cad rab tu 'joms pa dngos grub dam par 'gyuraro// byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi bdud chen po'i stobs rab tu 'joms pa dngos grub dam pa ni khams gsum
145b1(rgyud): ba thams cad kyi dbang phyug chen po dngos grub dam par 'gyur// byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi khams gsum thams cad kyi dbang phyug chen po'i dngos grub dam pa ni ma lus pa na/ sems can gyi
145b2(rgyud): khams lus pa med pa yongasu sbyong bar lo pa'i rgyu'i phyira'o// 'khor ba la yang chags shing // brtsor 'grus che ba'i byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ma lus pa ni/ sems can gyi khams
145b3(rgyud): lus ba med pa yongasu sgrub pa dang / sems can thams cad la phan pa dang / bde ba dang / mchog tu shin tu bde ba chen po dngos grub dam par 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ji srid 'khor ba'i
145b4(rgyud): gnasu ni// mkhas mchog 'dug par gyur ba'i tshe// de srid ma chu sa med sems can don// mya ngan mi 'da' byed par nus// shes rab pha rol phan thabs dang // ye shes gan su bsgrubs pas
145b5(rgyud): na/ chos kun rnam par dag pa'i phyir// 'khor ba yongasu dag pa ra gyur// chags la sogs pas 'dul na ni// 'khor ba'i bar du rtag par yang // 'jig rten sdig byed de sbyang phyir// 
145b6(rgyud): 'bor ba srid du bdag nyid 'bul// ji ltar pad+ma rab 'bar yang // tshen gyi nyes pas mi gos pa// de bzhin gnas pa'i nyes pa yis// 'gro phan rnams la mi gos so// 'dod chags chen po rnam par dag
145b7(rgyud): bde ba che zhing nor che la// khams gsum dbang phyug thob pas na// sems can don rnams brtan par byed// lag na rdo rje su la la nang par langs nas mchog dang po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul
145b8(rgyud): gyi sgo'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nyin re zhing // 'dod pa dang / nyan pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / klog pa dang / sgom pa de yid bde ba dang / bde ba thams cad thob par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje don yod
146a1(rgyud): ba'i dam tshig dngos grub kyi mchog kyang tshe 'di la thob par 'gyuraro// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba mchog grub ta/ rdo rje 'dzin thams cad kyi chen po 'am/ de bzhin
146a2(rgyud): gshegs par 'gyuraro// de nas bcom ldam 'das kyis gsang ba'i bdag po lag na rdo rje la bka' stsal pa/ gsang ba pa'i bdag be shes rab kyi pha ro lnga phyin pa'i tshul gyi sde'i sngags kyi tshig ni ci
146a3(rgyud): shu rtsa lnga po 'di rnamaso// oM byang chub kyi sems rdo rje/ oM kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa/ oM yid bzhin gyi nor bu/ oM 'gog pa med pa/ oM skye ba bzlog pa/ oM rnam par shes pa thams cad/ oM 'dod chags
146a4(rgyud): dang bral ba'i chos nyid chen po/ i brdzun 'grus kyi ga cha/ mo na tu 'gro gau yo rdo rjes pa'i sems/ hUM Ta oM de bzhin gshag/ sa pa thams cad/  de pa nyid rnam par dag pa mo chos nyid shes
146a5(rgyud): pa rnam par dag pa/ oM las rnam par steng ga hUM aM nges par/ gnod mdzes rdo rje cane/ hUM phaT oM 'dod pa la 'dod chags pa// oM spong ba'i ba'i rdo rje can/ oM hUM thams cad 'dul ba/ oM hrI
146a6(rgyud): oM a zhes bya ba'i sgo// oM shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa A po hUM oM a/ oM de bzhin gshag pa thams cad kyi sku'i mchog/ oM de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsung rnam par dag pa/ 
146a7(rgyud): oM de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs rdo rje aHoM a sdig pa 'ching ga thams cad choms shig/ ngan sing gi rgyud thams cad las thar bar gyis shig/ oM dam tshig thams cad kyi rdo rje
146a8(rgyud): hUM traH/ sdig pa gzhom pa'i phyag rgya dang / sngags te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang gdangos grub dam pa rdo rje 'dzin 6/ de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur// lag na rdo rje 'di ni
146b1(rgyud): sems can dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa rnams kyis mnyan pa 'am/ yi ger 'dri ba 'am/ yi ger br-ir gzhug pa 'am/ klag pa 'am/ 'chang ba 'am/ sgom pa 'am/ bsti stang du bya ba 'am/ ri mor bya ba 'am
146b2(rgyud): mchod par mi nus// gang dag gos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul gyi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di las tha na yi ge 'bru gcig tsam thos na yang sems can de dag ni gzhan na sangs rgyas rang
146b3(rgyud): lo la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa yin na mtha' dag rdzogs po lta ci smos/ lag na rdo rje gang la la dag sangs rgyas bya ba khrag khrig gang ga'i klung brgyad cu'i bye ma la bkur sti ma byas pa dang / bla mar
146b4(rgyud): ma byas pa dang / bsti stong ma byas pa dang / mchod par ma bya sa pa de dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin po'i tshul gyi sgo'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos par mi nus// chos kyi rnam
146b5(rgyud): grangs 'di gang la spyod pa'i sa phyogs de mchod rten du' gyur// chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gang gi lus la thogs sam/ glegs bam la bris te/ spyod pa'i gang zag de phyag
146b6(rgyud): bya ba'i gnasu 'gyur// de bskal po bye ba mang por skye ba dran par 'gyuraro// de la bdud sdig to can bar chad byed par mi 'gyuraro// rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / lha gzhan rnams kyang de la srung ba dang / 
146b7(rgyud): bskyab pa dang / sba ba'i phyir rtag tu phyi bzhin 'brang bar 'gyur ro// ya nga ba ma spangs pas 'chi bar mi 'gyuraro// sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis dgongs par 'gyuraro// mdo
146b8(rgyud): na sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dang gang du 'dod pa de dang der skye'o// de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul gyi sgo'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di phan yon mang mod kyis ngas phyogs tsam zhig sdod
147a1(rgyud): bcom ldan las kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dang / lha dag mi dang / lham
147a2(rgyud): yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshul lnga bsdu pa rdzogs/ 
147a3(rgyud): rgya gar skad du/ shrI badz+ra maN+Da a laM kA ra nA ma ma hA tAn+t+ra rA dza/ bod skad du/ dpal rdo rje snying po rgyun ces bya ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po// bla ma dang 'jam pa'i dbyangs kyi zhabs kyi pad+ma la spyi bos gus
147a4(rgyud): bar phyag 'tshal la// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus ga na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyai rdo rje dang / nong du dong / na po che dang / pad+ma da / las kyi sbyin
147a5(rgyud): gyis brlabs pa'i dam tshig gi ye shes rnam pa sna tshogs shing khyad par du 'phags pa dang ldan pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rin po che'i cod pan khams gsum pa'i chos kyi
147a6(rgyud): rgyal por dbang bskur ba brnyes pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje dam tshig gi ye shes rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi phyag rgya brnyed pa/ 
147a7(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya thams cad mnyam pa nyid thug su chud cing las sna tshogs mdzod pa ma lus shing lus pa med pa'i sems can gyi khams thams cad kyi ri thams cad yongs
147a8(rgyud): su rdzogs pa'i rdo rje'i las mdzad pa/ zugs rje chen po rnam par snang mdzad chen po rtag pa dus gsum dus gsum du gnas pa'i sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pade bzhin/ 
147b1(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyis bsten cing bsngags pa'i norang bu rin ngo mtshan po dang ldan pa/ kha deg rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i dra ba du btags pa/ rlung gis bskyed pa'i dang kyi 'ban dang / me tog mi chun po
147b2(rgyud): dang dra ba dang ba byed pas klubs shing nye bar mdzes pa/ chos kyi dbyings thams cad legs par yong su dag pa ches dbyings kyi khang babang 'od mtha' yas pa/ shos rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gtsug 'ag khang
147b3(rgyud): la me tog gi 'bri shing mchog gi snying po'i rgyan gyis bkod ga/ 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud rgya mtsho rab tu 'akram pa'i sprin nas pa'i khams yongs khyab pa/ de bzhin gshegs pas byin gyis brlazlas pa/ 
147b4(rgyud): mtha' las 'das pa'i sangs rgyas 'khrungs pa'i dbus rnam par snang mdzad kyi snying po 'di gsal ba'i gzhal med khang // de bzhin gshegs pa'i gnas rdo rje snying po'i rgyan// de bzhin gshegs
147b5(rgyud): pa thams cad kyi skra dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje/ de bzhin ga/ shags pa mi 'khrungs mi 'gog 'gog par mi 'gyur/ ra ba'i yan lag gi spyod yul yang dag pa'i mtha' gsal
147b6(rgyud): ba thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi yul/ ches kyi dbyings kyi snying po'i khang bzang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi sku/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byang chab kyi snying po sa chen
147b7(rgyud): dam pa la bzhugs// de la sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul dang mnyam pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis yongasu bskor zhing
147b8(rgyud): mdun du bdang ti chos sten par mdzad pa ni thog mar dge b.lang du dag gdon pazang po/ tshig 'bru bzong ba/ ma 'dres pa// khong su rdzogs pa/ yongasu dag pa/ yongasu dkar ga chos thams cad kyi tshul yongasu dag
148a1(rgyud): pa'i sgo ston par mdzad// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje gnyi su med pa mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes sems dpa' da ban
148a2(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi nyi ma rnam par rgyal ba ridam tshig 'byung gnas rdo rje stong ngo po// chos thams cad ngo bo nyid kyis rnam par dag pa'i ye shes mnyam pa nyid brnyes pa/ rgya mtsho ltar zab pa khas
148a3(rgyud): sna tshogs pa'i phyag rgya'i ye shes thob pa sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje rnamakha' lta buHsku chen po rdo rje'i sku// mtha' las 'das pa'i sku/ sku rin po che chos kyi sku/ sprul pa'i sku/ chos mnyam pa nyid kyi sku/ 
148a4(rgyud): byang chub kyi sems/ don yod pa// yongasu bsdus pa/ dge ba 'daphel ba rgyal po chen po snang ba'i tog band pa po// chos dang ldan pa// shes rab kyi 'khor lo// skad thams cad pa/ sna tshogs pa cen/ 
148a5(rgyud): slong ba po// gnod sbyin can/ mtshams sbyor ga yang dag pa'i gter/ gtsug ter du 'gyur ba/ mchog ldan/ rdo rje can 'khor/ lo can/ ye shes can/ khar 'jug chen po// skra dang gsung dang
148a6(rgyud): thugis rdo rje nam pa'i dbyings thams cad du lags par bzhugs pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis yongasu bgrod pa/ rdo rje'i dbyings thams can khong du chud pa'i ye shes sems dpa' rnam pa'i kham
148a7(rgyud): thams cad kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul dang mnyam pa rdo rje'i bani rlabs kyi ye shes snying po// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bla na med po'i rdo rje rin po che'i dbang bskur ba chen po dam tshig na mkha'i khams
148a8(rgyud): thams cad du spros pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i mngon par shes pa mngon par byang chub par gyur pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag nyid kyi ngo bo rnam par dag pas chos thams cad rang bzhin
148b1(rgyud): byi ngag pa nam par 'a khyab pa 'o// gzug sa thams cad yong su mthong ba'i ye shes kyis ma khrug shing lus pa med pa'i sems san 'dul ba'i spyod pa mchog dang ldan gang bzhin gshegs pa thams cad do/ 
148b2(rgyud): yod pa'i bka' lung mdzad pas sems can thams cad mnyam pa nyid bla na med pa'i las sna tshogs pa can/ rnam snang mi 'gyur mi bskyed ga rin chen tog de 'od 'dra ba// 'od dpag med pa rgyal ba'i mgon// 
148b3(rgyud): den yod pa ni las kun byed// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi me long lta bu'i ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes la rab tu gnas pa/ de bzhin gshegs
148b4(rgyud): ba thams cad kyi so sor rtog pa'i ye shes gnyi su med pa ba rnyes pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bya bsgrub pa'i ye she sa yang dag par rje su thob pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
148b5(rgyud): ches kyi dbyings rnam par dag pa/ chos thams cad mnyam pa/ nyid kyi yang shes kyi spyod yul// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cadakyi gnyi su med cing mnyam pa nyid dmigs pa'i ye shes yongasu
148b6(rgyud): mthar yod pa la gnas gastong pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / mtshan ma med pa/ smon pa med pa dang / tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi po dag gis sangs rgyas kyi ye shes kyi yul du gyur
