148b7(rgyud): sangs rgyas kyi yul mnyam pa nyid la dmig pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug nyid la byin gyis brlabs nas/ phyogs dang mtshams rnams la rnam par gan so// de nas rdo rje
148b8(rgyud): rnam byung rtsi ba thug gas lam dpa la gnasu byung ba la bka' stsal pa/ 'jams dpo khyod kyims sa rgyas thams cadas rdo rje 'dzin pa rnams spyan bres shig/ khom ldan las kyis ga
149a1(rgyud): ces bka' stsal pa dang / 'jam dpal gnonanu 'khor los bsgyud pa chen po rab tu dbyal ba'i nal ras kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / rjerje 'dzin pa rnams spyan drang ba'i don du rje
149a2(rgyud): rjes grol brdabs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bsdus pa chen po'i snying po 'od chad du brjod pa/ bud+d+ha sa mA dza AHhAHoM hUM badz+ra sa mA dzaHde nas de skad ces stod pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
149a3(rgyud): dang rdo rje 'dzin pa rnams kyis 'jig rten gyi khams me tog gi gzhi'i snying po'i rgyan bkod pa'i rgyud rab 'byam rgya mtsho sprin khyab par mthong ngo // de nas yang 'jam dpal gzhi nur gyur pas/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par
149a4(rgyud): snang mdzang bang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang ldan cig/ sumadzad nas// de bzhin gshegs po thams cad kyi rdo dri gros kyis ye shes yongs tu skyed de gnas thams cad du rnam pa gnas/ 
149a5(rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i rang bzhin rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug gi/ sa de bzhin gshegs po thams cad du bdag nyid byin gyis brlabs
149a6(rgyud): te de bzhin gshegs pa de rnams dang rdo rje 'dzin pa rnams la bka' stsal pa/ kye de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mngon pa'i ye shas kyi 'khor los bsgyur ba chen po'i snying po bdag la yod de ngas bshad
149a7(rgyud): bar byas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyis rlobs shig/ gleng de nas mi bskyod de bzhin gshegs pa dang / rin chen 'byung gnas de bzhin gshegs/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med// don yod
149a8(rgyud): grub pa de bzhin gshegs// gzhan yang de 'onon gshegs pa rnams dang lhan cig de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs kyi dpal gyi be'u la rab tu zhugs te/ zhugs pa tsam gyis de bzhin gshen
149b1(rgyud): pathams cad kyi bde ba chen po thams cad kyi phyir byin gyis babras par mdzad do// de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad zhal bzhir gyur te/ zhal bzhi po rnams las chos kyi dbyings dang rnamakha' khams
149b2(rgyud): mtha' med pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yul chos kyi tshul dbyatas gcig gis ched du brjod pa 'di lta ste/ rab tu dga' ba rnam par dag pa'i gnas gang yin pa de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa'i gnaso// lha
149b3(rgyud): ba rnam par dag pa'i gnas gang yin pa de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa'i gnas// dga' ba rnam par dag pa'i gnas gang yin pa de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa'i gnaso// sred pa rnam par dag
149b4(rgyud): ba'i gnas gang yin pa de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' glan so// 'dod chags rnam par dag pa'i gnas gang yin pa de ni/ 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa'i gnaso// zhe sdang rnam par dag pa'i
149b5(rgyud): gnas gang yin pa de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa'i ga naso// gti mug rnam par dag pa'i gnas gang yin pa de ni 'di lhor byang chub sems dpa'i gnaso// de rgyal rnam par dag
149b6(rgyud): ba'i gnas gang yin pa de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa'i gnaso// mi khom pa rnam par dag pa'i gnas gang yin pa de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa'i gan so// yid sim pa rnam par dag pa'i gan
149b7(rgyud): gang yin pa de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa'i gnas// snang ba rnam par dag pa'i gnas gang yin pa da ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa'i' gnaso// lus rnam par dag pa'i gnas gang yin pa de ni
149b8(rgyud): 'di ltar byang chub sems dopo'i gan so// ga rnam par dag pa'i gnas gang yin pa de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpo'i gnaso// yid rnam par dag pa'i gnas gang yin pa don 'di lta byang chub sem
150a1(rgyud): pa'i gnas// gzugs rnam par dag pa'i gnas gang yin pa de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa'i gnaso// sgra rnam par dag pa'i gnas gang yin pa de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa'i
150a2(rgyud): gnaso// dri rnam par dag pa'i gnas gang yin pa de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa'i gnaso// ro rnam par dag pa'i gnas gang yin pa de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa'i gnaso// reg rnam par dag pa'i
150a3(rgyud): gnas gang yin pa de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa'i gnaso// dngos po thams cad rnam par dag pa'i gnas gang yin pa de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa'i gan so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar chos
150a4(rgyud): thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis rnam por dag pa ste/ chos thams cad rang de bzhin gyis rnam par dag pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi dan pa yongasu dag pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis da skad
150a5(rgyud): cas bka' stsal nas/ chos thams cad kyi dbang phyug gsang sngag/ sa thams cad kyi 'dren pa po// sngags thams cad kyi blo ma ra gyur pa/ thams cad gtsug ter 'khor los bsgyur
150a6(rgyud): bstan pa rdzi ba med pa/ 'khor lo sbyang ba'i snying pos bka' stsal pa/ b+h+rUM 'jam dpal gang la las chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin bsdus pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i snying po 'di lan cig tsam
150a7(rgyud): yang thos na de'i byang chub kyi snying po la thug pa'i bar du sgrib pa thams cad chod pa dang / nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa dang / chos kyi sgrib pa dang / las kyi sgrib pa chen po thams cad nye bar bsags kyang rnam
150a8(rgyud): kyang dmyal ba lo sogs pa ngan song rnams skye bar mi 'gyur ro// gzhan yang sdig pa rnams byas na yang sdug bsngal med cing zad par 'gyur// gang gis 'di 'chang ba dang / nyi ma re re 'don pa
150b1(rgyud): dang ston pa dang / rgyun ma chad par yid la byed pa de ni skye ba 'di nyid la chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid rdo rje'i ting 'dzin so ser theb nas chos thams cad kyi dbang phyug tu 'gyur ro// chos thams cad la dga'
150b2(rgyud): zhing mgu la rab tu dga' ba myong bar 'gyuraro// byang chub sems dpa' chen po skye ba bcu drug na/ de bzhin gshegs pa nyid dam rdo rje 'dzin pa nyid pa thob par 'gyur// hUM/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin ga
150b3(rgyud): pa rnam par snang mdzad kyis sgor yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi zhi ba'i chos nyid mngon par sgrub pa 'di ston par mdzad// rdo rje mnyam pa nyid mngon par bya
150b4(rgyud): chub pa'i byang chub chen po rdo rje lta bur sra ba dang / don gcig pa nyid kyis don mnyam pa nyid mngon par byang chub pa'i byang chub chen po dang / rang bzhin rnam par dag pas chos nyid mnyam pa nyid mngon par
150b5(rgyud): byang chub po'i byang chub chen po dang / rnam par rtog pa dang / rnam par mi rtog pa nyid kyis las thams cad mnyam pa nyid mngon/ bar byang chub chen po ste/ 'jam dpal gang la las chos
150b6(rgyud): kyi gnas bzhi po// 'di thos nas nyan pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / 'don pa dang / sgom par byed ni ji srid byang chub snying po la thug gi bar du sdig pa thams cad yang dag par ldan pa yang sdig pa thams cad
150b7(rgyud): las grol bar 'gyur zhing myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par byang chub par 'gyuraro// oMd de nas yang bcom ldan 'das gdug pa thams cad 'dul ba de bzhin gshegs pa
150b8(rgyud): shAkya thub pas chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid rnam par rgyal bas bsdub po zhes bya ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nges par bsgrub pa bka' stsal pa// 'dod chags smos pa med pa'i phyir 'dod chags
151a1(rgyud): kyi spros pa mad pa'o// na sdang gi spros pa med pa'i phyir// na sdang gi spros pa med pa'o// gti mug gi spros pa med pa'i phyir/ gti mug gi spros pa med pa'o// chos thams cad spros pa med pa'i
151a2(rgyud): phyir chos thams cad smras pa med pa'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa spros pa med pa'i phyir// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phan pa skyes pa med par rig par bya'o// lam dpal gang la la shes rab tu kyi pha rol tu phyin
151a3(rgyud): de'i tshul 'di thos nas 'dzin cing 'don la klog par byed na des 'dul ba'i dbang nye bar bzung nas khams gsum du skyes pa'i sems can rnams bsad par gyur kyang ngan song du 'gro bar mi 'gyur zhing myur
151a4(rgyud): du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs par byang chub par 'gyur// hUM de nas bcom ldan 'das rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pa'i tshe sa nyid brnyes pa'i de bzhin gshegs pas slar yang chas thams
151a5(rgyud): cad rnam par gzigs pa'i dbang phyug ye shes kyi phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di bka 'a stsal pa/ 'jig rten gyi 'dod chags thams cad rnam par dag
151a6(rgyud): pa'i phyir yul thams cad rnam par dag pa nyid yi no// 'jig rten gyi na sdang thams cad rnam par drag po'i phyir sdig pa thams cad rnam par dag pa nyid yi no// 'jig rten gyi chos thams cad rnam par
151a7(rgyud): dag po'i phyir/ chos thams cad rnam par dag pa dri yino// 'jig rten du thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes rnam par dag pa'i phyir/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes rnam par dag pa yino// 'jig rten gyi shes
151a8(rgyud): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa nyid yin// 'jam dpal gang lo las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bos nas nyan par byed 'dzin cing 'ad/ 
151b1(rgyud): la sgom par byed na/ de 'dod pa thams cad kyi nang na gnas kyang pad+ma lta bur 'dod chags kyi rkyen gle bur ba'i dri ma gos par mi 'gyur zhing myur du bla na mang ba yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs
151b2(rgyud): par byang chub par 'gyur// hriHde nas bcom ldan 'das khams gsum thams cad pa'i bdag po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dbang bskur ba'i 'byung gnas ye shes snying po zhes bya ba shes rab kyi pha
151b3(rgyud): rol tu phyin pa'i tshul bka' stsal pa/ dbang bskur byin pas 'jig rten gsum pa thams cad kyi rgyal po yong su thob par 'gyur// den gyi sbyin pas thams cad kyi bsam pa yongasu rtogs par 'gyur// chos kyi
151b4(rgyud): sbyin pas chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid thob par 'gyur ro// zang zing gi sbyin pas thams cad kyi lus dang / ngag dang / yi da bde ba thob par 'gyuraro// tAM de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
151b5(rgyud): paM thams cad kyi ye shes kyi phyag rgya brnyes pa thams cad kyi khu tshur 'chang ba de bzhin gshegs pa rtag pas slar ya nga de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes phyag rgya byin gyis
151b6(rgyud): brlabs pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul bka' stsal pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku'i phyag rgya yongasu gzung bas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad nyid du 'gyur
151b7(rgyud): ba dang / gsung gi phyag rgya yongasu gzung bas chos thams cad thob pa'i don du 'gyur ba dang / thugs kyi phyag rgya yongasu ga zung bas ting nge 'dzin thams cad thob pa'i don du 'gyur ba dang / rdo rje'i byag
151b8(rgyud): rgya yengasu gzung pos sku dang gsung dang thugs thams rdo rje mchog tu grub pa'i don du 'gyur te/ 'jam dpal gang la las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di thos nas 'dzin cing 'di
152a1(rgyud): la 'chad cing sgom par byed na des dngos grub thams cad dang / phun sum tshegs pa thams cad dang ye shes thams cad dang / las thams cad dang sku dang gsung dang thugs
152a2(rgyud): rdo rje sems dpas mchog gi dngos grub thams cad so sor yongasu thob par 'gyur zhing myur du bla na medra pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par byang chub par 'gyur// A
152a3(rgyud): da bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad spros pa med pa'i de bzhin gshegs pas slar yang rdo rje'i yi ge yongasu bsgyur ba zhes bya bi'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu rin po'i tshul bka' stsal pa/ 
152a4(rgyud): rang bzhin mad pa sbyor ba'i phyir chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad mtshan ma med par nye bar 'azung ba'i phyir chos thams cad mtshan mas dben pa dang / smon pa las
152a5(rgyud): bar grol ba'i phyir chos thams cad smon pa med pa dang / shes/ rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yong su dag pa'i phyir/ chos thom/ sa cad rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'o// AM de nas
152a6(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'dus pa'i khong du chud pa de bzhin gshegs pas slar yong 'dus pa chen por 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i
152a7(rgyud): tshul bka' stsal pa/ rdo rje mnyam pa nyid la zhugs nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'dus par 'jug par 'gyur ba dang / don mnyam pa nyid la zhugs nas byang chub sems dpa' chen
152a8(rgyud): bo'i 'dus par 'jug par 'gyur ba dang / chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid la zhugs nas dam pa'i chos kyis 'dus par 'jug par 'gyur ba dang / las mnyam pa nyid la zhugs par 'dus
152b1(rgyud): ba thams cad du 'jug par 'gyuraro// hUM / de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchod pa'i cho ga rgyas pa'i snod de bzhin gshegs pas slar yang de bzhin gshegs pa
152b2(rgyud): thams cad kyi mchod pa dam pa zhes bya ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul bka' stsal pa/ byang chub kyi sems bskrad pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mched pa'i cho ga
152b3(rgyud): rgyas pa dang / sems can gyi khams thams cad yongs skyeb pas dbazhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchod pa'i cho ga rgyas pa dang / chos thams cad yongs bzung bas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
152b4(rgyud): kyi mchod pa'i cho ga rgyas pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'dri ba dang / 'drir 'jug pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / 'don pa dang / yod pa dang / skem pa mngon du 'gro ba'i las kyis de bzhin gshegs
152b5(rgyud): pa thams cad kyi mchod pa'i cho ga rgyas pa'o// oMd de nas bcom ldan 'das gdug pa thams cad 'dul ba'i nus pa de bzhin gshegs pa slar yang sems can thams cad 'dul ba'i ya sha
152b6(rgyud): snying po zhes bya ba/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid pas kho nga mnyam pa nyid dang / sems can 'dul ba nyid pas khro ba 'dul ba zhid dang / sems can
152b7(rgyud): thams cad chos nyid nyid pas khro ba chos nyid nyid dang / sems can thams cad rdo rje nyid pas khro ba rdo rje nyid de de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar sems can thams cad 'dul ba'i byang chub ste/ haHde nas bcom
152b8(rgyud): ldan 'das thams cad mnyam pa nyid la rab tu gnas pa'i de bzhin gshegs pas slar yang chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi mchog ces bya ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di bka' stsal
153a1(rgyud): pa thams cad mnyam pa nyid pas shas kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mnyam pa nyid dang / thams cad kyi don nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i don nyid dang / chos nyid thams cad marnam pa
153a2(rgyud): nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i chos mnyam pa nyid dang // thams cad kyi bye ba nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bya ba nyid du rig par ba'o// hU~M de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thaMd
153a3(rgyud): kyis slar yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad byin gyis rlob pa zhes bya ba'i sheshos rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'od bka' stsal pa/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po bdag nyid thams cad
153a4(rgyud): bas sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi snying po dang / rdo/ rdzi dbang bskur bas sems can thams cad rdo rje'i snying po dang / rin po che thams cad kyi dbang bskur bas sems can thams cad rin
153a5(rgyud): bo che'i phung po dang / ngag thams cad la rab tu 'jug pas sems can thams cad chos kyi snying po dang / las thams cad byad pa'i sbyor bas sems can thams cad las kyi snying po'o// TI de
153a6(rgyud): nas bcom ldan 'das mtha' las 'das shing mu med pa'i chos la mi gnas pa'i bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pas slar yong chos thams cad yongasu mi gnas pas byin gyis brlabs pa
153a7(rgyud): rdo rje nas bya ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di bka' stsal pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mtha' med pa'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mtha' mang ba dang / shes rab
153a8(rgyud): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mu med pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mu med pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa cig pa nyid kyi phyir chos thams cad gcig pa nyid dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu
153b1(rgyud): zin pa yengasu mi gnas pa'i phyir chos thams cad yongasu mi gnas par 'gyur ba ste/ 'jam dpal gang la las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di thos nas nyan par dad 'dzin cing 'don la skem par byed ni dag
153b2(rgyud): cing mthar byed pa'i byang chubo sems dpa'i spyod pa la nges par gnas nas sgrib pa thams cad las rnam par grol bas de bzhin gshegs pa nyid dam rdo rje 'dzin pa nyid myur du thob par 'gyuraro// b+h+yo de nas bcom
153b3(rgyud): ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i chos nyid brnyas pa/ chos thams cad spros pa med pas slar yang bde ba chen po rdo rje don yod pas dam tshig ces bya ba rje
153b4(rgyud): rje chos mnyam pa nyid shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo dam pa thog ma dang ba ma dang / dbus las grol ba pa'i mchog 'di bka'i stsal pa/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi 'dod chags
153b5(rgyud): chen po mchog tu grub pas bde ba chen po mchog tu grub par 'gyur ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams/ kyis bde ba chen po mchog tu grub pas de bzhin gshegs pa
153b6(rgyud): thams cad kyi byang chub chen po mchog tu grub par 'gyur/ ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi de bzhin gshe gas pa thams cad kyi byang chub mchog tu grub pas bdud sde chen po
153b7(rgyud): rab tu 'joms pa mchog tu grub par 'gyur ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'o chen po rnams kyi bdud sde chen po rab tu 'joms pa mchog tu grub pas 'jig rten gsum po mtha' dag gis dbang phyug
153b8(rgyud): mchog tu grub par 'gyur ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi 'jig rten gsum mtha' dag gi dbang phyug mchog tu grub pas ma lus shing lus pa med pa'i sems can gyi khams/ 
154a1(rgyud): yongasu skyob pa'i sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba'i mchog shin tu bde ba chen po mchog tu grub par 'gyur te/ sr-i/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ji srid 'khor ba'i gnasu ni// 
154a2(rgyud): mkhas pa mchog rnams gnas gyur pa// de srid mnyam med sems can de na// ma ngan mi 'da' byed par nus// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i thabs// ye shos byin gyis brlabs kyis 'grug/ 
154a3(rgyud): las ni thams cad rnam dag pas/ srid pa dag par 'gyur phyir ro// chags sogs rab ldan 'jog rten no// kun nas srid par sdig byed po/ de dag rnam par spyang don du//  rnams 'dod chags chen po
154a4(rgyud): 'dzin// ji ltar pad+ma legs dmar ba// dmar po'i skyon gyis ma go sa ltar// bag chags skyon gyis srid pa ru ka rtag tu 'gro ba nags mi 'gyur// 'dod chags chen po rnam dag pa// bde ba chen
154a5(rgyud): bo nor chen po// khams gsum dbang phyug thob na so// de dag de na ni brtan par byed// hoH'jam dpal gang la las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul gyi sgo'i chos kyi rnam grangs
154a6(rgyud): 'di nyid re bzhin du nang par langs te/ gang 'don pa dang / nyan pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / brjod par byed na des bde dang / yid bde ba thams cad thob par 'gyur zhing bde ba chen po rdo rje don yod pa'i dam tshig
154a7(rgyud): gi dngos grub mchog tu gyur pa skye ba 'di nyid la thob par 'gyuraro// hUM de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jam dpal gzhonur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal nyi shu rtsa lnga po 'di
154a8(rgyud): ngag ni nges par shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul gyi sgos ste/ 'di lta ste/ oM na maHsa rbabu d+hu bo d+hi satwA nAM oM ba d+ha tsit+ta badz+ra/ oM sa man+ta b+ha drarba r+ye d+hi/ oM tsin ma Ni oM a ni re d+ha/ oM dzA tISh+Tha
154b1(rgyud): thAd e dzA di ba raM wa ra ta ma hA rA gA d+ha ma tA/ oM dIr+ya ka wa tsa/ oM sarba gA mi ni/ oM badz+ra rbi D+haHka wa tsi ta hUM phaT/ oM sarba ta thA ga te/ oM swa b+ha bi shud+d+he/ oM pradz+nyA pA ra mi tA dz+nyA na bi shud+d+he/ oM kar+m+ma bi sho d+ha na hU~M/ oM na Tu
154b2(rgyud): b+ha badz+ri hU ngag oM kar+m+ma rA ga/ oM badz+ra hU badz+re/ oM sarba d+harma tI/ oM hrIHoM a kA ro mu khe/ oM pradz+nyA dza oM hAHmaM hUM oM aM/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta kA ya a gri oM sarba ta thA ga ta kA ya a gre/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta thA/ 
154b3(rgyud): badz+raHoM sarba ta thA ga ta tsit+ta badz+ra AHoM s+pho Ta ya sarba A pa ya big+h+nAM ni pra mok+Sha ya sarba aM pa ya ga taM b+h+yaHsarba sa ma ya badz+ra hUM phaT/ sdig pa dang bral ba'i phyag rgya dang sngags// da brjod pa tsam gyis
154b4(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba mchog gi dngos grub rdo rje 'dzin pa 'am/ da de bzhin gshegs pa nyid du 'gyur// 'jam dpal 'di ni dge ba'i rtsa ba ma bskrun pa'i sems can
154b5(rgyud): rnams kyi rnal du grag par mi 'gyur zhing dag pa'i rtsa ba ma bskrun pa'i sems can gyis dri ba dang / bklag pa dang / rjod pa dang / rim gyi bya ba dang / bla mar bya ba dang / rjed por bya ba dang / mchod
154b6(rgyud): par bya bar yang nus pa ma yin// gzhan du gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul gyi sgo'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di chung ngu na/ yi ge gcig yang thos nas// sems can de sangs rgyas mang
154b7(rgyud): pe la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskrun par rig par ba na slar yang mtha' dag ma lasmai par rdzogs pa lta ci smos/ 'jam dpal sems can gang la la gang ga'i klung gi bye ma brgyad cu skad kyi sangs rgyas phye
154b8(rgyud): ba khrig la phyag byas/ bla mar byas// dra par byas/ mchod par byas na des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di nyan par nus// sa'i khams gang na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di spyod pa de mchod
155a1(rgyud): / nAdu stsu pa phyag bya ba'i ga // gang rgyas kyi rnam grus 'di yid la bzu ba 'am/ glegs pan du bris par gyud na da bskal pa bye sa khrag khrig bcu steng dang ba snye
155a2(rgyud): dran par myed/ de la bdu sdig to can gyis par du migacod de/ rgyal po chen po bzhi po rnams dang gzhan yang lha rnams kyi bzhin rjesu 'drangs te/ de la drung ba dang slob pa nga sbed pa myed par ladu
155a3(rgyud): ring chul mi yinapas sa mi 'thung nas pardzu su las sa sa sa pa 'ag ma su ma ma gyig she ga'i sangs 'ad do ma
155a4(rgyud): ma la 'di la dza dzin mo ma pa 'dzin she rab kyi log tu/ byin pa'i tshul gyi rnam rjes kyi rnam // de nas ldan las rdo rnal 'a ste dang byug rten pos
155a5(rgyud): snying po thams cad kyi rgyan theg pa chen po mngon par rtogs pa/ de bzhin ga/ shogs pa thams cad kyi mchog tu gsang ba chen po mtshe ga tu gsang ba'i dam tshig rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug
155a6(rgyud): dam pa 'khor los bsgyur ba chen po bzhis yongasu bskor ba rdo rje snying po rgyan ces bya ba'i snying po 'di byung // mtshan nyid gcig pa'i phyir chos thams cad gdod ma nas ma skyes pa'o// namakha' mnyam
155a7(rgyud): ba'i phyir chos thams cad stong pa nyid// spros pa thams cad spangs pa'i phyir chos thams cad gdod ma nas rnam par dag pa'o// thams cad kyi sems gsal ba'i mtshan nyid kyi phyir chos thams
155a8(rgyud): cad chos kyi dbyings yongasu rgyas pa'o// AHb+h+rUM trAM hrIH/ hUM de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje yi ge'i tshig 'di brjod pa tsam gyis chos kyi dbyings kyi mthas klas sangs rgyas kyi yul/ 
155b1(rgyud): / thams cad shin tu gsal bas snang bar gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang thabs gcig tu de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi slar yang bsdu bas byon nas/ de
155b2(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor chen po'i bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ 'jam dpa' gno nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs
155b3(rgyud): ba thams cad kyi rdo rje snying po rgyan zhes bya ba bshad par byas nyon cig/ da legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig bshad par bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad chen pos
155b4(rgyud): 'jam dpal gzho nur gyur pa la bka' sprul pa/ 'jam dpal khod kyang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi shes rab ya shes la zhugs la/ de bzhini gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po
155b5(rgyud): la rdo rje'i byin gyis brlabs byon shig/ de nas yang 'jam dpal gau/ zhon nur gyur pas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis gsol ba bta ba'i tshig thos nas de bzhin
155b6(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs khar zhugs te/ bin gyis brlabs nas de las 'thon te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi spyan sngar rnam par gan so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis
155b7(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig 'byung gnas/ rdo rje snying po'i rgyan byin gyis rlob pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas chos kyi dbyings kyi rdo rje chen po snying de'i rgyun
155b8(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po bka' stsal pa/ de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// dkyil 'khor chen po mchog gyur pa/ rdo rje snying po gsang chen po// de bzhin
156a1(rgyud): gshegs pa kun ldan dag/ rdo rje snying po dang mtshungs pa// khams rnams thams cad rnam par sprug/ sangs rgyas kun gyi bdud rtsi dang // gzhan yang bcud len dang mtshungs pa/ de bzhin
156a2(rgyud): gshegs pa kun gyi gsang // rdo rje kun gyi rang bzhin grong gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa// rta babs bzhis ni rnam par mdzad// thig pa ni dang ni yang dag ldan// dar dang me tog chun pos spras/ grwa yaM cha ni bad
156a3(rgyud): dang sgo 'gram dang ni mtshams rnamasu// rdo rje rin chen rnams kyis spras// nang gi dkyil 'khor thig gdab bya// de yi pha rol tu bya ba// dkyil 'khor yang ni rnam pa bdun/ sgo khyud du ni rin chen ni// mchog
156a4(rgyud): turma dbyung bzhag par bya// rdo rje srad bu dag dang ldan// ka ba brgyad kyis nye bar rgyan// rdo rje ka ba'i mdun banag pa// bum pa la sogs dag gis smras// tshad mdzes pa yi snying po che// 
156a5(rgyud): rdo rje 'khor lo sogs pas rgyan/ ra rab chen po ni// ri bo gta/ sa kyi phyi rol du// sngags pas kun nas yongs bskor ba/ khyad par ji bzhin bri bar bya// nang gi dkyil 'khor dag ni
156a6(rgyud): rnam bzhir ba// gru bzhi pa dang zlum po dang // gru gsum rnam pa las byung dang // zla ba byed pa'i tshul 'dra ba// dkyil 'khor yang ni bzhi pa'o// de yi nang gi cha la ni// pad+ma lo ma brgyad pa bri// de ltar shes
156a7(rgyud): rab chen po yi// slob dpon rdo rje 'byung bas bri// de yi rjes lha rnams kyi// go rims ji bzhin bri bar bya// gdugs dkar rgyal ba'i gtsug tor dang // gzi brjid dra ba rnam par rgyab// dam tshig
156a8(rgyud): mchog gi rnam pa bzhi// slar yang 'dab ma'i mtsham su / rdo rje shugs kyis song nas ni// dkyil khor dag ni po ru// mi bskyod la sogs rnam pa bzhi// rdo rje rnal 'byor dbang phyug bri/ mi
156b1(rgyud): bskyong yi dkyil 'khor ni// zla 'od lta bu'i mdog tu bya// dang ni rdo rje sems dpa' sogs// kun mchog sa yi dbang phyug rnams// rdo rje slob dpon stobs po chag shes rab chen pos dgod par bya// 
156b2(rgyud): rdo rje rin chen sogs gang ba'o// rin chen 'byung gnas dkyil 'khor yin// rdo rje chos sogs gsang ba yi// dkyil 'khor tshe dpag med pa'i 'od// rdo rje las la sogs ldan pa// don yod gru
156b3(rgyud): nga'i dkyil 'kho'o// rdo rje shugs kyis song nas ni// dkyil 'khor gsum pa bri bar bya// rnam gzigs la sogs sangs rgyas rnams// dkyil 'khor der ni bri ba yin// rdo rje snying po rgyal po che// khab
156b4(rgyud): bdag gsang ba'i dbang phyug gtse// 'dod pa'i don kun grub pa'i phyir// 'ad pa yis ni bri bar bya// blo grotso rgya mtsho mi zad blo// byams pa bdag nyid chen po dang / na mkha'i snying po grags chen po/ 
156b5(rgyud): kun su 'bang po nyid dag drang // phyag na rdo rje bdag nyid tshe// kun na sa 'bar bas 'khrigs pa'i 'og/ 'jam pa'i dngas ni rigs kyi mchog// sangs rgyas sras padang dri ma mang / sgrib
156b6(rgyud): pa thams cad nges par sel// de nang sa yi snying po mcho'o// na mkha' mdzod ni mdzod dam pa// lag na rin chen bla na med// mi phan pa kun 'joms pa ni// dra ba can gyi 'od ces bya// dpa' bo 'di
156b7(rgyud): dag gsang ba che// kyil 'khor 'di dag bri bar bya// 'khor lo de ni dor nas ni// blo gros ldan pas phyir song ste// shar du sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// phyag rgya go rims bzhin du dgod// 'khor lo
156b8(rgyud): mdzes pa'i dge lags ris// rdo rje dpal ba'u pad ces bya// gtsug tor rnam pa sna tshogs pa/ rdo rje bad+mas rnam par rgyan// lhung zad dang ni mkhar posil dang / chos gos kyang ni khyad par du/ 
157a1(rgyud): 'di dag shAkya sa ga yi// sangs rgyas kun gyis rab tu gsungs// gang zhig dngos grub mchog 'dod pas// de rnams blo ldan brtan par bri// byang du 'jig rten dbang phyug go// 
157a2(rgyud): phyag ma'i tshogs chog de na ta/ d+ma rung ba la dang ni/ hUM gas lpags pa'i ga yang gan dang / drug gu'i shing rnam khas pa yes/ sa rgyas pordo brI ba bya/  pa sa sbyi
157a3(rgyud): no sa byag na rdo rje bdag nyid che// slob ringan bdag nyid chen po ya~M/ khyog rgyal dngas drib bya rje badz+ra sha dA ni/ dril chub tu mdzes pa dang / phyog sus ni bo jo/ byug pa rdo rjes ma
157a4(rgyud): ba dang / lcags sgeg dang ni rwa gsum yang / 'di dag dpa' bo'i phyag rgya'o// dkyil 'khor nub du song nas mi// 'jam pa'i dbyangs ni blo gros kyi/ grasang ba'i chos ni dam pa'i mchog ldan 'grus chen po
157a5(rgyud): phyag rgya bri// ud pal 'khor lo rdo rje dang // ral gri yang ni khyad par du// thod ba dang ni dgra sta dang // rma ba dang ni seng ge nyid// phyog rgya 'di rnams brtson 'grus che// mkhas pa yis ni dgod par bya// 
157a6(rgyud): 'khor lo'i grwa ni legs gnas par// rdo rje sgeg mo lo sogs bri/ phyi yi 'khor lo'i grwa ru ni/ rdo rje bdug pa zhes bya sogs// bdag nyid chen po ladapa yos// mchod pa 'di dag bri bar bka b+hi yi dkyil
157a7(rgyud): 'khor gru rnams// zugs kyi rdo rje zhes bya sogs// gzugs sgra de bzhin dri dang ni// khyad par du ni ro dang yang // regau dang chos kyi dgyis dang ni// mkhas pa yis ni dgod par bya// sgri sa nong no thams ca
157a8(rgyud): du bsgo skyong ba ni dgod par bya// de bzhin dkyil 'khor gzhan pa ru// rdo rje shugs kyis song nas ni// go rims bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi// sum rnams 'thad pas bri bar bya// nomakha'i spyan zhes bya ba ni/ 
157b1(rgyud): sangs rgyas spyan nas bya ba dang // shes rar pha rol yin ma dang // ngag rgya kun dang yang dag ldan/ ji srid de bzhin gshegs rig ma/ thams cad shar du dged par bya// de nas blo gres ldan pa yi// byang gi phyogasu
157b2(rgyud): song nas ni// gos dkar las gnas sgrol ma che// khro gnyer can dang grags 'dzin ma// khad par du ni dpal bdun dang // mngar bdun dang ni dpangs can ma// de la sogs pa'i lha mo rnams// bran dang bran mer yang
157b3(rgyud): ngag ldan// de bzhin de nya rtse// gsang ba'i phyag rgya lhan cig bri// rdo rje shugs kyi song ba nau// lho yi phyogasu rab na la// mA ma ki dang lcagaso sgrog dang // khab rtse rdo rje mtshan mchog dang // de ltar bris nas blo ldan
157b4(rgyud): gyisas nub kyi begasu song nas ni// der ni phyin nas shes ldan gyis// sgra gcan stobs chan bri bar ba// de bzhin 'dam bu mnga' rgyu dang // lha mo zla ba'i 'od zer 'dra// lha mo nye ba'i skra can ma// 'bad pa yis ni hri
157b5(rgyud): da zhong kyi bla gras dang / grogs tu lde dang ldan/ kA sa~M N+Da b+ha / tha ma tu rtse zhes migs rna mthams du// de byang rnam pa gra 'an rgyas
157b6(rgyud): bachus ma/ de mas pa mardus sa ma ga rje galas sa /  m+b+hal nganas rje ldan tshul la pas 'das pa 'i se // ga yan bamasasas/ 
157b7(rgyud): bamamam par gzhag pa yas// khre chen gzhan gyis mi thu pa// de bzhi mi ga la zhes bya dang // khams gsum rnam rgyal srung po ni/ sa par bdag 'acu brag lnga yi'i bskor// de lta dris nas sngags
157b8(rgyud): ngal desas kyang ga sa / ma grin grib chen po dang / gangasa'i rgyu khyod ba nga// gnyi mam pa sgrim gzo cwo ldan chen 'grus che pa masems cadang/ 
158a1(rgyud): pamo ste gis yongs bskor bar// 'jig rten mgon gyis bka' stsal to// de nas rdzogs ldan pa yas// lho yi phyogs su song nas ni// de ni byin te 'artson chen po// khro ba chen po
158a2(rgyud): stobs po che// rdo rje mtshan pas legs mtshan pa/ shes rab chen pos dgod par ga/ khro ba zla ba'i thog le dang // de bzhin khro chen rdo rje 'chang // sgra gcan khre bo stengs pa cha// khre bre bdud rtsi 'khyil pa dang / 
158a3(rgyud): rjes 'ogs 'og dang // de bzhin 'jigs pa'i mig can dang / rkang pas bsnan pa rdo rje mchog// gsang dang gra gsang rjes 'gro dang // bran dang po nya khro bo ni// stong phrag gsum dang rnyed kyis bskor// de ltar
158a4(rgyud): bris nas blo ldan gyis gdub kyi phyog su phyin nas ni// ni song ste brtson chen po// gshin rje mthar byed ces bya ba// gdong gu kha la lag drug pa// khri ba yo ge 'dun zhes bgyi// khro ba'i ga
158a5(rgyud): bo stong phrag ni// bdun dag gis ni yongs bskor ba'o// dkyil 'khor chan thams cad du// khro bo gtum po thams cad br-i// de nas blo ldan 'ongs nasu// rang rgyal rgyal ba thams cad kyi// dkyil
158a6(rgyud): 'khor kun tu bri bar bye// de nas sngags pa 'ongs nas ni// rgyal ba nyan thos dri bar bya// de yaM phyir tshangs sogs lha// dkyil 'khor kun tu rnam par bri// dbang phyug cha dang khab 'jug// zla ba nyi ma zhes bya dang / 
158a7(rgyud): gza' brgyad dang ni 'jog rten skyong // rgyal chen rigs ni bzhi po dang / de bzhin sum cu rtsa gsum dang // mtha' bral rnams dang dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dragar gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang / tshangs pa mdun
158a8(rgyud): na 'den pa rnams// tshangs chen rnams dang // 'od chung rnams dang / tshad med 'od rnams dang / 'od gsal rnams dang / dge chung rnams dang / tshad med dag rnams dang / dge rgyas rnams dang / sprin med rnam
158b1(rgyud): / dang bsod nams skyes rnams dang / 'bras bu che ba rnams dang khri che ba rnams dang / mi gdung ba rnams dang / gya nam sdang ba rnams dang / shin tu mthong ba rnams dang / 'og min rnams dang / dag pa'i gnas
158b2(rgyud): rnams dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi mtsham su bged par bya'o// de nas dbang ldan du dbang ldan dang / dbang por dbang po dang / mer ma'i lha dang / gshin rjer gshin rje dang / bden bral du bden dral dang / chung chu lnga
158b3(rgyud): dang rlung du rlung lha dang / lus ngan du lus ngan rnams dang / byi rol gyi shar phyog su khro bo gzhan gyis mi thub pa zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya chen po dged par bya// lhor rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi spun gyi phyag rgya chen po dge
158b4(rgyud): par bya'o/ nub du khro bo'i rgyal po chen po gshin rjeg da kyi phyag rgya chen po dgod par bya'o// byang du rta mgrin gyi phyag rgya che na po rnam par dgod par bya'o// phyi rol du ra ba dag gi nang du rgya mtsho chen
158b5(rgyud): be bdun dgeng per bya'o// de'i phyi rol du 'gro ba lnga po bzhag par bya'o// de lta bu'i gru bzhi pa// sgo bzhi pa dkyil 'a khor chen po dang dang me tog gi chun po dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan
158b6(rgyud): dad ba dan sbrang gadra ba dang / dra ba phyed pas klubs gang lta bu'i dkyil 'khor chen po bris la bsgom par bya'o// de bzhin du dbusu ri'i rgyal po lhun po'i tshad du dpag tshad brgya stong phrag du mar rgyas pa de'i steng du
158b7(rgyud): rdo rje seng ge'i khri la bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnam par bsams nas nye bar spyod pa thams cad kyis tshogs mchod la mnyes par byas te/ mchod pa dang dbang bskur ba dang / byin gyis brlabs
158b8(rgyud): pas spro ba dang / bsdu ba la sogs pa byas pas na mkha'i gnas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya chen po rnam par bsam nas spyan drangs te bcug la bcings nas dam tshig la rnam par bzhag ste/ 
159a1(rgyud): de bzhin du/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang rdo rje sems dpa'i sku mdog nyid rnam par snang mdzad yin no snyam du skams pa sgom par bya'o// de nas snying rje dang babs pa'i mig gis
159a2(rgyud): phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' las 'das pa thams cad khyab pa'i rgya mtsho'i sprin de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku'i sprin gyis kun nas bkang ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rim pa mchog
159a3(rgyud): gos rdo rje sems dpa' hUM mdzad kyi phyag rgya rang gi lus la zhugs nas phyogs thams cad hUM gi yi ge'i sgra brjod cing bsnun pa bzhis rel ba dang bcas pas phag byas la bzlas pa bas te/ dam tshig
159a4(rgyud): gri phyag rgya bcings la/ cho ga bzhin du rdo rje sleb dpon gyis bkug nas bcug snga bcings la dam tshig la bzhag pa bas nas se gol gyi sbyor ba dang kun nas 'bebs pa'i phyag rgyas bdag nyid la dbab
159a5(rgyud): sdang snying po 'di bzhis rol pa dang bcas/ de bzhin gshegs pa tham sa cad dang bdag mtshungs snyam du bsom par bya'o// de la dri'i snying po bzhi po ni/ a A/ oM aH/ bdag byin gyis bzlas
159a6(rgyud): ba la sogs pa byas nas brjod la/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / bdag mtshungs pa yin no zhes nga rgyal bskyed// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje lcags kyu'i se gol gtogs nas
159a7(rgyud): snying po 'dis sangs rgyas thams cad spyan drang byar bya'o// de la snying ba ni 'di yin te/ d+hI tra~M hrIHhUM/ badz+ra sa mA dzaHa~M gats+tsha a gar+b+ha nu sarba ta thA ga ta sa thai be d+hi satwa pa ri pro ta pra t+ye ka ri he ha swAhA/ 
159a8(rgyud): oM badz+ra sa mA dzaHA gats+tsha A gats+tsha sarba ta thA gau ta badz+ra yo ga~M sha ra sa twa na yaHsa~M hA a haHa haHde nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang bcas
159b1(rgyud): ba dkyil 'khor thams cad yongasu rdzogs pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs dang rgyud dang / gzungs rnams dang lhan cig dkyil 'khor du 'dus nas ben par 'gyur ro// de nas de bzhin gshags
159b2(rgyud): ba thams cad kyi phyag rgya chen po bdag nyid rnam par bsgoms nas ming brgya rtsa brgyad pa gton la che ga ji lta ba bzhin du mchod pa byas nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad brtan par byas nas sgo bzhi po
159b3(rgyud): rnams kyis rdo rje lcogs kyu la sogs pa las byas te/ las chen po dam pa'i phyag rgyas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad gzhug par byas te/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta/ su ra ta badz+ra bodz+ra satwa dzaHsgrub
159b4(rgyud): a d+hi tiSh+ThAn+tu/ sarba ta thA ga ta ma hA maN+Da laM/ de nas gsang ba'i mchod pa l-i sogs pa rnams kyis mchod nas/ de bzhin gshegs ba thams cad la gsol ba gdab par bya ste/ sangs rgyas
159b5(rgyud): dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la bdag gsel ba 'dabs lags kyis mchod nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bdag la byin gyis brlab du gsol/ sems can
159b6(rgyud): thams cad kyi don mdzad du gsel// bdag la dngos grub thams cad sprul du gsol/ ji ltar bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchod pa rab 'bom rgya mtsho'i sprin rnams kyis ches kyi
159b7(rgyud): dbyangs kyi mthas klas pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yul kun nas bkang ste/ byin gyis brlab par bgyi'o// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bka' yongasu rdzogs par bgyi'o// de nas 'dir
159b8(rgyud): rdo rje snying po'i rgyan chos kyi dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor du slob ma gzhug pa'i cho ga rgyas par 'gyur ba ni de nas ges dmar po phrag par gzar te de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la sngags 'das
160a1(rgyud): phyag 'tshal ba'i thal mo sbyar nas sngags 'dis sman gsan dpa' par bya ste/ sa ma ya he/ sa ma ya s+t+wa~M/ sa ma ya badz+ra a d+hiSh+ThA na mad ku ru m+b+ha/ sarba ta thA ga ta/ sa ya ye Shu ma
160a2(rgyud): a d+hi tiSh+Thanu sa rbabud+d+ha mA br-i be sha yan+ta/ sarba ta thA ga ta badz+ra mut+tA la a laM kA re ma hA badz+ra maN+Da le br-i ta ba la yan+tu mAM sU dzA me pra yats+tshen+da/ de nas sleb dpon gyis do'i thal so me tog dkar po'i phreng ba sngag
160a3(rgyud): 'dis btags nas nang du ma tog bani dang / ser me'i rdza mor ma tog re re bcug la de nas sngags 'di brjod cing gzugs par bya'o// hU~M d+haM hr-i kr-i shrI d+hU baHkaHkro bAM shr-i dzA haM/ aM a d+hi tiSh+Tha mAM/ sarba ta
160a4(rgyud): ga ta sa ma ya satwa pra bi shA mi/ de nas slob dpon gyis de'i gdong g.yogs bcings la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mi ngan las 'das pa'i grong khyer chos kyi dbyings rnam pa'i
160a5(rgyud): khams rab tu khab pa'i sbyor bas de bcug la sngags 'dis ma tog gtor bar bya'o// sngags ni/ sa ma ye haM sa ma ya s+t+waM sau ma ya hUM/ gang la ma teg rnams lhung po de nyid da'i lngar
160a6(rgyud): bin par ba'o// de nas cho ga bzhin du sngags 'dis dbab par bya'o// sa ma yo haM sa ma ya~M s+t+waM/ sa ma ya hUM/ na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHte Ta ta gad+ha ma d+ha ma/ badz+ra hUM/ bi kr-i ta bi d+yu/ dz+dzi hA dud dAn+ta da ma ka/ ha si ta
160a7(rgyud): los+pho nga ro/ ka ha ka ha/ su lu tsu lu/ mu ny+tsa mu ny+tsa/ aT+Ta T+Ta ha sa da ra ba~M da ra/ badz+ra badz+ra/ badz+re ga ta/ badz+ra nai tra/ badz+ra shwe tra/ badz+ra g+hA Na/ badz+ra daMSh+Ta kiny+tsi rA ya si pra bi sha badz+ra bA Ni hr-i da ya mA bi me ba~M sha g+ha r+Na g+hur+Na bA
160a8(rgyud): dUr+Nag+hud+b+ha pa ya b+hud+b+ha pa ya/ b+h+ra ma ya b+h+ra ma ya/ pA ta ya mo Ta ya/ a ba sha ya/ dza lA dza lpA ya/ la g+ha lag+h+na/ sarba ta thA ga te dzA ka ri pra ba ra/ d+har+m+ma lab+ta/ bi dza ya he he badz+ra dza kA ra hUM kr-i ta swA hA/ dbab pa'i dam
160b1(rgyud): tshig gong da ltar babs nas kyi khyed kyis gang dge ba'am mi dag kha mthong ngam zhes 'dri'o// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa 'am/ rdo rje 'dzin pa 'am/ dag pa 'am/ mi dag pa bdag gis 'di lta bu mthong ngo nas sna
160b2(rgyud): bar 'gyuraro// de nas slob dben gyis de thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rdo rje'i rang bzhin du yongasu bzhag la mig bcings pa bgrel la dbang bskur ba'i don du dkyil 'khor grwa bani pa bas
160b3(rgyud): la de'i dbusu kha dog thams cad kyis pad+ma chen po mdab ma brgyad pa yid du 'ong ba 'am seng ge'i khri rang nyid kyis bris te/ de nas de la dang gyi bgo ba dang / me tig dang / 'dug pa la sogs pa rnams
160b4(rgyud): kyis mchod la khad par du gzugs dang / sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang ra ka dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / dung dang / rdza rnga dang / rnga bo che dang / dud la sogs pa dang / gar dang klu
160b5(rgyud): rnams kyis legs par mchod nas cod pan lnga'i dbang bskur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje slob dpon gyi go 'phang la rab tu bzhag pa rigs dang rdzas 'thun pa'i ming du byas nas
160b6(rgyud): sngags 'dis bin gyis brlabs par bya ste/ oM sarba ta thA ga te badzoSh+NI Sha a b+hi Shin+d+ra oM badz+ra satwa a b+hi Shin+da/ oM badz+ra rat+na a bi Shiny+tsa/ oM badz+ra pad+ma a b+hi Shiny+tsa/ oM badz+ra badz+ra a b+hi Shiny+tsa/ spyi ba~M dang / dngul
160b7(rgyud): ba dang mgrin po dang / snying kha dang / lci ba dang / rkang pa nas rdzi ngar gyi bar du/ yi gre'i phyag rgya bkod la / rang gi lha'i gzugs kyis sbyor bas byin gyis brlab par bya'o// de nas rdo rje'i tshig rnams bsla
160b8(rgyud): par byas te/ de la rdo rje'i gnas tshigs rnams ni 'di dag ste/ rang bzhin gyis dbyer med pa'i phyir rang gi lus rdo rje sems dpa'i gnas te/ rdo rje'i gnas li sa lta ba'i thabs po thams cad nges
161a1(rgyud): par 'joms par 'gyuraro// ma rig pa rdo rje'i gnas kyi rig pa la 'jug pa ste/ rdo rje'i gnas 'dis dmigs pa'i dngos po yongasu shes pa la 'jug par 'gyuraro// hUM mngon par
161a2(rgyud): 'du byed pa'i phyi mtshams med pa'i mtha' rdo rje'i gnas 'dis lta ba thams cad du gyur pa'i sems nges par rig par 'gyur// mo 'dod chags kyi mtha' zhi ba'i phyir 'dod chags dang bral ba'i mtha
161a3(rgyud): rdo rje gnas 'dod chags pa dang bral bar 'gyuraro// ha zhe sdang gis mtha' ni ba'i phyir byams pa'i mtha'i rdo rje'i gnas te/ rdo rje'i gnas 'dis skyon thams cad kun tu 'dral bar 'gyur// me gti mug
161a4(rgyud): gri mtha' zhi ba'i phyir shes rab kyi sgron ma rdo rje'i muHste/ rdo rje'i mtha' 'dis mun pa bsal bar byed par 'gyur/ ra~M se mas can thams cad sems can gcig pa ste/ rdo rje'i gnas 'dis
161a5(rgyud): sems can mnyamo pa nyid la 'jug pa'i don dang sems can gyi rang bzhin rtogs pa'i don du 'gyuraro// hrI sems ca/ na thams cad sems can gcig pa ste/ rdo rje'i gnas 'dis sems
161a6(rgyud): can nges pa la 'jug pa'i don dang / sems rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba mngon par rtogs pa'i don du 'gyuraro// a sangs rgyas thams cad sangs rgyas gcig pa ste/ rdo rje'i gnas 'dis de bzhin
161a7(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi rjesu 'jug pa'i don dang / mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes rjesu rtogs pa'i don du 'gyuraro// oM/ chos thams cad sangs rgyas kyi chos rdo rje'i gnas 'dis thams cad mkhan
161a8(rgyud): ba'i ye shes rjes rtogs par 'jug pa'i don dang / rdo rje lta bu'i ting 'dzin rjesu rtogs pa'i don du 'gyuraro// ang bdud kyi las thams cad sangs rgyas kyi chos te/ rdo rje'i gnas 'dis las bod
161b1(rgyud): rjesu rtogs pa la 'jug pa'i don dang / las thams cad las yongasu 'das pa'i don du 'gyuraro// hUM ngag thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang sku/ rdo rje'i gnas 'dis sgra ji bzhin pa thams cad rjesu rtogs
161b2(rgyud): ba la 'jug pa'i don dang / brjod pa las 'das pa'i chos rjesu rtogs pa'i don du 'gyur// bang chos thams cad ma skyes pa ste/ rdo rje'i gnas 'dis 'chi 'pho med pa la 'jug pa'i don dang / skye ba dang
161b3(rgyud): rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba'i lam las 'da' ba'i don du 'gyur/ mid chos thams cad ma byung ba ste/ rdo rje'i gnas 'dis 'gog pa med pa la 'jug pa'i don dang / chos thams cad 'gog pa medo pa'i
161b4(rgyud): don du 'gyuraro// kha 'di la rnam gnas rnal 'byor pa// bdag gi de nyid rab rtogs te/ bdag gis de nyid rang brtags nas// sang sa rgyas kun mtshungs mnyam med 'gyuraro// de la sogs pa'i dngos
161b5(rgyud): grub thams cad dang // phun sum tshegs pa thams cad dang // gter thams cad dang // 'khor lo thams cad dang / rdo rje thams cad dang / ral gri dang / yid bzhin nor bu dang / dngul chu dang / bcud lan
161b6(rgyud): rnams dang / gyen du 'gro ba dang / rkang 'og dang / mi snang ba dang / rig pa 'dzin pa dang / 'khor los bsgyur ba nyid dang / brgya byin nyid dang / tshangs pa dang // khyab 'jug dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / byang chub sems
161b7(rgyud): dpa'i sa rnams des myur du 'grub par 'gyuraro// hUM yid ni rtse gcig gyur pa yi// sangs rgyas rjes dran bsgoms nas ni// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// sangs rgyas sku gzugs bsgom
161b8(rgyud): par byad / sbyor ba de yi bka' drin gyis// sangs rgyas kun mtshungs mnyam med 'gyur// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// 'od kyi dkyil 'khor rab gsal ba'i// kun tu bzang po phyag rgya che/ 
162a1(rgyud): lags par mnyam par gzhag pas skem// le ni phyed kyi skyer ba yis// kun tu bzang po 'dra bar 'gyuraro// rdo rje rin chen phyag rgya che// lags par mnyam par gzhag par sgom// rgyal
162a2(rgyud): be'i dbang bskur nyid dam na// yang nadabang phyug thob par 'gyur// rdo rje ches kyi phyag rgya che// de nas rang gis brtan por skem// 'jig rten kun gyi dang phyug kyang // thob na dedes grub gzhan ci spros// rdo rje las kyi phyag
162a3(rgyud): rgya gang // de bzhini nyid kyi 'od gsal ba// rdo rje'i sbyor bas de bsgoms pas// rdo rje'i rnal 'byor brtan por 'gyur// de lta bu'i byang chub kyi sems kyi mchog sgom pa phyag rgya chen po'i ye shes nyid yin no// 
162a4(rgyud): 'khor lo sgyur ba'i phyag rgya che// legs par mnyam par ga/ zhag pas sgom// phyag rgya kun gyi bdag nyid kyis/ dam pa'i don nyid thob par 'gyur// gzi ging+ga dra ba phyag rgya che// dam pa'i don du bsgom par bya/ 
162a5(rgyud): gsang ba'i rgyal po thob 'gyur na// ngos grub gzhan lta/ ci zhig spes// gdugs dkar gtsug tor chen po ni// dam pa 'idon du bsgom par byar// gtsug ter ye shes theb 'gyur na// dngos gru
162a6(rgyud): gzhan lnga ci zhig smos// rgyal ba'i gtsug ter ngag ma// de na yang dang yang du sgom// chos kyi rgyal po rnam rgyal nyid// mdor bsdus pa ni thob par 'gyur// rnam rgyal gtsug tor phyag rgya yo// dam pa'i
162a7(rgyud): yi ge bsgom par bya// lags par rab gnas 'ong ba phan// ngos grub ye shes thob par 'gyur// de la sogs pa mthar yas mi chog/ chos phyis mnyam dang mi mnam pa// gtsug tor rnams kyis
162a8(rgyud): legs bshad po/  phyag rgya de rnams bdag zhid mchog/ de ltar rnal 'byor pas bsgoms na// lhag pa'i lha ni gcig pu nyid// thog ma pa ma med zhig/ nga byung mchog tu mi 'gyur ga/ sangs rgyas kun
162b1(rgyud): dang mnyam sbyor ba// rnal 'byor dbang phyug go 'phang mchog/ sangs rgyas ye shas dri ma med// bdag nyid chen po thob par 'gyur// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gtsug tor gyi dam tshig ya shas kyi phyag
162b2(rgyud): rgyu rnam so// da ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi yi ge'i rang bzhin gyi ye shes de la bslab par bya'o zhes bya ba ni rnam par spyod pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgor shes par bya'o// a
162b3(rgyud): zhes bya ba ni chos thams cad ma skyes pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgor bshad par bya'o// oM A a~M a aHpa zhes bya ba ni chos thams cad kyi sgo ste don dam par chos thams cad kyi pha rol
162b4(rgyud): tu phyin pa thams cad yongasu rdzogs par blta bar bya'o// oM paM na zhes bya ba ni chos thams cad kyi ming dang / gzugs / shes rab dang chos dang bcas pa yongasu shes pa'i dbang du 'gyu
162b5(rgyud): ba'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgor bshad do// oM no da zhes bya ba ni 'dul ba dang / zhi ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongasu rdzogs par byed pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgor brjod do// oM de
162b6(rgyud): sa zhes bya ba ni thogs pa med pa las yang dag par 'das shing yongasu nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par spong ba dang / zag pa dang bcas pa dang / zag pa med pa'i nas phung po dang / khams dang / 
162b7(rgyud): skye mched la sogs pa don dam pa'i bden pa la gnas te mi dmigs pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgor rnam par gzhago// oM swe/ ta zhes bya ba ni de bzhin nyid kyis rje su 'gro ba'i chos kyi dbyings
162b8(rgyud): mi 'jug pa'i phyir// chos thams cad kyi sgor rnam par lu'o// oM ti ka zhos bya ba ni las kyi rnam par smin pa rnam par bgrod pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgor gsal bar bya'o// o ka ma
163a1(rgyud): zhes bya ba ni sgyu ma lta bu nyid dran pa med cing snying rje che ba dang shes rab rno ba las byung ba'i phyir/ chos thams cad kyi sbyor galal bar bshad// oM me ga nas bya ba ni bab me la
163a2(rgyud): sbed pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgor blta bar bya'o// oM gaM/ dza zhes bya ba ni skye ba dang / rga ba dang 'chi ba las yongasu rgal ba'i rang bzhin mi phyed pa'i phyir// chos thams cad kyi sgor blta bar bya'o// 
163a3(rgyud): oM dza d+ha zhes bya ba na chos kyi dbyisu mi byed po'i rdo rje yong su rdzogaso pa'i byor chos thams cad kyi sgong bcu bgyi'o// oM d+hi/ sha zhes byo ban ni gonas dang lhag mthong yongasu rdzogs
163a4(rgyud): phyir chos thams cad kyi skong balci bar bya'o// kau sheSha zhes bya/ ni gang dag dang chos kyi bdag med pa na mkhar lhor gsal ning chos thams cad rang bzhin gyi 'od gsal ba'i phyir chos
163a5(rgyud): thams cad kyi sgor rnam par gzhago// oM ShaM k+Sha zhes bya ba ni gau/ yo ba med pas mi bzad pa'i ye shes so sor dmigs te/ chos thams cad kyi sgor blta bar bya'o// oM k+Sha ngo zhes bya
163a6(rgyud): ba ni chos thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi 'ang yulo ma yin pa'i phyir// chos thams cad kyi sgor blta bar bya'o// oM ngaM tha zhes bya ba ni gnas dang gnas ma yin pa la mkhas pas sangs rgyas kyi
163a7(rgyud): zhing yongasu sbyor ba'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgor blta bar bya'o// oM the D+ha zhes bya ba ni sgrib pa thams cad rab tu spangs pas/ zod pa'i ye shes mi skye zhing mthar thug pa'i ye shas thob pa'i
163a8(rgyud): phyir chos thams cad kyi sgor ba shad// oM d+haM dz+nyA nas bya ba ni myung du 'chi ba med pa rje su dmigs pa med pa'i phyir// chos thams cad kyi sgor blta bar bya'o// oM dz+nyA ka zhes bya ba ni lus rnam par
163b1(rgyud): skyed pa ni 'dod chags dang bral bas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te rdo rje snying po'i lus so sor thob pa'i phyir/ chos thams cad kyi sgor blta bar bya'o// oM ke A zhes bya ba ni sems rnam par spyod
163b2(rgyud): ba ni nyes pa dang rmongs dang / bag la nyal ba rab tu spangs nas byang chub kyi sems bskyed pa rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgor blta bar bya'o// oM aM kha zhes bya ba ni
163b3(rgyud): ngag rnam par spyod pa ni ngag gis spros pa chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag pa'i phyir// chos thams cad kyi sgor blta bar bya'o// oM baM tsha zhes bya ba ni grob ma ma dmigs shing rang bzhin gyis dang
163b4(rgyud): ba'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgor bltang bar bya'o// oM tshaM g+ha zhes bya ba ni gcig tu 'dres pa ma dmigs pa'i don dam par gnyi su med par gyur pa'i phyir// chos thams cad kyi sgor ba
163b5(rgyud): bar bya'o oM g+ha Ta zhes bya ba ni tsa co dang bral ba'i rdo rje snying po na pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgor bshad// oM Te ba zhes bya ba ni chos thams cad dbu ba gdos pa lta bu'i tshul
163b6(rgyud): gyis gsang ba'i ye shes gsal phyir chos thams cad kyi sgor bshad// oM pheM Da zhes bya ba ni chen po las grol ba'i na mkha' las 'gro ba grub pas so sor thor pa'i phyir chos thams
163b7(rgyud): cad kyi skor blta bar bya'o// oM De Sha~M zhes bya ba ni cha sgo mi dmigs pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgor blta ra bya'o// oM ShaM u zhes bya ba ni chos thams cad nye bar zhi ba'i phyir/ chos zad
163b8(rgyud): kyi sgor rnam par gzhago go// oM A ya zhes bya ba ni rgyun tu byed pa ni nges par 'byung ba'i don du 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad la nye bar gnas pa'i phyir/ chos thaman kyi sgor blta bar bya'o// 
164a1(rgyud): oM ye ta nas pa ba ni dakho na nyid na spros pa thams cad rnam par spangs pa'i byi/ chos thams cad kyi sgor rnam par gan go// oM ta shu zhes bab ni ma smras pa'i chos rnam par grol
164a2(rgyud): bti ma tshan cid yin pa'i phyir/ chos thams cad kyi sbre ba shad/ oM hU sI zhes bya ba ni yo su bzung ba med pa ni 'ab pa dang rtsod pa spangs pa'i chos nyid yin pa'i phying// chos thams cad kyi skar blta ba
164a3(rgyud): oM hraM kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa ni mtshan nyid rnam par dag pa'i phyir// chos thams cad kyi sgor blta bar bya'o// oM ka kha ga g+ha nga / rang bzhin 'od gsal ba'i mtshan nyid bzung ba'i phyir chos thams cad rgya ska
164a4(rgyud): gnaso/ oM tsa tsha dza dzA nya/ snang ni gsal zhing 'bar ba'i phyid/ chos dathams cad kyi ske'o// oM Ta na Da D+ha// sgom pa ni chos thams cad gnyisasu mi gnas pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o// oM tra
164a5(rgyud): tha dad+ha na/ gzhi med pa ni chos thams cad ma 'dres pa'i phyir/ chos thams cad kyi sgor rnam par gan go// oM pa pha ba b+h+ra ma/ byang chub ni chos thams cad dri ma med pa'i phyir chos thams cad
164a6(rgyud): kyi sgor blta bar bya'o// oM ya ra la wa/ mya ngan las 'das pa'i ni blo ba pa thams cad nges par dor ba'i mtshan nyid dang chos kyi dbyings so sor thob cing mngon par shes pa lnga dang ye shes mkhyen
164a7(rgyud): pas sangs rgyas kyis yongasu thob pa'i phyir/ chos thams cad kyi sgor blta bar bya'o// oM sha Sha sa ha/ rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes rnam par dag pa de
164a8(rgyud): gzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi sgo rnam par nges pa'o// de nas rig pa thams cad kyi gas pa'i cho ga rgyas par gyur pa ni/ sngon bzhin nges par byos nas ni// phyogs kun mnyam pa nyid
164b1(rgyud): bsgoms nas// r-i rab chen po grubani pa/ rin chen kun gyis rnam par rgyun// da yi stang du rdo rje cha/ da yi steng du pad+ma ba zhag// 'dab ma brgyad pa cher bkra ga rnal 'bor ston zhes rnam par bshad// sangs
164b2(rgyud): rgyas kun gyi phyag rgya che/ 'od zer gsal ba'i dkyil 'khor can/ dbang po gnyis ni snyoms 'jug pa/ yongasu rdzogs par bdag nyid kyis// rnal 'byor thams cad bsgom par bya// mnyam med sangs rgyas
164b3(rgyud): kun dang mtshangs// sangs rgyas kun bdag bsgoms nas ni// bskal mthar yang ni du gnas 'gyur// b+ha ga chen po rnal 'byor cha// rnal 'byor pa gnas mi bzad pa// sangs rgyas kun bdag bsgoms
164b4(rgyud): nas ni// sangs rgyas kun dang mtshungs par 'gyur// khams gsum pa yi rgyal srid che// sems can kun la thams cad du// gang rnal 'byor pas bsgoms nas// de tshe dngos grub la gan
164b5(rgyud): gnas// rang bzhin gyis ni 'od gsal chos// gdod nas dag cing ma 'dres pa// gang tsha ya shes mthong ba ni// de yi chan dag/ bar 'gyur// sangs rgyas thams cad mdor bsdus pa/ sna
164b6(rgyud): tshogs las kyi ster ba yis// gad tshe rnal 'bor pa bsgoms na/ sna tshogs las ni byed par 'gyur// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi// phyag rgya chen po ya sheso// 'khor lo sbyar ba rgyal po che/ 
164b7(rgyud): kun mchog sa yi dbang phyug ni// rdo rje sbyor bas bsgoms nas ni// mnyam med 'khor lo bsgyur ba mtshangs// gzi brjid phreng ba phyag rgya che// logs par mnyam par bzhag pa sgom// 'bar ba'i 'dres
164b8(rgyud): bas 'khrugs shing mdzes// pad+ma rA ga mtshungs pa'i 'od// rdo rje'i sbyor bas bsgoms nas ni// rang bzhin gzi brjid phreng bar 'gyur// gdugs dkar rgyal ba'i gtsug tor gyis// phyag rgya chen po bsgom/ 
165a1(rgyud): na ni// 'od zer gsal ba'i sbyor ba yis// sems can dag pa nyid du 'gyur// rnam par gsal ba'i gtsug ter rgya// / ral gri 'bang ba'i 'od kyis 'khrugs// bag pa med pa'i sbyor ba
165a2(rgyud): yis mnyam mad gsal ba'i gtsug tor mtshungs/ rgyal ba'i gtsug tor phyag rgya che// legs par mnyam par gzhag pas sgom// rgyal ba'i gtsug tor sbyor ba yis// de yi rnam pa'i spyod yul 'gyur
165a3(rgyud): rdo rje dam tshig ye shas che// legs par mnyam par gzhag pas sgom// kun tu bzang po dam pa'i gzugs// mnyam med rdo rje sems dpa' mtshungs// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas pa// rdo rje sems
165a4(rgyud): dpa' sems dpa' cha/ byang chub sems dang mtshungs pa'i 'od// gtsug tong lnga ldan stobs po che// rdo rje'i sbyor bas bsgom pa yis// rdo rje sems dpa' 'dra bar 'gyur// rdo rje rgyal po
165a5(rgyud): phyag rgya che// da yi den du bsgoms nas ni// 'gro ba thams cad la// grags byed na// skye bo gzhan lta smos ci dgos// rdo rje ma gas pa'i phyag che// legs par mnyam par gnag pas
165a6(rgyud): sgomang skye dgu thams cad chags 'gyur na// bud med gzhan lnga smos ci dgos// rdo rje sems dpang phyag rgya che// dam pa'i don du bsgom par bya// legs so ba ni rab gsol bas// bud med thams
165a7(rgyud): cad tshim par byed// byang chub sems kyi phyag rgya ri ya sha so// rdo rje rin chen phyag rgya che// 'bar ba'i phreng bas 'khrugs pa'i 'od// dpral po'i phyogasu gnas pasgom// de yi dar thod dbang bskur
165a8(rgyud): thobang rdo rje ga phyag rgya che// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor mtshus pa'i 'od// snying khor gnas pa bsgom par bya// kun mkhyen ye shes ster bar byed// rin chen tog gi phyag rgya che// legs par mnyes
165b1(rgyud): bar gnag pas sgom// sbyin pa'i pha rol phyin kha mchog/ sgrub po dam pas rdzogs par byed// rdo rje bshang bas phyag rgya che// lags par mnyam par gzhag pas sgom// rdo rje band pa ltar gyur te// da ni
165b2(rgyud): skye dgu dga' byed 'gyur// dbang bskur ba'i phyag rgya'i oM sheso// pad+ma yi ni pad+ma che// dag pa'i chos ni mnam gzhag pas// dam pa'i don du bsgom par bya// mnyam mang rdo rje chos dang mtshungs/ 
165b3(rgyud): roshes rab ye shes rdo rje rno// bsgoms pas de ni rdo rje 'chang // shes rab pha rol phyin dag pa// stong nyid sbyor bas bsgoms nas ni// dam pa'i don du bsgom bya ste// mnyam med 'jam dbyangs dang na
165b4(rgyud): mtshungs rdo rje rgyu yi phag rgya che// legs par mnyam par gnag pa sgoms nas// chos kyi 'khor lo kun mchog ce// mdor bsdu sa nas ni de yi bskor// rdo rje smra ba'i phyag rgya che// dam pa'i
165b5(rgyud): don du bsgoms nas no// rdo rje bzlas pa'i nus pa yis// ldem po 'i ngag ni de yis 'chad// chos kyi phyag rgya'i ye shes// rdo rje las kyi phyag rgya che// dam pa'i don du bsgoms na ni
165b6(rgyud): kun nas kun nas rang nyid kyis// rdo rje las ni byed par 'gyur// rdo rje srung ba byams pa che// rdo rje chos zhes grags pa ste// chos kyi sbyor bas bsgoms na ni// rdo rje srung ba dang mtshungs 'gyur// 
165b7(rgyud): rdo rje gnod sbyin brtson 'grus che// khro bo chen po stobs po che// dam pa'i don gyi bsgom par bya// rdo rje gnod sbyin dang mtshungs 'gyur// rdo rje khu tshur phyag rgya che// lus ngag yid kyi de bzhin du/ 
165b8(rgyud): rdo rjer sbyor bas bsgoms na ni// rdo rje khu tshur 'dzin par 'gyur// las kyi phyag rgya'i ye shes// sgeg mos mngon par dga' ba ster// phreng ba yi ni dbang bsgyur ba// glu mas mdzes pa'i sgra dbyangs
166a1(rgyud): byad dgar mas rdzu 'phrul thob par 'gyur// dri mas bzang po'i dri yin te// me tog byang chub yan lag nyid// sgron mas mtha' dag gsal ba'o// bdug pa bdug pa dag
166a2(rgyud): la brtson lcags kyus dbang phyug 'gugs byed na// skye bo gzhan lta smos ci dgos// zhags pas dbang po 'ang 'ching 'gyur na// gdug pa'i sems can smos ci dgos// lcags sgregs gis
166a3(rgyud): ni 'phrog byed dang // tshangs sogs dbang phyug chen po 'ang 'tshang ka 'bebs pas thams cad 'babs 'gyur na/ dman pa'i mi dag smos ci dgos// 'di nyid kyi ni sbyor ba yis// chos kyi yi ge
166a4(rgyud): dang ldan pa'o// phyag rgya'i ye shes dang bcas pas// de/ grwa thams cad myur du 'grub// 'di yi sbyor ba shes par bya// phyag rgya'i 'khor lo khyad par bya// spyi gtsug nas ni rkang pa'i
166a5(rgyud): bur yi ge yis ni yongs gang bang // gzugs brnyan/ gcig gis go 'phang gyur// sems ni rtse gcig 'gyur/ bar bsam// sa la rab gnas pad+ma ni// dbang chen gyis ni gnas
166a6(rgyud): zhes bshad// dbang po gnyis ni mtshungs sbyor bas// dbang phyug kyang ni bsgrub par bya// dbang chen dag ni gru bzhi pa// dbang chen dag gi lasu bshad// chu ni zlum par shes par bya// bar ma'i
166a7(rgyud): 'dab mas rnam par mtshan// zhi bar byed pa'i las dang ldan// zhi ba'i don du de bshad// mi ni gru gsum shes par bya// gzhi mdo yi ni gnasu bshad// dbang du bya ba sgrub don du// pad+ma rA ga 'dra
166a8(rgyud): ba'i 'od// mngon spyod la ni brtson 'grus che// rlung gi dkyil 'khor dam pa ste// ral gri ya~M ni phyag rgyal dbyings// dbyar gyi sprin dang mtshungs pa'i 'od// sar dang dkar dang de bzhin dmar// 
166b1(rgyud): nag po yang ni khang par du// dang po'i dkyil 'khor nas sbyangs te// tha ma'i bar du rab tu brtag/ dang bre rdo rje rab tu bzhag/ de yi rdza.u rin Nan te// pad+ma dang ni las rnal 'byor// grub pa'i go 'phang
166b2(rgyud): rim par bshad// phyag rgya thams cad kyi yang she so// de nas bcom ldan 'das rtag pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya'i ye shes bka' stsal pa// gnyis dang gnyisu med pas
166b3(rgyud): yongasu dag pas chos thams cad rnam par grol ba'i phyag rgyas btab pa'o// rtag pa dang chad pas yongasu dag pas ches thams cad zhi ba dang mtha' med pa'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o// bad
166b4(rgyud): sgo dang zad pa'i mtha' dang zad pa'i mar thug pa dang ldan pas chos thams cad zad pa dang 'dod chags dang bral ba'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o// mnyam pa nyid kyi mtha' rnam par dag
166b5(rgyud): pas chos thams cad la skur pa mi 'debs pa'i byag rgya sa rgyas btang ba'o// mig lnga las yang dag par 'das pas chos thams cad namakha'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o// sa
166b6(rgyud): thams cad na mkha'i khams thams cad dang ldan pa'i phyir chos thams cad na mkha'i rang bzhin gyis phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o// chos kyi dbyings yongasu khyab pas chos thams cad dbyar mi
166b7(rgyud): phyang ba'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o// chos thams cad byang chub kyi sems dang tha mi dad pas chos thams cad byang chub kyi sems kyi phyag rgyas rgyas bdab pa'o// chos kyi dbyings mi phyed pa'i
166b8(rgyud): mtshan nyid yin pas chos thams cad kyi chos kyi dbyings kyi phag rgyas rgyas bdab pa'o// ngo bo nyid med pas chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o// 'tsho ba mang po'o chos
167a1(rgyud): thams cad bdag med pa'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o// skad cig ma 'ad pas ches thams cad mi rtag pa'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o// smra ba dang / rga ba dang / 'chi ba'i mtha'
167a2(rgyud): dang ldan pas ches thams cad sdug bsngal gyi phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o// sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma 'amang de bzhin nyid pas chos thams cad de bzhin nyid kyi phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o// gdod ma nas
167a3(rgyud): yongasu dag pas chos thams cad yang dag po'i mtha'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o// 'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas mnyam pa nyid pas chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi phyag rgyas rgyas btab
167a4(rgyud): pa'o// spros pa'i dmigs pa rnam par bral bas chos thams ca dad mtshan ma med pa'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o// ra ba thams cad las rnam par grol bas chos thams cad smon
167a5(rgyud): ba med pa'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab ba'o// dngos po med pa'i nyid kyis tshan nyid kyis ni chos thams cad mi rtag pa'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab ba'o// phung po lnga yongasu
167a6(rgyud): 'dus pa'i mtshan nyid kyis na chos thams cad sdug bsngal gyi phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o// rang bzhin gyis bdag med pas chos thams cad bdag med pa'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o// shin tu mi g.ya
167a7(rgyud): ba'i phyir chos thams cad zhi ba'i phyag rgyas rgyas btib pa'o// don dam pa'i bden pas yongasu khyab pa'i phyir/ chos thams cad bden pa'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o// 'tshe ba rnam par mi gnas pa'i phyir/ 
167a8(rgyud): chos thams cad dri ma med phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o// shin tu gdon mi za bar gnas pa'i phyir// chos thams cad 'khrug pa med pa'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o// sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha
167b1(rgyud): bcad pa'i phar chos thams cad ji lta ba bzhin gyis phyag rgyas rgyas pa'o// mi rnams kyi gzhi gni med pa'i phyir/ chos thams cad sgro 'dogs pa med pa'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab bo// bad ba pos
167b2(rgyud): byas pa'i phyir chos thams cad 'jig pa'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o// rang bzhin gyis ma byung ba'i phyir// chos thams cad 'byung ba med pa'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o// rang ba non gyis ma
167b3(rgyud): skyes pa'i phyir chos thams cad 'gog pa med pa'i phyag rgyas rgyas pa'o// 'gag pa med pa'i phyiraro chos thams cad gdod ma nas skye ba med pa'i phyag rgyas rgyas pa'o// rnam par spyod pa kun
167b4(rgyud): tu spyod pa thams cad dang bral ba'i phyir chos thams cad spros pa med pa'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o// gzugs rnam pa dar lta ba med pa'i phyir/ chos thams cad mtshan nyid
167b5(rgyud): med pa'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o// gnas yongasu bcad pa'i phyir chos thams cad nye bar sbyor ba med pa'i phyag rgyas rgyas bta pa'o// mi mthun pa'i phyogs nye bar mi dmig pa
167b6(rgyud): phyir chos thams cad la skur pa mi 'debs pa'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o// mngon par 'du byed pa thams cad med pa'i phyir chos thams cad las kyi rnam par smin pa med pa'i phyag rgyas
167b7(rgyud): rgyas btab pa'o// skya ba dang gnas pa las rnam par grol ba'i phyir// chos thams cad 'dus ma byas pa'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o// na mkha' dang khyab par med pa'i phyir chos thams cad
167b8(rgyud): mnyam pa nyid kyi phyog rgyas rgyas btab pa'o// mtshan nyid gcig pa'i phyir chos thams cad gzugs dang / tshor ba dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o// snying po med
168a1(rgyud): pa'i bying chos thams cad rung ba'i phyag rgyas rgyas pa'o// nga po dang cas pa med pa'i phyi chos thams ca 'das dang sgyums kyi phyus rgyas rgyas bdas pa / sa sa
168a2(rgyud): thams cad kyi sku dang mnyam pa nyid thob pas chos thams cad khoms dang skye mched kyi phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o// mtha ro gcig tu 'jig rten gyi lam rnam par dag pa'i phyir chos thams cad 'phags
168a3(rgyud): pa'i bden pa bzhi'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o// lha'i rdzas byed pa'i phyir chos thams cad phyag rgya chen po'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o// mtha' gcig tu chos la phan 'dog pa'i phyir chos thams
168a4(rgyud): cad chos kyi phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o// thams cad kyi las sna tshogs byed pa'i phyir chos thams cad las kyi phyag rgyas rgyas pa/ tab pa'o// thams cad dam tshig thams cad rjesu sgrub
168a5(rgyud): pa'i phyir chos thams cad dam tshig gi phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o// sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad rab tu mi gnas pa'i phyir/ chos thams cad sangs rgyas kyi phyag rgyas rgyas 'atab pa'o// chos
168a6(rgyud): thams cad 'jig rten las 'das pa'i lam gyi phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa dang / thag pa chen po'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab po'o// gsang sngags kyi phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa dang / phyag rgya'i phyag rgyas rgyas
168a7(rgyud): btab pa dang / dkyil 'khor gyi phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa dang / mnyam pa nyid kyi phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa dang / rdo rje ya shas kyi phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa dang / ye shes thams cad kyi phyag rgyas rgyas btab
168a8(rgyud): ba dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa dang / me long lta bu'i ye shes kyi phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa dang / mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa dang / so sor
168b1(rgyud): rtog pa'i ye shes kyi phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa dang bya ba sgrub pa'i ye shes kyi phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa dang / chos thams cad chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag pa'i ya shas kyi phag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o// de bzhin
168b2(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi phyag rgya'o// muH'jam dang la phag rgya'i tshig 'di dag ni mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i ye shes kyi tshig/ de bzhin gshegs pa tham tsa kyi byin gyis brlangs pa'i tshig
168b3(rgyud): thams cad mkhan pa'i ye shes yongasu rdzogs par bde pa theg pa chen po'i tshig ste/ sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi rgyud kyi phyag rgya'i tshig rnams la 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i
168b4(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das rnams dang chos kyi phung po brgya do khri bzhi stong dang byang chub kyang byung ba yino// a aM aHAM/ sngags bso phyag rgya 'di rgyas btab na de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi phag
168b5(rgyud): rgya yang dag par 'du'o// hUM myur du ma skyes pa'i chos rnams la bzod pa thob par 'gyur/ kheng de nas da ni de bzhin gshegs po tham sa cad kyi sbyor ba thams cad kyi gsang ba chen po'i
168b6(rgyud): phyag rgya'i ya shas su gyur pa'o// snying gi dbu sku rtag tu sgom// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus son par// pad+ma'i phreng ba 'khrigs pa'i 'od// pad+ma chen po 'dab brgyad pa// 'bar ba'i phreng ba 'khrig
168b7(rgyud): pa'i 'od// de yi stang du rtag sgom pa// yi ga yi ni gtso bo mchog/ thog ma tha med zhi ba// kha bab mo'i 'od 'dra 'od// dpa' bo kun da zla ltar dkar// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor ltar 'od gras la// zhi ba'i chos
168b8(rgyud): kyi rang bzhin sku// kun mkhan ye shes kyis gang la// de bzhin gshegs pa gnas kyi gsang // ra sa ya na dang mtshungs mchog/ kha yig mkhar 'drang shes par ga// thig len das rnam par spras
169a1(rgyud): gsang 'a chen po mchog tu mdzes// thog ma tha ma med pa'i bdag/ de yi steng du rde rje / rtsa mo lnga dang yang dag ldan/ de yi steng du sgron ma cha// 'bar ba'i drang bas 'khrugs pa'i le
169a2(rgyud): de yi stang du rtag bsams pa// yi ge mchog gi ge 'bang ngo // man ngag mchog las shes pa ste// gzhan du na ni nga mi smra// sangs rgyas mkhas pa thams cad kyi// mdor bsdus nas ni 'di gsungaso// rnam par
169a3(rgyud): grol ba gsuMm thob pas// thob 'gyur 'di ni gzhan du min// lha ni rkan las sbyar bas byo// sna yi rtse mor yi ge hUM// dadang po gnyis ni snyoms 'jug pas// phyag rgya'i go 'bang tshig gis ni// shes
169a4(rgyud): rang ldan pas rang sems sgom// snang ba med cing spros med pa// shin tu mchog tu phrar shes bya// khyab bdag bsod nams ye shes 'ongos// bsam bya bsam gtan gcig bya ste/ mig dang sgron ma'i 'od bzhin
169a5(rgyud): du kun tu 'bar ba dang ldan pa// mgrin pa 'bad pas bcu/ ma nas ni// dkar po ser po sngon po 'od// dmang po yang ni tham sa cad du// 'bar ba 'di dga'abad pa yis// sgrub po dam pas mtshan
169a6(rgyud): par bya snying khar gsal bar byas nas su// de bzhin thams cad spyi bor song // gnas de la ni 'thon nas kyang // dbang po thams cad dga' bar 'gyur// de la 'thon nas 'jig rten no// mtshungs par kun
169a7(rgyud): nas thams cad du// slar yang de ru 'ongs nas ni// de ni 'jug pa rab tu bsam// yid kyis de ltar bsgoms na ni// nga nyid 'khor lo sgyur lta bu/ dbang po gnyis ni rab sbyor bas// legs par mnyam par gzhag pas
169a8(rgyud): sgom du dang po lngas ni dmigs nas yang // mi rnams lus ni dag par 'gyur// ji snyed bud med yon tan dang // ldan pa kun tu gnas pa ni// bkug nas bcug ste bcings nas su// dbang du bya ste bsgrub par
169b1(rgyud): ba de rnams lhan cig yongs bsten nas// sngags pa mchog gi dngos grub thob// gsang ba mchog tu dbyas pa na// shes rab pha rol phyin pa cha// ni nga'i chos kyi rim pa ni// shin tu mnyam par gzhag pa
169b2(rgyud): sgom rdo rje sems dpa'i dngos grub che// de 'grub gzhan lta smos ci dgos// mchog ni rta // khar mas phun sum tshogs pa ste// stong pa nyid dang mtshan med mchog/ smon pa med pa zhes su grags// chos
169b3(rgyud): kun bdag med pa yi mchog/ kun mkhyen ya shes rdzogs par byed/ sa bcu yi ni stobs dag gis// pha rol phyin pa thams cad pog// rdo rje sems dpa' mchog bsgoms na// rdo rje sems dpa' 'dra bar 'gyur
169b4(rgyud): de nyid 'di ni bcud kyis len// gnyis su med pa'i ye shes mchog/ thag chen mchog tu yid 'ong ga/ stong nyid sgom pa'i bdag nyid can// gnyisu med pa'i ye shes mchog/ gang gis
169b5(rgyud): rtag tu sgom byed na// de yang rdo rje 'dzin rgyal po// yon tan mchog las skyes par 'gyur// bud med gang zhig spobasangs ma// rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par brgyan// lus ngag yid kyi sbyor ba yis/ 
169b6(rgyud): yongs rig A~M yid gtsum pas// mchog gi dngos grub thob par 'gyur// bud med kha dog ljang ku gang // rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par rgyan// de tshe nga ni sngags pas bstan// mnyam med gsang ba'i
169b7(rgyud): ye shes mtshungs// bud med gang zhig kha dog dkar// pad+ma'i 'dab ma 'dra ba'i 'od// de dang lhan cig sngags pas bsdad// dam pa'i dngos grub thob par 'gyur// bud med gang zhig kha dog dam pa// sup+pa
169b8(rgyud): sa yi rgyan 'chang ma// sngags pas de dang lhan cig gnas/ shes rab pha rol byin mtshungs 'gyur// bud med in dran la mtshungs// gsang ba rdo rje rnal 'byer gyis// sngags pa cho ga shes pas bsten/ 
170a1(rgyud): rig 'dzin rnams kyi stobs chen 'gyur// gsang chen ma ra ka ta mtshungs// gang gis rtag tu bstan pa ni// da yang rdo rje 'dzin rgyal po// myur du gsang ba'i dam par 'gyur// bud med bcwa
170a2(rgyud): rAg 'dra// rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par brgyan// dbang po gnyis ni snyoms 'jug pas// rdo rje 'dzin ma lta bu sgrub// sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam sbyar ba// gnyisu med pa'i ye shes mchog/ gang
170a3(rgyud): gis rtag tu sgom pa ni// mnyam med sangs rgyas kun dang mtshungs// ngan pa zhi bar gzhag pa bani// mchog gi gnas kyis bsgoms pa ni// rnal 'byor mchog gi mi ring bang/ rdo rje 'dzin pa lta bur 'gyur/ yang
170a4(rgyud): dag spong ba rnam pa bzhi// legs par mnyam par gzhag pas skom/ dbang po gnyis ni stongs 'jug pas// mnyam meda' jig rten dang phyug mtshungs// so sor yang dag rig pa bani// shin tu
170a5(rgyud): mnyam gzhag bsgoms na ni// rgan med rdo rje sangs rgyas mchu ngas/ mnyam med 'jam pa'i mchog dang 'dra// mi 'jigs pa ni rnam pa bzhi// rdo rje'i sbyor bas bsgom par bya/ dbang po gnyis ni snum
170a6(rgyud): 'jug pas// rdo rje 'dzin pa lta bu ste// rdzu 'phrul gyi ni rkang pa bzhi// shin tu mnyam gzhag bsgoms na ni// dbang po gnyis ni mnyam sbyor bas// rdzu 'phrul ldan pa'i mchog tu 'gyur// tshangs pa yi ni gnas bzhi po// 
170a7(rgyud): tshad med pa yi sems kyis ni// rdo rje skyong bar bdag bsgoms na// rdo rje 'dzin pa lta bur 'grug// sbyor ba'i bdag nyid dbang po lnga/ dam pa'i don gyis bsgoms na ni// dbang po gnyis ni snyoms 'jug pas// mnyam
170a8(rgyud): med rdo rje sangs rgyas mtshungs// yid kyi stobs ni rnam pa lnga/ shin tu mnyam gzhag bsgoms na ni// 'khor lo sgyur ba brtson 'grus che// stobs 'dzin pa nyid du 'gyur// byang chub yan lag rin chen du/ 
170b1(rgyud): gsang sngags bsgoms pas sgom na ni// rdogs pa'i ya shes sbyor ba yasi// khyab bdag chos kun 'dzin par 'gyur// 'phags pa'i yan lag brgyad kyi lam// kun mkhyen ya shas rdzogs byed pa// da ni
170b2(rgyud): bsgoms pa tsam gyis ni// 'jig rten shes las rab tu 'da'// rje su dran pa rnam po drug/ bdag nyid rtse gcig gis bsgoms na// sngags pa rdo rje 'dzin pa ru ka/ sngags pa dug mo ring bar 'gyur// stobs bcu
170b3(rgyud): bo ni yang dag bsgoms// sgom pa'i rnal 'byor de nyid kyis// bsod nams ye shes yongs rdzogs te// rtag tu stobs bam+b+hi'i dam par 'gyur// pha rol phyin bcu yongs rdzogs// stobs rnams dang ni dbang rnams
170b4(rgyud): dang rdzas rnams kun ni nges bskyed nas// myur du mtshan ma dag par 'gyur// bud med nun shin tu bsnan// rjes ngar rjes ngar de bzhin du// mchu yis mchu ni yongasu bzung // 'ad pas dam du A ling ga/ 
170b5(rgyud): rnam grol gos kyis bsgribs nas bu// byang chub sems/ ni bsgom par bya// rdo rje ya shas brtson 'grus che// rdo rje nga hi su bdag bstan pas// rnam pa sna tshogs ka ngan// rnal 'byor shis
170b6(rgyud): ba de bstan bya// sngar bzhin thams cad byas nas su// bud med rnams kyi dam tshigau sgrub// rdo rje sems dpa' mtshungs par 'a gyur// bud meng rnams kyi nyer nas bstan// ling ga myur du gang bar
170b7(rgyud): 'gyur/ sbyor ba 'di ni mkhan pa yis// stobs chan sangs rgyas rab tu grub// gsang ba 'di ni dam pa ste/ sangs rgyas kun gyi skyob pa'o// gsang ba 'di yi sbyor ba yis// yi ge dam pa 'grub par 'gyur// 
170b8(rgyud): sangs rgyas rnams kyi ma 'dres pa'i// cho su grag pa gang yin pa// de rnams sgom byed gtso bo ni// dngos grub thams cad rab rdzogs pa/ ma 'dres pa yi chos bco brgyad// sangs rgyas che su grags pa
171a1(rgyud): steng nga rnams skem pa dang ldan pas// sangs rgyas byang chub rab ster byed// bsam gtan bzhi po thob nas ni// gzugs med pa yi rtag par yang // 'alog pa'i snyoms par 'jug ldan
171a2(rgyud): bas// sangs rgyas byang chub sgrub pa po// byang chung phyogs ni sum bcu bdun// chos ni mchog tu rmad byung ba/ de rnams sgom pa dang ldan pas// byang chub sems dpa'i stod pa'o// sngags rnams thams
171a3(rgyud): cad rab 'grub cing / sbyor ba thabs cad thams cad du'o// de nas 'bad pa thams cad kyis // sangs rgyas chos nyid bsgom par bya/ 'jig rten 'jig rten 'das pa'i lamo// ya shas rin chen rab rnyed dgal/ 
171a4(rgyud): mchod dang dbang bskur ba ni rlabs pas// rlud 'gyur gzhan du ma yin no// nu zhing gsol ba btab pa dang // bdag nyid dbul bde bzhin no// sangs rgyas sogs la yi rang bzhin// de bzhin
171a5(rgyud): yongasu bsngo ba dang // byang chub sems ni yang dag bskyed// khyad paradu ni dus kun du'o// thog ma bar dang phyi ma rad du// ji lta ba zhin du rjes bsgoms pas// sangs rgyas thams cad
171a6(rgyud): bsgrub bya ste/ 'di la pho tshom yod ma yin// 'gro ba sems kyis spo ba ni// brtan pa'i snying po legs par bshad// stong nyid de bzhin nyid las byung // rdo rje sems dpar de bshad// 'gro ba thams cad
171a7(rgyud): bkug na su// sangs rgyas byang chub sbyar bar bya// don yod ye shes dag pa ste// rdo rje rgyal po mchog ces bshad// rdo rje chags pas chags gyur nas// rang bzhin gyis ni brtan par 'gyur// 'gro ba
171a8(rgyud): ma lus lus med pa// de yi sems ni chags par bshad// chos rnams kun ni rang bzhin gyis// rnam par yin zhing gnyisu med// gang tsha dag pa'i bdag nyid mthong // de tshe rdo rje legs par
171b1(rgyud): bshad// rdo rje sems dpa' bzhi po yis// ming dang brda ni sbyar ba'o// sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam sbyor ba// sdom pa mchog tu ngas pa'o// khams gsum pa yi rgyal srid cha// tshogs gnyis rdzogs
171b2(rgyud): bar byas pa ste// sa dang pha rol phyin mchog gtse// rdo rje dbang bskur las byung ba// de bzhin gshegs kun ye shes te// rnyog pa med cing yi ge mang// 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gzi brjid mchog/ brtan
171b3(rgyud): partag pa nyid du 'gyur// namakho'i mdzod ni mdzod chen po// chos rnams thams cad legs gnas pa// yid bzhin nor bu rdo rje cha// rdo rje tog ni blan med// ye shes snang ba rin chen che// yongs sgyu
171b4(rgyud): ba yongasu blta// de bzhin gshegs kun gsang ba ni// rdo rje band pa na su bshad// chos kyi bdag med las byung ba// gnyi su med pa'i ye shes mchog/ chos nyid dam pa bsam du med// 
171b5(rgyud): la rje grol ldang ga yel ba ye shes dri med mchog/ zag meng sha sa rab chen po pa// de ni rdo rje rnon por bshad// sangs rgyas rnams kyi chos 'khor lo// gnyisu mad las byung bar
171b6(rgyud): mtshon na yan lag bcu gnyis rten 'brel ming // rdo rje rgyu zhes nges par bshad// dgongs pa'i skad ni spros pa'i mchog/ yul rnams kyis ni bshad pa de// sangs rgyas kun gyi bzlas pa che// de ni
171b7(rgyud): rdo rje smra bur bshad// sems can kun gyi don la sbyar// sangs rgyas kun gyi mchod pa cha// gdod nas dag pa'i rnal 'byor cha// de ni rdo rje la su bshad// bla na med pa'i byams pa che// bsrung ba'i bya ba
171b8(rgyud): gong ma med // dga' ba'i chos ni brtson chen po// rdo rje srung ba zhes bu grags// shes rab thabs kyi khro bo che// sangs rgyas kun dang rjes 'thun pa// nyon mongs thams cad za ba che// do ni gnod sbyin
172a1(rgyud): chen par rjod// lus dag yid ni yang dag sbyor// sgrib pa rad cing yi ga pral// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyis gsang // de ni rdo rje mtshams sbrer bshad// rdo rje ya shes rnal 'bed che/ 
172a2(rgyud): sangs rgyas kun gyi stobs po che// thog ma tha ma mad ni ba// rig pa mchog ces bya bar bshad// de nas yang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i glus de bzhin gshags
172a3(rgyud): pra bams cad legs par mchod nas glur blangs pa// oM sarba bud+d+ha ba ra ma shA ra bud+hu shud+d+ha/ la li ho su b+ha ga su ra ta ma hA ma hA a d+hi ma hA bud+d+ha bud+d+ha/ yo gI shA ra ta thA tA b+hA bi tA ta ma ka ta thA ga ta/ byang chub
172a4(rgyud): sems bskyed las 'drungs pa// sangs rgyas kun la phyag 'tshalo// mchog gi dbang phyug dpe chos// gdong nas zhi ba la phyag 'tshal byang chub sems dpa' skyob pa de/ rdo rje can kun la phyag 'tshal// 
172a5(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje cha// sangs rgyas byang chub lo// phyag 'tshal/ mi dmigs go 'bang la gnas pa// mtha' las 'das pa la phyag 'tshal// 'dren pa rnams kyi stobs po che/ hUM gi
172a6(rgyud): yi ge ma lus pa// thaMd mkhyen pa mthar dag dang // shin tu yo su mya ngan 'da'// 'jig rten dbang phyug mgon pazang ngo po// rdo rje ye shes dri ma med// rnam par dag pa rdo rje mchog/ dngos grub thams cad
172a7(rgyud): rang gsol byed// rnal 'bar dbang phyug rnams kyi mchog rgyas gsum bsam pa dbang gyurapa// sems can rnams la phan don du// khyab pa khyod la phyag 'tshal 'dud/ rdo rje snying po rgyan las dkyil
172a8(rgyud): 'khod chen po yongasu rdzog so// // de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs la rnams sngar yang 'dus par gyur nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs kar zhugs te/ bcom
172b1(rgyud): ldan 'das rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po rdo rje'i snying po'i rgyun gyi dkyil 'khor chen por phyag rgya'i don du nu bzhus pa/ de nas yang dag bshad byag/ dkyil 'khor chen po dam pa ste/ rdo rje
172b2(rgyud): snying po zhes grags pa// sangs rgyas kun gyi skyob pa'o// grubazhi pa la sgo bani pa// rta babs pa ni swa ni rnam par mdzes// sgo khyud rdo rje'i gzugs brnyan dang // phyag rgya dang ni rab tu mdzes// dkyil 'khor
172b3(rgyud): de yi dbus ni// 'khor lo gnyis ni rab tu gnas// rtsibs brgyad pa dang bcu drug rtsibs// rnam par dbye ba legs par brtag/ dbus kyi dkyil 'khor nang gi ni// lte ba'i gnas su legs brtag pa// bad+ma
172b4(rgyud): chen po 'dab brgyad pa// ga sar bltams pas rab tu mdzes// da y-i lte ba'i dbus ni// khyab bdag rnal 'byor/ dbang phyug che// rnam par snang mdzad brtson chen po// sems can rnams
