172b5(rgyud): la rjes brtse bas ka/ da yaM nya 'bor kun tu ni/ de bzhin gce gas pa brgyad rnams dgod// shar du dgod bya 'khor lo can// gtsug tor dkar po nub tu ste// gzi brjid phung po lho ru'o// rnam par rgyal
172b6(rgyud): ba byang du gnas// dbang ldan rnam par gsal bar bri// mar ni steng du dgod par bya// stang 'gro chen po badren za hU~M/ nub du 'ang dpag med par 'gyur// byang du ngan yang grub pa'i mang // rlung du rgyal ba chen
172b7(rgyud): po gnas// sangs rgyas gzugs brnyan 'dzin pa yi// rnal 'byer ldan pa 'di dag bri/ mi bskyod pa ni shar du dgod// lho ru rin chen 'byung ldan no// nung du 'od dpag med par 'gyur/ khyang du don
172b8(rgyud): yod grub pa'i ming // zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la ston pa'o// dbang ldan phyogs nas brtsams nas ni// rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs bri// thams cad zla ba'i dkyil 'khor rnams// 'khor rnams
173a1(rgyud): rna ba'i dkyil 'khor la'o// drang ba rnam par dgod pa pa// rang gi phyag rgya'ong par 'ab/ rdo rje smug mo la sogs pa'i// lha mo 'ab pas dgod par bya// rdo rje gdug pa la stsa
173a2(rgyud): bri da bzhin gzugs kyi rdo rje sogs// rdo rje lcags kyu la sogs pa// sgo srung 'bad pas bri bar bya// byi yi dkyil 'khor la gnas pa// kun tu bzang sogs rims bzhin bri// rang gi phyag rgya'i 'khor
173a3(rgyud): rnams dang // pho nya yi ni 'khor dag dang // khro bo rnams dang mngag pa dang / de bzhin po nya po nya mo// rgya mtsho yid ni dkyil 'khor ni// 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gsal ba'o// phyi ru phyi rol rdo yi ming // dkyil
173a4(rgyud): 'khor la ni 'bad pas brika/ dbang ldan phyogs nas brtsadams na su// 'jig rten skyong ba rgyal po bri// tshangs pa khyab 'jug dbang chen ming // dbang po la sogs lha thams cad// ma mo kun
173a5(rgyud): dang sring mo rnams rgyal chen rnams dang klu dang bcas/ de bzhin lnga rnams thams cang dang // rtson 'grus rje rnaM/ bo namakha' lding // 'angad pa yis ni bri bar bya// de lha'i dkyil
173a6(rgyud): 'khor bris nas su// khang par du ni mchod par bya// me tog bdug spos rol mo dang // de bzhin bza' dang ston mo sogs// phreng ba'i rgyan ni sna tshogs kyis// de bzhin gshegs rnams
173a7(rgyud): mchod par bya// dkyil 'khor kun gyi cho ga yis// mchod pa kun gyis thams cad nas// 'khor lo kun gyi cho ga yis// sangs rgyas thams cad mchod par bya// de nas slob ma thams cad 'asug/ yengasu
173a8(rgyud): dag pa khyad par du// byang chub sems ni bskyed nas su// byang chub bslab pa rjes spyod pa// cho ga shes pa'i sngags pas gzhug/ 'dren pa rnams la mchog tu gzhug/ rdo rje'i dbang bskur sbyar ba yis/ 
173b1(rgyud): dbang bskur ba ni nas sbyin// sang ga'i khri yi stang du ni// dang dang me tog chun pas spras// dkar po'i gdugs dang rin chen cha// bla dra rgya che 'bar ba dang // nga yi g.yas kyi drung du ni// mkhas pa yis ni bzhag par bya// ba
173b2(rgyud): ngan rnam pa sna tshogs dang // sna tshogs ras las yang dag sprul// g.yon gyi drung du thams cad nas// 'bad pa yis ni bzhig par bya// rin chen sman kun gyis gang ba'i// bum pa lags par bzhag byas to// rdo rje
173b3(rgyud): chu sogs dbang bskur gyis// de la rang gi dbang bskur ba// rdo rje ming gis dbang bskur ba// mkhas pa yis ni sgrar yang bya// kun gyi cod pan dbang bskur gyis// yang dang yang du dbang bskur ba// chos
173b4(rgyud): kyi cod pan dbang bskur dang ka/ sangs rgyas kun gyi skyeb bo ni// sna tshogs las kyi dbang bskur sbyin// chos kyi dbyings dang mnyam mtshungs pa'o// chos kyi sku yi dbang bskur po// sangs
173b5(rgyud): rgyus kun gyi sgron mo'i sbyin// de ltar slob ma dbang bsku rab// khyad par du ni dbang bskur ba/ khad par du ni sngogs pas byas// de la dam tshig cho ga yis// sngags dang phyag rgyas
173b6(rgyud): sbyin par bya// slob dpon brnyas par mi bya zhing // sgrub po kun la smad mi bya// sngags kyi spyod pa thams cad la// 'da' bar mi bya smad mi bya// 'jig rten pa yi lha rnams dang // grub mtha'i rigs
173b7(rgyud): ba thams cad la// smad par mi bya blang mau bkad la mngon parang dga' ba spongs// sdig pa thams cad rnam spang zhing // de bzhin bsod nams thams cad bsdu// bza' dang ston mo du ma la// bza' bar
173b8(rgyud): mi bya spang mi bya// 'dod pas bcom ldan sems dpa' ste// sangs rgyas kun gyi sras bdag skyes// thog ma tha ma med zhi ba// nam yang dor bar mi bya'o// sangs rgyas thams cad chags
174a1(rgyud): las 'khrungs// nga bzhin zhe sdang rmongs las 'khrungs// mnyam dang mi mnyam chom rkun dang // dbu ma'i gnas la gnas nas su// de nyid dam tshig shes na su// sangs rgyas
174a2(rgyud): byang chub yongs mi spong // lus can kun la 'tshem bya// khod kyis sar sna mo bya ste// phra dog bya bar mi bya'o// dam pa'i chos ni spang mi bya// byang chub sems ni mchog tu bang // chang gi btung ba spang ba ste// pa
174a3(rgyud): rol bud med rnam par spangs// thams cad mkhyen pa yongs mi dog/ rtag tu srog chags bapad mi bya// sems can rnams la snying rje dang // byams pa yang ni rnam par sgom// sems can rnams la
174a4(rgyud): nu ba ni// yang dang yang du yongs bya// sangs rgyas kun gyi derjes skyes pa// dam tshig 'di zhid 'di dag ni// slob ma rnams sa rjes brgyabs // mkhas pa yis ni bstan par bya// de nas phyag
174a5(rgyud): rgya rjes bcings pa// go rims bzhin du bstan par bya// / ga rgya 'di dag khyad par gyi// mtshan nyid yang dag rab bshad bya// me tog zum pa'i tshul bzhin du// thal mo lags par bsdams
174a6(rgyud): par bya sangs rgyas dpa' bo thams cad kyi// pad+ma'i thal mo zhes su bsgrags// sems dpa' mchog ni legs brkyang ba// pad+ma'i phyag rgya zhes su brjod// re re'i mtshams su nges bcings pa// de ni rdo rje
174a7(rgyud): thal mor brtags// sor mo thams cad nges bsdams pa// rdo rje bsdams pas legs bcings pa// sor mo brkyang sta steng du bstan// sangs rgyas byang chub rab gsol byed// khu tshur nang du byas nas
174a8(rgyud): ni nga gnyis ka sbyar bas yongasu brtag/ 'khor lo sgyur sogs phyag rgya'o// dam pa sbyin pa yin par bshad// sangs rgyas dpa' bo thams cad kyi// dam tshig phyag rgya 'di yi no// ming med nang bcun
174b1(rgyud): Ta tshur gyis/ kun gyi gtso mong yongasu brtag rdo rje'i rnam par lags par sbyar// rdo rje chen po na su bsgrags ma ba 'u chung srin lag khu tshur las// gung mo lags par bskyangs nas suka mdzub mos
174b2(rgyud): mthe bong yongasu sbyar// 'khor los bsgyur ba nyid gsol byed// brkyang ba'i rtse mo sbyar ba ni// gdugs dkar zhes ni rab tu grags// srin lag dang ni mthe bong sbyar// gung mo gnyis ni brtag par bya/ 
174b3(rgyud): gzi brji phreng ba phyag rgya che// gzi brjid phreng ba nyid gsol byed// de nyid ral gri lta bur sbyar// rnam par rgyal ba zhes su grags//  nyid rgyal ba zhes bya ba// rdo rje ldan pa de bzhin gshegs// khu chur
174b4(rgyud): snying po ldan byas pas// gtsug tor rnam pa'i 'byung gnas te// thub dka' sangs rgyas thams cad kyis// steng du 'gro ba zhesu bshad// rdo rje bsdams pa yongasu sbyar// dam tshig kun gyi 'byung gnas te/ 
174b5(rgyud): gung mo'i rtse mo mchog tu gnas/ mtha'u chung ni mthe bong ba/ rkyang / lcags kyu mda' yi sbyor ba yas// legaso ba ni/ sbyar bar bya// gung mo rdo rje rin chen rtse// phye ba gzi brjid mchog
174b6(rgyud): gi mchog/ rgyal mtshan gnas nges par sbyar// bzhad pa'i gnas su sbyar bar bya// rdo rje chos kyi phyag rgya che// dbu ma pad+ma lta bus bskum// ram gri'i chos 'jam pa'i dbyangs// 'khor los bsgyur
174b7(rgyud): ba'i 'khor lo 'dra// khang bye ma'i phyag rgya che// rdo rje smra ba nyid du 'gyur// las kyi rdo rje'i phyag rgya ni// gar mtshungs rdo rje sna tshogs can// chos yongs sdud pa'i sbyor ba yis// rdo rje srung
174b8(rgyud): brtag par bya/ mche ba gnyis ni rnam par gtsigs// rdo rje gnod sbyin zhesu bshad// khu tshur bcangs pa khu tshur gyis// rdo rje thal mo snying khar bzhag/ rdo rje sgeg mo zhesu grags// yongasuM sbyar
175a1(rgyud): ba spyi bor bzhag/ rdo rje phreng ba zhes su brjed// bal mo sbyar ba gdong du sgrol/ rdo rje glu mar rjesu bsgrags// 'gyed cing 'dud pa'i spyod pa yis// 
175a2(rgyud): de ni rdo rje gangs bshad// bawA bal mo gang du ste// spyi bo yosasu sbyar la bzhag/ snyi kha ma'i me gnyis po lda// gdong ni lags par brgyung ba bya// lag pa steng du
175a3(rgyud): brkyang ba/ gzugs kyi phyag rgya nyid du 'gyur// lag gnyis rna ba'i lam du bzhag/ sgra yi phyag rgya nyid du bshang // dri ni byug pa'i sbyor ba yis// dri yi phyag rgya zhes su brjod// 'do
175a4(rgyud): du snyom pa bye ba ni// rdo oM phyag rgya zhes su bsgrag/ sa// mkha' la myur ba'i sbyor ba yis// reg pa reg pra zhes su bshad// mthe'u chung gnyis ni yongs su sbyar/ 
175a5(rgyud): mdzub mo lcags kyu'i sbyor ba las// de nyid zhags pa'i dbyings dang ni// lu gu rgyud kyi rnam par brtag/ bzhi pa/ rdo rje dril bu zhes// rdo rje 'bebs par rnam par brtag/ phyag rgya
175a6(rgyud): kun dang nye ba'i rgya// blo gros ldan pa rang gis brtag/ thal mo yongasu sbyar la bsdams// mdzub mo gnyis po bskams nas ni// rin po che yi rnam par bcing // kun tu bzang po blo ldan
175a7(rgyud): gyis de las rtse mo rtse mo bsgrub// sems kyi byams pa bsgoms na su// mdzub mo sbyar la bcug nas ni// ral gri'i rnam pa brtag pa ste// 'di ni na mkha'i snying po yi// phyag rgyar sangs
175a8(rgyud): rgyas kun gyis bsngags// de nas ral gri'i me tshan ma yi// rnam pa ra nI nyer gnas pa// phyag rgya 'di ni rnam 'gog par// thams cad kyis ni yongs su brjod// gar ni sdud pa'i
175b1(rgyud): stso la mas// rdo rje bal mo rab tu babyung // bad+ma'i lha bu rnam par brtag/ pad+ma'i lag pacwo ldan gyis// de nyid ma tog zus tshub dang // ud pa la rnam pa ltar mdzes pa// 'di ni
175b2(rgyud): bo ma spel ba'i rtsa// pad+ma'i mtshan po nas su grags/ mchib gtsigs pa dang ldan pa'i// pa dang 'dra bar legs par brtag/ 'di na rgya mgrin phyag rgya ste// kha yi phyogs su ra
175b3(rgyud): brtag/ pad+ma'i thal mo dpral ba yi// khro gnyer du ni nye bar sbyar// rdo rje thal mo 'bebs pa che// dpal gyi snying po rin chen ldan// yid bzhin nor bu'i rnam pa bzung // thal mo lags
175b4(rgyud): bar rab tu brkyang // mi bzed blo gros phyag rgya che/ sangs rgyas kun gyis rab tu brtag/ gang ni sdud pa'i spyor ba yis// rin chen rdo rje snying khar bzhagagan mkhara' mdzod kyi phyag
175b5(rgyud): rgya ste// nam mkha'i mdzod nyid ster bar byed// rdo rje chen po legs par brkyang // mtha'u chung ma pa dong ngas bar bcing // lag pa gnyis ni nges par brtag/ blo gros rgya mche
175b6(rgyud): phyag rgyar 'gyur// rdo rje thal mo steng du sgang // mdzub mo gnyis po sbyar bar bya// 'di ni rdo rje snying po'i rgya// rdo rje snying pos bka' stsal to// khu tshur nang du byas nas su// mdzub mo gnyis po
175b7(rgyud): rtse mo sbyar// 'di ni 'jam dpal phyag rgya ste// rdo rje ral gri zhes su brtag/ de nyid shaka ti'i rnam pa ni// 'jam pa'i dbyangs ni blo ldan gyi'o// gshin rje mthar pad mdung rtser 'gyur// mdung rtse
175b8(rgyud): chen po rab tu brtag/ mdzub mo bskum par byas nas ni// gung mo'i steng du yongasu bzhag/ zhags pa'i rnam pa rab ldan pas// gshin rje yang ni 'tshogs par byed/ gad 'di ral grong
176a1(rgyud): byas pa ni/ sgra ban gyi rurab tu bshad// bu tshur mas cad nges btsas te// badzubya me gcig ni bskum pa sh+tsa// 'di ni nye ba'i sgra can rgyang // 'jam pa'i rang
176a2(rgyud): kyis bka' stsal to// rdo rje bsdams pa steng bcings te// dbu ma gnyis ni rnam par spang // mdzub mo rdo rje'i rnam par bya// mo'i chung dang ni mthe deng brkyang // 'di ni rdo rje 'dzin chen
176a3(rgyud): 'i dpag rgyu den kun sgrub byed yin// mdzub mo mam bang bsdams pa ni// mA ma kIr ni yongasu bshad// mdzub me lcogs sgrog rnam pa las// gung me'i dbu ma rdo rje sh+ya// 
176a4(rgyud): nirdo rje ljogros sgeg rgya// rdo rje la bur yo shad// rdo rje nu po rtsa lnga pa// khro bo gzigs mnganas bshad// mchog gi rba mo rje gcig bya// rdo rje rje so
176a5(rgyud): kyi bshad// lag na rin chen phyag rgya ni// lag/ gnyis legs par brkyang bar bya// ser me pad+ma'i dpying su bya// bskul byed lha mor yongs su bshad // thal mo
176a6(rgyud): yongs su sbyar ba las// mdzub mo dang ni mthe bong dag/ mig gi tshul du sbyar bar bya// sangs rgyas sman gyir rnam par bshad// bkra shis kyi ni skyil krungs bca'// rnal 'byor rig
176a7(rgyud): bas lus srang ste// lag gnyis lhung bzed 'dzin 'drag/ bsam gtan phyag rgya rab tu bshad// 'di ni rnam par snang mdzad rgya// sangs rgyas kun gyi don mdzad pa'i// mi bskyod pa yi
176a8(rgyud): sa la reg/ rin chen tog gi mchog sbyin bshad// bsam gtan phyag rgya 'od dpag med// ngo bo nyid kyi don rtogs byed// don yod gzigs pa'i phyag rgya ni// mi 'jigs pa ni med pa sbyin/ 
176b1(rgyud): rdo lda rdzas 'byer skyis krung gnas// sangs rgyal kun gyi rang bzhin pa ga/ mnyam par gzhag pas bag m+b+ha kun// 'ching ba 'am ni 'ching du gzhug/ 'jig rten pa yi phyag rgya la// lag pa gcig
176b2(rgyud): ni rang brkyang ste// dbang ldan gyi ni rtse gsum pa// mthe bong mthe chung mnan par bya// lha yi dbang bo'i rdo rjer gyur// lag pa g.yas pas brtag par bya// me yi oM yig lag pa dag/ mtha
176b3(rgyud): bong gung mo nying la banag/ gshin rje'i rdo rje dbyug pa ste// mdzub mo dang ni mthe bong sbyar// de nyid khyab mjug 'khor lo ste// 'khor lo'i yi ge dgod par bya// lag pa gcig gis thod pa
176b4(rgyud): ni ma mo rnams kyir yang dag bshad// sor mo gnyis sbrang ral gri ni// srin po'i bdag nyid chen po'i 'o// mdzub mo mthe bong sbyar ba ni// chu lha'i zhagus pa nyid du bshad
176b5(rgyud): mdzubu mo dang ni gung mo dag/ rgyal mtshan lta bur legs bar brkyang // rlung lha rgyal mtshan phyag rgya ni// lag pa gnyis kyi rab tu brtag/ dbu ma gcig pu lags brkyang ba/ 
176b6(rgyud): dbyug tho'i phyag rgya rab tu bshad// gnod sbyin kun gyi dbang phyug ni// lus ngan bdag nyid chen po'o// mchod par thogs kyi phyag rgya ni// tshangs pa yi ni legs par bshad// drag
176b7(rgyud): bo'i gsal shing shes bya ste// lha mo'i baT+Ti sa ru brjod// tshogs bdag gi ni sA ru bshad// zla ba'i bdud rtsi'i dkyil 'khor ro// nyi mi'i 'od zer stong phrag ni// lag pa gnyis kyis
176b8(rgyud): bstan par bya// 'od kyi dkyil 'khor sbyor ba yis// dbang po'i rdo rje mtshon cha ltar// 'di ni lha rnams kun gyi rgya// dpa' bo kun gyi rab tu gnas// dri za rnams kyi phyag rgya ni// glu
177a1(rgyud): lan su bcu rab tu bsngags// dag da gang byug pag rgya che// rdo rje'i sgra dngas rab tu 'ab// sangs rgyal thams cad pa mchod byir// do chen pos
177a2(rgyud): ni rab tu brtags// ting ting cag 'dzin sbyor ba yis// dri za rnams kyi rab tu bsgrogs// bi wang sbyang ba'i sbyor ba yis// dbyangs can gyir ni rnam par bshad// rtag tu dun du b+hi sgeg
177a3(rgyud): pa/ rig pa 'dzin pa rnams kyi brjod// lag gnyis gdangs ka'i tshul byas pa// klu rnams kyir ni legs par bshad// gar ni sdud pa'i sbyor ba yis// 'gyad dang 'dud
177a4(rgyud): ba'i de bzhin no// lag pa zhags pa'i ngas bcings pa// de ni phyag rgyar rob tu bshad// 'di rnams dam tshig phyag rgya ru// de bzhin gshegs rnams lags par gsungs// 
177a5(rgyud): las kyi sbyor ba 'bad pa yin// 'di rnams kyang ni phyag rgya bshad// phyag rgya dor nas sems kyi ni// rin chen yang dang yang du bsam// rnam par rtog med gdod nas
177a6(rgyud): ni chos dbyings mnyam zhing mi mnyam pa// stong pa mkha' 'drar shes na su// mkhas pa yis ni bsgom par bya// 'di dag thams cad ma skyes shing // rmi lam lta burang rab tu
177a7(rgyud): gnas// dri zi grong khyer lta bur snang // 'tshe ba'i 'jig rten yang dang yang // mig 'phrul lta bur shin tu ni// 'gro ba thams cad rab tu gsal// mi rtag sdug bsngal stong paru// 
177a8(rgyud): srid pa thams cad mdor sdus pa// bdag med pa zhes mthong nas ni// sangs rgyas kun dang dpa' bo yo// sgyu ma smig rgyu drag cha dang / sdu ba chu yi chu bur dang // gzugs brtan lta bur 'jig rten
177b1(rgyud): ning ljangasangs rgyas rnams kyis dgongs// thams cad 'gal me'i 'khor lo ltar// tho chun khyud mo ji bzhin du ka gar gyi gnas kyi tshul 'dra bang // zla ba gnyis dang mtshungs par blta// rtag tu
177b2(rgyud): glog gi phreng ba 'dra// sbrang bu'i sgra dang mtshus par bshad// 'khor ba shin tu brlang ba ste// rbadra ma'i kha dang 'dra bar gnas// 'di ltar shes shing rtogs nas ni// sgom pa'i stobs kyi rang bzhin
177b3(rgyud): gyis/ sems ni legs sgrib rnal 'byor pa// de la phyag rgyarab tu bshad// stong pa mtshan ma med pa dang // smon pa med pa'i rang bzhin las// lus dang ngag dang yid kyis ni// dam tshis
177b4(rgyud): gsum ni brtags pa'o// phyag rgya sngags dang lha nyid dang // de nyid gsum ni rab tu gnas// bdag nyi sbyor ba'i rnal 'a dbyor gyis// mtshan nyid gcig tu rnam par gnas// de
177b5(rgyud): 'di dam pa'i phyag rgya // sangs rgyas rnams kyis bka' stsal to// phyag rgya yi ge dral ba ste// rnam pa med cing snang ste// ngos po med pa'i tshogs rnams la// dngos po'i de
177b6(rgyud): zhing nyid du bshad// dngos med dngos po'i rang bzhin yin// dngos med nyid kyang dngos po yin// dngos dang dngos meng rnam par grol// rnal 'byor ye shes mchog tu bde// rtog ge med cing snang ba
177b7(rgyud): mdang 'khrul pa med cing yi ga med// stong pa namakha' mtshungs pa'i sems// gang che de ltar nyid 'gyur ba// de tshe phyag rgya rnams dang sngags// lha nyid du yang rab tu brtag/ sngags las
177b8(rgyud): phyag rgya ma mthong shing // phyag rgya las kyang sngags min cing // rang nyid lha yi rnal 'byor ni// gnyis mad sngags dang phyag rgyar brtags// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje snying po
178a1(rgyud): rgyan ces bya ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po las phyag rgya'i rim par phye ba'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad slar yang 'dus par gyur te/ 
178a2(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor los sgyur ba chen po rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po la gsol ba btab pa// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs bskyed par mdzad du gsol/ 
178a3(rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa de dag gis gsol ba btab pa'i cho ga nye bar gsan nas/ 'og min gyi gnas nas bon te dga' ldan gyi gnasu bzhugs nas dga' ldan gyi ris kyi lha'i bu
178a4(rgyud): rnams la chos bstan nas zas gtsang gi rigs la mngon par gzigs te/ mngon par byung bar mdzad nas byang chub kyi snying po dag la nye bar gnas nas nye bar 'khod de// bdud bzhi lnga
178a5(rgyud): rnam par rgyal bar bstan nas byang chub kyi snying po la ba zhugs par gyur te/ bzhugs nas kyang kun nas 'odz+ra rje / ting 'dzin sngon du 'gro ba'i ting 'dzin bya ba brgya stong phrag brgyad cu
178a6(rgyud): rtsa bzhi la snyoms par zhugs te/ snyoms par zhugs nas kyang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rjes gol gyi sgras de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad spyan 'dren cing gsang sngags 'di
178a7(rgyud): gsung so// oM sarba ta thA ga ta badz+ra sa mA dza a kaR+Sha ya sarba ta thA ga tAn hUM/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'khor dang bcas pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po rnams lags par bon te chos kyi
178a8(rgyud): dbying su spros nas phyogs bcu mu med pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad khyab pa'i rgya mtsho'i sprin rnams bkang ste/ na mkha'i khams na gnas pa thams cad til gyi gang bu ltar 'jam
178b1(rgyud): bu'i gling du 'khod par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug gis bkug cing bcug ste bcings nas dbang du mdzad// nga nyid kyi thugs khar rab tu bzhag par gyur to// 
178b2(rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'dis rdo rje rnal 'byer gyi bang byug chen pos gnyisu med pa'i skyeng bas byin gyis brlazlas te/ sngags 'dis rang gi sems so sor rtogs par mdzad// oM tsit+tha pra ti'i d+hi
178b3(rgyud): ro ming de'i rjes thogs nyid la sangs rgyas thams cad kyis bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzod kyi thugs khar long spyod rdzogs pa dang / sprul pa'i sku las chos sku rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba
178b4(rgyud): sems rin po nges par 'byung ste spros par mdzadado// de nyi da sems 'od gsal gzug rje chen po sa khab pade ba ni/ na gshegs pa thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid gzung ba dang
178b5(rgyud): 'dzin pa'i rnyog pa spangs pa namakha' ltar gdod nas zhi ba de las thugs rje chen po la mngon par phyogs par byas nas sems can gyi khams thams cad la rnam par gzigs
178b6(rgyud): ta mri shes pas rga ba dang / 'chi bas rnam par khab par 'jig rten la gzigs nas slar yang sngags 'di byang chub kyi sems nye bar bskyed pa bstan pa/ oM b+ho d+hi tsit+ta ud pA da yA mi byang chub
178b7(rgyud): kyi sems bskyed pa'i rdzas thogs nyid la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis de'i thugs khar sems 'od gsal ba de yongasu rdzogs pa'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor ltar byin gyis brlabs te
178b8(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs khar rnam par bzhago// legs par rnam par dag pa'i rnamakha'i ltar dri ma med pa/ spros pa thams cad spangs pa me long lta bur brten par byas nas
179a1(rgyud): gnas te byang chub kyi sems chen po la sngags 'di pe // oM dz+nyA na ra smai bi sra dzaHhUM/ de'i rjes thogs nyid la 'od zeng rnam pa sna tshogs pa zla ba'i dkyil 'khor las rnam pa
179a2(rgyud): phyung nga byung nas kyang rjes kyi dbyings kyi pho brang du zhugs te/ shes bya'i dkyil 'khor thams cad gsal bar byas nas sems can tha~Md kyi sems kyi ri ze'i rtse mo bsnyil te rab tu rtogs par bas
179a3(rgyud): nas gcig tu 'dris te/ rje rje'i sku chen po rnams bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs khar rje su zhugs nas zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbus rab tu gnaso// de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rnol
179a4(rgyud): 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen pos sngags 'di byin gyis pa thA so// oM triSh+Tha badz+ra pa ra da b+hU ya pany+tsa mu d+ha/ slar yang sngags 'dis spros pa/ oM s+pharar+ya badz+ra/ slar yang sngags 'dis bsdu so// oM
179a5(rgyud): siM sa ra badz+ra/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thabs sad kyis ya/ shes rdo rje'i snying po 'di ched du brjod pa oM dz+nyA na dz+ra/ da nas/ bcom 'das rdo rje rnal 'byer gyi dang drug chen pos sngags
179a6(rgyud): 'dis byin gyis brlabs pa// oM sarba ta thA ga badz+nyA na badz+ra hUM/ de nas de benan gshegs patha~Md kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs mi nyam pa 'ad mnyes pas sngags 'dis byin gyis bzlas pa/ oM badz+ra At+ma
179a7(rgyud): de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad brtan pa nyid du nye bar gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs gzigs nas sngags
179a8(rgyud): 'das byin gyis brlab par mdzad// oM ya thA sarba ta thA ga tasta thA a ha ma bi/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku sems can thams cad kyi don mdzad pa'i rgyu
179b1(rgyud): sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sku bdag nyid sems can gyi khams thams cad du nges par bstan to// de nas brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rkyen skyong ba rnams kyis mthong nas lha dang mi rnams kyi mngon
179b2(rgyud): par byang chub pas bcom ldan 'das mngon par byang chub pa zhes sgra bsgragaso// de nas tshangs pas gsol ba btab te/ chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor nas de dang des 'dul ba'i skye bo
179b3(rgyud): btul te gang gis slar ldog pa med pa nyid du gyur to// 'di rnams ni sangs rgyas kyi byang chub sgom pa'i rim pa'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad ting 'dzin de las bzhengs
179b4(rgyud): nas sangs rgyas kyi byang chub bstan te/ sems can thams cad kyi don mdzad pa nye bar bsgrubs nas de thugs kha las rje phyung ste nyid kyi phyag du bzhag par gyur to// de nas 'ad
179b5(rgyud): zer rnam par phyung ste// 'jig rten gyis khams thams cad bar mdzad nas slar log ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs/ khar zhugs nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po kun tu
179b6(rgyud): ba'ang po'i skur byin gyis brlabs te mtshan nyid thams cad yongs su rdzogs par rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa / dang dang phreng bas dbang bskur ba zla ba ro'i dag lta bu'i 'od zer can du/ byin gyis
179b7(rgyud): brlangs te rnam par gnaso// de nas thugs kha nas phyung nas zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la brtan te/ de bzhin gshegs pa tha~Md kyi spyan snga dang / rgyab dang drung du rdo rje sems dpa' dang / rdo rje chos dang / 
179b8(rgyud): rin chen dang / rdo rje las la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i phreng ba rnam par gnaso// de bzhin du sgeg me la sogs pa rnams dang / bdag pa la sogs pa khang par du nges par
180a1(rgyud): bskyed cing gzugs la sogs pa rnams dang / lcags kyu la sogs pa'i lha rnams bskrad da 'di dag gi dkyil 'khor bka' sprul pa// de nas yang dag bshad pa ga/ dkyil 'khor chen po
180a2(rgyud): mchog gyur pa// sangs rgyas dpa' bo thams cad kyis// rdo rje snying po zhesu gsungs / kya pa cwa 'i gang dang po tog phreng bas brgyan// sgo logs dang ni rig byed dang ka/ rta babs kyis ni so sor spras// de yi
180a3(rgyud): busu khri chen po// kun nas yongs su gru bzhi pa// de yi stang du pang chen po// ga sar ldan zhing ra mdzes pa// de yi lte ba'i dbusu ni// sangs rgyas sku gzugs dgang bar bya// sangs rgyas
180a4(rgyud): kyi ni drung kun tu// sangs rgyas thams cad dgod par bya// sangs rgyas kun gyi nye 'khor du ka 'khor los sgyur ba la sogs bri// phyi yi gnas ni thams cad du// sangs rgyas sras po rnam
180a5(rgyud): par dgod// kha dog ser po gzi brjid che// dang tshon dkyil 'khor rab 'bar ba// thams cad rnam pa sna tshogs rgyan// brgyan pa de dag dgod par bya// rdo rje snying po'i rgyan gyi rgyud/ 
180a6(rgyud): chen po las dbang chen gyi dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi slar yang chu'i lha'i dkyil 'khor chen po bka' stsal pa/ de nas yang dag bshad
180a7(rgyud): b+ha ga/ dkyil 'khor chen po mchog gyur pa// chos kyi 'khor lo 'dra bas na// chos kyi 'khor lo zhes su brjod// nga yi phyi rol gnyis pa la// zlum por ni rtogs par bya// ri mo rnam pa snga
180a8(rgyud): tshogs pas// sgo dang sgo logs brtag par bya// rta babs rnam pa sna tshogs pa// dang dang me tog phreng bas rgyan// de yi dbus su bang chen pos// ge sar ldan zhing rab mdzes pa// 'dab ma brgya
180b1(rgyud): kyika pa la// kyil 'khor brgyad kyis brtan pa'o// dkyil 'khor de yi dbus su ni// rgyal ba thams cad dkar po mchog khab bzho ltar dag gsal// shel dang zla ba lta bu'i 'od// kun da zla ba ltar/ 
180b2(rgyud): dkar bstan// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus son par// de yi nye 'khor thams cad du// sangs rgyas sras po rnam par dgod // thams cad zla ba ltar dkar zhing // zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas ba
180b3(rgyud): mtshon cha sna tshogs zla ba 'dra// zla ba 'bar mtshung mnyam med pa// chu yi ming zhes bya ba yo// dkyil 'khor ngam pa nyid du 'dong // rdo rje snying po rgyan gyi rgyud chen po las chu lha'i dkyil 'khor
180b4(rgyud): gyi cho ga'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen pos me lha zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po bka' stsal pa/ de nas yang dag bshad
180b5(rgyud): bya ba dkyil 'khor chen po mchog gyur pa// rdo rje ye // sa gzi rjid mtshungs// rdo rje gzi brjid cesu brjod// gru gsum rnam pa nyid du bya// shing rta'i rnam pa dang
180b6(rgyud): mtshungs shing // 'bar ba'i phrang 'khrugs 'jigs pa'o// kha dog dmar po stobs po che// 'jig pa'i dus kyi me 'dra ba// rtag tu pad+ma rA ga mtshungs// de yi dbus gzi brjid cha// nyi ma'i
180b7(rgyud): kha dog stobs po che// rdo rje rtse gsum sna tshogs pa// shing rta'i snying khar banag par bya// bal po se'u'i me tog mtshungs// ya ba'i me tog dag dang 'dra// pad+ma pad+ma rA ga mtshungs// 
180b8(rgyud): sangs rgyas dpa' bo yang dag 'bar// bzang po ngas tshul sa// rgya skyegs bcud dang 'dra bar gnas// de yi nya 'khor thams cad du// de bzhin sangs rgyas sangs rgyas sras// khro ba
181a1(rgyud): dang ni mngag pa dag/ mkhas pa yis ni dgong par bya// de dag thams cad kha dog dmar// gzi brjid khams la 'od ldan pa// 'od zer dmar po rab 'phro ba// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor
181a2(rgyud): dbus son par// thams cad dmar po'i mtshon cha can// dmar po'i rgyan gyis rnam par brgyan// dmar po'i gos kyis bka' ba'i lus// phreng ba dmar po mchog 'dzin pa// 'di ni gzi brjid gtor
181a3(rgyud): zhes byang da dkyil 'khor mchog tu 'bar ba'o// rdo rje snying po rgyan gyi rgyud chen po las me lha zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po rdzog so// / de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis
181a4(rgyud): slar yang rlung lha'i dkyil 'khor bka' stsal pa/ de nas yang dag pashad ba ba// dkyil 'khor chen po mchog gyur pa// rlung gi khams dang 'dra bas na// rlung gi dkyil
181a5(rgyud): 'khor na su bshad// zla ba phyed pa'i rnam pa 'dra// byar gyi sprin gyi 'od dang mtshungs// a ta si yi me tog 'dra// in+d+ra nA la'i 'od dang mtshungs// de yi dbus su bang chen
181a6(rgyud): bo bADU R+Ya'i 'od dang 'dra// shin tu gnas pa'i mig sman mtshungs// sngon dmar gyi ni rnam par gnas// de yi lte ba'i dbus ni// sangs rgyas dpa' bo rab 'bar ba// rgyal po 'khyil
181a7(rgyud): ba 'bar ba'i gzi// mtshan mo nag mo lta bur gnas// ud pal sngon po 'dab ma'i tshul// stong pa na mkha' lta bur gnas// de yi nye 'khor thams cad du// rgyal dang rgyal ba'i sras
181a8(rgyud): rnams bri// khro bo rnams dang mngag pa dang // de bzhin po nya po nya mo// thams cad sna tshogs rgyan gyis brgyan// de bzhin nag po'i gos gyon pa// ba dan rnam pa sna tshogs bsdams// kha dog nag po
181b1(rgyud): thams cad du// gdugs ni rnam pa du ma'i dbyibs// kha dog sna tshogs lags 'bar ba// bla ra rgyas pa mnyam pa ni// kha dog nag po sna tshogs pa// dngos po kun gyi rang bzhin gyi// mdor bsdus
181b2(rgyud): nas ni bsgom par bya// dkyil 'khor chen po 'di lta bu// sangs rgyas kun gyi rjes skyob pa// bris nas shes rab can gyis sgom// gal te dngos grub rang 'dod na// rdo rje snying po rgyan
181b3(rgyud): gyi rgyud chen po las rlung lha'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga'o// // de nas bcom ldan las rnams kyis slar yang ting nge 'dzin la spobs par zhugs te/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dang
181b4(rgyud): phyug chen po la gsel ba btab pas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis de kho na nyid kyi sgrub pa'i thabs bka' stsa la du gsol de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rnal
181b5(rgyud): 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po de rnams kyis gsol ba btab pa'i tshig nye bar gsan nas sgrub pa'i thabs kyi cho ga mchog tu gsang ba chen po bka' sprul pa/ sgeg mo sogs
181b6(rgyud): pas mchod pa kun// yang dag mdor bsdus byas nas ni// sangs rgyas kun gyi sku chen por// bdag gi rtag tu bsgom par bya// sngags kyi yi ge yang dag ldan// 'dod pa
181b7(rgyud): ster ba'i sku ru bya// sgra dang gzugs dang de bzhin sbyor// yi ge'i phreng ba de bzhin te// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// sngags pas thams cad rnam par bsam// hUM sngags pas
181b8(rgyud): snying khar son pa sgom// gsang sngags dag pa brjod nasu// de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs dag pa// dung gi sgra ru rab tu brjod// dril bu'i sgra ni rab gsal ba// pad+ma rnal 'byor dbang phyu'o/ dus pa/ 
182a1(rgyud): sprin gyi hUM gi sgra// tsa Ta tsa Ta'i sgra 'phro ba// rdo rje rin chen dbang phyug gis// sla ru de bzhin gshegs rnams gsungs// nor bu las kyi rigs kyi yang // rnga chen ska ru rab tu bshad/ 
182a2(rgyud): bi lang gling bu de bzhin gru// gang kyi rkyen gyi sgra dang mi// rdza rje'i nga swa hUM gi sgra// spyi yi 'od du rab tu bshad// rtog pa kun las rnam par sbyar// sgrub pa'i thabs kyi las rnams dang // de nas gzugs
182a3(rgyud): kyi bzlas pa mchog/ go rims ji bzhin rab tu bshad// dgug dang gzhug dang bcing ba dang // lha rnams dbang du bya ba ste// de la rang gi tshul rab sbyar// sngags dang phyag rgya rab tu sbyar// de
182a4(rgyud): rjes rnam pa kun gyi mchog/ rtag tu lus chen bsam byab ste/ lha yi sku gzugs bsgom par bya// lag pa'i phyag rgya rab nges pa'i// phyag rgya 'ang snying khor son shes bya// rang gi
182a5(rgyud): rigs rim cho ga yis// de yi lus ni 'od gsal zhing // sgron ma'i 'od ltar gsal ba'i khyim// de ltar kun nas bla/ mas cad du// kun nas baspu'i tshangs nas// 'od zer 'bar ba'i drang
182a6(rgyud): dag 'as// gzugs kyi bzlas pa zhes su bshad// de nas sbyor ba'i bzlas pa yis// gsang sngags sgrub pa brtsam par bya// mchod dang byin rlazlas dbang bskur mchog/ spro la sogs rim thams
182a7(rgyud): cad du/ sbyor ba'i bzlas pa gtso bo 'di// 'bad pa yis ni rab tu bshad// snying kha mgrin pa mchu lci min// rkan dang spyi bo nyid ma yino// nang min byi dang gnyis par min// chos ni 'ba'
182a8(rgyud): shig kho na la// bzlas pa'i sgra yang 'byung mi yin// 'di ni bcom ldan rnal 'byor che// shes rab pha rol phyin gsol ba// sgom pa'i sngags pa de nyid ni// rnal 'byor pa yi gnas su
182b1(rgyud): bshad 'di nas rdza su mdor bsdus te// snying kha'i dkyil 'khor rab zlum pa// zla ba gang ba ltar bsam bya// dri ma med cing lags par gnas// de la yi ge rnam par dgod// tshig gi phreng ba ma
182b2(rgyud): chad pa// mu tig phreng ba ltar rgyas pa// char sprin gyi ni me 'dra'i 'od// de tshe thams cad gsal bar byed// lha yi lus ni snang byed cing // ji lta ji lha yi ge'i drang // mchog gi lus la rab
182b3(rgyud): 'jug pa// de lta de ltar sngags kyi lus// lha yi bdag nyid nyid du 'gyur// mthu stobs lnga dbang thams cad ni// tshangs pa khab 'jug las chen lhag/ bzlas pa'i de nyid mchog 'di ni/ 
182b4(rgyud): sangs rgyas kun gyi bsngags pa'o// ji ltar rnam par sa mas ni sgom pa yi// da ltar dngos grub mchog tu 'gyur// rdo rje'i snying po rgyan gyi rgyud chen po las bzlas pa'i de kho na nyid
182b5(rgyud): kyi le'u'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rnam 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen pos// de bzhin gshegs pa/ thams cad kyi bstod pa rin po che bka' stsal pa// mnyam
182b6(rgyud): med mi g.yo mnyam med mchog gi chos nyid can// thugs rje'i bdag nyid 'gro ba'i sdug bsngal sel bar mdzad// yon tan mtha' yas dngos grub thams cad sbyin mdzad pa/ dri mang mi g.yo
182b7(rgyud): mnyam mang dam pa'i mchog chos can// yon tan shin tu phra ba'i cha la 'ang tshad med de// de ba ni na mkha' dang yang bskrun du yod ma yin// dngos grub mtha' yas mnyam med dpa dang bral ba
182b8(rgyud): rnams// sems can khams la dngos grub mchog rnams nges par stsol// rtag tu dri mang thugs rje'i shugs las byung // smon lam grub pa 'gag pa med pa'i chos nyid can// 'gro
183a1(rgyud): ba'i don grub rab tu brtson pa mtha' yas pa// thugs rje chen po'i bdag nyid rtag tu rnam par snang // tshad mad tshad dang bral ba shin tu rtogs pa yi// bde bar gshegs
183a2(rgyud): ba go 'phang dam pa brnyas gyur kyang // khams gsum rnams la dngos grub mchog stsol mdzad pa yi// thugs rje'i spong pa mi g.yo 'gags par yong mi 'gyur// e ma'o shin tu
183a3(rgyud): bzang po'i chos nyid mchog dang ldan// mchog sbyin rnams kyi nang na go 'phang mchog brnyas pa// khams gsum kun la rtag tu dngos grub mchog stsol mdzad// mgon po dus gsum
183a4(rgyud): sgrib pa med pa rab mkhyen pas// dam tshig mchog gsum dngos grub dam pa bdag la gsol// 'di de sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// yang dag yon tan rgyas pa
183a5(rgyud): ste/ lan cig tsam zhig brjod pas kyang // ga mang sngags thams cad 'grub par 'gyur// bstod pa'i// rgyal po 'di yis ni// de bzhin gshegs de kun bstod
183a6(rgyud): nas// rab yangs dngos grub stsol gyur te// bskal par gnas shing bskal bar bskul// lus ni g.yo ba med pa ru// bdag nyid brtan par byas pa yis// mgon po chen po
183a7(rgyud): rnam snang mdzad// mi bskyod rin chen 'byung gnas dang // rgyal bdag pa 'od dpag med// don yod rgyal ba thams cad du// dngul chu bcud ldan da nyidi dang // mchog kyang rab tu gsol bar
183a8(rgyud): byed/ dngos grub yid gyi ma lus la// rgyas pa'i don dang phun sum tshogs// re ba thams cad yongs rdzogs pa// yid la 'dod pa ster bar byed// ye shes tshe dang stobs dang shugs/ mchog tu
183b1(rgyud): dag pa gsol bar mdzad// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bstod pa'i rgyal po zhes pa brdzog so// // de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen pos de bzhin
183b2(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi dngos grub kyi cho ga rgyas ba sa pa// tshes grangs med cing rgyu skar med// smyung bar gnas pa'i cho ga med// ji ltar bshad pa tsho gas bslab pa'i gnas nye bar
183b3(rgyud): b.rung ste gang yang rung ba'i yid dga' bar ji ltar 'dra ba'i dkyil 'khor byas te/ me tog sil ma bkram la 'dug spos kyis bdug ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la ji ltar nus pa'i
183b4(rgyud): ma tog la sogs pa'i mchod pa byas te/ sngags la dis yid kyis kyang sdig pa bshags te/ mo sarba pA pa ta/ k+Sha yig krI Sh+Ta ka ma na so tA pu te rAg dri la mo ha ma mA na mA na
183b5(rgyud): biSh+Ta na ya da kr-i te traM ka li ka hUM hUM hU~M phaT la phaH/ sarba dzA baM so Ta yA mi swAhA/ oM sarba dA pre pra ti sha yA mi swA hA// de'i rjes thogs la bdag nyid kyis dngos pa dbul
183b6(rgyud): bar ba swa/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta nA na At+ma b+ha ba nir yA ta ya mi/ sarba ta thA ga taHpra ti gr-ih+Nan+tu mAM swA hA// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bsod nams la rje su yi rang ba ni// oM sarba ta thA
183b7(rgyud): ga pur+Na dz+nyA nA saM b+ha rAn a nu mo yA mi swA hA/ yang dang yang du byang chub kyi sems bskyed pa/ rang bzhin gyis grub pa'i sngags kyis bya ste/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta sa man+ta/ b+ha dra ma hA badz+ra/ sa ma
183b8(rgyud): yaM many+dzu bo d+hi tsit+ta/ ut+pA da yA mi swA hA/ de nas byang chub kyi sems bskyed pa'i rjes thogs la zla ba'i kha dog can zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la bzhugs pa'i bsod nams dang ye shes kyi
184a1(rgyud): tshogs yongasu rdzogs pa sa bcu'i dbang phyug nor bu rin po che chen po'i pad+ma'i snying po seng ge'i khri'i steng du bdag nyid bsam par bya'o// oM shud+d+hod+d+hoH/ sngags 'dis
184a2(rgyud): bdag yongasu dag dag par byas te/ oM swa b+ha ba shud+d+ha sarba ta thA ga tAHswa b+hA ba bi shad+d+ho Ne/ sngags 'dis bdag nyid chos kyi dbyings yangs pa 'od gsal ba'i snang bar shin tu gnas par bya ste/ 
184a3(rgyud): oM d+harma d+hA tu swa b+hA ba At+ma kon/ de nas skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis rgyan pa 'jig rten thams cad las shin tu 'das pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi skur
184a4(rgyud): bdag nyid sngags 'dris gnas par bya ste/ oM pra b+he shwa ro ha/ da bzhin du rim pa 'dis chos kyi dbyings rgya chen por spros nas bad ga nyid sangs rgyas nyid do// zhes nga rgyal bskyed la bdag bya
184a5(rgyud): ma lus pa'i dpung gzhan du byas la chos kyi dbyings rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal bar lhan cig gnas par byas te nye bar rgyas par thun mtshams bzhir bzlas pa bsam bor ba ste/ yi ge la
184a6(rgyud): rjesu gzhol ba'i yid kyis 'bum phrag nyi shu bzlas par bya zhing / nyi ma re rer stong phrag brgyad dam stong phrag re bzlas te ji sri gapa' mas sa dang / ga pur dang / gur gum la sogs pa rnams
184a7(rgyud): kyis dkyil 'khor bas te nye bar 'kho ba thams cad kyis mchod pa cho 'phrul gyi zla ba 'am/ sa ga'i nya gang ba la mar gyi mar me stong phrag brgyad spang la rdo rje skyil dkrung gis gnas te sna
184a8(rgyud): ma'i me tog gam mo tog pad+mas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / mchod rten mchod de ji srid 'dug gi sgra sgrogs pa mthos pa de srid du bzlas par bya'o// de nas de bzhin gshag
184b1(rgyud): / pa'i sku bdag la gsal bar 'gyur bar shes par bya'o// de nas sreg blugs 'bum phrag gcig dgang bar byas pas mtshan ma thams cad gsal bar 'gyuraro// bye ba phrag bzhi bzlas pas
184b2(rgyud): dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa'i sems can thams cad dbang du 'gyuraro// de nas sgrub pa chen po dad par 'dod pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtho gang ba'i tshad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa la
184b3(rgyud): mchod brtan byas la mchod rten re re'i mdun du stong phrag re re bzlas pa 'am yang na dri'i mchod rten gyi drung du 'bum lhag pa'i bye ba phrag bdun bzlaso// bde bar gshegs pa'i mtho
184b4(rgyud): gang ba'i tshad kyis mchod rten nyi ma re re la re ro ji srid bye ba phrag bdun bzlas pa rdzogs pa de srid du bya'o// tha ma'i mchod rten 'bar ba'i 'od des sgrub pa'i lus la zhugs
184b5(rgyud): bas brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba la// sogs nas ji srid dag pa'i gnas kyi ris kyi dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa'i lha rnams me tog char
184b6(rgyud): 'babs par 'gyuraro// lha dang klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yi dang // na mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci la sogs pa lo sa nas kyang bstod par byed cing ji srid a ba tsa mnar med
184b7(rgyud): pa'i bar gyi seMn dmyal ba tha~Md bsil bar 'gyur// yi dwags rnams kyang yi dgas kyi bsngal las rnam par grol bar 'gyur// sdug bsngal ba rnams kyis sems rnams la gdung
184b8(rgyud): bar mi 'gyuraro// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thaMd kyis mngon par gzigs par 'gyuraro// de'i rjes la lus ngang pa gser gyi mdog lta bu dang / lo brgyad gnyis kyi rnam pa can dang / ting 'dzin
185a1(rgyud): dang ye shas thob pa dang / kha dog dang / tshe dang / stobs dang / shugs dang / dbang phyug la sogs pa'i yon tan dang ldan pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khamasu rgyu ba dang / 
185a2(rgyud): 'khor lo sgyur ba ltar che ba dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyis mngon par bstod cing stang du 'gro ba dang / rig pa 'dzin pa'i rgyal por 'byung ba dang / stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten
185a3(rgyud): gyi khams kyi rig pa 'dzin pa'i rgyal po rig pa 'dzin pa brgya stong phrag du mas yongasu bskor ba dang / phyogs bcu mtha' yas pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams rdzu 'phrul gyis 'gro ba dang / de bzhin
185a4(rgyud): gshegs pa thaMd la mchod pa chen po'i sprin gyi legs par mchod cing grub pa tha~Md 'od kyis ltung bar 'gyuraro// brgya byin dang // tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba'i stan byed ster
185a5(rgyud): bar 'gyuraro// gzi brjid dang / gzugs dang / dpa' bas rig pa dzin pa zang zil gyis gnon par 'gyu/ byang chub sems dpa'i sa yang so sor thob por 'gyuraro// sams can dzad
185a6(rgyud): 'dul ba la thakhas par 'gyuraro// phyi ma'i mthar tshe byin gyis brlab ste// sangs rgyas thams cad bskyed par mthong bar 'gyur// byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi bya ba nges par ston pa 'gyuraro// 
185a7(rgyud): sgyu sa das yu / rgya chu yongs pa ba khyis pa dag la med pa 'o malus pa ma/ dgin gshegs pa rnas
185a8(rgyud): sku'i sgrub pa'i thabs zhes bye ba ste dngo sa'o// sgrub pa'i thabs gnyis pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mchod par byas te/ pi lang ngam ldong res pad+ma'i snod du bzhag la/ 
185b1(rgyud): ji srid dngos grub rnam pa gsum byung ba nga srid du bzlas par bya'o// sems can thams cad dbang du 'gyur ba dang / mi snang ba dang / rig pa thams cad 'dzin pa nyid// rig pa 'dzin par gyur nas/ 
185b2(rgyud): ni me stong shar ba'i kha dog dang la brgyad gnyis kyi rnam par sgra li zhing 'khyil ba dang // gdugu dang ldan zhing lha'i bu me be ba phrag du mas yongasu bskor cing rig pa 'dzin pa'i grub pa zad
185b3(rgyud): kyis yongasu bskor ba dang / bskal pa chen po'i mtha' gnas pa dang / rig pa 'dzin pa thams cad kyi dbang phyug tu 'gyuraro// rim pa 'dis rtse gsum bsgrubs na dbang phyug chen por 'gyur// 
185b4(rgyud): mchod par thogs bsgrubs mtshangs par 'gyur// 'khor los khyab 'jug du 'gyuraro// grog mkhar gyi rtse mo'i sa bzung stas srung gI bu byas la de la zhon te bzlas na dbang bar
185b5(rgyud): 'gyur ro nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor byas te de'i steng du bsdad na nyi ma dang mtshungs par 'gyur// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi zla ba'i steng 'od nyid kyis lha'i bye brag gang gis mtshan mar bzung
185b6(rgyud): sta ngas de'i long spyod la spyod por 'gyur// de bzhin du rim pa 'dis dngangul chu'am bcud lan gang bsgrubs pa de 'grub par 'gyuraro// gal ta ma grub ni de'i tshe sgrub pa la bdun pa'o// bdun
185b7(rgyud): bas pas ci nas kyang 'grub par 'gyuraro// zhes de bzhin gshegs pa tha~Md kyi 'khor lo bsgyur bas bka' sprul pa/ 'bum phrag gsum bzlas pas ri bo lhun pa'i tshad tsam gyi ri bo yod
185b8(rgyud): hU~M nas brjod pas ltung ba dang / rgya mche skams pa dang / ljon pa drung nas 'byin pa dang / bum pa na mnga' la phan pa dang / glang po che ngengs par byed pa dang / pha rol gyi sde mngon par 'joms par bang pa
186a1(rgyud): dang bar snang na gnas pa thams cad lhung bar byed pa'o// sems can thams cad 'bebs par byedo// sgrub pa po las gang dang gang sgrub par 'dod pa de dang de thams cad bye'o// yang na zla ba
186a2(rgyud): gcig tsam mi smra bar de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi skur bdag nyid bsgoms na sangs rgyas thams cad mthong bar 'gyuraro// sgyu 'phrul dra ba thams cad ston par 'gyur// na mkha'i la gnas shing
186a3(rgyud): 'chag par byed// me 'bar ba dang glog 'bru ba la sogs pa ston par byed// gcig tu gyur na mang por 'gyur// 'jig rten gyi khams stong phrag kyang g.yo bar byed do// sgrub pa pos bye ba
186a4(rgyud): phrag bdun bzlas nas 'di dag thams cad bsgrub par bya'o// rim pa 'dis lhung bzed dang / chos gos dang / stod ga/ yogs dang mkhar bsil las gang yang rung ba bzung nas ji
186a5(rgyud): srid rig pa 'dzin par gyur pa de srid du bzlas par bya'o// sa sa rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du 'gro ba dang / sprul pa du ma byed pa dang / 'dod na 'chi ba dang / skad cig tsam gyis 'jig rten
186a6(rgyud): gyi khams thams cad du 'gro zhing de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi nye bar gnas par byed// sangs rgyas kyi gzugs kyis sangs rgyas kyi bya ba thams cad kyang byeng ngo // sgrub pa'i thabs
186a7(rgyud): gzhan yang bde bar gshegs pa'i mtho'i tshad kyi mchod rten 'bum phrag gcig byas te/ rma med pa'i ral gri glas la cho 'phrul gyi zla ba phyed lo nye bar spyod pa thams cad kyis mchod de brgyad
186a8(rgyud): ba 'am/ bcu bzhi pa 'am/ nya gang ba la skyil dkrung bcas te ji srid du ral gri 'bar ba de srid du bzla bar ba'o// de'i rjes thogs nyid la rje bo che rnams kyi sgra grago/ steng nas me tog gi char
186b1(rgyud): 'bab par 'gyuraro// lhan cig pa ji snyed pa dang bcas pa stang du 'gro'o// rig pa 'dzin pa thams cad kyis mchod bar 'gyur ro// rig pa 'dzin pa'i rgyal po chen por 'gyuraro// ral gri'i/ 
186b2(rgyud): rig pa 'dzin pa chen po'i 'khor lo sgyur ba rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i chos gos dang rgyan 'chang ba 'dod dgur rgyu ba skad cig tsam gyis 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du rnam par spyod pa
186b3(rgyud): dang / rga shi med pa dang nyi ma re re ning sangs rgyas kyi bdag nyid che ba mthong ba dang / mchod pa'i sprin thams cad kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du mchod pa'i char 'bebs pa dang / bska
186b4(rgyud): ba chen po stong phrag du 'tshe bar 'gyuraro// de nas sgrub pa 'i thabs gzhan yang 'khor lo 'am pa nis blangs te 'bum phrag nyi shu bzlas pa yongasu rdzogs pa dang dpal gyi sgor
186b5(rgyud): song ste/ nim pa'i lo mche ba'i mar khu la btab pa 'bum phrag gcig bsregs blugs pa'o// lha ma yin gyi 'a khrul 'khor thams cad 'byed par 'gyur// lha ma yin gyi
186b6(rgyud): bu mo thams cad 'ong bar 'gyuraro// gal te ma grub na 'bum phrag gnyis sam gsum du bsregs blugs pa'o// lha ma yin gyi bu mo thams cad bsregaso bzhin du 'ong bar 'gyuraro// 'ongs
186b7(rgyud): nas kyang sgrub pa po la zhu bar byed/ kye skyes bu dpa' bo 'jug tu gsol zhes smra'o// de nas grogs dang bcas nas 'jug par bya'o// ral gri 'am 'khor lo de bzung nas lha ma yin gyi
186b8(rgyud): rig pa 'dzin pa'i rgyal por 'gyur// sa 'og gi rdzas rnams kyi mnga' bdag lha ma yin gyi bu mo thams cad kyi bdag po// gsang sngags grub pa gzhan dang lha ma yin gyi rig pa 'dzin pa
187a1(rgyud): rnams kyi dbang phyug/ sa 'og thams cad kyi bdag po// lha ma yin chen po'i sprul pa bad pa po bskal pa chen por gnas pa/ khab 'jug gi 'khor lo hUM zhes bya ba brjod pa
187a2(rgyud): tsam gyis brlag par byed pa khab 'jug kyang hUM zhes brjod pa tsam gyis brlag par byed na/ gzhan lta smos kyang ci zhog dgos// sgrub pa'i thabs gzhan yang // bde bar gshegs pa'i mtshos rten 'bum
187a3(rgyud): drag sum cu byas te/ mchod rten re reri'i mdun stong phrag brgya rgyad bzla bar bya'o// thams cad la nye bar spyod pa thams cad kyis mchod la tha mar me tog can gyi ljags la 'khor lo rtsibs drug pa mtho
187a4(rgyud): gang tsam pa bzung ba la cho 'phrul gyi zla ba byed pa skyil dkrung ba cas te/ ji srid 'bar ba de srid du bzlas par bya'o// de bcas pas rig pa 'dzin pa'i 'khor lo sbyar bar 'gyur ro// rig pa 'dzin pa'i
187a5(rgyud): rgyal po thams cad kyi ngar bdag dbang phyog chen po la tho/ sa pa'i lha thams cad 'dul bar byed pa/ po skal ba byed pa rgya stong phrag dgu trasurtsa de kur 'che ba dang / 'jig rten
187a6(rgyud): khams stong rdzu 'phrul gyis gnod pa dang / mchod pa'i spri brgya stong phrag gi mchong pa byed pa dang / sangs rgyas stong phrag mthong bar 'gyur // de rnams ma nyi ma reri re ning mchong ba chen po'i sprin
187a7(rgyud): gyis mchod de'i byed do// sgrub pa'i thabs rgyas pa gnar yang mchod rten 'jam phrag drug bcu byas te/ sngon du bston pa byas la bye ba bzlas pa'o// de nas mtshan nyid dang ldan pa'i mablangs
187a8(rgyud): mgru pa panyi ba mapo thathams cad kyis mchod do sring ma mas par spong du rba bar bya'o// sangs nas pa lha mu chud mon dang mi snang ba la sogs pa 'ams cad des ster ba byer/ 
187b1(rgyud): gal te mi ster na ji srid la las lha ma byung ba de srid du bzla bar bya'o// de nas mtshon rnon pos de bcad par bya'o// de bzung bas nyi ma stong gi gzi brjid can rig pa 'jig pa thams cad kyi rgyal po
187b2(rgyud): rig pa 'dzin pa byeb stong phrag drug cu'i 'khor can/ tshe bskal pa ba ba brgya stong phrag drug cu 'tsho ba sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du rdzu 'phrul gyis 'gro ba dang ri bo lhun po bye ba
187b3(rgyud): brag stong skul ba dang / gling stong phrag 'phen pa dang / rgya mtsho stong phrag skems pa dang / lha'i 'jig rten brgya stong phrag bsdigs pa dang / tshangs pa dang // khab 'jug dang / dbang phyug tshon
187b4(rgyud): po la sogs pa rnams ltung ba dang / ska li zhing 'khyil ba dang // lo brgyad gnyis lon pa'i rnam pa dang / rgyan thams cad kyi rnam par brgyan pa ste/ sreg pa'i bskal pa na
187b5(rgyud): 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan du 'gro zhing rke ba dang 'chi ba med/ par 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi da bang phyug chen pos de skad ces bka' stsal te// de bzhin
187b6(rgyud): du yid bzhin gyi nor bu dang / dpag bsam gyi shing dang / bum pa bzang po dang / nor gyi char pa dang / na mkha'i mdzod kyi ting 'dzin chen po dang / rin po che chen po'i lag pa dang / ner rgyun gyi
187b7(rgyud): rtog pa chen po dang / sems can gyi re ba thams cad rje su 'gengs pa dang / 'khor lo sgyur ba'i rgyal po dang / rin po che thams cad kyang bsgrub par bya'o// de la 'di lta ste 'khor lo rin pa
187b8(rgyud): che dang / nor bu rin po che dang / bud med rin po che dang / khyim bdag rin po che dang / glang po rin po che dang / rta rin po che dang / bsnyen bkur ba rin po che'o// de nas sprul pa'i thabs gzhan yang
188a1(rgyud): can dan dkar po las pad+ma so drug pa'i tshad byas pa bad+mad lag par bzung nas zla ba drug tu skyil dkrung bcas te/ nye bar spyod pa thams cad kyis mchod nas thun mtshams
188a2(rgyud): gsum mam bzhir 'dzu 'chu bzlas par bya'o// zla ba drug yongasu rdzogs pa dang pad+ma 'bum drag bdun bsregs blugs pa'o// zla ba nya nas bsgrub pa brtsam par bya ste/ nye bar spyod pa thams cad kyis mchod
188a3(rgyud): la skyil mo dkrung bcas nas mtshan thog mas lda par bya'o// tho rangs kyi tshe rig pa 'dzin par 'gyuraro// sga li zhing 'khyil ba dang lo brkyang gnyis kyi rnam pa rgyan gyi tshogs thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ 
188a4(rgyud): nyi mo stong phrag shar ba'i 'od dang mtshungs pa/ rig pa 'dzin pa bye ba phrag du ma'i 'khor can/ lha'i bu mo bo ba khrag khrig pa rgya steng du mas yongasu bskor ba/ tshangs pa la sogs pa'i
188a5(rgyud): lha rnams mngag gzhug par 'gyur// sangs rgyas kyi zhing tham sa cad du skad cig tsam gyis rnam par rgyu ba dang / mchod pa'i sprin du mas de bzhin gshegs pa rnams mchod
188a6(rgyud): bar 'gyuraro// de bzhin du ud pa la'i sgrub pa dang / tsan dan dmar po pad+ma'i sgrub pa yang ngo // sgrub pa gzhan yang bsgrub par bya ba ni shal dang / pad+ma rA ga dang / mu tig gi 'bras bu 'am rin
188a7(rgyud): po che yongasu rtog par byed pa pos yongasu brtags pa na bde bar gshegs pa'i mtho'i tshad tsam pa'i mchod rten 'bum tsa mo byas te/ gang yang rung ba'i grangs mi bzung bar ji srid bdag yongs
188a8(rgyud): su dag par mthong ba de srid du bzlas par bya'o// de'i rjesu mngar gsum gyis sbags pa'i pad+ma 'bum dang / sna ma'i me tog 'bum phrag gsum dang / a ga ru'i yam shing 'bum dang / tsan
188b1(rgyud): dan gyi yam shing 'bum drag gsum dang / til dang 'bras 'bum phrag bani dang / zhi zan 'bum dang / mar gyi bsregs blugs stong brag gsum dang / sman thams cad pa'i bsregs blugs 'bum
188b2(rgyud): phrag gcig byas la/ sbyin sreg yongs rdzogs pa dang / dkar po'i tshes bco lnga la bsgrub par bya'o// skyil mo dkrung bcas ste/ nye bar spyod pa thams cad kyis mchod la ji srid nor bu rin po che
188b3(rgyud): 'bar ba de srad du bzlas par bya'o// 'bar nas kyang rig pa 'dzin pa gzhon sdong du 'gro bar 'gyuraro// sku la zhing 'khyil ba dang / lo brgyad gnyis kyi rnam pa rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa khog
188b4(rgyud): brtsa mu med pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams rgyas par gsal bar byed pa/ rig pa 'dzin pa thams cad kyi bla ma 'khor los bsgyur ba chen por 'gyur// yid bzhin nor bu'i dngos
188b5(rgyud): grub byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i rig pa 'dzin pa zhe sa brjod// sangs rgyas thams cad mchod cing bsnyen bsku ra bar bdo// skad cig tsam la 'jig rten gyi khams zeng
188b6(rgyud): kyi sems can bskor nas slar de nyid du 'ong bar 'a'o// gal te 'dod na byang chab sems dpa'i tshogs mngon par rdzogs par byas te lus de nyid kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa
188b7(rgyud): byang chub par mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyuraro// de bzhin du sgrub thabs kyi le'u la bris sku dang shing lham dang u tog gi phreng ba yang yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i cho gas bsgrub pa
188b8(rgyud): bya'o// thang du 'grub par 'gyuraro// sgrub pa'i thabs gzhan yang mchod rten bye ba phrag stong pas te/ 'bum phrag bdun bzla bar bya'o// yongs rdzogs pa dang / me tog can gyi lcags so
189a1(rgyud): ljags lnga'i rang bzhin gyi rdo rje rtse mo lnga pa ser bcu'i tshad dam bde bar gshegs pa'i mtho'i tshad tsa mo// 'phrul gyi zla ba phyadral mtshan thog thag khri'i stang du lag pa
189a2(rgyud): bkab la ji srid par bar gyur pa de srid du bzla bar bya'o// de bzung nas rdo rje'i rig pa 'dzin pa 'khor los bsgyur ba chen po nyi ma bye ba brgya drag dang rje su 'tsham pa rdo rje 'chang ba ltar gzi brjid
189a3(rgyud): dang ldan zhing 'od gsal bar 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du rnam par rgyu zhing dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa'i lha rnams la ci bsgo ba nyad par 'gyur// lha ma yin rnams skrag
189a4(rgyud): ba dang / srin po rnams 'joms pa dang / sems can thams cad de'i ci bsgo ba byed par 'gyur bar bcom ldan 'das dri bani na gshegs pa tha~Md kyi 'khor los bsgyur ba chen po
189a5(rgyud): skad ces bka' stsal to// rdo snying po rgyan gyi rgyud chen po las dezhin gshegs pa tha~Md kyi rdzas kyi ba snang shes bya ba'i le'u yongasu rdzog so// // de nas bcom ldan 'das de
189a6(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa rnams slar yang ting 'dzin la mnyam par gzhag ste// bac+doMs thog ma dang tha ma med po rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dadang phyug chen po la sagasal ba btab pa/ bcom ldan 'das de
189a7(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba chen gak+Sha sbyar ba ste/ mtha' yas pa kha sbyar ba zhes bya ba bka' stsal du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa tha~Md kyi
189a8(rgyud): gsang ba chen po gsang sngags kyi ka k+Sha pu Ta bka' stsal pa/ de nas yang dag bshad bya gsangs rgyas kun gyis rjesu skyog// gsang sngags ka k+Sha sbyar zhes bya// gsang chen mchog tu
189b1(rgyud): rmad du byung // grub ni ba la tshad mdzes pa/ kun nas yeng su 'bang zhing dag/ re mig bani bcu ni dgu pa/ mdor bsdus nas ni sngags pas byA// dang po'i phreng bzang gnyis la ni// a sogs blo gros
189b2(rgyud): ldan pas dgod // ka sogs lhag ma'i re mig la// sngags pas mdor bsdus te bri// sbyor ba ji bzhin yi ge kun// go rims bzhin du dgod par bya// re mig stong pa dag la ni// k+Sha yig
189b3(rgyud): dang ni rdo rje bri/ rim pa de dag bkod nas ni// rang sde'i 'og tu 'bar ba mchog/ dang po dbyangs lo de'i rje su/ yi ge phyag rgya mdor bsdus pa// ka tsa Ta ta pa ya shA// dag cing chu yi dkyil 'khor
189b4(rgyud): ldan 'di rnams myur du 'grub par byed// pad+ma'i rigs kyi lha'i na do// don kun grub par yang dag ldan// me yi dkyil 'khor zhesu bshad// 'bar ba'o me dang mtshungs pa'i 'od// / 
189b5(rgyud): chatha ba ra la/ pung chen gyi ni dkyil 'khor ldan// ga dza Ta de ba la swA// dngos grub kun byed rlung gzugs ldan// dbyar gyi sprin ltar shin tu 'jigs// g+ha d+ha n+ta d+ha b+ha we hA/ steng 'gros
189b6(rgyud): dngos grub byed par brjod// slar yang nga nya Na na ma// chos kun dbang du byed par mchog/ theg mi'i dbyangs yig gang yin pa// de nas de bzhin gshegs stobs bcu// khyad par yan lag bcu
189b7(rgyud): gnyis bshad// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu gnyis// ma ning yi ge bzhi po spong // ra rA wa~M nas bya ba// dbyangs dang sa bon de bzhin sngags// de dag yi ge ru yaud bshad// dbang du byad bI
189b8(rgyud): snga tshan kun// thig la sgra gtsug zla phrad ces// sna ldan gyi ni phreng zhes bshad// sangs rgyas de bzhin byang sems kyis// yi ger brjod pa de bzhin zhing // gsal byed ces gyis gsal/ 
190a1(rgyud): pa'o// de bzhin yar la ba rlung // ma dang dang ldan padag po ste// 'byung ba chen po'i khams rnamaso// rlung ma bdud rtsi'i bcud ces bshad// mnyam dang mi mnyam chang bya bas// thams cad
190a2(rgyud): nyid kyi lam zhes pa// phyag rgya dang ni dkyil 'khor sngags// ting 'dzin mdor bsdus bshad pa'o// mi rtag sdug bsngal stong bdag med// chos kun las ni gton nas sbyar// stong pa mtshan
190a3(rgyud): med smon med pa// rnam par thar pa gsum du bshad// phung po khams dang skye mched rnams// mkhas pa yis ni shes par bya// da ni sngags kyi ka kI'i sbyor ba las// rab tu btus pa sbyar ba dang / 
190a4(rgyud): bral ba bshad par bya'o// yi ge rnams kyis byang chub dpyod// sangs rgyas nyid kyang mya ngan 'das/ lhan cig nyid du sbyar bar bya// dbyangs rnams kyis ni bsdus pa bshad// mtshan
190a5(rgyud): nyid kyang ni rab bshod bya// dbyangs ni byang chub gzugs nyid de// gzhan dang lhan cig sbyar bar bya// de la nges par sangs rgyas nyid// ster ba nyid du lags par bshad// thog mar
190a6(rgyud): sangs rgyas thams cad kyis// gsong sngags dri ma mod pa 'byung // thog mar dbyangs ni thig lor ldan// rdo rje'i steng du yang dag gnas// 'bar ba'i breng can rab ni pa// rnam par 'phro ba
190a7(rgyud): nyid du gnas/ zla ba'i dbus bsgom bya ba/ kun gyi ye shes 'od po che// kun tu 'gro ba rab tu thob// thams cad du yang rnyed par dka'// da ni gdod nas gnas rtag pa// yi ge med pa// byang / 
190a8(rgyud): chub sems zhes rab tu bshad// dung dang kun da zla ltar dag/ gnyis pa'i sgra dang yang dag ldan// de ni shin tu ring por shes// sangs rgyas kun gyi spyod pa ste// sa dang pha rol phyinapa
190b1(rgyud): rnams us ma rnams kyi rnam pa ni/ mya ngan 'das pa zhes du sgrags// dbyangs dang yi ge khyad pa can/ mtshan nyid rag tu sbyar bar ba// rang gi phyag rgya sogs ldan pa/ sangs rgyas byang chub ra
190b2(rgyud): gsol byed// da ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ sngags kyi de 'od 'di bshad bya// thog mar spyod pa byas nas ni// gnyis pa smra ba bo ru ba sha // zhi ba'i phyangs kyis kun nas man no// gsum
190b3(rgyud): ba'i ming ni yid ces pa// rgyu med pas te cung zad pa// bzhi pa yis ni gsal bar byas// drug pa'i sgra dang ldan pa la// de yi steng du thig le gnas// chos kun na mkha' dang mtshungs par// yang
190b4(rgyud): dang yang du bshad pa yin// de ni lnga par shes par bya / yi ge lnga pa stobs po che// yi ge lnga yi stobs lnga'i bdag nyid las skyes gtso// mtha stobs chen po khyab bdag srid
190b5(rgyud): ba'i bdag nyid skyes// mthu stobs chen po srid gsu ma las rab grol byed pas// yi ge lnga ni 'gro ba drug las grol ba'i bdag/ mngon shes drug kyang rab tu ster byed
190b6(rgyud): dri ma med// de nyi bcom ldan spyod pa ste/ mi bstod pa zhes rab tu grags byang sems rdo rje sems dpa' ste/ brtan pa'i sems dpar rab byung ba// chos kun gyi ni de bzhin nyid/ gang bsngags de ni
190b7(rgyud): thams cad du// me yi sa bon dang ldan pa// dbyang po yi ni steng du gnas// de nyid bcom ldan rnal 'byor ni// rin chen 'byung ldan zhes bshad// chos rnams kun gyis byed pa ni// med pa 'di du'ang bshad
190b8(rgyud): pa'o// me yi sa bon yang dag ldan// bzhi ba'i dbangs kyi spyi bo ru// mnan pa rgya sa dpago med// de nyid bcom ldan rnal 'byor ni// sna tshogs de bzhin gau shags pa kun// drug pa'i dbyangs
191a1(rgyud): dang yang dag ldan// don yod pa yi snying por grags// snga lnga pa yi bzhi pa ni// dngos dang dngos mad rab rtogs dang // ma yi sa ben rab tu ldan// 'khor lo'i dngasu
191a2(rgyud): rab tu gnas// drug pa'i dbyangs dang yang dag ldan// thig le sgra yis rnam par spras// 'khor los bsgyur ba ye shes che// rnam par rgyal de'i nor ster byed// gang zhig snga lnga pa yi mthara'// 
191a3(rgyud): sgyu ma'i chos la rab tu gnas// de nyid bcom ldan rnal 'byor ni// gdugs dkar shesu bshad bgo brgyad pa'i dbyings dang yang dag ldan// byams pa zhes ni grags pa ste// de nyid bcom ldan rnal 'byor
191a4(rgyud): ning spyi bor thig le mnan pa'o// 'jam pa'i dbyangs dong ye shes che// mA ma kiraru dwe bsgrag so// lnga yi dbyangs dang ya nga dog ldan// 'jam pa'i dbyangs zhes rab tu grags// spyod pa'i
191a5(rgyud): gar mkhan rab rtogs ming // sdig pa thams cad langs khyed// rnam par sel ba zhes bya ba// sdig kun rnam par spyod byed pa// sde tshan lci ba'i gnas pa ni// phyag ni rdo rje stob
191a6(rgyud): chen dang // gshin rje mthar bad khro bo che// yi ge gsum ni stobs chen po// thog mar dgu pa yi ni dbyangs// de yi dbusu spyod pa bzhog/ tha mar sna tshogs zhes bya sbyar// sku gsum
191a7(rgyud): du ni rnam par sgom// tha ma'i sde tshan gsum pa ni// gang yin kun tu bzang por bshad// sde tshan dang po'i gsum pa ni// sangs rgyas spyan zhes bya ba'o// de nyid bcom ldan mgon po
191a8(rgyud): ni nganamapa'i mdzod ces rab tu grags// rdo rje khro bo stobs po che// de nyid rab tu grags pa'o// 'di kun thams cad stong pa ste// rgyu ni rab tu spangs pa'o// dbyangs lnga dang ni yang / 
191b1(rgyud): ga/ do su dzum // gang nag na pa'i 'o// me dpapa ldan yang // na pa sa da sa ldan/  lu ba sa / 
191b2(rgyud): gang dang ma sbyang ba// sgrol ma nas su rab tu grags// bzhi pa yi ni gnyis pa dang // shes rab pha rol phyin pa ngos// big le lhan cig yang dag ldan// sgra dang ldan pa'i mchog tu
191b3(rgyud): gyur sde tshan gnyis pa'i gsum pa gang // ma nyid dang ni yang dag ldan// bzhi pa'i dbyangs kyi yang dag mnan// khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba'i mchog/ de nyid bcom ldan nas
191b4(rgyud): byasar/ spyod pa'i gar mkhan zhes pa'i mtshan/ du yi rjes nyid la ni me// dgu bo'i dbyangs dang yang dag lnga na// gsum pa'i dbyangs kyis mnan ba yi// sde tshan dang pa'i
191b5(rgyud): dang po sde// de nyid bcom ldan mgon tho ni// la~MH/ rten mgon po thub pa che// ye shes rgya che bsgrub par bya// sangs rgyas byang chub rag gsol byed// sde tshan lnga pa rin chen
191b6(rgyud): mchog/ bzhi pa'i sa bon dam pa ste// 'og tu me yi yan lag ldan// khro gnyar can nas rab tu grags// debang chen yi ge dag pa la// thig le sgra yi rnam par rgyan// sangs rgyas rgyan nas
191b7(rgyud): rnam grags pa// sdig pa thams cad 'phrog par byed// sde tshan drang po'i gsum pa ni// na mkha'i spyan zhes brjod pa'o// sgyu ma'i chos la rab gnas nas// gsod pa'i don du rab tu
191b8(rgyud): gsal// mA ma kI zhes bya ba'i ming // rig pa mchog tu gsang ba ste// rgyu mi dmigs pa'i chos rnams kyis// dri ma med pa stsol ba byed// gnyis pa'i dbyangs dang yang dag ldan/ 
192a1(rgyud): 'phags pa mi g.yo ba zhes bya// dbang chen sa bon yang dag ldan// 'gro ba'i rdo rje rangs byed na// gdug pa gzhan kun smos ci dgos rlung gi dkyil 'khor sbyar byas pa/ 
192a2(rgyud): rang gi sa bon gnas shing 'dro// 'gro ba thams cad skrod byed na// gdug sems can gzhan smos ci dgos// de nyid med dang ldan pas na// dbang dang dgug pa'i las rnams dang // bgegs
192a3(rgyud): dang dgra rnams zhi ba ni// khyad par mi g.yo ba yis byid // don dam bden pa'i byin gyis brlabs// rnam par snang mdzad gnas las byung // gzhan gyi dpag dpung 'joms pa ni// me dang ldan pa
192a4(rgyud): nyid kyis bya// drugru de'i dbyings dang yang dag ldan/ thig le sgra yis rnam par rgyan// rlung gi dkyil 'khor gyis grangs pas// 'gro ba thams cad 'gugs par byed// ti si
192a5(rgyud): man dar lo sogs// dol phye mar rnyog par nges/ rdul gnas 'khor lo yi// dbus nas 'gro kun rengs bar byed// gnas nas bskyong bar byas pa yos// 'thung po rnams
192a6(rgyud): ni dbang du byed// rtag pa'i gzugasasu gnas nas ni// mi g.yo ba yi snying khar son// chos kyi dbyangs mtshungs thob nas ni// bdag gi bdag nyid bsgom par bya// rlung gi sa bon rin po che// spyod
192a7(rgyud): ba'i steng du yang dag ldan// me las byung ba ma la gnas// 'gro ba thams cad 'bebs par byed// sde tshan dang po'i dang po gang // sa yi yi ge steng du mnan// snga tshan lnga pa'i tha ma ni// 
192a8(rgyud): drug pa'i sgra yi stang du gnas// 'og tu me yi sa bon ldan// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbusu ste// sa ga suM thams cad 'bar bar byed// me yi phyogasu gnas nas ni// phyag rgya'i bdag
192b1(rgyud): 'di thams cad sgom// rlung lA ma lha yang dag sbyor// rgyu ni byed pa mtshungs pa'o// rnam par snang mdzad ya shas che// de nyid kho na bsgrub par bya// dbang chen mi ni sbyor ba las// 'khor lo
192b2(rgyud): sgyur ba'i go 'phang gnas// ye shes rgya chen bsgrub par bya// yang na phun sum tshogs pa'i don// rig pa 'dzin dang sangs rgyas nyid// rnal 'byor ye shes phun sum tshogs// skye ba
192b3(rgyud): 'od las 'grub 'gyur te// 'di la the tshom mi bya'o// dbyangs dang yi ga thams cad la// sbyor ba'i dbye ba rnam par gnas// tshig dang ngag gi tshad rnams dang // ting 'dzin rnams
192b4(rgyud): thams cad du// slob dpon man ngag shes bya ste// / gzhan du bya ba ma yin no// rdo rje snying po'i rgyan ces bya ba'i rgyud chen po las rdo rje ka DA'i sbyor ba mdor bsdus te bstan
192b5(rgyud): ba ste/ rgyas par slob dpon gyis mngon par dpyad pa ra bya'o// // de nas bcom ldan las rnams slar yang 'dus par gyur pas// bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rnal 'a
192b6(rgyud): gyi dbang phyug la gsung dag gi dkyil 'khor gsol ba btab pa// de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis// de rnams kyis gsol ba btab pa'i tshig gi rjes nyid la/ 'brug
192b7(rgyud): gi sgra mtha' yas pa'i legs par bsgrags pa na mkha'i mdzod kun nas rdo rje rgya che ba tshangs pa chen pa'i sgra yongs su rdzogs pa'i don dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
192b8(rgyud): kyi gsung gi 'khor lo'i dkyil so sor yongs su rtogs pa'i don du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsung grub pa zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po bka' stsal pa/ 
193a1(rgyud): nas yang dag bshad bya ga/ gsung gi 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor che// zlub po kun nas bzang po sku// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor lta bur gnas// da yi sta
193a2(rgyud): du pang chen po// 'dab ma brgyad la ge sar can// de yi lte ba'i dbus su ni// yi ge mchog gi go 'phang nyid// bdag gi dngos grub bsgo bar bya// ngag gi dbang phyug 'od chen
193a3(rgyud): ba~M snying khar zla ba dang bad+ma// de yi steng du drung brtag bya// rlung gi dbus su lha yin te// rdo rje'i rang bzhin dge ba'o// de yi steng du rin chen pang // yang na sangs rgyas gzugs
193a4(rgyud): brnyan yang // 'bar zhing rkan gyi mthar khyab pa// bdu da rtsi'i rgyun ni rab 'bab pa// pa yi yi ge spyi tshugs pa// sangs rgyas kyi ni stang du gnas// bdud rtsi'i thig pa 'dzag
193a5(rgyud): pa ni go rims bzhin du bsam par bya// zla ba phye/ da dang zla ba gcig/ yang na zla ba bzhi 'am ni// zla ba brgya da du rab mchog bsgoms// dkyil 'khor bzang po bsgrub par bya/ 
193a6(rgyud): skyil dkrung gi ni nyer gnas te// dang po'i sbyor ba'i dbang phyug skyes// chos kyi dbyis ni mtha' dag tu// thams cad du ni yongasu gang // sangs rgyas gzugs brnyan bsgom par bya// chos dbyings
193a7(rgyud): mnyam dang mi mnyam pa// sangs rgyas kun gyi rjes skyob pa'o// ji snyed rig pa thams cad ni// lus dang ngag dang yid rnams kyis// phyag rgya de rnams bdag nyid mchog/ de rnams thams cad
193a8(rgyud): bdag nyid kyis// lus kyi 'khor lo la 'jug bsam// dung gi sgra ni gsal ba bsam// pad+ma'i khams la yang dag rten// pad+mo'i ge sar thig le las// sgra yi rang bzhin rdul phran rnams
193b1(rgyud): mgrin par son nas sgra gyur te// de las kyang ni ji ltar gyur ka/ slar yang khye ru son pa dang // yi ge mchog tu dag pa'o// lha yi yi ga cher 'bang ba// gcig nas cig tu rdo rje'i tshul/ kun nas/ 
193b2(rgyud): rab tu 'od gsal ba/ rdo rje ngag ni dam pa'i don// sgra yis na mkha' kun gang bar// sgrub pos mdo ru bsdus te 'dra// de bzhin du rnying khar s+tha/ lce la 'od bar nges 'bros nas// mchu 'am se las pa
193b3(rgyud): bkra ba'i// gal te 'od zer mthong na ni// de tshe grub par rnad par shes// grub pa'i ngag ni dam pa'i don// yang na lha ni gzhan pa yis// ngag gi sgrub pabs chen po mchog/ rang lha rdo rje'i rang bzhin bas
193b4(rgyud): bdag nyid rdo rje sems dpa'i rang // 'bar ba'i sgron ma da dang mtshungs pa/ rang gi snying gi dbus kyi cha// yi ge mchog tu phra ba yis// a yi yi ge mnga' bdag mchog/ rnam par
193b5(rgyud): bkra ba nyi ma bzhin// rang gi sde pa'i mthar thug mtshung sa// yi ga yi ger yongasu gzhel// phra mo mnyam pa'i mthar thug ni// 'bar zhing thig le dang mtshungs shing // snying gi dkyil
193b6(rgyud): 'khor gsal byed pa// de yi 'a'abab rab phra ba// ji srid rkan gyi bar du son// slar yang yi ge thams cad ni/ yang dang yang du gsal byed cing // rdo rje 'bar ba stong phrag dang // yang dang yang du rnam
193b7(rgyud): par 'don// 'jig rten kun tud song ste// chos pa'is mnyam dang mi mnyam pa// yi ge'i rang bzhin rnam bkra ba// rang gis 'gro ba rnam pas te// slar yang longs nas rang gan su/ 
193b8(rgyud): 'jug ba ra ni yongs su brtag/ de nas sgra dang yi ge naM// lte bar song ste yongs su gnas// lta ba ru ni pad+ma mchog/ pad+mar rdo rje dri med mdzes// de yi steng du dung chen po// rab tu 'dre
194a1(rgyud): pa nyid du gnas// de las 'bar ba'i rnam pa'i sgra// brang gi gnas nas yongasu byung // slar yang ma grin par song nas// rdo rje lce la yang dag reg/ 'gram pa sbyar ba'i dbus
194a2(rgyud): na sangs rgyas gzugs brnyan dri ma med // khab pa zhi lngar dkar 'od// bcud len bdud rtsi'i thigs pa 'dra// rdo rje lha ni mtha' dag rnams// yang dang yang du gsal bar byed// ting nge 'dzin
194a3(rgyud): gyi rtsar son to// slar yang snying kha nyid du song // thig le las ni gug skyed gyur// gu skyed ri mo ring po can// cha shas rnam bzhi 'dus pa las// de na yi ge raM rnam par shes/ 
194a4(rgyud): yi ge las ni sgra skya zhing // sgra las nA dad las dbyangs// da'angs las ngag tu rnam par 'gyuraro// yi ge las ni cha shas tshegs// tshig rkang dang ni ngag du 'gyur/ 
194a5(rgyud): tshig rkang las ni tshig bcad dang // de bzhin du ni gI thA dang // phreng 'dzin rgyun chags de bzhin te/ 'di ltar sngags dang rig sngags dang // rang gi snying por
194a6(rgyud): tu 'gyur// de nas bzlas pa'i rnal 'byor tshe// blo gros ldan pas brtan byas te// dgug dang gzhug dang bcing ba dang // dbang du byas te bsgrub par bya// bzlas pa 'di yis sbyor
194a7(rgyud): ba yid thams cad du ni brtan par bya// yi de bzhin gyi ni ngag 'grub bo// rmad byung mchog tu rnyed dka' ba'i// yang dag lha ni gzhan pa yi// ngag 'grub thams cad slob rnams kyi/ yi ge
194a8(rgyud): cig pa gsang chen po// ngag gi sgrub thabs mchog tu dge/ sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag nyid ni// legs par mnyam par gzhag pas sgom// rang snying zla bar rdo rje tshe// 'bar ba'i phreng ba
194b1(rgyud): / 'khrugs pa'i 'od// de las bstan bcos thams cad ni// nges par gdon pa nyid du gangag grub pa yi ye shes 'dis// thams cad mkhyen pa thob par byed// bstan bcos thams cad rab
194b2(rgyud): 'don cing // de nyid kyang ni 'chad par byed// sems can kun gyis thams cad du// dngos po cung zad gang bsams pa/ nga dag thams cad rnam shes te// skad cig tsam la smra bar byed// rdo rje
194b3(rgyud): snying po rgyan ces bya ba las ngag gi sgrub pa'i thabs rdzog so// // de nas bcom ldan 'das rnams slar yang 'dus nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
194b4(rgyud): thugs mchog gi dbang phyug la gsol ba btab pa / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang sngags kyi mdzod kyi cho ga rgyas pa sgrub pa'i thabs
194b5(rgyud): bka' sprul du gsol// de nas bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad kyi dbang phyug gis de dge gsolakha btab pa// nye bar gas na nas de de bzhin zhes bka' stsal
194b6(rgyud): nas/ de bzhin gshags pa thams cad kyi gsang sngags kyi mdzod kyi sgrub pa'i thabs kyi rim par phye ba'i cho ga rgyas pa bka' stsal pa// nga nas yang ngag bshad pa ba// 'khor los bskur
194b7(rgyud): ba'i sgrub pa'i thabs// 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad rnam par bri/ yang na bcu drug rtsibs kyang bri// lte bar de bzhin gshegs pa dgeng // 'khor lo'i phreng bas rnam par brgyan/ mtha' ru rIn
194b8(rgyud): chen rnam pa bdun// mkhas pa yis ni spel bar bya// de yi lta bar bdag nyid ni// 'khor lo sgyur ba stobs po che// sangs rgyas kun gyi sku chen po// chos kyi dbyings dang mtshungs pa'i
195a1(rgyud): mchog/ de yi phyag rgya bgrang las 'das// skad cig ma ni nyid la 'then// 'gro ba thams cad snang bas nas// sngags kyi dbang phyug nyid la gdug/ 'khor lo'i dngos grub
195a2(rgyud): gzi brjid che// 'khor los bsgyur bor bdag nyid 'gyur// chung dang cha dang dbang phyug dang // rang dbang 'dod dgur spyod pa dang // kun tu 'gro ba nyid dang ni// kun gyi dbang phyug phun tshegs 'bras// 
195a3(rgyud): rga dang 'chi ba med thob cing // nges par 'khor los bsgyur dang mtshungs// gser gyi 'khor lo rin po che// de bzhin dngal dang shel nyid dang // me tog can gyis lcags kyang rung // rang gi lag
195a4(rgyud): gis bzung nas su// dbang chen dkyil 'khor dbus su ni// sangs rgyas thams cad bsgom par bya// 'khor los bsgyur ba gzi brjid che// mtshan rnams kyis ni rnam par brgyan
195a5(rgyud): de ltar bdag nyid bsgoms nas ni// 'khor los bsgyur ba nyid du 'gyur// de la de'i sngags kyi tsho gaM tu gyur pa ni/ oM sarba ta thA ga toSh+Ti Sha a ba lo ki ta mur+t+ti tsakra wad+hi dzA la
195a6(rgyud): dz+wA la d+hu na bi d+hu na tra sa ra ya mA ra ya/ uts+tsha TA ya ha na b+hany+dza pr-i khi ni kuN+Da li na a ba rA dzi tAs+t+ra d+ha ri Ni// hUM hU~M phaT phaT swA hA// rtsa ba'i sngags// oM aM a pa rA dzi tA d+hi ka swA hA// snying po'i// 
195a7(rgyud): na meHsan+ta bud+d+ha nA~M/ e pra ti ha ta shA sa na a pe rA dzi ta d+hi ka swA hA/ mchog gi snying po'o// 'khor los bsgyur bar rang grub ster// sangs rgyas nyid ni thob nas ni// ye shes tshe dang stobs dang
195a8(rgyud): shugs// yang na dbang phyug dam pa kun// dpa' bo thams cad ster byed ni// dngos grub gzhan lta smos ci dgos// 'khor los bsgyur ba'i sgrub pa'i thab so// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor bri/ 
195b1(rgyud): bar bya// na mkha' la ni yongasu sgom// gzi brjid phung po ye shes che// sangs rgyas thams cad thob par 'gyur// gnyis med 'byung sems kyi mchog/ dkyil 'khor mchog tu rmad 'byung ba//  ni
195b2(rgyud): me yaur shes par bya// sangs rgyas byang chub sgrub byed// de yang 'khor lo 'dzin rgyal po// 'khor los bsgyur ba legs 'bar ba// de la de bzhin rin chen bdun// 'khor lo'i phreng bas
195b3(rgyud): rnam par rgyan// 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// nyi ma re re'i bkra shis sgom// gzi rjid phung po sku chen po// sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan 'chang ba// 'bar ba'i drang
195b4(rgyud): 'khrugs dpa' bo ni// snang ba shar ba lha bur gnas// de yi phyag rgya rtag tu bsam// namakha'i rnam par legs bar gnas// chos kyi dbyings kyi mthas klas pa// 'od zer
195b5(rgyud): rnam par khyab// de dang bdag nyid rdo rjer skom// sangs rgyas byang chub rab sgrub byed // kun tu kun nas thams cad du// dngos po kun las 'byung bar 'gyur// ye shes tshe
195b6(rgyud): dang stobs dang shugs// kun tu 'gro ba nyid dang ni// sangs rgyas tha~Md nyid dag drang // rdo rje can kun nyid dang ni// gzi brjid mchog kun thob gyur nas// gzi brjid phung po 'dra bar 'gyur// de
195b7(rgyud): la sngags kyi tshig tu gyur pa ni// oM ta thA ga tony+dzi Sha a ba lo ki te mut+ti/ te dze rA si dz+wa la dz+wA la d+ha ke d+ha ka/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ bi b+ha bi b+hA hUM hUM phaT phaT swA hA// rtsa ba'i sngagaso// oM ta rdza
195b8(rgyud): rA si swA hA/ snying po lo oM dz+wa la te dze ra si hUM phaT swA hA// nye ba'i snying po'o// dag pa'i gsang sngags 'di rnams kyis// nyi ma'i ye shes rab tu gsil// kun tu 'gro ba 'grub par
196a1(rgyud): byang rig pa 'dzin pa nyid thob 'gyur// gzi brjid daphung po gsang sngags kyi sgrub pa'i thab so// kun nas snang ba zhes bya mchog/ yi ge gsum pa stobs po che// gsu
196a2(rgyud): gyi kha dog lags 'bor zhing // gtsug tor snang na 'od gsal ba// sngags pa rang bdag gis bsgom bya// kun nas snang ba lnga bur 'gyur// oM AHhUM/ gsang sngags rtse mo dam pa 'di// bsgom
196a3(rgyud): pa tsam gyis thams cad du// brtan pa dang ni g.yo ba yi// 'gro kun btsun pa ldang bar 'gyur// kun nas sdong ba'i gtsug tor gyi sgrub pa'i thab so// chos kyi 'khor lo phyag rgya che// legs par
196a4(rgyud): mnyam par gzhag pas sgom// sangs rgyas kun nyi rang kun gyi mchog/ chos kyi 'khor lo rab bskor byed// 2khar lo 'di ni rtsibs bcu gnyis// rnam pa bcu gnyis yongasu
196a5(rgyud): gnas// rnam gsum gsum ni yongs bskor ba// bya ba'i don du dag pa ste// sangs rgyas rang bzhin sku na po// na mkha'i khrugs na gnas pa ste/ chos kyi dbyings ni khyab
196a6(rgyud): pa ni/ legs par mnyam par gzhag pas sgom// 'gro ba brtan dang g.yo ba ni// 'di kun rten cing 'brel 'byung ba// 'di ni chos kyi phyag rgya che// sangs rgyas byang chub rab sgrub byed// de yi sngag su gyur pa
196a7(rgyud): ni oM d+hu na sa twA sa ts+tshan+da tsakra Na/ badz+ra Ni hUM/ gsang sngags 'di ni dpal ldan mchog/ chos kyi 'khor lo gnyis mad 'char// skad cig tsam gyis thams cad du// dam pa'i chos ni stobs ldan
196a8(rgyud): byed/ chos kyi 'khor lo sgrub pa'i thab so// cho ci 'khor lo'i rnam pa 'dra// sangs rgyas sku gzugs legs 'bang ba// rnal 'byor sbyor ba'i mchog bsgrubs na// nyon mongs rdo rje 'dra bar
196b1(rgyud): / 'gyur/ snying nas rdo rje gzugs brnyan 'dra// 'bar ba'i brang gzugs pa'i 'od// de yi snying la rdo rje ma// dri ma med pa skyes par 'gyur// nyon mongs rtag rgyu yongs zad kyi// dgra rnams kun las
196b2(rgyud): rgyal bar byed// bden pa bzhi ni rtogs pas na// bden pa'i ye shes thob par 'gyur// sngags ni oM kle sho a sha ni hUM phaT/ 'di ni nyon mongs rdo rje'i sngags// drag cing drag po'i
196b3(rgyud): gzhan gnon pa'o// sangs rgyas nyid kyang star byang na// dngos grub gzhan lta smos ci dgos// nyon mongs rdo rje sgrub pa'i thab so// dbang chen dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'i// sangs rgyas
196b4(rgyud): rang bzhin stobs po che// bdud bzhi las ni rnam rgyal 8// legs par mnyam par gzhag pas sgom// den pa bzhi yi khu tshur che// lus dang ngag dang de bzhin yid// 
196b5(rgyud): khu chur sangs rgyas thams cad kyis// gnas med skye ba'i mtshan nyid// rdo rje'i dbus su bsgom pabya// rang nyid sangs rgyas yin no zhes// gan dngagayo
196b6(rgyud): ba'i gro ba ni// 'di dag thams cad ma skyes par // rdo rje khu tshur bsgoms nas ni// rdo rje khu tshur 'dra bar 'gyur// de la sngogasu gyur pa ni// oM bi dza ye hAHde bzhin gshegs
196b7(rgyud): ba'i khu tshur chu// shes rab pha rol phyin gsal ba// sngags pas rtag tu bsgoms na ni// shes rab pha rol phyin pa 'thob// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi khu tshur gyi sgrub
196b8(rgyud): ba'i thabs// dngos grub las byung 'od gsol pa// gded nas zhi zhing mtshan nyid med// sangs rgyas rang bzhin sku chen po// dkyil 'khor chen po'i dbu su'o// rdo rje'i rdo rje'i bdag nyid
197a1(rgyud): sgoms 'bar ba lta bu'i gzi brjid kyis// 'di yis 'jig rten thams cad kyi// 'khor los bsgyur ba nyid du ni// 'jig rten kun gyi thams cad du// kun nas phun sum tshogs
197a2(rgyud): pa kun// bkug nas gus pas sbyin par bya// sngags ni oM dz+wa la dz+wa la dI bya bIHud kany+tsi Sha d+hu na d+hu na hUM/ snying 'gre'i gtsug to shes bya bar// sangs rgyas dpa' bo kun gyi gsungs// 'di ni
197a3(rgyud): bsgrubs pa tsam gyis ni// sangs rgyas nyid kyang rnyed dka' mni// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gtsug tor gyi sgrub pa'i thab so// sangs rgyas rang bzhin phyag rgya che// legs par mnyam
197a4(rgyud): par gzhag pas sgom// tshad skyob gdugs dka dachen po ni// chos dbyings mnyam dang mi mnyam pa// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// zla ba'i kha dog cher 'bar/ 
197a5(rgyud): zhil chu'i dkyil 'khor rnam dag pa// dri med bund/ ri kar gnas// ri mo bdun gyis yongasu gang // bcud mA/ na lta bur bsgom par bya// dngos grub 'di yi sbyor ba yis/ 
197a6(rgyud): sems can rnams la thams cad du// re ba thams cad yongs rdzogs pa// 'di ni gtsug tor gdugs dkar che// sngags ni oM ma ma ma ma hUM ni// 'di ni bsgrubs pa tsam gyis ni// ye shes
197a7(rgyud): tshe dang stobs mgyogs 'gro// dpa' bo thams cad thob 'gyur zhing // sangs rgyas nyid kyang rnyed dka' min// gdugs dkar po yi sgrub thab so// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas par// 'bar
197a8(rgyud): ba'i phreng la blugs ral gri ni// sngags pas snying khar bsgom par bya// rang gi bdag nyid sangs rgyas zhing // sangs rgyas rang bzhin sprin chen pos// na mkha'i mthongs rnams yongs gang / 
197b1(rgyud): bdag nyid gnyis mang ngo bo yis// rnal 'byor gcig tu bsgom par ba// sngags kyi yi ge 'khor lo cha// 'bar ba'i phreng ba 'khrugs pa'i 'od// sngags pas snying khar bsgom par bya// rgyal ba
197b2(rgyud): dam pa nyid du 'gyur// sngags ni oM dz+wa l-i dz+wa loSh+NI She dz+wa la dz+wa la ba ban+d+ha da ma dam du ma dru ma da ha da ha na hUM// rgyal ba'i gtsug ti phal gri che// shes rab ye shes dri ma med// sngags pas kun
197b3(rgyud): nas bsgoms nas ni// rgyal ba'i gtsug tor 'dra bar 'gyur// rgyal ba'i gtsug tor gyi sgrub pa'i zab so// sangs rgyas kun gyi rang bzhin sku// 'bar ba'i phreng ba 'khrugs pa'i 'od// seng ge'i
197b4(rgyud): khri yi steng du dasam// yang rdo rdo rje'i gdan la gnas// kun tu gtsug tor char 'bar ba// snying khar yongasu bsgom par bya// sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag nyid ni// yi ge dam pa yi ni gnas/ 
197b5(rgyud): thog ma tha ma med ni ba// chos kyi sku ni mchog tu che// 'di ni bsgrubs pa tsam gyis ni// kun tu gtsug tor ste/ bas po che// skad cig de la 'grub 'gyur te/ rdo rje sangs rgyas
197b6(rgyud): kun gyi bka' bzhi no// sngags ni// oM badz+ra ban d+ha hUM// gsang sngags 'di ni dam pa gtse// sangs rgyas thams cad dbang bskur byeng // rtag tu rnal 'byor pas bsgoms na// da ni kun gyi dbang bskur
197b7(rgyud): rdo rje snying po rgyan ces bya ba'i rgyud chen po las de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gtsug tor gyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rim par phye ba yongasu rdzogaso// // de nas bcom ldan
