197b8(rgyud): 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnams slar yang 'dus par gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug la gsol ba btab pa// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems
198a1(rgyud): dpa' rnams kyi galam gyi sgrub pa rgyas dbaka' stsal du gsol// de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen pos de dag gis gsol pa
198a2(rgyud): btab pa'i tshig gsan nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad du bdag nyid byin gyis brlabs nas byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi gsang sngags kyi rim par bye ba bka' stsal pa/ 
198a3(rgyud): shes rab ye shes rdo rje che// snying khar yongs su bsnyems nasu// ral gri 'bar ba gzi brjid tsho// mtha' klas pa la rnam par gnas// 'jam dbyangs zhes bya bsgom par
198a4(rgyud): bya dgung gum gyi ni rnam pa 'dra// gtsug na bur phung lnga ldan pa// gzhonu byas pa'i gzugs can ni// mtha' yas rgyas pa'i rlabs che ba'i// rnam par 'gro ba
198a5(rgyud): lto bur gnas// ud pal sngon po phyag na snams/ dpa' chen dang ni me las 'khrungs// ye shes chen bo gzi brjid che// 'khrul pa med cing yi ge bral// sangs
198a6(rgyud): rgyas kun bdag shes rab mchog/ nyon mongs thams cad zad par byed// rdo rje kun bdag bko pa po// kun tu 'gro ba'i dam pa'i don// dbyer med mchog tu gsang bapo// rig pa
198a7(rgyud): mchog gis bdag nyid 'di// zhal drug pa la phyag drug mchog/ mngon shes drug ldan yi ge drug/ rjes dran drug gi sbyor ba yis// phyag rgya dam pa stobs po che// gzi brjid yang na
198a8(rgyud): stobs kyis kyang // kun nas yongasu gsal ba po// gzugs che lus kyang che ba ste// na mkha'i khams na rnam par gnas// yang na phyag gnyis shes par bya// ting 'dzin gnas sdig pa
198b1(rgyud): bcom// dpa' bo pad+ma la gnas pa// zla ba'i mdog can 'od po che// rnam 'byor pa yi ye shes pra// shes rab pha roman 'ang // gdod nas ma skyes pa zhes bsam// sangs rgyas byang chub rab
198b2(rgyud): gsol byed// sangs rgyas rnams kyi ye shes mchog/ 'jam pa'i dgas zhes rab tu grags// de'i sngags ni// oM bA kye de na maHgsang sngags 'di ni mchog tu gsang // gsong chen gyi
198b3(rgyud): ni dam por bzhed// rnam par gsum gyi sgo mar gnas// pha rol byin dgro btu gas la/ cang nyid shes rab yin shes// sngags pas rtag tu bsgom par bya// dbang po drug ni rab bskur te/ sangs rgyas
198b4(rgyud): nyid ni rnal 'byor las// pad+ma rA ga lta bu'i mdog/ ston TI lta bur cher gsal ba// sems dpa' chen po gser gyi mdog stobs po che ni bsgom par bya// 'di ni bsgrubs patsam
198b5(rgyud): gyis ni// shes rab dri ma med par 'gyur// bstan bcas bad rang smra zhing // dbang phyug zed mdun na gnas// rig pa 'dzin pa zed dang // byang chub kun gyi pha rol son// dbang phyug
198b6(rgyud): kun dang bde ba che// chos rnams kun gyi yon tan mchog/ rdo rje 'dzin pa thams cad dang // yang na sangs rgyas tha~Md kyi// kun tu 'gro ba thob 'grub na// dngos grub gzhan lta smos ci dgos// dngangul
198b7(rgyud): chu bcud len de nyid dang // rkang pas spyod pa nyid mchog/ ril bu dang ni mi snang ba// thams cad du ni ster bar 'gyur// dpal ldan 'jam pa'i mchog 'di ni// chos kyi dung gi mchog las
198b8(rgyud): 'khrungs// sangs rgyas rnams kyi tshangs pa'i dbyangs// 'jam pa'i dbyangs zhes rab tu grags// 'di ni bsgrubs pa tsam gyis ni// bsams pa'i phun sum tshogs kun gyis// sangs
199a1(rgyud): rgyas kun d+ha btan 'gro na// gzhan pa'i lha lnga smos cing ges// 'jam pa'i byangs kyi sgrub pa'i 'baso// snying khar pad+ma chen po la/ pra ba'i kyil 'phe yongasu gnas/ 'jig rten
199a2(rgyud): dbang phyug dpa' bo che// thugs rje chen po'i thugs ldan pa// phyag bzhi pa la zhal ba'i pa// dung dang kun da bla ltar dag chos kyi dbyings las yang dag byung // chu yi dkyil 'khor chen po la// bdag 'di
199a3(rgyud): 'jig rten dbang phyug lhas// de la gnas pa dge bsgom// rang bzhin gyis ni 'di kun dag/ gdong nas ma skyes ma byung ba// gsang sngags chen po 'di yis ni// snying khar yongasu bsgom par ba// 'jig
199a4(rgyud): rten dbang phyug 'khor lo cha/ kun tu rnam par 'gro ba yi// 'bar ba'i phreng bas 'khrigs shing ni// rol pa'i thor tshu gas 'dzin pa po// ral pa'i dbus dpa' be che/ 'od dngag mang po ldan
199a5(rgyud): ba'i bdag/ ston ka'i zla ba lta bur gsal// kun tu nam kha' yongs gang ga/ gsang sngags sbyor bdag bsgom pa rag/ rang nyid 'jig rten gsum rnam rgyal/ chos kyi dbyings kyi ma
199a6(rgyud): klas pa// pad+ma'i lus kyi yang dag gang // kun tu pad+ma rnams la ni// khams gsum rnar rgyal ba'i sku// khyad par du dag dgang bar bya/ 'gro ba brtan dang g.yo ba kun// snang dang mi snang dngos po ni// yang dang
199a7(rgyud): yang du blta bar bya// gdul byam lus sems la ni// stobs po ches ni dgang bar bya// rtse don dbyibs ni 'od bzhin du// sna tshogs gzugs la cher 'bar ba// kun nas yongasu bsdus nas ni// sngags
199a8(rgyud): pa'i mdun du bzhag par bya// de nas sngags pas de ma thag/ slar yang rtse gcig sems kyis ni// dgug dang gzhug dang bcing ba dang / dbang du bya ba bsgrub par bya// 'jig rten dbang phyug thucu chen po// 
199b1(rgyud): bcom ldan rnal 'byor can grub na// dpa' bo thams cad stsol 'gyur zhing // rang gi dengs grub mchog rnams dang // rnal 'byor thams cad 'dzin nyid dang / rnam par rgyas pa'i nor sngar 'gyur// rig pa 'dzin
199b2(rgyud): dpa'akhor lo can// sa dang pha rol byin sogs dang // sangs rgyas rnams kyang stsol 'gyur na/ dngos grub gzhan lta smos ci dgos// de'i sngags ni oM A ro li ka/ gsang sngags dpal ldan
199b3(rgyud): mchog 'di ni// rang nyid khams gsum rnam par rgyal// longs spyod thams cad bkug nas ni// skad cig tsam gyis rnam par ster// pad+ma'i sgrub pa'i sbyor ba yi// bdag nyid 'jig rten
199b4(rgyud): dbang phyug sgrub// 'jig rten gsum gyis rgyal rnams ni// srid pa bkug nas rnam par ster/ 'jig rten dbang phyug gi sgrub pa'i thab so// thams cad rdo rje'i rang bzhin gzugs
199b5(rgyud): me yi dkyil 'khor dge pa ste// de yi dbus bya ba ni/ dkyil 'khor rlung dang rang mtshungs pa/ de yi dbusu de 'dra bas maM// nyi ma yi ni dkyil 'khor ro// de yi dbus gza
199b6(rgyud): brjid che// 'bar ba lta ba'i gzi brjid can// rdo rje'i lag pa gzi brjid che// rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par brgyan// tshangs pa'i yul sa thams cad du// kun nas yongs su gsal bar byed// 
199b7(rgyud): hUM gi yi ge sgra zab mo// dbyar gyi sprin dang mtshungs pa'i 'od// rgyal po 'khyil ba dang mtshungs pa// zar ma yi ni me tog 'dra// 'bar ba dmar pos 'khrigs shing 'dzegs// bskal
199b8(rgyud): po'i me dang 'dre bar gnas// zhal bzhi pa las mche ba bzhi// 'jigs pa'i dus kyi ba la ba 'dra/ hUM ga yi ge bzhi dang ldan// sprin 'khrugs pa dang rab tu 'dra/ rdo rje hUM mdzad ces bya ba/ 
200a1(rgyud): rnal 'byor pas ni rtag tu skem// sngags kyi tshig ni/ oM sum b+ha ni sum b+ha nin+d+he/ gr-ih+Na gr-iswA ts+tsha/ gr-ih+NA pa ya gr-i h+NA pa ya hU~M/ a na ya se b+ha ga wAn/ bing+ka dang hU~M dag/ rdo
200a2(rgyud): 'dzin pa'i rgyal po 'di// kun mchog srid pa'i dbang phyug gis// 'jig rten gsum yang 'gugs byed na// bud med gzhan lta smos ci dges/ tshangs pa khyab 'jug dbang chen sogs// 
200a3(rgyud): chung ma dang bcas phyag rgyar bcas// de dag thams cad 'gugs byed na// sdug bsngal can gzhan smos ci dgos// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// rdo rje'i gzugs rnyan snying khar
200a4(rgyud): seMn dbang po gnyis ni mnyam sbyor bas// rdo rje can gyi sngon du sgrug/ bsam pa thams cad rdzogs byed pa// bcom ldan rdo rje can 'grub 'gyur// rgyal po thams cad sbyin 'gyur/ 
200a5(rgyud): na// dngos grub gzhan lta smos ci dgos// sngags ni 'dir oM k+ki hUM dzaHgsang sngags 'di yi sbyorab yis// dam pa'i don du bsgrub par bya// longs spyod
200a6(rgyud): snyed thams cad rnams// de snyed thams cad rnam par bster// rdo rje 'dzin pa sgrub pa'o// dbang chen dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'i// byams pa chen po'i bdag nyid sku// snying khar zla zhing
200a7(rgyud): gzugs brnyan 'od// rdo rje 'bar ba'i phreng ba ldan// 'jig rten khams ni 'byam klas pa// rang bzhin gcig tu byas nas ni// rdo rje yis ni spro ba dang // dbang bskur ba yi rang bzhin
200a8(rgyud): dge gser gyi kha dog legs 'bar ba// ral po'i ngor tshugs 'dzin pa go// ral pa'i dbus su mchod rten tsho// dung dang kun dazla 'od bzang // bsgoms nas sems can thams
200b1(rgyud): la brtan pa'i don du dbang bskur bya// yang na sems can thams cad la// bu gcig lta bur rnam par spro// bsgoms pa'i sbyor bas bsgoms na ni// gnyis mang ma rgyal ba las rgyul// spro ba dang / 
200b2(rgyud): ni bsdu ba dang // gnas sogs dbye bas rnam par dbye// byams pas kun tu rnam par spro// chos dbyings mnyam dang mi mnyam pa// thams cad bdag dang bdag gi bar/ shin tu dri ma med par
200b3(rgyud): gnas// ri rab lta bur brtan pa'i sems// 'khrul po mdo cing yi ga bral// de ltar sems ni brtani byas nas// mnyam med sems can kun dang mnyam// bdag nyid byams pa yino zhes// dga'
200b4(rgyud): ldan gnas pa'i tshul 'dzin pa// cung zad li zhing 'khyil ba'i sgra// pad+ma rA ga mtshungs pa'i 'ong // rin cha na sems ni rnam dag pas// bdag nyid kyis ni bsgom par
200b5(rgyud): byad 'di'i gsang sngags rang bzhin gyis grub pa ni// oM a r+thi tany+dza ya sarba satwA sa ya nu ga ta swA hA/ sang sngags bdag nyid rgyal po 'di// byams pa zhes ni grag
200b6(rgyud): pau ste/ chos kyi dbyings dang mtshung bar khyab/ byams pa'i thugs ni yid du'o// dang po'i sbyor ba'i rnal 'byor gyis// sgrub pa'i thabs mchog bsgom par bya// oM mai tra ya tI/ 'di
200b7(rgyud): bsgrubs pa tsam gyis kyang // dga' ldan du ni gnas par 'gyur// sgrib pa kun dang bral ba'i bdag/ rang nyid lha yi bu dang mtshungs// byams pa'i sbyor bas bsgoms na ni// 'di ni byams
200b8(rgyud): pa lte bur 'gyur// byams pa'i sangs rgyas zhing du ni// rang bzhin gyis ni skye bar 'gyur// de mdun chos ni legs mnyan nas// sa dang pha rol phyin pa dang // dbang dang ting 'dzin
201a1(rgyud): thob nas ni// da ni byang chub sems dpar 'gyur// mthar yang sangs rgyas thams cad ni/ khams pa'i yid kyis thob par 'gyur// khams pa'i sgrub pa'i thab so// rang
201a2(rgyud): gri lus ni thams cad ni// namakha' mtshungs pa nyid du sgom// chos bdag med pas bskyed nas kyang // rang nyid na mkho'i snying por 'gyur// gsang sngags 'di yi spyir ba yis// mkha' mtshung
201a3(rgyud): dpe las rnam par 'das// na mkha'i 'od zer gyur pa yis// rang gi sems can sems la spro// kun gyi sems las spros nas ni// slar yang rim gyis bsdu bar bya// na mkhar sa many+dzu ra
201a4(rgyud): blta// rang gi de nyid kyis sbyar bya// rin chen dkyil 'khor dbus sa par// rin chen kha dog 'od po che// rgyan rnams kun gyis lus brgyan pa// lag na rin cheni stongs
201a5(rgyud): po chen rin chen sbyor bas bsgoms pa yis// na mkha'i dam pa 'grub pa yin// oM A ka sha gar+b+hA ya swA hA// na mkha'i snying po stobs po che// bcom ldan rnal 'byor
201a6(rgyud): 'grub par 'gyur// rang gi dngos grub thams cad ni// ster bar 'gyur te dpyad mi dgos// dpa' bo sangs rgyas thams cad kyis// dngos grub ji skad bka' stsal pa// na mkha'i snying
201a7(rgyud): po bsgrubs pa yis// de dag thams cad myur du sbyar// na mkha'i snying po sgyu ba'i thab so// sangs rgyas kun gyi rang bzhin sku// rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan pa yis// kun tu bzang po
201a8(rgyud): 'od bzong ga/ zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus ni// sngags pas rtag tu bsgom par bya// dngos grub mchog ni thob par 'gyur// rang go lus ni ji snyed pa'i// rang gi phra rab rdal rnams kyis// de dag/ 
201b1(rgyud): thams cad mtshungs par bya/ sangs rgyas sku yi sku nyid du// yang na ba spu'i khung rnams// rang gi 'khor los yongs bskyor nas// sangs rgyas kun dang mtshungs byas te/ bdag ni kun tu
201b2(rgyud): bzang po zhes// yi ge lnga zho su bshad// 'di yi sngags chen bzla bar bya// yang na 'dir n-i lnga gzhan gyis// rtag tu sngagasu gyur pa'o// oM sI hriHka ya swA hA/ gsang sngags rgyal po cha gsang zhing // gdod
201b3(rgyud): nas dag cing rang 'byung ba// grub pa gsang sngags 'di yis ni// de yi shes rab dri med cing // gzugs mdzes po ni da dang mtshungs/ bstan bcos thams cad rab smra ba// kun bzang mchog tu bdag 'gyur
201b4(rgyud): ro kun tu bzang po'i sgrub pa'i thab so// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// rgyan rnams kur gyis brgyan pa yi// sgrib pa tham sa cang rnam sel ba// dam pa'i don du bsgem par bya/ 
201b5(rgyud): gsang sngags 'di yi sbyor ba dang // cud kyi len gyis bde blag tu// ring po nyid du mi thogs par// sgrib pa rnam sel mtshungs bar 'gyur// oM sarba ni wa ra Na ban+tam b+hi swA hA/ 
201b6(rgyud): oM ni sa ra ya swA hA/ gtso bo gsadra sngags 'di 'dzin la// rnam par sel bar grags pa ste// thams cad sgom pa'i sbyor ba yis// phyag rgya kun gyi thams cad du// gdod nas skye mad rang bzhin
201b7(rgyud): gyis// gdod nas dag cing 'gyur ba med// de ltar chos 'di shes nas ni// lha nyid dang ni mnyam byas nas// rnyog pa med cing zag med pa'i// rje su rnal 'byor gyis bsgrub bya// ud pal
201b8(rgyud): sngon po'i 'dab ma ltar// gsal ba'i rnam par gnas pa'o// me yis yongs su bskor ba yis// phyag rgya ral gri gzi brjid che// yang nas yang du sems byed cing // dngos grub 'di ni/ 
202a1(rgyud): gzi brjid che// rnam sel mchog gi dbang phyug ni// mtha' las 'das pa'i dngos grub mchog/ thams cad nas ni stsol ba nyid// rnam par sel ba sgrub pa'i thab so// dbang / 
202a2(rgyud): chen gyil 'khor stang du ni// rdo rje yi ni dbus na bzhugs// gser gyi mdag can sku chen po// 'bar ba lta 'u riga'i gIr can// snying khar dr-i yi phyag rgya gnas// mkha' snying zhes byang bdag nyid
202a3(rgyud): sgom// rang gi lhag pa'i lhar sbyor ba// rang gi gsang sngags brjod par bya// mkha' snying zhes byar bdag bsgoms nas// sngags kyi yi ge mchog bod 'di// oM k+ki haHrA dzaHswA hA/ bsam yas
202a4(rgyud): sngags mchog 'di yis ni// dngos grub thams cad rab gas rol mdzad// sa yi snying po zhes grags pa// dam pa'i don du/ rnal 'byor pas// sa'i snying po'i sgrub pa'i thab so// zad
202a5(rgyud): ba med cing 'khrul pa med// zad med mchog gi shes rab can / zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// shes rab tu rje'i bdag nyid dge/ blo gros mi zad rnyed dka' ba// 'bad / 
202a6(rgyud): yis ni bsgom par bya// ma yi dkyil 'khor dbus ni// gsar gyi mdog dang ldan pa'i gzugs// rgyal po chen po zla ba'i 'od// 'od kyi dkyil 'khor rab tu gsal// sngags ni oM ak+Sha ya
202a7(rgyud): ma tI swAhA// sngags kyi yi ge gsang ba 'di/ thams cad blo gros gsapapa byed// ye shes mi zad 'dod pa yis// 'bad pa yis ni bsgrub bya ste// dngos grub kun gyi mchog ces bya// shes
202a8(rgyud): rab ye shes dri mad mdzes// sangs rgyas nyid kyang thob 'gyur na// ngos grub gonan lta smos ci dgos// blo gros mi bang pa'i sgrub thab so// kun nos shes rab chen po can/ zla ba'i gyil 'tsha
202b1(rgyud): la brten par// gser gyis kha dog gzi brjid che// rgyan rnams thams cad kyis brgyan pa'i// gzhon nu'i gzugs can rtag rtsa bsam// rab thams cad rdzogs par mdzad// gi sa ba tI lhar sbyor ba/ 
202b2(rgyud): namakha'i bdag po bdag yin zhes// lus ngag yid kyi thams cad du// thams cad rig pas brtan par bya// shin tu dri ma de byang chub sems// rang snying me leng lta bur bsam// de nas yi ge
202b3(rgyud): tshig bkod de// mkha' mdzod bdag ces bdag nyid kyis// bsgoms nas rdo rje rdo rje'i bdag/ mkha' la rin chen 'thung gnas dang // yid bzhin nor bu dpagra bsam shing // de bzhin
202b4(rgyud): bum pa bzang po sogs// 'jig rten kun gyi dbang phyug gis// nye bar 'kho ba thams cad 'bab// 'jig rten kun gyi rdzas thams cad// ji snyed yod pa de dag kun/ 
202b5(rgyud): 'dir ni skad cig tsam nyid la// dngos grub dam pa stsol bar 'gyur// oM ga ga na kan+d+he gaM sA hA// na mkha' mdzod kyi dngos grub che// nor gyi rgyun gyi rab 'babs pa// na mtha'i
202b6(rgyud): mdzod ni stobs po che// skad cig ma la bad par 'gyur// nam mkha' mdzod kyi sgrub pa'i thab so// rin chen dkyil 'khor las byung ba// rin chen phung po char rab 'bebs// rin chen gzi brjing
202b7(rgyud): mchog tu rol// lag na rin chan de bsgrub bya// lag na rin chen phyag brkyang ba// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// rdo rje sbyor bas bsgom par bya// bdag nyid rin chen zhes bya dang // 
202b8(rgyud): rin chen thams cad stsol bar mdzod// thams cad rdo rje bzhin bdag nyid// pr-i yang sku mdog sngo bsangs 'od // dbang chen dang ni ma las byu // phyag na rin chen cher gsal ba// rab tu
203a1(rgyud): 'bad de bsgom par bya// oM hA pA Ni muHswA hA/ gsang sngags 'di ni brtson 'grus cha// rab tu 'bad da bsgrubs nas ni// 'gro bkun gyi lag tu ni// rin chen thams cad rab
203a2(rgyud): stsol byed// lag na rin po che bsgrub po'i babaso// chos kyi dbyings dang mtshungs pa'i sems// bdud rtsi chu yis rab gang gi// stob gsum zhes ni bsam par bya// pad+ma gcig gi steng na
203a3(rgyud): gnas// de ya~M steng du gzi brjid che// chu lha yi ni gzugs ni mchog/ de snying du yang gsang chen po// me oM dkyil 'khor dam pa yin// de yi steng du brtson 'grus che// rtse mo brtsa ba'i rdo
203a4(rgyud): byung 'ad yi steng du pad chen po// 'dab ma brgyad pa 'od gsal // de stang rtag tu bsam pa ni// byang chub sems dpa' stobs po che// rgya mtsho'i blo gros zhes grags pa// 'bar ba'i
203a5(rgyud): dring ba 'khrigs pa'i 'od// dung dang kun dazla ba'i mdog/ rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par brgya no// de yi lag nag rgya che// rdo rje steng du rab tu grags// rang gi lhag pa'i lha skyo
203a6(rgyud): lelang nyid rdo rje min no nas/ ma mangs// rdo rjel stang pas myas nas // rgya mama'i blo gros shes pa ma// slar sa gas sngags bcu pa sh+ya// sngags ni oM swaka
203a7(rgyud): ra ma ti sa ra swA hANAM/ sngags 'di mchog dang gtso bo ste/ shes rab ye shes dri med mdzes// rdo rje'i sbyor bas myangs nas ni// shes rab rgya mtsho'i blo gros mtshungs// rang nying sangs
203a8(rgyud): rgyas 'jam pa'i dbyas// thub rten 'jig rten dbang drug rgyal// dngos grub gzhan lta smos ci dgos// rgya mtsho'i blo gros kyi sgrub pa'i thab so// dbang chen dkyil 'khor la gnas
203b1(rgyud): nga'i/ ud par sngon po 'dab 'dri'i 'od// rdo rje snying po brtson 'grus che// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni// ji snyed sa stangs mthar dag tu/ khyab la sdug cing mtho ba yis// sra ning
203b2(rgyud): snying po rnam dag pa'i// mchog gi yi ge 'gyur med pa'i// sa bcu'i dbang phyug mgon po ni// chos kyi sprin la spyod mdzad pa// bsam yas so ni yang dag brnyes// in dra nI la
203b3(rgyud): mtshungs pa'i 'od// de yi sngags gyur mdzes pa ni// yi ge mchog ni steng du 'bar// thugs kyi rdo rje gsal ba// rang nyid rnam par 'phro ba bzhin// sngags ni oM badz+ra gar+b+ha hUM/ 'di ni sngag
203b4(rgyud): mchog gtso bo ste// sangs rgyas byang chub rab sgrub pang // ye/ shes yangs pa stsol mdzad cing // rnam pa kun tu phun tshogs kun// sangs rgyas nyid kyang stsol mdzad na/ dngos
203b5(rgyud): grub gzhan lta smos ci dgos// dgug dang gzhug dang bcing dang // bang du bya ba sgrub par byed// bdag nyid rdo rje yin zhe zhes// nga rgyal rab tu bskyed nas ni// rdo rje snying po bzhin du gzhan/ 
203b6(rgyud): bdag gi rnal 'byor bsgom par bya// thugs kyi rdo rje nyid gyur nas// chos kyi dbyings dang mnyam pa thob// dus na rnam pa thams cad kyis// rdo rje snying pos yang dag byung / rdo rje snying po mkha' rdo rje/ 
203b7(rgyud): smon pa byed pa de yis sdug/ rdo rje snying po sgru ba'i thab so// dba' chen me las yang dag byung // nor bu rin chen 'dra ba'i 'od// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gnas pa yi/ nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor mtshungs pa'i
203b8(rgyud): 'di rin chen 'byung ba sems chen po// 'gro ba snang bar byed de gnas// pad+ma mkha' 'drar rnam pa can// phyag rgya de yi snying khar gnas// rin chen sbyor bas bsgom par bya// rim chen char
204a1(rgyud): 'bab par 'gyur// sngags ni oM rat+na kA ra/ hrIHrat+na na dad swA hA// rin chen 'byung gnas rgyal po 'di// mchog rnams kyi ni sa yi byug/ sbyor ba kun gyis bsgrub par bya// rgya
204a2(rgyud): tshe'i nor rnams stsol bar 'gyur// ran chen 'byung ba'i sgru'i pa'i thab so// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje snying po rgyan gyi rgyud las sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad
204a3(rgyud): kyi sgrub pa'i thab so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad slar yang 'dus te gshegs nas bcom ldan 'das thog ma dang tha ma med pa dam pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor
204a4(rgyud): ba'i gsol ba btab pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis khro bo bcom ldan 'das bskyed du gsol// de nas bcom lda ngan 'das khro bo 'khor los bsgyur ba chen pos de skad ces
204a5(rgyud): gsol ba btab ma thag kho nar rdo rje khro bo ri dkyil 'khor gsad dA las ches gsang ba bka' stsal pa/ de nas yang dag bshad b+ha ga khro bo yi ni dkyil 'khor mchog/ rlung khams
204a6(rgyud): rab tu gsal ba la// me ni dbus nas dbusa'o// de yi dbus rdo rje che// 'od zer lnga li phreng bas mdzes// de yi mdun du bya ba yang // mdung rtsa 'bar po chen po yi// de yi g.yas kyi gdan la ni// 
204a7(rgyud): rdo rje chen po 'bar phreng can/ g.yon nyid du ni bcon can// rig pa'i phreng bas rnam par spras// rgyab tu ram gro'i phyag rgya ni// rin chen 'ab bas rnam par rgyan// byi ngos rnamasu rnam khros pa'i/ wa~M
204a8(rgyud): go mas ched dgod par bya// de yi sngags kyi yi ge gsang // gsang chen mchog tu 'bar ba'o// gnal du mod cing grangs med mchog/ chos dbyings mnyam dang mi mnyam pa/ yi ge gcig
204b1(rgyud): ba gsang chen po/ rgyu yi don du rtogs par byed// dbyangs lnga dang ni yang dag ldan// thig le sgra yis rnam par rgyan// de nyid gsang ba'i mgon po ni// dbyangs bdun pa ni bshad pa yin// ha ru kA dpa
204b2(rgyud): rdo rje che// 'jigs pa'i bskul ba can thal bas// sems dpal sngon po 'bar ba'i bdag/ 'bang ba me yi dkyil 'khor bzhin// 'jigs pa chen po'i dus mtshan gyis// char sprin dang ni 'dra ba'i
204b3(rgyud): 'od pad+ma rA ga'i rnam pa 'dra// 'bar ba kun gyis rnam par rgyan// dur khrod me bzhin shin tu yang // gsal ba'i sgra ldan stobs po che// rno ba'i rdo rje char 'bar ba// thod pa'i tshong bar steng du
204b4(rgyud): 'bar/ 'jigs pa chen po'i dus mtshan gyis// rgod ma kha ya~M me ltar gnas// smin 'khyog rnam par 'khrug pa can// g.yas brkyang ba yi zhabs kyis bzhugs// khro bo la sog
204b5(rgyud): nyams dang ldan// rnam pa sna tshogs 'khrug pa'i gdong // gar da nga sdud par yang dag ldan// 'jig rten snang ba'i gar mar+tha/ dang // phyag ni brgya phrag stong dang ldan// gcig tu gyur
204b6(rgyud): cing rnam pa mang // rnam mang nal ldan de dag gi// sngo ser la sogs tha dad ldan kazhabs kyang rnam pa du ma ldan/ sna tshogs mdog ldan rnam por 'khrug// de nyid bcom ldan rnal 'byor te// 
204b7(rgyud): khro bo'i rgyalo stobs po che// shin tu gdug cing drag rnams la// sgyu 'phrul dri ba zhes byar gnas// phyag drug zhabs phrug snang ba can// zhal drug pa ste gsus po che// char sprin mchog 'dra
204b8(rgyud): cher gnas pa// dus mtha'i ma dang 'dra bar gnas// mdog chen rgyal po 'khyil ba 'dra// zar ma yi ni me tog mtshungs// khri bo bod pa'i phreng ba 'chang // gshin rje'i mthar mdzad stobs
205a1(rgyud): ngo che de la sngags kyang oM AHhUM phaT oM ya ma ma than hUM/ dag/ oM hrIHSh+T+r-iT+Ta bi kr-i tA na na hUM sarba sha tAnan shA ya sAn+d+ha ya hUM phaT/ sngags kyi rgyal po'i bdag nyid 'di// khab
205a2(rgyud): bdag gdul dka' 'dul ba po// gshin rjes mthar mdzad khro bo che// sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag nyid gtso// sangs rgyas thams cad spyan nges// dbang du yang ni mdzad par gnas// rtag tu gdul
205a3(rgyud): dka' 'dul mdzad cing // rdo rje snang mdzad lags par 'dul// shin tu gdug pa drag rnams la// zhi ba'i nye bar mi sbyar te// shes rab thabs kyi bdag nyid kyis// de bzhin gshegs rnams khre bor
205a4(rgyud): mdzad// thugs rjes khro bo'i nga tshul can// 'jig rten gsum kyang ngas sreg mdzad// de bas 'bad ba thams cad kyis/ ras rab thabs kyi bdag nyid sku// thugs rjes khro bo ma
205a5(rgyud): lus mchog/ gdug pa 'dul bar mdzad pa bskyed// gshin hUM/ mthar byed kyi sgrub pa'i thab so// de nyid bcom ldan rnal 'byor te// khro bo gzigs me zhesu grags// rin chen
205a6(rgyud): 'bar ba'i khro bo che// 'jigs pa chen po'i dus dang 'dra// ud pa la sngon po'i mdab ma bzhin// da yi kha dog rnam par gsal// drag po chen po'i zhal bzhi pa// 'bar ba'i phreng ba 'khrigs pa'i
205a7(rgyud): 'od spyan gsum pa la khro gnyer bsnyer// phyag drug pa la mchog tu 'bar/ ma ma pa ga li khri'i mdog ltar shin tu dmar// de yaMs khro gnyar bsnyer ba yis// gdug pa 'dul mdzad 'byin
205a8(rgyud): bar byed// khro ba'i rgyal po gnyis pa ni// yang dang yang du bsam par bya// ma lus pa rnams thams cad du// son pa'i bdag nyid chen po ngas// 'gugs pa dang ni dbang byed na/ skye bo gzhan/ 
205b1(rgyud): lta spros ci dgos// sngags ni oM kakaNi hUM phaT/ khro bo 'di yi sngags 'dzin pa// 'jig rten gsum mchog stobs po chegs rnams thams cad sreg bdan// skye bo gzhan lta smos ci dgos// 
205b2(rgyud): khro bo gzugs ma sgrub pa'i thab so// de 'od bcom ldan rnal 'byor te// rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs// pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug gyur// rta mgrino zhesu bo shad pa yin// rtag tu 'chang ka'i
205b3(rgyud): mdog 'dra ba// rgya skyugs mdog ltar dmar ba'o// chu dang gzi brjid can reg pa// me yi dkyil 'khor dag dang ldan// 'dod ldan rnams la gdod pa 'byung // gdug pa can rnams gdug pa
205b4(rgyud): 'byung ni ba la yang zhi ba 'byung // stobs ldan rnams la stobs kyis sbyor// zhal bzhi pa la zhabs bzhi pa/ bsam gtan bkri dang mnyam par ldan// phyag bzhi pa la brtson 'grus
205b5(rgyud): che seng ge ltar gnas mche ba bzhi// rta mgrin rgyal po chen po no// dam pa'i dbang phyug bsgrub par bya// skad cig nyid la gnas nas no// thams cad lhung ba bsgrub par
205b6(rgyud): bya sngags ni oM a mr-i tod+b+ha bod b+ha be hUM dzag oM a mr-i tod b+ha ba hUM phaT/ g.yas dang g.yon gyi sbyor ba yis// g.yon brkyang ba ni rab tu sbyar// khro bo'i skyil dkrung byas nas ni// 'jig
205b7(rgyud): rten thams cad rab tu mnyes// pad+ma'i dbang phyug rgyal po 'di// sa yi dbang phyug kun gyi mchog rta yi mgrin pa stobs po che// stobs kyi sbyor ba bsgrub par bya// dbang phyug chen po la
205b8(rgyud): sogs lha// tshogs kyi bdag po gzhan dag dang // mi dang gdug pa'i bsam pa can// sa rnams thams cad dgug par bya// rta mgrin gyi sgrib pa'i thob so// de nyid bcom ldan rnal
206a1(rgyud): 'byor de// gcig pu nyid ni lhag pa'i lnga// shes rab thabs kyi bdag nyid gyur// khro bo mchog tu mi 'gyur ba// kun sbyor bdag gi rnal 'byor gyis// thugs rjes khro ba'i gang du
206a2(rgyud): song // de nas sangs rgyas thaMd kyis// sna yi rtse mor yid kyis ni// g.yo ba med par bsam par bya// slob dpon mi g.yo khro bo che// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad brtan// ral gri zhags pa 'dzin pa
206a3(rgyud): gsang // thog ma tha ma med pa'i mchog// br-i yang ku raru sngo ba'i gzugs// 'khrigs shing byis pa lta bur gnas// ma lus pa yis rnams kun// chos dbyings mnyam dang mi mnyam pa// khro bo mang
206a4(rgyud): ba bran dang ni// pho nyas kyang ni rnam par rgyan// skye bo kun gyis yongasu gang // sangs rgyas kun gyi spyan snga na/ bka'/ lung yang ni yongasu stsol// sngags ni/ na maHsa man+ta badz+ra NA tsaN+Da ma
206a5(rgyud): ro 'aN s+pho Ta ya hUM/ tra ka hAM ma khro bo gzi brjid / na po 'di// gzugs mang mnga' ba stobs po che// 'gro ba thaMd 'gugs par byed// bang du yang ni mdzad par gnas// rlung dang
206a6(rgyud): me las yang dag byung // 'bar ba lta bu'i gzi brjid can// sngags dang phyag rgya sogs kun mchog/ lus dang ngag yid de bzhi no// dgug dang gzhug dang bcing ba dang / ka/ dbang du bya ba sgrub par byed// 
206a7(rgyud): de la sogs pa mtha' yas mchog/ rnam pa'i khams kyis mtha'o klas mchog khro bar phyag rgyarang byung ba// drag po thog ma tha ma med/ rnam par 'phro ba bzhin du gnaso// de bzhin gshig
206a8(rgyud): pa thams cad kyi rdo rje snying po rgyan gyi rgyud las khro ba'i dkyil 'khor 'di yongasu rdzog so// / de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad slar yang 'dus te gshegs
206b1(rgyud): nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad gzungs thams kyi dbang phyug gi rgyal po bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba btab pa/ bcom ldan 'das gzungs thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor
206b2(rgyud): bskyed par mdzad du gsol// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor bka' stsal pa// de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// gzungs rnams kyi ni dkyib dge/ grubazhi pa la sgo bzhi pa// 
206b3(rgyud): rdzobabs kyi ni rnam par mdzes// thig pani dang ni yang dag ldan// dkyil 'khor dam pa rab tu bshad// de yi dbus pad chen po// lo ma kun gyis shin tu mdzes// nyi shu rtsa lnga'i 'dab
206b4(rgyud): ma ldan// rdo rje rin chen legs par rgyan// de yi dadu su rtag bri ba// dpag med shes rab pha rol phyin// de yi nye' khror thed du// sna tshogs las ni 'bar rnams la// nyi shu lnga'i dbye
206b5(rgyud): yis// shes rab pha rol byin ma bri// shar gyi 'dab ma nas brtsams te// thog mtha' nyid kyang brtag par bya// phywa ga rgya'i yi ga tsaM rigs par// glo rims bzhin du rnam par dgod// 
206b6(rgyud): phyogs tshi'i dbye ba tha dad kyis// kha dog dab pa zed du// rnam pabye mchog tu sna tshogs pa/ chos nyid mnyam dang mi mnyam pa// de las 'od zer bsam mi khyab// sde ser la sogs bye ba yis// 
206b7(rgyud): shes rab snang ba'i rgyal 'khor gyis// 'gro ba tha~Md gsal bar ba// 'dus par gyur nas de dag kun// lha nyid kyi ni gzugs ji bzhin/ shes rab chen po gzugs chen po// 'bar bcas mdzes pa'i
206b8(rgyud): gzi brjid can/ de yi lte ba'i dkyil du ni// sngags kyi kyil 'khor kun nis rten// sku ni gser gyi mdag dang 'dra// rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par brgyan// rang gi ting 'dzin la zhugs/ du ma'i gzugs/ 
207a1(rgyud): kyi gzugs ldan pa// shes rab pha rol byin ma ni// san khams ni rnam sbyong mdzad// kun nas sems can rnams kyi yum// sems can kun gyi thams cad du/ thams cad lus la mnyam pa
207a2(rgyud): khab/ sems kyi rgyun bzhin lags par bzhugs// zag pa med cing bsam mi lag/ dri ma med cing rang gis stong // ramakha' dang ni mtshungs 'dra ba// denges dang dngos med rnam par spangs// thog ma tha ma med cing
207a3(rgyud): zhing chos rnams kun gyi dbang phyug sku// sdig pa kun las rnam par grol ka/ bden pa gnyis la rnar gnas// kun rdzob dang ni dam pa'i don// chos kyi sku ru de bshadado// dbang po kun kyang rnam par shes// 
207a4(rgyud): sems dang thams cad bad du/ ka/ yid kyi rnam shes zhes su bshad// shes rab blo dang blo gros dran// lhag mthong dang ni ye shes kun// kun nas nyon mongs mi mthun phyogs// rtag dang chad
207a5(rgyud): pa'i mtha' dang ldan// mtha' gnyis po ni rnam par spangs// kun rdzo/ dang ni dam pa'i don// rnam pa gnyis de rab brtags// ji lnga ra bung shing la brten nas/ me yo sa bon gnas pa
207a6(rgyud): dang til la ti la mar ji bzhino// bur shing ro bzhin rab tu brtag me tog dr-i ni ji bzhin nam// zho la mar sar ji bzhin du// rnal 'byor pa mi ye shos sdug/ 'dud rtsi lta bu'i snying po thung // gtsub shing dang
207a7(rgyud): ni gtsub stan las// ji bzhin gtsubs pas me 'byung ste// de bzhin ye shes rnal 'byor pas// bsrungs pas yongasu brtag par la/ shes bya'i dkyil 'khor thad la// yang nas yang du bsrung bar bya/ 
207a8(rgyud): mun pa zad rnam sel ba'i/ nyi ma'i 'od zer ji bzhin bdag/ nam kha' dri ma med brdzun nas// nyi ma bla dza bzhin gnas// 'char ba yo ni gsol byed pa// 'bar ba stong phrag gi ni snod// mun pa kun
207b1(rgyud): 'joms skar ma la// kun nas kyang ni mdzes pa yin// rnal 'byor pas ni ji ltar sems// mkha' bzhin shin tu dri ma med// gzung 'dzin las ni nges par grol// mnyam dang mi mnyam dngos po kun// de
207b2(rgyud): gnas rnal 'byor pa rnams kyis// ye shes nyi zla mtshungs pa'i 'od// shes rab pha rol phyin bsgoms te// gsang sngags 'di ni bsam par bya// rang bzhin gyis ni dag pa'i dngos/ rang bzhin med par rnam par
207b3(rgyud): gnas// rang bzhin gyis ni 'od gsal kun// gdod nas ma skyes rlog pa mang // yi ge de nyid do lta bu/ gnas dang mi gnas rnam par spangs// sde tshan bzhi pa'i gnyis pa la// thig le sgra yis rnam par rgyan// 
207b4(rgyud): de nyid bcom ldan mgon po ste/ shes rab pa ros phyin ma bshad/ oMd+ha swA swA oM swAhA/ oM shru ti smr-i ti bi dza ye swAhA/ sangs rgyas rnams kyi shes rab 'dis// bsam pa thaMd rdzogs par
207b5(rgyud): byed// 'di ni sangs rgyas kun gyi yum// de nyid 'khor los rnam par ba sgyur/ 'dis ni dngos grub thams cad dang // grub pa nyid ni byed par gnas// bstan bcos rab tu 'chang byed dang / 
207b6(rgyud): bya thams cad khyad par du// thams cad mkhyen pa'i chos rnams kun// dbang phyug dam pas shes par 'gyur// shes rab pha rol phyin ma'i sgrub pa'i thab so// shes rab pha rol phyin gnyis pa
207b7(rgyud): rdzu 'phrul chen po mkha'i dang mnyam// gsor gyi mdog can 'bar ba can// zla bi'i gdan la legs par bzhugs/ brtson 'grus chen po bsam gtan hA// sngags kyi yi ge rnam par rgyan/ mchog
207b8(rgyud): tu rnal 'byor ma rnams kyis/ sangs rgyas spyan zhes btags pa yis// de yi gsang sngags rab bshad bya// nyon cig sa rnams 'dod pa rnams// sngags ni oM ru ru sU ru dza la tiSh+Tha sid+d+ha/ 
208a1(rgyud): lo tsa ni sarba ar+tha sA d+ha ni swA hA/ 'di de mchog tu gsang ba ni// rnal 'bor ma la mchod du bshad// dam chen yi ge'i mthar 'ag pa// bsgoms pas dge ba rab tu sbyar/ chos
208a2(rgyud): kyi phyag rgya 'di shin tu// sems can thams cad dbang du byed// dpung dang bcas pa myur bkug ste// bran du gyur nas nye bar gnas// phyag rgya gcig pa'i lha mo che// rol cing g.yo ba'i zhal mnga' ba// sgeg
208a3(rgyud): pa la sogs nyams dang ldan// rol cing snang ba'i gar mdzad pa// sangs rgyas spyan ni 'grub par 'gyur// mig gi phyag rgya rab tu sbyar// mag gi phyag rgya 'di shin tu// 'jig rten gsum yang gar byed
208a4(rgyud): do sangs rgyas spyan gyi phyag rgya'i sgrub pa'i thab so// chu yi dkyil 'khoradagos pa na// bcud kyis len dang mtshungs pa'i mchog/ mtha' yas rgyas shing yangs pa yi// dri ma med pa'i
208a5(rgyud): mkha' la gnas// dkyil 'khor da yi dbus ni// lha mo mchog tumadzes pa mo// 'dam du 'da' rgyu'i mdog ltar dkar// glu/ ba ma ral pa'i cod pan 'chang // 'gro ba mtha' dag/ 
208a6(rgyud): snang mdzad ma/ ka/ rtag tu na mkha' bzhin du gnas// sngags ni// oM ka Te bi ka Te ka TaM ka Te swA hA// gos dkar mo yi phyag rgya che// dung dang kun da zla ba 'dra// sngags kyi yi ge phreng ba che// pad+ma'i rgyal
208a7(rgyud): bo rab tu gnas// 'gro ba mtha' dag snang mdzad na// sgrub pa pos ni bsgrub par bya// dam pa'i lha mo 'grub par 'gyur// pad+ma'i dkyil 'khor sgrub pa'i thabs// zhi ba'i yi ge mnyam par ldan
208a8(rgyud): zhi bar mdzad cing 'jig rten gyi// sa gsum sgrub par byed pa'i thabs// gos dkar mo'i sgrub pa'i thab so// sngo bsangs dkar mo sna tshogs gzugs// rnam pa sna tshogs rgyan gyis
208b1(rgyud): brgyan zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas pa// sgeg pa'i nyams kyis yos gang ba// 'gro ba mtha' dag skyob mdzad ma// thugs rje'i thugs dang ldan pa can// rab tu 'bad de bsgrub par bya/ rol pa
208b2(rgyud): yi ni yi ges mchod// sngags ni oM tA ra tut+tA ra tu ra swA hA/ chos kyi phyag rgya mtha' yas mchog/ sbrel mas legs par rnam par gnas// gsang chen bzhin du thams cad la/ btsud kyis
208b3(rgyud): lan dang 'dra ba'i mchog/ kun tu kun tu thad du// dngos grub thams cad stsol bar mdzad// sgrol ma'i sgrub pa'i thab so// dkyil 'khor chen po'i dbu su ni// rnal 'byor dbang phyug chen mo mchog/ 
208b4(rgyud): phag bani spyan ni gsum pa dang // ral ba'i cod pan dag gis ba rgyan// 'dam bu mda' rgyu'i mdog ltar dkar// dpa' ba la sogs nyams kyis rgyan// brtson 'grus chen mo 'jig
208b5(rgyud): sil ma zla ba'i dkyil 'khor shus gnas par// rab tu 'bar ba'i me bzhin du/ shin tu gsal ba'i gzi brjid can// hUM gi yi ge zab mo'i sgra// sa gsum po ni 'khrug par
208b6(rgyud): mdzad khro gnyer can zhes legs par grags// sngags kyi phreng bas rnam par rgyan// sngags ni/ oM d+ha ya nA sha ni trAs ni tA sa trA sa yA/ b+h+r-i ku Ti ta ri be ta ba ra Ti shwe ta dzi Ti ni/ oM tsak+ki hUM
208b7(rgyud): dzaHswA hA/ gsang sngags 'di ni brtson 'grus che// gsang sngags kun gyi bdag nyid mchog/ 'gro ba kun kyang mgu byed na/ gdug pa'i sems lnga smos ci dgos// khro gnyer can gyi sgrub pa'i thab sa// 
208b8(rgyud): nyi mi'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/ zla ba'i dkyil 'khor rdo rje ldan/ rdo rje'i phreng bas yongasu bskor// gzi brjid dkyil 'khor kun nas dkris// der gnas rtag tu lha mo ni// stobs chen praM
209a1(rgyud): yang ku ltar ldang // phyag bzhi pa par bsam par bya// rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par brgyan// rnal 'byor ma rnams char zhi ba// dngos grub thams cad rang stsol ma// sngags kyi yi ge/ 
209a2(rgyud): drang ba che// rdo rje'i dbus seng rab tu gnas/ khro bo hUM mdzad gang pa'i mtha'// dpa' ba'i nyams la sogs par ldan// lha mo 'jig rten gsum rmongs byed// dngos grub chen po rab stsol ma// skad cig tsam
209a3(rgyud): gyis 'gro ba kun/ nges par dbang du byed par 'gyur// rdo rje'i rlung gi phreng ba che// rdo rje'i 'khor lo rab tu gnas// 'jigs pa chen po'i me ltar drag/ snang ba chen po stobs po che// pad+ma rA ga'i rnam
209a4(rgyud): pa 'dra rdo rje 'ab ngas rnam par rgyan// mtshan ni mA ma kI zhes bya/ dalha mo 'jig rten gsum gyis mchod// sngags ni oM ku la d+hA tI ye na maHshe ka re/ shaMn+ti~M ka re g+hun+da b+h+yaH
209a5(rgyud): g+ha ta ya g+hun+di ni/ khyA ta ya g+hun+d+hi swA hA/ oM ku lan+d+ha ri/ ban+d+ha ban+d+ha hU~M pha gagasang sngags 'di ni don gyi mchog/ gsang sngags/ kun gyis gsungs pa yin/ sa gsum po ni ga
209a6(rgyud): byed cing / tshangs pa la sogs lha rnams kun/ 'gro ba zed 'gugs byed la// rang gi dbang du gnas pa'ang yin// mA ma kI'i sgrub pa'i thob so// rlung gi dkyil 'khor drug po la/ rdo rje lu gu rgyu
209a7(rgyud): kyis bskor// de yi dbusu snang ba che// zla ba'i gzugs kyis rnam par rgyan// de spros pa las bdag nyid ni// rdo rje lu gu rgyud kyi sku// phyag bzhi ma la lha mo de// rdo rje yi ni rgyan gyis brgyan/ 
209a8(rgyud): dmar po 'bar ba de yis ni// sa gsum po ni 'ching bar mdzad// tshangs pa khyab 'jug dbang phyug che// bkug nas dbang du mdzad par gnas// dngos grub thams cad 'dzin pa dang // da yi
209b1(rgyud): thugs kar rdo rje che// 'bar ba'i phre ba 'khrigs pa'i 'od// de yi 'bar ba lcags sgrog gi kham pa rdo rje'i mtshan mas mtshan// nges par byung nas de dag kun// chos dbyings mnyam dang mi mnyam
209b2(rgyud): ba'i 'jig rten khams ni mtha' dag tu// kun nas rnam par bkang nas kyang / bsgom bya rdo rje thams cad du// khro bo dang ldan spro ba'i na la// lte ba 'byang shing sku che ba// mche ba bani yis rnam par rgyun// 
209b3(rgyud): 'bar ba yi ni phreng ba gsal// gzugs mdzes drag po'i gzugs dang ldan// sngags ni/ oM badz+ra shi kha lA ya d+hi pa ta ya/ ma hA ba lA ya/ ma~M hA bi d+yA re dzA ya taM pra dz+wa li ta/ hastA ya na mo ni la
209b4(rgyud): kar+N+Na ya ki rA d+ha rU pa le bo da rA ya/ d+h+waM b+h+r-i ku nI mu khA ya mA dzA ra su kha laM/ sa tu deSh+Ta ka rA lA ya/ e h+ye t+yai a s+ya ra sha ri ri ma nu brA wa~M sh+yi shi ro grAh+Na/ grI ba gr-ih+Na/ hastaM pA de gr-ih+NA bi
209b5(rgyud): A bi shA ya ke bA ya ke bA ya/ b+h+ra mi b+h+ra mA ye/ maN+Da la ma d+h+we/  kurba bi kugats+tshar+N+Na nASh+Ta/ kuT+Ta kuT+Ta/ s+pho Ta ya s+pho Ta ya/ mamA Ni ni kr-in+d+ha ya/ hr-i da ya/ ts+tshin+dza/ She la ba la kin+du rA ya si/ 
209b6(rgyud): ba nA ga/ yek+Sha sa/ bi shA tsa tsan+da ye/ sa ma ya ma nu sma ra/ dzA ti ma nu sma ra hA hA/ ni d+hi ni d+hi/ nai Shi ni Shi/ badz+re shaM ka ya/ adz+nyA bA ya ti swA hA/ oM badz+ra re Ni hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra Ni hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra kA li
209b7(rgyud): hUM phaT swA hA// gsang sngags 'di yi sbyor ba yis// bcud kyis len ni 'de ba dang // 'gri ba thed 'bebs pa dang // gdug pa rnams ni 'ching ba dang // tshangs pa la sogs lha rnams
209b8(rgyud): dang lha dang lha min lto 'phye che// 'jig rten skyong dang klu rnams kyang // rang gi gnas nas bskyod nas ni// grub pa kun gyi dngos grub ni// dngos grub 'gugs par 'dod pa yis// thams
210a1(rgyud): cad gus pas sbyin par byed// bud med gzugs kyis bsgrub par bya// rdo rje lu gu rgyud ma'i sgrub pa'i thab so// zla ba'i dkyil 'bo dbus gnas par// bad+ma dmar pos rab tu
210a2(rgyud): gnas/ lhag bzhi pa la du ma'i gzugs// dung dang kun da zla ba 'dra// thugs kyi rdo rje 'di nyid yin// rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor dbus ni// zhi de'i la sogs nyams dang ldan// chos rnams kun gyis bdag skyes
210a3(rgyud): mchog/ rnal 'byor pas ni rtag tu sgom// sangs rgyas mtha' las yang dag 'byung // darang bdag yang dag sgom pa ni// bskul byed ma zhes yongasu grags/ sngags kyi phreng ba'i yi ge ni// kun nas 'a
210a4(rgyud): ba mu tig 'dra// na mkhi'i khams ni yongs gang ba// ji srid de yi spyod yul yang / de srid de yi 'od zer sgom// rnal 'byor ya shes kyis rab sprul// sngags ni/ oM tsa li tsu lu
210a5(rgyud): swA hA/ 'di yi sngags kyi mchog gtso go// sangs rgyas kun gyis/ mchod pa po// mtshungs pa med pa'i dngos grub ster/ lha dang lha min bcas pas mchod// 'di yis sdig
210a6(rgyud): kun mdzad byed cing // phun sum tshogs kun rab sgrol mdzad// pad+ma'i phyag rgya yang dag ldan// sangs rgyas nyid kyang sbyin par mdzad// bskul byed mi'i sgrub pa'i thab so// gsang ba mchog gi phye
210a7(rgyud): pa ni/ zed bdag nyid rtag tu bzhugs// sangs rgyas kun bdag dgyes po ni// rdo rje se'i bde ba'i mchog/ 'di ni rang byung bcom ldan 'das// gcig pu nyid ni lhag pa'i lha// sangs rgyas kun
210a8(rgyud): dang mnyam sbyor ba// mkha'agro ma yi dra ba sdom// 'dod chags med cing chags bral med// dbu mar dmigs par mi 'gyur// dbu med kun gyis sgyu mi'i rgya/ 'di ni gnyis med thag pa'i
210b1(rgyud): mchog/ sgyu ma dag ni zad la// bung mad sgyu ma khyang par 'phags// rang bzhin nyid kyis de grub pa// nus pa yis ni rang bzhin gyis// 'jig rten gsum gyi bud mang 'di// bkrus ka par 'os pa yin// 
210b2(rgyud): ngan spyod rnams kyis kyang 'grub ste// rnyed pa kun dang bde dang spro// thaMd bud med sgyu mas 'grub// rang gi ngo bo yongs bsgyur ba// sna tshogs sgyu ma'i phyag rgya ring // shes rab pha rol phyin mar bshad/ 
210b3(rgyud): kun la sna tshogs phyag rgya ni/ kun la sna tshogs sdom pa yis// sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam par sbyor// stong pa nyid kyi de nyid bskul// kun la kun nas thams cad du// kun tu kun nas rang nyid kyis// 
210b4(rgyud): sangs rgyas thams cad brtan dang ga yo// thams cad dngos po rang ni da 'gyur// sems dang sems can ting 'dzin dang // byang chub skyo dra ba sna tshogs nyid// sa dang pha rol byin spyod pa// dbang
210b5(rgyud): nyid du yang de bshad// 'dud dang bdud las rgyal ba nyid// sangs rgyas rdo rjed bzhin gshegs// thog ma tha ma med ni ga// byang chub sa ngas rgyas bcom ldan de'o// rdo rje rdo rje 'dzin pa nyid/ 
210b6(rgyud): de bzhin pad+ma 'dzin// nor bu nir bu 'dzin pa nyid// sna tshogs de bzhin sna tshogs 'dzin// ral gri ral gri 'jir rgyal po// 'khor lo de bzhin 'khor lo 'dzin// 'jig rten gsum rgyal nyid dang ni
210b7(rgyud): 'di rnams kyi yang rigs nyid 'gyur// de nyid chags dang chags bral ba/ 'dod dang thar pa ru yang 'gyur// dus gsum dang ni srid gsum mchog/ 'jig rten gsum dang khams yul brtan pa
210b8(rgyud): zed da nyid de// rnam pa sna tshogs nyid du 'gyur// g.yo ba kun nas sna tshogs pa// thams cad du ni de 'gyur ro// de la sogs pa sna tshogs mchog/ chos dbyings mnyam dang mi mnyam pa
211a1(rgyud): nam kha'i khams kyi mtha' klas pa// dngos po kun tu de 'gyur// de nyid bcom ldan rnal 'byor te// gcig pu nyid ni lhag pa'i lhagan mkha' kun gyi skabs na dpal// rdo rje sems
211a2(rgyud): dnga' de bzhin gshegs// dadal ldan sgyu mchen po 'chang // rnam snang rtag pa thams cad du// rnal 'byor dbang phyug gtso chen khab// sangs rgyas 'khor lo can mi bskyod// cha dang rin chen
211a3(rgyud): 'byung stobs che// tshe dpag med pa kun nas mchog/ don yod sna tshogs mdzad pa dang // rdo rje sems dpa' lda na sdug/ dgug pa mchog gi sbyor ba dang // legs par mdzad pa de nyid
211a4(rgyud): yin// rin chen sgron ma de bzhin rtog/ rdo rje bzhad pa snang ba che/ rdo rje chos dang rno ba che// rgyu dang smra mchog bdud rtsi dang / las dang go cha gnod sbyin cha// khu chung de bzhin gshegs
211a5(rgyud): ba kun// de nyid bcom ldan rnal 'byor te// rdo rje sems dpa' stong sa po che// rdo rje hUM mdzad hUM mdzad dang // rta mgrin zhes ni rnam par grags/ he ru ka dpal rdo rje che// mchog
211a6(rgyud): gi gshin rje gshin rje gshed/ khro bo gzegs ma snang ba che/ rdo rje ma ni 'od chen po/ gzugs rnams kyi ni mchog cig tu// ting 'dzin las dbang sgyur ma/ shes rab pha rol phyin pa gtso/ sa dang / 
211a7(rgyud): pha rol phyin pa'i thabs// tshangs pa'i gnas pa chen po bani// dbang ni mchog du 'bar ba dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi/ dbang po rnams dang stobs rnams dang // rjes dran drug por gyur/ 
211a8(rgyud): pa dang / bsgom par bya ba rab tu gnas// de nyid bcom ldan gcig pu ste/ byang chub yan lag bdun brtags pa// mtha' gcig yongasu rdzogs par 'gyur// sum su rtsa gnyis
211b1(rgyud): mchog gi mtshan// 'jig rten 'das pa'i lam po che// 'phags lam yan lag brgyad brtags pa// stobs bcu yi ni bcu pa nyid// sangs rgyas chos kyi bdag nyid gnas// byang chub phyogs kyi chos
211b2(rgyud): chen po// rnam par dbye pa sum cu dadun// mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms 'jug ni// dgu la gnas par 'gyur ba dang // bsdu ba'i dngos po chen po bzhis// sems can bsdu bas sdud pa dang // so so yang
211b3(rgyud): dag rig pa bzhis de bzhin srung ba mi mnga' ba// skal pa chen po'i mi 'jigs pa// mchog tu gyur pa nyid dang ni// bsam gtan gzugs med bzhi phrag gnyis// tshad med pa yang dra bzhi no// bang
211b4(rgyud): chub kyi ni skye mchog gtso// bden pa bzhi ni ston pa po// nyon mong ngas can gyi mi mthun phyogs// zag bcas zag pa med pa'i mchog/ de nyid bcom ldan rnal 'byor te// dbang phyug
211b5(rgyud): mchog gi dbang drug dang / skye dgu'i bdag po skye dgu'i mgon/ mchog gi bdag nyid dbyangs bdag po// kun rdzob brjod pa / da dang // sgra rnams kyis ni spyod yul 'gyur/ brjod
211b6(rgyud): med cing spros pa bral// stong pa mkha' mnyam mtshungs pa med// tshig mtha' sgra yi rnam dgod pa// 'jig rten tha snyed tshul du gtogs// de tshe lus sogs dbye ba yis// sa rnams kyi ni
211b7(rgyud): yongasu brtags// sku ni sprul pa nyid du 'gyur// ling spyod rdzogs pa yang dag brnyas// rdo rje'i sku dang de bzhin du// ye shes skye sogs yongasu brtags// mtho' yas sku dang sku chen po// 
211b8(rgyud): rin chen sku ni 'od byed pa// pad+ma'i rje la che// thad ska ni las bzang byed// rtogs par bya ba las kyi sku// rnam pa gsum du'ang dbye bar bya// de nyid bcom ldan rnal 'byor te// byang chub
212a1(rgyud): sems ni 'od gsal ba// kun tu 'od kyis chen po// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gzi brjid ldan/ gnyis pa bdud rtsi'i 'od ces bya// zla ba'i 'dzi sa la ba/ gam pa rnamakha' 'od ces
212a2(rgyud): byang mkha' bzhin legs par rab tu gnas// rdo rje'i 'od mtha' gang zhig sa// bzhi pa de ni yid 'ong ba// bsam pa brtan pa'i sbyor ba yis// rdo rje zhes ni yongasu bsgrags/ lnga pa'i rin chen 'od ces bya// 
212a3(rgyud): dang bskur ba ni rab tu gnas// drug pa bad+me chang zhes bya// bad bzhin rab tu rnam par snang // nga bzhin gyis ni chos nyid dag/ bdag gi med cing yongs bzung med// bdun pa las kyi sa zhes bya// sangs
212a4(rgyud): rgyas phrin las mdzad pa che// brgyad pa dpe med pa zhes bya// depe ni de la yod ma yin/ dgu pa dpe dang bral zhes bya// dpen/ rams thams cad rab 'jug pa// bcu pa shes rab 'od ces bya// sangs
212a5(rgyud): rgyas sa ni bla na med// bcu gcig kun mkhyen nyid ces bya// / sa chen po ni 'od gsal ba// bcu gnyis so sor bdog rig ga/ rnal 'byor ye shes yongs rdzogs nyid// sa chen po ni 'di
212a6(rgyud): dag rnams// sangs rgyas rnams kyis don dam du// sangs rgyas dang ni sangs rgyas chos// rnal 'byor ya shes gang brjod pa// thams ca nyid ni mtha' yas mchog/ chos dbyings mnyam dang mi mnyam
212a7(rgyud): bdede bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje snying po rgyan gyi rgyud chen po las sngags kyi de kho na nyid// // de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bcom ldan 'das
212a8(rgyud): thog ma dang tha ma med pa chos kyi 'khor lo chen po bskor ba rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po la gsol ba btab pa/ de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen pos de dag
212b1(rgyud): gis gsol ba btab pa'i tshig gi de ma thag nyid du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mnyam pa nyid du dmigs pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la mnyam par gzhag pa'i da ma thag tu yang bcom ldan
212b2(rgyud): 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs rdo rje la rjesu bcug nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi lus dang ngag dang yid mnyam pa nyid du byin gyis brlabs nas mnyam par
212b3(rgyud): bzhug so// de nas bcom ldan 'das rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi skur bdag nyid rtogs nas ting nge 'dzin las gzhongs te 'jam dpal gzho nur gyur
212b4(rgyud): ba la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi theg pa chen po mngon bar rtogs pa zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po yod zhes
212b5(rgyud): gsungs nas cang mi gsungasar bzhugs par gyur to// de nas 'jam dpal gzhonur gyur pa de bzhin gshes sa pa thams cad kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis stan las langs
212b6(rgyud): te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig / tu bzar nas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar dbus mo g.yas pa'i lha ngas la btsugs te// thal mo sbyar nas btud de 'di ska ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das
212b7(rgyud): bstan du gsol/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang thabs kyi thag pa chen po mngon par rtogs pa zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po gang du zhugs pas sems can rnams thabs chung ngus
212b8(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchog gi dngos grub thob par 'gyur ba bka' stsal du gsol// de nas bcom ldan 'das rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen pos 'jam dpal gnyenur
213a1(rgyud): gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal khyed gang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig la rdza su zhugs pa ni 'jam dpal khyod legaso lag so// de lag par ra
213a2(rgyud): tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang thag pa chen po mngon par rtogs po zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po bshad par bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po de bzhin gshegs
213a3(rgyud): pa thams cad kyi rdo rjes byin gyis rlobs pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas dam tshig chen po rdo rjes byin gyis rlob pa theg pa chen po mngon par rtogs pa zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor 'di
213a4(rgyud): bka' stsal pa//  nas dkyil 'khor chen po mchogs dang dag rab tu bshad bya ba/ dam tshig chen po rdo rje mchog/ snying po chen po'i rgyan ces bya// gru bzhi pa la sgo bani gu
213a5(rgyud): banas bzhis ni mdzes par bya/ khrig bani dang ni mnyam bar ldan// 'od zer 'bar bas 'khrigs pa'i 'od/ snying po yongs bcug pa/ byang chub shing gis nye bar mdzes/ 
213a6(rgyud): rdorje dkyil 'khor grwa rnams dang // sgo yi logs kyi mtshams rnams// rdo rje rin chen rnams kyis spras// rdo rje pad+ma thad du// las kyi rdo rje thams cad du// 'bor ba'i phreng ba 'khrigs pa'i 'od/ 
213a7(rgyud): dril bcas sna tshogs mchog dang ldan// rgyal mtshan sgreng ba rlung bskyed pa'i// gos dang me tog chun pos spras/ zla ba phyed pas nye bar mdzes// ral gri lta bur ud pa la// lcags kyu la sog
213a8(rgyud): sna tshogs rgyan// chu yid dkyil 'khor yongs bskor ba// mu khyud bzhin du rnam par gnas// de la 'ang sgo logs la sogs pa// mkhas pa yis ni spro bar bya// de yi nang du bri bya ba/ 'khor lo chen
213b1(rgyud): / po rab tu gnas// cha brgyad dang ni yo su ldan/ kyil 'khor lags pa rnam par spras// rdo rje'i thig dang yongasu ldan// rdo rje'i 'khor lo cher 'bab// de yi dbus snying po che/ rdo rje'i snying po gsu bshad
213b2(rgyud): da yi stang du rdo rje che// rdo rje pad+ma rab tu gnas// pad+ma'i steng du rdo rje che// 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor dag gis rgyan// dung dang kun da zla ba dkar// sangs rgyas kun gyi gdan du bshad// de yi stang du legs bzhun/ 
213b3(rgyud): pa khyab bdag rnam par snang mdzad che// zla ba'i mdog ldan 'dzum bcas pa// ting 'dzin ldan ni sdig pa bcom// rdo rje'i phreng bas rnam par spras// sna tshogs 'bar bas 'khrigs pa'i 'od// rin chen
213b4(rgyud): chen po'i phreng ba ches// smras pa rnam par dgod par bya// de sngags rtag tu shes bya ba/ yi ga yi ni mchog gtso bo// das yi steng dang ldan pa g.yas// mchog gi dbang phyug rgyu gcig
213b5(rgyud): bo drug pa'i dbyangs kyi legs gsal ba// thig le nA ngas legs par rgyan// rten cing 'brel 'byung 'khor lo yis// don can rab tu bskyed par bya// de nyid bcom ldan rnal
213b6(rgyud): 'byor can gcig pu nyid ni lhag pa'i lha// chos kyi sku ni ye shes che// rdo rje rnal 'byor dbang phyug bshad // de nas yang de bzhin gshegs pa mi bskyod pa ye shes kyi 'ong bar dang // de bzhin
213b7(rgyud): gshegs pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi rgyal po dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje rnam par gnod pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thug rdo rje nyid du rang gi/ 
213b8(rgyud): bdag nyid byin gyis brlabs te// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa'i phyogs zed mnyam pa nyid du dmigs nas phyogs 'azhir 'khong // dbang chen dkyil 'khor mi bskyed pa/ 
214a1(rgyud): rje ma kyil 'pher ye shes 'ang / chu mi dkyil 'khor 'ad pag med/  rjes rnam gnon nung dkyil 'pher/ de nas bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' chen po kun tu bcang
214a2(rgyud): ngo'i dab tshig las 'byung ba sems dpa' byin gyis rlob pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi theg pa chen po mngon par rtogs pa zhes pa ba// 
214a3(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje snying po'i rgyan gyi snying po 'di nyid kyi thugs kha nas byung ba'o// oM badz+ra satwa/ de nas 'di rnam par byung ba tsam gyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
214a4(rgyud): thugs ka nas rdo rje'i 'od zer rnams phyung ste/ rdo rje'i 'od zer de rnams kyis 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad snang bar byas te/ gsal bar gyur nas/ de nas rdo rje'i 'od zad de rnams kyis/ 
214a5(rgyud): 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul phra rab dang ma nyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi skus 'ji garten gyi khams rnams gshegs nas 'jig rten gyi khams
214a6(rgyud): thams cad snang bar mdzad// sems can thams cad kyi don mngon par rdzogs nas slar yang gcig tu 'dus te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po'i skur gyur nas/ bcom
214a7(rgyud): ldan 'das rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po'i thugs kar gnas te chud du brjod pa 'dis chad du brjod pa/ a ma he rdo rje snying po bdag/ sangs rgyas ye shes bla na med// snying po ye shes rnam/ 
214a8(rgyud): dag pa/ rdo rje sems dpa' nyid gyur nas// byang chub sems ni brtan bskyed// sangs rgyas ye shes bla na med// gang zhig brtan phyir lus min yang // sangs rgyas sku nyid du gyur to// de nas rdo rje'i
214b1(rgyud): sku byang chub sems dpa' chen po bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs kha nas 'thon nas/ bcom ldan 'das mi bskyed pa'i nye 'khor thams cad rnam pa bzhis phye ste/ dkar po ser po dmar po ljang gu'i mdog
214b2(rgyud): du mngon par sprul nas/ rang gi sngags kyi yi ges zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la brtan te gnas par gyur to// dgug pa'i ting 'dzin ni// oM badz+ra rA dza/ rjesu chags pa'i ting 'dzin ni// oM badz+ra rA
214b3(rgyud): ga/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la lags par mdzad pa'i ting 'dzin ni/ oM badz+ra swA hA/ de bzhin du rin chen 'byung ldan gyi dkyil 'khor la dbang bskur ba ting 'dzin ni// oM badz+ra rat+na/ nyi ma'
214b4(rgyud): dkyil 'khor gyi ting 'dzin ni/ oM badz+ra te dza/ de bzhin pa/ shegs pa thams cad kyi namakha' mdzod kyi ting 'dzin ni/ oM badz+ra ke tu/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi band pa chen po'i
214b5(rgyud): ting 'dzin ni// oM badz+ra ha sa/ de bzhin du 'od dpag tu med pi'i dkyil 'khor yang thugs rje'i ting 'dzin ni/ oM badz+ra d+ha rma/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ting 'dzin ni// oM badz+ra tISh+Tha/ 
214b6(rgyud): dam pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo'i ting 'dzin ni/ oM badz+ra he tu/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sems dpa' smra ba'i ting 'dzin ni/ oM badz+ra b+hA Sha/ de bzhin du rdo rje don yod pa'i dkyil 'khor la/ 
214b7(rgyud): las sna tshogs pa'i ting 'dzin ni/ oM badz+ra karmA/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ting 'dzin ni/ oM badz+ra k+Sha bzhin gshegs pa tha~Md kyi khro bo'i ting 'dzin no// oM badz+rA yak+Sha de bzhin gshegs
214b8(rgyud): pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs khu tshur bcas pa'i ting 'dzin ni/ oM badz+ra san+d+hi/ de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad de bzhin gshegs bzed kyi ye shes kyi phyag rgya/ 
215a1(rgyud): dam tshig rdo rje'i dbyings kyis byin gyis bzlas pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ nyid kyi thugs kha nas 'di byu // oM badz+ra d+hA du / rang gi rig pa mchen
215a2(rgyud): ni oM badz+ra d+hA tI shwa ri hA badz+ra Ni/ de nas yang de bzhin gshegs pa mi bskyed pas// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje sems dpa'i dam tshig ye shes kyi phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor byin
215a3(rgyud): gyis rlob pa zhes bya bi'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ nyid kyi thugs kha nas rang gi rig pa mchog 'di phyung ba/ oM ak+Sho b+h+yaHAHoM dz+nyA na muSh+Ti tsit+ta badz+ri Ni hUM/ de bzhin gshegs
215a4(rgyud): pa 'od zer gyis de bzhin gshegs pa tha~Md kyi rnga rje rin po che'idam tshig gi ye shes kyi phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor byin rgyapra ba zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin lo snyoms par zhugs
215a5(rgyud): nas da kyi thugs 'anas yang ga rig pa mchog dan dka' g.yo badz+ra gas tha ba smos badra na ga ts+tsha /  na/ sa de bzhin gshegs pa 'ad dpag sde de bzhin
215a6(rgyud): gshegs pa zed kyi rdo rje chos kyi dam tshig gi ye shes kyi phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor byin gyis rlo pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyems par zhugs nas nyid kyi thugs kha nas rang gi rig
215a7(rgyud): mchog 'di bka' stsal ga/ oM a mi trAHhrIHoM badz+ra d+harmo No hUM/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rnar gnon pas de bzhin gshegs pa tha~Md kyi rdo rje las kyi dam tshig gi ye shes kyi phyag rgyar/ 
215a8(rgyud): kyil 'khor byin gyis rlob pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas rang gi rig pa mchog 'di bka stsal pa oM sar+b+ba a me g+ha sid+d+hi e/ oM badz+ra ma hA ba ye hU~M/ de nas
215b1(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad yul la rnam par gzigs shing de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mnyam pa nyid rnam par spros pa'i snying po 'di bka' stsal pa/ oM sa
215b2(rgyud): tathA ga tA ma dA dz+nyA na badz+ra hA/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po 'di dag bshad pa tsam gyis// de bzhin gshegs pa tha~Md kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad mthong bar gyur to// de nas phyag na rje
215b3(rgyud): rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po'i bdag nyid rtogs nas rdo rje mnyam pa nyid spros pa'i snying po bka' stsal pa/ oM badz+ra sa ma tA dz+nyA na bud+d+ha hUM/ de nas 'di bshad pa tsam gyis de 'din
215b4(rgyud): gshegs pa tha~Md kyi snying po rnams phyag na rdo rjer mthong bar 'gyuraro// de nas phyag na rdo rje'i thugs khA nas chos thams cad mnyam ba nyid sdes pa'i snying po 'di byung // oM sar+b+ba d+harma sa ma
215b5(rgyud): dz+nyA na badz+ra hUM/ de nas 'di rnam par phyung ba tsam gyis kyang slar yang phyag na rdo rje'i thugs khar de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad byin gyis brlabs pa
215b6(rgyud): mdzad nas/ dkyil 'khor thams cad du 'khod par mthong // de nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyi thugs kha nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mnyam pa nyid spros pa'i snying po
215b7(rgyud): 'di phyung // oM sar+b+ba satwa sa ma hA many+dzu bud+d+ha hA/ de nas 'di byung ba tsam gyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs kha nas phyag na rdo rje rnam par phyung ste slar yang de bzhin gshegs
215b8(rgyud): bzed kyi spyan snga na gnas nas bka' non cing 'khod do// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnams bdag gis ji ltar bsgrub par bgyi// de bzhin gshegs pa tha~Md kyi dkyil 'gro
216a1(rgyud): rnams la byin gyis rlob par byes shig/ de de bzhin zhes gsol nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs la nas dkyil
216a2(rgyud): 'khor thams cad byin gyis brlabs te brtan par gyur nas rdo rje sgeg mo la sogs pa'i lha rnams phyung ste/ lha mo de rnams dkyil 'khor thams cad klu rnams de bzhin du rnam par gnaso// sgo
216a3(rgyud): rnams ske skyong ma rnams dang / mtshams rnamasu gzugs dang / sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg pa rnams bshad// de dag gi sngagasu gyur pa ni/ oM badz+ra me g+he Te TaM/ 'khor lo'i mtshams gzhag
216a4(rgyud): bar bya'o// oM sne ha badz+ra Ni he/ oM badz+ra sha rang badz+ra e aM/ oM badz+ri Ni kI li kI li hUM/ de bzhin gshegs pa thaMd gyes pa chen po'i mchod pa phyi'i dkyil 'khor gyi grwa dang / mtsham
216a5(rgyud): rnams dri rdo rje la sogs pa'i lha mo rnams de bzhin gshegs bi'i nye bar gnas par dgod par bya'o// oM badz+ra gan+d+ha hUM/ oM ma d+hu badz+ri ni hU~M/ g+hu k+Sh+mAM/ oM ma nod b+ha ba badz+ri Ni hI
216a6(rgyud): oM badz+ra shi shi re ho ho// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rol pa chen po'i lha mo'i sgo'i mtshams rnamasu gzugs la sogs pa'i oM badz+ra hA gaM oM badz+ra shak+She/ oM badz+ra gan+d+he/ 
216a7(rgyud): badz+ra ra se/ oM badz+ra s+phar sha/ mnyes par byed pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi shin tu dga' bde rdo rje'i snying po ni/ oM sa ma ya hoHsu ra ta s+t+waM/ dga' bde chen po'i rdo rje'i snying
216a8(rgyud): po 'dis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kun nas mnyes pas dkyil 'khor thams cad la brtan par gyur nas dngos grub zed stsol bar mdzad// dgug dang lags par rab gnas/ 
216b1(rgyud): dang 'ji bzhin gnasu sbyar ba nyid// kun nas dgyes mdzad sangs rgyas kun// dngos grub thed rab sbyin dag/ sngags kyi tshig rnams kyang / oM e h+ye hi b+ha ga wan badz+ra a ku sha dzaHoM pra be sha hUM/ sa
216b2(rgyud): ta thA ga ta/ oM sa ma ye ban+d+ha tiSh+Tha b+ha ga wan/ oM tu Sh+yo hoH/ b+ha ga wa na badz+ra A ba sha aH'di dag ni dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi sgo'i phrin laso// de lta bu'i dkyil 'khor 'dre ba la byams pa dang / 'jam
216b3(rgyud): dpal dang / kun tu bzang po dang / spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la sogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams dgod par bya'o// sngon du bshad pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi tshogs slob ma bcug te dang
216b4(rgyud): bskur ba la sogs pa byas slob ma dang bcas pas tha dbas gcig tu de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la nye ba mkho ba thams cad kyis mchod par bya'o// de la dang po kho narar
216b5(rgyud): shig dkyil 'khor tha~Md kyi slob dpon ni dam tshig tham sa cad shes pa/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi da khang phyug chen pos dngos grub thams cad kyi byin gyis brlabs
216b6(rgyud): pa dbang bskur ba thams cad thob pa/ rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug lta bu/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya la bslab par bya'o/ 
216b7(rgyud): de nas 'dir dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcing bar 'gyur ba ni skyil dkrung bcas nas dri la sogs pa rnams kyis phyag rgya bcing ba rab tu bsgrub par bya'o// lag pa gnyis rdo rje bsdams pa byas
216b8(rgyud): te sor mo phan tshun bcings nas skyil dkrud kyi dbusu rdo rje bsdams pa bzhig pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya'o// rdo rje sod la sogs pa ni gar gyi sbyor bso// 
217a1(rgyud): bsnams pa de 'dadi de nad pa'i phyogasu bzung ba ni// rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya'o// rdo rje bsnams pa las mdzuthu mo lcags kyu snang ba rung ba ni rdo rje'i rgyal po'i phyag rgya'o// 
217a2(rgyud): de nyid mda' 'phan pa lta bu'i sbyor ba ni rdo rje mda'i phyag rgya'o// de nyid las legaso ba sbyin pas rgyab du 'jog pa ni/ rdo rje lags pa'i byang chub kyi sems kyi phyag rgya'o// rdo rje bsdams pa de nyid dpral
217a3(rgyud): bar 'jog pa ni rdo rje rin chen gyi phyag rgya'o// rdo rje bsdams pa la 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sbyor ba ni rdo rje nyi ma'i 'od kyi phyag rgya'o// rdo rje bsdams pa spyi bar sbyar ba ni tog gi phyag rgya'o// kha'i thad du
217a4(rgyud): bskor ba ni rdo rje bzhed pa'i phyag rgya'o// rdo rje bsdamasapa de nyid khi'i thad du bskor ba ni rdo rje chos kyi phyag rgya'o// de ny-id snying khar byas pa ni rdo rje ral gri'i phyag rgya'o// de nyid 'khor lo ltar
217a5(rgyud): yongasu bskor ba ni rdo rje rgyu ro phyag rgya'o// de nyid snying bar sgreng ba ni rdo rje smra ba'i chos kyi phyag rgya'o// rdo rje bsdams pa de nyid gar nyid du ston pa ni las sna tshogs pa'i phyag rgya'o// lag pa/ 
217a6(rgyud): gnyis spyi bo dang snying kha dang mgrin par 'jog pa ni rdo rje srung ba'i phyag rgya'o// rdo rje bsdams pa 'gram pa gnyis 'jig pa ni rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi phyag rgya'o// rdo rje bsdams pa de nyid snying khar bcas pa
217a7(rgyud): ni rdo rje khu tshur gyi phyag rgya'o// de bzhin du sgeg mo dang / bdug pa ma la sogs pa'i sbyor bas lha mo thams cad kyi phyag rgya thams cad rab tu sbyar bar bya'o// rol cing rnam par dgod pa dang / sgeg dang snying
217a8(rgyud): rdo'i bdag nyid dang / dpa' dang bro sogs chos bdag nyid// rang nyid zhi ba'i bdag nyid nyams// phyag rgya thad rab tu sbyar// gal te dngos grub mchog 'dod na// bdag nyid rdo rje'i gar byed dam// skyob pa
217b1(rgyud): sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ phag rgyab cing gag tu sbyar/ thams cad drub bar 'dod sogs kyis/ skyil dkrung sangs rgyas med kyis/ de phyir gnyis mad rdo rje can/ sangs rgyas rnams kyi drang po'i sku/ sgeg
217b2(rgyud): ba'i sbyor ba'i rdo rje can// sangs rgyas rnams kyi ni ba spyan// sems bcas rdo rje can gyis dgongs// sangs rgyas rnams pa rdo rje can// ti 'dzin dbye pa las shes bya// 'khrugs pa'i lha stangs khro rnams kyi
217b3(rgyud): btsun mo rnams kyi rol pa nyid// 'jig rten pa yi lha rnams dang // bsdigs spyod rnams kyis lnga stangs te/ chos rnams kun gyi rjes 'jug pa'i// shugs kyi lha stangs phyag rgya'o// tshogs dang
217b4(rgyud): nya pho nya mo'i// lha stangs rnam pa sna tshogs nyid/ ma yi phyag rgya yongs ldan pa/ g.yo ba med cing mi 'gul ba// sangs rgyas rnams kyi phyag rgya mchog/ sangs rgyas byang chub rab sbyin
217b5(rgyud): byed mtshams sbyor cang zad yang dag ldan/ rnam 'gyur/ med cing mtshungs med gnas// rol pa'i yi ge yang dag ldan// mchu yi phyag rgya rdo rje can// rnam 'gyur can dang 'khor ba can
217b6(rgyud): khro bas su ni yongasu bsdams// 'di ni khro bo'i phyag rgyar bshad// mchu yi phyag rgya gzugs mdzes can// 'jig rten pa rnams mchu'i phyag rgya// rnam 'gyur 'jig cing gzugs dang bral// shin tu
217b7(rgyud): gnag dka'i 'dod chags dang // sdang dang rmongs las thaMd du// rol cing rnal 'byor dang ldan pa// g.yo bcas rab tu 'phro ba yang // mchu yi phyag rgyar shes par bya// lha mo po nya tshogs kyi yang
217b8(rgyud): de la sogs pa mtha' yang mchog/ lha stangs mchu la sogs pa'i ming // phyag rgya thams cad mdor bsdu ba// skyeb pa rnams kyi kun shes bya/ ji srod sku yi dbye ba dang / dbang po la sogs rab
218a1(rgyud): bye dang / de dag phyag rgya sna tshogs mchog/ sangs rgyas kun gyi rtags pa nyid// sna tshogs sku'i gzi brjid che// tshad med skyon 'thung ba'i gnas// sangs rgyas rnams kyi phyag rgya mchog/ sa
218a2(rgyud): rgyas byang chub rab sbyin pad// rdo rje snying po rgyan gyi rgyud chen po las dam tshig chen po'i de kho na nyid gsang ba zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po yongs rtog so// / de nas bcom ldan 'das rnar snang mdzad
218a3(rgyud): kyis slar yang de bzhin gshegs pa tha~Md kyi mnyam pa nyid dbang bskur ba zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po 'odi bka' stsal pa/ de nas dkyil 'khor chen po mchog/ yang dag rab tu bshad bya ga gru bzhi
218a4(rgyud): ba la sgo bzhi pa// rta babs bzhis ni mdzes par bya// sna tshogs khams ni bsam yas mchog dang dang me tog chu na pos rgyan// rdo rje rin chen rnams kyis spras// sna tshogs pad+ma
218a5(rgyud): bzhin gzhan// dkyil 'khor de yi dbus ni// sangs rgya sa sku gzugs yid 'ong ba// mgon po sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan// 'bar ba mchog gis rgyan pa po// de sngags rtag su shA
218a6(rgyud): bya ga dang po'i dbyangs dang gnyis pa'o// de yi nye 'khor brgyad du ni// 'gram rtsibs brgyad pa yi yang / 'khor lo dag ni bri bar bya// dkyil 'khor de yi dbusu ni// 'khor lo kun tu 'bar ba bzhag/ 
218a7(rgyud): 'khor lo'i lte bo'i dbus ni// pad+ma'i rgyal po rab tu gnas// sgeg sogs sangs rgyas thaMd ni// ji ltar sngon bzhi bri bar bya// nye bar mkho ba'i mchod kun gyis// de bzhin gshegs pa mchod par bya/ 
218a8(rgyud): dgug sogs cho gar sbyor ba ni/ dkyil 'khor snga ma ji bzhi no// dkyil 'khor nye bar spyod pa kun// cho ga 'dir ni 'byung bar 'gyur// dkyil 'khor chen po'i rtog pa'o// de nas dkyil la
218b1(rgyud): chen po mchog/ yang dag rab tu bshad pa ga/ 'jig rten gsum las rnam rgyal zhes// bya ba rdo rje hUM mdzad grags// gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa// rta bangs bzhis ni mdzes par byas// de yi nang du 'khor lo ni/ 
218b2(rgyud): dkyil 'khor brgyad pa lta bu'o// de yi de'u su khro bo che// 'jig rten gsum las rnam rgyal yang kau/ khro gnyer ldan zhing smin ma 'khyog/ spyan gsal 'bar ba chen po pa// cung zad mche ba gtsigs pa'i
218b3(rgyud): zhalas rnam par dgod cing slar khro ba// g.yas brkyang ba yi zhabs kyis ni// bka' bzlog dbang phyug chen po gnon// sangs rgyas phreng ba sogs pas spras// i na dra nI la mtshungs pa'i 'od// phyag
218b4(rgyud): bzhi pa la spyan gsum pa// zhal bzhi pa la thub paradang ka'// ba can dang ni zhags par mdzod// dang po na ni rdo rjer bshad// gnyis pa zhags pa bsdigs mdzub can// phyag gnyis khA
218b5(rgyud): tshur dam pa mchog khu tshur gnyis ni rab tu brtag/ maH chung gnyis ni mnyam sbyar ba'o// lu gu rgyud kyi rnam par spe/ snying bar phyag rgya lags bzhag nas// bsdigs mdzab gnyis kyis
218b6(rgyud): bsdogs par mdzad// 'jig rten gsum rgyal zhes bya 'il// phyag rgya mchog tu thub par dka'// sngags ni ming gi de nyid ldan/ 'bar ba'i phreng bas mnyam par 'khrigs// dkyil 'khor de yi gnas
218b7(rgyud): rnamasu// cha rnams kun tu thams cad nas// phyag rgya thams cad mnyam par bri// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor mnyam gnas par// ral gri 'khor lo gzhu dang mnga'// de bzhin du ni dgra sta nyid// de la sogs pa'i
218b8(rgyud): mtha' yas mchog mdor bsdus nas ni phyag rgya dgod// de ltar khro bo'i dkyil 'khor thams cad rnam par dkod nas nye bar 'khor ba'i mchod pa tha~Md kyis mchod par bya'o// 'jig rten gsum las
219a1(rgyud): rnam par rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor// de nas dkyil 'khor chen po mchog/ yang dag rab tu bshad bya bka/ sangs rgyas dpa' bo thams cad kyis// 'gro ba 'dul ba zhi su bshad gru bzhi
219a2(rgyud): ba la sgo bzhi pa// dar dang ma tog chun pos rgyan// de dbus dkyil 'khor chen po ni// chu zhes bya ba'i ming sa no// de yid dusu pang chen po// mdab ma brgyad pa yid 'ong ba// de yi lte ba'i dbus ni/ 'gro ba
219a3(rgyud): 'dul ba zhes bya ba// zla ba'i 'od can zla ba'i mdog/ ral pa'i cod pan 'dzin pa can// phyag bzhi pa la zhal bzhi pa// rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan pa po// sangs rgyas phreng ba sogs pas spras/ sku
219a4(rgyud): rnams thams cad kun nas spro// mtha' yas rab 'bam rgya che ba'i chos dbyings mnyam dang mi mnyam la// de yi sngagasu yo ngas grags pa// sha Sha'i sde yi mtha' dag ga
219a5(rgyud): yig don ldan sngon byung ba// rgyu yi don du rab sgrub byed// bzhi pa'i dbyangs kyis spyi bor mnan// me yi sa bon gsal bar bya da// thig le sgra ni mchog tu sbyin// 'jig rten dang / 
219a6(rgyud): byug zhes byo'i mtshan// de yi phyag rgya yang dag bshad// pad+mo'i thal mo rab tu brkyang // khros pa'i phyag rgyang yang dag bshang // dashug gu'i ril ba spyi blugs bri// mdun du'i grang phreng pad+ma yi/ 
219a7(rgyud): rgyal po zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gzhag// de la sogs pa mtha' yas mchog/ phyag rgya mchog tu 'bar de dag// 'gro ba 'dul ba'i dkyil 'khor du// ji ltar rigs pa dgod par bya// 'gre ba 'dus
219a8(rgyud): ba zhes bya ba/ dkyil 'khor gyi ni rgyal po'o// de nas dkyil 'khor chen po mchog/ gzhan ni rab tu bshad par bya// dpa' be rin chen snying po yi// rdo rje rin chen zhesu bshad// gru bzhi pa la sgo
219b1(rgyud): ba ni bdun babs bzhis ni mdzes par byas// de yi dbus rin chen che// yan lag brgyad pa mchog tu 'bar//  dbus rin chen pad+ma ni// rin chen phreng bas rnam par mdzes// de dbus ma ra ka ta 'dra Shin
219b2(rgyud): chen rdo rje tshwar 'bar ba// sangs rgyas lnga yi cod pan can// rin chen phreng bas rnam par mdzes// mdun du kun gyi dbang bskur gtso/ rin chen da yi gtso bo mchog/ g.yas pad+ma dag ste// rgyag tu iH
219b3(rgyud): nI lale// yid bzhin nor bu rin chen g.yon// phyag rgya rnam pa sna tshogs mchog/ sna tshogs rin chen rnam par brgyan// dkyil 'khor kun gyi grwa bzhi ni// gnas rnams ni banag par bya// sangs rgyas
219b4(rgyud): dpa' bo thams cad kyis// de yi sngagasu yengs grags pa// bzhi pa'i sde yi dang po gang // ma yi sa bon gyis gsal byas ka dbyangs kyis gnyis pas kun nas mnan// dbang bsgyur ba ni stang du
219b5(rgyud): gnas kang yi phyag rgya yang dag bshad/ rin chen snyes rgya chums teka/ rin chen rnam pa legs 'byung ba// de ni rdo rje rin chen/ rdo rje rin po che'i dkyil ledze / de na sa dkyil 'a
219b6(rgyud): chen po mchog/ yang dag rab tu bshad bya ba// grubazhi pa la sgo bzhi pa karta babs bzhis ni mdzes par byas// thig bzhi dang ni yang dag ldan// rdo rje'i blang bas rnam par mdzes// de yi dbus zhal
219b7(rgyud): bzhi pa'i// 'khor lo bzhi ni yongs bskor ba'o//  yi dbusu pad chen po'o// kha dog sna tshogs yengs 'bar ba// de yi dbus brtson chen po// rdo rje'i gzugs ni yengasu bri// rdo rje khur 'dzin
219b8(rgyud): mdzes pa ni// rgyan rnams kun gyis brtan pa po// kha dog sna tshogs gzi brjid che// sangs rgyas phreng bar rnam par mdzes// de yi sngags ni yang dag bshad// bcu gnyis pa yi dbyangs kyi
220a1(rgyud): dpa' mngan 'das den lags gsal bya// skrag sogs rig ma thams cad kyis// de bzhin rang gi phyag rgya yis// rdo rje'i thig la yeng su ldan/ sna tshogs bkra ba mcheg du 'jug
220a2(rgyud): yi dbang bskur phyag rgya yis// mchod pa kun gyi thams cad nas// kun nas yongasu bskor ba yis// las kyi dkyil 'khor bri bar bya// las kyi dkyil 'khor// de nas dkyil 'khor chen po mchog/ 
220a3(rgyud): yang dag rab tu bshad bya ba// shes rab ye shes 'khor lo che// sngags kyi yi ges rnam par rgyan// de yi dbus pang chen po// 'dab mo brgyad pa shin tu mdzes// de yi lte ba'i dkyil du ni// gzho nu sna
220a4(rgyud): tshogs gzugs ldan pa// sku mdog dmar zhing 'dzum bcas pa// sna tshogs gzugs can ral gri can// phyag bzhi pa la zhal bzhi pa// ral gri'i phreng bas rnam par rgyan// gsang sngag
220a5(rgyud): chen po yi ge lnga/ ka/ de yi drung du legs par gnas// dbyangs dang smra kha kun nas de'i// thugs kha ru ni yang dag gnas// phyi ro// la nyid ni gru bzhi mdzes// thig bzhi dang ni yang dag
220a6(rgyud): ldan// rta babs bzhi dang mnyam par sbyor// sgo gcig gis ni shin tu mdzes// shes rab pha rol phyin pa nyid// de la dkyil 'khor dbu su ni// gal te dngos grub mchog 'dod na/ 'bad pa
220a7(rgyud): yI bri bar bya// sngon du bshad pa'i tshi ga yis/ mchod sogs chog rgyas pa nyid// gzhug pa'i tshig de bzhin du// ji ltar dkyil 'i khor 'dir mthong bzhi ni/ shes rab ye shes kyil
220a8(rgyud): 'khor de nas dkyil 'khor chen po mchog/ yang dag rab tu bshad byag khru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa// rta babs bzhis ni mdzes par byas// thig bzhi yis ni yang dag ldan/ khyi yi dkyil
220b1(rgyud): 'khor bri bar bya// de yi nang du bri bya ga/ chos kyi 'khor lo bla na med// rten cing 'brel 'byung phreng ba ni// 'dad pa yis ni bri bar bya// 'khor lo'i dbu su brtson chen po// rdo rje'i rgyu ni stobs po
220b2(rgyud): phyag bzhi pa la zhal ba'i ge/ rkyen rnams kun gyis brgyan pa'o// kha dag zhag be gzhi brjid rmi// chos kyi 'khor le rab bskor mdzod/ de yi sngags gyur mdzes pa ni/ rgyu mi don du sa ser bskyed/ 
220b3(rgyud): dbyangs drug dang ni yang dag ldan// big le phyi mos rnam par rgyan// yi ge chen po'i phreng ba can// 'khor lo gnyis kyis rnam par rgyan de yi mdun du dud yin la// rgyu du zhags pa brjod pa
220b4(rgyud): // rdo rje'i thal me phyag rgya che// 'khor lo bzhin du rab tu gnas// mchod pa thams cad rab tu brtag/ ji ltar dkyil 'khorasnga ma bzhini// de lha'i dkyil 'khor bris nas ni// chos
220b5(rgyud): kyi 'khor lo bla na med// thog mar chos kyi 'khor lo skor// da sa grub thams cad yang dag 'bar// chos kyi 'khor lo 'i dkyil 'khor ro// de nas dkyil 'khor chen po
220b6(rgyud): mchog yang dag rab tu bshad bya ba// thog ma'i dkyil 'khor sbyor ba yis// kyil 'khor kun gyi thig gad ba'o// de yi dkyil du snang ba che// mkha' bzhin shin tu 'od gsal ba// sems
220b7(rgyud): dpa' chen po na mkha'i mdzod// pad+ma'i rgyal po rab tu bzhugs// zla ba'i mdog can gzi brjid che// sna tshogs mtshon cha 'dzin pa'i mchog/ gzhonu rab tu brjod pa'i zhal// na mkha'i
220b8(rgyud): mdzod ces rab tu grags// sangs rgyas phreng ba sogs pas spras// rdo rje gyil 'khor rgyan par mdzad// 'di yi gsang sngags gzi brjid che/ dbyings dgu pa la thig le dang / 
221a1(rgyud): nA da yis ni rnam par rgyan// sde tshan dang po'i gsum pa la/ thig la nA ngas rnam par rgyan// gtso bo da yi sngags pa yang // na mkha'i mdzod ni rab bskor mdzad// de lha'i dkyil 'khor
221a2(rgyud): bris nas ni// sngags kyi phreng ba mchog ldan pa// ma lus pa yis rnams kun// thed nas na mkha'i tshul// tog ni phyag rgyar gyur pa de'i// de bzhin du ni nges par bcang //  lha'i dkyil 'khor bris nas
221a3(rgyud): ni na mkha' yi ni mdzod la// gal te bdag ni grub 'dod na// mchod pa kun gyis rnam par mchod// na mkha'i mdzod kyi dkyil 'khor// de nas dkyil 'khor chen po mchog/ yang dag rab tu bshad
221a4(rgyud): byas dkyil 'khor snga ma'i sbyor ba yis// dkyil 'khor thams cad thig gdab po// kyil 'khor de yi dbus ni// khro ba'i dkyil 'khor gru bzhi gder yang rdo rje 'di yi mchog/ dkyil
221a5(rgyud): 'khor gyi ni mchog tu 'dod// de yid dbu su gzi brjid che// rdo rje gnod sbyin bla na med// phyag bzhi pa la zhal bzhi pa// pad+ma'i rgyal po la rab gnas// rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan pa'i lus/ 
221a6(rgyud): ud rnams thaMd rab 'joms mdzad// de sngags yi ger gyur pa na/ sho Sha'i sde tshan mthar dag pa/ rgyu yi don du legs gsal bya// khro bo'i dkyil 'khor chen po bskor / sngags kyi yi ge breng
221a7(rgyud): ba chas 'bad pa yis ni bri bar bya// de lnga'i dkyil 'khor bris nas ni// rdo rje gnod sbyi de yi ni// gal ti dngos grub mchog 'dod na// sgyu ma tha~Md gnom par bya/ rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi dkyil 'khor chen
221a8(rgyud): bo 'od de nas dkyil 'khor chen po mchog/ yang dag rab tu bshad bya ba// grub ni pa la sgo bzhi pa// rta babs bzhis ni mdzes par byas// de yi dbusu 'khor lo cha// lcags kyu yis ni rnar mar+tha/ 
221b1(rgyud): dbu su bcom ldan rdo rje rgyal// lcags kyu la ni rab tu bzhugs// phyag bzhi pa la zhal bzhi pa/ rgyan rnams thams cad rab tu 'bar// rdo rje lcags kyu khu tshur cha/ 'bar ba 'phro bus rnam par rgyan
221b2(rgyud): 'gro ba thams cad 'gugs par mdzad// sngags kyi yi gus legs par sbyar// sha Sha'i sde yi drung gnas pa// byed pa'i rgyu ru legs par gnas// dbyangs drug pa yis lags par phye// zla
221b3(rgyud): byed thig les legs par rgyan// lcags kyu'i phyag rgyas legs par sbyar// 'ogugs par byed la don yod pa'o// de ltar dkyil 'khor bris nas ni// rdo rje lcags kyu mchog tu dge// dgug pa la
221b4(rgyud): sogs thams cad la// 'gro ba 'dul ba yongs bsdu// don yod rgyal po'i dkyil 'khor// de nas dkyil 'khor chen po mchog/ yang ngag rab tu bshad bya ba// gru bzhi pa la sgo ban pa// 
221b5(rgyud): rta babs bzhis ni mdzes par bya// theg bzhi dang ni yang dag ldan// / dngos grub dkyil 'khor bri bar bya// dkyil 'khor de yi dbusu ni/ dkyil 'khor lcags kyu'i rnam pa can// 
221b6(rgyud): de yi dbus gru gsam grags// lcags kyu mchog tu dge pa'o// de yi dbus sems dpa' che// rdo rje rgyal po stobs po che// phyag bzhi pa la zhal bzhi pa// rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan
221b7(rgyud): pa'o// gzi brjid chen po dkar dang dmar// nags pa lcags kyu 'dzin dge ba// dri yi gsang sngags yang dag bshad// don yod 'bras bu stsol ba po// sde tshan gnyis pa'i gsum pa
221b8(rgyud): ni gnyis 'gyur nyid du rnar gnas// de yi thig la mya ngan 'das// sngags kyi phreng ba gzhan gyis bskor// sgeg mo la sogs mchod pa che// 'bad pa yis ni bri bar bya// sgo skyong ba dang
222a1(rgyud): / mchod pa yang // sbyor ba ji bzhin rnam par dged// de lnga'i dkyil 'khor bris nas ni// mchod pa thams cad yongasu sgrub// rdo rje rgyal po'i dkyil 'khor// de nas dkyil 'khor
222a2(rgyud): po mchog/ yang dag rab tu bshad pa ga/ sangs rgyas dpa' bo thams cad kyis// rdo rje chags pa zhesu bshad// gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa// rta babs bzhis ni mdzes par byas// thig bzhi ngang
222a3(rgyud): ni yang dag ldan// chags pa'i dkyil 'khor bri bar bya// thaMd dmar pos rab drags par// dbang du byed pa'i dam pa yin// de yi da su bad chen po// 'dab ma brgyad pa ga sor bcas// de yi lha
222a4(rgyud): ba'i dbus ni/ rdo rje chags pa bri bar bya/ pad+ma rA ga ma tshungs pa'i 'o// phyag bzhi pa la zhal ba ni pa// spyan pa/ sum 'od kyi phreng ba can// de yi phyag rgya mchog tu ni// mdzes pa
222a5(rgyud): yis ni mda' gzur 'gyur// rgyan rnams kun gyis mdzes pa'i lus// 'gro ba kun la ches mchog 'gyu 8// de yi gsang sngags mdzes gyur pa/ rdo rje chags pa mchog
222a6(rgyud): tu bde// sha Shi'i sde yi mthar thug pa/ kla yi yi ge'i sngon du gnas// dbyangs dgu pa dang yang dag ldan// sngags kyi phreng bas yang dag rgyun// me tog mda' ni yongasu 'phan// de ba zad yongs rdzogs
222a7(rgyud): mdzad de lta'i dkyil 'khor dris nas ni// sangs rgyas thams cad ba mchog khyong / rdorje chags pa'i dkyil 'ber// de nas dkyil 'khor chen po mchog/ yang dag rab tu bshad byu ga/ rdo rje legs pa
222a8(rgyud): ne grags pa// gan du rnyed po'i dga' ba nga ba'ol// gru bzhi pa la sgo la no ga/ tu 'angs banas ni mdzes pa byas/ de mi da su tsha mdzes pa'i/ kyil 'khor sa pa gru ban pa/ de yi dbu su pas
222b1(rgyud): / chen po// be 'bru yis ni nye bar mdzes// de yi lta ba'i dkyil du ni// zla ba'i gzugs brnyan yang dag 'bar// der gnas dpa' bo bsam par bya// rdo rje legs pa stobs po cheg/ dung dang kun da zla ba dkar// kha ba
222b2(rgyud): bzho'i 'od ltar mdzes// legaso stsol ba tshim par mdzad// ting 'dzin dbang mang po sbyar// rdo rje sgeg mo sogs mchod pa// de bzhin me tog bdug pa sogs// sgo la skyong ba nyid kyang ni// rab tu 'bad de dri
222b3(rgyud): bar bya/ de yi sngags gyur mdzes pa ni// gsang ba chen po mchog tu 'bar/ lha mi yo ge sngon gang de// sems can don ni rangab sgrub byed// thig le gnyis dang yongasu ldan// legs stsol bas ni rnam pa gnas
222b4(rgyud): de lha'i dkyil 'khor bris nas ni// mchod pa thams cadadab tu bskor// bdag nyid dag pas gzhugs pa sogs// / sa cad yongasu spyad par bya// rdo rje lags pa'i dkyil 'khor ro// de nas
