222b5(rgyud): dkyil 'khor chen po mchog yang dag rab tu bshad/ 9// rdo rje gni bad+hi shesu grags/ rdo rje nyims blo gros ldan/ gru bzhi pa lo sde bani pa// rta bangs bzhis ni mdzes par byas/ 
222b6(rgyud): thig pa ni dang ni yang dag ldan// dkyil 'khor dram pa bri bar bya// de yi nang du bri bya ba// rdo rje nyi ma 'dra po che// rdo rje nyi ma'i stang du ni// gru gsum rnam pa las byung ba// de yi dbusu gzi ljid che// 'bar
222b7(rgyud): ba yi nI lha bu// pad+ma chen po 'dab brgyad pa// ze 'bru yis ni shin tu mdzes// de yi lte ba'i dkyil 'khor du// rdo rje gzi brjid stobs po che// bzang po'i mtshal dang mtshungs pa'i 'od// rgya skyegs
222b8(rgyud): rdu chu mtshungs pa'i mdog/ phyag bzhi pa la nal bani la// rgyan rnams kun gyi brgyan par// de yi sngag su yongs grags pa/ kun nas sangs rgyas mtshungs pa'i nyid/ byangs yig btsun ci
223a1(rgyud): pa yi mtha'// nyi na'i dkyil 'khor dbus ni// sngags kyi phreng bas yongasu bskor// rang gi phyag rgya'i mtshan ma ldan// de lha'i dkyil 'khor bris nas ni// sangs rgyas thams cad rab mchod
223a2(rgyud): bya rdo rje gzi brjid dkyil 'khor ro// de nas dkyil 'khor chen po mchog/ yang dag rab tu bshad bya ba// yid bzhin nor bu'i rgyal mtshan ming // bdag nyid chen po rdo rje rtog/ gru bzhi pa la sgo bani pa/ 
223a3(rgyud): rta babs bzhis ni mdzes par byas// thig pa'i dang ni yang dag ldan// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bri bar bya// dkyil 'khor de yi dbus ni// mchog tu 'bar ba yi ni rlung // zla ba phad pa'i rnam pa 'dra// rin
223a4(rgyud): chen rgyal mtshan yongs sgreng gi// de yi dbus sems dpa 'che// rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan pa po// zhal bzhi pa la ba zi brjid che// in+d+ra nI la mtshungs pa'i 'od// rin chen char pa rab
223a5(rgyud): tu 'bebs// phyag bzhi pa la snang ba che// de yi gsang sngags gzi brjid che// sde tshan bzhi pa'i dang po la// ma yis rab tu gsal byas pa// tog gi phyag rgyas yongasu
223a6(rgyud): bskor bsngags kyi phreng bas rnam par brgyan// de lha'i dkyil 'khor bris nas ni// sangs rgyas thams cad rab mchod bya// rdo rje tog gi dkyil 'khor// de nas dkyil 'khor chen po mchog/ yang rab tu
223a7(rgyud): bshad bya ba// rdo rje bshad pa zhes grags pa// rdo rje bzhad pa mtshungs pa'i 'od// gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa// rta babs bzhi ni mdzes par byas// thig bzhi dang ni yang dag ldan// dkyil 'khor chen po
223a8(rgyud): dri bar byo// dkyil 'khor de dbus zlum po ni// in+di nI la mtshungs pa'i 'od// de bzhin chu ni gzi brjid can// phyag rgya 'khor los rnam par mdzes// kyil 'khor de yi dbus ni// ston ka'i zla ba/ 
223b1(rgyud): 'dra ba'i 'od// 'gro ba mtha' dag snang mdzad pa// rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan pa'o// phyag bzhi pa la zhal bzhi la// dang phyug thams cad yang dag ldan// de yi gsang sngags gsang chen po// rgyu yi
223b2(rgyud): don du bsgrub par bya// stong pa mngon brjod bsam me khyab/ rang ming rtogs pas mtshon pa'o// de lta'i dkyil 'khor bris nas ni// sangs rgyas thams cad rab mchod pa// rdo rje bzhad pa'i dkyil 'khor
223b3(rgyud): ro/ de nas dkyil 'khor chen po mchog/ yang dag rab tu bshad bya ba// grubazhi pa la sgo bzhi pa// rta babs bzhis ni mdzes par byas// thig bzhi dang ni yang dag ldan// dngos grub dkyil 'khor yang
223b4(rgyud): ngag bri de yi steng du'ang pad+ma che// pad+ma ma las yang de/ gra byung // gru gsum mchog tu mdzes pa po// ther cog dag gis rnam par rgyan// chos dbyings yi ge'i de kho na// thams cad gzi
223b5(rgyud): brjod bdag nyid dag/ de yi mdog gi de nyid na// 'gro ba'i mig ta drag/ phyag bzhi ba la zhal 'di ga/ rgyan rnamasakun gyis brgyan pa 'o// gnyis pa'i mdog tu gyur ba ni// bad+ha mA
223b6(rgyud): ga mtshungs pa'i 'odaka/ ji srid ngag gi 'khor lo ni// smra ba'i dbye bas rab tu gnas// thams cad so sor gsal bar byed// sprin gyi dkyil 'khor mchog rmad byung // de lta'i dkyil 'khor bris nas ni// 
223b7(rgyud): sangs rgyas thams cad rab mchod bya// rdo rje smra ba'i dkyil 'khor ro// de nas dkyil 'khor chen po mchog/ yang dag rab tu bshad pa ba// dkyil 'khor snga ma'i sbyor ba yis// dkyil 'khor thams
223b8(rgyud): cad dri ba // da yi dbu su go cha tsho// rin chen kun gyis rnam par brgyan// de yi dbusu brtson chen po// rdo rje snang bar yang dag bri// phyag bzhi pa la zhal bzhi pa// rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan pa
224a1(rgyud): bos pa dog sna tshogs gzi brjid che// thams cad srung ba mchog tu dag/ phyag rgya sngags dang yang dag ldan// gsang ba chen po ge 'bang mchog/ de yi gsang sngags
224a2(rgyud): gzi brjid che// sha ba'i sde yi mthar gnas mchog/ mgon po'i rgyur ni mngon par brjod// stong du nA das brgyan par bya// kun nas kha dog du ma yis// yongasu bskor ba bsgom par bya/ 
224a3(rgyud): sngags kyi phreng ba yongasu ldan// glog gi phreng bas rnam par rgyan// de lha'i dkyil 'khor bris nas ni// mchod pa thams cad rab bsgrub bya// rdo rje srung ba'i dkyil 'khor// de nas dkyil
224a4(rgyud): 'khor chen po mchog/ yang dag rab tu bshad bya ba// gru ba zhi ba la sgo bzhi pa// rta babs bzhis ni mdzes par bya/ thig bzhi dang ni yang dag ldan// khu tshur dkyil 'kho
224a5(rgyud): bri bar bya// dkyil 'khor de yi dbus ni// rdo rje pad+ma yid 5ka/ gzi brjid chen po gser gyi mdog/ 'dab ma ts+tsha/ nga pa yid 'ong ba// de yi steng du gos brjid che// rdo
224a6(rgyud): rje khu tshur stobs po che// phyag bzhi pa la zhal bzhi pa// rgyan rnams kun gyi brgyan pa po// kun da dud zla ba dkar// khu tshur de bzhin gshegs kun gyi// sku dang gsung dang thugs khru
224a7(rgyud): tshur sa rdo rje nyid du mnyam nyid mchog/ gnyi su med pa mchog gsang ba// khu tshur gyis ni sdud par bshad// de sngags mchog tu dga' ba ni// brjod du med nyid stsol mdzad pa// snga
224a8(rgyud): tshan lnga pa'i gsum pa ni// 'bar ba'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor can// sangs rgyas rnams kyi rdo rje'i sku// 'di yi sngags la rnam par gnas// de lha'i dkyil 'khor bris nas ni// rdo
224b1(rgyud): / khu tshur mchod par bya// rdo rje khu tshur dkyil 'khor ro// de la sogs pa'i mtha' yas mchog/ dkyil 'khor mchog tu 'bar ba ni// chos kyi dbyings kyi mtha' klas pa'i// sangs rgyas byang / 
224b2(rgyud): chub stsol bar mdzad// de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// 'jig rten pa yi dkyil 'khor mchog/ de bzhin gru bzhi bris nas ni// sgo khyud la sogs rnam par spangs// rtse gsum snam bu nyid
224b3(rgyud): dang ni// dung dang pad+ma sogs pas rgyan// thog mar dbang phyug chen po dgod// rtsa gsum pa yi phyag rgyar ldan// khyu mchog la zhon mig gsum pa// stag gi lpags gyon phyag bzhi pa/ 
224b4(rgyud): thal bas byugs shing mgo bo la// ral pa'i tshogs ni rab 'a phyang ba// chu yi dkyil 'khor dbus ni// de bzhin gshag/ sa pa thams cad la// phyag 'tshal ba ni de bri'o// de'i
224b5(rgyud): sngags ni// oM tri sa sre hUM phag/ gsang sngags 'di ni charagasang ba// bdag nyid chen po dbang phyug che'i// dbang phyuH/ chen po'i sgrub pa'i thab so// dkyil 'khor chen po
224b6(rgyud): de nyid la// dbang phyug chen po'i gnasu nag po chen po gnag par bya'o// lag pa stong gi gar byed pa dang ldan pa'i dga' byed dbang phyug dang lhan cig phyag bzhi pa lag pa stong gis gan
224b7(rgyud): ba'o// rang gi sngags ni// oM ma hA kA la hUM b+h+yaHoM nin+di ka shwa hU b+h+yo// 'di bzlas na dngos grub thaMd byedo// dga' byed dbang phyug dang nag po chen po'i sgrub pa'i thab so// de nyid kyi ni cho ga/ 
224b8(rgyud): yis// dkyil 'khor gru ba ni thig gdab bya// der ni pad+ma yang dag bri// pad+ma'i dbus sbrang rtsi byed// la sogs mthar byed spun bri'o// gzhu yi phyag rgya yongasu 'dzin// snang ci byed dang rgyal
225a1(rgyud): par byed// nyid kyi sgrub thabs de bzhino// me tog mda' dang yengasu ldan// rang gi ming rtogs mtshan ma can// sngags ni/ ma d+ha kr-itA/ oM sA d+ha na swa/ gsang sngags 'di ni
225a2(rgyud): 'dod gzugs can// dbang du byang ba thams cad sgrub// sbrang rtsi rdo rje la sogs pa'i sgrub pa'i thab so// dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa bris nis dbusu theg bzhi gad po// dbus tum pu ru'o// shar
225a3(rgyud): gyis 'dab mar rgyal ba'o// lho ru rnam par rgyal ba'o// nub tu mi thub pa'o// byang du gzhan gyis mi thub pa'o// de lta bu'i dkyil 'khor bris nas// go rims ji lta ba bzhin du gsang sngags
225a4(rgyud): dgod par bya'o// ai tuM bu ru hAM// oM dza ye hUM/ oM bi dza ya hAM/ oM a dzi te hAM/ oM a pa rA dzi te hAM/ dga' bu 'di dag lag g.yon du// khu tshur g.yon pas rab sgrub stsol/ 
225a5(rgyud): 'di yi phyag rgya nyid gyur pa// sangs rgyas kun gyis rab tu brtags// lag pa dgod par rab bshad bya// / rims ji lta ba bzhin du// tum bu ru ni mthe bor dgod// bsdigs
225a6(rgyud): mdzub lo ni rgyal ba gnas// rnam rgyal grang mo nyid la'o// mi thub de bzhin ming med la// gzhan gyi mi thub mthe chung la// lag pa'i dbus yi ge oM// dgad bya de nyid lag pa'i rgyag// rdo rje phreng
225a7(rgyud): ba'i mthar thug tu// dgod par bya ba mchog tu bshad// sbyor dang rnam par dbye ba yang // phyag rgya kun spyod yongasu bsdu// so sor brtan par bya ba nyid// sor mi rnams la khyad par du// dbang dang
225a8(rgyud): dgug dang rmongs la sogs// rengs byed la sogs go rims bzhin// las rnams dag ni thams cad du// sngags pas mnyam par bzhag ste bya// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshag+sa
225b1(rgyud): ba thams cad slar yang 'dus te gshegs nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po la// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i mtshan rnams kyi legs
225b2(rgyud): par mdzad// bcom ldan 'das mnyes par mdzad pa// byang chu sems ni rdo rje tsho// sangs rgyas de bzhin gshegs pa kun// dgra bcom 'dod chags bral ba dang / legs pa chos
225b3(rgyud): kyi 'byung gnas mchog/ blo gros dag pa ye shes che// thaMd mkhyen pa kun rig mchog/ mchog gi dbang phyug dpa' ba che// thog ma tha ma mang khyab pa// ma 'dres ma 'dres pa yi don// shin
225b4(rgyud): tu phra ba mchog sbyin rgyal// rdo rje can chen rnal 'byor tshe// rdo rje rnal 'byor dbang phyug mchog/ mi bskyod pa dang mi zad mgon// chos dbyings gzhan dang gzhan min pa// rin
225b5(rgyud): chen 'byung gnas rdo rje mchog/ dbang bskur kun gyi bla ma'i bla// zag chen che ba'i mchog gi mchog/ dpa' the mchog tu dpa' ba'i mchog / zab cing yangs la phra ba dang / 
225b6(rgyud): thams cad thaMd de bzhin gshegs// 'khor lo sgyur ba'i rgyal po che// tshad skyob dkar po stobs po che// gzi brjid phung po gzi brjing cha// phul byud phul las phul du byung // rgya mang
225b7(rgyud): mchog gi mchog dpa' mchog/ gzi mchog gzi brjid byed mtshangs pa// rgyal ba rgyal ba mchog nyid dang // legs pa'i rgyal po bdag nyid che// rdo rje sems dpa' sems dpa' chen// 
225b8(rgyud): rdo rje rgyal po lcags kyu che// rdo rje chags pa mda' chen po// rdo rje lags pa legs grub mdzad// rdo rje rin chen che mchog mchog rdo rje gzi brjid lags brjid mdzad// rgyal mtshan
226a1(rgyud): chen po rin chen tog/ rdo rje bzhad pa lags bzhad mdzad// 'jig rten dbang phyug pad+ma cha// shes rab ye shas lags rno mdzad// chos kyi 'khor lo chos chen be// sems
226a2(rgyud): dpa' smra ba legs band mdzad// sna tshogs las ni rgyal po che// rdo rje srung ba legs srung mdzod// khro bo chen po gnod sbyin cha// rdo rje mtshams sbyor mtshams sbyor sel// phyag 'tshal
226a3(rgyud): sangs rgyas kun khyod la// dang po'i rnal 'byor dbang phyug mchog/ lags rdor can rnal 'byor che// de bzhin gshegs pa thaMd dge/ spyi bo'i rgyan zhes mtshan gsal pa// 'di dag thams cad leg
226a4(rgyud): bar gsungs// sangs rgyas rnams kyi byang chub sems// ye shes snying po shin tu mdzes// gsang ba chen po ma chog tu gsang // swa bA shin tu rnyed dka' ba// shes rab pha rol/ 
226a5(rgyud): phyin pa'i mdo// brjod du med cing yi ge bral// rdo rje snying kho rgyan gyi rgyud chen po las shes rab kyi pha rol tu bya na pa'i dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba'i rtog pa rgya pa 'di yongasu
226a6(rgyud): rdzog so// // de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thang sngar yang 'dus te gshegs nas bcom ldan 'das thog ma dang tha ma med pa'i rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen
226a7(rgyud): bo la gsol ba bta'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen pos de dag gis gsol ba btab pa'i tshig nye bar gsan nas sangs rgyas tha~Md kyi yul la
226a8(rgyud): 'jug pa ye shes rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhug so// de ma thag tu bcom ldan 'das ma yang snyoms par zhug so// de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang
226b1(rgyud): phyug chen po 'di skad cig nyid la 'jam dpal gzho nur gyur pa de bzhin gshegs pa tha~Md kyi shes rab kyi ye shes rdo rje la zhugs par gyur to// zhugs nas kyang de bzhin gshegs pa zed
226b2(rgyud): kyi shes rab ye shes kyi ting 'dzin gsal ba mdzad cing brtan par gyur nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis thugs de las 'thon te/ sangs rgyas tha~Md kyi yul chos kyi dbyings kyi mtha'
226b3(rgyud): klas pa ma lus shing lus pa med pa'i sen gyi khams thams cad snang bar mdzad nas san thams cad kyi 'ang shes rab dang ye shas rnar sbyangs te/ byang chub kyi sems bsnyad nas bkug cing rje su
226b4(rgyud): mnyas par byas nas legs par mdzad nas rnam par gnas te/ rdo rje sems dpa'i ting 'dzin legs par yod su rdzogs par mdzad nas mngon par dbang bskur te gzi brjid
226b5(rgyud): dang tog dang / bshad pa dang / de dag la nges par sbyar te mchog gi dbang drug chen po las rdo rje sems dpa' ti 'dzin gyis chos rtogs pa la yang rab tu gnas nas
226b6(rgyud): rnon po dang / rgyu dang smra ba'i sems dpa' rnams la'ang thugs brtan par mdzad/ yongasu dag nas yang pad+mo'i sems dpa'i ting 'dzin la rang bzhin gyis dag pa'i dbang phyug chos nyid
226b7(rgyud): gni med pa la sbyar nas sna tshogs pa'i las kyi bdag pos kyang sen yongs smin cing srung ba'i khro bos de bzhin gshegs pa tha~Md kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje mtshams sbyar ba
226b8(rgyud): rnams sems can gyi khams mtha' dag yongasu smin pa dang / byin gyis brlabs te slar log nas bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs kar rje su zhugs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa tha~Md kyi she
227a1(rgyud): pa kyi ya shas la zhugs nas tshad du brjod pa 'di che du brjod// a ma ho zag med shes ra ni// sangs rgyas skyob pa tha~Md kyi// shes rab shin tu dri med sems// sems
227a2(rgyud): dpa'i lu su bdag gyur to// dri med sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// dngos dang dngos med rnam dpyad na// a ma he chos ni bsam med nyid// bdag gi dbang du rnam par gnas// de nas byang chub sems dpa'
227a3(rgyud): chen po 'jam dpal bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs ka nas 'thon nas byang chub sems dpa' bcu drug gi lus mngon par sprul te/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad la yongs su
227a4(rgyud): bskor ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa thaMd kyi nye 'khor kun tu nyi ma'i dkyil dang 'od kyi dkyil 'khor dang // byin gyis brlabs pa dkyil 'khor la 'khod par gyur nis bcom ldan 'das
227a5(rgyud): rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po la 'di skadaces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das rdo rje snying po rgyan gyi rgyud las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mdor bstan
227a6(rgyud): ba'i chos kyi tshig bka' stsal du gsol// de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis 'jam dpal gzho nur gyur po la bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal khyod de bzhin gshegs pa la
227a7(rgyud): don de yongasu zhu bar sems dpa' ni lag so lag so// legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang ngas bsha // de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po de
227a8(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa thad du bdag nyid byin gyis brlangs nas sngags kyi tshig 'di dag bka' stsal gadran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi ni nang gi lus dang / phyi'i lus dang / phyi nang gi lus la
227b1(rgyud): / lus kyi rjesu lta zhing brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa/ dran pa dang ldan pas 'jig rten gyi chags sems dang / yid mi bde ba rnam par bsal cing rnam par spyod// lus la kun 'ju
227b2(rgyud): ba'i rA su lta zhing rnam par spyod// lus la zad pa'i rje su lte zhing rnam par spyod// lus la mi gnas pa'i rnam par spyod cing 'jig rten du gang yang nye bar len pa medo// nang gi tsher ba dang / phyi'i tsher
227b3(rgyud): ba dang phyi nang gi tsher ba dang / nang gi sems dang / phyi'i sems dang / phyi nang gi sems dang / nang gi chos dang / phyi'i chos dang / phyi nang gi chos la chos kyi rjesu lta zhing brtson 'grus shes bzhin dang
227b4(rgyud): ldan po/ dran pa dang ldan pas 'jig rten gyi chags sems dang / yid mi bde ba rnar bsal cing rnam par spyod// / chos la kun 'byung ba'i rje su lta zhing rnam par spyo // chos
227b5(rgyud): la zad pa'i rdzasu lta zhing rnam par spyod// chos la mi gan sa pa'i rnam par spyod cing 'jig rten du gang yang nye bar len pa mdo// rtag tu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lus dang ngag dang sama?/ 
227b6(rgyud): dang chos mnyam pa nyid kyis gnaso// oM kI oM tsa tA ra smr-i t+yA bas+tha nA nA hUM/ yang dag par spong ba bzhi ni sdig to mi dge ba'i chos ma skyes pa rnams mi skyed pa'i phyir mi dmigs pa'i
227b7(rgyud): tshul gyis 'dun pa bskyed cing rtso lo// brtsoni 'grus rtse mo// sems kyi mthu bskyed// smon lam yang dag par 'dab so// sdig to mi dge bo'i chos skyes pa rnams spong ba'i phyir/ 'dun pa
227b8(rgyud): le sogs pa dang / dge ba'i chos ma skyes pa rnams bskyed pa'i phyir 'dun pa bskyed// 'ab do// brtson 'gas brtsa mo// sems rab tu 'dzin to// smon lam yang dag par 'dab so// dge ba'i chos skyes
228a1(rgyud): pa rnams 'phel zhing shin tu rgyas par bya ba dang / sgom pa yongasu rdzogs pa'i phyir 'dun pa bskya// 'angado// brtson 'grus rtsero// sems rab tu 'dzin to// smon lam yang dag par 'das
228a2(rgyud): chos tshad med pa thams cad don dam par tshad med par rtogs par bya ba'i phyir bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen pos 'di bka' stsal to// oM samyaka pra hA Na sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta sa ma ta a
228a3(rgyud): d+hiny+tsi de aHraHhUM// yang dag par spong ba brjod pa zhes bya ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhe / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi ni mos pa'i ting 'dzin spong ba'i 'du byed dang ldan pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa sgom pa
228a4(rgyud): byedong sems dang brtson 'grus dang / dpyod pa'i ting 'dzin spong ba'i 'du byed dang ldan pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa sgom par bye'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i don dam pa dang // kun rdzob kyi sgo
228a5(rgyud): chos thams cad sgyu ma'i mtshan nyid zhes bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad kyi 'khor los bsgyur bas bka' stsal to// oM ri d+hi bA da pA ra mi ta la ba pa ra hUM hUM/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa'i pha rol tu
228a6(rgyud): byin pa mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes zhes bya ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// dbang po lnga ni dad pa'i dbang po dang / brtson 'grus kyi dbang po dang / dran pa'i dbang po dang / ting 'dzin gyi dbang po dang / shes rab kyi dang
228a7(rgyud): ba'o bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid la dbang sgyur bas spros pa med pa'i dbang po 'di dag bka' stsal to// oM in dri yA ba bo d+ha pradz+nyA i shany+dza nA ma n+ya nA pa ga ta ya at+mahUM/ dbang po mnyam
228a8(rgyud): ba nyid ces bya ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// stobs lnga ni dang pa'i stobs dang / brtson 'grus kyi stobs dang / dran pa'i stobs dang / ting 'dzin gyi stobs dang / shes rab kyi stobs zhes bka' sngan
228b1(rgyud): da bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid la gnas pa stobs zad rtogs ga smos pa thams cad dang bral ba gdod ma nas dag pas 'di bka' stsal pa/ oM sar+b+ba ta thA ga tA ba la aHswA nom
228b2(rgyud): 'phel ba zhes bya ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshangs pa'i gnas pa bzhi ni/ byams pa dang / snying rje dang / dga' ba dang / bdang snyoms pa'o// oM brah+ma bi hA rA d+h+riwAn ke mai drAR+Sha hUM trAM/ ches thaMd
228b3(rgyud): mnyam pa nyid ces pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bka' stsal to// tshangs pa'i gnas pa byin gyis rlob pa'o// so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi ni spobs pa so sor yang dag par rig pa dang / nges
228b4(rgyud): pa'i tshig so so yang dag par rig pa dang / don so so yang dag par mi ga pa dang / chos so so yang dag par rig pa'o zhes bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad sgyu ma'i mtshan nyid du so so
228b5(rgyud): yang dag par rig pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o zhes bka' stsal to// oM pra ti samA~M daHswA hA/ shes rab kyi pha la tu phyin pa mnyam pa nyid// rje su dran pa drug gang na
228b6(rgyud): na/ sangs rgyas rjesu dran pa dang / choms dran pa dang / dge 'dun rje su dran pa dang / gtong ba rjesu dran pa dang / tshul khrims rdzasu dran pa dang / lha rje su dran pa dang / chos thaMng gcig tu rna su dran pa ni chos zang
228b7(rgyud): don dab pa stong pa nyid ces bya'o// mtshan nyid dang mtshan nyid med pa rnam par dpyod pas mnyam pa nyid kyi sgo zhes bya ba 'di ting 'dzin la dbang sgyur bas bka' stsal to// oM sarba a nu prA
228b8(rgyud): hUMs padang shi hU~M hrI hrI/ su dran pa drug gi shes rab ga/ byang chub kyi yan lag bdun gang zhe na/ dran pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / chos rjir myed pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / 
229a1(rgyud): / brtson 'grus yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / dga' ba yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang shin tu sbyangs pa yang dag byang chub kyi yang dag dang / ting 'dzin yang dag byang chub kyi yan
229a2(rgyud): lag dang / btang snyoms yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ste/ byang chub kyi yan lag mnyam pa nyid skye ba med pa'i mtshan nyid ces bya ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bka' stsal to// oM sar+b+ba tA se bo rgya
229a3(rgyud): ga sa ma tA su pra tiSh+Thi te d+h+r-i ge byang chub kyi yan lag bdun zhes bya ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa gang she na/ yang dag pa'i lta ba dang / yang dag pa'i
229a4(rgyud): rtog pa dang / yang dag pa'i ngag dang / yang dag pa'i las kyi mtha' dang / yang dag pa'i 'tsho ba dang / yang dag pa'i rtsol ba dang / yang dgra pa'i dran pa dang / yang dag pa'i ting 'dzin to// lam zad mi
229a5(rgyud): shes pa'i byang chub kyi sems chen po la 'jug pa legs par so sor rig pa thaMd mkhyen pa'i ye sheso// oM Ad+yaSh+T+rA ga/ ma mtha 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brkyang ba nyid
229a6(rgyud): ces bya ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// ting 'dzin gsum ni stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'o// de la stong pa nyid kyi ting 'dzin gang zhe na/ stong pa'i rnam pa dang / dben pa'i
229a7(rgyud): rnam pa dang / med pa'i rnam pa dang // rang bzhin med pa'i rnam pa thad mtshan nyid gcig tu rtogs pa sems rtse gcig pa ste/ 'di ni stong pa nyid kyi ting 'dzin ces brjod// de la mtshan ma med ni
229a8(rgyud): ting 'dzin gang zhe na/ gang la mtshan mar mi byed pa dang / 'dod pa med pa dang / shes pa med pa dang / zhi ba'i rnam pa dang / rnar bral ba'i rnam par sems rtse gcig pa ste/ 'di ni mtshan ma med
229b1(rgyud): / pa'i ting 'dzin ces bya'o// de la smon pa med pa'i ting 'dzin gang zhe na/ mi rtag pa'i rnam pa dang gasdug bsngal ba'i rnam pa sems rtsa gcig pa ste/ de ni smon pa med pa'i ting 'dzin ces bya'o// chos
229b2(rgyud): thams cad rtogs nas smon par mi byed// lnga 'am lha las gzhan gang yang rung ba don du mi gnyer zhing 'phags par yang mi 'dod pa ste/ dngos po thams cad la ting 'dzin thaMd kyi sgo yis kyi // shes
229b3(rgyud): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid kyis// ting 'dzin gyi sgo gsum nya bar rtogs par bya'o// oM kha sa maHsarba d+ha rmAHkhe/ de la stobs bcu ni gnas dang gnas ma yin pa mkhyen pa'i stobs dang / las kyi rna
229b4(rgyud): smin pa mkhyen pa'i stobs dang / khams sna tshogs mkhyen pa'i stob sa dang / dbang po mchog dang mchog ma yin pa mkhyen pa'i stobs dang / sdug bsngal 'gog pa so sor mkhyen pa'i
229b5(rgyud): stobs dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa'i gzhi mkhan pa'i stobs dang / sngon gyi gnas rjesu dran pa mkhyen pa'i stobs dang / mngon bar shes pa lnga mkhyen pa'i stobs dang / zag pa zad pa
229b6(rgyud): mkhyen pa'i stob so// de bzhin gshegs bzed kyi mnyam pa nyid so sor rtogs pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// oM da sha ba la sa ma tA thA/ stobs bcu mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba shes
229b7(rgyud): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// rnam par thar pa brgyad gang sha na/ gzugs can gyi gzugs rnams mthong ba 'di ni rnam par thar pa dang po'o// nang gzugs med pa'i 'du shes dang ldan pas phyi rol
229b8(rgyud): gyi gzugs rnams mthong ba 'di ni rnar thar pa gnyis pa'o// bzang bar mos pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa gsum pa'o// gzugs kyi 'du shes las yang dag par 'das te thogs pa'i 'du shes
230a1(rgyud): rnams nub par gyur cing sna tshogs kyi 'du shes rnams yid la mi byed pas na mkha' mtha' ya sa// mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas pa 'dzin rnar bar
230a2(rgyud): ba bzhi pa'o// de rnam pa thams cad du rnamakha' mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ rnam par shes pa mtha' ya so// rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la na bar bsgrubs te gnas pa
230a3(rgyud): 'di ni rnam par thar pa lnga pa'o// de rnam pa thams cad du rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ cung zad ma yo zhes cung zad med pa'i skye mched nye bar bsgrubs te gnas
230a4(rgyud): ba 'di rnam par thar pa drug pa'o// rnam pa thams cad du cung zad mad pa'i skyo mched las yang dag par 'das te 'du shes mda' du shes med min skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas
230a5(rgyud): ba 'di ni rnam par thar pa bdun pa'o// de rnam pa thams cad du 'a du shes med min skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ 'du shes dang tshor ba 'gog pa la nye bar bsgrubs
230a6(rgyud): te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa brgyad pa'o// chos thaMd spros pa med pa'i mtshan nyid kun nas nyon mongs pa med cing rnam par byang ba med pa/ bsam gtan med cing bsam gtan med pa ma
230a7(rgyud): yon pa snyoms par 'jug pa med cing snyoms par 'jug pa med pa ma yin pa 'di bka' stsal to// oM san+ta b+ha dre sarba b+ha ba baM shud d+hi d+he ShaM khaM/ gnas dang gnas pa yin pa dang bral ba zhes bya
230a8(rgyud): ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// mi 'jig pa bzhi gang zhe na/ bdag gis yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nas dam bcas na chos 'di rnams mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas
230b1(rgyud): zhes bya bar bdag la dge sbyong ngang / bram ze 'ang/ lha 'am/ bdud dam / tshungs pa 'ag/ skye dgu'i tshogs gnan ci yang rung ste 'jig rten na chos dang ldan par rgol bar 'gyur zhes bya ba'i rgyu yang / 
230b2(rgyud): bar rje su ma mthong ste/ rgyu yang dag par rje su ma mthong bas de la bdag bde ba thob pa dang / bag tsha ba med pa thob dang / mi 'jigs pa theb pa rnam par spyod// khyu mchog rlabs po tsho'i gnasu dam
230b3(rgyud): bca'o// 'khor gyi nang du seng ga'i sgra bsgrag go// tshangs pa'i 'khor lo 'jig rten na dag sbyong ngam/ dam ze 'am/ lha 'am/ bdud dam/ tshangs pa 'am/ gzhan sus kyang rung ste/ chos dang ldan par bskor
230b4(rgyud): bar mi nus pa bdag gis rab tu bskor bar bya'o// bdag zag pa zad do zhes dam bcas nas de la zag pa 'a rnams yongasu zad pa ram gyur to zhes bya bar bdag la dge sbyong ngam/ khwam
230b5(rgyud): ze 'am/ lha 'am/ bdud dam/ tshangs pa 'am/ skye dgu'i tshogs ga nan su yang rung ste 'jig rten na chos dang 'thun pa zhes bya ba'i bar du'o// gang yang bdag gis bar chad kyi
230b6(rgyud): chosu bstan pa de dag la bsten na b.rang chad kyi chos su mi 'gyuro zhes bya ba rgyas par spyo// gang yang bdag gis lam 'phags pa'i 'byung ba rtogs par 'gyur pa de bde ba'i sdug bsngal yang
230b7(rgyud): dag par 'gyur bar brtan pa de dag la nan tan byas nas sdug bsngal yang dag par zad par 'gyur bar mi 'thud // zhes dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze 'ag/ lha 'am/ bdud dam/ tshangs pa 'am/ 
230b8(rgyud): dgu'i tshogs sus kyang rung ste/ 'jig rten ches dang ldan par rgol bar 'gyur nas bya ba'i rgyu yang dag par rA su mi mthong ba la sogs pa ji ltar gyur pa theng yongasu spros te brjod
231a1(rgyud): bar bya'o// mi 'jigs pa ni ngar 'dzin pa'i phyiraro// chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid sgyu ma'i mtshan nyod do zhes/ oM bai sha ra d+ya sa ma tA pra b+ha a A e AHmthar gyis gnas pa'i
231a2(rgyud): mnyam pa nyid kyi snyoms par 'jug pa dgu gang zhe na/ 'dod pas dben pa sdig to mi dge ba'i chos kyis dben pa/ rtog pa dang bcas pa/ dpyod pa dang bcas pa dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang // 
231a3(rgyud): bde ba can/ bsam gtan dang po la nye bar bsgrubs te gan so// de rnam par rtog pa dang / rnam par dpyod pa nye bar zhi nas nang yongasu dang s+t+wa~M/ sems kyi rgyud gcig tu gyur pos rtog pa med pa
231a4(rgyud): dpyod pa med ga/ ting 'dzin las skyes pa'i dga'ar ba dang / bde ba ca ngan bsam gtan gnyis pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnaso// de dga' ba'i 'dod chags dang bral bas btang snyoms
231a5(rgyud): su gnas te/ dran pa dang ldan zhing shes bzhin du bde ba lus kyis myong la/ 'phags pa rnams kyis de la phan pa dang lnga/ na bde ba la rnam par spyod pa btang snyoms pa'i zhes
231a6(rgyud): brjod pa ste/ dga' ba med pa'i bsam gtan gsum pa la nye bar bsgrub te gnaso// de bde ba yang spangs sdug bsngal ba yang spangs shing yid bde ba dang / yid mi bde ba snga nas nub pas
231a7(rgyud): bde ba yang med/ sdug bsngal ba yang med btang snyoms pa dang / dran pa yongasu drug gabasam gtan ban pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gan so// de rnam pa thed du gzugs kyi 'du shes las
231a8(rgyud): yang dag par 'das te/ thogs pa'i 'du shes rnams nub par gyur cing sna tshogs kyi 'du shes yid la mi byed pas na mkha' mtha' yas so zhes te/ na mkha' mtha' yas skye mched
231b1(rgyud): / la nye bar bsgrubs te gnaso// de rnam pa thams cad du na mkha' mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te rnam par shes pa mtha' yas so zhes rnam shes mtha' yas sku mched
231b2(rgyud): la nye bar bsgrubs te / kan so// de rnam pa thams cad du rnam shras mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ cung zad ma yod do zhes cung zad med pa'i skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs
231b3(rgyud): ta gnaso// de rnam pa thams cad du cung zad med pa'i skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gan so// de rnam pa thams
231b4(rgyud): cad 'du shes med 'du shes med ma ni skye mched la so yang da dag par 'das te 'du shes dang / tsher ba 'gog pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gan so// rnam par thar pa brgyad po dang / 
231b5(rgyud): mnyam pa nyid rje su thob nas dngos por rtog par mi byed/ dngos po med par rtogs pa mi byed/ chos thams cad gnyi su me da par rtog so// 'di ni mthar gyis gnas par skye
231b6(rgyud): par 'jug pa dgu mnyam pa nyid do// oM a nan+taHbi mo Sha mu She shaM/ dngos po thams cad mthor gyis gnas pa'i rnam par thar pa mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba shes rab kyi rol tu phyin pa'o/ 
231b7(rgyud): de la pha rol tu phyin pa bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang // brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin// 
231b8(rgyud): ba dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sngon lam gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / stobs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
232a1(rgyud): dang thabs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / thams cad kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / spros pa med pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / yang dag
232a2(rgyud): ba'i don gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / chos thams cad kyi de kho na nyid kyi don gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / rdo rje'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / rin po che'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / pad+ma'i pha rol tu phyin pa
232a3(rgyud): dang las kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste bstan pa'i rje su rtogs pa'i sbyor bas so// oM sarba pA ra mi ta a ra tha pa ri pA ri Ni/ oM
232a4(rgyud): hUM taM/  thams cad kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// de las bcu po gang zhe na/ rab tu de ga' ba zhes bya ba'i sa dang / dri ma med pa zhes bya ba'i
232a5(rgyud): sa dang / 'od byed pa zhes bya ba dang / 'od 'phro ba zhes bya ba dang // spyang dka' ba zhes bya ba dang / mngon du gyur pa zhes bya/ ba dang / ring du song ba zhes bya ba dang / mi g.yo ba zhes
232a6(rgyud): bya ba dang / legs pa'i blo gros zhes bya ba dang / chos kyi sprin zhes bya ba dang / sa thams cad don gcig ste/ 'di ltar ye shes kyi don to// ye shes kyang ci yang med pa/ nyon mongs
232a7(rgyud): ba med ga yi ge med gdon yod pa/ gdod ma nas dag pa/ dri ma med pa/ 'od gsal brjod pa dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i don to// oM b+hu mi bi sho d+ha ni sar+b+ba ra tha pa ri pU ra Ni ba b+h+rUM/ sa yongasu
232a8(rgyud): spyong ba zhes bya ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// byang chub sems dpa'i gnas pa bcu gang zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dang po bskyed pa dang / gzhon nur gyur ba dang / las dang / 
232b1(rgyud): bo pa dang / rnal 'byor spyod pa dang / skye ba nas skye bar sbyor ba dang ldan pa dang / bsam pa dang ldan pa dang / phyir mi ldog pa dang / dbang bskur ba thob pa dang / skye ba gcig gis thegs pa dang
232b2(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis rnam par gnas pa dang / mi gnas pa dor ba ste don dam par gnos pa gcig yin pa'i phyir te/ 'di ltar gnas pa med pa'o// oM sarba b+hAHbsna
232b3(rgyud): no ba~M ga te hUM/ rnam par gnas pa med pa zhes bya ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis dbang bcu gang zhe na/ tshe la dbang ba dang / las la dbang ba dang / 
232b4(rgyud): yo byad la dbang ba dang / mos pa la dbang ba dang / smon lam la dbang ba dang / rdzu 'phrul la dbang ba dang / ye shes la dbang ba dang / chos la dbang ba dang / sems la dbang ba'o// 
232b5(rgyud): dbang ba dang mi dbang ba rang bzhin gyis rnam par grol ba thams cad la dbang ga dbang phyug thams cad la dbang rje su tho ba pa/ chos thams cad dang legs par rab ldan
232b6(rgyud): ba'i phyi ro// oM sarba ba shi ta tro truM hUM/ thams cad la dbang ba zhes bya ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// de la sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad gang zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs
232b7(rgyud): ba lo 'khrul pa mi mnga'o// ca tse mi mang ngo // dgongs pa nyams po mi mnga'o// thugs mnyam par ma gzhag pa mi mnga'o// 'du shes sna tshogs mi mnga'o// ma rtags pa'i
232b8(rgyud): btang snyoms mi mnga'o// mos pa yongs nyams pa mi mnga'o// brtson 'grus yongs nyams pa mi mnga'o// dgongs pa yongasu nyams pa mi mnga'o// ting 'dzin yongasu nyams
233a1(rgyud): ba mi mngo'o// shas rang yong su nyams pa mi mnga'o// rnam par grol ba yong su nyams pa mi ma'o// rnam par grol ba'i ye shes gzigs pa yongasu nyams pa mi mang
233a2(rgyud): 'das pa'i dus la ma bogs ma chags pa'i ye shes gzigs pa 'jug ma 'ongs pa'i dus la ma chags ma thogs pa'i ye shes gzigs pa 'jug/ da ltar byung ba'i dus
233a3(rgyud): ma chags mi thogs pa'i ye shes gzigs pa 'ju'o// sku'i phrin las thams cad ye shes sngon du 'gro ba ste ye shas kyi rje su 'brung // gsung gi phrin las zad ye shes sngon du
233a4(rgyud): 'gro ba ste/ ye shes kyi rjesu 'dra'o// thugs kyi phril las thim sa cad ye shes sngon du 'gri ba ste ye shes kyi rjesu 'brang // de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ni yul 'a
233a5(rgyud): du dus thams cad kyi cha tha~Md mnyam pa nyid lnga legs par rab tu gnas pa ste/ steng ba di la yang dag par rjes rtogs pa nyid kyi phyir ma/ shes rab yongasu dag pa'o// oM a
233a6(rgyud): wa~M Na ka bu d+ha d+harmA sa ma ta aHbI ra hUM khaM/ ma 'dres pa mnyam pa pa nyid ces bya ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// de la skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis rnams ci zhe na/ phyag dang zhabs
233a7(rgyud): kyi mthil 'khor los mtshan pa nyid de 'di yi phyag dang zhabs kyi mthil dag la 'khor lo rtsibs stong can lto ba dang bcas pa mu khyud dang bcas dang pa rnam pa thams cad yongasu rdzogs pa'o// 
233a8(rgyud): phyag dang zhabs kyi mthil legs par gnas po ste/ zhabs kyi mthil thams cad kyis sa gzhi la reg cing dri yang 'di'i mtho bo ni dma' ba dang dma' 'ani mtho ba'o// phyag dang zhabs kyi so
233b1(rgyud): mo ngang pa'i rgyal po lta bu nga bas 'brel pa ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi phag dag dang zhabs de dag gsar gyi mdog can gyi ri mo'i phreng ba rnams kyis rang pa brgyad pa bzhin du mdzes pa'o// 
233b2(rgyud): Thag dang zhabs 'jam zhing gzhon sha chags pa nyid// bcom ldan 'das 'di'i phyag dang zhabs dag ras 'al 'jam po bzhin dang skyes nas zla ba lon pa'i bris pa bzhin du gzhan she can dang
233b3(rgyud): kA tsa lin da ltar 'ja pa rag na bde ba'o// bdun mtho bar gyur te phyag gnyis dag dang zhabs gnyis dag dang / phrag gong dag dang / mgron pa'i byog cig/ ser mo ring ba ste 'di yi zhabs kyi sor mo
233b4(rgyud): rnams rims kyis ring ba nyid// rnyis pa yangs pa ste 'di'i rting pa che zhing zhabs kyi rjesu mtsham par yangs par 'gyuraro// sku zhid drang ba nyid de 'phye ba ma yin zhing / nem pa ma yin/ 
233b5(rgyud): ma tshang ba ma yin/ 'thas pa ma yin/ legs par skyes pa rnam pa thams cad pa bdun dang ldan pa'i sku ste mtho ba 'di yi sr-i/ da rje su mtshams pa'i nang du 'gyur// zhabs 'bur
233b6(rgyud): mi mngon pa nyid de 'di'i pus mo dang long du mtho bar 'gyuraro// ba spu'i rtse mo gyen du phyogs pa ste 'di'i ba spu rnams rtse mo gyen du phyogs par 'gyur zhing / ba spu rnams g.yas byegasu 'khyil la
233b7(rgyud): 'khor ba mig sman gyi mdog can rnams te/ de rnams kyis gser gyi mdog can gyi sku mngon pang gsal bar byed// byin pa ri dgas e na yi'i lta bu ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyi byin pa dog zlum
233b8(rgyud): ba ri dgas a na ya rnams kyi lta bu'o// phyag ring zhing mdzes pa ste rgyas shing ma btud pa nyid du phyag mthil dag gis rang gi pus mo'i lha nga la reg pa'o// 'doms kyi snga ba spribasu nub pa/ 
234a1(rgyud): sta sbubs kyis rab tu g.yogs pa glang po che'i gsang gnas lta bur 'gyuraro// sku mdog gsar 'dra ba ste 'di yi kha dog gser lha bur 'gyur// lpags pa srab pa ste shin tu 'jam
234a2(rgyud): ba gser shog ltar 'jam pa'i lpags pa can du 'gyur ni rdul med pa'i na bzar 'dzin pa'o// s+pha ra ra nas skyes pa ste/ 'di'i ba spu'i 'dru bur spu rnams re rer 'gyuraro// sprin mo'i dbus na mdzod bu
234a3(rgyud): can ta 'di'i smin dag gi dbus na ras skud legs pa lta bu dung bcag pa'i mdog can g.yas phyogasu 'khyil bar 'gyur te/ mdzod spu nyid kyis zhal gser gyi kha dog lta bu shin tu gsal bar byed/ 
234a4(rgyud): sku stod seng gre lta bu ste/ 'di yi sku steng du yangs pa seng gi ri lta bu 'gyura'o// dbang mgo rnam pa ste/ yong su rtsub pa'i mgrin pa can du 'gyur// khal gang rgyas pa ste/ 'di yi nye bar byas pa
234a5(rgyud): 'gyur zhing gser shog bzhin du rnam par gsal ba'i mgrin pa tsa no// yan lag seM rna mur nam myong bar byed// ces pas na Do d+ba ba'i mchog dang ldan pa nyid de cu rnams yin la de
234a6(rgyud): rnams kyi mchog tu rlung dang / mkhris pa dang / bad kan la sogs pa rnams kyis ma dkrugs pa nyid kyis phyir yang dag par gsol ba'o// shing n+ya gro da ltar chu shing ga' ba skyes bu chen po'i chu dang zhang
234a7(rgyud): dang mnyam pa'o// dbu gtsug tor dang ldan pa ste/ dbu rnam par 'gyur zhing / gtsug tor gdugs lnga bus yas bkab pa gtsug tor yang shin tu mtho ba'o// ljags ring bas te/ snyan gyi mtha'i bar
234a8(rgyud): du ljags kyi rtse mos reg par byed cing / dbu skra'i mthar thug par yang / dpral ba'i mthar ljags kyis khebs pa'o// tshangs pa'i dbyangs te 'khor stong phrag du mar dbyangs nang du ji lta phyi rol du'ang thos/ 
234b1(rgyud): shing byug la bing ka'i bzhin du snyan pa nyid du 'gyuraro// 'gram pa seng ge lta bu ste/ 'gram pa dag seng ge'i bzhin du rtsub por 'gyur// chems dkar bas te du sh+ya kun dadang / zla ba'i kha dog can gyi tshems
234b2(rgyud): rnam so// tshams mnyam pa ste/ ha cang dma' ba ma yin mtho ba ma yin mi mnyam pa ma yin pa'i rtse mo can gyi chos rnamasu 'gyuraro// tshems thags bzang ba ste/ tshems rnams par med pa'o// tshems pani
234b3(rgyud): bcu mnga' ba ste/ tshems 'og tu nyi shu dang / stang du tshems nyi shu'o// spyan mngon mthing ste/ spyan dag gi sngon po gang yin pa de shin tu rnam par dag par 'gyur te ri mo dmar mo rnams dang ma 'dres pa nyid kyi
234b4(rgyud): phyil la/ ga dkar po yin pa de dkar pi kho na shin tu rnam par dag par 'gyur// rdzim pa'i lta bu ste spyan gyi rdzi ma rnams khyu mchog gi bzhin du gang 'og ma yin pa de rnams 'og kho na dang / gang snang ma
234b5(rgyud): yin pa de rnams steng kho nar gnas pa ma 'dzings pa lags par gzho la ba'o// sems can 'ga' zhig rnams kyis de bzhin gshag sa ba gser gyi mdog can du mthong ga 'ga' zhig
234b6(rgyud): rnams kyis shel gyi mdog can du mthong ba/ 'ga' zhig rnams kyis pad+ma rA ga'i kha dog dang / 'ga' zhig rnams kyis in dra nI la'i kha dog can dang / 'ga' zhig rnams kyis mu tig dmar
234b7(rgyud): po'i kha dog can dang / 'ga' nig rnams kyis dung dang kun da dang zla ba ltar dkar ba dang / 'ga' zhig gis kha dog sna tshogs pa dang / 'ga' zhig gis rnam pa'i kha dog can dang / 'ga' zhig gis khru byed
234b8(rgyud): dang bcu gsum pa'i chang dang / ji srid du dpag tshod 'dzus gyi tshad dam/ dang ga chad bye ba'i tshad dang / ji srid du 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byas rgya mtsho'i sprin mtha' yas pa rnamasu snang bar mdzad
235a1(rgyud): pa'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor can dang / stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams snang bas yongasu rgyas par mdzad pa dang / ji srid du me tog gi gzhi'i snying po'i rgyan bkod pa'i
235a2(rgyud): rgya la che rnams snang bar byed cing // chos kyi dbyings kyi mtha' thug pa'i bar du ste/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yul gdul bya'i dbang las thams cad snang bar byed cing 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad
235a3(rgyud): dbyangs kyis rnam par rig par mdzad pa dang / stong gnyis dang / gsum dang / ji srid namakha'i mthar thug pa'i bar thams cad 'od dang / dbyangs kyis sdang bar bas nas rnam par rig par mdzad pa dang / 
235a4(rgyud): tshos dang / zang zing dang / don 'thun pa dang / don bya ba'i bsdu ba'i dang sa po bzhi rnams kyis sems can rnams la bar 'dogs shi nga/ phan btags nas byang chub chen po la rab tu dgod
235a5(rgyud): par mdzad// skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis mnyam pa nyid kyis chos rnams thams cad mnyam zhing mnyam pa ste/ lha nA mas kyi mtshan mngon par 'grub par 'altar bar bya
235a6(rgyud): ba'i mtshan ma yin pa mngon par 'grub pa ni ma yin no// byang chub mtshan nyid med pa nyid kyi phyir// chos rnams thams cad mtshan nyid med pa ste/ 'di lta ste/ stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid cano// lha bams
235a7(rgyud): cad kyang stong pa nyid du mnyam pa'o// lha thams cad dang / byang chub dang / chos rnams thams cad kyang mtshan nyid gcig pa ste/ 'di lta ste/ na mkha'i mtshan nyid can/ stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid can/ zhi ba
235a8(rgyud): mtshan nyid na rnams// oM saH ta thAg lnga par lak+Shanas sa~M tA d+hi pA ta A/ mtshan thams ca mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// de byang brgyang su rnams ci zhen
235b1(rgyud): rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni sen mo zangs kyi mdog lta bur 'gyur te/ san mo snum pa dang / sen mo mtho ba dang / sor mo rnams zlum par 'gyur ba dang / sor mo rnams rims kyis phra ba dang / so
235b2(rgyud): mo rnams rgyas pa dang / rtsa mi mngon pa dang / ca rnams mdud pa med pa dang / long bu mi mngon pa dang / zhabs mi mnyam pa mang bar mtshungs pa dang / glang po che'i stabasu gshegs pa dang / seng ge'i skabs
235b3(rgyud): su gshegs pa dang / g.yas phyog su ldog cing gshegs pa dang / drang por gshegs pa dang / mdzes par gshegs pa dang / rim gyis gshegs pa dang / che zhing yangs la yongasu gyur pa'i dbus
235b4(rgyud): me'i lha nga can dang / mtshan yongasu rdzogs pa dang / goms pa snyom sa pa dang / sku rnam par dag pa dang / sku 'jam pa dang / sku rnam pa ra dang ba dang / sku zhum pa med pa dang / sku chub med pa
235b5(rgyud): dang / kun tu spyod pa gtsang ba dang / khyu mchog ltar kun nas rab tu dang ba can dang / gzigs pa yongasu dag cing mngon par 'dod pa la mnyam pa'i 'od can dang / sku zlum pa dang / sku
235b6(rgyud): bskams phyin pa dang / sku ma snyoms pa dang / sku spyad gzhu'i lag bcangs lta bu dang / lte ba zab dang / lta ba mi g.yo ba dang / lte ba g.yas phyogasu 'khyil ba dang / lte ba thogs pa med pa dang / 
235b7(rgyud): yan lag dang / nying lag shin tu rnam par 'byas pa dang / lpags pa skyon dang bral ba dang / gnag bag dang / sme ba mang pa dang / sku bon+da pa dang phyag shing bal lta bu dang / phyag yangs pa
235b8(rgyud): dang / phyag gi ri mo snum pa dang / phyag gi ri mo mo yo ba dang / mchu bim pa lta bu dang / zhal ha cang mi ring ba dang / gnyen zhing srab la dmar ba'i ljags dang / glang po che'i bar can dang / snyan cing
236a1(rgyud): mnyan pa'i dbangs dang / sgra bud sum tshogs pa dang / dbyangs 'jam pa dang / shangs mtho ba dang / mche ba zlum pa dang / mche ba dkar ba dang / mche ba byin gyis phra ba dang / spyan gtsang ba dang / 
236a2(rgyud): span yangs pa dang / spyan mthon mthing dang / rdzi la gan pa dang / smin ma sdug pa dang / smin ma 'jam pa dang / spyan dkar gnag 'byis shing pad+ma'i 'dab ma lta bu dang / sprin tshugs ring ba dang / smin ma'i spu nag
236a3(rgyud): bo dang / smin ma'i spu phra ba dang / smin marje su 'thun pa dang / kha dog ma nyams pa dang / snyan mi mnyam med pa dang / snyan skyon dang bral ba dang / dbang po thams cad ma mnyams zhing spyan dang bral ba dang / yongasu rdzogs/ 
236a4(rgyud): shing mtho la mchog tu gnas pa'i zhal gdong dang dpral ba can dang / dbu shin tu rgyas pa dang / dbu skra gnag pa dang dbu skra stug pa dang / dbu skra 'jam pa dang / dbu skra dri zhim pa dang / dbu skra mnyam
236a5(rgyud): ba dang / dbu skra snum pa dang / dbu skam 'khums pa dang // dpal be'u dang / bkra shis dang / g.yung drung 'khyil bas/ rgyan pa dang / rgyal mtshan yang dag par gnas pa dang / dpral ba
236a6(rgyud): dung lta bu dang / dbu mchog tu mtho ba dang / gtsug tor yang 'phags pa dang dang / dbu gdugs kyi rnam pa can dang / kun nas mdzes pa ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ni tshad med pa'i dpe pad can mnyam pa
236a7(rgyud): nyid la legs par rab tu gnas pa gsal byed dang gsal byang dang gsal byed yin pas mnyam pa nyid la legs par rab tu gnas pa/ chos thams cad gsal byed meng par mnyam pa nyid la ra
236a8(rgyud): tu lags par gnas pa mtshan dang dpe byad thams cad sgyu ma chos dang ldan pa la lags par rab tu gnas pa/ dus gsum gyi dpe byad mnyam pa nyid rdo rje lta bu mnyam pa nyid thob pa stong pa nyid
236b1(rgyud): thob pa nyid kyi chos thams cad dang / dpe byang mnyam pa nyid thob pa/ gnyis med pa'i don la legs par yang dag par zhugs pa rnams ces pa'o// oM a nu b+hany+dza na sa ma hA su pra tiSh+Thi ta badz+ra d+hA
236b2(rgyud): na spu'i pe byad mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das dri bzhin gshegs pa thams car slar yang zhus par gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi
236b3(rgyud): rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po can lo leg so zhes bya ba rnams kyis mnyes par mdzad// oM byang chub sems chen khod leg so// sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag nyid mchog/ sangs rgyas chos chen
236b4(rgyud): khod log so// tshad med chad du khyod lag so// shes ro ba dam pa'i ched du yang // mdo sde 'di ni legs par bshad/ sangs rgyas snga mas ma gsungs pa'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das
236b5(rgyud): rdo rje rnal 'byor can gyi dbang phyug chen pos lha rnams pa mas cad la phyag 'tshal ba bzhi yis dges par mdzad/ sangs rgyas kun khyod la phyag 'tshal// chos kyi sku yi mchogs
236b6(rgyud): mchog/ gdod ma'i sngags kyi don nyid la// rdo rje ye shes stobs chen la// shin tu sgrib med zhi ba la// rdo rje chos rnams legs gnas pa// theg pa chen po'i go 'bang thob// thugs rtswa'i bdag
236b7(rgyud): nyid can gyi lha// gdod nas dag pa dpa' bo che// dbang phyug dam pa mchog gi mchog/ dam chos mchog tu 'gyur ba med// bde gshegs de rnams la phyag 'tshal ces pa'o// na mo stu te/ 
236b8(rgyud): oM mAM hUMn ma sU ta swA hA/ 'di ni brjod pa tsam zhig gos// sangs rgyas thams cad rab mchod pa'o ces pa'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzod chen pos de bzhin gshegs
237a1(rgyud): pa thams cad bos nas 'di skad ces gsung so// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnams thams cad dngos grub thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor bskyed par mdzad du gsol/ 
237a2(rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnams thams cad slar yang 'dus par mdzad nas// bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rnal 'byor can gyi dbang phyug chen po la gsol ba btab pa/ bcom
237a3(rgyud): ldan 'das khyod kyi rigs thams cad kyi 'khor lo bskyed par mdzad du gsol// de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug tshon pos gsol ba btab pa'i gsung gi de ma thag tu kho nar
237a4(rgyud): 'jam dpal gzhonur gyur pa la bos te bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa rnams thams cad kyi byang chub kyi snying po nyon cig ces te/ de nas 'di las yang dag
237a5(rgyud): bshad// byang chub kyi dkyil 'khor bla na med// rdo rje shes gsang ba mchog/ sangs rgyas skyob pa thams cad kyi'o// dben pa'i sa gzhi nyams dga' ba// me tog phreng bas
237a6(rgyud): rnam rgyan pa// kun tu sna tshogs cha bzang ba// kun tu sna tshogs sdom par ni// kun nas sna tshogs bo ba rnams// dam pa'i don du bsgrub par bya// ri yi mchog gam grong khyer ni// me tog 'bras
237a7(rgyud): bus rnam rgyan pa/ der gnas sngags pas dngos gru'i mchog/ gal te 'dod ni yang dag bri// gtsug lag khang dang dgon pa'i gnas// r-i stengs rnamasu kun+da nas ni// sangs rgyas
237a8(rgyud): kun gyi bya ba rnams// dam pa'i don du bsgrub par bya// ma mo'i gnas dang zhi ba'i gnas// dur khrod lha yi gnas ni// rdo rje 'dzin dpal bya ba rnams// don dam par ni bsgrub par bya// pad+ma'i
237b1(rgyud): skyed mos tshal kun dang / chu bo 'dus pa rnams yang / phag na pad+ma dpal bya ba// dam pa'i don du bsgrub par bya// rgyal po'i pho brang nyams dga' ba// rgyal po'i skyed tshal rnamasu ni// rdo rje rin
237b2(rgyud): tshon de yi ni// rin chen ba ba rnams bsgrubs// rtags gcig pa dang ba glang gnas// chu klung 'dus pa rnamasu yang // sna tshogs byab thams cad rnams// dam pa'i don du bsgrub par bya// 
237b3(rgyud): dpal ldan rdo rje sems dpa' dang / lha rnams gnas mchog kun tu'o// na mkha' 'am ni phyogs gzhan du// gang du mnyam par gzhog pa der // rtag pa bsod nams mchog gyur pa// bya ba
237b4(rgyud): thaM bsgrub par bya// phyogs kun mnyam nyid gnas dkyi la 'khor// shes rab can gyis thig gdab bya// shar lho nub dang byang rnams kyis// phyogasu dkyil 'khor thig brgyad pa'o// 
237b5(rgyud): de yi byi ru 'khor lo ni// kha dog lnga pa cher 'bar ba'o// gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa// rta babs bzhi yis mdzes pa s+t+wa~M// sna tshogs gos dang me tog phreng // rnga yab sogs kyis
237b6(rgyud): rnam rgyan pa// dkyil 'khor kun la gnas pa yis// sgo dang sgo khyud mtsham rnamasa'o// rdo rje rin chen rnams kyis spras// dkyil 'khor bde bri bar bya// dkyil 'khor de yi dbus ni// gal te dngos grub
237b7(rgyud): mchog 'dod na// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas par// sangs rgyas gzugs brnyan bri bar bya// shar du bcom ldan 'khor lo can// rdo rje sems dpa' yang dag ldan// 'khor lo sgyur ba thams cad
237b8(rgyud): ni/ sgeg par bcas pa kun bri bya// lho ru gtsug tor dkar po ni// rin chen 'bar ba yang dag ldan// gtsug tor dkar po'i ngos su ni// rdo rje gzi brjid la sogs bri// byang du brtson 'grus chan
238a1(rgyud): be ni gzi brjid phung po stobs po che// sna tshogs rdo rje sogs bcas pa// rim pas kun nas bri bar bya// rdo rje rnal 'byor can gyis ni/ dbang phyug mgon po'i nub phyog su/ 
238a2(rgyud): gtsug tor rgyal ba brtson 'grus che// rdo rje chos sogs dang bcas pa/ thams cad sngags pas bri bar bya// gral te dngos grub mchog 'dod na// dbang ldan phyog su 'phags pa gnas// 
238a3(rgyud): mtshams ni cher 'phag so// bdan bral du ni rnam rgyal nyid// rlung du de bzhin rnam 'phro ba'o// rdo rje sems dpa' sems dpa' che// sems dpa' kun gyi mdun du ni// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus
238a4(rgyud): gnas pa// gsang zhing 'bar 'khrigs 'od zer can// mkhas pas dkyil 'khor rnams ni// mchod pa rnams ni bzhag byas te// sgeg mo la sogs mchod pa che// de bzhin
238a5(rgyud): gzugs sgra la sogs dang // bdug pa la sogasagasang che no// sgo skyong ba ni bzhi yin te// byi yi dkyil 'khor gnas rnamasasu// kun tu bzang po sogs rnams bri// de ltar
238a6(rgyud): dkyil 'khor bri bya ste// mchod pa byas nas snga ma bzhin// de bzhin 'jug pa sogs byas la// sgrub pa'i thabs ni brtsam par bya// rdo rje rnal 'byor dbang phyug sogs// dkyil 'khor mngon
238a7(rgyud): sum mthong ba las// snga ma rtag po ji bzhin du// phyi nas de bzhin bri bar bya// bsod nams ji bzhin dkyil 'khor rnams// thaMd tshon gyi rab brtag la// rang gi lhag pa'i lha ngo bos// dkyil 'a/ 
238a8(rgyud): thing bri bar 'gyur/ nga lha'i bdag nyid rnal 'byor gyis/ dkyil 'khor thams cad rab tu grug/ cho ga sman dang lhag pas kyang / 'grub par 'gyur te skyon ma yin// kun tu sna tshogs skal / 
238b1(rgyud): pa/ kun nas sna tshogs 'khor lo can// 'khor lo sgyur ba bdag nyid che'i// rin chen bdun gyi mchod pa cha'ang // yongasu rdzogs pa'i zla ba ltar// dkyil 'khor bdud rtsi 'byung zhes bya// sangs
238b2(rgyud): rgyas rdo rje 'dzin sogs kyis// dkyil 'khor 'di ni bshad byas pa'o// phyag na pad+ma bdag nyid che// pad+ma'i rnam par brtag shes bya// rin po che yi rin chen rnams// dkyil 'khor sna tshogs rnam
238b3(rgyud): pa'o dkyil 'khor dman zhing tshig rnams// dor bar byas pa de nyid ni// gsang ba shes pa ma yin na// sgrub pa'i thabs ni 'grub mi 'gyur// de phyir gsang ba thad kyi// dkyil 'khor thams cad
238b4(rgyud): lta ba ni// gal te dngos grub mchog 'dod na// gdon mi zla bar rtag tu bya// bla ma la ni yon phul nas// rjesu rim pas bsgrub par bya// brtan pa 'am ni g.yo ba yaM// rdzas rnams ji
238b5(rgyud): snyed thaMd ste// rtse ba me tog 'bras bu sogs// bu mo lags par rgyun byas dang // 'dod pa'i chung ma phul byas nas// slar yang rin gyis bslubar bya// grong dang de bzhin gtsug
238b6(rgyud): lag khang // kun dga' ra sogs rgyal srid mchog/ gang la sbyin pa cung zad yod// 'tsho ba de ni sbyin par bya// dag gi dngos po yongs gtong ba// sangs rgyas thams cad rab mchod pa'o// bla ma la ni le
238b7(rgyud): gsang ba dam pa rmad byung ba// mngon par dbang bskur de nas bya// 'dab ma brgyad pa yid 'ong la// sleb ma banag nas yan lag kun/ phyag rgya kun nas bcings byas nas// khams kun rang bzhin nu ba dang / sa
238b8(rgyud): don 'bras rnga drang pa y-i// bum pa rnams kyi dang bskur to// sangs rgyas phreng ba'i dbang bskur las/ spyi bo dang ni dpral ba dang / gzhogs dang de bzhin rgyob du yang / sangs rgyas rin chen po kun/ cad
239a1(rgyud): / ngan mchog tu mi 'gyur ba'o// dpal ldan sangs rgyas gtsug nor bu// gdugs dkar steng na gnas pa'o// rgyal srid kun gyi dbang bskur gyis// yang dang yang du dang bskur ba// dpal kun/ 
239a2(rgyud): gyi ni mngon mtho ga zhes bya'i dang bskur bshad pa'o// khams kun rang bzhin glang po dang / rte na mchog tu 'bar ba'am// seng ge'i gdan gnas dbang bskur ba// dpal gyi sngags ni brjod byed cing // dpal
239a3(rgyud): gyi mngon mtho zhes bya ba'o// dam pa'i don gyis dbang bskur ba/ bkra shis sam ni dpal be'u/ ka/ gang yang bris nas dbang skur bya// sangs rgyas dpa' bo thams cad kyis// rnam rgyal dbang bskur zhes bshad// 
239a4(rgyud): tsan dan chu dang bum pa che// gzhan gyis mi thub sman blugs pa//  na nas dbang bskur ched du ni// rtag tu shes rab can gyis brtag/ gzhan gyis thub dbang bskur mchog dkyil 'khor gang gang bras
239a5(rgyud): byas byas// phyag rgya gang dang gang bkod pa// de ni de dang de brtag bya// de rnams phyag rgya dam par bshad// dbang bskur ched du/ sangs rgyas rnams// lha de rnams ni yid du 'ong // sman gyi dam
239a6(rgyud): bo mchog gyur pa// sangs rgyas kun gyis rab tu bshad// tsan dan dang ni rgya spos dang // ga pur de bzhin gur gum dang // a ga ru dang lha yi shing // tsan dan dmar po nyid dang ni// sa~M hA b+haglau de bzhin mchog/ 
239a7(rgyud): kunas sa ha da ba dang / gi ri kar Na tshangs mchod sbyin// sman gyi dam pa rnams bshad// lhag gnas kun gyi sbyor ba yis// sangs rgyas mchod pa rab 'jug cing // dang po rdo rje dbang bskur ba// shes rab
239a8(rgyud): thams cad rang 'jug byed// rin chen dam pa'i dam pa ni// gsar la sogs kyis thams cad nas// sman kun dang ni sa bon kun// 'bru rnams thams cad bzang po ni// sangs rgyas byin ribs rnal 'byor
239b1(rgyud): las da dang bskur don du rab brtag bya// sangs rgyas kun gyi rnal 'byor che// dbang bskur dam pa 'od 'bar ba'o// sangs rgyas kun nas sangs rgyas 'gyur// ces pa'o// dpal rdo rje snying po rgyan gyi rgyud/ 
239b2(rgyud): du ji ltar rnyed pa rdzogs// // rigs gzugs skal bzang mang thos blo 'byor sogs/ dun tshogs ldan pa dpal ldan chos rje yis// rgyud 'di bsgyur las cung zad ma rdzogs par// dpal ldan
239b3(rgyud): gris brtan pas rdzogs par bsgyur// #// rgya gar skad du/ shrI badz+ra maN+Da a lang kAr na me ma hA tan+da rA Ni/ bod skad du/ dpal rdo rje snying po rgyan ces bya ba'i rgyu kyi rgyal po chen po// bla ma
239b4(rgyud): dang 'jam pa'i dngas kyi zhabs kyi pad+ma la spyibs gus par phyag 'tsha'o// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus cig na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje dang / 
239b5(rgyud): nor bu dang / rin po che dang / pad+ma dang / las kyis byin gyis par/ khas pa'i dam tshig gi ye shes rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i/ khyad par dang ldan pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rin
239b6(rgyud): po che'i cod pan khams gsum pa'i chos kyi rgyal por dbang bskur ba brnyas pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje dam tshig gau ye shes rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po de bzhin gshegs
239b7(rgyud): pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi phyag rgya brnyes pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya thams cad mnyam pa nyid thugasu chud cing / las sna tshogs mdzad pa/ ma lus shing lus pa med
239b8(rgyud): pa'i sems can gyi khams thams cad kyi rab thams cad yongasu rdzogs pa'i rdo rje'i las mdzad pa/ zugs rje chen po rnam par snang mdzad chen po rtag pa dus gsum du gnas pa'i sku dang gsu
240a1(rgyud): dang thugs rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis brten cing bsngags pa'i nor burin po che chen po dang ldan pa// kha dog rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i dril
240a2(rgyud): bu btags pa / rlung gas bskyod pa'i dar gyi ba dan dang / me tog gi chun po dang / dra ba dang dra ba byed pas klubs shig la mdzes pa/ chos kyi dbyings thams cad legs par yongasu dag pa/ chos kyi
240a3(rgyud): dbyings kyi khang bzang 'od mtho' yas pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin tsug lag khang mo tog gi 'khri shing mchog gi snying po'i rgyan gyis bkod pa 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud rgya mtsho rab
240a4(rgyud): tu bkram pa sprin na mkha'i khams yongasu khyab pa/ de bzhin gshegs pas byin gyis brlabs pa/ mtha' las 'das pa'i sangs rgyas 'khrungs pa'i dbus// rnam par snang mdzad kyi snying po gsal ba'i
240a5(rgyud): gzhal med khang // de bzhin gshegs pa'i gnas/ rdo rje snying po/ 'i rgyan// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku dang gsung dang thugs/ rdo rje/ de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'drung / mi 'gog/ 'gog par
240a6(rgyud): mi 'gyur ba'i yan lag gi sgyid yul/ yang dag pa'i mtha' gsol ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thams cad mkhyen ba'i ye shes kyi yug chos kyi dbyings kyi snying po'i khang bzang / 
240a7(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ya shes kyi sku/ de bzhin gshags pa thams cad kyi byang chub kyi snying po sa chen po'i dam pa la bzhug so// de la sangs rgyas kyi zhing thaMd kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul dang
240a8(rgyud): mnyam pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis yongasu bskor shing mdun du bdar te chos ston par mdzadado// thog mar dag gabar du dge gatha mar
240b1(rgyud): / dge bdon babang po// tshig 'bru bzang po ma 'dres pa/ yong su rdzogs pa/ yongasu dag pa/ yongasu dkar / chos thams cad kyi tshul rnam par dag pa'i sgo ston pa mdzado// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhi
240b2(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang thugs rdo rje gnyisu med pa mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi nyi ma/ rnam par rgyal ba'i dam
240b3(rgyud): tshig gi 'byung gnas rdo rje snying po// chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid kyis rnam par dag pa'i ye shes mnyam pa nyid brnyes pa rgya mtsho lngar zab pa/ las sna tshogs pa'i phyag rgya'i ye shes thob pa/ 
240b4(rgyud): sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rjen mkha' lta bu/ sku chen po rdo rje'i sku/ mtha' las 'das pa'i sku// sku rin po che chos kyi sku// sprul pa'i sku/ las mnyam pa nyid kyi sku/ byang chub kyi sems
240b5(rgyud): don yod pa/ yongasu bsdus pa/ dge ba 'phel ga rgyal po chen po snang ba tog/ band pa po/ chos dang ldan pa shi sa rab 'khor lo// skad thams cad pa/ sna tshogs pa can/ srung
240b6(rgyud): ba po// gnod sbyin can/ mtshams sbyor ba// gtsug tor du gyur pa/ mchog ldan/ rdo rje can/ 'khor lo can/ ye shes can/ khyab bdag chen po// sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje na mkha'i dbyings
240b7(rgyud): thams cad du legs par bzhugs pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad yang dag par 'du bar byed pa/ rdo rje'i dbyings thams cad khong du chud pa'i ye shes sems dpa' nam pa'i khams
240b8(rgyud): thams cad kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul dang mnyam pa'i rdo rje'i byin rlabs kyi ye shes snying po// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bla na med pa'i rdo rje rin po che'i dbang bskur ba chen po'i dam tshig
241a1(rgyud): na mkha'i khams thams cad du spros pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i mngon par shes pa mngon par byang chub par gyur pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag nyid kyi ngo bo rnam
241a2(rgyud): bar dag pa de yis chos thams cad rang bzhin gyi dag ga/ namakha' thams cad la khyab pa po// gzugs thams cad yongasasu mthong ba ye shes kyis ma lus shing lus pa med pa'i sems can 'dul
241a3(rgyud): ba'i spyod pa mchog dang ldan gang bzhin gshegs pa thams cad don yod pa'i bka' lung mdzad pas sems can tha~Md mnyam pa nyid bla na med pa'i las sna tshogs pa can/ rnam snang mi 'gyur mi bskyed
241a4(rgyud): bzhin chen rtog ste 'od byed pa// 'od dpag med pa rgyal ba'i mgon// don yod pa ni las kun byed// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi me long lta bu'i ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor/ 
241a5(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid kyiye shes rab la rab tu gnas gang bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi so so ra rtogs pa'i ye shes gnyisu med pa brnyes pa/ 
241a6(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bya ba bsgrub pa'i ye shes yang dag par rje su thob pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag pa/ chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid
241a7(rgyud): kyi ye shes kyi spyod yug de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gnyisu med cing mnyam pa nyid dmigs pa'i ye shes yongs dag par mthar phyin pa/ stong pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyid dang / yang
241a8(rgyud): dag pa'i mtha' dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi po dag gis sangs rgyas kyi ye shes kyi yul du gyur go sangs rgyas kyi yul mnyam pa nyid la dmigs/ 
241b1(rgyud): pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po nyid la byin gyis brlabs nas/ phyogs dang mtshams rnamasu kun tu gnaso// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rnal
241b2(rgyud): 'byor gyi dbang phyug gis 'jam dpal gzho nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal khyod kyi sangs rgyas thams cad dang rdo rje 'dzin pa rnam spyan drongs shig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad
241b3(rgyud): bka' stsal pa dang // 'jam dpal gnon 'khor los bsgyur ba chen po rab tu dgyes pa rog la ras kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang // rdo rje 'dzin pa rnams spyan drang ba'i don du rdo rje
241b4(rgyud): sa gol brdabs ta de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad bsngo ba'i snying po chen po 'di chad du brjod pa/ bud+d+ha sa mA dza AH/ hA oM hU badz+ra sa mA dzaHde nas de skad ces brjod pas de bzhin
241b5(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad dang / rdo rje 'dzin pa rnams kyis/ 2garten gyi me tog gi gzhi'i snying po'i rgyan bkod pa'i rgyu nga/ rab 'bam rgya mtsho'i sprin yang dgra par mtho // 
241b6(rgyud): de nas yang 'jam dpal gzho nur gyur pas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad la/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams bad kyis lhan cig yang dag por sbyar nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams
241b7(rgyud): cad kyi rdo rje blo'i ye shes yongs bskyed// gnas thams cad du rnam par gan so// de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i rang bzhin rnal
241b8(rgyud): 'byor gyi dbang phyug gis/ de bzhi ni gshegs pa thams cad nyid du bdag nyid byin gyis brlabs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa de rnams dang / rdo rje 'dzin pa rnams la bka' stsal pa// 
242a1(rgyud): kye de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad thams cad mkhyen pa'i yes rkye kyi 'khor los bsgyur ba chen po'i snying po bdag la yod pa dang bshad par bya'o// de bzhin gshegs
242a2(rgyud): brnams kyi byin gyis rlobs shig/ glu de nas mi bskyod de bzhin gshegs pa dang / rin chen 'byung gnas de bzhin gshegs// de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dngag med// don yod grub pa de bzhin
242a3(rgyud): gshegs/ gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang lhan cig de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs dpal gyi be'u la rab tu zhug so// zhugs pa tsam gyis de bzhin gshegs
242a4(rgyud): ba thams cad 'khor lo la bde ba thams cad yang dag par ston to// de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad zhal bzhir gyur te/ zhal bzhi po rnams kyi nas ci dbyings dang
242a5(rgyud): namakha'i khams mtha' med pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yul chos kyi tshul mngon par btags pa 'di nyid dbangs kyi ched du brjod pa 'di lta ste/ rab tu dga' ba rnam pa
242a6(rgyud): dag pa'i gnas gang yin pa de ni 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' gnaso// lte ba rnam par dag pa'i gnas gang yin pa de ni 'di lta ste byang chub sems dpa' gnaso// dga' ba rnam
242a7(rgyud): par dag pa'i gnas gang yin pa de ni 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i gnaso// sred pa rnam par dag pa'i gnas gang yin pa den 'di lta ste byang chub sems dpa'i gan so// 'dod chags/ 
242a8(rgyud): rnam par dag pa'i gnas gang yin pa de ni 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i gnaso// zhe sdang rnam par dag pa'i gnas gang yin pa de ni 'di lta ste byang chub sems dpa'i gnaso// gti
242b1(rgyud): rug rnam par dag pa'i gnas gang yin pa de ni 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i gan so// nga rgyal rnam par dag pa'i gnas gang yin pa de ni 'di lta ste byang chub sems dpa'i gnaso// mi lom
242b2(rgyud): ba rnam par dag pa'i gnas gang yin pa de ni 'di lta ste byang chub sems dpa'i gnaso// yid sim pa rnam par dag pa'i gnas gang yin pa de ni 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i gnaso// snang / 
242b3(rgyud): ba rnam par dag pa'i gnas gang yin pa de ni 'di lta ste byang chub sems dpa'i gran so// lus rnam par dag pa'i gnas gang yin pa de ni 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i gnaso// ngag
242b4(rgyud): rnam par dag pa'i gnas gang yin pa de ni 'di ni 'di lta ste byang chub sems dpa'i gan so// yid rnam par dag pa 'i gnas gang yin pa de ni 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems
242b5(rgyud): bi'i gan so// gzugs rnam par dag pa'i gnas gang yin/ ba de ni 'di lta sde byang chub sems dpa'i gan so// sgra rna ma par dag pa'i gnas gang yin pa de ni 'di lta ste/ 
242b6(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa'i gnaso// dri rnar dag pa'i gnas gang yin pa de ni 'di lta ste byang chub sems dpa'i gnaso// ro rnam par dag pa'i gnas gang yin pa de ni 'di lta ste/ bang
242b7(rgyud): chub sems dpa'i gan so// reg pa rnam par dag pa'i gnas gang yin pa de ni 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i gan so// dngos po thaMng rnam par dag pa'i gnas gang yin pa de ni
242b8(rgyud): 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i gan so// de rgyu ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar chos zad ni rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pa ste/ chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis rnar dag pas shes ra
243a1(rgyud): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongasu dag pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis nga skad ces bka' stsal nas/ gsang sngags thams cad kyi dbang phyug gsang sngags thams cad kyi 'dren pa
243a2(rgyud): bo sngags tha~Md kyi bla mar gyur pa/ thams cad gtsug tor 'khor los bsgyur ba/ bstan pa la brdzi ba med pa/ 'khor los bsgyur ba'i snying po bka' stsal pa/ b+h+rUM 'jam dpal gang la las chos
243a3(rgyud): thad bsdus pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i snying po lan cig tsam yang thos na de'i byang chub pa'i ngan sang rnamasu ldang ba kyi snying po la thug pa'i bar du// sgrib pa zed chod pa dang / nyon mongs
243a4(rgyud): ba'i sgrib pa dang / chos kyi sgrib pa dang / las kyi sgrib bu chen po nye bar bsags kyang / nems kyang dmyal ba la sogs pa'i ngan song rnamasu ltung bar mi 'gyuraro// sdig pa rnams byas pa tsam
243a5(rgyud): na yang sdug bsngal med cing zad par 'gyuraro// gang gi sa 'di 'chang ba dang / nyi ma re re 'don pa dang / klog pa dang / rgyun ma chad par tshul bzhin yid la byed pa de ni/ skye ba 'di nyid la chos
243a6(rgyud): ze mnyam pa nyid rje lnga'i ting 'dzin so sor thob nas chos zad kyi dbang phyug tu 'gyuraro// chos thams cad dga' zhing mgu ma rab tu dga' ba myong bar 'gyur// byang chub sems dpa' chen
243a7(rgyud): po skye ba bcu drug na/ de bzhin gshegs pa nyid dag// rdo rje 'dzin pa nyid thob par 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnor snang mdzad kyis slar yang shes rab kyi
243a8(rgyud): rab tu phyin pa'i chul/ de bzhin gshegs pa dzad kyi zhi ba'i chos nyid mngon par byang chub yang Ta sgrub pa 'di ston par mdzad// rdo rje bstan pa nyid kyis rdo rje mnyam pa nyid mngon par rdzog
243b1(rgyud): par byang chub pa'i byang chub chen po dang / den gcig pa nyid kyis don mnyam pa nyid mngon par byang chub pa'i byang chub chen po dang / rang bzhin rnam par dag pas chos nyid mnyam pa nyid mngon par
243b2(rgyud): byang chub pa'i byang chub chen po dang / rnam par rtog pa dang / rnar mi rtog pa nyid las thams cad mnyam pa nyid mngon par byang chub pa'i byang chub chen po ste/ 'jam dpag gang la las chos
243b3(rgyud): kyo gnas bzhi po 'di nyan par byed pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / 'don pa dang / sgom par byed na ji srid byang chub snying po la gnas kyi bar du/ sdig pa thaMd la kun tu spyod pa tha~Md kyang sdig pa thams cad la
243b4(rgyud): 'das par 'byung zhing / myur du bla na med pa yang / dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par byang chub par 'gyur// / aM da nA yang bcom ldan 'das bdug pa thad 'dul ba de bzhin
243b5(rgyud): gshegs pa shAkya thub pas chos thams cad mnya ma pa nyid rnam par rgyal bas bsdus pa zhes bya ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par sgrub pa bka' stsal pa/ 'dod
243b6(rgyud): chags kyi spros pa med pa'i phyir 'dod chags spros pa med pa'o// zhe sdang gi spros pa med pa'i phyir ni sdang spros pa med pa'o// gti mug gi spros pa med pa'i phyir gti mug spros pa med
243b7(rgyud): pa'o/ chos thaMd spros pa med pa'i phyir chos zadade spros pa med pa'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa spros pa med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa spros pa med par rig par bya'o// 
243b8(rgyud): 'jam dpal gang la la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di nyan pa dang badzin cing 'don la klog par byed na de 'dul ba'i dbang nye bar bzung nas khams gsum du skyes pa'i
244a1(rgyud): sems can rnams bsad par gyur kyang ngan song du 'gro bar mi 'gyur zhing myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ba'i byang chub par 'gyuraro// hUM de nas
244a2(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pa'i chos nyid brnyes po'i de bzhin gshegs pa slar yang chos thaMd spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug ye shes kyi phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i shes
244a3(rgyud): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di bka' stsal pa// 'dod chags thams cad rnyer dag pa'i phyir 'jig rten na yul thams cad rnam par dag pa nyid du 'jug par 'gyur// zhe sdong thams
244a4(rgyud): cad rnar dag pa'i phyir 'jig rten na sdig padzad rnam parang gu ba nyid du 'jug par 'jug ches thams cad rnam par dag pa'i chos 'jig rten mches meng rnam par dag pa nyid du 'jug par 'gyur
244a5(rgyud): ros thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes rnar dag pa'i phyir 'jig rtenan thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes rnam par dag pa nyid/ du 'jug par 'gyuraro// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnar
244a6(rgyud): dag pa'i phyir 'jig rten na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa nyid du 'jug par 'gyur// 'jam dpal gang la las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di nyan par byed// 'dzin cing 'don la/ 
244a7(rgyud): sgom par byed na de 'dod pa zad kyi nang gnas kyang pad+ma lta bur 'dod chags kyi skyer blo bur ba'i dri mas gos par mi 'gyur zhing / myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par byang / 
244a8(rgyud): chub par 'gyuro// hrIHde nas bcom ldan 'das khams gsum pa thaMd kyi bdag po de bzhin gshegs pas slang yang / de bzhin gshegs pa thaMd dbang bskur ba'i 'byung gnas ye shes snying po zhes
244b1(rgyud): byab shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshal bka' stsal pa// dbang bskur byin pas khams gsum po thams cad kyi rgyal srid yongasu thob par 'gyur ro// don gyi sbyin pas tha~Md kyi bsam pa yongasu rdzogs par
244b2(rgyud): 'gyuraro 'chos kyi sbyin pas chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid thob por 'gyuraro// zang zing gi sbyin pas thaMd kyi lus dang ngag dang yid bde ba thob par 'gyuraro// hUM de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
244b3(rgyud): ba tha~Md kyi ye shes kyi phyag rgya mnyes pa thams cad kyi khu tshur 'chang ba de bzhin gshegs pa rtag pas slar yang de bzhin gshegs pas tha~Md kyi ye shes phyag rgya byin gyis brlazlas pa rdo rje zhes
244b4(rgyud): bya ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul bka' stsal pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku'i phyag rgya yongasu bzung bas de bzhin gshegs pa thaMd nyid du 'gyur ba dang / gsung gi
244b5(rgyud): phyag rgya yongasasu bzung bas chos zad thob pa'i don du 'gyur ba dang / gzugs kyi phyag rgya yongasasu bzung bas ting 'dzin thaMd thob/ pa'i don du 'gyur ba dang / rdo rje'i phyag rgya yongasu gzung bas
244b6(rgyud): sku dang gsung dang thugs thams rdo rje mchog tu 'grub pa'i don du 'gyur te/ 'jam dpal gang la las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di nyan par byed/ 'dzin cing 'dod la 'chad cing sgom par
244b7(rgyud): byed na/ da dngos grub thaMd dang / phun sum tshogs pa thams cad dang / ye shes thams cad dang / las thaMd dang / sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje sems dpa' mchog gi dngos grub thed so sor thob par
244b8(rgyud): 'gyur zhing myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par byang chub par 'gyur// A de nas bcom ldan 'das cho ga thams cad spros pa med pa'i de bzhin gshegs
245a1(rgyud): ba slang yang rdo lde yi ge'i 'khor lo bskor ba zhes bya ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu zin pa'i tshul bka' stsal pa/ rang bzhin med pa'i chub kyis chos tshad stong pa nyid dang / chos
245a2(rgyud): thams cad mtshan pa med pa nye bar gzung ba'i phyir chos ba mtshan mas dben pa dang / smon pa las nye bor grol ba'i phyir chos thams cad smon pa med pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yong su dag
245a3(rgyud): pa'i phyir chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'o// oM de ram pa'o pa de bzhin brtse pa tha~Md kyi 'khor lo'i nang du gnas pa'i de bzhin gshegs pas slar yang 'khor lo chen por 'jug pa zhes bya
245a4(rgyud): pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul bka' stsal pa/ rdo rje mnyam pa nyid la zhugs nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor lo 'jug par 'gyur ba dang / don mnyam pa nyid
245a5(rgyud): la zhugs nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i 'khor lor 'jug/ bar 'gyur ba dang / chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid la zhugs/ nas dam pa'i chos kyi 'khor lor 'jug par 'gyur
245a6(rgyud): ba dang las mo rnam pa nyid la zhugs pas 'khor bde du 'jug par 'gyuraro// spu de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa nged kyi mchod pa'i cho ga rgyas pa'i snod de bzhin gshegs pa sngar/ 
245a7(rgyud): yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchod pa thams cad kyi mchod pa dam pa zhes bya ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul bka' stsal pa/ byang chub kyi sems bskyed pas dri bzhin gshes
245a8(rgyud): bzad kyi mchod pa'i cho ga rgyas pa dang / sen gyi khams thams cad mo su skyeb pas dobonan gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchod pa'i cho ga rgyas pa dong / chos zad yongasu rung bas de bzhin pa/ 
245b1(rgyud): pathams cad kyi mchod pa'i cho ga rgyas pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'dri ba dang / 'drir 'jug pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / 'don pa dang / brjod pa dang / sdom pa sngon du 'gro ba'i las kyi de bzhin gshes/ 
245b2(rgyud): bzad kyi mchod pa'i cho ga rgyas pa'o// oM de nas bcom ldan 'das gdug pa thams cad 'dul ba'i nus pas de bzhin gshegs pas slar yang sems can thams cad 'dul ba'i ye shes snying po
245b3(rgyud): zhes bya ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di bka' stsal pa/ sems can tha~Md mnyam pa nyid pas khro ba mnyam pa nyid dang / son thams cad 'dul ba nyid pas khro ba 'dul ba nyid dang / sems can
245b4(rgyud): thaMd chos nyid nyid pas khro ba chos nyid nyid dang / sen thab sring pas khrab pachis de rgyu ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar sems can thams cad 'dul ba'i byang chub ste/ haH nas bcom ldan 'das
245b5(rgyud): thams cad mnyam pa nyid la rab tu gnas pa'i de bzhin gsheg/ sa pas slar yang chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi mchog ces bya ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i
245b6(rgyud): tshul 'di dka' stsal pa/ zad mnyam pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mnyam pa nyid dang / thad kyi don nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i don nyid dang / chos thams cad mnyam pa
245b7(rgyud): nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i chos mnyam pa nyid dang / thams cad las nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las nyid du rig par bya'o// hrIng de nas bac+doMs de bzhin gshegs pa
245b8(rgyud): thams cad kyis slar yang de bzhin gshegs pa zed byin gyis rlob pa zhes bya ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'od bka' stsal pa/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po ra / 
246a1(rgyud): nyi thams cad pas sems can thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po dang / rdo rje'i snying pos dbang bskur bas sems can pa rje rtsa'i snying po drang / rin pa cha da kyi dang
246a2(rgyud): bskur bas sems can thaMd rin po che'i snying po dang / ngag thaMd la rab tu 'jug pas sems can thams cad chos kyi snying po dang / las thams cad byed pa'i sbyor bas sen thams cad kyi snying po
246a3(rgyud): 'o hrIHde nas bcom ldan 'das mtha' las 'das shing mu med pa'i mthar phyin pa'i de bzhin gshegs pas slar yang mu med cing mthar byin po'i chos dang / slar yang 'di'i rtog pa dang
246a4(rgyud): yongasu mthar thug pa byin gyis brlab pa'i don du chos tha/ de mnyam pa nyid yongasu mthar thug pas byin gyis brlabs pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di bka'
246a5(rgyud): sprul pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mthar thug pa'i phyir chos thaMd yongasu mthar thug par 'gyur ba ste/ 'jas dpal gang la las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
246a6(rgyud): chu la 'di nyan par byed/ 'dzin cing 'don la sgom par byed na/ de ni dag cing mthar phyin pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa mthar phyin pa la gnas pa nyid kyis sgrib zed las rnam par grol
246a7(rgyud): bas de bzhin gshegs pa nyid dam rdo rje 'dzin pa nyid myur du thob par 'gyur// b+h+yoHde nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad de bzhin gshegs pa de bzhin gshegs patha~Md kyi gsang ba'i
246a8(rgyud): chos nyid brnyas pa/ chos thams cad spros pa med pas slang yid dade pa chen po rdo rje don yod pa'i dam chog ces bya ba rdo rje chos mnyam pa nyid shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo dam pa
246b1(rgyud): thog ma dang / kha ma dang / dbus las grol ba'i mchog 'di bka' stsal pa byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi 'dod chags chen po mchog tu grub pas bde ba chen po mchog tu grub
246b2(rgyud): bur 'gyur ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis bde ba chen po mchog tu grub pas de bzhin gshegs pa thaMd kyi byang chub chen po mchog tu grub par 'gyur ba dang / byang chub
246b3(rgyud): sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa tha~Md kyi byang chub mchog tu grub pas bdud sde chen po rab tu 'joms pa mchog tu grub par 'gyur ba dang / byang chub sems de pa'i chen
246b4(rgyud): bo rnams kyi bdud sde chen po rab tu 'joms pa mchog tu grub pas khams gsum po mtha' dag gi dbang phyug tu 'grub par 'gyur ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnam
246b5(rgyud): kyi 'jig rten gsum po mtha' dag gi dbang phyug ma chog tu grub pas ma lus shing lus pa med pa'i sa na gyi khams yongasu sgyur ba'i sems can bde la ban pa
246b6(rgyud): dang bde ba'i mchog shin tu bde ba chen po 'grub par 'gyur// sde de rgyu ci'i phyir zhe na/ ji srid 'khor ba'i gnasu ni/ mkhas pa mchog rnams gnas gyur pa/ de srid mnyam med sems
246b7(rgyud): can don// mya ngan mi 'da' byed par nus// shes rab kyi pha rol phyin pa'i thab so// ye shes byin gyis brlabs kyis 'grub// las ni thaMd rnam dag pas// srid pa dag par 'gyur phyir// chags
246b8(rgyud): sogs kyis 'dul 'jig rten ni// kun nas srid par rtag sdig byed// de dag rnam par srung don du// srid pa'i ram du 'dul byed/ ji ltar bad+ma legs dbang ga tshon gyi skyon gyis ma gos kyu
248a1(rgyud): bag chags skyon gyi srid pa ru// rtag tu 'gro ban ges mi 'gyur// 'dod chags chen po rnam dag pa/ bde ba chen po nor chen po// khabs gsum dbang phyug thob nas su/ 
248a2(rgyud): de dag don ni brtan par byed// haH'jam dpal gang la la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul gyi sgo'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nyin re bzhin du nang par sngar langs te/ gang 'dron pa dang / 
248a3(rgyud): nyan pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / brjod par byed pa des bde ba dang / yid bde ba zed thob par 'gyur shing / bde ba chen po rdo rje den yod pa'i dam tshig gi dngos grub mchog tu gyur pa skye ba 'di nyid la thob
248a4(rgyud): bar gyuro// smye de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis 'arngam dpal gzhon gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal nyi shu rtsa lnga po 'di dag ni nges par shes kyi pha rol tu byin pa
248a5(rgyud): tshul gyi sgo ste/ 'di ltar/ oM nam/ sarba bu d+d+ha bo dz+dza satwA nAM/ oM za n+do tsit+ta badz+re/ oM sa man+tar+tha dra tsar+ya bI/ oMHnA ma Ni/ oM a ni ro d+ho/ oM dzat+ti b+hI b+hU te/ oM dza tA bai ra waH/ 
248a6(rgyud): oM ma hA rA ga d+harma te/ oM bIr+ya ka ba tse/ oM sarba ga mi ni/ oM badz+ra dr-i D+he ka ba tsi ta hUM phaT/ oM sarba ta thA ga te/ oM swa b+hA ba shud+d+he/ oM pradz+nyA bA ra mi tA dz+nyA na bi shud+d+he/ oM karma bi shwa d+ha ne hU phaT/ 
248a7(rgyud): oM ni sum+b+ha badz+ri Ni hUM phaT/ oM karma rA ga oM badz+ra sU badz+ra/ oM sarba dA ma NI/ oM hraHoM a kA ro mu khe/ oM pradz+nyA pA ra mi ti/ oM hoHbaM ng+ku mo I/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta kA ya a gre/ oM sarba ta thA ga
