248a8(rgyud): ta bAka bi sho d+ha na/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta tsit+ta badz+ra oMHoM s+pho Ta ye sarba a pA ya ban+d+ha nA ni pra ma~M k+Sha ya/ sarba a pA ya ga ti b+h+yaHsaMrbe sa ma ya badz+ra sU Sheg sdig pa dral ba'i phyag rgya dang snga
248b1(rgyud): de brjod pa tsam gyis nga bzhin gshegs pa tha~Md kyis gsang ba mchog gi dngos grub rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po 'am/ de bzhin gshegs pa nyid du 'gyuraro// 'jam dpal 'di ni dge ba'i rtsa ba ma
248b2(rgyud): bskrun pa'i sen rnams kyi rna lam du grag par mi 'gyur zhing / dge bo'i rtsa ba ma skrun pa'i sems can gyis byi ba dang / klag pa dang / brjod pa dang / rim gror bA ba dang / bla mar bya ba dang / rjed
248b3(rgyud): bar bya ba dang / mchod par bya bar yang nus pa ma yin// gzhan du na gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul gyi sgo'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di tha nA yi ge gcig tsam yang thos nas
248b4(rgyud): seni de sangs rgyas mang po la dge ba'i rtsa ba sbyin par rig par bya na/ slar yang mtha' dag ma lus pa rdzogs pa lha ci smos/ 'jam dpal sems can gang la la gang ga
248b5(rgyud): klung gi bye ma brgyad cu snyed kyi sangs rgyas bye ba khra ga khrig la phyag byas/ rjed par byas/ mchod par byas na des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'di nyan par nus// gang du
248b6(rgyud): na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di rab tu spyod par 'gyur ba'i sa phyogs de mchod rten du gyur par 'gyur te gang zag de yang phyag bya ba'i 'os 'gyur ro// gang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yid la gzung
248b7(rgyud): ba'am / glegs bam du bris par gyur na de bskal ba bye'o khrag khrig brgya stong mang por skye ba dran par 'gyur// de la bdud sdig to can gyis bar du mi gcod// rgyal po chen po bzhi po rnam
248b8(rgyud): dang / gzhan yang lha rnams kyi phyi bzhin rje su 'brangs te/ da srung ba dang / sgrub pa dang / srid pa byed par 'gyur zhing / tshul me yin pas dus byed par mi 'gyur la/ sangs rgyas dang
249a1(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' tha~Md kyis dgongs par 'gyuraro// mdor sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dang gang yid la 'dod pa de dang der skye bar 'gyuraro// 'jam dpal 'di lta bu'i thar yon mang
249a2(rgyud): bo 'di ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu byin pa'i tshul gyi sgo'i chos kyi rnam grang so// de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen pos rdo rje'i snying po thams cad kyi rgyan theg pa chen po'i mngon
249a3(rgyud): bar rtogs pa de bzhin gshegs pa tha~Md kyi mchog tu gsang ba chen po mchog tu gsang ba'i dam tshig rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug dam pa chen po 'khor los bsgyur ba chen po bzhis yongasu bskor
249a4(rgyud): 'ardo rje snying po rgyan ces bya ba'i snying po 'di byung // ma tshan nyid gcig par phyir chos thaMd gded naso ma skyes pa 'o// na mkha' dang mnyam pa'i phyir chos thams cad stong pa
249a5(rgyud): spros pa thad spangs pa'i phyir chos zad gdod ma nasayongasu dag pa'o// thams cad kyi sems gsal ba'i ma tshan nyid kyi phyir chos thaMd chos kyi dbyings yongasu dag pa'o/ 
249a6(rgyud): AHd+hU trAM hrIHhUM/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje yi ge'i tshig 'di brjod pa tsam gyis chos kyi dbyis kyi mthas klas pa sangs rgyas kyi yul thams cad de snyed nyid du shin tu
249a7(rgyud): gsal ba rgya chen po snang bar gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi slar yang bsdu bas byon nas de bzhin gshegs pa bad kyi dkyil 'khor chen po'i
249a8(rgyud): bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te 'jam dpal gzho'ur gyur pa la bka' stsal ga/ 'jim dpol de bzhin gshegs pa zad kyi rdo rje snying po rgyan zhes bya
249b1(rgyud): pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po bshad par bya yis nyon cig/ de lags par nyon la rab tu yid la gyis shig dang bshad par bya'o// de nas bac+doMs rnam par snang mdzad chen pos 'jam dpal gzhes
249b2(rgyud): gyur pa bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal khyod kyang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi shes rab ye shes la zhugs la/ de bzhin gshegs pa tha~Md kyi rdo rje'i snying po chen po la byin gyi brlabs
249b3(rgyud): bar byos shig/ de nas yang 'jam dngul gnonur gyur pas bcom 'das rnar snang mdzad kyis gsol ba btab pa'i tshig thos nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa tha~Md kyi thugs kar zhugs te/ 
249b4(rgyud): byin gyis brlabs nas de las 'thon te de bzhin gshegs bzad kyi spyan sdang rnam par gan so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig 'byung gnas// rdo rje sna
249b5(rgyud): bo'i rgyan byin gyis rlob pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ chos kyi dbyings kyi rdo rje chen po snying po'i rgyun de bzhin gshegs pathed gsang ba'i dkyil
249b6(rgyud): 'khor bkod pa chen po bkar stsol pa/ de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// dkyil 'khor chen po mchog gyur pa/ rdo rje snying po gsang rgan po// de bzhin gshegs bkun ldan dag/ rdo rje snying po dang
249b7(rgyud): mtshungs pa// khams rnams thaMd rnam par sprul// sangs rgyas kun gyi bdud rtsi dang // gzhan yang bcud len dang mtshungs pa// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gsang // rdo rje kun gyi rang bzhin
249b8(rgyud): grong grub ni pa la sgo bis garta babs pa ni ni rnam par mdzes// theg bzhi dang ni yang dag ldan// dar dang me tog chun pos spras// grwa yaM cha rnams thams cad dang / sgo khyud kyi ni
250a1(rgyud): mtshams rnamasu// rdo rje rin rnams kyis spras// rdo rje'i thig rnams kyis spras pa'i// phyi rol dkyil 'khor thig gdab bya// de yi phyi rol du bya ba/ dkyil 'khor bdud rtsi
250a2(rgyud): yi ni 'od// khyad par ji lta ba bzhin du// sngags pas kun nas yongs bskor bya// de ltar rnam bzhi'i rnam po dang // ji srid grong ni rnam pa bdun// sbyor ba bdun dang yang dag ldan// dar dang me tog phreng
250a3(rgyud): bas rgyan// sgo dang sgo khyud rin chen ni// yang dag mtho ba legs par gnas// de yi grong gi nang du ni/ ra zhugs 'khor lo 'dra ba ru// rdo rje thig gis yongasu bskor// ka ba brgyad kyis nye bar mdzes
250a4(rgyud): rdo rje ka mdun gnas rnams// dkyil 'khor lnga yis rgyan pa'o// de ltar 'khor lo rnam po gnyis// nang gi dkyil 'khor dang ma tshungs pa// tshad mdzes pa yi snying po che// rdo rje 'khor
250a5(rgyud): los rnam par rgyan// gru bzhi pa dang zlum pa nyid// gru gsum rnam bar yang dag byung // zla byed rnam pa dang mtshungs pa// kyi/ la 'khor rnam pa bzhi slar yang // slob dpon rdo rje
250a6(rgyud): yang dag 'byung // shes rab chen pos rab brtag bya// dbus kyi dkyil 'khor dbus ni// pad+ma chen po 'dab brgyad pa// pad+mar ga'i 'od mtshungs la// sangs rgyas gzugs brnyan bzhag par bya/ 
250a7(rgyud): dkyil 'khor gyi ni dbus nyid du// sangs rgyas thaMd bsdus pa'o// sangs rgyas kyi ni ngos kun tu// shes rab can gyis bzhag bya ba/ dam tshig mchog bzhi rnam bzhi ni// go rims bzhin
250a8(rgyud): du yang dag dri// rdo rje chen po seng ge'i khrin 'khor lo can gyi khyab bdag gzhag// gdugs dkar rgyal ba'i gtsug tor dang / gzi brjid daphung po skal pa che// rnam par 'phro byed rnam rgyal
250b1(rgyud): nyid de bzhin gtsug tor lnga po ni// sangs rgyas skyod pa thed la// yongasu bskor nas snam bu la// dkyil 'khor kun tu bri bar bya// rdo rje shugs kyis song nas ni// dkyil 'khor dag ni
250b2(rgyud): bzhi po ru// mi bskyod la sogs rnam pa bzhi// rdo rje rnal 'byor dbang phyug gi/ mi bskyod pa yi dkyil 'khor ni/ zla 'od lta bu'i mdog tu bya/ rdo rje sems dpa' sogs rgyal po// kun mchog sa yi
250b3(rgyud): dbang drug rnams/ rdo rje slob dpon stobs po che// shes rab chen po so dgod par bya// rin tshon 'byung gnas dkyil 'khor du// rdo rjen chen sogs kyis dgang // rdo rje chos sogs gsang ba yis/ dkyil
250b4(rgyud): 'khor che dpag med pa'o// rdo rje las la sogs ldan pa// don yod gyu zla ba'i dkyil 'khor// gnyis pa 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor du// rdo rje shugs kyis song nas ni/ rnam gzigs la se
250b5(rgyud): sangs rgyas rnams// dkyil 'khor kun tu der ni gyi rgyal po che / khyab bdag gsang ba'i chos dbang phyug/ 'dod pa'i don kun grub pa'i phyir// 'bad pa yis ni bri bar ba// blo gros
250b6(rgyud): rgya mtsho mi zad blo/ byams pa bdag nyid chen po dang // na mkha'i snying po grags chen po// kun tu bzang po nyid dag dang // phyag na rdo rje bdag nyid che// kun nas 'bar bas 'khrugs pa'i 'od// 'jam
250b7(rgyud): ba'i dbyangs ni rigs kyi mchog/ sangs rgyas sras bzang dri ma med// sgrib pa zad nges par sel// de nas sa yi snying po mchog/ na mkha'i mdzod ni mdzod dam pa// lag na rin chen bla na med// ngan
250b8(rgyud): song kun ni 'joms pa ni// dra ba can gyi 'od ces pa// dpa' bo 'di dag gsang ba che// dkyil 'khor 'di dag bri bar bya// 'khor lo da ni dor nas ni// blo gros ldan pas phyir song ste/ shar du
251a1(rgyud): sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// phyag rgya go rims bzhin du dgod// 'khor lo mdzes pa'i dag lags can// rdo rje dpal be'u pad ces pa// gtsug tor rnam pa sna tshogs pa// rdo rje pad+mas
251a2(rgyud): rnam par rgyan// lhung bzed dang ni 'khang sil dang // chos gos kyang ni khyad par du// shAkya seng ge ji srid par// sangs rgyas kun gyis rab tu gsungs// gang zhig dngos grub mchod 'dod pas// de rnams
251a3(rgyud): blo ldan brtan pas bri// byang du 'jig rten dbang phyug gi/ phyag rgya'i tshogs mchog de bzhin te// pad+ma ud pa la nyid dang ni/ spyi blugs lpags pa'i ga yang gzhi dang / dbyug gu'i shing ni mkhas pa
251a4(rgyud): yis dam myong ba ru bri bar bya// slar yang lho ru seng nas ni// lhag/ rdo rje bdag nyid che// slob dpon bdag nyid chen po yis// phyag rgya 'thad pas bri bar bya// rdo rje paT+Ti sha dang ni// dril bu rab tu
251a5(rgyud): mdzes pa dang // dbyug gu dang ni tho ba dang // dbyug pa rdo rje mtshon ba dang / lcags sgrog dang ni rtse gsum yang // 'di dag dpa be'i phyag rgya'o// dkyil 'khor rub tu song nas ni// 
251a6(rgyud): 'jam pa'i dbyas ni blo dang ldan// gsang ba'i chos ni dam pa'i mchog/ brtson 'grus chen po'i phyag rgya gri/ ud pal 'khor lo rdo rje dang // ral gri yang ni khyad par du// thod pa dang ni dag ste nyid// rma
251a7(rgyud): bya dang ni seng ge nyid// phyag rgya 'di ni brtson 'grus che// mkhas pa yis ni dgod par bya// 'khor lo 'i grwa ni legs gnas par// rdo rje skrag mo la sogs bri// phyi yi 'khor lo'i grA ru na/ 
251a8(rgyud): 'dug pa zhes bya sogs// bdag nyid chen po 'bad pa yis// mchod pa 'di dag bri bor bA// paM yi dkyil 'khor grwa rnams// gzugs kyi rdo rje la sogs ming // gzugs sgra de bzhin de dang ni// bad
251b1(rgyud): par du ni ro nyid dang // reg dang chos kyi dbyings dang ni// mkhas pa yis ni dgod par bya// sgo yi nang ni thad du// sgo skyong ba ni dgrod par bya// de bzhin dkyil 'khor gnyis pa ru// rdo rje shugs kyis song
251b2(rgyud): nas ni// go rnams bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi// sum rnams 'bad pas bri bar bya// namapo'i spyan zhes bya ba ni// sangs rgyas spyan zhes bya'o dang // shes rab pha rol phyin ma yang / phyag rgya kun dang yang dag
251b3(rgyud): ldan/ ji srid de bzhin gshegs rig pa// dzad shar du dgod par bya// de nas blo gros ldan pa yos// khyong gi phyog su song nas ni// gos dkar mo dang sgrol ma che// khro gnyer con dang grags 'dzin ma/ 
251b4(rgyud): khyad par du ni dpal bdun dang // mda' bdun dang ni dbyings can mo// dri la sogs pa'i lha mo rnams// blon dang bran mor yang dag ldan// de bzhin pho nya pho nya mo// gsang ba'i phyag rgya lhan cig bri/ 
251b5(rgyud): rdo rje shugs kyis song nas ni/ lho yi phyogasu rab byin la/ ma rA ka/ dang lcags sgrog dang // khab rje rdo rje'i mtshan ma mchog de lta ra bris nas blo ldan gyis// nub kyi phyogasu song nas naM// 
251b6(rgyud): der ni byin nas shes ldan gyis// sgra gcan stobs chen dro bar bya// de bzhin 'dam bu 'dar rgyu dang // lha mo zla mdzes 'od zer 'dra/ dkyil 'khor kun gyi mtshams rnams// de bzhin nye dang skra can
251b7(rgyud): ma 'dod pa yis ni bri bar bya// rab bkra nor gyi blo gros dang // 'gugs pang po nya lnga dang ldan// grA ya~M cha ru bri bar bya// rdo rje mdung rtse zhes pa sogs// sgo yi nang ni thed du// sgo skyong ba ni rnam par 'aM/ 
251b8(rgyud): gzhan gyis mi thub lha mo che// de bzhin ral pa gcog ma mchog/ rdo rje dregs mo lha mo che// rdo rje kum b+hi yang dag bri// de nas blo ldan dkyil 'khor ni// thaMd las ni 'thun na su// shar gyi chan zad
252a1(rgyud): / du sngags pa mnyam par gzhag pa yis// khre tshar gzhan gyis mi thub pa// de bzhin mi gso zhes pa dang // khams gsum rnam rgyal snying po ni// mnga' dag brgya phrag lnga yis
252a2(rgyud): bskor// shar du bris nas sngags pa yis// de nas byang gi char song ste// rta mgrin khrob chen po dang // skar ma'i spyan ni spyad par du'o// khro gnye rim pa rnam bsgyings pa// khro bo blo ldan brtson 'grus che// 
252a3(rgyud): bo nya bran rnams thaMd dang // ma mo stong gis yongs bskor bar// 'jig rten mgon gyis bka' stsal to// de nas blo gros ldan pa yis// lho yi phyogasu song nas su// der ni byin te brtson chen po
252a4(rgyud): khro bo chen po stobs po che// rdo rje mtshan pas lags mtshan pa// shes rab chen pos dgod par bya// khro bo zla ba'i thig la pa// de bzhin khri chen rdo rje 'chang // khro bo gzigs ma stobs po
252a5(rgyud): cher khro bo bdud rtsi'i 'khyil pa dang // rdo rje sa 'og/ sa 'og dang // de bzhin 'jigs pa'i migau can dang // rkang / pas bsnun pa rdo rje mchog/ gsang dang rab gsang rjes 'gro dang // 
252a6(rgyud): bran dang po nya rdzas 'gro ga/ rdzas 'gro can blo khro bo ni// stong phrag gsum dang phyed kyis bskor// de nas bris nas blo ldan gyos// nub kyi phyogasu byin nas ni/ der ni seng ste brtson chen po// gshin
252a7(rgyud): rje mthar byed ces b+ha ga/ gdong drug pa la lag drug pa/ khro bo yi ge 'dun zhos pa// khro bo'i gtso bo stong phrag ni// bdun dag gi ni yongs bskor ba'o// dkyil 'khor cha ni thaMd du// khro bo gtum
252a8(rgyud): bo thaMd bro// de nas blo ldan 'ongs nasu// rang mya nga rgyal ba zad ni// dkyil 'khor kun tu bri bar bya// de nas sngags pa 'ongs nas ni// rgyal ba nyan thos bri bar bya// de nas thams cad bris nas su/ 
252b1(rgyud): de rnams tshangs sogs lha de dag dkyil 'khor kun tu rnam par bri/ dbang phyug che dang khyab 'jug dang // zla ba nyi ma zhes bya dang / gapar brgyad dang ni 'jig rten skyong // rgyal chen rigs ni bzhi
252b2(rgyud): po dang de bzhin sum cu rtsa gsum nyid// 'thab bral rnams dang dga' ldan rnams// 'phrul dga' gzhan 'phrul dbang byed rnams// tshangs pa mdun na 'den pa rnams// tshangs chen rnams
252b3(rgyud): dang 'od chung rnams dang // tshad med 'od rnams dang / 'od gsal rnams dang / dag chung rnams dang / tshad med dag rnams dang // dag rgyas rnams dang / sprin mad rnams dang / bsod nams skyes rnams
252b4(rgyud): dang 'bras bu che ba rnams dang / mi che ba rnams dang // mi gdung ba rnams dang / gyanam snang ba rnams dang / shin tu mthong ba rnams dang // 'ogro min rnams dang / dag pa'i gnas pa
252b5(rgyud): rnams dkyil 'khor zad kyi mtsham su dgod par bya'o// de nas dbang ldan du dbang ldan dang / dbang por dbang po dang / mer me lha dang / ga shrIn+ti R+Sha dang / nga na bral du bder bral dang / rlung chu
252b6(rgyud): lha dang / rlung du rlung dang / lus ngan du lus ngan rnams dang / pha rol gyi shar phyogs khro bo gzhan gyis mi thub pa zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya chen po dgod par bya'o// lhor rdo rje 'jigs byed can gyi phyag
252b7(rgyud): rgya chen po dgod par bya'o// nub du khro bo'i rgyal po chen po gshin rje gshed kyi phyag rgya chen po dgod par bya'o// byang du rta mgrin gyi phyag rgya chen po rnam par dgod bya'o// de lta bu'i gru bzhi pa// 
252b8(rgyud): sgo bzhi pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po dang dang me tog gi chun po dang / sgo khyud dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan sgang gangadra ba dang dra ba byed pas klubs pa// da lta bu'i dkyil 'khor
253a1(rgyud): chen po bris la bsgom par bya'o// de'i phyi rol du 'gro ba lnga po bzhag par bya'o// de bzhin du dbu su ri'i rgyal po lhun po'i chang dbag tshad brgya stong phrag du ma rnam par bsapra
253a2(rgyud): nas de'i steng du rdo rje seng ge ri khril bdugs pa'i bcom ldan 'das gnag par bya'o// da ltar dkyil 'khor rib gyis bkod nas nye bar spyod pa thams cad kyi tshogs mchod nas/ nya bar zhugs
253a3(rgyud): te dgug pa dang / gzhug pa dang / dam tshig gis bcings nas mnyes par byas te/ mchod pa dang / dbang bskur ba dang / byin gyis bas padang / spro ba dang / bsdu ba la sogs pa byas nas/ de bzhin gshag
253a4(rgyud): bzed kyi phyag rgya chen po bsgom par bya'o// de bzhin du sgom pa las blang ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rdo rje sems dpa'i bdag nyid na rdor snang mdzad pa'o zhes bsgom par bya'o// 
253a5(rgyud): de lta bu las langs nas de'i snyengs pa 'chang zhing snying rje dang byam sa pa'i 'dren byed dang mig gis phyogs bcu'i 'jig tu/ na gyi khams mtha' las 'das pa rab 'byam rgya
253a6(rgyud): mtsho'i sprin thams cad du de bzhin gshegs pa tha~Md kyi sku'i sprin gyis kun nas bkang ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa rab tu 'bab pas rdo rje sems dpa'i hUM mdzad kyi phyag rgya rang gi lus la zhugs nas
253a7(rgyud): phyogs thams cad hUM gi yi ge'i sgras rab tu bsgrag par bya'o// bsnun pa bzhis rol pa dang bcas pas phyag rgya la bzlas pa bya ste/ dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings lnga/ cho ga bzhin du rdo rje slob dpa
253a8(rgyud): gyis bkug nas bcug ste bcings la dam tshig la bzhog par byas nas// rdo rjes gol gyi sbyor ba dang / kun nas 'bebs po'i phyag rgyas bdag nyid la dbab ste/ snying po 'di bzhis de bzhin
253b1(rgyud): gshegs pa thaMd dang bdag mtshungaso snyam du bsam par bya'o// de la 'di ni thams cad 'bebs pa'i snying po bzhi por 'gyuraro// a A aM aHbdag byin gyis rlob pa la sogs pa byas nas
253b2(rgyud): slob dpon gyis de bzhin gshegs pa tha~Md dang bdag mtshungs pa yino zhes nga rgyal bskyed par byas nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa tha~Md kyi rdo rje lcags kyu'i saM gol gtogs nas/ sangs rgyas thaMd
253b3(rgyud): spyan drang bar bya'o// de la snying po ni 'di yin te badz+ra sa maH/ a gar+b+ha a gan+d+har+b+ba sarba ta thA gau ta/ sarba bo d+hi satwa pa raM br-i ta khwa t+ye kA ra ha te/ sa ha na so// oM badz+ra sa mA dzA/ a gats+tsha a gats+tsha/ sa
253b4(rgyud): ta thA ga ta badz+ra yo gI shA raH/ satwA na yeHsa ha a haH/ da nas de bzhin ga sh+ya ba thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa' tha~Mng dang bcas pa dkyil 'khor thams cad yongasu rdzogs pa de bzhin
253b5(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs dang / rgyud dang / gzungs rnams dang lhan cig dkyil 'khor du 'dus nas byon par 'gyu ro// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyu
253b6(rgyud): rgya chen po bdag nyid rnam par bsgom nas ming brgya rtsa brgyad pa gton la cho ga ji lta ba bzhin du mchod pa byas nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thaMd bstan par byas nas/ sgo bzhi po rnamasu rdo rje
253b7(rgyud): lcags kyu la sogs pas las byas te/ las chen po dam pa'i phyag rgyas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad gzhug par bya'o// oM sarba tra thA ga ta/ su ra ti badz+ra badz+ra satwa dzaHswA'i soHa r+d+ha
253b8(rgyud): tiSh+ThA tu/ sarba ta thA ga ta ma hA maN+Da li zhes bya'o// de nas gsang ba'i mchod pa la sogs pa rnams kyis mchod pa byas nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la gsol ba btab par/ 
254a1(rgyud): bste/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la bdag gsol ba 'deb lags kyis// sangs rgyas dang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis bdag la byin gyis
254a2(rgyud): brlab du gsol// sems can zed kyi don mdzad du gsol/ bdag la dngos grub zad stsal du gsol/ ji ltar bdag gis de bzhin gshegs tha~Md kyi mchod pa rab 'byam rgya mtsho'i spri rnam kyis
254a3(rgyud): byings kyi mthas klas pa'i sangs rgyas tha~Md kyi yul kun nas bkang ste byin gyis brlab par bgyi'o// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ga' yong su rdzogs par bgyi'o// de nas 'dir rdo rje snying
254a4(rgyud): po'i rgyan chos kyi dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor du slob ma gzhug pa'i cho ga rgyas par 'gyur ba ni// de nas gos dam dar po drag par gzar te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thang la phyag 'tshal
254a5(rgyud): dza bal mo sbyar na'o/ sngags 'dis snyan gros na dang 'a ste/ sa ma ya ho/ sa ma ya s+t+wa~M/ sa ma ya badz+rad+haSh+TA na/ ku ru shwe/ sarba ta thA ga ta sa ma yu me a d+hi ti/ us rbo prad+d+ha rmAH
254a6(rgyud): pra ba sha yan+tu/ pra tI pA la yar+Yu pU dzAny+dza me pra yats+tshaR+ShA br-i biSh+To smai/ sarba ta thA ga ta badz+rA nAr+tha aM lang ka re/ ma hAM badz+ra maN+Da le pra taM ba la yan+tu man+du dzany+tsa me pra yats+tsha yan+mu/ de nas slob dpan
254a7(rgyud): gyis de'i thal mor me tog dkare ba'i phreng ba 'dis btegs na/ nang du me tog ba'i dang sar ma'i rtse mor me tog ri re bcug la de nas sngags 'di brjod cing gzhul par bya'o// hU d+hA rbe/ 
254a8(rgyud): shre d+d+he baHkaHbr-i khi shr-I dz+dza tsA mAM/ a d+hi tiSh+Tha me/ sarba ta thA ga ta sa ma ya satwa pra bi shA mi/ de nas slob dpon gyis de'i gdong g.yogs bcings la/ de bzhin gshegs pa tha~Md kyi mya nga
254b1(rgyud): / las 'das pa'i grong khyer tshe kyi dbyings na mkha'i khams rab tu khyad pa'i sbyor bas de bcug la sngags 'dis me tog gtor bar bya'o// sngags ni/ sa ma yo daM/ sa ma ya ste/ sa ma
254b2(rgyud): yahUM gang la me tog rnams byung ba de nyid de'i lhar byin par bya'o// de nas cho ga bzhin du sngags 'dis dba' par bya'o// na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHta Ta ta Ta/ d+hu ma d+ha ma/ badz+ra ba kra ta
254b3(rgyud): bid+yu dza~M hA dud+haru/ dA ma ka/ ha si tai le bo d+ha ra/ ka ha ka ho/ tsu lu tsu lu un+da muny+dza aT+TaT+TA hi si da ra bi da ra/ badz+ra badz+rod ta badz+ra ne \u0f89\u0fa4 badz+ra sho tri badz+ra g+h+r-i NA badz+ra dan+da kau nA rA ya saM pra biM sha dzar+tha
254b4(rgyud): bA NaM hr-i da yaM mA bi sha/ gur+Na guH/ pUr+N+Na pUd+b+ha/ g+h+nar+N+Na pa ya kUd+b+ha pa ya b+h+ra ma ya b+hU ma ye/ bA ta ya mo Ta ya/ a sha ya dza lA dza lA dza lA yai/ dza lA ya la g+hu la g+hu/ sarba ta thA ba
254b5(rgyud): ta dz+nyA ka ra khra ba ra/ d+harma lab+hA khe dza ya he ha badz+re dz+ha kA ra hUM kr-i ta swA hA// dbab pa'i dam tshigo// de ltar phang nas kyi khyod kyis gang dag pa 'am mi dge pa mthong ngam zhes
254b6(rgyud): dri'o// de bzhin gshegs pa 'am/ rdo rje 'dzin pa 'am/ dge ba 'am/ mi dge bi bdag gis 'di lta bu mthong zhes smra bar 'gyuraro// de nas slob dben de thaMd de bzhin gshegs pa thams
254b7(rgyud): cad kyi rdo rje rang bzhin du yongasu gzhag la mig bcings pa bkrol la dbang bskur ba'i don du dkyil 'khor gyi bzhi pa byas la/ de'i dbus kha dog thams cad kyi 'dra chen
254b8(rgyud): 'dab brgyad pa yid du 'ong ba 'am/ seng ge'i khri rab nyid kyis bris te/ de nas de la dar gyis bgo ba dang / me tog bdug po la sogs pa rnams mchod la/ khyad par du gzugs
255a1(rgyud): dang sgra dang / dr-i dang re dang / rag pa dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan la sogs pa nye bar 'khob dang / dung dang / rdza rnga dang / rnga bo che dang / dung la sogs pa dang / gar dang
255a2(rgyud): grwa rnams kyis legs par mchod nas/ cod pan lnga'i dbang bskur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa tha~Md kyi rdo rje slob dpon gyi go 'phang la sngags 'dis gzhag par bya'o// oM sarba ta thA ga ta badz+reSh+Ti
255a3(rgyud): 2 a bi Shiny+tsa oM badz+ra satwa a b+hi ShiSh+Ti/ oM rat+na yad+hi Shany+tsi/ oM badz+ra pad+ma a b+hi bany+dzi/ oM badz+ra badz+ra a b+hi Shany+tsi/ spyi bo dang / dpral ba dang / mgrin pa dang / snying kha dang / lta ba dang / rkad pa nas rje mang
255a4(rgyud): kyi bar du yi ge'i phyag rgya bkod la rang gi lha gtu gas kyi sbyor bas blta bar bya'o// de de ltar dbang bskur na sa rigs dang 'thun pa'i ming byas nas rdo rje'i tshig rnams bslab
255a5(rgyud): bar bya'o// de la rdo rje'i gnas tshig rnams ni 'di dag ste/ rang bzhin gyis dbyer medo pa'i phyir rang gi lus rdo rje sems dpa'i gnas te/ rdo rje'i gnas 'dis lta ba'i thibs
255a6(rgyud): bo thod nges par 'joms par 'gyur// rig pa la 'jug pa'i phyir ma rig pa rdo rje'i gnas te rdo rje'i gnas 'dis dmigs pa'i dngos po yongasu shes pa la 'jug par 'gyur// hUM mngon
255a7(rgyud): bar 'du byed pa'i phyir mtshams med pa'i mtha' rdo rje'i gnas te/ rdo rje'i gnas 'dis lta bar gyur pa zad du nges par rig par 'gyur// e 'dod chags dang bral ba'i mtha' mnyam pa
255a8(rgyud): nyid kyi phyir 'dod chags kyi mtha' rdo rje'i gnas te/ rdo rje'i gnas 'di 'dod chags 'dod chags dang bral ba'i ched du 'dug/  byams pa'i mtha' mnyam pa nyid kyi phyir zhe sdang gi/ 
255b1(rgyud): mtha' rdo rje'i gnas te/ rdo rje'i gnas 'di nyes pa zed gcod pa'i ched du 'jug/ ma/ shes rab kyi sgron ma mnyam pa nyid kyi phyir gti mug gi mtha' rdo rje'i gnas te/ rdo rje'i gnas
255b2(rgyud): 'das mun pa gsal bar byed par 'gyur// re sems can thams cad seni gcig pa ste/ rdo rje gnas 'dis sems can mnyam pa nyid la 'jug pa'i don dang / sen gyi rang bzhin rtogs
255b3(rgyud): pa'i don du 'gyuraro// hrI sems can thod sems can gcig pa ste/ rdo rje'i gnas 'dis sems nges pa la 'jug pa'i don dang / sems rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba mngon rtogs
255b4(rgyud): pa'i don du 'gyuraro// e sangs rgyas thams cad sa ngas rgyas gcig pa ste/ rdo rje'i gnas 'dis de bzhin ga shegs pa tha~Md kyis rjesu 'jug pa'i don dang / mnyam pa nyid
255b5(rgyud): kyi ye shes rjesu rtogs pa'i don du 'gyuraro// aM/ chos thad sangs rgyas kyi chos te rdo rje'i gnas 'das thaMd mkhyen pa'i ye shes rdzasu rtogs par 'jug pa'i don dang
255b6(rgyud): rdo rje lta bu'i ting 'dzin rdza su rtog pa'i 'don du 'gyuraro// AM bdud kyi las thaMd sangs rgyas kyi las te/ rdo rje'i gnas las thams cad rnaMsu rtogs pa la 'jug pa'i don dang / khas mas pa
255b7(rgyud): yongasu 'das pa'i don du 'gyur// hUM/ ngag thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung ste/ rdo rje'i gnas 'di sgra ji bzhin pa thaMd rje su rtogs pa la 'jug pa'i don dang / brjod pa lnga
255b8(rgyud): 'das pa'i chos rje su rtogs pa'i don du 'gyuraro//  chos thams cad skyes pa ste/ rdo rje'i gnas 'di 'i che 'bo med pa la 'jug pa'i don dang / skye ba dang / rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba'i lam las
256a1(rgyud): 'da' ba'i don du 'gyur// me ches thams cad ma byung ba ste/ rdo rje'i gnas 'di 'gog pa med pa la 'jug pa'i don dang / chos thams cad 'gog pa med pa'i don du 'gyuraro// khe 'di la rnam
256a2(rgyud): gnas rnal 'byor pa// bdag gi de nyid rab rtogs te// bdag gis de nyid rab brtags nas// sangs rgyas kun mtshungs mnyam med 'gyur// de la sogs pa'i dngos grub thams cad dang / phun sum tshogs pa
256a3(rgyud): thams cad dang / gtar thams cad dang / 'khor lo thad dang / rdo rje thams cad dang / ral gri dang / yid bzhin gyi nor bu dang / dngulu chu dang / bcu lan rnams dang / gyen du 'gro ba dang / rkang 'og dang / mi snang ba dang / rig
256a4(rgyud): ba 'dzin pa dang / 'khor los bsgyur ba nyid dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / khyab 'jug dang / dbang phyug chen po nyid dang / byang chub sems dpa'i rnams des myur du 'grub par 'gyuraro// hUM/ yid ni ru
256a5(rgyud): gcig 'gyur ba yis// sangs rgyas rjes dran bsgoms nas ni nyi mi'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// sangs rgyas skug/ zugs bsgom par bya// sbyor ba de yi bka' drin gyis/ 
256a6(rgyud): sangs rgyas kun mtshungs mnyam med 'gyur// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus granas par/ 'od kyi dkyil 'khor rab gsal ba'i// kun tu bzang po phyag rgya che// legs par mnyam par gzhag pas/ 
256a7(rgyud): sgoman lo ni phyed kyi sbyor yis// kun tu bzang po 'dra bar 'gyur// rdo rje rin chen phyag rgya che// legs par mnyam gzhag pas sgom// rgyal po'i dbang bskur nyid dam ni// yang na dbang phyug theb par
256a8(rgyud): 'gyur rdo rje chos kyi phyag rgya che// de ni rang gis brtan por snyam// 'jig rten kun gyi dbang phyug kyang // thob na dngos grub gnan ci smos// rdo rje las kyi phyag rgya gang / de bzhin nyid kyi 'od gsapa
256b1(rgyud): brdo rje'i sbyor bas de bsgoms pas/ rdo rje'i rnal 'byor brtan por 'gyur// de lta ru yi byang chub kyi sems kyi mchog sgom par phyag rgya chen po'i ye shes nyid yi no// 'khor los bsgyur ba'i phyag
256b2(rgyud): rgya che// legs par mnyam par gzhag pas sgom// phyag rgya kun gyi bdag nyid kyi// dam pa'i don nyid thob par 'gyur// gzi brjid phung po phyag rgya che// dam pa'i don du bsgom par ba// gas
256b3(rgyud): ba'i rgyal srid thob 'gyur na// dngos grub gzhan lha ci zhig smos// gdugs dkar gtsug tor chen po ni// dam pa'i don du bsgom par bya// gtsug tor ya shas thob 'gyur na// dngos grub gzhan
256b4(rgyud): lta ci zhig smos// rgyal ba'i gtsug tor phyag rgya che// de ni yang dang yang du skom// chos kyi rgyal srid rnam rgyal nyid// mdor bsdu sa pas ni bor bar 'gyur// rnam rgyal gtsug tor phyag
256b5(rgyud): rgya yis/ dam pa'i yi ge bsgom par bya// legs par rab gnas 'od zer can// dngos grub ye shes thob par 'gyur// de la sogs pa mtha' yas mchog/ chos dbyings mnya
256b6(rgyud): dang mi mnyam pa// gtsug tor rnams kyis legs bshad pa// phyag rgya de rnams bdag nyid mchog// de ltar rnal 'byor pas bsgoms na// lhag pa'i lha ni gcig pu nyid// thog ma tha ma med zhi ba// rang 'byung
256b7(rgyud): mchog tu mi 'gyur ba// sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam sbyor ba// rnal 'bor dbang phyug go 'bang mchog/ sangs rgyas ye shes dri ma med// bdag nyid chen po thob par 'gyur// de bzhin gshegs
256b8(rgyud): pa thams cad kyi gtsug tor dam tshig ye shes kyi phyag rgya rnams// da ni de bzhin gshegs pa tha~Md kyi chos kyi yi ge'i rang bzhin gyi ye shes la bslab par bya'o// zhes bya ba ni rna
257a1(rgyud): dbed pa'i phyir ches thams cad kyi ske swa/ rnam par 'byung ba'i der du shes par bya'o// oM ba a/ zhes bya ba ni chos thams cad ma skyes pa'i phyir ches thaMd kyi sgor ba shad / oM a A
257a2(rgyud): oM aH/ ba zhes bya ba ni chos thams cad kyi sgo sna don dam par chos tha~Md kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad yongasu rdzogs par lta bar ba'o// oM pa no zhes pa bai ri chos thams cad kyi ming dang gzugs dang
257a3(rgyud): shes rab dang / chos dang bcas pa la dbang bsgyur ba'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgor bshad// oM na da zhes bya ba ni 'dul ba dang zhi ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa yong su rdzogs par byed pa'i phyir chos
257a4(rgyud): thams cad kyi sgor garjod// oM daM sa zhes bya ba ni thigs pa med pa da las yang dag par 'das shing yongs nyon mongs pa dang rnam pa dar spong ba dang / zag pa dang bcas pa dang / zag pa med
257a5(rgyud): ba'i sgo nas phung po dang / khams dang skye mched la sogs don ma pa'i bden pa nye bar len pa/ mi dmigs pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgor rnam par gzha'o// oM sU ta zhes
257a6(rgyud): bya ba ni de bzhin nyid kyi rjesu 'gro ba'i chos kyi dbyings la 'jug pa'i chos thams cad kyi sgor rnam par lta'o// oM taM/ ka zhes bya ba ni las kyi rnam par smin pa dang bral ba'i phyir chos thaMd kyi sgor gsal
257a7(rgyud): bor bya'o// oM ka ma zhes bya ba ni sgyu ma lta bu nyid dang dran ba med cing snying rje che ba dang shes rab rno ba las byung ba'i phyir chos tha~Md kyi sgor gsal bar bshad// oM me ga zhes bya ba ni zab mo gting
257a8(rgyud): dpag dkar ba'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgor blta bar bya'o// oM ge dza zhes bya ba ni skye ba dang rgab dang 'tsho ba las yongasu rgal ba'i rang bzhin maM phyed pa'i phyir chos thaMd kyi sgor blta bar bya'o// oM
257b1(rgyud): dz+ra d+ha zhes bya ba ni chos kyi dbyings sosu mi byed pa'i rdo rje yongs rdzogs pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgor blta bar bya'o// oM d+hi sha zhes bya ba ni zhi gnas dang lhag mthong yongasu rdzogs pa'i phyir chos thaMd
257b2(rgyud): kyi sgor blta bar bya'o// oM shi kha zhes bya ba ni gang zag dang chos kyi bdag med pa na mkha' ltar gsal zhing chos thams cad rang bzhin gyi 'od gsal ba'i phyir chos the sgor rnam par gzhag// oM khaM k+Sha/ 
257b3(rgyud): zhes bya ba ni/ g.yo ba skye ba med pas mi zad pa'i ye shes so sor dmigs te chos thams cad yongasu dag pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgor blta bar bya'o// oM k+She dang zhes bya ba ni thams cad mkhan pa
257b4(rgyud): ye shes thogs pa med pa'i phyir chos thaMd kyi sgor blta bar bya'o// oM nge wa zhes bya ba ni gnas dang gnas ma yin pa mkhas pa sa sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongasu sbyong ba'i phyir chos thad
257b5(rgyud): kyi sgor blta bar bya'o// oM thai D+haM nas bya ba ni mthar phyin pa dang / mur thug pa med pa dang / sgrib pa thams cad rab tu spangs pas zad pa dang mi skye ba'i ye shes thob pa'i mchog tu byed
257b6(rgyud): ba'i chos thams cad kyi sgor bshad// oM g+hadz+dza zhes bya ba ni dri mi'i rnam par dmigs pa med pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgor blta bar bya'o// oM d+haM/ lus rnam par 'byed pa ni 'dod chags dang
257b7(rgyud): bral ba'i mtha' nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te rdo rje snying po'i lus so sor thob pa'i phyir chos tha~Md kyi sgor blta bar bya'o// oM kaM/ sems rnam par 'byed pa ni nyes pa dang rmongs pa dang dgas
257b8(rgyud): nyal ba rab tu spangs nas byang chub kyi sems bskyed pa rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgor bltar bar bya'o// oM aM/ ngag rnam por 'byed pa ni ngag gi spros pa chos kyi
258a1(rgyud): la 'am pa dag pa byung chos rnams pad kyi slo gyu// lag shes bya gyu par dpag kyis da par bya chos ga
258a2(rgyud): bar bya'o// oM tshe/ g+ha zhes bya ba ni gcig tu 'dres pa ma dmigs pa'i don dam par gnyisu med pa'i phyir chos thaMd kyi sgor blta bar bya'o// oM g+he/ Ta zhes bya ba ni tsa co dang bral ba dang rdo rje snyams
258a3(rgyud): pa 'dzin pa'i chos thams cad kyi sgor bshad// oM ga pa zhes bya ba ni chos cad dbu ba gdos pa lta bu'i tshul gyis gsang ba'i ye shes gsal ba'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgor ba shad// oM pa/ 
258a4(rgyud): Da zhes bya ba ni 'tshe ba las grol ba'i na mkha' la 'gro ba grub paso+o so sor thob pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgor blta bar bya'o// oM raM Sha zhes bya ba ni tsha sgo mi dpags pa'i phyir cho

258a6(rgyud): pa'i lam yan lag brgyad la 'jug pa'i phyir chos tha~Md kyi sgor blta bar bya'o// oM yaM/ de kho na nyid ni spros pa thams cad rnam par spang ba'i phyir// chos tha~Md kyi sgor rnam par gzhago// oM taMng me skyes
258a7(rgyud): pa'i chos rnam par grol ba'i mtshan nyid kyi dan yin pa'i phyir chos par kyi sgor bshado// oM hu yo su gzung ba med pa ni 'thab pa dang rtsong pa spang ba'i chos nyid yin par phyir chos thaMd kyi sgrar
258a8(rgyud): blta bar bya'o// e hriM/ kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa ni mtshan nyid rnam par dag pa'i phyir chos cad kyi gleng blta bar bya'o// oM ka kha ga g+hang rang bzhin 'od bsal ba'i mtshan nyid bzung ba'i phyir/ 
258b1(rgyud): chos thams cad kyi sgor gnaso// oM tsatshadza d+ha ta/ snang ba ni gsal zhing 'bar ba'i phyi chos thams cad kyi sgor/ oM Ta nar d+hAH/ sgom pa ni chos thad kun tu sbyo ba dang bral ba yang dag
258b2(rgyud): par sdud pa'i phyir chos thaMd kyi sgo'o// oM ta thad d+ha na/ gzhi med pa ni chos thams cad ma 'dres pa'i phyir thams cad kyi sgor rnam par banago// oM ba pha ba b+ha ma/ byang chub ni chos thaMd dri ma med pa'i
258b3(rgyud): phyir chos thaMd kyi sgor blta bar bya'o// oM ya ra la wa mya ngan las 'das pa ni blo bur ba thaMd nges par dor bar mtshan nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings so sor thob cing mngon par shes pa lnga dang ye shes
258b4(rgyud): mkhyen pas sangs rgyas kyis yongs thob pa'i phyir/ chos thaMd kyi sgo dang blta bar bya'o// oM sha Sha sa te/ rnam pa thams cad kyi mag dang ldan pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes rnam
258b5(rgyud): bar dag pa rnar 'byed par byed pa'o zheso// de bzhin gshegs paHmas cad kyi chos kyi sgo rnam par nges pa'o// / de nas gas thams cad kyi gsang ba'i cho ga rgyas par gyu
258b6(rgyud): ba ni sngon bzhin nges par byas nas ni// phyogs kun mnyam pa nyid bsgoms nas// ri rab chen po gru bzhi pa// rin chen du kyis rnam par rgyan// sa kyi ngo'i ste du ma ga/ mdab ma brgyad pa ches bkra
258b7(rgyud): ba rnal 'byor gnas zhes rnam par bshad/ dbang po gnyis ni snyoms 'jug pa// yongasu rdzogs par bdag nyid kyis// sangs rgyas thaMd nyid bsgoms na// de ni bskal pa'i mthar thug gnas// sangs
258b8(rgyud): rgyas kun gyi phyag rgya che/ 'od zer gsal ba'i dkyil 'khor can// rnal 'byor thaMd bsgom par bya// mnyam med sangs rgyas kun dang mtshungs// b+ha ga chen po rnal 'byor che// rnal 'byor pa gnas/ 
259a1(rgyud): mi bzad ba// sangs rgyas kun bdag bsgoms nas ni// sangs rgyas kun dang mtshungs par 'gyur// khams gsum pa yi rgyal srid che// sems can kun la thaMd du// gang tshe rnal 'byor pas
259a2(rgyud): bsgoms na// de tshe dngos grub lag na gnas// rang bzhin gyis ni 'od gsal chos// gdod nas dag cing mi 'dres pa// gang che ye shes mthong ba yi// de yi chen dag par 'gyur// sangs rgyas thang mdor bsdus
259a3(rgyud): ga sna 'byor las kyi sbyor ba yis// gang che rnal 'byor ba sgom na// sna tshogs las ni byed par 'gyur// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi// phyag rgya chen de'i ye shes// 'khor los bsgyur ba rgyal po
259a4(rgyud): ches kun mchogs yi dbang po ni// rdo rje sbyor bas bsgoms na ni// mnyadam med 'khor los bsgyur ba mtshungs// gzi brjid phung po phywa ga rgya che// legs par mnyam pa las ma'i 'bar ba'i
259a5(rgyud): phreng bas 'khrugs shing mdzes// khang rA ga mtshus pa'i 'od/ rje'i sbyor bas bsgoms nas ni// rang nyid gzi brjid phung po ra 'gyur// gdugs dkar rgyal ba'i gtsug tor gyi/ 
259a6(rgyud): phyag rgya chen po bsgoms na ni// 'od zer gsal ba'i sbyor ba yis// sani dag pa nyid du 'gyur// rnam par gsal ba'i gtsug to rgya// ral gri 'bar ba'i 'od kyis 'khrugs/ zag pa mang ba'i sbyor ba
259a7(rgyud): yis nga mnyam med gsal ba'i gtsug tor mtshungs// rgyal ba'i gtsug tor phyag rgya che/ legs par mnyam par gzhag pas sgom// rgyal ba'i gtsug tor sbyor ba yis// de yi rnam pa'i spyod yul lu
259a8(rgyud): rdo rje dam tshig ye shes che// legs par mnyam par gzhag pas sgom// kun tu bzang po'i sogs gzugs kyis// mnyam med rdo rje sems dpa' mtshungs// zla ba'i dkyil 'kho dbus gnas par// rdo rje/ 
259b1(rgyud): sems dpa' sems dpa' cha// byang chub sems dang mtshungs pa'i 'od// gtsug tor lnga ldan stobs po che// rdo rje'i sbyor bas bsgoms pa yis// rdo rje sems dpa' 'dra bar 'gyur// rdo rje rgyal po'i phyag
259b2(rgyud): rgya che// don dam par ni bsgoms na ni// 'gro ba tha~Md 'gugs byed na// sta be gzhan lta smos ci dgos// rdo rje chags pa'i phyag rgya che// legs par mnyam bzhag pas sgom// skye dgu thams cad chags
259b3(rgyud): 'gyur na/ bud med gzhan lta smos ci dgos// rdo rje lags pa'i phyag rgya che/ dam pa'i don du bsgom par bya// legaso ba ni rab gsol bas// bud med thad tshim par bad // byang chub kyi sems kyi phyag rgyar ye
259b4(rgyud): sheso// rdo rje rin chen phyag rgya che// 'bar ba'i phreng bas 'khrug/ das pa'i 'od// dngal ba'i phyogasu gnas pasgom// de yis da thod dbang bskur thob// rdo rje gzi brjid phyag rgya che
259b5(rgyud): me'i dkyil 'khor mtshungs pa'i 'od// snying khar gnas pa bsgom pa ra ba// kun mkhyen ye shas ster bar byed// rin chen tog gi phyag rgya che// legs par mnyam par gzhag pas
259b6(rgyud): sgom sbyin pa'i pha rol phyin pa mchog/ sgrub po dam pas rdzogs par byed// rdo rje bzhed pas phyag rgya che// legaso par mnyam par gzhag pas sgom// rdo rje gnang ba ltar gyur te// de ni skye dgu dga'
259b7(rgyud): bad 'gyur// dbang bskur ba'i phyag rgya'i ye sheso// // pad+ma bud tshon pad+ma la// dag pa'i chos ni mnyam gzhag pas// dam pa'i don du bsgom par bya// mnyam med rdo rje chos dang mtshungs// 
259b8(rgyud): shes rang ye shes rdo rje rno// bsgoms pas de ni rdo rje 'chang // shes rab pha rol phyin dag pa/ stong nyid sbyor bas bsgoms na ni/ dam pa'i don du bsgo mos bya ta mnyam mang 'jam dpangs
260a1(rgyud): dang ni mtshungs// rdo rje rgyu yi phyag rgya che// lags par mnyam par gzhag sgoms nas// chos kyi 'khor lo kun mchog che// mdor bsdus nas ni de yis bskor// rdo rje smra ba phya che// dam
260a2(rgyud): pa'i don du bsgoms nas ni// rdo rje bzlas pa'i nus pa yis// ldem po'i ngag ni de yis 'chad// chos kyi phyag rgyar ye sheso// / rdo rje las kyi phyag rgya che// dam pa'i don du bsgoms na no// kun nas
260a3(rgyud): kun nas rang nyid kyis// rdo rje las ni byed par 'gyur// rdo rje srung ba byams pa che// rdo rje chos zhes grags pa ste// chos kyi sbyor bas bsgoms nan// rdo rje srung ba dang mtshungs 'gyur// rdo rje gnod sbyir
260a4(rgyud): brtson 'grus che// khro bo chen po stobs po che// dam pa'i don gyis bsgom par bya// rdo rje gnod sbyin dang mtshungs 'gyur// \u0f7fkhu tshur phyag rgya che// lus ngag yid kyi de bzhin du// rdo rje
260a5(rgyud): sbyor bas bsgoms nas ni/ rdo rje 'u rur 'dzin par 'gyur// las kyi phyug myur ye sheso// sgeg mos mngon par dga' ba ster// phreng ba yis ni dbang bskur ba// glu mas mdzes
260a6(rgyud): ba'i sgra dbyangs byed// gar mas rdzu 'phrul thob par 'gyur// dri mas bzang po'i dri yin te// me tog byang chub yan lag nyid sgren pas mtha' dag gsal ba'o// bdug pas bdug pa dag la brtson
260a7(rgyud): lcags kyus dbang phyug dgugs byed na// skye bo gzhan la smos ci dgos// zhags pas dbang po 'tshong 'gyur na// gdug pa'i sems can smos ci dgos// lcags sgrog gis ni 'phrog byed dang
260a8(rgyud): tshangs sarba dbang phyug chen po'ang 'ching // 'bebs pas thad 'bebs 'gyur na// dman pa'i mi dag smos ci dgos// 'di nyid kyi sbyor ba yis// chos kyi yi ge mchog gi ni// phyag rgya'i yaM
260b1(rgyud): shes rab sbyor bas// sbyar te byur du sgrub par bya// 'di yi sbyor ba shes par bya// phyag rgya'i 'khor lo khyad par du// spyi gtsug snying kha rkang pa'i bar// yig yis ni yongs gang bang // gzugs brnyan gcig
260b2(rgyud): gis go 'bang gyur// sems rtse gcig gyur bsam gtan gyi// sa la rab gnas pad+ma ni// dbang chen gyis ni gnas zhes bshad// dbang po gnyis ni mtshungs sbyor bas// dbang phyug kyang ni bsgrub par
260b3(rgyud): byang dbang chen dag ni grub zhi pa/ dbang chen gyi kyi las su bshad// chu ni zlum por shes par bya// pad+ma'i mtshan mas rnam par mtshan// zhi bar byed pa'i las dang ldan// zhi ba'i don du de bshad// me ni gu
260b4(rgyud): gsum shes par bya// sum mdo yi ni gnasu gnas/ dbang du bya ba sgrub don du// pad+mo rA ga 'dra ba'i 'od// mngon spyod la ni brtson 'grus che// rlung gi dkyil 'khor brjod pa ste// ral gri
260b5(rgyud): yi ni phyag rgya'i dbyibs// dbyar gyi sprin dang mtshungs pa'i 'od// se ra dang dkar dang de bzhin dmar// nag po yang ni khyad par du// dang po'i dkyil 'khor tshul gyis ni// tha ma'i bar du
260b6(rgyud): rab tu brtag/ dang ba rdo rje rab tu bzhig/ de yi rgya su rin chen te// pad+ma dang ni las rnal 'byor// grub pa'i go 'phang rim par bshad// phyag rgya thams cad kyi ye sheso// / de nas bcom ldan 'das
260b7(rgyud): rtag pas de bzhin gshegs pa zed kyi phyag rgya ye shes bka' stsal pa/ gnyis dang gnyisu med pas yongasu dag pas chos thams cad rnam par grol ba'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o/ 
260b8(rgyud): rtag pa dang chad pa yongasu dag pas chos thams cad zhi ba dang mtha' dang mtha' med pa'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o// bad pa'i sgo dang bad pa mtha' dang zad pa'i mur thug pa dang
261a1(rgyud): ldan pas chos thams cad bdang dang / 'dod chags dang bral ba'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o// mnyam pa nyid kyi mtha' rnam pa dag pas chos bde la skur pa mi 'debs pa'i
261a2(rgyud): phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o// mig lnga las yang dag par 'das pas chos thaMd nas khe'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o// sems can na mkha'i dbyings nyid kyi phyir chos thaMd na mkha'i rang bzhin gyis phyag
261a3(rgyud): rgyas rgyas btab pa'o// chos kyi dbyingasu yang dag par 'du ba nyid ni bar chos thams cad dbyar mi phyed pa'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o// byang chub kyi sems dang tha mi dad pas chos thams cad byang chub kyi
261a4(rgyud): sems kyi phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o// chos kyi dbyings mi phyed pa rim tshun nyid yin pas chos thaMd chos kyi dbyings kyi phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o// ngo bo nyid med pas chos thams cad stong pa
261a5(rgyud): nyid kyi phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o// 'tshe ba med pas chos thams de bdag med pa'i phyag rgyas rgyas bta pa'o// skad cig mad+ha dpas chos thams cad mi rtag pa'i phyag rgyas rgyas
261a6(rgyud): btab pa'o// skye ba dang rga ba dang 'chi ba'i mtha' dang ldan pas chos thaMd sdug bsngal gyi phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o// sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' de bzhin nyid pas chos thams cad de bzhin nyid kyi
261a7(rgyud): phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o// gdod ma nas yongasu dag pas chos thams cad yang dag pa'i mtha'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o// 'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas mnyam pa nyid pas chos thaMd chen po stong
261a8(rgyud): pa nyid kyi phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o// spros pa'i dmigs pa rnar bral bas chos thams cad mtshan ma med pa'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o// rab thaMd las rnam par grol bas chos thams cad smon
261b1(rgyud): pa med pa'i phyag rgyas rgyas bdab pa'o// dngos po mthong bo nyid kyi mtshan nyid kyis na chos thams cad mi rtag pa'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o// phung po lnga po yong su 'dus pa'i mtshan nyid kyis na chos
261b2(rgyud): thams cad ldog bsngal gyi phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o// rang bzhin gyi bdag med pas chos thaMd bdag med pa'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab bo'o// shin tu mi g.yo ba'i pir chos thams cad zhi ba'i phyag rgyas
261b3(rgyud): rgyas bdab po'o// don dam pa'i bden pa yang dag par 'du ba'i phyir chos thams cad bden pa'i phyag rgyas rgyas bta' ba'o// 'tshe ba rnam par mi gnas pa'i phyir chos thaMd dI ra med pa'i phag rgyas rgyas
261b4(rgyud): btab pa'o// mchog tu mthar phyin pa'i phyir chos thams cad 'khrug pa med pa'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o// sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' bcad pa'i phyir chos thams cad ji lta
261b5(rgyud): ba bzhin gyi phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o// 'jal ba'i dbang du byed ba dang dbang du bya ba med pa'i pir chos thams cad sgro 'a dogs pa med pa'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o// dang
261b6(rgyud): ba bos byas pa'i phyir chos thaMd 'jig pa'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o// rang bzhin gyis ma byung ba'i phyir chos thams cad 'byung ba med pa'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o// nga bzhin gyis
261b7(rgyud): ma skyes pa'i phyir chos thams cad 'jog pa med pa'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o// 'gag pa med pa'i phyir chos thams cad gdod ma nas skye bo med pa'i phyag rgyas rgyas bam pa'o// rtog pa
261b8(rgyud): kun tu spyod pa thod dang bral ba'i phyir chos thams cad spros pa med pa'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o// gzugs rnar lta ba med pa'i phyir chos thams cad mtshan nyid med pa'i phyag rgyas rgyas
262a1(rgyud): / pa'o granas yongasasu bcad pa'i phyi chos thams cad nya bar sbyor ba med pa'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o//  mthun pa'i phyogs rnams cad nye bar mau dmigs pa'i phyir chos
262a2(rgyud): thams cad la rnasu sbyor ba med pa'i phyag rgyas rgyas btan pa'o// mngon par 'du byed pa thams cad med pa'i phyir chos thams cad lus kyi rnam par smin pa med pa'i phyag rgyas nus btob pa'o// 
262a3(rgyud): skye ba dang / gnas pa las rnam par grol ba'i phyir chos thaMd 'dus ma byas pa'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o// na mkha' dang byed par med pa'i phyir chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi phag rgyas rgyas
262a4(rgyud): btab pa'o// mtshan nyid gcig pa'i phyir gzugs dang tsher bu dang 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang rnam par shes pa'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o// snying po med pa'i phyir chos zad phung po'i phyag rgyas
262a5(rgyud): rgyas btab pa'o// snying po dang bcas pa med pa'i phyir/ chos thams cad khams dang skye mched kyi phyag rgyas rgyas btob pa'o// sangs rgyas tha~Md kyi sku dang mnyam po nyid thob pas chos thams cad kham
262a6(rgyud): dang skye mched kyi phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o// mtha' gcig tu 'jig rten gyi lam rnar dag pa'i phyir chos thams cad 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o// lha rje su byed pa'i phyir chos thad
262a7(rgyud): phyag rgya chen po'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o// mtha' gcig tu chos la phan 'dogs pa'i phyir chos thaMd chos kyi phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o// thams cad kyi las sna tshogs byed pa'i phyir chos thams cad / 
262a8(rgyud): phyag rgyas rgyal btab para'i/ thams cad dam tshig thams cid rjesu sgrub pa'i phyir chos thams pad dam tshig go phyag rgyal rgyal btab pa'o// sangs rgyas gyi chos thams cad rag tus gnas pa phyi gyi
262b1(rgyud): / khams pad sangs rgyas kyi phyag rgyal rgyas btab par// chos thams cad 'jig rten las 'das pa'i lam gyi phyag rgyab rgyal btab pa dang / theg pa chen por byag rgyas rnas btan pa dang / gsang phyugs
262b2(rgyud): kyi phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa dang / phyag rgya'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa dang / dkyil 'khor gyi phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa dang / mnyam pa nyid kyi phyag rgyas rgyas btob pa dang / rdo rje se shes kyi phyag rgyas rgyas
262b3(rgyud): btab pa dang / ye shes thams cad kyi phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa dang / me long lta bu'i ye shes kyi phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa dang / mnyam pa
262b4(rgyud): nyid kyi ye shes kyi phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa dang / so sor rtog pa'i ye shes kyi phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa dang / bya ba sgra da pa'i ye shes kyi phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa dang / chos thams cad
262b5(rgyud): chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag pa'i ye shes kyi byugaHsa r+thas btab pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi phyag rgya'o// muH'jam dpal phyag rgya'i tshig 'di
262b6(rgyud): dag ni ma mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i ye shes kyi tshig de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyis brlazla ba'i tshig med mkhyen pa'i ye shes yongs rdzogs par byed pa theg po chen po'i tshig sa/ 
262b7(rgyud): ngas pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang / byang chub kyi phyag rgya'i tshig gang gis/ phyag rgya'i tshig 'di rnams kyis kyang chos kyi phung po brgyad
262b8(rgyud): bri bani grong brgyud par byod/ sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi rgyud la phyag rgyam rgyas pa ti 'o// ma ma a a.A/ sngag po pas phyag rgya 'di lha dus rgyas gzha na de bzhin gshegs
263a1(rgyud): da'i las kyi phyag rgya yang dag par 'du'o// sU myur du ma skyes pa'i chos rnams la bzod pa thob par 'gyur// ba de nas da ni de bzhin gshegs pa da kyi sbyor ba thams cad kyi gsang ba
263a2(rgyud): chen po phyag rgya'i ye shes su byur ba ni snying gi dbus rtag bsgom bya// pad+ma chen po 'dab brgyad pa// 'bar ba'i phreng bas 'khrigs pa'i 'od// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus son par// de yi stang du rtag sgom
263a3(rgyud): ba yi ge yi ni gtso bo mchog/ thog mtha ma med ni ba// kha ba ba mo'iri 'od 'dra'o// dpa' bo kun da bla ltar dkar/ nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor ltar 'od gsal// zhi ba'i chos kyi rang bzhin sku// kun mkhyen ye she
263a4(rgyud): kyis gang ba// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gsang // ra sA ya na dang mtshungs mchog/ kha yig mkha' 'drang shes par bya// thig ra le nA das rnam par spras// gsang po chen po mchog tu
263a5(rgyud): mdzes log ma tha ma med pa'i bdag/ de yi steng du 'od der che// 'drar ba'i phreng ba 'khrugs pa'i 'od// rdo rje rdo rje lta bur gnas// spyi bong rtse mo lnga dang ldan// de yi steng du rtag bsam pa// 
263a6(rgyud): yi ge mchog gi go 'phang ngo // man ngag mchog las shes bya ste// gzhan du na ning mi smra// sangs rgyas mkhas pa thaMd kyi// mdor bsdus nas ni 'di gsung so// rnam par grol ba gsum thob nas// thob 'gyur
263a7(rgyud): 'di ni gzhan du mni// lce ni nan la sbyar bar bya// sA yi rtse mo yi ge hUM// dbang po gnyis ni snyoms 'jug pas// phyag rgya'i go 'bad tshig gis ni/ shes rab ldan pas rang sems sgom// snang ba med cing / 
263a8(rgyud): spros med pa// shin tu mchog tu brang shes bya// khyab bdag bsod nams ye shes dngos// bsam bya bsam gtan brtson bya ste/ mig dang sgron ma'i 'od bzhin du// ra yig 'bar ba dang ldan pa// 
263b1(rgyud): / mgrin pa 'ad pas gcus nas ni// dkar po ser po sngon po'i 'od// dmar po yang ni bdag gis spro// 'bang ba 'di dag 'bad ba yi/ 'di dag yang dag nyid mtshon bya// snying bar gsal bar byas nas su// de
263b2(rgyud): bzhin thams cad spyib song // gnas de las ni 'dzin nas kyang // dbang po thams cad dgang bar byas// de las 'thon nas 'jig rten ni/ mtshungs par kun nos thams cad du// slar sang de ru 'ongs
263b3(rgyud): nas ni// de ni 'jug par rab tu bas ma/ yid kyis de ltar bsgoms na ni// rang nyid 'khor los bsgyur lta bun// dbang po gnyis ni rab sbyor bas// lags par mnyam par gnag pas sgom// dbang po
263b4(rgyud): lngas ni dmigs nas yang // mi rnams lus ni dag par 'gyur/ ji snyed bud med yon tan dang / ldan pa kun tu gnas pa ni/ 'akug nas bcug ste bcings nas su// dbang du bya ste
263b5(rgyud): bsgrub par bya// de rnams lhan cig yongs brten nas// sngags pa ma cho ga gi dngos grub thob// gsang ba mchog tu dgyes pa na// / shes ra pha rol phyin pa ste// zhi ba'i chos kyi rim
263b6(rgyud): pa mchog/ shin tu mnyam par gzhag pa sgom// rdo rje sems dpa' dngos grub gang // de 'grub gzhan lta smos ci dgos// mchog ni rtag par shes par bya// bar mas phun sum tshogs pa
263b7(rgyud): ste/ stong pa nyid dang mtshan med mchog/ smon pa med pa zhes su grags// chos kun bdag med pa yi mchog/ kun mkhyen ye shes rdzogs par byed// sa bcu yi ni stobs ngag gis// pha rol phyin
263b8(rgyud): pa thams cad thob// rdo rje sems dpa' mchog bsgoms na// rdo rje sems dpa' 'dra bar 'gyur// de nyid 'di ni bcud kyis len// gnyisu med pa'i ye shes mchog/ thag chen mchog tu yid
264a1(rgyud): / btu stong nyid bsgoms pa bdag nyid can// gnyisu med pa'i ye shes mchog gang gis rtag tu sdom byed na// de yang rdo rje 'dzin rgyal po/ yon tan mchog las skyes par 'gyur
264a2(rgyud): rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par banan// bud med lus ngag yid sbyor bas// yongs reg a ling gtsum pas// mchog gi dngos grub thob par 'gyur// bud med kha dog ljang ku dang / rgyan
264a3(rgyud): rnams kun gyis rnam par brgyan// de tshe 'di ni sngags pas brtan// mnyam med gsang ba'i ye shes mtshungs// bud med gang zhig kha dog dkar// pad+ma'i mdab ma 'dra ba'i 'od// de dang lhan cig
264a4(rgyud): sngags pas bsdad// dam pa'i dngos grub thob par 'gyur// bu mo gang zhig kha dog dmar// ut+pa la yi rgyan 'chang ma// sngags bas de dang lhan cig gnas// shes rab pha rol phyin
264a5(rgyud): mtshungs 'gyur// bud med in+d+ra nI la mtshungs// gsang ba rdo rje rjesu sbyo / rig 'dzin rnams ni rgyal po ni// stobs chen gru ba de 'gyur// gsang chen mar ka ta mtshungs/ gang
264a6(rgyud): gis rtag tu brten pa ni// de yang rdo rje 'dzin rgyal po// myur du gsang ba'i dam par 'gyur// bud med pad+ma rA ga dang // rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par brgyan// dbang po gnyis ni snyoms 'jug pas// rdo rje 'dzin
264a7(rgyud): ma lta bur sgrub// sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam sbyor ba// gnyis med pa'i ye shes mchog/ bsam pas rtag tu sgom pa ni// mnyam med sangs rgyas kun dang mtshungs// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi/ 
264a8(rgyud): mchog gi gnas kyis bsgoms na ni// rnal 'byor mchog gi mi ring bar// rdo rje 'dzin pa lta bur 'gyur// yang dag spong ba rnam pa bzhi// legs par mnyam par gzhag pa sgom// dbang po gnyi/ 
264b1(rgyud): ni snyoms 'jug pas// mnyam med 'jig rten dang phyug mtshungs// se so yang dag rig pa bzhi// shin tu mnyam gzhag bsgoms na ni// rdo rje sangs rgyas ting 'dzin mchog/ mnyam meng
264b2(rgyud): 'jam pa'i mchog dang 'dra// mi 'jigs pa ni rnam pa bzhi// rdo rje'i sbyor bas bsgom par bya// dbang po gnyis ni snyoms 'jug par// rdo rje 'dzin pa lta bu ste// rdzu 'phrul gyi ni rkang pa bzhi/ 
264b3(rgyud): shin tu mnyam gzhag sgom na ni// dbang po gnyis ni mnyam sbyor bas// rdzu 'phrul ldan pa'i mchog tu 'gyur// tshangs pa yi ni gnas bzhi po// tshad med pa yi sems kyis ni// rdo rje sbyar bar bdag
264b4(rgyud): bsgoms na// rdo rje 'dzin pa lta bur 'grub// sbyor ba'i bdag nyid dbang po lnga// dam pa'i don gyis bsgoms na ni// dbang po gnyis ni snyoms 'jug pas// mnyam med rdo rje
264b5(rgyud): sangs rgyas mtshungs// yid kyi stobs ni rnam pa lnga// shin tu mnyam gzhag bsgom na ni// 'khor los sgyur ba brtson 'grus che// stobs 'dzin lta bu nyid du 'gyur// byang chub yan
264b6(rgyud): lagra rin chen bdun// gsang sngags sgom pas bsgoms na ni// rtog pa'i ye shes sbyor ba yis// khyab bdag chos kun 'dzin par 'gyur// 'phags pa'i yan lag brgyad kyi lam// kun mkhyen
264b7(rgyud): ye shes rdzogs byed pa// de ni bsgoms pa tsam gyis ni// 'jig rten shes la rab tu 'ad // rje su dran pa rnam pa drug bdag nyid rtse gcig gis bsgoms na// sngags pa rdo rje 'dzin par// sngags
264b8(rgyud): pa dus mi ring bar 'gyur// stobs bcu pa ni yang dag bsgoms// sgom pa'i rnal 'byor de nyid kyis// bsod nams ye shes yongs rdzogs te// rtag tu stobs bcu'i dam par 'gyur// pha rol
265a1(rgyud): / phrin bcu yongasu rdzogs// stebs rnams dang ni dbang rnams dang // sa rnams kun gyis nges bskyed nas// myur du mtshan ma dag par 'gyur// rnam grol gos kyis bsgribs nas
265a2(rgyud): su de yi nu shin tu bsdun// rje ngar gyis kyang de bzhin du// mchu yis mchu ni yosu bzung // 'bad pas dam du a ling ga/ byang chub sems ni sper par bya// rdo rje ye shes brtson 'grus
265a3(rgyud): / rdo rje dbyingasu bdag brtan pas// rnam pa sna tshogs ka ra na// rnal 'byor shes pa de brten bya// bud med rnams kyi dam tshig 'grul// rdo rje sade' mtshungs par 'gyur// bud med rnams kyi b+ha ga
265a4(rgyud): bsna no// ling ga myur du gang bar 'gyur// sbyor ba 'di ni ma khyen po yis/ stobs cheni sangs rgyas rab tu grug/ gsang ba 'di ni dam pa ste// sangs rgyas kun gyi skyob pa'o// gsang
265a5(rgyud): ba 'di yi sbyor ba yis// yi ge dam pa 'grub par 'gyur// sangs rgyas rnams kyi ma 'dres pa'i// chos su grags pa gang yin pa// de rnams sgom byed gtso bo ni/ 
265a6(rgyud): dngos grub tha~Mng rab tshogs pa'o// ma 'dres pa yi chos bco brgyad// sangs rgyas chos grags pa ste// de rnams sgom pa dang ldan pas// sangs rgyas byang chub rab ltar byed// bsam gtan
265a7(rgyud): bzhi po thob nas ni// gzugs med pa yi rtag par yang // 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug ldan pas// sangs rgyas byang chub sgrub pa po// byang chub phyogs ni sum cu bdun// chos ni
265a8(rgyud): mchog tu rmad byung ba// de rnams bsgom pa dang ldan pas// byang chub sems dpa'i skyeb pa'o// sngags rnams thams cad rab 'grub cing // sbyor ba thams cad thams cad
265b1(rgyud): du'ong des na 'dad pa thams cad kyis// sangs rgyas chos nyid bsgom par bya// 'jig rten 'jig rten 'das pa'i las// ye shes rin chen rab rnyed dka'// mchod dang dbang bskur byin pa
265b2(rgyud): bris rnyed 'gyur gzhan du ma yin// bshags dang gsel ba gdab pa dang // bdag nyid dbul ba de bzhi no// sangs rgyas sogs la yi rang shing // de bzhin yongasu bsngo ba dang // byang chub
265b3(rgyud): sems ni yang dgra bskyed// khyad par du ni dus kun du'o// thog ma bar dang bye ma rang du// ji lta bzhin du rjes bsgoms pas// sangs rgyas zad bsgrub bya ste// 'di la the tsom yod
265b4(rgyud): ma yin// 'gro ba sems kyis spro ba ni// brtan pa 'i snying por legs par bshad// stong nyid de bzhin nyid las byung // rdo rje sems dpar de bshad// 'gro ba bad bkun
265b5(rgyud): nas su// sangs rgyas rgyas byang chub sbyar bar bya// don yod ye shes dag ste// rdo rje rgyal po mchog ces shad// rdo rje chags pas chags gyur nas// rang bzhin gyis ni
265b6(rgyud): brtan par 'gyur/ 'gro ga mo lus khrom med par// de yi sems ni chags par bshad// chos rnams kun gyi rang bzhin gyis/ rnam par den zhing gnyi su med// gang tshogs dag pa'i
265b7(rgyud): bdag nyid mthong // de tshe rdo rje legs par bshad// rdo rje sems dpa'i bzhi po yis/ ming dang brdar ni sbya ba'o// sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam sbyor ba// sdom pa mchog tu dam pa'o// 
265b8(rgyud): khams gsum pa yi rgyal srid che// tshogs gnyis rdzogs par byas pa ste// sa dang pha rol phyin mchog gtso// rdo rje dbang bskur las byung ba/ de bzhin gshegs kun ye shes/ 
266a1(rgyud): rnyog pa med cing yig mang // 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gzi brjid mchog/ brtan pa rtag pa nyid du 'gyur// na mkha'i mdzod ni mdzod chen po// chos rnams bde dbang bsgyur ba// yid bzhin
266a2(rgyud): nor bu rdo rje cha// rdo rje rtog ni bla na med// ye shes snang ba rin chen che// rmad du byung ba nges par mthong // de bzhin gshegs kun gsang ba ni// rdo rje bshad pa zhes su grags/ chos kyi bdag med las
266a3(rgyud): byung ba// gan su med pa'i ye shes mchog/ chos nyid dam pa bsam du med// rdo rje chos zhes bya bar dran// rdo rje blo gros snang ba che// shes rab ye shes dri med mchog/ zag med shes rab chen po
266a4(rgyud): bdadade ni rdo rje rnon por bshad// sangs rgyas rnams kyi chos 'khor lo// gnyisu med las byung bar mtshon// yan la ga bcu gnyis rten 'brel ming // rdo rje rgyu zhes nges par bshad/ 
266a5(rgyud): dgongs pa skad ni spros pa'i mchog/ yul rnams kyi ni bshad pa ste// sangs rgyas kun gyi bzlas pa che// de ni rdo rje smra bar bshad// san kun gyi don la sbyar// sangs rgyas kun gyi mtsha
266a6(rgyud): pa che gdod nas dag pa'i rnal 'byor che// de ni rdo rje las su bshad// bla na med pa'i byams pa che/ bsrung ba'i bya ba gong na med// dag ni chos ni brtson chen po// rdo rje bsrung ba zhesu grags/ shes ra
266a7(rgyud): thabs kyi khro bo che// sangs rgyas kun dang rjes 'thun pa// nyon mongs thams cad zla ba tsho// de ni rdo rje gnod sbyin brjod// lus ngag yid ni yang dag sbyor// sgrib pa med cing yi ge bral// de bzhin ga
266a8(rgyud): pa kun gyi gsang // de ni rdo rje mtshams sbyor bshad// rdo rje ye shes rnal 'byor che// sangs rgyas kun gyi stobs po che// thog ma tha ma med ni ga/ rig pa mchog ces bya bar bshad// de nas yang / 
266b1(rgyud): 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas de bzhin gshegs pa tha~Md kyi rdo rje'i glus de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad legs par mchod glur blas pa/ oM sarba bu dz+nyA ba ra me shwa bad+h+ya shud+d+ha/ 
266b2(rgyud): li hoHsu b+ha gaHsu ra taHma sA ma hA A dI ma hA bo d+hi shun+ya shun+ta/ yo gI shwa ra t+na b+hA bi twAd ma ka ta thA ga ta/ byang chub sems bskyed las 'khrungs pa// sangs rgyas kun la phyag 'tshal lo/ 
266b3(rgyud): mchog gi dbang phyug dam pa'i chos// gdod nas zhi be la phyag 'tshal// byang chub sems dpa'i skyob pa po// rdo rje can kun la phyag 'tshal// de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje che// sangs rgyas byang chub
266b4(rgyud): la phyag 'tshal// mi dmigs go 'phang la gnas dag// mtha' las 'das pa la phyag 'tshal// 'dren pa na mas kyi stobs po ni// hUM gi yi ge ma lus pa// thaMng mkhyen
266b5(rgyud): mama' dag dang // shin tu yongasu mya ngan 'da'// 'jig rten dbang phyug mgon bzang ngo // rdo rje ye shes dri ma med// rnam par dag pa rdo rje mchog// dngos grub thaMd rab gsol byed/ 
266b6(rgyud): rnal 'byor dang phyug rnams kyi mgon// dus gsum bsam pa dbang bsgyur gsan rnams la phan don du// 'byung ba khyod la phyag 'tshal 'dud/ rdo rje snying po rgyan las dkyil 'khor chen
266b7(rgyud): bo yongasu rdzog so// // de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnams slar yang 'dus par gyur nas// de bzhin gshegs pa tha~Md kyi thugs khar zhugs te// bcom ldan 'das
266b8(rgyud): rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po rdo rje snying po'i rgyan gyi dkyil 'khor chen po'i phyag rgya'i don chad du brjod pa// de nas yang dag bshad byab// dkyil 'khor chen po dam pa ste/ rdo rje
267a1(rgyud): snying ba zhes grags pa/ sangs rgyas kun gyi skyeb pa'o// glu banizhi pa la skye bani pa// rta babs bzhis ni rnam par mdzes// sgo byang rdo rjer gzugs brnyan dang / phyag rgya dang ldan rab tu mdzes
267a2(rgyud): dkyil 'khor da yi dbus ni// 'khor lo gnyis ni rab tu gnas// rtsibs brgyad pa dang bcu drug rtsibs// rnar dbye ba lags par brtag/ dbus kyi dkyil 'khor nang gi ni// lte ba'i gnas legs
267a3(rgyud): brtags pa// pad+ma chen po 'dab brgyad pa// ge sar gtams bas rab tu mdzes// da yi lte ba'i dbus ni// khyab bdag rnal 'byor dbang phyug che// rnam par snang mdzad brtson chen po// sems can
267a4(rgyud): kun la rjes brtse bas// de yi nye 'khor kun tu ni// de bzhin gshe dgas brgyad rnams dgod// shar du dgod bya 'khor lo na// gtsug ter dkar po nub du gnas// gzi brjid
267a5(rgyud): phung po lho ru'o// rnam par rgyal ba byang du gnas// dbang ldan rnam bar bsal ba bri// mer ni stang 'gro dgod par bya// steng 'a gro chen po bden bral du// rlung du rgyal ba chen po gan/ 
267a6(rgyud): sas rgyas gzugs brnyan 'dzin pa'i mchog/ rnal 'byor ldan pas 'di dag bri// mi bskyed pa ni shar du dgod// lho ru na 'byung ldan no// nung du 'od dpag med par 'gyur// byang du don yod grub
267a7(rgyud): pa'i mong // zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la brten pa'o// dbang ljon phyogs nas brtsams nas no// rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs bri// thaMd zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gnas// 'khor rnams zla ba'i dkyil
267a8(rgyud): 'khor la'o// phreng ba rnam par dgod bya ba// rang gi phyag rgya 'od zer 'bar// rdo rje sgeg mo la sogs pa'i// lha mo 'bad pas dgod par bya// rdo rje gdug pa la sogs bri// de bzhin gzug
267b1(rgyud): kyi na sogs/ rdo rje lcags kyu la sogs pa// ske srung 'dad pas bri bang bya// byi yi dkyil 'khor la gnas par/ kun tu 'azang sogs rim bzhin dri// rang gi phyag N+DI'i 'khor rnams dang // 'o yin
267b2(rgyud): 'khor dag dang // khro bo rnams dang mngags pa de nin pho nya pho nya ma// rgyo mtsho yi ni dkyil 'khor ni// 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gsal ba'o// phyi ru phyi rol rdo rje'i ming // dkyil 'khor la ni 'dad
267b3(rgyud): bas bri/ dbang ldan phyogs nas brtsams nas su// 'jig rten skyong ba brgyad po gri/ tshangs pa khyab 'jug dbang chen ming // dbang po la sogs lha thams cad// ma mo kun dang sring mo rnams// rgyal po
267b4(rgyud): chen po bzhi dang kye/ de bzhin lha rnams cad dang / brtson 'grus chen po rnamakha' lding // 'thod pa yis ni bri bar bya/ de wA'i dkyil 'khor bris nasu// khyad par du ni mchod bdag/ me tog
267b5(rgyud): dug spos rol mo'i tshogs// de bzhin bza' dang ston mo sogs// / phreng ba'i rgyan ni sna tshogs kyis// de bzhin gshegs rnams mchod par bya// dkyil 'khor kun gyi cho ga
267b6(rgyud): yis/ mchod pa kun gyis thams cad nas// 'khor lo kun gyi tshe ga yis// sangs rgyas tha~Md mchod par bya// de nas slob ma thams cad gzhug/ yong su dag pa khyad par du// byang chub sems ni bskyed
267b7(rgyud): nas su// byang chub bslab pa rjes spyod pa/ cho ga shes pa'i sngags pas gnag/ 'dren pa rnams la mchog tu gzhug/ rdo rje'i dbang bskur sbyor ba yis// dbang bskur ba ni de nis sbyin// seng gi
267b8(rgyud): khri ya~M steng du ni// dang dang me tog tshun pos spas// dkar po'i gdugs dang rin chen tshe// bA re rgya che 'bar ba dang // de yi g.yas kyi drung du n-i// mkhas pa yis ni gzhag par bya/ ba dan rnam pa
268a1(rgyud): sna tshogs dang // sna tshogs ras kyis rang mchod pa// g.yon gyi drung du thad nas// 'thad pa yis ni banag par bya/ rin chen sman kun gyis gang ba ra// bum pa legs par
268a2(rgyud): bzhag byas te// rdo rje ming gi dbang bskur gyis// de la rang gi dbang bskur bya// rdo rje ming gis dbang bskur ba// mkhas pa yis ni slar yang bya// kun gyi cod pan dbang bskur gyis// yang dang yang du dbang
268a3(rgyud): bskur bya// chos kyi cod pan dbang bskur dang // sangs rgyas kun gyi skyib po ni/ sna tshogs yas kyi dbang bskur sbyin// chos kyi dbyings dang mnyam mtshungs pa'o// chos kyi sku yi dbang bskur reg
268a4(rgyud): sangs rgyas kun gyi sgrol ma sbyin// de lta slob ma dbang ba skur ba/ khyad par du ni sngags pas bya// de la dpe tshig cho ga yos// sngags dang phyag rgyas sbyar bar bya// sleb dpon brnyas par
268a5(rgyud): mi bya zhing // sgrub po kun la smad mi bya// sngags kyi spyod pa thams cad la/ 'dar bar mi bya smad mi bya// 'jig rten/ kha ya~M lha rnams dang // grub ma pa'i rigs bzang la/ smad par
268a6(rgyud): mi blang mi hU~M/ de la mngon par dgorab spangs// sdig pa thams cad rnam sbas shing // de'i don bsod nams thams cad bsdu// baba' dang thun mo du ma la~M/ bza' bar mi bya smad mi bya// 'das
268a7(rgyud): bas bcom ldan sems dpa' ste// sangs rgyas kun gyi sras bdag skyes// thog ma 'am ming zhi ba/ nam yang dor bar mi bya'o// sangs rgyas thod chags las 'khrus// de bzhin na sdang rmongs
268a8(rgyud): las 'ju sa// mnyam dang mi mnyam chos kun dang / dbu mo gnas la gnas nas su// de nyid dam tshig shes nas su// sangs rgyas byang chub yong mi spong // lus can kun la 'tshem bya/ 
268b1(rgyud): khyod kyis sar sA mi bya ste// khwa dog bya bar mi bya'o// dam pa'i chos ni spang mi bya// byang chub sems ni mchog tu 'de// chang gi btung ba spang bya ste// pha rol bud med rnam par spang // thams cad
268b2(rgyud): mngon pa yong mi dang // rtag tu srog chags gsad mi bya// sems can kun lo stong rje dang // byams pa yang ni rnam par sgom// san rnams la phan pa ni// yang dang yang du yongs bsdu bya// sangs
268b3(rgyud): rgyas kun gyi rjes skyob pa// dam tshig de nyid 'di dag ni// slob ma rnams la rjes brtse bas// mkhas pa yis ni bstan par bya// de nas phyag rgya rjes bcing ba// go rims bzhin du bstan par bya/ 
268b4(rgyud): phyag rgya 'di dag khyad par gyis// mtshan nyid yang dag ra ba bshad bya// thal mo brtan par bsdum par bya// me tog zum pa'i tshul du mdzes// sangs rgyas dpa' bo tha~Md kyis// pad+ma
268b5(rgyud): thal mo zhesu bsgrags// rtse mo thams cad legs bsku nga ba// pad+mar phyag rgya zhe su brjod// re re'i mtshams su ngas bcing ba// do ni rdo rje thal mor brtags// sor mo thaMd nges bsdams
268b6(rgyud): pa rdo rje bsdams pas legs bcings pa// sor ma rkyang ste steng du bstan// sangs rgyas byang chub sa gsol byed/ khu chu nang du byas nas ni// gnyis ka sbyor bas yongasu brtag 'bar lo
268b7(rgyud): bsgyung sogs phyag rgya'o// dam pa spyon bu yin dang shad // sangs rgyas dpa' bo bad kyi// dam tshig phyag rgya 'di yin no// ming med nang bcug khu tshur gyis// kun gyi rtse mor yongasu brtag
268b8(rgyud): rdo rje'i rnam pa legs par sbyar// rdo rje chen po zhesu bsgrags// mthe chung srin lag khu tshur las// gung mo legs par bskyang nas su// mdzub mas mthe bong yongasu sbyar// 'khor lo
269a1(rgyud): bsgyur ba nyid gsol byed// brkyang ba'i rtse mo sbyar ba ni// gdugs dkar zhes ni rab tu grags// srin lag dang ni mthe bong sbyar// gung mo gnyis ni bajug par ga// gra'i brjid
269a2(rgyud): phung po'i phyag rgya che// gzi gId phung de nyid gsol byed// de nyid ral gri lta bur sbyar// rnam par rgyal ba zhe su grags// de nyid rgyal ba zhes bya ga/ rdo rje ldan pa de bzhin gshegs/ 
269a3(rgyud): khu tshur stong po ldan byas pas// gtsug tor pa'i 'byung gnas te// thub dka' sangs rgyas thams cad kyis// steng du 'gro ba ni su bshad// rdo rje bsdams pa yongasu spyar// dam tshig
269a4(rgyud): kun gyi 'byung gnas te// gung mo'i rtse mo mchog tu sbyar// mthe chung dang ni mthe bong brkyang // lcags kyu meng 'a yi sbyor ba yis// legaso ba ni sbyar bar bya// gung mo rdo rje rin
269a5(rgyud): chen rtse// phye ba gzi brjid mchog gi mchog/ rdu la mtshan gnasu nges par sbyar// bzhad pa'i gan su sbyar bar bya// rdo rje chos kyi phyag rgya che// dbu ma bang+ga lA bur+ya kum/ 
269a6(rgyud): ral gri 'dzin pa 'jam pa'i dbyangs// 'khor lo sbyar ba'i 'khor los bsgyur// kha ru phye ma'i phyag // rdo rje smra ba nyid du 'gyur// las kyi rdo rjer phyag rgya che// gar mtshungs rdo rje sna
269a7(rgyud): tshogs can// chos yongs sdud pa'i sbyor ba yis// rdo rje srung bar brtag par bya// mche' gnyis ni rnar gtsigs// rdo rje gnod sbyin na su bshad// khu tshur bcas pa khu tshur gyis// rdo
269a8(rgyud): thal mo snying khar bzhag/ rdo rje sgeg mo ni su grags// yong su sbyar ba spyi bor 'o zhag/ rdo rje phreng la zhe su brjod// thal mo sbyar ba gdang du grol// rdo rje glu mar rje su bsgrags/ 'gyed cing 'dud
269b1(rgyud): po'i sbyo yis/ de ni rdo rtag mang bshad// 'adz+ra thal mo gdong du dbye/  khor yo su spya la bzha// snying la mthe 'o mnyam pa dang / rlub tu byung bajug pa'o// lag paste
269b2(rgyud): du yangs brkyang ba// gzugs kyi phyag rgya nyid du 'gyur// lag gnyis rna bo ro lam du gzhag// sgra yi phyag rgya nyid du bshad// dri ni thug pa'i sbyor ba yis// dri yaM phyag rgya ni su brjod gdong du
269b3(rgyud): snyim pa bye ba ni// ro yi phyag rgya zhes brjod// mkha' la myur ba'i sbyor ba yis// reg pa reg pa zhesu bshad// mthe chung gnyis ni yongasu sbyad/ mdzub mo lcags kyur sbyor ba las// de nyid zhags
269b4(rgyud): pa'i dbyis dang ni/ lu gu rgyud kyinar bdug yin pa rdo rje dral bu zhes// rdo rje 'debs par rnam par brtag / phyag rgyaHna dang nyi tha~M bya// blo gros ldan pa ring gis brtag pal ma
269b5(rgyud): su sbyar la bsdam// mdzub mo gnyis po bsgrub nas ni/ rin po che yaM rnar bcing // kun tu bzang po blo ldan gyis// de las rtse mo rtse mo bskum/ sems kyis byams pa bsgoms
269b6(rgyud): nas nis mdzub mo sbyar la bcug nas ni// ral gri'i rnar brtag pa ste/ 'di ni namakha'i snying po oM// phyag rgyang sangs rgyas kun gyis bsngags// de nas ral gri'i mtshon cha yis// rnam bdun nyer
269b7(rgyud): gnas pa// dug rgya 'di ni rnam 'gog par/ da kyis ni yong su brjod// gang ni sdud pa'i sbyor ba yis// rdo rje thal mo rab tu brgyang / khad+ma lA bun rnam par 'drag// 'dz+wa'i lag pa blo ldan
269b8(rgyud): gyis dade nyid mo tog zum tshul dang // ut+pal rnam pa ltar mdzes pa// 'di ni pad+ma sgrol ba'i rgya// pad+ma'i mgon po zhesu grags// mche ba gtsigs pa dang ldan pa'i// kha dang 'dra bar len
270a1(rgyud): bar brtag// 'di ni rta mgrin phyag rgya ste// kha yi phyogasu rab tu brtag/ pad+ma'i thal mo dpral ba yi// khro gnyer du ni nye bar sbyar// rdo rje thal mo 'bebs pa che// dpal gyi snying de 'i
270a2(rgyud): chen ldan// yid bzhin nong bu'i rnam pa bzung // thal mo lags par rab tu brkyang // mi zad blo gros phyag rgya che// sangs rgyas kun gyis rab tu brtags// gang ni sdud pa'i rtswa yis// rin chen rdo rje
270a3(rgyud): snying khar bzhag/ na mkha' mdzod kyi phyag rgya ste// na mkha'i mdzod nyid ster bar byed// rdo rje chen po legs par brkyang // mthe chung mthe bo nges par bcing // lag pa gnyis ni nges par brtag/ blo gros
270a4(rgyud): rgya mtsho'i phyag rgyar 'gyur// rdo rje thal mo steng du 'greng // mdzub mo gnyis po sbyar bar bya// 'di ni rdo rje snying po'i rgya/ rdo rje snying pos bka' stsal to// bu tshur nang du byas nasu// mdzub
270a5(rgyud): mo gnyis po rtse mo bya// 'di ni 'jam dpal phyag rgya ste/ rdo rje ral gri zhe su brtag/ de nyid shag ti'i rnam pa ni// / 'jam pa'i dpyas ni blo ldan gyi'o// gshin rje mthar byed ma du
270a6(rgyud): rtser 'gyur// mdung rtsi chen por rab tu brtag/ mdzub mo bskum par byas nas ni// gung mo'i stang du yongasu bzhag/ zhags pa'i rnam pa rab ldan pa'i// gshin rje yang ni 'jigs par byed// 
270a7(rgyud): de nyid ral gri byas pa ni// skra can ma ru rab tu bshad// khu tshur thad nges bcings te// mdzub mo ga cig ni bskum par bya// 'di ni nye ba'i sgra can ma yi rgyar// 'jam pa'i dbyangs kyi so bkan
270a8(rgyud): stsal to// rdo rje bsdams pa stengs bcings te// dbu ma gnyis ni rnam par spangs// mdzub mo rdo rje'i rnam par bya// mthe chung dang ni mthe bong brkyang // 'di ni rdo rje 'dzin chen po'i// phyag rgya
270b1(rgyud): / don kun sgrub byed yin// dzub mo mtha bong 'asdams pa ni/ mA ma kar ni yosu bshad // mdzub mor lugs sgrog rnam pa las// guphung mo'i dbum rdo rjer bya/ 'di ni rdo rje lcags sgrog rgya// rdo rje
270b2(rgyud): bur yongasu bshad// rdo rje chen po rtse lnga pa// khro bo gzegs mar rnar bshad/ mchog gi rtse mo gcig bya// rdo rje rje mo nyid kyi bshad/ lag na rin chen phyag rgya ni// lag gnyis legs par btu
270b3(rgyud): bar bya// sor mo pad+ma'i dbyibs su bya/ bskul byed lha mo yongasu bshad/ thal mo yongasu sbyar ba las// mdzub mo dang ni mthe bong dag/ mig gi tshul du sbyar bar bya// sangs rgyas spyan gyi nor pa dang
270b4(rgyud): bkra shis kyis ni skyil krung bca'o// rnal 'byor rig bas lus bsrungs te// lag gnyis lhung bzed 'dzin 'dra ba// bsam gtan phyag rgyar rab tu ba shad// 'di ni rnam par snang
270b5(rgyud): mdzad rgyu// sangs rgyas kun gyis don mdzad pa'o// mi ba spyod pa pa yaM sa la reg/ rin chen tog gi mchog sbyin bshad// bsam gtan phyag rgya 'od dpag med// ngo bo nyid kyi don
270b6(rgyud): rtogs byed// don yod gzigs pa'i phyag rgya ni// mi 'bri 'ayi pa med pa sbyin// blo ldan rnal 'byor skyil krung gnas// sangs rgyas kun gyi rang bzhin bdag/ mnyam par gzhag pa phyag rgya kun/ 
270b7(rgyud): 'ching ba'am ni 'ching du gzhug// 'jig rten pa yi phyag rgya la// lag pa gcig ni rab brkyang ste// dbang ldan gyi na rje gsum pa// mthe bos mtha chung mnan par bya// lha yi dbang po rdo rjer 'gyur/ 
270b8(rgyud): lag pa g.yas pas brtag par bya// me yi oM yig lag pa dag/ mthe bong gung mo nyid la gzhag/ gshin rje'i rdo rje dbyug pa ste// mdzub mo dang ni mthe bong sbyar// de nyid khyab 'jug 'khor lo
271a1(rgyud): / steng 'khor lo'i yi ge dgod par bya// lag pa cig gis thod pa ni// ma mo rnams kyi yang dag bshad// sor mo gnyis sbre la gri ni// srin po bdag nyid chen po'i'o// mjab ma
271a2(rgyud): mthe bong sbyar ba ni// chu lha'i zhags pa nyid du bshad// mdzub mo dang ni gung mo dag/ rgyal mtshan lta bur legs par brkyang // rlung lha rgyal mtshan phyag rgya ni// lag pa gnyis kyis rab tu brtag/ 
271a3(rgyud): dbu ma gcig pu legs brkyang ba// dbyug ti'i phyag rgya rab tu bshad// gnod sbyin kun gyi dbang phyug ni// lus ngag bdag nyid chen po'o// mchod phyir thogs kyi phyag rgya ni// tshangs pa yaM ru
271a4(rgyud): legs par bshad// drag po'i gsal shing zhes bya ste// lha mo'i ba TaM sa ru brjod// chags bdag gi ni sna ru bshad/ zla ba'i bdud rtsi'i dkyil 'khor// nyi mi'i 'od zer steng
271a5(rgyud): phrag ni// lag pa gnyis kyis bstan par bya// 'od kyi dkyil 'khor sbyor ba yis// dbang po'i rdo rje mtshon cha ltar// 'di ni lha rnams kun gyi rgyu// dpa' bo kun gyis rab tu gnang // 
271a6(rgyud): za rnams kyi phyag rgya ni// glu len lta bur rab tu bsgrags// dga' byed dbang phyug phyag rgya che// rdza rnga'i sgra dbyangs rab tu 'bar// sangs rgyas zang rab mchod phyir// lha chen po sa ni rab tu brtags// 
271a7(rgyud): ting ting cag 'dzin sbyor ba yis// mi 'am tsaM rnams kying brjod bya// pi wang sgreng ba'i sbyor ba ba yis// dbyangs can gyor ni rnar bshad// rtag tu dun du b+hi sgrogs pa// rig pa 'dzin pa rnams
271a8(rgyud): kyir brjod// lag gnyis gdengs ka'i tshul byas pa// klu rnams kyis ni legs par bshad// gar ni sdud pa'i sbyor ba yis// 'gyad dang 'du ba'i de bzhi no// lag pa zhags pas ngas
271b1(rgyud): bcings pas// de ni phyag rgya rab tu bshad// 'di rnams dam tshig phyag rgya // de bzhin gshegs rnams legs par gsungs// las kyi sbyor ba 'bad pa yi// 'di rnams kyang ni phyag rgyar
271b2(rgyud): bshad// phyag rgya dor nas sems kyi ni// rin chen yang dang yang du bsam// rnar rtog med gdod nas ni// chos dbyings mnyam zhing mi mnyam pa// stong pa mkha' 'drar shes nasu// mkhas pa
271b3(rgyud): yis ni bsgom par bya/ 'di dag zad ma skyes shing // rmi las lta bur rab tu gnas// dri za'i grong khyer lha bur snang // 'tsho ba'i 'jig rten yang dang yang // mig 'phrul lta bu shin tu na/ 
271b4(rgyud): 'gro ba thaMd rab tu gsal// mi rtag sdug bsngal stong pa ru/ srid pa thed mdor bsdus pa// bdag med pa zhes mthong nas ni// sangs rgya la dang dpa' bo laM// sgyu ma smas
271b5(rgyud): rgyu brag cha dang // lbu ba chu yi chu 'ur dang // gzugs brnyan lta bur 'jig rten ni// de ltar sangs rgyas rnams kyis da gongs// thams cad 'gal ma'i 'khor lo ltar// 
271b6(rgyud): zo chun khyud mo ji bzhin du// gar gyi gnas kyi tshul 'dra ba// zla ba gnyis dang mtshungs par blta// rtag tu klog gi phreng ba 'dra// snang bu'i sgra dang mtshungs par gnas// 'khor ba shin
271b7(rgyud): tu brlang ba ste// rgod mo'i kha dang 'dra bang gnas// 'di ltar shes shing rtogs nas ni// bsgoms pa'i stobs kyis rang nyid kyis// sems ni legs sgrub rnal 'byor pa// de la phyag
271b8(rgyud): rgya rab tu bshad// stong pa mtshan ma med pa dang // smon pa med pa'i rang bzhin las// lus dang ngag dang yid kyis// dam tshig gsum ni btags pa'o// phyag rgya sngags dang lha
272a1(rgyud): dang // de nyid gsum ni rab tu gnas// bdag nyid sbyor ba'i rnal 'byor gyis// mtshan nyid gcig tu rnam par gnas// de 'di dam pa'i phyag rgya ru// sangs rgyas rnams kyis ba
272a2(rgyud): sprul to// phyag rgya yig bral ba ste// rnam pa med cing snang ba med// dngos po med pa'i chos rnams la// dngos po'i de nyid du na bshad// dngos med dngos po'i rang bzhin yin// dngos med nyid kyang
272a3(rgyud): dngos po yin// ngos dang dngos med rnam par grol// rnal 'byor ye shes mchog tu bde// rtog ge med cing snang ba med// 'khrul pa med cing yi ge med// stong pa nam mkha' mtshungs pa'i ses
272a4(rgyud): gang tshe de ltar nyid gyur pa// de tshe phyag rgya rnams dang sngags// lha nyi da du yang rab tu brtag/ sngags las phyag rgya ma mthong zhi nga // phyag rgya las kyang sngags min cing // rang nyid lha/ 
272a5(rgyud): yi rnal 'byor ni// gnyis med sngags dang phyag rgyar brtags// de ba zhin gshegs pa tha~Md kyi rdo rje snying po rgyan ces bya ba'i rgyud kyai rgyal po chen po las phyag rgya'i rim par phye
272a6(rgyud): ba'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad slar yang 'dus par gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor los bsgyur ba chen po rdo rje rnal
272a7(rgyud): 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po la gsol ba btab pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs bskyed par mdzad du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa de dag gi gsol ba
272a8(rgyud): btab pa'i tshig nye bar gnas nas 'og min gyi gnas nas dga' ldan gyi gnasu bzhugs nas dga' ldan gyi rigs kyi lha'i bu rnams la chos bstan nas zas gtsang gi rigs
272b1(rgyud): la mngon par gzigs te/ mngon par byung bar mdzad nas byang chub kyi snying po dag la nye bar mnan nas 'khod de/ bdud bzhi las rnam par rgyal bar bstan nas byang chub kyi snying po la bzhugs pa
272b2(rgyud): 'gyur te/ bzhugs nas kyang kun nas 'phro ba'i ting 'dzin sngon du 'gro ba'i ting 'dzin bye ba brgya stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi la snyoms par zhugs te/ snyoms par zhugs nas kyang de bani
272b3(rgyud): gshegs pa zad kyi rdo rje se gol gyi sgras de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad spyan 'dren cing gsang sngags 'di gsung so// oM sarba ta thA ga ta badz+ra sa mA dza A k+Sha ya sarba ta thA ga ta na hUM da nas
272b4(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thaMd 'khor dang bcas pa'i dkyil 'khor na po rnams legs par byon te chos kyi dbyingasu spros na sa phyogs bcu mu med pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams
272b5(rgyud): thams cad rab 'byam rgya mtsho'i sprin rnams khyab ste/ na mkha'i kha mas na gnas pa thaMd til gyi gang bu ltar 'dzam bu'i gling du 'khod par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo
272b6(rgyud): rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang thug gis bkug cing bcug te/ bcings nas dbang du mdzad/ de nyid kyi thugs khang rab tu bzhag par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen
272b7(rgyud): bos gnyi su med pa'i sbyor bas byin gyis brlabs te/ sngags 'dis rang gi sems so sor rtogs pa mdzad// oM tsat+ta pra ti ba d+ha kai ro mi/ de'i rjes thogs nyid la sangs rgyas tha~Md kyis
272b8(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das rnar snang mdzad kyi thugs kar longs spyod rdzogs pa dang / sprul pa'i sku las chos kyi sku rang bzhin gyi 'od gsal ba sems rin po che nges par thung ste/ spros pa mdzad/
