273a1(rgyud): de nyid sems 'od gsal gzugs rje chen pos khyab gde bzhin gshegs pa thad mnyam pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid// gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i rnyog pa spangs pa/ na mkha' ltar
273a2(rgyud): gdod nas zhig de las thugs rje chen po la mngon par phyogs par byas nas/ sems can gyi khams thams cad la rnam par gzigs te/ mi shes pas rga ba dang / 'chi bas rnam par khyab
273a3(rgyud): ba'i 'jig rten la gzigs nas slar yang sngags 'das byang chub kyi sems bskyed pa nye bar bstan pa// oM bo d+hi tsit+ta ud pA da ya mi/ byang chub kyi sems bskyed pa'i rjes thogs nyid
273a4(rgyud): la de bzhin gshegs pa tha~Md kyi thugs khar sems 'od gsal ba de yongasu rdzogs pa'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor lngar byin gyis brlabs te de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thug
273a5(rgyud): khar rnam par banago// legs par rnam par dag pa'i na mkha'i lhar dri ma med pa/ spros pa tha~Md spangs pa me long lta bur brtan par byas nas gnas te byang chub kyi sems
273a6(rgyud): chen po la sngags 'di brjod// oM dz+nyA na rasmai bi sr-i ngo hU~M/ de ni rjes thogs nyid las 'od zeng rnam pa sna tshogs pa zla ba'i dkyil 'khor las rnor byu // de byung nas kyang chos kyi dbyings
273a7(rgyud): kyi pho brang du zhugs te shes bya'i dkyil 'khor thams cad gsal bar byas nas sen thams cad kyi sems kyi ri bo'i rtse brnyil te rab tu rtogs par byas nas gcig tu 'dres/ 
273a8(rgyud): rdo rje'i sku chen po rnams bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs khar rje su zhugaso nas zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbus rab tu gnaso// de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang
273b1(rgyud): byug chen pos sngags 'dis bin gyis 'das so// oM tiSh+Tha badz+ra/ slar yang sngags 'dis spros pa/ oM swa ra badz+ra/ slar yang sngags 'dis bsdu'o// oM saM ha ra badz+ra/ de nas de bzhin gshegs
273b2(rgyud): pa thams cad kyis ye shes rdo rje'i snying po 'di ched du brjod do// oM dz+nyA na badz+ra/ de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen pos sngags 'dis byin gyis brlabs pa/ oM sarba ta thA ga
273b3(rgyud): ta dz+nyA na badz+ra hA/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa tha~Md kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs mnyam pa nyid brnyes pas sngags 'dis byin gyis brlabs pa/ oM badz+ra At+ma ko// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams
273b4(rgyud): cad brten pa nyid du nye bar gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'o/ das rnam par snang mdzad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa tha~Md kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs gzigs nas sngags 'dis byin gyis
273b5(rgyud): brlabs par mdzad// oM ya thA sarba ta thA ga ta sta bA a ha na pi/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs ba thams cad kyi sku sen thams cad kyi don mdzad pa'i rgyu/ sangs
273b6(rgyud): zad kyi sku bdag nyid sen gyi khams thams cad du nges par bstan to// de nas brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang 'jig rten skyong ba rnams kyis mthong nas/ lha dang mi rnams kyis mngon par byang chub
273b7(rgyud): ba zhes smra bsgrag so// de nas tshangs pas gsol ba btab ste/ chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor nas// de dang des 'dul ba'i skye bo btul te/ gang gis skur ldog pa med pa nyid la gyur to// 'di
273b8(rgyud): rnams ni sangs rgyas kyi byang chub sgom pa'i rim pa'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad ting 'dzin de las gozhengs nas/ sangs rgyas kyi byang chub bstan te/ sems can
274a1(rgyud): thams cad kyi don mdzad pa nye bar bsgrubs nas de'i thugs ka las rdo rje drung ste/ nyid kyi phyag du bzhag par gyur te/ te nas 'od zer rnam par byung ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams med
274a2(rgyud): snang bar mdzad nas slar log ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs kang zhugs nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po'i skur byin gyis brlangs te/ mtshan nyid thaMd yongasu rdzogs par
274a3(rgyud): rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ dar dang phreng bas dbang bskur gazla ba'i kha dog lta bu'i 'od zer can du byin gyis brlabs te rnar gan so// de nas thugs ka nas byung ba'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la
274a4(rgyud): rten te/ de bzhin gshegs 'bad kyi spyan snga dang / rgyab dang drung du rdo rje sems dpa' dang / rdo rje chos dang / rdo rje rin chen dang / rdo rje las la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' chen po
274a5(rgyud): drang bar rnar gan so// de bzhin du sgeg mo la sogs pa rnams dang / 'dug pa la sogs pa'i lha khyad par dude sa par bskyed cing / gzugs la sogs pa rnams dang / lcag
274a6(rgyud): kyu la sogs pa'i lha rnams bskyed/ 'di dag gi dkyil 'khor bka' stsal pa/ de nas yang dag bshad bya bo// dkyil 'khor chen po mchog gyur pa/ sangs rgyas dpa' bo tha~Md kyi// rdo rje snying po
274a7(rgyud): zhesu gsungs// gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa// dar dang me tog phreng bas rgyan// sgo khyud dang ni kha khyer dang // rta babs kyis ni so sor spras// de yi dbu su khri chen po// kun nas yongasu gru bzhi pa// de yi
274a8(rgyud): steng du da chen po// gis bldan zhing ba mdzes pa// de sa lte pa'i dbus ni/ sangs rgyas sku gzugs dgod par bya// sangs rgyas kyis ni drang kun du/ sangs rgyas bad dgod par bya/ sangs/ 
274b1(rgyud): rgyam dun gyinya lakhor du/ 'khor lo bsgyur ba la sogs brus rgyas gnas ni thams pad du/ sas rgyas sras po rnam par dgod / pa dag ser po bas yod de// dang chen dkyil 'khong pa
274b2(rgyud): mas sad rnam pa 'i tshogs ca/ rnyan pa de dag shing por bya/ rdo rje ning po rgyan gyi sbyin chen po las de chen gyi dkyil 'khor gyi chog s+ho// des bcom ldan 'as su bA
274b3(rgyud): mdzad kyis slar yang chu lce'i dkyil 'khor chen po bka' stsal ga/ de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// dkyil 'khor chen po mchog gyur pa// chos kyi dkyil 'khor lo 'dra bas na// chos kyi 'jor
274b4(rgyud): lo zhe su brjod// de yi phyi rol gnyis pa la// zlum po dran rtogs par bya/ ri mo mang po sna tshogs pas// sgo dang ske khyud brtag par bya// rta babs rnam pa sna tshogs pa// dar dang me
274b5(rgyud): rtog phreng bas rgyan// de yi dbus pad chen po// ge sar ldan zhing rad mdzes pa// mdab ma brgyad kyi ka ba'i mdun// dkyil 'khor brgyad kyis brgyan pa'o// dkyil 'khor de mi
274b6(rgyud): dbus ni// rgyal ba zad dkar po mchog kha ba bzho ltar dkar gsal/ shel dang b+hA ba lta bu'i 'od// kun da zla ba ltar dkar brtan/ zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus son par// de yi nye 'khor
274b7(rgyud): thams cad du/ sangs rgyas smras po rnam par dgod// da zla ba ltar dku shing // zlanga'i dkyil 'khor lo gnas pa/ mtshon cha sna tshogs za ba 'dra/ rna ba 'bar mtshungs mnyam med pa
274b8(rgyud): shes bya y-i/ kyi tsha sa yan du 'ad tshig rgyan po chud chen po las chu lta rgyal lam kyi mal la// denas pam ldan 'ar rnam pa
275a1(rgyud): kyi dgang byug chen pos me lha zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor ma tshul stsal pa/ de nas yang dag bshad bya ga/ dkyil 'khor chen po mchog gyur pa/ rdo rje ye shes gzi
275a2(rgyud): rdo rje gzi brjid cesu brjod// gru gsum rnam pa nyid du bya// sum mdo'i ris kyi rnam par mtshungs// 'bar ba'i phreng 'khrugs 'jigs pa'o// kha dog dmar po stobs po che// 'jig pa'i dus kyi me 'dra
275a3(rgyud): gartag tu padA rA ga mtshungs// de yi dbus gzi brjod che/ nyi ma'i kha dog stobs po che// rdo rje rtsa gsum sna tshogs pa// sum mdo'i snying khar bzhag par bya// bal po'i se'u me tog mtshungs// ya
275a4(rgyud): ba'i me tog dag dang 'dra// pad+ma pad+ma rA ga mtshungs// sa ngas rgyas dpa' bo yang dag 'bar// bzang po mtshal dang mtshungs 'dra ba// rgya skyegs bcud dang 'dra bar gnas// de yi nya 'khor thod du/ 
275a5(rgyud): de bzhin sangs rgyas sas rgyas sras// khro bo dang ni mang ga pa dang / mkhas pa yis ni dgod par bya// de dag bad kha/ dog dmar// gzi brjid khams le 'od ldan pa// 'od zer dmar po rab
275a6(rgyud): 'phro ba// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus son par// thams cad dmar po'i mtshon cha can// dmar po'i rgyan gyis rnam par brgyan// dmar po'i gos kyis bkab pa'i lus// phreng ba dmar po mchog 'dzi/ 
275a7(rgyud): pa 'di ni gzi brjid gter zhes bya// dkyil 'khor mchog tu 'bar ba'o// rdo rje snying po rgyan gyi rgyud chen po las me lha zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po rdzog so// // de nas bcom ldan
275a8(rgyud): 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis slar yang rlung lha'i dkyil 'khor bka' stsal pa/ de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// dkyil 'khor chen po mchog gyur pa// rlung gi khams dang 'dra bas na// rlung / 
275b1(rgyud): gi dkyil 'kho shAsu twA shad/ zla ba byed par rnam pa 'dra// dbyung gyi smon ci 'od dang mtshungs// At+ma sa si me tog 'dra/ idA nI la'i 'od dang mchus// de yi phasu byung chen po// de
275b2(rgyud): 'dra'i 'od dang 'dri// shin tu gnas pa'i smig sman mtshungaso// sngon dmar gyi ni rnam par gnas// de yi lte ba'i dbusu ni// sangs rgyas dpa' bo rab 'ab ba// rgyal po 'khyil ba 'ab
275b3(rgyud): gzi mtshan mo nag mo lta bur gnas// ut+pal sngon po 'dab ma'i tshul// stong pa na mkha' lta bur gnas// de yi nye 'khor thad du// rgyal dang rgyal ba'i sras rnams bri/ khri bo rnams dang
275b4(rgyud): mngag pa dang // de bzhin po nya bo nya mo// thams cad sna tshogs rgyan gyis brgyan// de bzhin nag po'i gos s+ho na ba// kha dog nag po thaMd du// ba den rnam pa sna tshogs bsna
275b5(rgyud): gdugs ni rnam pa du ma'i dbyings// kha deg gis lags 'bar ba// bla ra rgyas pa mnyam pa ni/ kha dog nag po sna tshogs pa// dngos po kun gyi rang bzhin gyis
275b6(rgyud): mdor bsdus ni bsgom par 'o// dkyil 'khor chen po 'di lta bu// sangs rgyas kun gyis rjes skyob pa// bris nas shes rab can gyis bsgoms// gal te dngos grub rang 'dod na/ rdo rje sna
275b7(rgyud): po rgyan gyi rgyud chen po las rlung lha'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thaMd kyis sngar yang bsdu bas byon pa'i ting 'dzin la snyoms
275b8(rgyud): par zhugs te/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po la mas kyis gsol ba btab pa// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gau she gos pa tha~Md kyi de kho na nyid kyi
276a1(rgyud): / sgrub pa'i thabs bskyed du gsol// de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po de rnams kyis gsol ba btab pa'i tshig nye bar gnas nas// sgrub pa
276a2(rgyud): thabs kyi cho ga mchog tu gsang ba chen po bka' stsal pa// sgeg mo sogs pas mchod pa kun/ yang dag mdor bsdus byas nas ni// sangs rgyas kun gyi sku chen por// bdag gis
276a3(rgyud): rtag tu bsgom par bya// sngags kyis yig yang dag ldan// 'dod pa ster ba'i sku ru bya// sgra dang gzugs dang de bzhin sbyor// yi ge'i phreng ba de bzhin te// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus
276a4(rgyud): gnas par// sngags pas thaMd rnam par bsam// hUM sngags pas snying khar son pa sgom// gsang sngags dag pa brjod na suH/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs dag pa// dung gi sgra ru
276a5(rgyud): rab tu brjod/ khri bu'i sgra ri rab gsal ba// pad+mo rnal 'byor/ bang phyug go// dus min sprin gyi hUM gaM sgra// tsaTa'i tsa'i sgra 'phro ga/ rdo rje rin chen dbang phyug go// skyu ru
276a6(rgyud): bzhin gshegs rnams gsung // nor bu las kyi rigs kyi yang // rnga chen sgra ru rab tu bshad// piwang gling bu de bzhin glu// gar gyi rgyan gyi sgra dang ni// rdza rnga'i ngar sgra hUM gi sgra// spyi yi nyi
276a7(rgyud): du rab tu bshad// rtog pa kun la rnam par sbyar// sgrub pa'i thabs kyi las rnams dang // de nas gzugs kyi bzlas pa mchog/ go rims ji bzhin rab tu bshad// dgug dang gzhag
276a8(rgyud): dang bcing ba dang // lha rnams dang du bya ba ste/ de la ring gi chul rab sbyar// sngags dang phyag rgya rab tu sbyar// rdo rjes rnam pa kun gyi mchog/ rtag tu lus chen bsam bya bsam// lnga
276b1(rgyud): sku gzugs bsgom par bya// lag pa'i phyag rgya rab nges pa'i// phyag rgya snying khar son zhes bya// rang gi rigs rims cho ga yis// de yi lus ni 'od gsal zhing // sgron ma'i 'od ltar gsal
276b2(rgyud): bi'i khyim// de ltar kun nas thaMd du// kun nas ba spu'i rtse dag nas// 'ad zer 'bar ba'i phreng dag pas// gzugs kyi bzlas pa zhesu bshad// de nas sbyor ba'i bzlas pa ni// gsang sngags
276b3(rgyud): sgrub pos brtsam par bya// mchod dang byin rlabs dbang bskur mchog/ spro la sogs rims zad du// sbyor ba'i bzlas pa gtso ba 'di// 'bad pa yis ni rab tu bshad// snying kha mgrin pa
276b4(rgyud): mchu lce mni// rkan dang spyi bo nyid ma yin// nang ni na phyi dang ga nyis par min// chos ni 'ba' zhig kho na la// bzlas pa 'i sgra yang 'byung ma yin// 'di ni bcom ldan rnal 'byo
276b5(rgyud): ches shes rab pha rol byin gsal ba// rnaskam pa'i spogs pa de nyid ni// rnal 'byor pa yi gnas bshad// de nas steng du mdor bsdus te// snying kha'i dkyil 'khor ra
276b6(rgyud): zlum pa// zla ba gang ba lhor bsam bya/ dri ma med cing legs par gnas// de la yig rnam par dgod// tshig gi phreng ba mchod pa// mu tig phreng ba ltar brgyus pa// char sprin gyi ni me 'drar
276b7(rgyud): 'od de tshe thams cad gsal bar byed// lha yi lus ni snang byed cing // ji lha ji ltar yi ga'i phreng // mchog gi lus la rab 'jug pa// de lta de ltar sngags kyi lus// lha yi bdag
276b8(rgyud): nyid nyid du 'gyur// mthu stobs lho dbang zad ni// tshangs pa khyab 'jug las cher lhag// bzlas pa de nyid mchog 'di ni// sangs rgyas kun gyis bsngags pa'o// ji ltar sa/ 
277a1(rgyud): de bsgom pa yis// de ltar ngos grung mchog tu 'gyur// rdo rje snying po rgyun gyi rgyud chen po las// bzlas pa'i de kho na nyid kyi le'a'o// // de nas bcom ldan
277a2(rgyud): 'das rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen pos de bzhin gshegs pa tha~Md kyi bstod pa rin po che bka' stsal ba// mnyam med mi g.yo mnyam ma da mchog gi chos nyid can// thugs rje
277a3(rgyud): bdag nyid 'gro ba'i sdug bsngal sel bar mdzad// yon+tan mtha' yas dngos grub bde sbyin mdzad pa// dri med mi g.yo mnyam med dam pa'i mchog chos can// yon+tan shin tu phra ba'i cha 'ja
277a4(rgyud): tshad med// de ba ni na mkha' dang yang snyun du yod ma yi na// dngos grub mtha' yas mnyam med dpe dang bral ba rnams// seMn khams la dngos grub mchog rnams nges par
277a5(rgyud): stsol ba rtag tu dri ma med pa thugs rje'i shugs las byung // smon lam grub pa 'gog pa med pa'i chos nyid can/ 'gro ba'i don sgrub rab tu brtson pa mtha' yas 'a// thugs rje chen po'i
277a6(rgyud): bdag nyid rtag tu rnar snang // tshad mes dang bral ba shin tu rdzogs pa yi// bde bar gshegs pa'i gnasu gshegs kyang e ma chos nyid bzang // bde bar gshegs pa go 'bang dam pa bas
277a7(rgyud): gyur kyang // khams gsum rnams la dngos grub mchog stsol mdzad pa yi// thugs rje'i spyod pa mi g.yo 'gag par yong mi 'gyur// e ma ho shin tu bzang po'i ches nyid mchog
277a8(rgyud): dang ldan// mchog sbyin rnams kyi nang na go 'gar mchog brnyernyas pa// khams gsum kun la rtag tu dngos grub mchog spol mdzad// mgon po dus gsum sgrib pa med par rab mkhyen
277b1(rgyud): bas dam tshig mchog gsum dngos grub dam pa bdag la stsol// 'di de sangs rgyas thaMd kyi// yang dag yod+han rgyas pa ste// lan cig tsam zhig brjod pas kyang // gsang sngags tha~Md 'grub
277b2(rgyud): bar 'gyur// bstod pa'i rgyal po 'di yis ni// de bzhin gshegs dekun bstod na// rab yangs dngos grub stsol 'gyur te// bskal par gnas shing bskal par bskul// lus ni g.ye
277b3(rgyud): ba med pa ru/ bdag nyid brtan par byas pa yis// mgon po chen po rnam snang mdzad// mi bskyod rin chen 'byung gnas dang // rgyal ba dag pa 'od dpag med// don grub rgyal po thad du// dngul
277b4(rgyud): chu bcud len de nyid dang // mchog kyang rab tu gsol bar byed/ dedes grub yid 'od ma lus pa/ rgyas pa'i don dang phun sum tshogs// re ba zad yongs rdzogs pa/ yid la 'dod pa ster bar byed/ 
277b5(rgyud): ye shes tshe dang stobs dang shugs// mchog tu dge/ ba gsol bar mdzad// de bzhin gshegs pa zed kyi ba// stong pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba rdzog so// // de nas bac+doMs rdo rje
277b6(rgyud): rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen pos de bzhin gshegs pa tha~Md kyi dngos grub kyi cho ga rgyas pa bka' stsal pa// tshes grangs med cing rgyu skar med// bsnyung bar gnas pa'i cho ga red// ji
277b7(rgyud): lhar bshad pa cho gas bslab pa'i gnas nye bar bzung ste/ gang yang rung ba'i yid dga' bar ji ltar rung ba'i dkyil 'khor byas te/ me tog sil ma bkram la bdug spos kyis 'dug
277b8(rgyud): ti de bzhin gshegs pa thaMd la ji ltar nus pa'i me tog la sogs pa'i mchod pa rnams kyis mchod par bya ste/ sngags 'dis yid kyis kyang sdig pa bshags te/ oM sar+b+ba
278a1(rgyud): b+hu bA ta kA ya~M ka dA ka tsit+ta ma na sod b+hU tAn ra ga/ dwe Sha me ha mA da mA na biSh+Ti Na yang kr-i tan tre kA li ke hU hUM hU phaT phaT phaT sarba pA paM s+pho Ta yA mi swA hA/ oM sarba bArA drAH
278a2(rgyud): de sha ya mi swA hA/ de'i rjes thogs la bdag nyid kyi dngos pa dbul bar bya ste/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta nAn Ad ma b+ha ba ni ra ya ta ya mi/ sarba ta thA gra taHpra tI gr-i h+Nan tu mAM swA hA// de bzhin gsheg+sa/ 
278a3(rgyud): ba thaMd kyi bsod nams la rje su yi rang pa ni/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta puN+ya dz+nyo na saM b+ha rAn a nu mo dA ya mi swA hA// yang dang yang du byang chub kyi sems bskyed pa rang bzhin gyis grub pa'i sngag
278a4(rgyud): kyis bya ste/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta sa mnu b+ha dra ma hA badz+ra sa ma ya ma hA bo d+hi tsit+te uta pA da ya mi swA hA/ de nas byang chub kyi sems bskyed pa'i rjes thogs la zla ba'i kha dog
278a5(rgyud): can zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la bzhugs pa'i bsod nams da nga ye shes kyi tshogs yongasu rdzogs pa sa bcu'i/ dbang phyug nor bu rin po che chen po'i pad+ma'i snying
278a6(rgyud): bo seng ge'i khri'i steng du bdag nyid bsam par bya'o// oM bud d+hoH/ sngags 'dis bdag yongasu dag par byas te/ oM swa b+ha ba shud+d+haHsarba ta thA ga taHswa b+hA ba shud d+ho tshi/ sngags
278a7(rgyud): 'dis bdag nyid chos kyi dbyings yangs pa/ 'od gsal ba'i snang ba shin tu gnas par byas te/ oM d+harma d+hA tu swa b+ha ba At+ma ko&H/ de nas skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa
278a8(rgyud): gnyis kyis rgyan par bdag nyid byin gyis brlabs te 'jig rten thaMd las shin tu 'das pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thaMd kyi chos kyi skor bdag nyid sngags 'dis gnas
278b1(rgyud): bar bya ste/ oM pra b+hA sa re / de bzhin du rim pa 'dis chos kyi rgyus rgya chen por spros nas/ bdag nyid sangs rgyas nyid// zhes brgyal bskyed la bdag skye dgu ma lus pa'i
278b2(rgyud): dpung gnyen du byas la// chos kyi dbyings 'od gsal bar lhan cig gnas par bya ste/ nye bar rgyas bur thun mtshams bzhir bzlas pa tsam par bya ste/ thun mtshams gsum
278b3(rgyud): du dus ji lta bor yi ge la rjesu gzhol ba'i yid kyis 'bum phrag nyi shu bzlas par bya zhing / nyi ma re ra stong phrag brgyad dam/ stong phrag re bzlas te// ji srid mtshan ma thob pa de
278b4(rgyud): srid du'o// tsan dan dang ga pur dang gur gum la sogs pa rnams kyis dkyil 'khor bya ste/ nye bar 'khor ba thaMd kyi mchod pa byas cho 'phrul gyi zla ba 'am sa ga'i
278b5(rgyud): ga ga la mar gyi mang mi stong phrag brjid spyang la/ jo skyil dkrung gis gnas to/ sde mra'i me tog badz+ra/ de bzhi gshegs pa 'di dang / mchod rten la
278b6(rgyud): mchod de ji srid 'dug gi sgra sgrogs pa ma thos pa de srid du bzlas par bya'o// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku bdag la gsal bar 'gyur shes par bya'o// de nas sreg
278b7(rgyud): blugs 'bum phrag gcig dgang bar byas pas mtshan ma tha~Md gsal bar 'gyuraro// bye ba phrag bzhi bzlas pas dbang thug chen po la sogs pa'i sen tha~Md dbang du 'gyur/ 
278b8(rgyud): de nas sgrub pa chen po byed par 'dod pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtho gang ba'i tshod kyis// de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten re re'i mdun du stong phrag re re bzlas pa/ 
279a1(rgyud): 'am yang na dra'i mchod rten gyi drung du 'dzum lhag pa'i bye ba phrag 'dun bzla so// bde bar gshegs pa'i mtho gang ba'i tshad kyis mchod rten nyi ma re re lu re
279a2(rgyud): srid bye ba drag bdun bzlas pa rdzogs pa de srid du bya'o tha ma yang mchod rten 'bar ba'i 'od des sgrub pa'i lus la zhugs pas brgya byin dang tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba la
279a3(rgyud): sogs nas ji srod dge ba'i gnas kyi dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa'i lha rnams me tog gi tsher 'bebs par 'ong bar 'gyuraro// lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang dri za dang lha ma
279a4(rgyud): yin dang na mkha' lding dang mi 'am ci la sogs pa'o ngas nas kyang bstod par byed cing ji srid a ba'i ci mnar med pa'i bar gyis ni dmyal ba thaMd bsil bar 'gyur// yi
279a5(rgyud): dgas rnams kyang yi dgas kyi sdug bsngal las rnar gol bar 'gyuraro// sdug bsngal ba rnams kyis sen rnams la gdung bar mi 'gyuraro// de nas de bzhin gash+ye
279a6(rgyud): be zad kyis mngon par gzigs par 'gyuraro// de'i rjes la lus dang ba gser gyi mdog lta bu dang lo brgyad gnyis kyi rnam pa can dang / ting 'dzin dang ye shes thob pa dang / kha dog dang
279a7(rgyud): tshe dang stobs dang / shugs dang dbang phyug la sogs pa'i yon+dan dang ldan pa dang 'jig rten gyi khamasu rgyu ba dang // 'khor los bsgyur la ltar che ba dang / sangs rgyas tha~Md kyis
279a8(rgyud): mngon par bstod cing rje 'gro ba dang / rig pa 'dzin pa'i rgyal por 'gyur ba dang / stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rig pa 'dzin pa'i rgyal po rig pa 'dzin pa bye
279b1(rgyud): phrag brgya stong du mas yongasasu basbyor ba dang lnga'i bu mo bye ba phrag du mas yong su bskor ba dang / phyokhyogs bcu mtha' yas pa'i 'jig rten gyi khar su rdzu 'phrul gyis 'gro ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa
279b2(rgyud): thad lan chod pa chen po'i sprin gyis legs par mchod cing grub pa thaMd 'od kyis ltung bar 'gyur// brgyabyin dang tshas pa dang 'jig rten skyong ba'i stan byed stor bar 'gyur// ga'i bad+h+r-id dang gzugs da
279b3(rgyud): dpa' bos rig pa 'dzin pa thaMd zil gyis gnon par 'gyu ro// byang chub sems dpa'i sa yang so sor thob par 'gyur// san thams cad 'dul ba la mkhas par 'gyuraro// phyi mi'i mthar tshe byin
279b4(rgyud): gyis brlabs te/ sangs rgyas zad bskyed pa mthong bar 'a gyur// byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi bya ba nges par ston par 'gyur// mchod pa'i sprin thaMda'abyung bar 'gyur// 
279b5(rgyud): chub sede' chen po kun tu bzang po dang / byams pa dang 'jam dpal dang mtshungs par 'gyur// de bzhin ka she/ gas pa thams cad kyi sku'i sgrub pa'i thabs zhes bya ba stong
279b6(rgyud): ba'o// // sgrub pa'i thabs gnyis pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa thaMd mchod par bya ste// gau wang ngam ldeng ras pad+ma'i snod du bzhag la/ ji srid dngos grub rnam pa gsum byung ba de srid du bzlas par
279b7(rgyud): bya'o/ seMn thams cad dbang du 'gyur ba dang / mi snang ba dang rig pa dzad 'dzin pa nyid// rig pa 'dzin par gyur nas nyi ma stong shar ba'i kha dog dang / lo brgyad gnyis kyis rnar sku le zhing 'khyil
279b8(rgyud): ba dang gdu bu dang ldan zhing lha'i bu mo bye ba drag du mas yong su bskor cing / rig pa 'dzin pa'i grub med kyis yongasu bskor ba dang / bskal pa chen po'i mthar gnas pa dang / rig pa 'dzin
280a1(rgyud): thathams cad kyi dang drug tu 'byung/ rim pa 'dis rtse gsum bsgrungs na dang drug chen por 'gyu'o// mchod phyir thogs bsgrubs na tshangs par 'gyur// 'khor los khyab 'jug tu
280a2(rgyud): 'gyur/ grog mthar gyi rtse mo'i sa bzung ste sa srung gi bu byas la de la gon te bzlas na dbang por 'byor/ nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor byos te de'i steng du bsdad na nyi ma dang mtshungs par 'gyur// rna ba'i dkyil
280a3(rgyud): 'khor gyi zla ba'i sde 'di nyid kyis lha'i bye brag gi mtshan ma bzung ste/ des de'i longs spyod la spyod par 'gyuraro// de bzhin du rim pa 'dis dngul chu'am bcud len gang bsgrubs pa de 'grub par 'gyur// 
280a4(rgyud): gal te ma grub na de'i tshe sgrub pa lan 'don bya'o// dun byas pas rbin das kyang 'grub par 'gyur// zhes de bzhin gshegs pa tha~Md kyi 'khor los bsgyur bas bka' stsal ga/ 'bub phrag/ 
280a5(rgyud): gsum bzlas pas ri'i lhun po'i tshad de tsam ri bo yang hU zhes da bas ltung ba dang / rgya mtsho skems pa dang ljon pa drang nas 'byi na ba dang / bum pa na mkhas 'phen pa dang / glang po rengs
280a6(rgyud): bar byed pa dang / pha rol gyi snga mngon par 'joms par byed pa dang / bar snang na gnas pa thed lhung bar byed// sen thaMd 'bebs par byed// sgrub pa po las gang dang gang sgrub par 'dod pa de dang de thaMd byed// 
280a7(rgyud): zla ba cig tsam mi smra bar de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi skur bdag nyid bsgoms na sangs rgyas thaMd mthong bar 'gyuraro// sgyu 'phrul dra ba thams cad ston par 'gyuraro// ma mkha' la gnas shi
280a8(rgyud): 'chag par byed// me 'bar ba dang glog 'gyur la sogs pa ston par byed// gcig tu gyur nas mang por 'gyur// 'jig rten gyi khams stong phrag kyang g.yo bar byed// sgrub pos nye ba bdun bzlas nA
280b1(rgyud): / 'di dag thams cad bsgrub par bya'o// rim pa 'dis lhung bzed dang / chos gos dang snam sbyar dang / mkhar sil las gang yang rung ba bzung nas ji srid rig pa 'dzin par gyur pa de srid du bzlas pa
280b2(rgyud): bya'o// sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du 'gro ba dang sprul pa du ma byed pa dang / 'dod na 'chi ba dang skad cig tsam gyis 'jig rten gyi khams thad du 'gro zhing de bzhin gshegs pa tha~Md kyis te
280b3(rgyud): bar gnas par byed// sangs rgyas kyi gzugs kyis sangs rgyas kyi bya ba thaMd kyang byed// sgrub pa'i thabs gzhan yang bde bar gshegs pa'i mtho'i tshad kyis mchod rten 'bum phrag gcig
280b4(rgyud): blangs te rma med pa'i ral gri blangs te cho 'phrul gyi zla ba phyed la nye bar spyod pa tha~Md kyis mchod/ brgyad pa 'am bcu 'ani pa 'am nya gang ba la skyil dkrung bcas te ji srid du ral
280b5(rgyud): gri 'bar ba de srid du bzla par bya'o// de'i rjes thogs nyid la rnga bo che rnam sa kyi sgra grag go// steng nas me tog gi char 'bab par 'a gyu ro/ lhan cig rig pa 'dzin pa'i rgyal po che po
280b6(rgyud): 'gyur/ ral gri'i rig pa 'dzin pa chen po'i 'khor los bsgyur ba rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i cha lcags dang rgyun 'chang 'dod dgur rgyu ba dang skad cig tsam gyis 'jig rten gyi khams thaMngad du rnar dpyod
280b7(rgyud): pa dang rga shi med pa dang nyi ma re re zhing sangs rgyas kyi bdag nyid che ba mthong ba dang / mchod pa'i sprin tha~Md kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing thad mchod pa'i chang 'bebs pa dang / bskal pa chen po stong
280b8(rgyud): phrag du 'tshe bar 'gyur// de nas sgru ba'i thabs gzhan yang 'khor lo 'am pa Ti sa blangs te/ 'bum phrag nyi shu bzlas pa yongs rdzogs pa dang / dpal gyi sgor song ste// ni mkha'i lo ma tsha de'i
281a1(rgyud): ma pa dul btags pa 'dum phrag gcig bsregs drugs bya'o// lha ma yin gyi 'khrul 'khor bad 'byed par 'byong// lha ma yin gyi bu mo bad 'ong bar 'gyur// gal
281a2(rgyud): ma gub na 'bum phrag gnyis sam gsum tu bsregs blugs bya'o// lha ma yin gyi bu mo thad bsregs bzhin du 'ong bar 'gyuraro// 'ongs nas kyang sgrub pa po la zhu bar byed// kye skyes bu
281a3(rgyud): dpa'i 'jug tu gsol zhes smra'o// de nas grogs dang bcas pas 'jug par bya'o// ral gri 'am 'khor lo de bzung nas lha ma yin gyi rig pa 'dzin pa'i rgyal por 'gyuraro// sa 'og
281a4(rgyud): gi rdzas rnams kyi mnga' bdag lha ma yin gyi bu mo thams ca da kyi bdag po gsang sngags grub pa gzhan thams cad dang lha ma yin gyi rig pa 'dzin pa rnams kyi dbang
281a5(rgyud): byug sa 'og thaMd kyi bdag po// lha ma yin chen po'i sprul pa byed pa po bskal pa chen por gnas pa/ khyab 'jug gi 'khor lo hUM zhes bya ba brjod pa tsam gyis
281a6(rgyud): lhag par byed pa// khyab 'jug kyang hUM zhes brjod pa tsam gyis brlag por byed na// gzhan lta smos kyang ci dgos// sgrub pa'i thabs gzhan yang bde bar gshegs pa'i mchod rten 'acu
281a7(rgyud): phrag sum cu byas te// mchod rten re ro'i mdun du stong phrag brgyad brgyad bzla bar bya'o// thams cad la nye bar spyod pa tha~Md kyis mchod la tha mar me tog can gyi lcags las byung ba'i 'khor lo/ 
281a8(rgyud): cibs drug pa mtho gang tsam pa bzung nas cho 'phrul gyi zla ba phyed pa skyil mo krung bcings te/ ji srid 'bor ba de srid du bzlas par bya'o// de blangs pas rig pa 'dzin pa'i 'khor log
281b1(rgyud): bsgru bar 'tho / rig pa 'dzin pa'i rgyal po tha~Md kyi mnga' bdag dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa lha tha 'dul bar byed pa bskal pa bye ba stong phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgur 'tsho ba dang / 'jig rten
281b2(rgyud): gyi khams stong rdzu 'phrul gyis 'dul ba dang / mchod pa'i sprin rgya stong phrag gis mchod par byed pa dang / sangs rgyas stong phrag mthong bar 'gyur// de rnams la nyi mo re re ning mchod pa chen
281b3(rgyud): be'i sprin gyis mchod par byed// sgrub pa'i thabs rgyas pa gzhan yang mchod rten 'bum phrog drug cu byas te/ sngon du brnyan pa byas la bye ba bzlas pa'o// de nas mtshan nyid thaMd dang ldan pa'i
281b4(rgyud): rol khrus byas nas/ nye bar 'kho ba tha~Md kyis mchod de ji srid ma langs pa ji srid du bzla bar bya'o// langs nas dpu chu dang bcud len dang / mi snang ba la sogs pa tha~Md de la
281b5(rgyud): steng bar byed// gal te ma ster na ji srid kha las lce ma byung ba de srid du bzla bar bya'o// de nas mtshon rnon pos de tra cad par bya'o// de bzung bas nyi ma stong gi gzi 'dzi
281b6(rgyud): can rig pa 'dzin pa thams cad kyi rgyal po rig pa 'dzin 'bye ba stong phrag drug cu'i 'khor can/ tshe bskal pa bya ba brgya stong phrag drug cu 'tsho ga sangs rgyas kyi zhing thang du rdzu 'phrul
281b7(rgyud): gyis 'gro ba dang / ri bo lhun po bye ba brgya stong skul ba dang / gling stong phrag 'phen pa dang / rgya mtsho stong phrag skams pa dang / lha'i 'jig rten brgya stong phrag bsdigs pa dang tshangs
281b8(rgyud): ba dang / khyab 'jug dang dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa rnams lhung ba dang / ska li zhing 'khyil ba dang / lo brgyad gnyis pa'i rnam pa dang / rgyan thams cad kyis rnam par brgyan pa ste/ 
282a1(rgyud): sgeg pa'i bskal pa na log rkyen gyi khams gzhan du 'gro zhing nab dang 'tho ba med par 'gyur shes bcos rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dang drug chen pos de da ces bka' stsal to// 
282a2(rgyud): de bzhin du yid bzhin gyi nor bu dang dpag bsam gyi shing dang / bum pa bzang po dang nor gyi char pa dang / na mkha' mdzod kyi ting 'dzin chen po dong rin po che chen po'i lhag pa dang / nor rgyun gyi rtog pa
282a3(rgyud): / chen po dang sen gyi re ba thaMd rjesu 'gengs pa dang / 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal srid pang / rin po che tha~Md kyang bsgrub par bya'o// de la 'di lta ste 'khor lo rin po che dang / blang ba rin po che dang
282a4(rgyud): rta rin po che dang / nor bun po che dang / bud med rin po che dang / khyim bdag rin po che dang / bsnyen bkur ba rin po che'o// de nas sgrub bo'i thabs gzhan yang tsan dan dkar po las badz+ra
282a5(rgyud): sor drug pa'i tshad byas la pad+ma de lag par bzung nas zla ba drug tu skyil krung bcings te/ nye bar spyod pa thaMd kyis mchod na sa thun mtshams gsum 'am bzhir grangs mi
282a6(rgyud): bar bzlas par bya'o// zla ba drug yongasu rdzogs pa dang pad+ma 'bum phrag bdun bsregs blugs bya'o// zla ga nya nas sgrul pa brtsam par bya ste nye bar spyod pa tha~Md kyis mchod la skyil krungs
282a7(rgyud): bcas nas mtshan thog thag bzlas par bya'o// tho rangs kyi tshe rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur// skra li zhing 'khyil pa dang lo brgyad gnyis kyi rnar rgyan gyi tshogs thaMd kyis brgyan gnyi ma stong
282a8(rgyud): phrag shar ba'i 'od dang mtshungs pa rig pa 'dzin pa bye ba phrag du ma ri 'khor can/ lha'i bu mo bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du mas yongs bskor ba/ tshangs pa la sogs pa'i lha rnams
282b1(rgyud): ma ga gdug par 'khrugs sa rgyas kyi par du byung cig cas kyis rnam par gyug dang mchod pa'i smin du mas de bzhin gshegs pa rnams rnas bya markyod par 'gyung de ba sa
282b2(rgyud): la'i sgrub pa dang / tsan dan dmar po'i ma'i sgrub pa yang // sgrub pa gzhan yang 'byung ste/ shal dang / pad+ma rA ga 'am// mu tig gi 'bras bu 'am/ rin po che yongasu rtog par byed pa pos yongasu
282b3(rgyud): brtags pa la/ 'di bar gshegs pa'i mtho'i tshad tsam pa'i mchod rten 'bum tsam byas te/ gang yang rudu bar grangs mi gzung ba ji srid bdag yongasu dag pa mthong ba de srid du bzlas par
282b4(rgyud): bya'o// de'i rje su mngar gsum gyis sbags pa'i pad+ma 'bum dang / sna ma'i me tog 'bum phrag gsum dang / a ka ru'i yam shing 'bum dang / tsan dan gyi yam shing 'bum phrag gsum
282b5(rgyud): dang til dang 'bras 'bum phrag bzhi dang / zho zan 'bum dang / ma ra gyi sreg blugs stong phrag gsum dang / sman zad pa'i sregs blugs 'bum phrag cig byas la sbyin bsre
282b6(rgyud): yongasu rdzogs pa dang / dkar po'i tshes bco lnga la bsgrub par bya'o// skyil mo krung bcas te nye bar spyod pa thaMd kyis mchod la/ ji srid nor bu rin po che 'bar ba de srid du bzlas par bya'o// 
282b7(rgyud): 'bar nas kyang rig pa 'dzin pa gzhon nu gdong du 'gro bar 'gyuraro// ska la zhong 'khril ba dang / lo brgyad pa gnyis kyis rnam pa rgyan thaMd kyis brgyan pa/ phyogs bcu mu med pa'i 'jig
282b8(rgyud): rten gyi khams rgyas par gsal bar byed pa/ rig pa 'dzin pa tha~Md kyi slar 'khor los bsgyur ba chen por 'gyur// yid bzhin nor bu'i dngos grub byang chub sede'i chen po'i rig pa
283a1(rgyud): / 'dzin pa zhes brjod// sangs rgyas zad mchod cing bsnyen bkur bar byed// skad cig tsam la 'jig rten gyi khams zad kyi sen bskor nas/ skur de nyid du 'ong bar 'gyur// 
283a2(rgyud): gal te 'dod na byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs mngon par rdzogs par byas te lus de nyid kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub par mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba
283a3(rgyud): 'gyuraro// de bzhin du sgrub thabs kyi le'u bris sku dang / shing lha ma dang mu tig gi phreng ba yang yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i tsho gas bsgrub par bya'o// thang du 'grub par 'gyuraro// sgrub pa'i thabs
283a4(rgyud): gzhan yang mchod rten bye ba brag stong byas te/ 'bum phrag pa dun bzla bar bya'o// yongasu rdzogs pa dang / me tog can gyi lcags sam/ lpags lnga'i rang bzhin gyi
283a5(rgyud): rtse me lnga pa sor bcu'i tshad dam bde bar gshegs pa'i mtha 'tshad tsam cho 'phrul gyi zla ba phyed la mtshan thog tha ga lag pas rdo rje de bzung nas mdun du khri'i steng
283a6(rgyud): du lag pa bkab la/ ji srid 'bar bar gyur pa de srid du bzlas par bya'o// de nas bzung rdo rje'i rig pa 'dzin pa 'khor los bsgyur ba chen po nyi ma bye ba brgya phrag dang / rje su 'tsham pa rdo rje 'chang
283a7(rgyud): ba ltar gzi brjid dang ldan zhing 'od gsal bar 'jig rten gyi khams thaMd rnam par rgyu zhing / dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa'i lha rnams la ci bsgo ba nyan par 'gyur/ lha ma yin
283a8(rgyud): rnams skrag pa dang / srin po rnams 'joms pa dang / sen thams cad de'i ci bsgo ba byed par 'byung bar bac+doMs de bzhin gshegs pa tha~Md kyi 'khor lo bsgyur ba chen pos de skad
283b1(rgyud): ces bka' stsal to// rdo rje snying po rgyan gyi rgyun chen po las/ de bzhin gshegs pa zed kyi rdzas kyi bya ba bsgrub pa zhes bya ba'i sgrub thabs kyi le'u yo su rdzog so// de nas bcom ldan
283b2(rgyud): 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnams thed slar yang ting 'dzin la mnyam par gzhag ste/ bac+doMs thog ma dang tha ma med pa rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po la gsol ba btab pa/ 
283b3(rgyud): bac+doMs de bzhin gshegs pa tha~Md kyi gsang ba chen po ka k+Sha sbyar ba ste/ mtha' yas pa kha sbyar ba zhes bya ba bka' sbrul du gsol// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa zad
283b4(rgyud): kyi gsang ba chen po gsang sngags kyi ka krA pu tra bka' sprul gde nas yang dag bshad byug sangs rgyas kun gyi rjesu skyel// gsang sngags ka kla sbyar zhes bya// gsang chen
283b5(rgyud): mchog tu rmad du byung // gru bzhi pa la tshad mdzes pa// kun nas yongasu bzang zhing dgar mig bzhi bsdu zhe dgu pa/ mdor bsdus nas ni sngags pas bya// dang po brang bzang gzhi
283b6(rgyud): la ni sas sogs blo gros ldan pas dgod// ka sogs lhag ma'i re mig la// sngags pas mdo ru bsdus te dri// sbyor ba ji bzhin yi ge kun// go rims bzhin du dgod par bya/ re mig stong pa
283b7(rgyud): dag la ni/ k+Sha yig dang ni rdo rje br-i / rim pa 'di dag bkod nas ni// rang sde'i 'og tu 'bar ba mchog/ dang po dbyas la rjesu// yig phyag rgya mdor bsdus pa// kaM tsaT ta po la ya shA dag
283b8(rgyud): cing chu yi dkyil 'khor ldan/ 'di rnams myur du 'grub par byed// pad+ma'i rigs kyi lha nyid// don kun grub par yang dag ldan// ma yi dkyil 'khor zhe su bshad// 'bar ba'i me dang
284a1(rgyud): mtshungs pa'i 'od// kha tshanatha ba ra Sha/ dbang chen gyi ni dkyil 'khor ldan/ ga tha ra da pa las// dngos grub kun byed rlung gzugs lhun/ dar gyi spyir ltar shin tu
284a2(rgyud): g+ha dz+ha D+ha d+ha b+ha wang ba/ steng 'gros dngos grub byed por brjod// slar yang nga nya Na na ma// chos kun dbang du byed pa mchog// thog ma'i dbyangs yog gang yin pa// de ni de bozhin gshegs stobs bcu
284a3(rgyud): khyad par yan lag bcu gnyis bshad// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sa bcu gnyis// ma ning yige bon 'o spong // r-i r-I l-i l-I zhes bya ba// dbyangs dang sa bon de bzhin sngags// de dag yaM ge
284a4(rgyud): yong bshad/ dbang du byed pa'i sde tshan kun// thig le sgra gtsug zla phyed ces// rjes dbyangs kyi ni phrang zhes bshad// sangs rgya so de bzhin byang sems kyis// yi ger brjod pa de
284a5(rgyud): bzhin zhing // gsal byed ces kyis gsal ba'o// de bzhin ya ra ya wa rlung / me dang dbang chen chu dag ste// 'byung ba chen po khams rnam so// rlung ma bdud rtsi'i bcud ces

284a7(rgyud): chos rnams kun gyi sdom bu brjod// stong pa mtshan med smon med pa// rnam par thar pa gsum du bshad// phung po khams dang skye mched rnams// mkhas pa yis ni shes par bya// 
284a8(rgyud): da ni sngags kyi ka rje'i sbyor ba la// rab tu btus pa sbyong ba dang bral ba bshad par bya'o// ga rnams kyis byang chub spyod/ sangs rgyas nyid kyang mya ngan 'das/ lhan cig nyid duskye/

284b2(rgyud): nyid// stor ba nyid du legs par bshad// thog mar sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// gsang sngags dri ma med pa 'byung // thog mar dbyangs ni thig le ldan// rdo rje'i steng du yang dag gnas/

284b5(rgyud): sangs rgyas kun gyi spyod pa ste/ sa dang pha rol phyin pa rnams// byang chub sems nas rab tu bshad// dro ba'i bzhi pa sdu ra ba ni// mya ngan 'das pa ni su bsgrags/ dbyangs
284b6(rgyud): dang yi ge khyad par can// mtshan nyid rab tu sbyor bar bya// rang gi phyag rgya sogs ldan pas// sangs rgyas byang chub rab gsol byed// da ni sangs rgyas tha~Md kyi sngags kyi de nyid 'drir bshad
284b7(rgyud): bya/ thog mor spyod pa byas nas ni// gnyis pa smra ba bau ru bshad// bzhi pa'i dbyangs kyis kun nas mnan// gsum pa me yi ming cano// rgyu med pas ta cung zad pa// bzhi pa yis
284b8(rgyud): ni gsal bar byas// drug pa'i sgra dang tha dad med// de yi steng du thig le gnas// chos kun na mkha' dang mtshungs par// yang dang yang du bshad pa yin// de ni lnga par shes
285a1(rgyud): / ba rgyas yig lbu ba stobs po che/ yi ge lha yi stobs lnga'i bdag nyid las skyes gtse// mthu stobs chen po khyab bdag srid pa'i bdug da skyes/

286b7(rgyud): bas rjer dge// tshig dang ngag gi tshad rnams dang / ting 'dzin dang sngags 'byung ba// slob dpon man ngag las shes bya// gzhan du bya ba ma yino// rdo rje snying po rgyan ces bya ba'i rgyud chen po

287a1(rgyud): rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang drug chen po la gsung dag gi dkyil 'khor gsel ba btab bo// de nas bac+doMs rnam par snang mdzad kyis gsol ba btab pa'i tshig gi rjes nyid la/ 
287a2(rgyud): 'dug gi sgra mtha' yas pa legs pa bsgrags pa na mkha'i mdzod kun nas rdo rje rgya che ba tshangs pa chen po'i sgra yongasu rdzogs pa'i don dang / de bzhin gshegs pa tha~Md kyi gsung gi 'khor lo
287a3(rgyud): dkyil 'khor so sor yongasu rtogs pa'i don du de bzhin gshegs pa tha~Md kyi gsung grub pa zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po bka' stsal pa/ de nas yang dag bshud pa ba// gsung gi
287a4(rgyud): 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor che// zlum po kun nas bzang po ste// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor lta bur gnas// de yi steng du pad chen po// mdab ma brgyad la ga sa sa na// rdo la lte ba'i dbusu
287a5(rgyud): ni yi ge mchog gaM go 'brang nyid// bdag gis dngos grub pas/ ma par bya// ngag gi dbang phyug 'od chen go/ snying Sha k+Sha dang pad ma// de yi stang du dang brtag bya// dung gi dbusu lce
287a6(rgyud): yin te// rdo rje'i rang bzhin dag pa'o// de yaM srung du rin chen pad// yang na sangs rgyas gzugs brnyan yang // 'bar zhing rkan gyi mtha' khyab pa// bdud rtsi rgyun ni rab 'bab pa// baM yaM yig sgyu
287a7(rgyud): tshugs pa// sangs rgyas kyi ni steng du gnas// bdud rtsi'i thigs pa 'dzag pa ni// go rims bzhi na bsam par bya/ zla ba phyed dang zla ba gsum// zla ba bin 'am zla ba nyid/ zla ba brgyad du rab mchog
287a8(rgyud): bsgoms// dkyil 'khor bzang po bsgrub par ga/ skye'i klungs kyis ni nyer gnas te// dang po'i sbyor ba'i dbang phyug skyes// chos kyi dbyings ni mtha' dag tu// bad du ni yongasu gang / 
287b1(rgyud): sangs rgyas gzugs brnyan sgom par bya// chos dpyis mnyam dang mi mnyam pa// sangs rgyas kun gyi rjes skyob pa'i// ji snyed rig pa dzad ni// lus dang ngag dang yid rnams kyi// phyag
287b2(rgyud): rgya de rnams bdag nyid mchog/ de rnams thaMd bdog nyid kyi// lus kyi dkyil 'khor la 'jug bsam// dung gau sgra ni gsal ba bsam// badz+ra khams la yang dag brta no// papI ge
287b3(rgyud): sar thig le las// sgra yi rang bzhin rdul phran rnams// mgrin par son nas sgra gyur te/ sgra ni dbyangs nyid lhag pa'o// slar yang lce ru son pa dang / yi ge mchog tu dge pa'o// lnga
287b4(rgyud): yi yige char 'ab ga gcig nas gcig tu rdo rje'i tshul// kun nas rab tu 'di gsal ga/ rdo rje'i ngag ni dam pa'i don// sgra yis na mkha' kun gang bang// sgrub pos mdo ru
287b5(rgyud): bsdus te bzla// de bzhin du ni snying khar sgra 'am// lce la 'od zer nges 'phros nas// mchu 'am so la rab bkra ba'i// ga nye 'od zer mthong na ni// de tshe grub par rnar shes// gru
287b6(rgyud): bi'i ngag ni dam pa'i don// yang na lha ni gzhan pa yi// ngag gi sgrub thabs chen po mchog/ rang lce rdo rje'i rang bzhin bsam// bdag nyid rdo rje sems dpa' nga // 'bar ba'i sgron ma dang mtsha

288a1(rgyud): yang rig bad/ yang dang yang zhugs la byed cing // hUM lu rje rje 'ag ba// rdul ldan m+b+ha ba bye bzhin pa'i// rdo rje 'ab ba skyong drag dag yang dang yang dun ma

293b1(rgyud): kun du namapara' yos gang ga/ gas sngags stong bag bsgom par ga/ rang nyid 'jig rten gsum rnam rgyag/ chos kyi dargyas kyi mabs klas pa/ ba tshwa chung kyis yang dag dang / kun

293b3(rgyud): dang yang du blta bar bya// gdul bya ma lus sems la ni// stobs po ches ni dag par bya// khe dog dbyings ni 'di bzhin du// sna tshogs gzugs la cher 'bar ba// kun nas yongasu bsdus
293b4(rgyud): nas ni// sngags pa'i mdun du bzhag par bya// de nas snga gas pas de ma thag/ slar yang rtse gcig sems kyis ni/ dgug dang gzhag dang bcing ba las// dbang du bya ba bsgrub par

294a1(rgyud): so// thams cad rdo rje'i rang bzhin gzugs/ mA y-i dkyil 'khor dge ba ste// de yi dus b+hu ba ni/ dkyil 'byor na dang ba mchis pa/ de meda.u de

294a4(rgyud): 'jigs shing 'jigs/ bskal pa'i mi dang 'dra bar gnas// ma'o nr-i pa la mche 'a pon// 'jig pa'i dus kyi thal ba 'dra/ sbyin rdzi sgra dang mtshus pa y-i/ sI ga yig bani dang ldan/

294a6(rgyud): dang rdo rje 'dzin pa'i rgyal po 'od// kun mchog srid pa'i dbang phyug gis// 'jig rten gsum yang 'gugs byed na// bud med gzhan lta smos ci dgos// tshangs pa khyab 'jug de

294a8(rgyud): snying khar son// dbang po gnyis ni mnyam sbyor bas// rdo rje can gyis sngon du sgrub// bsam pa thaMd rdzogs byed pa// bcom ldan rdo rje can 'grub 'gyur// rgyal po thaMd sbyin gyur na/ dngos
294b1(rgyud): klub gzhan lta smos ci dgos// sngags ni 'dir// oM Tik+ki hUM dzaHgsang sngags 'di yi sbyor ba yis// dam pa'i don du bsgrub bar bya// los spyod ji snyed thaMd rnams// de snyed bang rnam pang ste

294b5(rgyud): la bu gcig lta bur rnam pa spro// sgom pa'i sbyor bas bsgom sa na ni// gnyis med ma rgyal ba las rgyal// spro ba dang ni bsdu ba dang // thim sogs phyogs dbyes nor byed//

295a1(rgyud): sa thAs ma ya mu nu ga ta swA hA// gsang sngags bdag nyid rgyal po 'di// byams pa zhes ni grags pa ste/ chos kyi dbyings dang mtshungs par khyag// byams pa'i thugs ni

299a5(rgyud): tshemachar sprin mchog 'dra cher gnas pa// dus mtha'i mi dnga' dra bar gnas// mdog chen rgyal po 'khyil ba 'dra// zar ma yi ni me tog mtshungs// khro bo thod pa'i phreng ba
299a6(rgyud): 'chang gshin rje mthar byed stobs po che// de la sngags kyang / oM AHhUM dag/ oM ya ma mthan hUM phaT/ oM hrIHSh+T+rIHbikr-i tA na na sU sarba sha tAn nA sha ya stam+b+ha ya hUM phaT/ sngags
299a7(rgyud): kyi rgyal po bdag nyid 'di// khyab bdag gdul dka'i 'dul ba po// gshin rje mthar mdzad khro bo che// sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag nyid gtse// sangs rgyas thaMd spyan 'dren cing // dbang du yang
299a8(rgyud): ni mdzad par 'dug/ shin tu gdug pa drag rnams la zho ba nye bar mi sbyar te/ shes rab thabs kyi bdag nyid kyis// de bzhin gshegs rnams khro bor mdzad// zug rje khro ba dang tshul
299b1(rgyud): can 'jig rten gsum kyang rjes srag mdzad// de bas 'bad pa tha~Md kyis// shes rab thabs kyi bdag nyid sku// thugs rjes khro bo ma lus mchog/ gdug pa 'dul bar mdzad pa bskyed/ 
299b2(rgyud): gshin rje mthar mdzad kyi sgrub pa'i thab so// // de nyid bcom ldan rnal 'byor te// khro bo gzegs ma nesu grags// dmar po 'bar ba'i khro ba che// 'jigs pa chen po'i dus dang 'a
299b3(rgyud): ut+pal sngon po'i mdab ma bzhini// de yi kha dog rnam par bsam// drag po chen po'i zhal bzhi pa// 'bar ba'i phreng ba mkhrigs pa'i 'od// spyan gsum pa la khro gnyer bster// phyag
299b4(rgyud): drug pa la mchog tu 'bar/ me si khams dang 'dra ba'i mdog/ li khri'i mdog lngar shin tu 'bar/ de yi khro gnyer bster ba yis// gdug pa 'dul mdzad 'byin par byed// khro
299b5(rgyud): po'i rgyal po gnyis pa ni// yang dang yang du bsam par bya//  lus sa rnams zad du// son pa'i bdag nyid chen po de sa// 'gug pa dang ni dbang byed na// skyo ba gzhon lha
299b6(rgyud): smos ci dgos// sngags ni/ oM ka Ni d+hu ni hUM phaT khro bo 'di yi sngags 'dzin pa 'jig rten gsum mchog sbo po che// sa rnams thaMd sreg byed na// skye bo gzhan lta smos ci dgra
299b7(rgyud): khro bo gzigs ma sgrub pa'i thab so// / de nyid bcom ldan rnal 'byor te// rdo rje se 'i de bzhin gshegs/ pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug 'gyur// rta mgron zhesu bshad pa yin// rtag tu
299b8(rgyud): 'bar ka'i mdog 'dreg rgya skyegs mdog ltar 'bar ba po// chu dang gauzi brjod can reg pa/ me yi dkyil 'khor dag dang ldan/ 'dod ldan rnams la 'dod pa 'byung // gdug pa can
300a1(rgyud): / rnams gdug pa 'byung // zhi ba la'ang zhi ba 'thung // stobs ldan rnams la stobs kyis sbyor// zhal bzhi pa la zhabs zhi// bsam gtan bzhi dang mnyam par ldan/ 
300a2(rgyud): phyag bzhi pa la brtson 'grus che// seng ge ltar gnas mche ba bani// rta mgrin rgyal po chen po ni// dam pa'i dbang phyug bsgrub par bya// skad cig nyid la bslang nas ni// zad slong ba
300a3(rgyud): bsgrub par bya// sngags ni/ oM a mr-i tod+b+ha bod b+ha be hUM phaT/ oM a mr-i tod b+ha ba hUM phaT// g.yas dang g.yon gyi sbyor ba yis// g.yon brkyang ba ni rab tu sbyar// khro bo'i dkyil krung byas
300a4(rgyud): nas ni// 'jig rten 'de rab nyid bya// pad+mi dbang phyug rgyal be ni// kun mchog sa yaM dbang phyug ste// rta yi mgrin pa stob sa po che// stobs kyi sbyor bas bsgrub par bya// 
300a5(rgyud): byug chen po la sogs lha// tshogs kyi bdag po gzhan dag dang // mingang gdug pa'i bsam pa can// sa rnams thaMng dgug par bya// rta mgrin sgrub pa'o thab so// 
300a6(rgyud): de nyid bcom ldan rnal 'byor de// gcig pu nyid ni lhag pa'i lha// shes rab thabs kyi bdag nyid gyur// khro bo mchog tu mi 'gyur ba// kun sbyor bdag gi rnal 'byor gyis// thugs rjes
300a7(rgyud): bo'i dbang du song // de nas sangs rgyas thaMd kyi// sna yi rtse mor yid kyis ni// g.yo ba med par bsam par bya// slob dpon mi g.yo khro bo che// de bzhin gshegs po thaMd brtan// ral gri zhag+sa
300a8(rgyud): pa 'dzin pa gsang // thog ma tha ma med pa'i mchog/ pr-i yang ku ltar ldang ba'i gzugs// 'khrigs shing byis pa lta bur gnas// ma lus pa yis rnams kun// chos dbyings
300b1(rgyud): mnyam dang mi mnyam pa// khro bo mngag pa bran dang ni// pho nyas kyang ni rnar brgyan// skye bo kun gyis yongasu gang // sangs rgyas kun gyi spyan snga na// bka' lung yang ni yongasu stsol// zad pa'i
300b2(rgyud): dus dang 'drar gnaso// sngags ni/ na maHman+ta badz+ra NAM tsaN+Da ma hA ro Sha Na s+pho Ta yau hUM/ tA ka hA nAM/ khro bo'i gzi brjid chen po 'di// gzugs mang mnga' ba stobs po che// 'gro ba thad 'gug
300b3(rgyud): bar byed// dbang du yang ni mdzad par gnas// rlung dang maM las yang dag byung // 'bar ba lte bu'i gzi brjid can// sngags dang phyag rgya sogs kun mchog/ lus dang ngag yid de bzhi no// 
300b4(rgyud): dgug dang gzhug dang bcing ba dang / dbang du byas nas bsgru 'ar bya/ de la sogs pa mtha' yas mchog// namakha'i kham sa kyi mthas klas mchog/ khri bo phyag rgya rang 'gyur
300b5(rgyud): badrag po thog ma tha ma med// rnar 'phro ba bzhin du gnas// de bzhin gshegs pa tha~Md kyi rdo rje snying po rgyan gyi rgyud la sa khro bo'i dkyil 'khor 'di yongasu rdzog so// 
300b6(rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa tha~Md slar yang 'dus te/ gshegs nas bac+doMs la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gzungs thams cad kyi dbang phyug gi rgyal
300b7(rgyud): po bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba btab pa/ bcom ldan 'das gzengs rnams thaMd kyi dkyil 'khor bskyed par mdzad du gsol// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gzungs kyi
300b8(rgyud): dkyil 'khor bka' stsal pa/ de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// gzungs rnams kyi ni dkyil 'khor dge / gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa/ rta 'bas kyis ni rnar mdzes// thig bzhi dang ni yang
301a1(rgyud): / dag ldan// dkyil 'khor dam pa rab tu bshad// dri yi dbusu pad chen po/ kho ba kun gyis shin tu mdzes// nI shu rtsa lnga'i mdab mar ldan// rdo rje rin tshun legs par gyur/ 
301a2(rgyud): de yi dbusu rtag bri ga// dpag med shes rab pha rol phyin// de yi nye 'khor thams cad du// sna tshogs las ni 'bar rnams la// nyi shu rtsa lnga'i dbye ba yis/ shes rab pha rol byin ma bri/ shA
301a3(rgyud): gyi mdab ma nas brtsams ste// thog mtha' nyid kyang brtag par bya// phyag rgya'i yig ci rigs par// go rims bzhin du rnam par dgrod// phyogs ma'i dbye ba tha dad kyis// kha dog dbye ba thaMd
301a4(rgyud): durgyarnam dpe mchog tu sna tshogs pa// chos dbyings mnya mo dang mi mnyam pa/ de las 'od zer bsam mi byag/ sngo ser l-i sogs dbye ba yo/ shes rab snang ba'i dkyil 'khor
301a5(rgyud): gyis/ 'gro ba thad gsol bar bya// 'dus par gyur nas de dag kun// lha nyid kyi ni gzugs ji bzhin// shes rab chen po gzugs chen po// 'bar bcas mdzes pa'i ga
301a6(rgyud): brjod can// de yi lte ba'i dkyil du ni// sngags kyi dkyil 'khor kun nas rten// sku ni gser gyi mdog dang 'dra// rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par brgyan// rang gi ting 'dzin la zhugs
301a7(rgyud): du ma'i gzugs kyi gzugs ldan pa// shes rab pha rol phyin ma ni// sems can khams ni rnam sbyor mdzad// kun nas seMn rnams kyi yum// seMn kun gyi da du// tha lus la mnyam
301a8(rgyud): bar khyab// sems kyi rgyun bzhin legs par zhugs// dag pa med cing bsam mi khyab// dri ma med cing ngang gi stong // na mkha' dang ni mtshungs 'dra ba// dngos dang dngos med rnam par
301b1(rgyud): spangs dpog ma tha ma med cing ni// chos rnams kun gyi dbang phyug smra// sdig pa kun las rnar grog/ 'den pa gnyis la rnar gnas/ dam pa dang ni dam pa'i don// chos kyi sku ru de bshad// 
301b2(rgyud): dbang po kun kyang rnam par shes// sen thams cad thad du// yid kyi rnam shes zhesu bshad// shes rab blo dang blo gros dran// lhag mthong dang ni ye shes kun// kun nas nyon mongs rnam pa
301b3(rgyud): bya rtag dang chad pa'i mtha' dang ldan// mtha' gnyis pa ni rnar spangs// kun rdzob dang ni dam pa'i ngan// rnam pa gnyisu de rab brtags// ji ltar bud shing la rten nas// ma yi sa bon gnas
301b4(rgyud): ba dang // til la til mar ji bzhi ni// khur shing ro ba zhi na rab tu brtag/ me tog dr-i ni ji bzhin nam// zho la ma sar ji bzhin du// rnal 'byor ba yis ye shes sdug/ bdud rtsi
301b5(rgyud): lta bu'i snying po 'byung // gtsub shing dang ni gtsub stan la// ji bzhin gtsubs pas me 'byung ste// de ba zhin ye shes rnal 'byor pas// bsrungs pas yongasu brtag
301b6(rgyud): bar bya/ shes bya'i dkyil 'khor tha~Md la// yang nas yang du bsrabs par dang // mun bzang rnams sel ba'i// nyi mi'i 'od zer ji bzhin 'dago// na mkha' dri ma med 'arten nas// nyi ma
301b7(rgyud): zla ba ji bzhin gnas/ 'char ba yi ni gsal byed pa// 'bar ba stong phrag gi no snod// smyen 'akun 'joms skar ma la// kun nas kyang ni mdzes pa yin/ rnal 'byor pas ni ji ltar sem
301b8(rgyud): mkha' bzhin shin tu dri ma med// gzung 'dzin las ni nges par grol// mnyam dang mi mnyam dngos po kun// de nas rnal 'byor pa rnams kyis// ye shes nyi zla mtshungs pa'i 'ang/ 
302a1(rgyud): shes rab pha rol phyin bsgoms te// gsang sngags 'dis ni bsam par bya// rang bzhin gyi ni dag pa'i dngos// rang bzhin med par rjer gnas// rang bzhin gyis ni 'od
302a2(rgyud): gsal kun// gdod nas ma skyes rnyog pa med// yig de nyid de lta bu// gnas dang mi gnas rnar spangs// snga tshan bzhi pa'i gnyis pa la// thig le sgra yis rnam par brgyan// de nyid
302a3(rgyud): bcom ldan mgon po ste// shes rab pha rol phyin mar bshad// oM pra dz+nyA swA hA/ oM shru ti smr-i ti bi dza ye swAh+ne// sangs rgyas rnams kyi shes rab 'dis// bsam pa zad rdzogs par
302a4(rgyud): byed// oM yaM 'di ni sangs rgyas kun gyi yum// 'dadi ni 'khor lo rdor bsgyur/ 'di ni dngos grub zade dang // grub pa nyid ni byed bar gnas// bstan bcos rab tu 'chad byed dang
302a5(rgyud): shes bya zad khyad par du// thad mkhyen pa'i chos rnams kun// dbang phyug dam pas shes par 'gyur// shes rab la rol phyin mi'i sgrub pa'i thab so// // shes
302a6(rgyud): rab pha rol phyin gnyis pa// rdzu 'phrol chen po mkha' dang mnyam// gsar gyi mdog can 'bar ba can// zla ba'i gdan la legs par bzhugs// brtson 'grus chen po bsam gtan
302a7(rgyud): bya sngags kyi yig rnam par brgyan// mchog tu rnal 'byor ma rnams kyis// sangs rgyas spyan zhes btags pa yi// de yi gsang sngags rab bshad pa// nyon cig sa rnams
302a8(rgyud): 'dod pa rnams// sngags ni oM ru ru s+phu ru dz+wa la tin+da sid+d+hi lo tsa ni sarba ar+tha sA d+ha ni swA hA// 'od de mchog tu gsang ba ni// rnal 'byor ma la mchog tu ba~M shad/ dbang chen yig
302b1(rgyud): mthar thugs pa// bsgoms pas dge ba rab tu sbyar// chos kyi phyag rgya 'di shin tu// sen thaMd dbang du byed// dpung dang bcas pa myur bkug ste// bran du gyur nas nye bar gnas/ 
302b2(rgyud): phyag rgya gcig pa'i lha mo che// rol cing g.yo ba'i zhal mnga' ba/ sgeg pa la sogs nyams dang ldan// rol cing snang ba'i gang mdzad pa// sangs rgyas spyan ni 'grub par 'gyur
302b3(rgyud): mog gi phyag rgya rab tu sbyar// mig gi phyag 'di shin tu/ 'jig rten gsum yang gar byedo// sangs rgyas sbyin gyi phyag rgya'i sgrub pa'i theb so// chu yi dkyil 'khor dgyes pa na/ 
302b4(rgyud): bcud kyis len dang mtshungs pa'i mchog/ mtha' yas rgya sa shing yangs pa yi// dri ma med pa'i mkha' la gnas// / dkyil 'khor de yi dbu su naM// lha mo mchog
302b5(rgyud): tu mdzes pa mo// 'dam bu mda' rgyu'i mdog ltar dkar// / grub ma ral pa'i cod pan 'chang // 'gro ba mtha' dag snang mdzad ma// rtag tu na mkha' bzhin du
302b6(rgyud): gnas// sngags ni/ oM ka Te bi ka Te ka TaM ka TaM swA hA// gos dkar mo ya phyag rgya che// dung dang kun da zla ba 'dra// sngags kyi yi ge'i phreng ba che// pad+mi ra rgyal po rab tu gnas// 'ag
302b7(rgyud): ba mtha' dag snang mdzad na// sgrub pa pos ni bsgrib par bya// dam pa'i lha mo 'grub par 'gyur// pad+ma dkyil 'khor sgrub pa'i thabs// zhi ba'i ro dang yang dag ldan// zhi ba'i
302b8(rgyud): yi ge mnyam par ldan// zhi bo'i mdzad cing 'jig rten gyi// sa gsum sgrub par byed pa'i thabs// gos dkar me'i sgrub pa'i thabs// / stobasangs dkar mo sna tshogs
303a1(rgyud): / gzugs/ rnam pa sna tshogs rgyan gyis brgyan// zla ba'i kyil 'khor dbus gnas pa/ skrag pa'i nyams kyis yongs gang gA 'gro ba mtha' dag skyob mdzad pa
303a2(rgyud): thugs rje'i thugs dang ldan pa can// rab tu 'bad de bsgrub par bya// rol pa yi ni yigs mchod// sngags ni/ oM tA re tut+tA re tu re swA hA// chos kyi phyag rgya mtha' yas mchog/ 
303a3(rgyud): sgrol mas legs par rab tu gnas// gsang chen legs par rab tu gnas// gsang chen bzhin du thaMd la// bcud kyis lini dang 'dra ba'i mchog/ kun tu kun tshe bad bu dngos grub
303a4(rgyud): thaMd stsol bar mdzad// sgrol mo'i sgrub pa'i thab so// // / dkyil 'khor chen po'i dbus ni/ rnal 'byor dbang phyus rjen mo mchog/ phyag bani spyan ni gsum pa dang // ral nA
303a5(rgyud): cod pan dgagis gnas// 'dam bu mda' rgyu'i ma dog ltar dkar// dpa' ba la sogs nyams kyis ba rgyan// brtson 'grus chen mo 'jig sel ma// zla ba'i
303a6(rgyud): dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// rab tu 'bar ba'i med bzhin du// shin tu gnas gsal ba'i gzi brjid can// hUM ga~M yi ge bab me'i sgra// sa gsum po ni 'khrug pa mdzad// khro/ 
303a7(rgyud): gnyer can zhes legs par grags// sngags kyi phreng bas rnam par rgyan// sngags ni/ oM b+ha ya nA sa ni trA sa ni trA sa~M/ b+h+r-i ku Ti ta T+Ta tA ta Ta~M bir shwe te dza Ti ne/ oM Tak+ki swA
303a8(rgyud): swA hA gas sngags 'di ni brtson 'grus che// g.yang sngags kun gyi bdag nyid mchog/ 'gro ba kun kyang 'gugs byed na// gdug po'i sems lte spos ci dgos// 
303b1(rgyud): gnyer can gyi sgrub pa'i thab so// nyi ma'i dkyil 'bor dbus gnas par/ zla ba'i dkyil 'khor rdo rje can// rdo rjer blang ba yongasu bskor// ga rgyad dkyil 'khor kun nas dkris
303b2(rgyud): dang gnas rtag tu lha mo ni// stobs chen bri yang ku ltar ljang // phyag bzhi par de bsam par bya// rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par brgyan// rnal 'byor ma rnams cher zhi ba// dngos grub
303b3(rgyud): bde stsol ma// sngags kyi yi ge phreng ba che// rdo rje'i dbus song rab tu gnas// khro bo hUM mdzod gang ba'i mthar// dpa' ba'i nyams la sogs par ldan// lha mo 'jig rten gsuM
303b4(rgyud): rmongs byed// dngos grub chen po rab stsol ma// skangag tsam gyis 'gro ba kun/ nges par dbang du byed pa 'gyur/ rdo rje'i rlung gi phreng 'tshe// rdo rjer 'khor lo rab tu
303b5(rgyud): gnas// 'jigs pa chen po'i me ltar drag/ snang ba chen mo stab stobs mo che// pad+ma rA gu'i rnor 'dra/ rje 'bar bas rnar brgyan// mtshan ni mA ma ki zhes bya// lha
303b6(rgyud): mo 'jig rten gsum gyis mchod// sngags ni/ oM ku la d+hA tI ye na mAH/ shaM ka re/ shAn+tiM ka re/ g+huT+Ta g+huT g+hur+t+ti ni/ g+hA ta ya g+hu Ti ni swA hA oM ku lan d+hA ri ben b+ha bar d+ha hU~M pha
303b7(rgyud): gsang sngags 'di ni don gyi mchog/ sangs rgyas kun gyis ga sungs pa yin// sa gsum po ni 'gugs byed cing // chings pa la sogs lha rnams kun// 'gro ba thong 'gug
303b8(rgyud): byed la/ rang gi dbang du gnas pa'ang yin/ mA ma kI'i sgrub pa'i thab po// rlung gi dkyil 'khor drag po la// rdo rje lu gu rgyud kyi dri yi dbus snang ba che// zla bgadu
304a1(rgyud): / kyis rlu rgyan// des spros pa las bdag nyid ni// rdo rje lug rgyud kyi sku// phyag bzhi ma la lha mo de// rdo rje yin rgyun gyis brgyan/ dmar po 'bar ba de sa
304a2(rgyud): ni rdzas gsum po ni 'tshong bar mdzad// tshangs pa khyab 'jug dbang phyug cha// bkug nas dbang du mdzad par gnas// dngos grub thaMd 'dzin pa dang // da yi thugs kar rdo rje cha// 'bar ba'i/ 
304a3(rgyud): phra ba 'khrigs pa'i 'od// de yi 'bar ba lcags sgrog gi/ rnam pa rdo rje'i mtshan mas mtshan/ nges par phyug nas de dag kun// ches dbyings mnyam dang mi mnyam pa'o// 'jig rten khams na nathA
304a4(rgyud): dag tu// kun nas rnar bkang nas kyang // bsgom bya rdo rje thad du/ khro bo dang ldan spro ba'i na la// lto ba 'phyang zhing sku che ba/ mab bzhi yis rnam par brgyan// 'bar ba yi ni phreng
304a5(rgyud): bgasal// gzugs mdzes drag pa'i gzugs dang ldan// sngags ni/ oM badz+ra shr-i kha lA ya d+hi pa ti ya ma dAshA lA ya/ ma hA bAd+hi rA dzA ya te pra dz+wa li ta/ hastA ya na mo ni
304a6(rgyud): kAr+t+ta yaM ki rA ta ru ba lam+bo da rA ya/ b+h+ri ku TI mu khA ya/ mA dz+nyA ra mu khA yA/ tsa tu daMSh+Ti ka rA lA ya/ e h+ye hi a s+ya sha rI ri// ma nu pra bi sh+ya/ shI ra gr-ih+ni gr-i ba gr-ih+Na/ hasta ba daM gr-ih+NA bi Sha/ A
304a7(rgyud): shaM yi/ kaM ba ya kaM pa ya/ b+h+ra ma ya b+h+ra ma yi/ maN+Da la ma d+hi/ baM kur+tha baM kur+the/ nuN+DASh+Tat+te kun+daH Ta ya s+pho Ta ya/ maR+YA Ni/ ni kr-in+ta ya/ hri da ya/ ts+tshin+sa/ ba la ba lakr-in+du rA ya saM/ de gnA ga/ yak+SheH
304a8(rgyud): ba bi shA mAn+da sA d+ha yas ma ya ma nu sma radzA ta~M ma nu sma ra hA gAni d+hi ni d+hi ni shi ni shi/ badz+ra shr-i khaM lA A dz+nyA pe ya ti swA hA/ oM badz+ra ra Ni hUM phuT/ oM badz+ri Ni hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra kA ma~M/ 
304b1(rgyud): hUM phaT swA hA// gsang sngags 'di yi sbyor ba yis// bcud kyis lan ni bde ba dang // 'gro ba thaMd 'babs pa dang / gdug pa rnams ni 'ching ba dang / tshangs pa la sogs lha rnams dang
304b2(rgyud): lha dang lha mon lto 'phye che// 'jig rten skyong dang klu rnams kyang // rang gi gnas nas bskyod nas ni// grub pa kun 'os grub ni// dngos grub 'gugs par 'dod pa yis/ thi dgu sa
304b3(rgyud): bas sbyor bar byed// bud med gzugs kyis bsgrub par bya// rdo rje lagu rgyud ma'i sgrub pa'i thab so// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// pad+ma dmar po rab tu gnas// phyag ban
304b4(rgyud): ba la du ma'i gzugs// dung dang kun da zla ba 'dra// thugs kyi rdo rje'i de nyid yin// rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor dbus ni// zhi ba la so gas nyams dang ldan// chos rnams kun gyi bdag
304b5(rgyud): skyes mchog rnal 'byor pas ni rtag tu skam// sangs rgyas bye ba yan dag 'thung // der bdag yang dag sgom pa ni/ bskal byed ma zhes yongasu grags// sngags
304b6(rgyud): kyo phreng ba'i yig ljon// kun nas rnam par 'phro byed pa// na mkha'i khams ni yongs gang ba// ji srid de yi spyod yul yang // de srid de yo 'od zer bsgoms// rnakhyor ye shes
304b7(rgyud): kyis rab sprul// sngags ni/ oM tsa le tsu le tsun+de swA hA// 'di yi sngags kyi mchog gtso bo// sangs rgyas kun gyis mchod pa po// mtshungs pa med pa'i dngos grub ster// lha dang
304b8(rgyud): lha min bcas pas mchod// 'di yi ldog kun mjed byed cing // phun sum tshogs kun rab stsol mdzad// pad+ma'i phyag rgya yang dag ldan// sangs rgyas nyid kyang sngar byed
305a1(rgyud): pa 'ong bskul byed ma yi sgrub pa'i thab po// gsang ba mchog gi dgyes pa na// da bdag nyid rtag tu bzhugs// sangs rgyas kun bdag dgyes pa ni// rdo rje sede' bde ba'i
305a2(rgyud): mchog/ 'di ni rang byung bac+doMs// gcig pu nyid ni lhag pa'i lha// sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam sbyor ba// mkha' 'gro ma yi dra ba'i sdom// 'dod chags med cing chags bral med// dbu ma
305a3(rgyud): dmigs par mi 'gyur// bud med kun gyi sgyu ma'i rgya// 'di ni gnyis med theg pa'i mchog/ sgyu ma dag ni thaMd la sa// bud med sgyu mi khyad par 'phags// nus pa yi ni rang bzhin gyis// 
305a4(rgyud): rang bzhin nyid kyis de grub bo// 'jig rten gsum gyi bud me/ dad 'dis// bskur bar bya ba 'os pa yin// ngan spyod rnams kyisau kyang 'grub ste// snyed pa kun dang bde dang spro// 
305a5(rgyud): du med sgyu mas 'grug// rang gi ngo bo yongs bsgyur ba// sna tsho/ sa sgyu ma'i phyag rgya 'das// shes rab pha rol phyin mashad// kun la sna tshogs phyag rgya ni// kun la sna tsha
305a6(rgyud): sdom pa yaM sI// sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam par sbyor// stong pa nyid kyi de nyid bskyal// kun la kun nas thad du// rnam kun kun tshe rang nyid kyi// sangs rgyas thaMd brtan dong g.yo// bde dngos po ra
305a7(rgyud): nyid 'gyur// sems dang sen ting 'dzin dang // byang chub spyod pa sna tshogs nyid// sa dang pha rol phyin spyod pa// dbang nyid du yang de bshad// bdud dang bdud las rgyal ba nyid// sangs rgyas
305a8(rgyud): rdo rje de bzhin gshegs// thog ma tha ma med zhi ga// byang chub sangs rgyas bcom ldan de'o// rdo rje rdo rje 'dzin pa nyid// pad+ma de bzhin pad+ma 'dzin// ner bu nor bu 'dzin pa nyid// sna tshogs
305b1(rgyud): de bzhin sna tshogs 'dzin// ral gri ral gri 'dzin rgyal po// 'khor lo de bzhin 'khor lo 'dzin// 'jig rten gsum rgyal nyid dang ni// 'di rnams kyi yang rigs nyid 'gyur// de nyid chags dang
305b2(rgyud): chags bral ba// 'dod dang thar pa ru yang 'gyur// dus gsum dang ni srid gsum mchog/ 'jig rten gsum dang khams gsum pa// brtan thod de nyid// rnam pa sna tshogs nyid du 'gyur
305b3(rgyud): g.yo ba kun nas sna tshogs pa// thaMd du ni de 'gyuraro// de la sogs pa mchog gi mchog/ chos dbyings mnyam dang mi mnyam pa// namakha'i khams kyi mthas klas gdangos po kun tu de 'gyur
305b4(rgyud): de nyid bcom ldan rnal 'byor te// gcig pu nyid no lhag pa'i lha// / na mkha' kun gyi skabs na dpal// rdo rje sede'i de bzhin ga shegs// dpal ldan sgyu ma chen mo 'tsha / rnam
305b5(rgyud): snang rtag pa thad du// rnal 'byor dbang phyug gtso chen khyag/ sa ngas rgyas 'khor lo can mi bskyod// tshe dang rin chen 'byu nga stobs che// tshe dngag med pa kun nas mchog/ don
305b6(rgyud): yod sna tshogs mdzad pa dang // rdo rje sede'i lta na sdug/ dgug pa mchog gi sbyor ba dang // legs par mdzad pa de nyid yin// rin chen sgron ma de bzhin rtog/ rdo rje gnad pa snang ba che// 
305b7(rgyud): chos deng rno ba che// sgyu dang spu mchog bdud rtsi dang / lus dang go cha gnod sbyin tshe// khu tshur de bzhin gshegs pa kun/ de nyid bcom ldan rnal 'byor 'di// rdo rje se der spangs pa che/ 
305b8(rgyud): hUM mdzad hUM mdzad dang // rta 'grin zhon rnaMr grags/ he ru ka dpal rdo rje che/ mchog gi dbang phyug gshin rje gshed// khro bo gzegs ma snang po che// rdo rje me ni 'od chen po// gzungs
306a1(rgyud): / rnams kyi ni mchog gcig lu ting 'dzin las dang sbyar sa// shes rab pha rol byin mchog gtsogs dang pha rol phyin 'a spobs/ tshangs pa'i gnas pa chen
306a2(rgyud): bzhi dbang ni mchog tu 'bar ba dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi// dbang po rnams dang stobs rnams dang // rjes dran drag bor gyur po gang // bsgom par bya bar rab tu gnas/ de nyid
306a3(rgyud): bcom ldan gcig pu nyid// byang chub yan lag bdun btags pa// mtha' gcig yongs rdzogs par 'gyur// sum cu rtsa gnyis mchog gi mtshan// 'jig rten 'das pa'i la
306a4(rgyud): po che 'phags lam yan lag brgyad btags pa// stob sa bcu yi ni bsdu pa nyid// sangs rgyas chos kyi bdag nyid gnas// byang chub phyogs kyi chos chen po// rnar dbye
306a5(rgyud): ba sum cu bdun// mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms 'jug ni/ dgu la gnas par gyur pa dang // bsdu ba'i dngos po chen po bzhiso// sani bsdu bar bsdus pa/ so so yang dag
306a6(rgyud): rig pa bzhi// de bzhin srung ba mi mnga' ba/ skal pa chen po'i mi 'jigs pa// mchog tu gyur pa nyid dang ni// bsam gtan gzugs med bzhi phrag gnyis// tshad med pa yang de bzhin/ 
306a7(rgyud): byang chub sems kyi spyod pa gtso// bden pa bzhi ni ston pa po// kun nas nyon mongs rnar byang // zag bcas zag pa med pa'i mchog/ de nyid bcom ldan rnal 'byor te// dbang phyug mchog gi
306a8(rgyud): dbang phyug dang / skye dgu'i bdag po skye dgu'i mgon// mchog gi bdag nyid na su brjod// kun rdzob brjod pa thaMd dang // sgra rnams kyi ni spyod yul 'gyur// brjod du med cing spros pa dra
306b1(rgyud): spong ba mkhas mnyam mtshungs pa med// tshig mtha' sgra yi rnam dgod pa// 'jig rten tha snyad tshul du rtogs// de tshe lus sogs dbye ba yis// sa rnams kyis ni yongasu brtags// 
306b2(rgyud): sku ni sprul pa nyid du 'gyur/ longs spyad rdzogs pa yang dag 'as/ rdo rje'i sku dang de bzhin du/ ye shes sku sogs yong su brtagasas// mtha' yas sku dang sgra chen po rin chen sku
306b3(rgyud): 'odi byed pa// pad+ma'i sku ni snang ba che// thed sku ni las bzang byed// rtogs par bya ba las kyi sku// rnam pa gsum du'ang dbye bar bya// de nyid bcom ldan rnal 'byor te// byang chub sems ni
306b4(rgyud): 'od gsal ba/ kun tu 'od kyi sa chen po/ nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gzi brjid ldan// gnyis pa bdud rtsi'i 'od ces bya/ zla bi'o/ 'od ni 'od gsal ba// gsum pa na mkha'i 'o
306b5(rgyud): bya mkha' bzhin legs par rab tu gnas// rdo rje 'od ma tha' gang zhigs// bzhi pa de ni yid 'ong ba/ bsam pa brtan pa'i sbyor ba yis// rdo rje zhes ni yongasu bsgrag
306b6(rgyud): lnga pa rin chen 'od ces bya// dbang bskur bar ni rab tu gnas// drug pa pad+mo 'chang zhes bya// pade bzhin rab tu rnar snang // rang bzhin gyis ni chos nyid dag/ badrag po med cing ya
306b7(rgyud): bzung med// 'dun pa las kyi 'od ces bya// sangs rgyas phrin las mdzad pa che// brgyad pa dpe med pa zhes bya// dpe ni la yod ma yin// dgu pa dpe dang bral zhes bya// dpe rnams bad
306b8(rgyud): 'jug pa// bcu pa shes rab 'od ces bya// sangs rgyas rnams ni bla na med// bcu gcig kun mkhyen nyid ces bya/ sa chen po ni 'od gsal ba/ bcu gnyis so sor bdag rig pa// rnal
307a1(rgyud): / 'byor ye shes yongs rdzogs nyid// sa chen po ni 'di dag rnams// sangs rgyas rnams kyis don dam du// sangs rgyas dang ni sangs rgyas chos// rnal 'byor ye shes gang brjod pa// 
307a2(rgyud): zad nyid ni mtha' yas mchog/ chos dbyings mnyam dang mi mnyam pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa tha~Md kyi rdo rje snying po rkyen gyi rgyud chen po las sngags kyi de kho na nyid do// // de nas bcom ldan
307a3(rgyud): 'das de bzhin gshegs pa tha~Md kyis bac+doMs thog ma dang tha ma med pa chos kyi 'khor lo chen po bskor ba rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen pi la gsol ba btab pa// de na sa bac+doMs rdo rje
307a4(rgyud): rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen pos de dag gi gsol ba btab pa'i tshig gi de ma thag nyid du de bzhin gshegs pa 'od mnyam ba nyid du dmigs pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin
307a5(rgyud): la mnyam par gzhag nas// mnyam par gzhag pa de ma thag tu nga bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa tha~Md kyi thugs rdo rje la rnaM su bcug nas// bac+doMs rnam par snang mdzad
307a6(rgyud): kyi lus dang ngag dang yid mnyam pa nyid du byin gyis brlabs nas rnar bzhug so// de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po de bzhin gshegs pa tha~Md kyi skur bdag nyid
307a7(rgyud): rtogs nas ting 'dzin las bzhengs te/ 'jam dpal gnonur gyur pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa tha~Md kyi theg pa chen po mngon par rdzo/ 
307a8(rgyud): ba zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po yod do zhes gsungs nas cang mi gsung bar bzhugs par gyur to// de nas 'jam dpal gzhonur gyur pa de bzhin gshegs pa thaMd kyi byin gyis
307b1(rgyud): brlabs kyis stan las langs te/ bla gros phrag pa gcig tu zer nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar bus mo g.yas pa'i lha ngas la btsugs te thal mo sbyar nas btud de 'di skad ces
307b2(rgyud): gsol to// bac+doMs bstan du gsol// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / thabs kyi theg pa chen po mngon par rtogs pa zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po gang du zhugs pas sen tha~Md
307b3(rgyud): thabs chung ngus de bzhin gshegs thaMd kyi mchog gi dngos grub thob par 'gyur ba bka' stsal du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen pos 'jam
307b4(rgyud): dpal gzho nur gyur pa la bka' stsal ga 'jam dpal leg to leg so// 'jam dpal khyod gang slar yang de bzhin ga/ shags pa tha~Md kyi dam tshig la rje su zhugs pa
307b5(rgyud): ni 'jam dpal khyod legaso leg so// de legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang / theg pa chen po mngon par rtogs ba zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po bshad par
307b6(rgyud): bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rjes byin gyi rlob pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs na
307b7(rgyud): dam tshig chen po rdo rje byin gyis rlob pa theg pa chen po mngon par rtogs pa zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor 'di bka' stsal pa// de nas dkyil 'khor chen po mchog/ yang dag rab tu
307b8(rgyud): bshad bya ba// dam tshig chen po rdo rje mchog/ snying po chen po'i brgyan ces bya// gru ba 'azhi pa la sgo bzhi pa// rta babs 'dis ni mdzes par bya byas// thig pazhi dang ni mnyam par ldan/ 
308a1(rgyud): 'am bas 'jigs pa'i 'od// rdo rje snang po yongs bskor ba/ byang myung shing gis nyebar mdzes/ rnga byed kyil lakho grwa rnams dang / ske dang khrung 'jams
308a2(rgyud): rnam su rdo rje rin chen rnams kyis smras// rdo rje pad+ma thad la// las kyi rdo rje thad du 'bar ba'i phreng ba 'khregs pa'i 'ang // dril bcas sna tshogs mchog dang ldan// rgyal mtshan sgreng ba rlung
308a3(rgyud): skyod pa'o// gos dang matog chun pas spras// zla ba phyed pas nye bar mdzes// ral gri rdo rje ut+pa la// lcags kyu la sogs sna tshogs brgyan// chu yis dkyil 'khor yongs bskor ba/ 
308a4(rgyud): khor yug bzhin du rnam par gonas// de la'ang sgro dang sgo/ da sogs// mkhra ba yis ni spro bar bya// de yi nang du bri bar gya/ 'khor lo chen po chen pa rab tu gnas// cha
308a5(rgyud): brgyad kyis ni yongasu bskor// rdo rje 'khor lo che 'ab// de yi dbusu snying po che// rdo rje'i snying po zhesu bsha da// de yi steng du rdo rje che/ rdo rje pad+ma rab tu gan
308a6(rgyud): pad+ma'i steng du rdo rje che// 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor dag gis brgyan// dung dang kun da zla ba dkar// sangs rgyas kun gyi bdan du bshad// de yi steng du legs bzhugs bya// khyab pa / 
308a7(rgyud): rnar snang mdzad che// zla ba'i mdog ldan 'dzum bcas pa// ting 'dzin ldan gnas sdig pa bcom// rdo rje'i phreng bas rnar spras// sna tshogs 'bar bas 'khrigs pa'i 'od Shin
308a8(rgyud): chen chen po'i phreng ba chas// smras pa rnar dgod par bya// de sngags rtag tu shes bya ba// yi ge yi ni mchog gce'o// sha sa'i sde pa gsal byed ni// mchog gi dbang phyug rgyu gci
308b1(rgyud): ba gyu ba'i da'angadas kyis legs gsal ba// thig len das legs par rgyan// rten cing 'brel 'byung 'khor le yi// don can rab tu bskyed pa bya// de nyid bcom ldan rnal 'byor can// gcig
308b2(rgyud): bu nyid ni lhag pa'i lha// ches kyi sku ni ye shes che// rdo rje rnal 'byor dbang phyug bshad// de nas yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i bskyod pa dang // ye shes kyi 'od zer ngo // de bzhin ga sh+ya
308b3(rgyud): ba spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis rgyal po dang // de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje rnar gnon pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa tha~Md kyo sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje nyid du/ rang gi bdag
308b4(rgyud): nyid byin gyis brlabs te/ bcom ldan 'dis de bzhin gshig/ sa pa shAkya thub pa'i phyogs bde mnyam pa nyid du dmigs nas phyogs bzhir 'khod// dbang chen dkyil
308b5(rgyud): 'khor mi bskyod pa// me yi dkyil 'khor ye shes 'od// chu yi dkyil 'khor 'od dpag med// rdo rjes rnams gnon rlung dkyil 'khor// de nas bac+doMs byang chub ser
308b6(rgyud): chen po kun tu bzang po'i dam tshig las 'byung ba se der byin gyis rlob pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas// de bzhin gshegs pa tha~Md kyi theg pa chen po
308b7(rgyud): mngon par rtogs pa zhes bya ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'ad kyi rdo rje'i snying po rgyan gyi snying po 'di nyid kyi thugs kA nas phyung ba'o// oM badz+ra satwa/ de nas 'di rnar phyung ba tsam gyi/ 
308b8(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa tha~Md kyi thugs ka nas rdo rje'i 'od zer rnams byung ste// rdo rje'i 'od zer de rnams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad snang bar byas te gsal bar
309a1(rgyud): gyur nas/ de nas rdo rje'i 'od bar de rnams kyis 'jig rten gyi khams tha~Md kyi rdul phra rab dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa tha~Md kyi skus 'jig rten gyi khams rnam
309a2(rgyud): su gshegs nas 'jig rten gyi khams thaM snang bar mdzad/ sems can thams cad kyi don bye bar mngon par rdzogs nas slar yang gcig tu 'dus te byang chub se'i chen po kun
309a3(rgyud): tu bzang ba'i skur gyur nas bco su rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po'i rdo rje snying po'i thugs kar gnas te tshad du brjod pa 'dis ched du brjod pa/ e mo'i rdo rje snying po bdag
309a4(rgyud): sangs rgyas ye shes bla na med// snying po ye shes rnam dag nga// rdo rje sems dpa' nyid gyur nas// byang chub sems dpa' brtan bskyed de// sangs rgyas ye shes bla
309a5(rgyud): na med// gang zhig brtan byar lus min yang // sangs rgyas sku nyid du gyur to// de nas rdo rje'i byang chub se der chen po bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs ka nas 'thon
309a6(rgyud): ta bcom ldan 'das mi skyod pa'i nye 'khor tha~Md rnam pa bzhis phye ste/ dkar gser po/ dmar po/ ljang ku'i mdog tu mngon par sprul nas rang gi sngags kyi yegs zla ba'i dkyil 'dre
309a7(rgyud): rten te gnas par gyur to// dgug pa'i ting 'dzin ni/ oM badz+ra rA dzoHrje su chags pa'i ting 'dzin ni/ oM badz+ra rA gaM de bzhin gshegs pa bde legs par mdzad pa'i ting 'dzin
309a8(rgyud): ni oM badz+ra sA d+ha/ de bzhin du rin chen 'byung ldan gyi dkyil 'khor la dang skur ba'i ting 'dzin ni oM badz+ra rat+na nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi ting 'dzin ni oM badz+ra te dza de bzhin gsha
309b1(rgyud): pa tha~Md kyi na mkha' mdzod kyi ting 'dzin ni/ oM badz+ra ka tu/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bzhad pa chen po'i ting 'dzin ni/ oM badz+ra ha sa/ de bzhin du 'od dpag tu med pa'i dkyir 'a
309b2(rgyud): yang thugs rje'i ting 'dzin no/ oM badz+ra d+harma/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ting 'dzin ni/ oM badz+ra tIk+Sh+Na dam pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo'i ting 'dzin nai/ oM badz+ra he tu de bzhin gshegs
309b3(rgyud): bzed kyi sems dpa' smra ba'i ting 'dzin ni/ oM badz+ra b+hA Sha de bzhin du rdo rje don yod pa'i dkyil 'khor lo/ lis sna tshogs pa'i ting 'dzin no// oM badz+ra karma/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol
309b4(rgyud): tu phyin pa'i ting 'dzin ni oM badz+ra rak+Sha de bzhin gshegs pa dkyi khro bo'i ting 'dzin ni/ oM badz+ra yak+Sha de bzhin gsheg sa pa tha~Md kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kha tshur
309b5(rgyud): btsongs pa'i ting 'dzin ni/ oM badz+ra sats+tshede nas bcom ldan 'a des rnam par snang mdzad de bzhin gshegs pa thad kyi ye shes kyi phyag rgya'i dam tshig rdo rje dbyings kyi
309b6(rgyud): byin gyis brlabs pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ nyid kyi thugs ka nas 'di phyung ngo // oM badz+ra d+hA tu hUM/ rang gi rig pa mchog no// oM badz+ra d+hA tri sha ri hUM badz+ra
309b7(rgyud): do nas de bzhin gshegs po mi bskyod pas de bzhin gshegs pa thod kyi rdo rje sems dpa'i dam tshig ye shes kyi phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor byin gyis brlabs pa zhes bya ba
309b8(rgyud): ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ nyid kyi thugs ka nas rang gi rig pa mchog 'di phyung ba/ oM ak+She b+ha aM/ oM dz+nyA na muSh+TaM tsitA badz+re bidz+ri Ni hAM/ da nas de bzhin gshegs
310a1(rgyud): pa'i 'od zer gyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje rin po che'i dam tshig gi ye shes kyi phyag rgya dkyil 'khor gyi byin gyis brlangs pa zhes bya/ 
310a2(rgyud): ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas nyid kyi thugs ka nas rang gi rig pa mchog 'di bka' stsal pa/ oM rat+na sau b+hA ba tAM/ oM badz+ra dz+nyA na gar+b+ha ta hUM/ de nas de bzhin pa
310a3(rgyud): pa 'od dpag tu med pa de bzhin gshegs pa tha~Md kyi rdo rje chos kyi dam tshig gi ye shes kyi phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor byin gyis rlob pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms
310a4(rgyud): par zhugs nas nyid kyi thugs ka nas rang gi rig pa mtsho ga 'di bkra' stsal pa/ oM a mau tA b+ha hrIHoM badz+ra d+ha ri Ni hUM/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par gnon
310a5(rgyud): pas de bzhin gshegs pa tha~Md kyi rdo rje las kyi dam tshig gaM ye shes kyi phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor byin gyis rlob pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par
310a6(rgyud): zhugs nas rang gi rig pa mchog 'di bka' stsa la pa/ oM a mo g+ha sid+d+hi oM/ oM badz+ra ma hA ba la hU~M/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad
310a7(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa tha~Md kyi yul la rnam par gzigs shing // de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mnyam pa nyid rnam par spros pa'i snying po 'di bka' stsal pa/ oM sarba ti thA ga
310a8(rgyud): ta sa ma tA dz+nyA na badz+ra hUM/ de bzhin gshegs pa tha~Md kyi snying po 'di dag bshad pa tsam gyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis dkyil 'khor tha~Md mthong bar gyur to// de nas phyag ni
310b1(rgyud): rjes de bzhin gshegs pa tha~Md kyi snying po'i bdag nyid rtogs nas rdo rje mnyam pa nyid spros pa'i snying po bka' stsal pa/ oM badz+ra sa ma tA dz+nyA na bud+d+he/ de nas 'di bshad pa tsam gyis de bzhin
310b2(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad snying po rnams phyag na rdo rjer mthong bar gyur to// de nas phyag na rdo rje'i thugs kha nas chos thaMd mnyam pa nyid spros pa'i stong pa'i phyung ngo // oM sarba d+ham sa ma hA
310b3(rgyud): na badz+ra hU~M/ de nas 'di rnam par phyung ba tsam gyis kyang / slar yang phyag na rdo rje'i thugs kar de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis dkyil 'khor tha~Mng byin gyis brlabs pa mdzad nas/ dkyil
310b4(rgyud): 'khor thaMd du 'khod pa mthong ngo // de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs ka nas de bzhin gshegs pa thaMd mnyadam pa nyid spros pa'i snying po 'di phyung // oM sarba
310b5(rgyud): sa twa sa ma tAM pra bany+tsa bud+d+ha skud nas 'di phyung ba tsam gyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs kha nas phyag na rdo rje rnam par byung te/ slar yang de bzhin gshegs pa
310b6(rgyud): thams cad kyi spyan sngar gnas nas bka' nod cing 'khod do// btsos de bzhin gshegs pa kun// bdag gis ji ltar sgrub par bgyi// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bka' stsal pa// de
310b7(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa tha~Md kyi dkyil 'khor rnams la byin gyis brlabs par byos shig/ de de bzhin no// zhes gsol nas/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa zad
310b8(rgyud): kyi thugs ka nas/ dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi byin gyis brlabs te brten par gyur nas/ rdo rje sgeg mo la sogs pa'i lha rnams phyung ste/ lha mo de rnams dkyil 'khor thaMd kyi gnas
311a1(rgyud): // su de bzhin du rnam par gan so// sgro rnams skye skyong ma rnams dang / mtsham su gzugs dang / s+thA dwa / d+hi dang /  dang / reg bya rnams bshad/ de dag gi sngag su gyur pa ni/ oM badz+ra
311a2(rgyud): ma g+he T+Ta TA/ 'khor lo'i 'tsham su gzhag par bya'o// oM sne ha bodz+ri NaNi/ oM sha rad badz+re e e/ oM bar+thi NI kA la~M kI li hU~M/ de bzhin gshegs pa tha~Md dbyas pa chen po'i mchod pa phyi
311a3(rgyud): 'khor gA dang mtshams rnams dri rdo rje la sogs pa'i lha mo rnams/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i nye bar gnas par dgod par bya'o// oM badz+ra gar+b+he hUM/ oM mu d+hu badz+ri Ni / u g+hu/ oM ma nod b+ha ba hrIH
311a4(rgyud): Ni hUM oM badz+ra she shi re ho ho/ de bzhin gsheg pa tha~Md kyi ro nga ba chen po'i lha mo'i sgo'o 'tshams rnams// gzugs pa sogs pa'i/ oM badz+ra d+hU pe/ oM badz+ra shag+h+ra~M/ oM badz+ra rA saM/ oM
311a5(rgyud): 'adz+ra swarI na mnyes par byed pa'o// de bzhin gshegs thams cad kyi shin tu dga' ba rdo rje'i snying po ni/ oM sa ma ya hoHsu ra ta s+t+waM/ dga' ba chen po'i rdo rje snying po 'dis// de
311a6(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa tha~Md kun nas mnyes pas/ dkyil 'khor thade la brtan par gyur nas/ dngos grub thams cad stsol bar mdzod// dgug dang legs par rab gnas dang / ji bzhin gnas
311a7(rgyud): sbyar ba nyid// kun nas dgyes mdzad sangs rgyas kun// dngos grub tham cad rab sbyin dge/ sngags kyi tshig rnams kyang / oM e h+ye hi b+ha wan badz+ra aM ku sha dza/ oM pra be sha ya hUM/ sarba ta thA ga tA/ 
311a8(rgyud): oM sa ma yai bin+d+ha tiSh+Tha b+ha ga wan/ 'di dag ni dkyil 'khor tha~Md kyi sgo'i phrin las so// de lta bu'i dkyil 'khor 'dri ba la/ byams pa dang / lajam dpal dang / kun tu bzang po dang / spyan ram pa
