311b1(rgyud): dang thug la sogs pa'i// byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams dgod par bya'o// sngon du bshad pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi chos/ slob ma bcug ste/ dbang bskur ba la sogs pa byas nas/ slob
311b2(rgyud): ma dang bcas pas thabs cig tu de bzhin gshegs pa tha~Md la nye bar 'khor thams cad kyis mchod par bya'o// de la dang po kho nar re shig dkyil 'khor tha~Md kyi slob dpon ni dam tshig thaMd
311b3(rgyud): shes pa/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen pos dngos grub thaMd byin gyis brlabs pa/ dbang bskur ba thams cad thob pa/ rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug lta bu/ thad mkhyen pa'i
311b4(rgyud): ye shes kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgyal bslab par bya'o// de nas 'dir dam tsha ga gi phyag rgya bcings par gyur pa ni/ skyil krungs bcings nas
311b5(rgyud): dri la sogs pa rnams kyis lag pa gnyis byugs nas/ phyag rgya bcings pa rab tu bsgrub par bya'o// lag pa gnyis rdo rje bsnams pa byas te/ ser mo phan tshun bcings nas skyil kru
311b6(rgyud): gi dbus rdo rje bsdams par bzhag pa ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa tha~Md kyi phyag rgya'o// rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa ni gar gyi tshogs kyi sbyor bas so// rdo rje bsdams po de nyid rked pa'i phyogasu
311b7(rgyud): bzung ba ni rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya'o// rdo rje bsdams pa las mthu mo lcogs kyu ltar bzung ba ni rdo rje rgyal po'i phyag rgya'o// de nyid mda' 'phen pa lta bu'i sbyor ba ni rdo rje mdo'i phyag rgya'o// de
311b8(rgyud): nyidadi la leg so sbyin pas// rgyab tu 'jog pa ni rdo rje lags pa'i'o// byang chub kyi sems kyi phyag rgya rnam sa// rdo rje bsdams pa de nyid dpral bar 'jog pa ni/ rdo rje rin chen gyi phyag rgya'o// 
312a1(rgyud): rdo rje bsdams pa la 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyis sbyor ba na rdo rje nyi ma'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi phyag rgya'o// rdo rje bsdams pa spyi bor sbyar ba ni tog gi phyag rgya'o// khadzad
312a2(rgyud): dubaskor ba ni rdo rje band pa'i phyag rgya'o// rdo rje bsnams pa de nyid khar byas pa ni rdo rje chos kyi phyag rgya'o// de nyid snying khar byas pa ni rdo rje ral gri'i phyag rgya'o// de nyid 'khor lo ltar
312a3(rgyud): yongasu bskor ba ni rdo rje rgyu'i phyag rgya'o// de nyid snying khur sgreng ba ni rdo rje smra ba'i phyag rgya'o// chos kyi phyag rgya rnam so// rdo rje bsdams pa de nyid gar nyid du sbyin pa ni las sna tshogs pa'i
312a4(rgyud): phyag rgya'o// lag pa gnyis spyi bo dang snyi ka dang mgrin par la jog pa ni rdo rje srung ba'i phyag rgya'o// rdo rje bsdams pa la 'gram pa gnyi su 'jog pa ni rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi phyag rgya'o// 
312a5(rgyud): rjerdza bsdams pa de nyid snying khar 'atsir ba ni rdo rje khu tshur gyi phyag rgya'o// de bzhin du skem mo dang / bdug pa ma la sogs ba'i sbyor bas lha mo thaMd kyi phyag rgya thaMd la rab
312a6(rgyud): tu sbyar bar bya'o// rol cing rnam 'khor dgod pa dang // sgeg dang snying rje'i bdag nyid dang // dpa' dang khro sogs chos bdag nyid// rang nyid zhi ba'i bdag nyid nyams// phyag rgya thams cad rab
312a7(rgyud): tshogs pa// gal te dngos grub mchog 'dod na// rang nyid rdo rje'i gar byed dam// skyob pa sangs rgyas thaMd kyi/ phyag rgya bcing ba rab tu sbyar// thaMd grub par 'dod sogs kyis/ skyil krungs
312a8(rgyud): sangs rgyas zad kyi / de phyir gnyis med rdo rje can// sangs rgyas rnams kyi drang po'i sku// sgeg pa'i sbyor bso rdo rje can// sangs rgyas rnams kyis zhi ba'i spyan// snyems ma rdo rje can gyis/ 
312b1(rgyud): gyis dgongs// sangs rgyas rnams dang rdo rje can// ting 'dzin dbye ba las shes bya// 'khrugs pa'i lha stangs khro rnams kyis// btsun mo rnams kyis rol pa nyid// 'jig rten pa yi lha rnams
312b2(rgyud): dang sdig spyod rnams kyi lta stangs steng // chos rnams kun gyi rjes 'jug pa'i// shugs kyi lha stangs phyag rgya'o// tshogs dang pho nya // lha stangs rnam pa sna tshogs nyid// chu'i
312b3(rgyud): phyag rgya yongs ldan pa// g.yo ba med cing mi 'gul ba// sangs rgyas rnams kyi phya rgya mchog/ sangs rgyas byang chub rab sbyin byed// 'tshams sbyor cung bang yang dag ldan// rnam 'gyur med
312b4(rgyud): tsong mtshungs med gnas/ rol ba'i yi ge yang dag ldan// mchu yi phyag rgya rdo rje can// rnam 'gyur can dang 'khor ba can// khro bas so ni yongasu bsda ma// 'di na khro bar
312b5(rgyud): phyag rgyar bshad// mchu yaM phyag rgya gzugs mdzes can/ 'jig rten pa rnams mchu'i phyag rgya// rnam 'gyur 'jig cing gzugs dang bral/ shin tu gnag dka'
312b6(rgyud): 'dod chags dang // sdang dang rmongs las thad du// rol cing rnam 'khor dang ldan pa// g.yo bcas rab tu 'phro ba yang / mchu yi phyag rgyar shes par bya// lha mo pho nya'i tshegs kyi
312b7(rgyud): yang de la sogs pa mtha' yas mchog/ lha stangs mchu la sogs pa'i ming // phyag rgya tha~Md mdor bsdus pa// skyob pa rnams kyi kun shes bya// ji srid sku yi dbye ba dang // dang
312b8(rgyud): po la sogs rab dbye dang // de dag phyag rgya mtha' yas mchog/ sangs rgyas kun gyis brtags pa nyid// sna tshogs sku ni gzi brjid che// tshad med yon+dan 'thung po'i gnas/ 
313a1(rgyud): sangs rgyas rnams kyi phyag rgya mchog/ sangs rgyas byang chub rab sbyin byed// rdo rje snying po rgyan gyi rgyud chen po las dam tshig chen po'i de kho na nyid gsang ba zhes bya
313a2(rgyud): ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po yongasu rdzog so// // de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis slar yang de bzhin gshegs pa zad mnyam pa nyid mngon par dbang bskur po zhe
313a3(rgyud): bya ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po 'di bka' stsal pa// de nas dkyil 'khor chen po mchog/ yang dag rab tu bshad bya ba/ gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa// rta babs bzhis ni mdzes par byas// sde
313a4(rgyud): tshogs khams ni bsam yas mchog/ dar dang me tog chun pos brgyan// rdo rje rin chen rnams kyis spras// sna tshogs pa / de bzhin gzhan/ dkyil 'khor de yi dbusu ni// sa
313a5(rgyud): rgyas sku gzugs yi 'ong ba/ mgon po sum cu rtsa gnyis ma tshan// 'bar ba mchog gos brgyan pa po// de sngags d+ha gsu shes bya ba// dang po'i dbyangs dang gnyis pa'o/ 
313a6(rgyud): de yi nye 'khor thams cad du// 'khor lo can brgyad bri bar bya/ dkyil 'khor de yis dbus ni// 'khor lo kun tu 'bar ba bzhag/ 'khor lo'i lci bo'i dbus ni// baung+ga'i rgyal po rab tu
313a7(rgyud): gnas// sgeg sogs sangs rgyas thad ni// ci ltar sngon bani ni bri bar bya// nye bar mkhoba'i mchod kun gyis// de bzhin gshegs pa mchod par bya// dgug sogs cho gir sbyor ba ni// dkyil
313a8(rgyud): 'khor snga ma ji bzhi no// dkyil 'khor nye bar spyod pa kun// cho ga 'dir ni 'byung bar 'gyur// dkyil 'khor chen po'i rtog pa'o// de nas dkyil 'khor chen po mchog/ yang dag rab
313b1(rgyud): tu bshad pa pa// 'jig rten gsum las rnam rgyal zhes// bya ba rdo rje hUM mdzad grags// gru bzhi pa la sgo bani pa// rlababs bzhis ni mdzes par byas// de yi nang du 'khor lo ni// dkyil
313b2(rgyud): 'khor brjod pa lta bu'o// da yi dbus khro bo che// 'jig rten gsum las rnam rgyal yang // khro gnyed ldan zhing sprin ma 'khyog/ spyan gsal 'bar ba chen po pa// cung zad mche ba ga
313b3(rgyud): pa'i zhal// rnam par dgod cing slar khro ba// g.yen brkyang pa yi zhabs kyis ni// dka' bzlog dbang phyug chen po gnon// sangs rgyas phreng ba sogs pas spras// in+d+ra nI la mtshungs pa'i
313b4(rgyud): 'od phyag bzhi pa la spyan gsum pa// zhal bzhi pa la thub pa Ta dka'// khe con drang ni zhags par brjod// dang po na ni rdo rtsi bshad// gnyis pa zhags pa bsdigs mdzub
313b5(rgyud): can phyag gnyis khu tshur dam pa mchog/ khu tshur gnyis rna rag tu brtag/ mtha chung gnyis ni mnyam sbyor ba// lu gu rgyud kyis rnam par sprul// snying kar phyag rgya'o/ 
313b6(rgyud): bzhagra nas// bsdigs mdzub gnyis kyis bsdigs par mdzad// 'jig rten gsum rgyal zhes bya ba'i// phyag rgya mchog tu thub par dka'// sngags ni ming gi de nyid ljon// 'bar
313b7(rgyud): ba'i phreng ba mnyam par 'khrigs// dkyil 'khor de yi gnas rnams// cha rnams kun tu thad nas// phyag rgya thams cad mnyam par bri// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor mnyam gnas par// ral
313b8(rgyud): gri 'khor lo gzhu dang mda'// de bzhin du ni dag sta nyid// de la sog pa'i mtha' yas mchog// mdor bsdus nas ni phyag rgya dgod// de ltar khro bo'i dkyil 'khor tha~Md rnam par bkod nas nye bar
314a1(rgyud): 'kho ba'i mchod pa bya'o// 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor// de nas dkyil 'khor chen po mchog/ yang dag rab tu bshad bya ga/ sangs rgyas
314a2(rgyud): dpa' bo thams cad kyis// 'gro ba 'dul ba zhe su bshad// gru bzhi pa la sgo ba ni pa// dar dang me tog chun pos rgyan// de dbus dkyil 'khor chen po ni/ chu zhes bya ba'i ming cano// de
314a3(rgyud): yi dbusu bang chen po// 'dab ma brgyad pa yi 'ong ba// de yi lte ba'i dbus ni// 'gro ba 'dul ba zhes bya ga/ zla ba'i 'od can zla ba'i mdog/ ral pa'i cod pan 'dzin pa can// phyag bzhi pa
314a4(rgyud): la zhal ba ni pa// rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan pa go// sa sa rgyal phreng ba sogs pas spras// sku rnams thams cad kun nas spro// mtha' yas ra 'byam rgya che ba'i// chos dbyi
314a5(rgyud): mnyam dang mi mnyam la/ de yi sngag su yongs grags pa/ sha ba'i sde yi mthar dge ba// klu yog don ldan sngon byung ba/ rgyu yi don du rab sgrub byeng/ bzhi pa'i dbyangs kyi
314a6(rgyud): spyi bor mnan// me yil sa bon gsal bar byed// thig le sgra ni mchog tu sbyin// 'jig rten dang drug zhes bya'i mtshan// de yi phyag rgya yang dag 'i shed// ts+li'i thal mo rab tu brgya
314a7(rgyud): dris pa'i phyag rgyar yang dag bshad// dbyug gu ril ba spyi blugs bri// mdun du bgrang phreng pad+ma yi// rgyal po zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bzhag/ de la sogs pa mtha' yas mchog
314a8(rgyud): phyag rgya mchog tu 'bar de dag 'gro ba 'dul po'i dkyil 'khor du// ji lta rigs par dgod par bya// 'gro ba 'dul ba zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi rgyal po'o// de nas dkyil
314b1(rgyud): 'khor chen po'i mchog/ gzhan ni rab tu bshad par bya// dpa' bo rin chen snying po yi// rdo rje rin chen zhesu bshad// klu bzhi pa la sgo ba ni pa// rta babs bzhis ni mdzes par bya// de mi
314b2(rgyud): dbusu rin chen che// yan lag brgyad pa mchog tu 'bar// de dbus rin chen pad+ma ni// rin chen phreng bas rnam par mdzes// de dbus pad+ma rA gA 'dra// rin chen rdo rje char 'bar go// sangs rgya
314b3(rgyud): lnga yi cod pan can// rin chen phreng bas rnar mdzes// mdun gyi kun gyi dbang bskur gso// rin chen de yi gtso bo mchog/ g.yas pad+ma rA ka ste// rgyang du in+d+ra ni la'o// yid bzhin no
314b4(rgyud): rin chen g.yon// phyag rgya rnam pa sna tshogs mchog/ sna tshogs rin chen rnam par rgyan// dkyil 'khor kun gyi grwa ya ni// gnas rnamasu ni bzhag par bya// sangs
314b5(rgyud): dpa' bo tha~Md kyi// de yi sngagasu yongs grags pa// bzhi pa 'i sde yi dang po gang // me yi sa bon gyis gsal byas// dbyangs kyi gnyis pas kun nas minam// dbang
314b6(rgyud): bsgyur ba ni steng du gnas// de yi phyag rgya yang dag bshad// rin chen snyim pa rgyab bskams te// rin chen rnam pa lagasau byung ba// de ni rdo rje rin chen no// rdo rje rin po che'i dkyil
314b7(rgyud): 'dziro// / de nas dkyil 'khor chen po mchog/ yang dag rab tu bshad bya ba// gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa// rta babs banas ni mdzes par byas// thig bzhi dang naM yang dag ldan/ 
314b8(rgyud): rdo rje phreng bas rnar mdzes// de yi dbus zhal bzhi pa'i// 'khor lo bzhin du yongs bskor ba'o// de yi dbusu bad chen po// kha dog sna tshogs yongs 'bar ba// de yi dbu su brtson
315a1(rgyud): chen po rdo rje sna tshogs yongasu gyi/ rdo rje khu chur 'dzin mdzes pa/ rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan pa'o// kha dog sna tshogs gzi brjid che// sangs rgyas phreng bas rtswar
315a2(rgyud): mdzes// de yi sngags ni yang dag bshad// bcu gnyis po yi dbyangs kyi mtha'// mya ngan 'das don legs gsal byas// sgeg sogs rig ma thad kyis// de bzhin rang gi
315a3(rgyud): phyag rgya yis// rdo rje'i thig le yongasu ldan// sna tshogs bkra ba mchog tu 'bar// de yi dbang bskur phyag rgya yis// mchod pa kun gyis thaMd nas// kun nas yongasu bskor ba ni/ 
315a4(rgyud): las kyi dkyil 'khor bri bar bya/ las kyi dkyil 'a khor// // de nas dkyil 'khor chen po mchog/ yang / ga rab tu bshad bya ga/ shes rab ye shes kyi 'khor lo// sdug
315a5(rgyud): kyi yi ges rnam par rgyan// de yi dbusu pad chen po// 'dab ma brgyad pa shin tu mdzes// de yi lte ba'i dkyil du ni// gzhon nu sna tshogs gzugs ldan pa/ sku mdog dam
315a6(rgyud): zhing 'dzum bcas pa// sna tshogs gzugs can ral gri can// phyag byin pa la zhal bzhi pa// ral gri'i phreng bas rnam par rgyan// gsang sngags chen po yig lnga// de yi drung du lags
315a7(rgyud): bar gnas// dbyangs kyi bcu gnyis gsang sngags ni// thugs ka ru ni yang dag gnas// phyi rol nyid ni gru bzhi mdzes// thig bin dang ni yang dag ldan// rta babab sa bani dang mnyam
315a8(rgyud): bar sbyor// sgo bo ni yis ni shin tu mdzes// shes rab pha rol phyin pa nyid// de la dkyil 'khor dbusu ni// gal te dngos grub mchog 'dod na// 'bad pa yis ni bri bar bya// sngon
315b1(rgyud): du bshad pa'i cho ga yis// mchod sogs cho ga rgyas pa nyid// bzhugs pa'i cho ga de bzhin du// ji ltar dkyil 'khor 'dir thong bzhin// shes rab ye shes dkyil 'khor ro// 
315b2(rgyud): de nas dkyil 'khor chen po mchog/ yang dag ra tu bshad bya ba// grI ba ni pa la sgo ba ni ba// rta babs bzhis ni mdzes par byas// thig bani dang ni yang dag ldan// phyi yi dkyil 'phong
315b3(rgyud): bri Tar bya// de yi nang du bri bya ga/ chos kyi 'khor lo bla na med// rten cing 'brel 'byung phreng ba ni// 'bad pa yis ni bri bar byo// 'khor lo'i dbu su brtson chen po// rdo rje'i rgyu ni stongs
315b4(rgyud): po che// phyag bani bzhi 'o ni pa// rgyan rnams kun das brgyan pa po// kha dog nag po gzi brjod che// chos kyi 'a khor lo rab bskor mdzad// de yi sngags gyur mdzes pa ni// 
315b5(rgyud): rgyu yi don du so sor bskyed// dbyangs drug da ni ya nga dug ldan// thig le phyi mos rnam par brgyan// rang gaM yi ge phreng ba che// 'khor lo gnyis kyis rnar brgyan// 
315b6(rgyud): yi mdun du dung yin lo// rgyug tu zhags par brjod par bya// rdo rje'i zil mo phyag rgya che// 'khor lo bzhin du rab tu gnas// mchod pa thaMd rab tu brtag/ ji ltar dkyil 'khor snyam
315b7(rgyud): bzhin// de lce'o dkyil 'khor bris nas ni// chos kyi dkyil 'khor bla na med// thog mar chos kyi 'khor lo bskor// dngos grub thaMd yang dag 'bar// chos kyi 'khor lo'i dkyil
315b8(rgyud): 'khor ro// / de nas dkyil 'khor chen po mchog/ yang dag rab tu bshad bya ba/ thog ma'i dkyil 'khor sbyor ba yis// dkyil 'khor kun gyi thig gdab go// de yi
316a1(rgyud): dkyil du snang ba che// mkha' bzhin shin tu 'od gsal ga/ sems dpa' chen po mkha'i mdzod// dam pa'i rgyal po rab tu bzhugs// zla ba'i bdog can
316a2(rgyud): brjid che// sna tshogs mtshon cha 'dzin pa'i mchog/ gnon nus rab tu brjid pa'i zhal// namakha'i mdzod ces rab tu grags// sangs rgyas drang ba sogs pas spras// rdo rje dkyi
316a3(rgyud): 'khor rgyan par mdzad// 'di yi gsang sngags gzi brjid che// dbyangs dgu pa la thig le dang // nA du yis ni rnam par rgyan// sde tshan dang po'i gsum pa la// thog len das
316a4(rgyud): rnar brgyan/ de yang gtso bo'i gsang sngags 'gyur// mkha'i mdzod ni rab bskor mdzad// de lha'i dkyil 'khor bris nas ni// sngags kyi phreng ba mchog ldan pa/ 
316a5(rgyud): ma lus pa yis rnams kun// thaMd nas ni na mkha'i chu la// rtog ni phyag rgya gyur pa dri'i// de bzhin du ni nges par bcing // de lha'i dkyil 'khor bris nas ni// 
316a6(rgyud): na mkha' yi ni mdzod de la// gol te bdag ni grub 'dod na// mchod pa kun gyis rnam por mchod// na mkhri'i mdzod kyi dkyil 'khor ro// // de nas dkyil 'khor chen po mchog/ yang dag ra
316a7(rgyud): tu bshad bya ba/ dkyil 'khor snga ma'i sbyor ba ya~M/ dkyil 'khor tha~Md thig gdab 'o// dkyil 'khor de yi dbus ni// khro bo'i dkyil 'khor gru bani ga/ der yang rdo rje me yi mchog/ dkyil 'bru
316a8(rgyud): gyin mchog tu 'dod// de yi dbus gi kha~M gad cha// rdo rje gnod sbyin than med// phyag bzhi pa la zhal bzhi pa// li sh+lau rgyal po la rab gnas ni rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan pa'i lus/ 'dud
316b1(rgyud): rnams thams cad pa 'joms mdzad/ de sngags yig gyur ba ni/ shaSha'i sde tshan mtha dag ga/ sgyu ma ngan tu lags gsal bya// khyo ba dkyil 'khor chen po bskor/ sngags
316b2(rgyud): yige phyung ba che// 'bad pa yis ni bri bar bya/ de lta'i dkyil 'khor bris nas ni// rdo rjer gnod sbyin de yis ni// gal te grub pa mchog 'dod na// sgyu ma zad gzhom par bya// rdo rje gan
316b3(rgyud): sbyin gyi dkyil 'bor chen po'o// // de nas dkyil 'khor chen po mchog/ yang dag rab tu bshad bya ga / gru bzhi pa la sgo bani ga/ tu bas bzhis ni mdzes par byas/ 
316b4(rgyud): de yi dbusu 'khor lo cheg/ lcags kyu yis ni rnam par ma dzes/ dbusu bcom ldan rdo rje rgyal// lpags kyu la ni rab tu bzhugs// phyag bzhi pa la zhal bzhi pa/ rgyan
316b5(rgyud): rnams tha~Md rab tu 'bar/ rdo rje lcags kyu khu tshur che// 'bar ba 'phro bas rnar brgya ni// 'gro ba tha~Md 'gugs par mjed/ sngags kyi yogs legs par spyug sha
316b6(rgyud): sde yi drang gnas pa// byed pa'i rgya ru legs par gnas// ngags drug pa yos legs par phye/ zla phyed thig les legs par brgyan// lcags kyu'i phyag rgya legs pa sbyang // 'gugs
316b7(rgyud): par byed la don yod pa'o// de ltar dkyil 'khor bris nas no// rdo rje lcags kyu mchog tu dge// dgugs pa la sogs thaMd la// 'gro ba 'dul ba yongasu bsdu// don yod rgyal po'i dkyil
316b8(rgyud): 'bongadade nas dkyil 'khor chen po mchog/ yang dag rab tu bshad bya ba// gru bzhi pa la ska bzhi pa// rngu babs bzhis ni mdzes par byas// thog pan dang no yang dag ldan/ dngos
317a1(rgyud): / grub dkyil 'khor buM ba ga/ dkyil 'khor de yi dbus ni// dkyil 'khor lpags kyu'i rnam pa can// de yi dbus gru gsum grags/ ljags kyu mchog tu dge ba'o// de yaM
317a2(rgyud): dbusu sada' tshe// rdo rnamapa stobs po tshe// phyag 'azhi pa la zhal bzhi pa// rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan pa po// gzi brjid chen po dkar dang dmarazhugs pa lcags kyu'i dzin dag gdem
317a3(rgyud): gsang sngags yang dag bshad// don yod 'bras bu stsol ba po// snga tshan gnyis pa'i gsum pa ni// nyis 'gyur nyid du rnar gnas// de yi thig le mya ngan 'das// sdug spyi phreng ba gzhan
317a4(rgyud): gyis bskor// sgeg mo la sogs mchod pa che// 'ag rab yis no bri bar bya// sgo skyong ba dang mchod pa yang // skye/ ba ji bzhin rnar dgod// de lha'i dkyil 'khor bris nas ni// mchod
317a5(rgyud): badzad yosu skyug rdo rje rgyal po'i dkyil 'kho'o//  nas dkyil 'byo chen po mchog/ yang dag rab tu na/ dpya ga sangs rgyas dnga'o tha~Md kyi/ rdo rje chags pa shes bshad
317a6(rgyud): gru bzhi pa la sgo bani pa// tu babs banas ni mdzes par byas// thig pa ni dang ni yang dag ldan// chags pa'i dkyil 'khor bro bor bya// dzad dmar pos rab dregs pa/ dbang du byed pa'i
317a7(rgyud): dam pa yin// de yi dbusu pad chen po// mdab ma brgyad pa gaM sar bcas// de yi lte ba'i dbus ni// rdo rje chags pa bri bar bya// bing+ga rA ga mtshungs pa'i 'od// phyag bani pa la zhal ban
317a8(rgyud): ba spyan gsum 'od kyi phreng ba can// de yi phyag rgya mchog tu na/ mdzes pa yo ni mda'i gzur 'gyur// rgyan rnams kun gyis mdzes pa'i lus// 'gro ba kun lo ches mchog gyur/ 
317b1(rgyud): de yi gsang sngags mdzes gyur pa/ rdo rjes chags mchog gi ba// sha Sha'i sde yi mthar gyur pak+Sha maM mig ra sngon du gnas/ dpyas dgu pa dang yang dag ldan// sngags kyi phreng
317b2(rgyud): yang dag brgyan// me tog mda' ni yongasu 'phen// ra ba tha~Md yongs rdzogs mdzad/ de lha'i dkyil 'khor bris nas ni// sangs rgyas tha~Md rab mchod byed// rdo rje chags pa'i dkyil 'khor ro// 
317b3(rgyud): de nas dkyil 'khor chen po mchog/ yang dag ra tu bshad bya ga rdo rje legs pa zhes grags pa// gnyisu med pa'i dga' ba 'ang 'phel// gru zin pa la sgo bzhi pa// rgya babs bzlas ni
317b4(rgyud): mdzes par byas// de yi dbus cher mdzes pa'i// dkyil 'khor dam pa gru bzhi pa// de yis dbus bde chen po// za' bru yis ni nye bar mdzes// de yi lte ba'i dkyil du ni// zla ba rag
317b5(rgyud): ldan yang dag 'du bde gnas dpa' bo bsam bur byA// rdo rje legs bsgongs po che// bu dang kun da 'du/ karA/ kha ba ba no'i 'od ltar mdzes/ legs so stsol 'chim
317b6(rgyud): bar mdzad// ting 'dzin dbang mang po bsgrub rdo rje sgeg mo mags michod pa// de bzhin me tog 'dage ba sog gi// sgra la skyong ba nyid kyang ni/  tu 'ad de bri bar bya/ de yi sngags kyur
317b7(rgyud): mdzes pa ni// gsang ba chen po mchog tu 'byung / ha yaM yig sngon gang de// sen don rab sgru'i byed// thig le gnyis dang yongasu ldan// legs stsol bas ni nor gnas// de lha'i dkyil
317b8(rgyud): 'khor bris nas ni/ mchod pa zad rab tu bskor// bdag nyid dag pas bzhugs pa sogs// thade yongasu spyad par bya// rdo rje legs pa'i dkyil 'khor// de nas dkyil 'bar cha/ 
318a1(rgyud): // po mchog/ yang dag ya tu bshad byug/ rdo rje ga'i brjid na su grags// rdo rje nyims blo gros ldan// gru bzhi pa la sgo ban pa// rta babs 'dis ni mdzes pa byas tra~M/ 
318a2(rgyud): bani dang ni yang dag ldan/ dkyil 'khor dam pa bri bar sh+ya// de yi nang du bri bya ga/ rdo rje nyi ma 'od chen po// rdo rje nyi ma'i stang du ni// klu bsum rnam pa las byung ba/ de yi dbusu gzo pad
318a3(rgyud): 'bar ba yaM ni me lta bu// pad+ma chen po mdab brgyad pa// ze 'bru yos ni shin tu mdzes// de yi lte ba'i dkyil du ni// rdo rje gzi brjod stobs po che// bzang po'i mtshal dang mtshungs pa'i 'od
318a4(rgyud): rgya skyegs khu ba mtshungs pa'i mdog/ phyag bzhi pa la zhal ba na ga/ rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan pa'o// de yi sngagasu yong sa grags pa/ kun nas sangs rgyas mtshungs pa'o// 
318a5(rgyud): dgyes yig bcu gcig pa yi mtha'// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor da su naM// sngags kyi phreng bas yo su bskor/ rang gi phyag rgya 'i mtshan ma ldan// de ltar dkyil 'khor bris nas naM/ 
318a6(rgyud): sangs rgyas 'di rab mchod bya// rdo rje gzi brjid dkyil 'khor// de nas dkyil 'khor chen po mchog/ yang dag rab tu bshad bya ba// yid bzhin nor bu'i rgyal mtshan pang // bdag nyid
318a7(rgyud): bordo rje'o rtog/ grub zhi pa lo sgo 'ani pa// rta babs bdis ni mdzes par byas// gra ban dang ni yang dgu ldan/ zla bo'i dkyil 'khor bri bar bya// dkyil 'khor de yi dbus ni/ mchog
318a8(rgyud): tu 'a ra ba yo ni rlung / zla ba byed pa'i rnam pa 'dra// rin chen rgyal mtshan yongs sgreng ba// de yi dbusu sede'i tshe// rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan pa'o// zhal bzhi pa la gzi brjod che
318b1(rgyud): oMn+d+ra nI la mthus pa'i bod// rin chen char ba rab tu 'debs// phyag bzhi pa la snang ba che// de yaM gsang sngags gzi brjid che// sde chen pa ni bya'i dang po la// me yis rag tugs pa byas/ 
318b2(rgyud): pa tig gi phyag rgya yongasu bskor// sngags kyi dreng bas rnar brgyan// de lha'i dkyil 'khor bris nas ni// sangs rgyas 'das mchod bya// rdo rje tog gi dkyil 'kho'o// de nas dkyil la
318b3(rgyud): chen po mchog/ yang dag rab tu bshad bya ba// rdo rje bzhad pa zhes grags pa// rdo rje bshad pa mtshungs pa'i 'od// grwa bzhi pa la sge bzhi pa// rta babs bzhis ni mdzes par byas// thig
318b4(rgyud): bzhi dang ni yang dag ldan/ dkyil 'khor chen po bri bar bya// dkyil 'khor de dbus zlum po ni// oMn+d+ra nI la mtshungs pa'i 'od/ de bzhin chu ni gzi brjid can// phyag rgya 'khor los rnam
318b5(rgyud): mdzes// dkyil 'khor de yi dbu su ni// ston ka'i zla ba 'dra ba 'i 'od// 'gro ba mtha' dag snang mdzad pa// rgyan rnam sa kun gyis brgyan pa po// phyag bzhi pa la zhal
318b6(rgyud): bzhi pa// dbang phyug zad yang dag ldan// de yi gsang sngags sngags chen po// rgyu yi don du grub par bya// stong pa mngon brjod bsam mi khyab// rang mong rtogs pas mtshan pa'o// 
318b7(rgyud): lha'i dkyil 'khor 'khor bris nas ni// sangs rgyas 'di pa mchod bya// rdo rje bzhed pa'i dkyil 'khor// de nas dkyil 'khor chen po mchog/ yang dag rab tu bshad bya ba// gru
318b8(rgyud): pa la sgo bzhi pa// rta babs bzhis ni mdzes par byas// thig bzhi dang ni yang dag ldan// dngos grub dkyil 'khor yang dag bri// de yi steng du'ang pad+ma che// pad+ma me las yang dag rgyu
319a1(rgyud): / gru gsum mchog tu mdzes pa po// sum mdo'i ris kyi rnar brgyan// ches dbyings yig ri de kho na// bde gzi brjid bdag nyid dag de yi bdag gi de nyid ni// 'phro ba'i
319a2(rgyud): raka ta 'dra// phyag bzhi pa zhal bzhi pa/ rgyan rnams kun gyis rgyan pa 'o// gnyis po'i mdog tu gyur pa ni// pad+ma rA ga mtshungs pa'i 'od// ji srid dag gi 'khor lo ni// smra ba'i dbye gra
319a3(rgyud): rab tu gnas// thaMd so sor gsal bar byed// sprin gyi dkyil 'khor mchog rmad byung // de lta'i dkyil 'khor bris nas ni// sangs rgyas tha~Md rab mchod bya// rdo rje sprang dkyil 'khor// 
319a4(rgyud): de nas dkyil 'khor chen po mchog/ yang dag rab tu bshad bya ba k+Sha dkyil 'khor snga ma'i sbyor ba yis// dkyil 'khor tha/ sa cad dri bar bya// de yi dbusu go cha che// rin chen kun
319a5(rgyud): gyis rnar brgyan// de yi dbus brjon chen po// rdo rje srung ba yang dag bri// phyag bzhi pa la zhal bzhi pa// rgyan rnam sa kun gyis brgyan pa po// kha dog sna tshogs gzi
319a6(rgyud): brjid che// bde srung ba mchog tu dag phyag rgya sngags dang yang dag ldan// gseng po chen po'i go 'bang mchog/ de yi gsang sngags gzi brjid che// sha Sha'i snga yi mthar gnas
319a7(rgyud): mchog/ mgon po'i rgyur ni mngon par brjod// steng du nA das brgyan par bye// kun nas kha dog du ma yis// yongasu bskor bar bsgom par bya// sngags kyi phreng bas rjer brgyan/ de
319a8(rgyud): lha'i dkyil 'khor bris nas ni// mchod pa thams cad rab bsgrub bya// rdo rje sring ba'i dkyil lekhor// de nas dkyil 'khor chen po mchog/ yang dag rab tu bshad bya ba// gru pa
319b1(rgyud): pa la sgo bzhi pa// rta babs bzhis ni mdzes par byas/ thig bzhi dang ni yang dag lnga// khu tshur dkyil 'khor bri bar bya/ dkyil 'khor de yi dbus ni// rdo rje pad+ma yid 'ong ba// gzi ba
319b2(rgyud): chen po gser gyi mdog/ mdab ma brgyad pa yod 'ong gA// de yi steng du gzi brjid che// rdo rje khu tshur stobs po che// phyag bzhi pa la zhol ban pa/ sna tshogs rgyan gyis brgyan pa
319b3(rgyud): kun da dung dang zla ba dkar// khu tshur de bzhin gshegs kun gyi/ sku dang gsung dang thugs khu tshur// rdo rje nyid du mnyamo nyid mchog gnyisu med pa mchog gsang ba// khu tshur gyis
319b4(rgyud): na sdud par bshad// de sngags mchog tu dga' ba ni// brjod du med nyid rtsol mdzad pa/ sde tshan lnga pa'i gsum pa ni// 'bar ba'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor ba na// sangs
319b5(rgyud): rgyus rnams kyi rdo rje'i sku// 'di yAM sngags la nar gnas/ dok+te'i dkyil 'khor bris nas ni/ rdo rje khu tshur ma da par bya// rdo rje khu chung kyi dkyil la'o de la
319b6(rgyud): sogs pa mtha' yas mchog/ dkyil 'khor mchog tu 'bar ba ni// chos kyi dbyings kyi mtha' klas pa'i// sangs rgyas byang chub stsol bar mjed// de nas yang dag bshad
319b7(rgyud): bya ba 'jig rten pa yi dkyil 'khor mchog/ de bzhin gri bzhi bris nas ni// sgro khyud la sogs rnam pa spas// rtse gsum pa T+wA~M sa dang ni// dung dang pad+ma sogs pas brgyan// 
319b8(rgyud): thog mar dbang phyug chen po dgod// rtsa gsum pa yi phyag tsor ldan// khyu mchog la zhon mog gsum pa/ stag gi ljags gyon phyag bzhi pa// thal bas byugs shing
320a1(rgyud): mgo bo la// ral ba'i tshogs ni rab 'phyang ba/ chu yi dkyil 'khor dbus ni// de bzhin gshegs pa thaMd la// phyag 'tshal ba ni 'di dri'o// de yi sngags ni oM tris
320a2(rgyud): suM hUM phaT/ gsang sngags 'di ni cher gsang ba// bdag nyid cher paM dbang phyug che'i// dbang phyug chen po'i dkyil 'khorab/ dkyil 'khor chen po de nyid la dbang phyug chen po'i gan sun
320a3(rgyud): bo chen po bzhag par bya'o// lag pa stong gis gar byed pa dang ldan pa'i dgar byed dbang phyug dang ldan cig phyag bzhi pa spyan gsum pa'o// lag pa steng gis gnas pa'o// 
320a4(rgyud): rang gi sngags ni/ oM ma hA kA la hAM b+h+yAMHoM nan di kai shA ra kye b+h+yo// 'di bzlas na dngos grub dzad byed// dga'i byed dang byug dang nag po chen po'i dkyil 'khor// de nyid kyi
320a5(rgyud): ni cho ga yis// dkyil 'khor ga bzhi thog gdab bya// de ni pa d+ma yang dag go// pad+mar dbus s+tha tsor byed// lo sogs mang po gsum dri'o// gzhu yi phyag rgya yongasu 'dzin
320a6(rgyud): sdang ci byed dang rgyal bar byed// de bzhin nyid du'ang sgrub bye// ma tog mda' dang yongasu ldan// rang gi mo gtogs mtshan ma can// sngags ni// ma d+hA kaMd sAM/ oM sA/ d+ha na swa/ gsang sngags
320a7(rgyud): 'di ni 'dod gzugs can// dbang du byed pazed sgyu'o// sbrang rje rdo rje la sogs par dkyil 'khor/ dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa dris nas dbu su thig bzhi gdang go dbus sum bu ru'o sha
320a8(rgyud): gyi mdam mar rgyal ba'o// lho ru rnamo pa rgyal ba'o// nub tu mi thub pa'o// byang du gzhan gyis mi thub pa'o// de lho rdo'i dkyil 'khor bris nas go rims ji lta ba bzhin du gsang sdug
320b1(rgyud): dgod par bya'o// oM tum bu ru rA oM dza ye hAM/ oM ba~M dza ya sAM oM a dz+rIM te sAM/ oM a pa rA NI te hUM// dga' ba 'di dag lag g.yon du// khu tshur g.yon pas rab grub stsol// 'di yaM
320b2(rgyud): phyag rgya nyid gyur pa// sangs rgyas kun gyis rab tu bcugs// lag par dgod par za bshad bya// go roms ji lta ba bzhin du// tum bu ru nI ma'i bor dgang // sdigs mdzub li ni rgyal ba gan
320b3(rgyud): rnam rgyal gung mo nyid la'o// oM thub de bzhin mod med la// gzhan gyis mi thub ma the chung la// lag pa'i dbusu yig oM// dgod bya de nyid lag pa'i rgyag rdo rje phreng ba'i mthar thug tu/ 
320b4(rgyud): dgod par bya ba mchog tu bshad// sbyor dang rnar dbye ba yang / phyag rgya kun spyod yongasu bsdu/ so sor brtun pa bya ba nyid// sor mo rnams la khyad par du// dbang dang dgug
320b5(rgyud): dang rmongs la sogs// rangs byad la sogs go rims bzhin/ las rnams drag ni thad du// sngags pas mnyam por ga zhag smra bya// de nas bac+doMs de bzhin gshegs pa thadi
320b6(rgyud): slar yang 'dus te gshegs nas/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po la// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i mtshan rnams kyis legs par bstod pa
320b7(rgyud): mdzad/ bac+doMs mnyes par mdzad pa byang chub sems ni rdo rje che// sangs rgyas de bzhin gshegs pa kun// dgra bcom 'dod chags bral ba dang // legs pa chos kyi 'byung gnas mchog/ 
320b8(rgyud): blo gros dag pa ye shes che// thaMd mkhyen pa kun rig mchog/ mchog go dbang phyug dpa' ba che// thog mo tha ma med khyab bdag/ ma 'dris ma 'dres pa yi don// shin tu phra ba mchog sbyin
321a1(rgyud): // rgyal rdo rje can chen rnal 'byor ma// rdo rnal 'byor dang phyug mchog mi bskyed pa dang mi da mgon// chos dbyangs gzhan dang gzhan min ga/ rin chen 'byung gnas rdo rje mchog da
321a2(rgyud): bskur kun gyi bla ma'i bla// theg chen che ba'i mchog gi mchog/ dpa' ba mchog tu dpa' bo'i mchog/ zab cing yangs l-i phra da dang / thams cad bde de bzhin gshegs// 'khor los bskur
321a3(rgyud): ba'i rgyal po che// tshad skyed dkar po stobs po che// gzi brjid phung po gzi brjid che// phul byung phul las phul du byung // rgyu med mchog gi mchog dpa' mchog/ gzi mchog ga
321a4(rgyud): brjid byed mtshungs pa// rgyal ba rgyal mchog nyid dang // legs par rgyal po bdag nyid che// rdo rje sems dpa' sems chen po// rdo rje rgyal po lcags kyu che// rdo rje chags pa mda'
321a5(rgyud): rdo rje logs pa legs grub mdzad// rdo rje rin chen che mchog/ rdo rje gzi brjid legs brjid mdzod// rgyal mtshan chen/ bo rin chen rtog/ rdo rje gzhad pa legs gzhad mdza
321a6(rgyud): 'jig rten dbang phyug pad+ma che// shes rab ye shes legs rno mdzad// rdo mi cwo la chos chen ga spru las gzhad mdzad// sna tshogs las ni rgyal po che// rdo rje sdud pa legs srung mdzad// khri
321a7(rgyud): bo chen po gnod sbyin che/ rje na[]sa sbyor sel// phyag 'tshal sangs rgyas kun khyod la// dang po'i rnal 'byor dab 'phyug mchog/ legaso rdor can rnal 'byor che// de bzhin gshegapa
321a8(rgyud): thams cad dge/ snying po'i rkyen zhes can gsol ba// 'di dag thaMd legs par gsungs// sangs rgyas rnams kyi byang chub sems// ye shes snying po shin tu mdzes// gsang ba
321b1(rgyud): chen po mchog tu gsang // snga bya shin tu rnyed dka' ba/ shes rab pha rol phyi pa'i mdo// brjod du med cing yi ge brag// rdo rje snyi rgyud chen po las shes rab 'i rol tu phyin pa dkyil
321b2(rgyud): 'khor 'byung ban+de byaM ldog pa rgyas pa 'od yongasu rdzog so// // de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad slar yang 'dus te gshegs nas bcos
321b3(rgyud): thog ma dang tha ma med pa'i rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po la gsol ba btab bo// de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen pos de dgra gi gsol
321b4(rgyud): ba btab pa'i tshig nye bar gsan nas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yul la 'jug pa ye shes rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhug so// de ma thag tu
321b5(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das ma yang snyoms par shug so// de co ldan 'das rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po 'di skad cig nyid la 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa de
321b6(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa tha~Md kyi shes rab kyi ye shes rdo rje la zhugs par gyur to// zhugs nas kyang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po shes rab ye shes kyi ting na
321b7(rgyud): gsal bar mdzad cing bdun par gyur nas de bzhin gshegs pa tha~Md kyi thugs de las 'thon te// sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yul chos dbyings kyi mthas klas pa ma lus
321b8(rgyud): ba lus pa med pa'i seMn gyi khams thams cad snang bar mdzad nas sems can gyi khams tha~Md kyi'ang shes rab dang ye shes rnam por sbyangs te byang chub kyi sems
321'a1(rgyud): / bskyod nas gag c-ing rjesu mnyas par byas nas legs par mdzad nas rnam par gnas te/ rdo rje sems papa'i ting 'dzin legs par yongasu rtogs pa
321'a2(rgyud): mdzad nas// mngon par dbang bskur te gzi brjid dang / tog dang // gzhad pa dang // de dag la nges par sbyar te mchog gi dbang phyug chen po las rdo rje sems dpa'i ting 'dzin gyis che
321'a3(rgyud): rtog pa la yang rab tu gnas nas/ rnon po dang / rgyu dang smra ba'i sems dpa' rnams la'ang thugs brten par mdzad de yongasu dag nas yang pad+mo'i sems dpa'i tingange 'dzinal
321'a4(rgyud): rang bzhin gyis dag pa'i dbang phyug chos nyid/ gzhi med pa la sbyar nas sna tshogs pa'i las kyi bdag tho dang / sems can yosu smin par byed ba srung dang // khro ba dang / 
321'a5(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa tha~Md kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje mtshams sbyor ba rnams sen gyi khams mtha' dag yongasu smin pa dang / byin gyis bzlas te skar
321'a6(rgyud): log nas bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs kar rje su zhugs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa tha~Md kyi shes rab kyi ye shes la bzhugs nas ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod// e ma'o
321'a7(rgyud): zag med shes rab bdag/ sangs rgyas skyob pa thams cad kyi// shes rab shin tu dri med sems// sa de'i lus su bdag gyur to// dri med sangs rgyas tha~Md kyi// dngos dang dngos med rnam
321'a8(rgyud): dpyad na/ e ma'o chos ni bsam med nyid// dag gi dang du rnam par gnas/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpa la bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs karmA/ 
321'b1(rgyud): 'dzin nas byang chub sems dpa' bcu gi lus su mngon par sprul te bcom ldan 'das rnar snang mdzad la yongasu bskor ba'i de bzhin gshegs pakhyod kyi nye 'khor kun tu
321'b2(rgyud): nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dang 'od kyi dkyi 'khor dang / byin gyis brlabs pa zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la 'khod par gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen
321'b3(rgyud): bo la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das rdo rje snying po rgyan gyi rgyud las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mdor bstan pa'i chos kyi tshig bko' stsal du gosal/ de nas
321'b4(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis 'jam dpal gnon nur gyur po la bka' sprul pa// 'jam dpal khyod de bzhin gshegs pa la don yongasu zhu bar sems dpa' ni
321'b5(rgyud): leg so leg so// legs par rab tu nyon la yaM da la zung shig dang / ngas bshad// de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rnal 'byor gi dbang phyug chen po de bzhin gshegs pa
321'b6(rgyud): thad du bdag nyid byin gyis brlab nas sngags kyi tshig 'di dag bka' stsal pa dan pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhini ning gi lus dang / phyi'i lus dang / phyi nang gi lus la lus kyi rje su lta zhing btsun
321'b7(rgyud): 'gas can shes bzhin dang ldan pa/ dran pa dang ldan pas 'jig rten gyi chags sems dang yod mi bde ba rnam par bsal cing rnam par dad// lus la kun 'byung ba'i rje su lnga zhing na
321'b8(rgyud): dadod do// lus la zad po re rje su lha ning rnam par dpyodado// lus la mi gnas par rnam par spyod cing 'jig rten du gang yang te 'dzin na nang gi tshor ba dang / khyi'i tshor ba dang phyi nang gi tshar
322a1(rgyud): da na gi sems dang /  semapa dang / nang sase sa dung / nang na chos dang / 'i chos dang / blan gi sa la chos rjes byung na sa na shes pan
322a2(rgyud): ldan gdun pa dang ldan pas 'jig rten gyi chags sems dang yid mi dade ba rnam dar bas la sod rnam par spyo/ chos la kun 'byung ba'i su lce zhing rnam par spyod// chos la zad po'i
322a3(rgyud): e wa kyang rnam par smye// chos lami gnas pa'i rnam par spyad cing 'jig rten du yang na ga sbyin pa myod// rgyug tu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lus dang ga dang khrims dang chos pa
322a4(rgyud): panyid kyi gnaso// oM k+Sha oM tsat+ta smr-i ts+tsha wAn na rmA/ dgra par stong bgazhin sdig to ma dge ba'i chos ma skyes ba rloms mi bskyed pa mi dmigs
322a5(rgyud): gyis 'dun pa bskyed cing stsol lo// 'artson 'grus rtsom mo// sems kyis rab tu 'dzin to// smon lam yang dag para'adres so// sdig to ma dge ba'i chos skyes pa rnams
322a6(rgyud): spang ba'i phyir 'dun pa la sogs pa dang / dge ba'i chos ma skyes pa rnams bskyas pa rnams bskyed pa'i phyir 'dun pa bskyed// 'bad do// brtson 'grus rtsom mo// sems kyis rab
322a7(rgyud): tu 'dzin to// smon lam yang dag par 'dab so// chos skyes pa rnams spangs po'i phyir 'dun pa la sogaso ba dang / dge bo'i chos ma skyes pa rnams skyed pa'i phyir 'dun pa bskyed// 
322a8(rgyud): 'byed do// rtson 'grus rtsom mo// sems rab tu 'dzin to// smon lam yang dag par 'dobs so// dge ba'i chos skyes pa rnams 'phel zhing shin tu rgyas po dbya ba dang / yongs par
322b1(rgyud): bya ba'i phyir dang / sgom pa yongasu rtogs par bya ba'i phyir 'dun bskyedado// 'thad do// brtson 'grus thob mo// sems rab tu 'dzin to// smon lam yang dag par 'debs so// chos rnams
322b2(rgyud): don dam par mi spong ba dang / mi spong ba mi yin pa'i ched du rdzogs par bya'o// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen pos 'di bka' stsal to// oM samya ka pA hA
322b3(rgyud): na sarba ta thA ga ta sa ma tA a d+hiSh+Ti aHraHhA// yang dag par spong ga brjod pa zhes bya ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo'o// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi ni 'dun pa'i ting 'dzin spo
322b4(rgyud): ba'i 'du byed dang ldan pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bsgom par bya'o// brtson 'grus dang / sems dang / spyod pa'i ting rjen spong ba'i 'du byed dang ldan pa'i rdzu 'phrul
322b5(rgyud): rkang pa sgom par byed// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa don dam ba dang / kun rdzob kyi sgo'i chos zad sgyu ma sgyu ma'i ma tshan nyid du 'jug go// zhesra bcom ldan 'das chos
322b6(rgyud): thaMd kyi 'khor los bsgyur bas bka' stsal to// oM rid+d+ha bA da pA ra mi te la bA ba ra hUM hUM// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes zhes bya ba shes rab kyi
322b7(rgyud): pha rol tu phyin pa'o// dbang po lnga ni dang po'i dbang po dang // brtson 'grus kyi dbang po dang / don po'i dbang po dang / ting 'dzin gyi dbang po dang / shes rab kyi dbang po'o// ba cos chos thaMd
322b8(rgyud): mnyam pa nyid la dbang bskur ba spros pa med pa'i dbang po 'di dag bka' stsal to// oM on+d+ra yA ba bo d+ha bA dz+nye i Sha dz+nyA nA nA ma n+ya nA pa ga ta ya aHhUM/ dbang po mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba
323a1(rgyud): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// stobs lda ni dad pa'i stobs dang / brtson 'grus kyi stobs dang / dran pa'i stobs dang / ting 'dzin gyi stobs dang / shes rab kyi slob 'o// zhes
323a2(rgyud): bka' stsal to// bcom ldan 'das chos tha~Md mnyam pa nyid la gnas pa/ stobs thams cad rtogs pa/ spros pa thaMd dang dral ba gdod ma nas dag pas 'di bka' stsal pa/ oM sarba
323a3(rgyud): ta thA ga tA ba la aHhUM hUM baHstobs 'phel ba zhes bya ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshangs pa'i gnas pa bzhi ni// byams pa dang / snying rje dang / dga' ba dang / btang snyoms so// 
323a4(rgyud): oM preh+ma bi ha rA byAM ShA ni kau ma~M druM k+Sha hU tAM/ chos zad mnyam rab nyid ces bya ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bka' stsal to// tshangs pa'i gnas pa byin gyis rlob pa'o// so so
323a5(rgyud): yang dag par rig pa dang / nges pa'i cho ga so so yang dang ga bar rig pa dang / don so so yang dag par rig pa dang / chos so so yang dag par rig pa'o zhes bcom ldan
323a6(rgyud): 'das chos thaMd sgyu ma'i mtshan nyid du so so yang dag par rig pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o zhes bka' stsal to// oM pra tI sam+bi da swa ng+ku shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
323a7(rgyud): ba mnyam pa nyid// rjesu dran pa drug gang zhe na/ sangs rgyas rjesu dran pa dang / chos rje su dran pa dang / dge 'dun rjesu dran pa dang / gtong pa r+Ne su dran pa dang / tshul khrims rjesu dran
323a8(rgyud): ba dang / lha rje su dran pa'o// chos thams cad gcig tu rjesu dran pa ni chos thams cad don dam pa stong pa nyid ces bya'o// mtshan nyid dang mtshan nyid med pa rnam par spyod pas
323b1(rgyud): mnyam pa nyid kyi sgo zhes bya ba 'di ting nge 'dzin la dbang bsgyur bas bka' stsal to// oM sarba a nu smr-i ti shud+d+he saM pa da ngi na nU hA hA/ rje su dran pa drug gi shes rab bo// byang chub kyi yan
323b2(rgyud): lag bdun gang zhe na/ dran pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang // chos rnam par 'byed pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / brtson 'gos yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / dga' ba yang dag
323b3(rgyud): byang chub kyi yan lag dang / shin tu sbyangs pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / ting nge 'dzin yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / baiting snyoms yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ste byang chub
323b4(rgyud): kyi yan lag mnyam pa nyid skye ba med pa'i mtshan nyid ces bya ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bka' stsal to// oM sarba tA thob+h+yAM ka sa ma ta su pra tits+tsha ti d+h+r-i ga 'phags pa'i lam yan lag
323b5(rgyud): brgyad gang she na/ yang dag pa'i ltung dang / yang dag pa'i// gle ba dang / yang dag po'i ngag dang / yang drag pa'i las rma pa' dang / yang dag pa'i 'tsho ba dang / yang dag pa'i rtsol ba da
323b6(rgyud): yang dag pa'i dran pa dang / yang dag pa'i ti 'dzin to// lam zad mi shes pa'i byang chub kyi sems chen po la 'jug pa legs par so sor rig pa thaMd mkhyen pa'i ye shes so// 
323b7(rgyud): Ar+yaSh+Ti ga mArga mgu' phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// ting 'dzin gsum ni/ stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med
323b8(rgyud): pa'o// de la stong pa nyid kyi ting 'dzin gang zhe na/ stong pa'i rnam pa dang / gsog dang gsob kyi rnam pa dang / rang bzhin med pa'i rnam pas chos thaMd mtshan nyid gcig tu rtogs pa sems rtse gcig/ 
324a1(rgyud): pa ste/ 'di ni stong pa nyid kyi ting 'dzin ces brjod do// de la mtshan ma med par dring 'dzin gang zhe na gang la mtshan mar mi byed pa dang / 'du pa med pa dang / shes pa med pa
324a2(rgyud): dang shi ba'i rnam pa dang / rnam par bral ba'i rnam par sems rtse gcig pa ste/ 'di ni mtshan ma med pa'i ting 'dzin ces bya'o// de la smon pa med pa'i ting 'dzin gang zhe na/ mi rtag pa'i rnam
324a3(rgyud): pa dang / sdug bsngal ba'i rnam pa sems rtse gcig pa ste/ de la smon pa med pa'i ting 'dzin ces bya'o// chos thaMd rtogs nas smon par mi byed/ lha 'am lha las gzhan gang yang rung gdon du mi
324a4(rgyud): gnyer gang gsol ba 'dabs par yang mi 'dod pa ste/ ngos po zangal ting 'dzin pams cad kyi sgo yis kyang ngo // shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid kyis ting 'dzin gyi na
324a5(rgyud): gsum nye bar rtogs par bya'o// oM kha sa maHsarba d+harmA/ khaM de la stobs bcu ni gnas dang gnas ma yin pa ma/ khyen pa'i stobs dang / las kyi rnam par smin pa mkhyen pa'i
324a6(rgyud): stobs dang // rnams sna tshogs mkhyen pa'i stobs dang / dbang po mchog dang mchog ma yin pa mkhyen pa'i stobs dang / mos po sna tshogs mkhyen pa'i stobs dang / sdug bsngal 'gog
324a7(rgyud): ba so sor mkhyen pa'i stobs dang // kun nas nyon mongs pa dang rnam par byang ba mkhyen pa'i stobs dang / sngon gyi gnas rje su dran pa mkhyen pa'i stobs dang / mngon par shes pa
324a8(rgyud): lnga mkhyen por stobs dang / zag pazad pa mkhyen pa'i spongs so// de bzhin gshegs pa tha~Md kyi mnyam pa nyid so sor rtogs pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// oM da
324b1(rgyud): sha ba las ma te gi/ stongs bsu mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// rnam par thar pa brgyad gang zhe na// gzugs can gyis gzugs rnams mthong ba de ni rnang
324b2(rgyud): 'dang po'o// nang gzugs med pa'i 'du shes dang ldan pas phyi rol gyi gzugs rnams mthong ba 'di ni rnam par thar pa gnyis pa'o// bzang bar mos pa 'di ni rnar thar pa gsum
324b3(rgyud): ba'o// gzugs kyi 'du shes las yang dag par 'das te thogs pa'i 'du shes rnams nub par gyur cing sna tshogs kyi 'du shes rnams yid la mi byed pas na mkha' mtha'
324b4(rgyud): yas so zhes te/ namakha' mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa bzhi pa'o// de rnam pa thams cad du na mtha' mtha' yos skye mched las yang
324b5(rgyud): dag par 'das te/ rnam par shes pa mtha' ya so// zhe/ sa rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched nye bar bsgrubs te/ gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa lnga pa'o// de rnam pa thams
324b6(rgyud): cad du rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ cung zad ma yod do// zhes cung zad med po'i skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par shar pa drug pa'o/ 
324b7(rgyud): de rnam pa thad du cung zad med pa'i skye mched las yang dag par 'das te 'du shes med ma ni skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas pa 'od ni rnam par thar pa bdun pa'o// de rnam par byed
324b8(rgyud): du 'du shes med 'du shes med moni skye mched las yang dag par 'das te 'du shes dang // tshor ba 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni rnam pa
325a1(rgyud): thar pa brgyad pa'o// chos thaMd spros pa med pa'i mtshan nyid kun nas nyon mo sa pa med cing rnam par bya ba med pa/ bsam gtan med cing bsam gtan med pa ma yin pa/ stso
325a2(rgyud): bar 'jug pa med cing snyoms par 'jug pa ma yin pa 'di bka' stsal te// oM sa man+ta b+ha dre sarba ba bi shudad+he d+he Sha~M gaM gnas dang gnas ma yin pa dang bral ba zhes bya ba shes rab
325a3(rgyud): pha rol tu phyin pa'o// mi 'jigs pa ba ni gang zhe na/ bdag gis yang dag par rdzogs par sangs rgyas zhes dam bcas na/ chos 'di rnams mngon par rdzogs por sangs rgyas so/ 
325a4(rgyud): zhes bya 'i// bdag la dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze'am/ lha 'am/ 'dud dam/ tshangs pa 'am/ skye dgu'i tshogs gzhan gyi nga yang rung sde 'jig rten na chos dang ldan par
325a5(rgyud): rgol por 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i rgyu yang dag par rje su ma mthong ste/ rgyu yang dag par rje su mo mthong bas de la bdag me da pa thob pa dang / bag tsha ba med pa thob pa dang / 
325a6(rgyud): mi 'jigs pa thob par rnam par spyod de/ khyu mchog brlabs po che'i gan su dam bca'o// 'khor gyi nang du sang ga'i sgra bsgragaso// tshangs pa'i 'khor lo 'jig rten na dag
325a7(rgyud): sbyong ngam bram ze 'am/ lha 'am bdud dam tshangs pa 'am// gzhan sus kyang rung ste/ chos dang ldan pa bskor bar mi nus pa bdag gis rab tu bskor bar bya'o// bdag zag pa zad do/ 
325a8(rgyud): zhes dam bcas nas/ de la zag pa 'di rnams yongs su zad par ma gyur to zhes bya bar bdag la dge sbyong ngam bram ze 'am/ lha 'am/ 'dod dam tshangs pa 'am/ skye dgu'i tshogs
325b1(rgyud): gzhan su yang rung ste/ 'jig rten na chos dang 'thun par zhes bya ba'i bar du'o// gang yang bdag gis bar chad kyi chos su bstan pa de dag la bar chad kyi chosu mi 'gyur zhes bya ba
325b2(rgyud): rgyas par sbya ro// gang yang bdag gos lam 'phags pa'i nges par 'byung ba'i lam du bshad pa de yis nges par 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/ yang dag par sdug bsngal zang po dang
325b3(rgyud): yang dag par sdug bsngal mthar bya bar ga la 'gyur// zhes dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze 'am/ bdud dam tshangs pa 'am skye dgu'i tshegasu yang rung ste/ 'jig rten na chos dang lnga par rgol
325b4(rgyud): bar 'gyuraro zhes bya ba'i rgyu yang dag por rje su mi mthong ba la sogs pa ji ltar gyur pa thaMdi yongasu spros te brjod pa ro bya'o// mi 'a rdzogs pa ni chos thaMd mnyam pa nyid sgyu me'i mtshan
325b5(rgyud): nyid de ngar 'dzin pa dang / nga yir 'dzin pa dang bral ba'i phyiro// oM baM shA ra d+ya sa ma tAprA pa tA a AHoM AHmthar gyis gnas pa'i mnyam pa nyid kyi snyoms
325b6(rgyud): par 'jug pa dgu gang zhe na/ 'dod pas dben pa sdig to mi dge ba'i chos kyis dben pa rtog pa dang bcas ga pyod dang bcas pa'i dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde
325b7(rgyud): can bsam gtan dang po la nye bar bsgrubs te gnaso// de rnar rtog pa dang / rnam par dpyod pa nye bar zhi nas nang yong su dngas te sems kyi rgyud gcig tu gyur pas rtog pa med pa/ 
325b8(rgyud): dpyod pa med gting 'dzin las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba can bsam gtan gnyis pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gan so// de dga' ba'i 'dod chags dang bral bas btang snyoms
326a1(rgyud): / rdzu gnas dun pa dang ldan na shes pazhin can sum gyis bdeg slong shul 'gul pa rnams kyi ste/ 'dun pa dang ldan pa'i da gal rnam pa pa byu bang rtsubs
326a2(rgyud): zhes brjod pa ste dga' ba med pa'i bsam gtan gsum pa la nye bar bsgrubs to gnaso// dbade ba yang spangs/ sdug bsngal yang spangs shing / yod bde ba dong / yod mo 'di snga nas
326a3(rgyud): kyang nub pas bde ba yang med/ sdug bsngal ba yang med/ khatang snyoms pa dang / dran pa yong su dag pa/ bsam gtan 'di pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gan so// de rnam bzang du gzugs
326a4(rgyud): kyi 'du shes las yang dag par 'das kyi thogs ba'i 'du shes rnams nub par gyur cing sna tshogs kyi du shes yid la mi byed pas na mkha' mtha' yaso so sa
326a5(rgyud): te rnam par mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar ba ngas te gnaso// de rnam pa 'di du na mkha' mthar la sa skye mched la so yang dag par 'das te rnam par shes
326a6(rgyud): pa mtha' ya so zhes rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnaso// de rnam pa zad du rnam shes mtha' yos skye mched las yang dag par 'das te cung zad
326a7(rgyud): ma yod zhes cung zad med pa'i skye mched la nyo bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de rnams pa thams cad du cung zad med pa'i skye mched las yang dag par 'das te 'du shes med
326a8(rgyud): ma ni skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas// de rnam pa thams cad du 'ad shes med ma ni skye mched pas yang dag par 'das te 'du shes dang / tsher ba 'gog pa'o snyoms
326b1(rgyud): 'jug la nye bar bsgrubs te gnaso// rnar thar pa brgyad po dang mnyam pa nyid su thob nas dngos po rdog par mi byed// dngos po med pa 'jog par mi byed/ chos thaMd gnyi su rnyed pa
326b2(rgyud): rtog so// 'di ni mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu mnyam pa nyid// oM a nan+taHbi mo k+Sha mu khe sham/ dngos po dzad mthar gyis pa'i rnam parau thar pa mnyam pa nyid ces
326b3(rgyud): bya ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// de la pha rol tu phyin pa bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i
326b4(rgyud): pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu byin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / smon lam gyi pha rol
326b5(rgyud): tu phyin pa dang / ye shes kyi pha rol phyin pa dang / stobs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / thabs kyi pha rol/ phyin pa dang / thaMd kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / mi mnyam pa
326b6(rgyud): dang / mnyam pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / spros pa med pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / yang dag pa'i don gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / chos thams cad kyi de kho na nyid kyi don gyi
326b7(rgyud): pha rol tu phyin pa dang / rdo rje'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang // rin po che'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bap+pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / las kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / chos tha~Md mnyam
326b8(rgyud): pa nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste bstan po rje su rtogs pa'i sbyor bas so// oM sarba pA ra maM ta an+da ba bi ru ro Ni/ oM br-i hAM taM/ thaMd kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba shes rab
327a1(rgyud): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// de las bcu gra she na/ rab tu dga' zhes bya ba'i sa dang / dri ma med pa zhes bya ba dang / 'od byung ba zhes bya ba dang / 'od 'phro ba zhes
327a2(rgyud): bya ba dang / sbyang dka' ba zhes bya ba dang / mngon du gyur pa zhes bya ba dang / rong du song ba zhes bya ba dang / mi g.yo ba zhes bya ba dang / legs po'i blo groso zhes bya ba dang / chos kyi spyan
327a3(rgyud): zhes bya ba dang / sa tha~Md don cig te 'di ltar ye shes kyi don to// ye shes kyang ci yang med ga/ nyon mongs pa med ga/ yo ga med gdon yod pa/ gdod ma nas dag pa/ dri ma medapa
327a4(rgyud): 'od gasral ga brjod pa bral ba zhes bya ba'i don to// oM b+h+yA mi bi shod+d+ha ni sarbA rbA ba ri bA ra Ni baM bruMs yongasu sbyong ba zhes bya ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// 
327a5(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa'i gnas pa bcu gang zhe na/ byang chub sem sa dpa' sems dang po bskye dang / gzhon nur gyur pa dang // las dang po pa dang / rnal 'byor spyod pa dang
327a6(rgyud): skye ba dang / skye bar sbyor ba dang ldan pa dang / bsam po dang ldan pa dang / phyir mi ldog pa dang / dbang bskur ba thob pa dang / skye ba gcig gi thogs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams
327a7(rgyud): kyi rnam par gonas pa dang / mi gnas pa dor ba ste/ don dam par gnas pa cig yin pa'i phyir 'di lhor gnas pa med po'o// oM sarba bya ba s+thA na bi ga te hUM/ rnam par gnas pa
327a8(rgyud): med pa zhes bya ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dbang bcu gang zhe na/ che la dbang ba dang / la sau la dbang ba dang / yo byad la dbang ba dang / 
327b1(rgyud): mos pa la dbang ba dang / smon lam la dbang ba dang / rdzu 'phrul dbang ba dang / skye ba la da'ang ba dang / ye shes dbang 'dang / chos lnga dbang ba dang / sems la dbang ba'o// dbang ba dang
327b2(rgyud): mi dbang ba rang bzhin gyis rnam par grol ba thams cad la dbang ga/ dbang phyug thams cad la rje su thob pa/ chos thams cad legs par so sor rtogs pa nyid kyi phyir ro// oM
327b3(rgyud): sarbal shi te d+hA d+hU hUM/ thams cad la dbang ba zhes bya ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// de la sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad gang zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa la 'khrul
327b4(rgyud): ba mi mnga'o//  tsom mnga'o// dgongs pa nyams pa mi mnga'o// thugs mnyam par ma gzhag pa mi mnga'o// 'du shes sna tshogs mi mnga'o// ma brtags pa'i brta
327b5(rgyud): snyoms mi mnga'o// 'dun pa yong su nyams pa mi mnga'o// brtson 'grus yongasu nyams pa mi mnga'o// dran pa yod/ su nyams pa mi mnga'o// ting 'dzin yongasu
327b6(rgyud): nyams pa mi mnga'o// shes rab yongasu nyams pa mi mnga'o// rnam par grol ba yongasu nyams bya mi mnga'o// rnam par grol ba'i ye shes gzigs pa yong su nyams pa mi
327b7(rgyud): mnga'o// 'das pa'i dus lam thogs ma chags pa'i ye shes gzigs pa 'jug go ma 'ongs pa'i dus la ma tshugs mthogs pa'i ye shes gzigs pa 'jug go// 
327b8(rgyud): da ltar byung ba'i dus la ma chags ma thogs pa'i ye shes gzigs pa 'jug go// sku'i phrin las thams cad ye shes sngon du 'gro ba ste ye shes kyi rje su 'brang ngo // gsu
328a1(rgyud): gaM phrin las thams cad ye shes sngon du 'gro ba ste ye shes kyi rdzasu 'brang ngo // thugs kyi phrin las thams cad ye shes kyi sngon du 'gre ba snga ya shAs kyi
328a2(rgyud): rje.u drang ngo // 'di chos rjes skye ba'i bsgyur 'brelags// / rgya dpe la gtugs shing sleb dang na zhi ba shes gtan gyi 'brel pa dang yang bsnun nas chu dag byas shing / mi da
328a3(rgyud): su mi rung ba re re tsam 'grel pa dang btsun nas bcos shing / zhu thugs g.yar khrel du blangs nas/ bu ston gyis bgyis pa'o// / dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyog 'tshal// de
328a4(rgyud): la sa bcu rnams ci zhe na/ rab tu dgar ba zhes bya ba'i sa dang / dri ma med pa zhes bya ba dang / 'od 'phro ba zhes bya ba dang / thug par dag ba zhes bya ba dang / mngon du sbyor pa zhes bya ba dang
328a5(rgyud): ring du song ba zhes bya ba dang / mi g.yo ba zhes bya ba dang / lags pa'i blo gros zhes bya ba dang / chos kyi sprin zhes bya ba'o// sa rnams thams cad don cig pa ste/ 'di lta ste yas
328a6(rgyud): kyi don no// ye shes kyang don dam par ci yang med gnyon mongs pa med ga 'gyur ba med gdon yod pa/ gdid ma nas dri ma med pa 'od gsal ba brjod du med pa'o zhes pa'i don gang
328a7(rgyud): yin pa'o// oM b+hu ma~M bi sho d+ha ni sar+b+bar+yA ba ri pU ra Ni kha~M b+h+ya/ sa yongasu sbyong ba zhes bya ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rnam par gzhag pa bcu
328a8(rgyud): rnams ci zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dang po bskyed pa dang / byis par gyur pa dang / las dang po pa dang / rnal 'byo 'i byung myo la/ sbyor ba phun sum tshogs pa dang / bsam pa
328b1(rgyud): phun sum tshogs pa dang / phyir mi ldog pa dang / dbang bskur bathob pa dang / skye ba gcig gis thogs pa ste/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rnam par gzhag pa ni don dam par rnam par/ 
328b2(rgyud): gzhag pa dang bral ba ste// rnam par gzhag pa cig nyid kyi phyir na 'di lta ste rnam par gzhag pa med pa'o// oM sarba bya ba swa na bi ga te hUM/ rnam par gzhag pa med pa zhes bya ba'i shes
328b3(rgyud): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dbang bcu rnams ci zhe na/ tshe la dang ba dang / las la dbang ba dang / yo byad la dbang ba dang / mos pa la dbang ba dang / 
328b4(rgyud): smon lam la dbang ba dang / rdzu 'phrul la dbang ba dang / skye ba la dbang ba dang / stobs la dbang ba dang / chos la dbang Ta dang / sems la dbang ba'o// dbang rnams thams cad kyang
328b5(rgyud): don nges par dbang med pa rang bzhin rnam par dben kun rdzob tu dbang phyug thams cad la dbang rje su thob kha ste chos legs par so sor rtogs pa nyid kyi phyir ro// 
328b6(rgyud): oM sarba' shi t+tarmAd+hU hUM/ dbang thams cad zhes bya ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// // de la sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad rnams ci zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs
328b7(rgyud): ba la 'brul pa med pa dang / ci co med pa dang / ngan pa nyams pa med pa dang / thugs mnyam par ma gzhag pa med pa dang / tha dad pa nyid kyi 'du shes med pa dang / so sor ma brtags pa'i
328b8(rgyud): btang snyoms med pa dang / 'dun pa nyams pa med pa dang / brtson 'grus nyams pa med pa dang / dran pa nyams pa med pa dang / ting 'dzin nyams pa med pa dang / shes rab nyams
329a1(rgyud): pa med pa dang / rnam par grol ba nyams pa med cing rnam par grol ba'i ye shes gzigs pa nyams pa med pa dang / 'das pa'i dus la ma chags ma thogs pa'i ye sha
329a2(rgyud): gzigs pa 'jug pa dang / ma 'ongs pa'i dus la ma chags ma thogs pa'i ye shes gzigs pa 'jug pa dang / da ltar gyi dug la ma chags ma thogs pa'i ye shes gzigs pa 'jug
329a3(rgyud): ba dang / sku'i phrin las thams cad ye shes sngon du 'gro zhing ye shes kyi rjesu 'brang dang / gsung gi phreng las thams cad ye shes sngon du 'gro zhing ye shes kyi rje su 'brang ba'o// rdzu
329a4(rgyud): kyi sprin las thams cad ye shes sngon du 'gro zhing ye shes kyi rje su 'brang ba'o// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ni yul ba thams cad du dus thams cad kyi tshe thams cad mnya
329a5(rgyud): pa nyid la legs par rab tu gnas pa ste/ stong pa da la yang dag par rje su rtogs pa nyid kyi phyir na shes rab yod su dag pa'o// oM a we ti ka bud+d+ha d+harma sa ma ta a
329a6(rgyud): dI ra hU khaM/ ma 'dres pa mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// de la skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis rnams ci zhe na/ phyag dang zhabs kyi mthil 'khor lo
329a7(rgyud): mtshan po nyid de 'di'i phyag dang zhabs kyi mthil dag 'a khor lo rtsibs stong can lte ba dang bcas pa rnam pa thams cad yongasu rdzogs pa'o// phyag dang zhabs kyi mthil legs par
329a8(rgyud): gnas pa ste/ zhabs kyi mthal thams cad kyis sa gzhi la reg cing // de yang 'di'i mtho ba ni dma' ba dang / dpa' ba dang ni mtho ba'o// phyag dang zhabs kyi sor mo dang pa'i rgyal
329b1(rgyud): bo lta bu dra bas 'bral ba ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi phyag dag dang / zhabs de dag gser gyi mdog can gyi ri bo'i phreng ba rnams kyis rkyang ba brgyad pa bzhin du mdzes pa'o// 
329b2(rgyud): dang zhabs 'jam zhing gzhon sha chags pa nyid// bcom ldan 'das 'di'i phyag dang zhabs dag ras bal 'jam po bzhin dang / skyes nas zla ba lon pa'i byis pa bzhin du gzhon sha
329b3(rgyud): can dang / kA tsa lon da ltar 'jam pa / reg na bde ba'o// bdun mtho bar gyur ta phyag gnyis dag dang zhabs gnyis dag dang / phrag gong dag dang / mgron pa'i phyogs gcig
329b4(rgyud): dag gis/ sor mo ring ba ste/ 'di'i zhabs kyi sor ma rnams rim gyis ring ba nyid do// rting pa yangs pa ste 'di'i rting pa che zhing nabs kyi rje su mtshams par yangs par
329b5(rgyud): 'gyur ro// sku che zhing drang ba nyid de/ 'bye'o ma yin zhing zhom ba ma yin// mamatshas la / legs par skyes pa rnam pa thams cad pa bdun dang ldan pa'i sku ste/ 
329b6(rgyud): 'tho ba 'di'i srid dang rje su 'tsham po'i zheng du 'gyur ro// zhabs 'bur mi mngon pa nyid de/ 'di'i pus mo dang khyong bu mtho bar 'gyur ro// ba spu'i rtse mo gyen du phyogs
329b7(rgyud): ste/ 'di'i ba spu rnams rtse mo gyen du phyogs par 'gyur zhing / ba spu rnams g.yas phyogs su 'khyil 'khor ba mag sman gyi mdog can rnams te/ de rnams kyis gsar
329b8(rgyud): gyi mdog can gyi sku mdog gsal bar byed do// byin pa ri dgas e ne ya'i lta bu ste bcom ldan 'das kyi byin pa rgya log e ne ya rnams lta bu'o// phyag ring zhing
330a1(rgyud): mdzes pa sde rgyas shing ma btud pa nyid du phyag mthil dag gis rang gi pus mo'i lha nga la reg pa'o// 'doms kyi lnga ba sbubs su nub ste/ sbubs kyis rab
330a2(rgyud): tu g.yogs pa glang po che'i gsang gnas lte bur 'gyur ro// sku mdog gser 'dra ba ste 'di'i kha drog gser lta bur 'gyur ro// lpags pa srang ba ste shin tu 'jam pa gas
330a3(rgyud): shog ltar 'jam pa'i lpags pa can du 'gyur zhing / rdul med pa na bza' 'dzin pa'o// spu re re nas skyes pa ste/ 'di'i ba spyi'i khung bur spu rnams re rer 'gyur ro// smin ma'i
330a4(rgyud): dbus na mdzad pu can ta/ 'di'i smin ma dag go dbus ni ras skud legs pa lta bu dang bcag baM'o khwa dog can g.ya saM phyogs su 'khyil bar 'gyur te/ mdzod bu nyid
330a5(rgyud): kyis zhal gser gyi kha dog lta bu shin tu gsal bar byed de// sku stod seng ge lta bu ste/ 'di'i sku steng du ya nges pa seng ga lte bur 'gyur ro// dpung mgo zlum ste
330a6(rgyud): ba'i mgrin pa can du 'gyur ro// thal gong rgyas par 'gyur zhing gser shog bzhin du rnam par gsal ba'i mgon pa can no// yan lag so so rnams su ro rnams myong bar byed do
330a7(rgyud): ces pas na/ ro bri ba'i mchog dang ldan pa nyid de// rtsa rnams yin pa de rnams kyi mchog tu rlung dang mkhris pa dang / bdag na la sogs pa rnams kyis ma dkrugs pa nyid kyi phyir yang
330a8(rgyud): dag par gsal ba'o// shing n+ya gro de ltar chu zhang gab pa ste/ skyes bu chen po'i mcha dang keng dag mnyam pa'o// dbu gtsug tor dang ldan pa ste/ dbu zlum par 'byur zhing gtsug
330b1(rgyud): tor gdugs lta bus yas bkab pa gtsug tor yang shin tu mtho ba'o// ljags ring ba ste snyan gyi mtha'i bar du lcags kyi rtse mos reg par byed cing dbu skra'i mthar thugs par yang / 
330b2(rgyud): dal ba'i mthar ljags kyis khebs pa'o// tshangs pa'i dbyangs te 'khor stong phrag du mar dbyangs nang du ji lta ba de ltar phyi rol du'ang thos shing byA ka la baM ka'i bzhin du snyad
330b3(rgyud): pa nyid 'gyur ro// 'gram pa seng ga' lta bu ste/ 'gram pa dog seng ge bzhin du zlum po 'gyuraro// tshems dkar ba ste dung dang kun de dang / zla ba'i kha dog can gyi tshems rnams so// 
330b4(rgyud): tshems mnyam pa ste ha cang dma' ba ma yin mtho ba ma yin// mi mnyam pa ma yin pa'i rtse mo can gyi tshems rna mas su 'gyur ro// tshems thag bzang ba ste tshe
330b5(rgyud): rnams bar bar med pa'o// tshems bzhi bcu mnga' ba ste/ mas 'og tu nyi shu dang / steng du tshems nyi sha'o// smra/ na 'thon 'thang ste spyan dag gi sngon po gang yin pa
330b6(rgyud): de shin tu rnam par dag par 'gyur te/ ri mo dmar po rnams dang ma 'dres pa nyid kyi phyir gang dkar po yin pa de khaM ni shin tu rnam par dag par 'gyur ro// rdzi ma pa lta bu ste/ smyan
330b7(rgyud): gyi rdzi ma rnams khyu mchog gi bzhin du 'og ma yin pa de rnams 'og kho na dang / gang stong ma yin pa de rnams steng kho nar gnas pa ma 'arjings pa/ legs par gzhol ba'o/ 
330b8(rgyud): sems can 'ga'o zhig rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa gser gyi mdog can du mthong ba 'ga' zhig rnams kyis shel gyi mdog can du mthong ga 'ga' zhig rnams kyis
331a1(rgyud): pahA rA ka'i mdog dang / 'ga' zhig rnams kyis oMn+d+ra nI la'i kha dog dang / 'ga' zhig rnams kyis mu tig dmar po'i kha dog can dang / 'ga' zhig
331a2(rgyud): rnams kyis dung dang kun da dang / zla ba ltar dkar ba dang / 'ga' zhig gis kha dog sna tshogs pa dang / 'ga' zhig gis na mkha'i kha dog can dang / 'ga' zhig gis khru phyed
331a3(rgyud): dang bcu gsum pa'i tshad dang / ji srid du dpag tshad 'bum gyi tshad dang / dpag tshad bye ba'i tshad dang / ji srid du 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam rgya mtsho'i sprin mtha' yas pa
331a4(rgyud): rnam pa snang bar mdzad pa'i 'od kyi dkyir can dang / stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams snang bas yongs su rgyas par mdzad pa dang / ji srid du me tog gi
331a5(rgyud): gzhi'i snying pa'i rgyan bkod pa'i rgya mtsho rnam par snang / bar byed cing / chos kyi dbyings kyi mthar thug pa'i bar du/ ste/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yul gdul byi'i dbang
331a6(rgyud): las thams cad snang bar byed cing / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad dbyings kyis rnam par rig par mdzad pa dang / stong gnyis dang gsum dang / ji srid na mkha'i mthar thug pa'i
331a7(rgyud): bar thams cad 'odi dang // dbyangs kyis snang bar byas nas rnam par rig par mdzad pa dang / chos dang zang zazing dang / don 'thun pa dang // don bya ba'i bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi
331a8(rgyud): rnams kyis sems can rnams la phan 'dogs shing / phan btags nas byang chub chen po la rab tu dgod par mdzad do// skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis man/ 
331b1(rgyud): pa nyid kyis chos rnams thams cad mnyam zhing ba ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi mtshan mngon par 'grub par blta bar bya'i// mtshan ma yin pa mngon par 'grub pa ni ma yin no// 
331b2(rgyud): byang chub mtshan nyid med pa nyid kyi phyir chos rnams thams cad mtshan nyid med pa ste/ 'di lta ste stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid can no// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyang stsa
331b3(rgyud): po nyid du mnyam pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / byang chub dang / chos rnams thams cad kyang mtshan nyid cig pa ste/ 'di lta ste/ na mkha'i mtshan nyid can/ 
331b4(rgyud): zhi ba'i mtshan nyid can rnams so zhes pa'o// oM sarba/ ta thA ga ta ba ra la kA Na sa ma ta d+ha ma te oM/ mtshan thams cad mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba'i shes rab
331b5(rgyud): kyi pha rol tu phyizhi pa'o// // dpe byad brgyad cu rnams ci zhe ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sen mo de ngas kyi mdog lta bar 'gyur te sen mo snum pa dang / 
331b6(rgyud): sen mo mtho bo dang / sen mo rnams zlum par gyur ba dang / sor mo rnams rims kyis phra ba dang / sor mo rnams rgyas pa dang / rtsa mi mngon pa dang / rtsa rnams mdud pa med
331b7(rgyud): ba dang long bu ma mngon pa dang / zhabs mi mnyam pa med par mtshungs pa dang // glang po che'i stabs su gshegs pa dang / seng ge'i stabs su gshegs pa
331b8(rgyud): dang g.yas phyogs su ldog cing gshegs pa dang / drang por gshegs pa dang / mdzes par gshegs pa dang // rims kyis gshegs pa dang / che zhing
332a1(rgyud): yangs la yongs su gyur pa'i dbus mo'i lha bcan dang / mtshan yongs su rdzogs pa dang / gom pa snyoms pa dang / sgyu rnam par dag pa dang / 
332a2(rgyud): sku 'jam pa dang / sku rnam par dngas pa dang / sku zhum pa med pa dang / sku rku ba med pa dang / kun tu spyod pa gtsang ba dang / khyu mchog ltar kun nas rab tu dang ba can dang / 
332a3(rgyud): gzigs pa yongs su dag cing mngon par 'dod pa la mnyam pa'i 'od can dang / sku zlum pa dang / sku skabs phyin pa dang / sku mo rnyongs pa dang / sgyu sked gtsur lag bcangs lha
332a4(rgyud): bu dang // lte ba zab pa dang / lte bu maM g.yo ba dang / lce rab g.yas phyogs su 'khyil ba dang / lte ba thogs dbo med pa dang / yan log dang nying lag shin tu rnam
332a5(rgyud): bar 'byes pa dang / lpags bskyon dang bral ba dang // zhag dag dang sme ba med po dang / sku bstan pa dang / phyag shing bal lta bu dang / phyag spangs pa dang / phyag
332a6(rgyud): gi ri mo snum pa dang / phyag gi ri mo mi yo ba dang / mchu 'om pa lta bu dang / zhal ha cang mi ring ba dang / mnyen zhing srab la dmar ba'i ljags dang / glang po che da ro can dang / 
332a7(rgyud): snyan cing mngon pa'i dbyangs dang / sgra phun sum tshogs pa dang / dbyangs 'jam pa dang / shangs mtho ba dang / mche ba zlum pa dang / mche ba dkar ba dang / mche 'byin gyis phra ba dang / 
332a8(rgyud): spyan gtsang ba dang / spyan yangs pa dang / spyan 'thon 'thong dang // rdzi mo gnag pa dang / sprin ma sdug pa dang / smin ma 'jam pa dang / spyan dkar nag 'byes shing pad+ma'i mdab ma lta/ 
332b1(rgyud): bu dang / smon tshugs ring ba dang / smin ma'i spu nag pa dang // smin ma'i spu phra ba dang / smin ma rje su 'thun pa dang / kha dog ma nyams pa dang / snyan mi mnyam pa med pa dang / snyan
332b2(rgyud): skyen dang bral ba dang / dbang po thams cad ma nyams shing skyon dang bral ba dang / skra yongasu rdzogs shing mtho la mchog tu gnas pa'i zhal gdong dang / dpral ba can dang dbu shin
332b3(rgyud): tu rgyas pa dang / dbu skra gnas pa dang / dbu skra dri zhim pa dang / dbu mnyam pa dang / dbu skra snum pa dang / dbu skra ma 'khu 'khums pa dang / dbu skra ma'i khrugs pa dang / dpal
332b4(rgyud): bo'u dang // bkra shos dang / g.yung drung 'khyil pas rgyan pa dang // rgyal mtshan yang dag par gnas pa dang / dpral ba dung lha dang / dbu mchog tu mtho ba dang / gtsug yar
332b5(rgyud): 'phags pa dang / dbu gdugs kyi rnam pa can dang / kun nas mdzes pa ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ni// tshad med pa'i dpe byad can mnyam pa nyid la lags pa
332b6(rgyud): legs par rab tu gnas pa gsal byed dang / gsal byed ma yin pa nyid la legs par rab tu gnas pa/ chos the mas cad gsal byed med par mnyam pa nyid la legs
332b7(rgyud): bar rag tu gnas pa mtshan dang dpe khyod thams cad sgyu mo'i chos dang ldan pa la legs par rab tu gnas gdus gsum gyi dpe byad mnyam po nyid rdo rje lta bu mnyam pa nyid kyi chos
332b8(rgyud): thams cad dang // dpe byed mnyam pa nyid thob pa/ gnyi su med pa'i don la legs par yang dag par zhugs pa rnams so zhes pa'o// oM a nu bya ban+d+ha na sa ma tA su pra tiSh+Thi ta badz+ra/ 
333a1(rgyud): dz+nyA na d+hU l+r-i//  pe byad mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa zad 'dus par gyur nas/ 
333a2(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po can la leg so zhes bya ba rnams kyis mnyes par mdzad// oM byang chub sems ched khyod lag so// sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag nyid
333a3(rgyud): mchog/ sangs rgyas chen po khyod legs// ting 'dzin dbang du 'jug pa yi/ rdo rje ye shes khyod leg so// rdo rje sems dpa' khyod leg so// tshad med chen du khyod leg so// shes rab dam
333a4(rgyud): nga'i ched du yang / mdo sde 'don lags par bshad/ sangs rgyas snga mas ma gsu nges pa'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen pos/ de
333a5(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa rnams thams cad la phyag 'tshal ba bana'i mngon par dgos par mdzad// sangs rgyas khyed la phyag 'tshalo// chos kyi sku yi mchog gi mchog
333a6(rgyud): gdod ma'i sngags kyi don nyid la// rdo rje ye shes stobs chen la// shin tu sgrib med zhi ba la// rdo rje chos rnams legs gon so ba/ theg pa chen po'i go 'phang thob// thugs rje'i bdag
333a7(rgyud): can gyi lha// gdod nas dag pa dpa' bo che// dbang phyug dam pa mchog gi mchog/ dam chos mchog tu 'gyur pa med// bde gshegs de rnams la phyag 'tshal zhes pa'o// na mo
333a8(rgyud): sku sta oM maM hUM hUM na mo stu swA hA// 'di ni brjod pa tsam zhig gis// sangs rgyas thaMd rab mchod pa'o zhes pa'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam pararo snang chen pos de bzhin gshes/ 
333b1(rgyud): pa thams cad bos nas 'di skad ces gsung so// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnams thaMd dngos grub thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor bskyed par mdzad du gsol// de nas btsa
333b2(rgyud): ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnams thams cad slar yang 'dus pa mdzad nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje can gyi dbang phyug chen po la gsol ba btab pa/ bcom ldan 'das
333b3(rgyud): khyed nyid kyis rigs zad 'khor lor bskyed par mdzad du gsolade nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen pos gsol ba btab pa'i gsung gis dri ma thag
333b4(rgyud): kho nar 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la bos te bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal la de bzhin gshegs pa rnams thaMd kyi byang chub kyi snying po nyon cog ces te/ de nas
333b5(rgyud): 'di las yang dag bshad// byang chub dkyil 'khor/ bla na med// rdo rje ye shes gsang ba mchog/ sangs rgyas skyob po thams cad kyi'o// dben pa'i sa gni nyams
333b6(rgyud): dga' ba// me tog phreng bas rnam rgyan pa/ kun tu sna tshogs cha bzang ba// kun tu sna tshogs sdom par ni// kun nas sna tshogs bya ba rnams// dam pa'i don du bsgrub par bya/ ri yaM mchog
333b7(rgyud): gam grong khyer ni// me tog 'bras bus rnam rgyan pa// deng gnas sngags pas dngos grub mchog/ gal te 'dod na yang dag bri// gtsug lag khang dang dgon pa'i gnas// ri stengs rnam
333b8(rgyud): su kun nas ni// sangs rgyas kun gyi bya ba rnams// dam pa'i don du bsgrub par bya/ ma mo gnas dang zhi ba'i gnas// dur khrod lha yi gnas no// rdo rje 'dzin dpal bya ba rnams// don dam par
334a1(rgyud): ni bsgrub par bya// pad+ma'i skyed mos tshul kun dang // chu bo 'dus pa rnamasu yang // phyag na pad+ma dpal bya ba// dam pa'i don du bsgrub par bya// rgyal po'i pho brang nyams
334a2(rgyud): dga' dang / rgyal po'i bskyed tshol rnams ni// rdo rje rin chen de yi ni// rin chen bya ba rnams bsgrub byo// rtags cig pa dang ba lang ltas// chu klung 'dus pa rnamasu yang // sna tshogs bya
334a3(rgyud): bzad rnams// dam pa'i don tu bsgrub par bya// dpal ldan rdo rje sems dpa' dang // lha rnams gnas mchog kun tu'o// namakha' 'am ni phyogs gzhan du// gang du mnyam par gnag pa dang / 
334a4(rgyud): rtag par bsod nams mchog gyur pa// bya ba thaMd bsgrub dbar bya// phyogs kun mnyam nyid gnas dkyil 'khor// sa rab can gyis thig gdab bya// shar lho nub dang byang rnams kyi
334a5(rgyud): phyogasu dkyil 'khor thig brgyad do// kha dog lnga / ra 'bar ba'o// gru bzhi pa la sgo ban pa// rta babs ngan yis mdzes pa ste/ sna tshogs gos dang me tog phreng / 
334a6(rgyud): sogs kyis rnam rgyun ga dkyil 'khor kun la gnas pa yi// sgo dang sgo khyud mtshams rnamasu// rdo rje rin chen rnams kyis spras// dkyil 'khor de yi dbus ni// gal te dngos grub mchog
334a7(rgyud): 'dod na// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa// sangs rgyas gzugs brnyan bri bar bya// shar du bcom ldan 'khor lo can// rdo rje sems dpa' yang dag ldan// 'khor lo sgyur ba thams cad
334a8(rgyud): ni/ sgeg par bcas pa kun bri bya// lho ru gtsug tor dkar po ni// rin chen 'bar ba yang dag ldan// gtsug tor dkar po'i dbusu ni// rdo rje gzi brjid la sogs bri khyeng du brtson 'grus/ 
334b1(rgyud): chen po ni// gzi brjid phung po stobs po che/ sna tshogs rdo rje sogs bcas pa// rim pa kun nas bri bar bya// rdo rje rnal 'byor can gyi ni// dbang phyug mgon po'i nub phyogasu// gtsug to
334b2(rgyud): rgyal ba brtson 'grus che// rdo rje chos sogs dam bcas pa// thams cad sngags pas bri bar ga// gal te dngos grub mchog 'dod na'o// dbang ldan phyogasu 'phags po gnas// me mtsham
334b3(rgyud): su ni cher 'phag so// bden bral du ni rnam rgyal nyid// rlung du de bzhin rnam 'phro ba'o// rdo rje sade'i sems dpa' che// sada'i kun gyi mdun du ni/ zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas pa// gsal
334b4(rgyud): zhing 'bar 'khrigs 'od zer can// mkhas pa dkyil 'khor rnams ni// mchod pa rnams no bzhag byas te// sgeg mo la sog/ sa mchod pa che// de bzhin gzugs sgra la sogs dang // bdugs
334b5(rgyud): pa la sogs gsang chen no// sgo skyong ba ni bani yaM/ no// phyi yi dkyil 'khor gnas rnamasu// kun tu bzang po la sogs brika de ltar dkyil 'khor bri bya ste/ mchod pa byas
334b6(rgyud): nas snga ma bzhin// de bzhin 'jug pa sogs byas la// sgrub pa'i thabs ni brtsam par bya// rdo rje rnal 'byor dbang phyug sogs// dkyil 'khor mngon sum mthong ba los// snga ma rtag
334b7(rgyud): bzhin du// phyi ma de bzhin dri bar bya// bsod nams ldan pas dkyil 'khor rnams// thaMd tshon gyis rab bortags pa// rang gi lha ki bos// dkyil 'khor thaMd bri bar 'gyur// rang lha'i
334b8(rgyud): bdag nyid rnal 'byor gyis dkyil 'khor thade rab tu grub// cho ga dman dang lhag pas kyang // 'grub par 'gyur te skyon ma yin/ kun tu sna tshogs skal bzang ba// kon nas sna tshogs 'khor
335a1(rgyud): lo can 'khor los bsgyur ba bdag nyid che// rin chen bdun gyis mchod pa che// yong su rdzogs pa'i zla ba wAr/ dkyil 'khor bdud rtsi 'byung zhes bya// sangs rgyas rje
335a2(rgyud): 'dzin sogs kyi// dkyil le bar 'di ni bshad pa'o// phyag na pad+ma bdag nyid che'o// pad+ma'i rnam par shes par bya// rin po che'i rin chen rnams// dkyis 'khor sna tshogs rnam pa'o// dkyil 'khor
335a3(rgyud): dman zhing dam tshig rnams// dor bar byas pa de nyid ni// gsang ba shes pa ma yin na// sgrub pa'i thabs ni 'grub mi 'gyur// de phyir 'bad pa thams cad kyis// dkyil 'khor tham cad ltab
335a4(rgyud): ni gal te dngos grub mchog 'dod na// gdon mi/ rna bar rtag tu bya// bla ma l-i ni yon phul nas// su rim ra pos bsgrub par bya// brtan 'am ni g.yo ba yi// rjes rnams
335a5(rgyud): ji snyed thams cad do// rtsa ba me to 'bras bu sogs// bu mo legs par rgyan pas dang // 'dod pa'i chung ma phul byos nas// slar yang rin gyis bslu bar bya// grong dang
335a6(rgyud): de bzhin gtsug lag khang // kun dag rer sogs rgyal srid mchog/ gang la sbyin bya cung zad yod// 'tsho ba de ni sbyin par bya// bdag gi dngos po yos gtong ba// sangs rgyas
335a7(rgyud): thams cad rab mchod pa'o// bla ma ya ni yon phul nas// gsang ba dam pa rmad byung gau/ mngon par dbang bskur de nas bya// mdab ma brgyad pa yid 'ong la// slob ma bzhag nas yan lag/ 
335a8(rgyud): kun phyag rgya kun nas bcings byas nas// khams kun rang bzhin tsa ba dang // sa bon 'bras bus dud pa yi// bum pa rnams kyis dbang bskur te// sangs rgyas phreng ba'i dbang bskur las// 
335b1(rgyud): spyi bo dang ni dpral ba dang // gzhog dang de bzhin rgyab du yang // sangs rgyas rin chen po kun/ cod pan mchog tu mi 'gyur ba'o// dpal ldan sangs rgyas gtsug nor bu// gdugs dkar
335b2(rgyud): steng na gnas pa'o// rgyal srid kun gyi dbang bskur gyis// yang dang yang du dbang bskur bya// dpal kun gyis ni mngon mthob// zhes bya'i dbang bskur bshad pa'o// khams kun rang bzhin gla
335b3(rgyud): bdang rta ni mchog tu 'bar ba 'am// seng ge'i gdan ste pa bskur ba// dpal gyi sngags ni brjod byed cing // dpal gyis mngon mtho zhes bya 'am// dam pa'i don gyis dbang bskur ba// bkra shis
335b4(rgyud): sam ni dpal be'u// gang yang bris nas dbang bskurabya// sangs rgyas dpa' bo thams cad kyis// rnam rgyal dang / rang bskur zhes bshad// tsan dan chu dang bung ba che/ ke nan gyis mi
335b5(rgyud): thub sman blugs la// kun nas dbang bskur chad du ni// rtag tu shes rab can gyis btag// gzhan gyis mi thub dbang bskur mchog/ dkyil 'khor gang gang bris byas nas// 
335b6(rgyud): phyag rgya gang dang gang bkod pa// der ni de dang de brtag bya// de rnams phyag rgya dam par bshad// dbang bskur ched du sangs rgyas rnams// lha de rnams ni yid du 'ong // sman gyi dam pa mchog
335b7(rgyud): go// sangs rgyas kun gyis rab gyis rab tu bshad// tsan dan dang ni rgyu spos dang // gang bur de bzhini gur gum dang // a ka ru dang lha yi shing // tsan daMn dmar po nyid dang ni// sa~MhA
335b8(rgyud): g+hi de bzhin mchog/ kun nas ha sa de ba dang // gau ri kata tshangs mchod sbyin// sman gyi dam pa rnamasu bshad// lho gnas kun gyi sbyor ba yis// sangs rgyas mchod par ba 'jug cing // ngang
